40015020	Yucha yu lhkilikiy an lapanak; pero li wa ntucha akma'ch'a'alh chi ak'ulhcha li tu'u, yucha ntu jalhkilikinin.
40015021	Taxtulhcha ancha an Jesús, alhcha la'acha'an Tiro chi la'acha'an Sidón.
40015022	Walh pumatam t'aku yu minchalh sta la'acha'an Canán, la'cha'alhi an Jesús, chi p'ascha ixa'alay ixjuniy: —¡Jamach'lhkat Jesús, ists'alh David, iksk'iniyan lamapaynin! An kintsi wa la'apaxto'ta la'atam makxkay'un, chi sawalhcha mama'alh'ajni.
40015023	Pero an Jesús tu k'is sip ix'ilhtuy. Pus tajuniy an ixt'alhtanan: —K'a'un li ka'ancho'ochalhcha, mu kintach'a'o'atan chi t'asajmintacha.
40015024	An Jesús najun: —Kit'in kimakminkanta li wa yucha an jamacha'an Israelhi ajkapuxkawlh, mu tats'an'ata.
40015025	Pero an t'aku la'cha'alhi an Jesús chi tatso'ottanilhcha la xlakapu', ixtapayninicha ixjuniy: —¡Ak'i'lhi'a't'ay'ut'i Jamach'alhkat, Jesús!
40015026	Pero yucha wa juniy: —Jantu oxi xajachalh li ajkama'osunilhcha yu ta'ut'ajun kijas'at'ank'an chi ajkamaka'anilhcha an x'oyun.
40015027	An t'aku juniy: —Chuni Jamach'alhkat Jesús, pero an x'oyun ta'usak'a masi wa xala'tach'e'echa an ts'aluku yu patajuy laka mesa.
40015028	Pus akxni an Jesús juniy an t'aku: —Uxint'i jak'iklak'a'inin sawalh, kunacha yu lak'ask'in. Pus an istsi an t'aku wa akxniy ta'oxicho'olhcha.
40015029	Ancho'olhcha an Jesús, alhcha wani xa'alamalh Galilea; chi tama'ast'a'alhcha a'stitawk'a, anchacha sa' tawlhchalh.
40015030	Lhilhuwi la'cha'ankalh, chi ixtalhicha'anicha yu wa la'ch'anlh'awilin, chi yu wa la'la'lhtulu'un, chi yu wa laj'a'atapanin, chi yu wa lakmaklht'ulukun, chi ali'incha ta'an'anin, wa tuchicha ta'an'at ixtapakxanta. La xlakapucha an Jesusi ixtayajuy chi yucha ixjak'uch'uycha.
40015031	Tacha an ts'anakscha ixlakyakalh, sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya li an yu ntu lay ixtachiwiniy, ixtachiwinicha, chi an lakmaklht'ulukun ixtata'oxicha, chi an la'ch'anlh'awilin oxicha ixtalakalhtan, chi an la'la'lhtulu'un oxicha ixtajalakawanan. Sawalhcha ixtalaknajuni li an ixDiosk'an jamacha'an Israel ay sawalh.
40015032	Jat'asanilhi an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jajuniy: —Ijkamapayniya ani lapanakni, mu la'at'utucha wilhchani ani tat'ajun, chi ntu tu'u yu katita'ulh; chi ajkamala'achacho'olhcha wa chuncha, wa lay inta tala'la'awitijtayalh laka tij.
40015033	An ixt'alhtanan tajuniy: —Wanaj lhilhuwi tacha ani ayxto'kan, para kajamalhilaaniw ¿Tanischa lay ka'iyaw lhuw pan li ani ntu tu'u lakwilakalhi?
40015034	An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Tasu a'xchuxcha pani lhit'ant'at? Yu'uncha tajuniy: —A'xtujun chi lakats'unicha lakt'ikt'i jatanti.
40015035	Pus an Jesús jajuniy an lapanakni li katalaktawlh'olhka an lakaat'un.
40015036	Chi yucha xa'a'ilhcha an a'xtujun pan chi an jatanti, chi xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun, xli'astan la'ch'e'elhcha, wachuncha jala'xta'nilhcha an ixt'alhtanan, chi yu'uncha tamala'pitsinilhcha ixchuxk'an an lapanakni.
40015037	Xchuxchak'ani talak'ulh chi talhikiklalhcha. Xli'astan la'atujun kanastaja a'tsamcho'olh yu wa xaxajnicha tapusakcho'olh.
40015038	An lapanakni an yu talakwaylh la'at'at'i milh, an t'akunin chi an jas'at'an an yu tama'waylh wachu, jantu jat'aput'e'ekalh.
40015039	Jala'axa'ala'olh an Jesús an lapanakni, tajulhcha an laka barco, alhcha tanchun la'acha'an junkan Magdala.
40016001	An Jesús tala'cha'alhi an fariseojnin chi an saduceojnin ixtalhila'ts'intanuycha, ixtajuni li ma kajamasunilh tu'u an lakt'iyan.
40016002	Yucha ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Akxni tats'isicha uxitnan nawnat li oxi wilhchani kuna katunkuna li akxni la'ts'inat an lakt'iyan li slapulh.
40016003	Chi akxni wats'isin, li wa talaktsin an jataputs'i chi li slapulhi an lakt'iyan, nawnat li kamina xkan chi li kalaya un.
40016004	An la'ma'lhta'alhinin yu chaway tat'ajun talakask'in li tu'u kajamasunikalh, pero ntu tu'u katijamasunikalh, wa yucha an tacha putapasalh tichi lapanak yu ixjunkan Jonás, yu ma'anchacha xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios. Jamakawlh an Jesús, alhcha.
40016005	Tacha'alhcha ixtapiktutam an lakxkan, an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús ixtakapta li katalhi'alh pan.
40016006	An Jesús jajuniy: —K'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti li ntu katamatsaman an ixlamaskajank'an an fariseojnin chi an saduceojnin.
40016007	Yu'uncha ixtapast'ak'a li sna xliyu ntu ixtalhi'anta pan.
40016008	Pus jalhimacha'xanilhi an Jesús, jajuniy: —Wa k'isi jak'iklak'a'ininat'iti lapanakni ¿Tasu li p'ast'ak'atcha li sna xliyu jant'u lhit'ant'at pani li chuncha klajunawi?
40016009	¿Jant'uk'a' lhimach'a'xayat'it, ch'i nt'u p'ast'ak'at'iti akxni an la'akisi milh lapanakni ta'ulh wa a'xkisi pan, chi tani la'achuxcha kanastaja p'usakch'o'ot?
40016010	¿Chi akxni ta'ulh la'at'at'i milh lapanakni wa a'xtujun pan, chi tani la'achuxcha kanastaja p'usakch'o'ot?
40016011	¿T'asuch'a li nt'u lhimach'a'xayat'iti li ntu xliyu li nt'u lhit'ant'at pani li iklajunaw li k'alajk'ats'anant'iti, li ntu katamatsaman xlhamaskajank'an an fariseojnin chi an saduceojnini?
40016012	Pus akxni talhimacha'xalhcha li ntu yu an lhimaskajakan pani juniy an Jesús, yucha an ixlamap'a'sink'an an fariseojnin chi an saduceojnin.
40016013	Akxni cha'alhcha la'acha'an tanchun junkan Cesarea de Filipo an Jesús, jalhisakmicha an ixt'alhtanan, jajuniy: —¿Tasucha talaknajun an lapanakni li tichini yuchacha an isTs'alh Diosi?
40016014	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Ali'in tanajun ma jama'paxanaj Juan, chi ali'in tanajun ma Elías, chi ali'in tanajun ma Jeremías, u ma wa xatichicha yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
40016015	Yucha jajuniy: —Chi uxitnan ¿tisi kit'inch'a nawnat'iti?
40016016	Pus an Simón Pedro alhtaylh, juniy: —Uxint'i Cristojk'at'i, isTs'alh Dios, yu la'ajunta.
40016017	Wachuncha alhtaylh an Jesús, juniy: —Sawalhch'a oxi ilht'uk'ani Simón, ists'alh Jonás, yucha an kimPay yu wilhchalh lakt'iyani chuncha manawniyan, jantu wa mijatapast'ak'atcha.
40016018	Chi k'it'in wachu ijkunan, uxint'i Pedrojk'at'i, chi la x'ukxni ani chiwxi akyawya an kintajtan. An ixlakmakxkayaxtu lhinin tu lay katilhajalhi an kintajtan.
40016019	Akxta'niyani an xayavej an lhich'alhkat anu lakt'iyan, chux yu k'ach'i'ulaya'a aniy lakaat'un, anu lakt'iyan wachu kach'i'ulakananta; chi chux yu k'ax'ot'a'a aniy lakaat'un, anu lakt'iyan wachu kax'otkananta.
40016020	Wachuncha an Jesús, jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan li ntu xamati katajunilh li yucha Cristo.
40016021	Chi akxni, an Jesús tsukulhcha jajuniya ixla'ts'awalanti an ixt'alhtanan li ka'ana stak ma'alh'ajna yucha, la'acha'an Jerusalén, li katama'niya', jajuniy: —Yu'uncha an laktatanincha jamacha'an Israel chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sini yu akintama'niya'. Pero akla'awcho'oya xlila'at'utu wilhchan.
40016022	Pus wachuncha an Pedro t'atala'xtinulhi an Jesús, chi sawalhcha juniy: —¡Jantu Jamach'alhkat Jesús, jantu layi ch'unch'ach'a k'at'ip'ut'ap'asa! Dioscha kalhi'a'tayjun.
40016023	An Jesús tala'asp'itlhi, juniy an Pedro: —¡K'a'ost'i satanás k'imama't'ijlay! Mu uxint'i nt'u yu lhak'ap'up'in yu ixnawain Dios, wa yucha an ixjatapast'ak'atchak'an lapanakni lhak'ap'up'in.
40016024	Chi jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús: —Li xamati kint'alhtana jumputun, kamakawlhcha yu wa xjatapast'ak'atcha, kaxa'a'ilhcha xcruz yu lay kapuma'nikalh chi akinch'a'o'alhcha.
40016025	Mu wa tichicha li yu kama'alhtaxtuputuna ixjatsukunti, kama'ats'an'aya', pero yu kama'ats'an'aya ixjatsukunti kilakata, kala'cha'ana'.
40016026	Chi an lapanak masi wanajcha ix'anu kajun'olh an lakaamunulhpa, ¿tasu lhila'ancha li kama'ats'an'alhi an ixjatsukunti? ¿Tasucha lay kalhila'cha'ancho'oya xjatsukunti?
40016027	Mu an isTs'alh Lapanak alhp'asi kaxlimj mina la xtachaput an ixPay, ali an ix'angelhnini kajat'amina'. Axkni atamj atamjcha kamapalhnikana tuchini ilhtulhcha.
40016028	Klajunaw yu sawalh, ali'in yu ani tat'ajun, jantu katitanilh sta akxni kamina ch'alhkatna an isTs'alh Lapanak, .
40017001	La'achaxancha wilhchan la'pusli, an Jesús jat'a'alhcha tanchun talhman a'stitawk'a an Pedro chi ixt'uyunk'an yu wa lhit'ala'awnin, Jakobo chi Juan, wa ix'akstuk'an.
40017002	La x'ukxlakapuchak'an yu'uncha, an Jesús, tapaxalh, an ix'ukxpu wa xlimjcha walh, tacha an wilhchan; chi an ixla'ch'it wa sut'ut'ucha walh, tacha an jatunkunu'.
40017003	Chi tatalakasulhcha an Moisés chi an Elías, ixtat'achiwiniycha an Jesús.
40017004	An Pedro juniy an Jesús: —Jamach'alhkat, Jesús, oxi li ani ikt'awnaw, li la'a'iy akyawya a'at'utu de jach'itin cha'a': a'atan mi anucha, chi a'atam ix'anucha an Moisés, chi a'atam ix'anucha an Elías.
40017005	Chunchaka ixnawt'ajun, walh jala'atanchanulhcha la'atam jataputs'i, wa xlimjnik'acha, chi an laka jataputs'i ixchiwinkancha, ixnawkan: —Yucha aniya yu ikmapayni kints'alh, oxi iklhiwilay, k'a'asmatnit'iti yucha.
40017006	Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tala'ta'antatawilhcha, sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan.
40017007	Pus an Jesús, stalh jala'alh ixjalak'aych'apaycha, jajuniy: —K'alakt'ayatcha nt'u k'alakt'alhanant'it.
40017008	Akxni talaktalakatiyawcho'olhcha wa yucha an Jesuscha xtala'ts'incho'oy.
40017009	Chi akxni tata'alhtaju'cho'olhcha an a'stitawk'a an Jesús, jajuniy: —Jant'u xamat'i k'a'unit t'ach'a an la'ts'int'it, sta akxni akla'awcho'oya kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak.
40017010	Wachuncha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, talhisakmi tajuniy: —¿Pus tasu li an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin tanajun li task'iniya li yucha an Eliasi p'ulhnaj kamilhi?
40017011	Yucha jajuniy: —Chun sawalh, an Elías p'ulhnaja kamina', kamina mala'asijnini chux an tanlhun.
40017012	Pero klajunaw yucha kilachilhcha, pero ntu tamispalh, stak ta'ilhtulhi wa tani ta'ilhtuputulhcha; wachu chuni kata'ilhtuya an isTs'alh Lapanak.
40017013	Pus akxni an ixt'alhtanan talhimacha'xalhi li yucha an jama'paxanaj Juani ixjalhixa'alay.
40017014	Akxni tacha'alhcha tan lhilhuw ts'anaks ixlakyakalh, pumatam lapanak la'cha'alh an Jesús, tatso'ottanilhcha, juniy:
40017015	Jamach'alhkat, Jesús, lamapaynin ak'ink'uch'uninka an kints'alh, mu wa sawalh niy chi sawalhcha ma'alh'ajnan, a'lhuwcha ta'a'tay laka jikmi chi lakxkan.
40017016	Yucha amint'alhtanani xajkalhiminita, pero ntu lay tak'uch'uy.
40017017	An Jesús najun: —¡Yu ch'away t'awnat jant'u jak'iklak'a'ininat'it, wa t'ani lap'ut'unatcha layat'itcha! ¿Tasu wanancha wa aktilat'a'aklatsukuyawi? ¿Tasu wanancha wa aktilalhilhitayaniyawi? ¡K'alhit'at'iti an ts'alh!
40017018	Wachuncha an Jesús, la'a'aymalhi an makxkay'un, pus makawlhcha an ts'alh, wa akxni ta'oxilhcha.
40017019	Xli'astan akxni wa ix'akstuchak'an ixtat'ayanalh an Jesús an ixt'alhtanan, stalh tala'alh, tajuniy: —¿Tasu li ntu lay ijk'uch'uw kitnani?
40017020	Yucha jajuniy: —Mu wanaj wa k'isi jak'iklak'a'ininat'it; li k'ajak'iklaka'inint'it masi wa tacha lakat'ikt'icha xatalhts'i mostaza, layi ka'una'it ani a'stitawk'a, anu kast'alh p'it'i, chi ka'ana', layi k'a'ilht'uya'it wa tuchicha.
40017021	Ani makxkay'un chuncha kataxtuya li t'ap'ayniniyat'iti Dios ch'i li lhit'ask'ajayat'iti mak'awnat mi waytk'an.
40017022	Anchaka ixtat'ajun la'acha'an Galilea, an Jesús, jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan: —An isTs'alh Lapanak kama'axta'kana la xmaknik'an an lapanakni,
40017023	katama'niya', pero kala'awcho'oya xlila'at'utu wilhchan. Pus an ixt'alhtanan sawalhcha ixtata'oxila'alhiy.
40017024	Akxni tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Capernaúm an Jesús, an Pedro tala'cha'alh an talhach'inin ixlakata tajtan, talhisakmi tajuniy: —¿Amimaestrojk'an mapalhlhi'ani ixlakata an tajtan?
40017025	Chun, mapalhlhi'an jajuniya an Pedro. Walh akxni tanuchalhcha an Pedro, tan xwilh an Jesús, yuchacha p'ulh xa'alast'uk'a, junkan an Pedro: —Pedro ¿T'asuch'a lhiwilayi? an xarejnin aniy lakaamunulhpa ¿tisiyu'unchacha yu talhich'i an tanlhuncha lhimapalhi'ati? ¿Yu'uncha an yu tat'alamispay an rejnin u yu'uncha an yu ntu tat'alamispay?
40017026	An Pedro juniy: —Yu'uncha an yu ntu tat'alamispay. Pus an Jesús juniy: —Ah, pus an yu tat'alamispay jantu tamapalay.
40017027	Pero masi chuncha kitnan kajamapalhniyaw, para li oxi akintala'ts'inkan. K'ap'inchi an lakxkan, k'amu'uya'a ami'anzuelo, chi an yu p'ulh k'ach'ap'ayawya'a jatanti k'ak'ikmaxt'uya'a a'xtam tumin, yuchacha k'alhimap'ala'a kilakata chi milakata.
40018001	La'atam panch'e'ex an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tala'cha'alh, talhisakmi tichini yu palaycha xa'ay anu la xlich'alhkat Dios.
40018002	Yucha t'asanilh pumatam jas'at'a chi ixtan'ajnichak'an yu'uncha yawlh.
40018003	Chi jajuniy: —Li jant'u map'axayatcha mijatsukuntik'an li jantu tacha ani jas'at'a unat'it jant'u k'at'ip'it'iti la xlich'alhkat Dios.
40018004	Yu tacha ani jas'at'a kajakilhpatinijk'atsaaya yucha yu xa'ay an la xlich'alhkat Dios kuna'.
40018005	Chi yu mapayniya xamati jas'at'a kilakata, kit'ini kila'a'iy.
40018006	Pero watichicha yu mama'lhta'alhiniy xapumatam an jas'at'an an yu kintakiklaka'iy, palay oxi kalhtuj ch'ipixtanukalh aya chiwx chi kawarjcha maka'ankalh tan putalhman alamalh.
40018007	¡Payni'incha an lapanakni aniy lakaamunulhpa', mu tanlhuni alin yu jamama'lhta'alhiniy! wa xliyu chuncha lhitask'ini li katapasalh, ¡pero yu wa la'ayajcha ilhtuyi li xamati ka'ilhtulh tala'alhin, ay tala'alhini ilhtuy!
40018008	Xliyu li mimaka u minch'aja ma'ilhtuyani yu ntu oxi, k'ach'a'xmaj'a. Palay oxi wa ch'anlht'uluku u maklht'uluku k'ach'ip'i laka jatsukunti, walh jantu masi li a'ts'a'o'oy, chi k'amakp'ink'a laka jikmi tan tu a'tam mixa.
40018009	Chi li mila'chulh ma'ilhtuyani yu ntu oxi, k'amaxt'u, k'amaj'a. Palay oxi wa la'atam mila'chulh k'ach'ip'i laka jatsukunti, walh jantu li a'tsa'ojoy mila'chulh k'amakp'ink'a tan tu a'tam mixa jikmi.
40018010	Jant'u k'ajaxk'ayla'ts'int'iti ani jas'at'an, mu yu'uncha talhit'ajun ix'angelhnink'an yu lhilhij tala'ts'inachalh an kimPay anu lakt'iyan.
40018011	Mu an yu walh isTs'alh Lapanak minta jama'alhtaxtunu an yu tats'an'ata.
40018012	¿T'asuch'a lhiwilayat? li xamati lapanak jalhit'ajun tamciento ixborregojnin chi li kama'ats'an'alh la'atam, ¿chu ntu kajamakawnaka an noventa y nueve, chi ka'anacha puxkawna an la'atam an lakak'iwin?
40018013	Chi li akxni la'cha'ancho'oycha, sawalhcha t'alaj'achan, palay jantu an noventa y nueve yu ntu ixjama'ats'an'ata.
40018014	Pus chunchacha amimPayk'an yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan, jantu la'a'iya li xamati kats'an'alh an jas'at'an.
40018015	Li tu'u jantu oxi ilhtuniyan mint'ala'ajun, k'ala'p'it'i, k'at'alakch'iwin tan wa mi'akstuk'an, li asmatniyan, lhajaxt'uch'o'ocha amint'ala'ajun.
40018016	Pero li ntu asmatniyan, k'a'aylhip'i pumatam u pumat'uy, para li lhipumat'uy u lhipumat'utucha k'at'ach'iwinint'it.
40018017	Li wachu jantu ja'asmatniy, an tan tata'ayxt'o'acha ixlapanakni Diosi k'aja'un, chi li wachu jantu ja'asmatniy, kalhi'ilht'ucha li ntu mispay Dios chi li wa tacha an yu wa talhimo'slayalhach'inincha tanlhun.
40018018	Klajunaw, watuchicha yu nt'u k'at'imak'a'unt'iti chuncha kawalh aniy lakaat'un, anu lakt'iyan wachu ntu katijunchalh, chi yu k'amak'awna'it'iti chuncha kawalh aniy lakaat'un, anu lakt'iyan wachu chuni kajunanta.
40018019	A'tam klajumpalaw, li mint'uyunk'an wa tami k'ak'ats'at'it aniy lakaat'un ch'i k'ask'init'it tu'u an Kimpay yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan, kataxta'niyan.
40018020	Mu tan ixt'uyunk'an u ixt'utunk'an ta'ayxto'nun la kintalakask'i ancha ikjapujayalh.
40018021	Wachuncha an Pedro stalh la'alh, juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ¿tasu a'chuxcha lay akmala'mixiniya kint'ala'ajun li tu'u yu ntu oxi ki'ilhtuniya? ¿a'tujun?
40018022	An Jesús alhtaylh, juniy: —Jantu ijkunan li a'tujun, ijkunan sta a't'utump'uxamkaw a'tujun.
40018023	An lhich'alhkat an lakt'iyan tachanu pumatam ay jamach'alhkat, yu jat'asanilhcha an ixma'tapatsanin mu ix'ilhtuputuncha cuentaj.
40018024	Walh akxni ix'ilhtut'ajuncha ixcuentaj an ay jamach'alhkat, talhicha'anilh pumatam yu ixli'ani la'alhuw millón ixtumin, jantucha lay ixput'e'echo'okan.
40018025	Chi mu ntucha lay mapalayi an yu lhicha'ankalh, pus najun an ay jamach'alhkat li kast'akalhcha, chux ixt'iwi chi ixjas'at'an chi yu lhit'ajuncha ixlaktanlhun, para li anchacha kalhitamalh.
40018026	Pus an ma'tapatsana tatso'ottanilhcha an ay jamach'alhkat, chi tapaynisk'inicha, juniy: —Lamapaynin ak'imp'akxanin, akmapalhni'oyan.
40018027	Pus an ay jamach'alhkat mu mapaynicha, makawlh, mak'akxanilhi an ixjalhi'aninti.
40018028	Pero akxni taxtulhcha anchunu ma'tapatsan, paxto'lhi pumatam ixt'ama'tapatsan yu wachu ixt'alalhi'ani tamciento tumin de plata, tacha la'at'utu malhkuyu xatapatsat, chi pixtuch'apachalh ixmaksk'anjwaputuncha, juniy: —Ak'imap'alhnincha an yu k'ilhip'ini.
40018029	Pus an ixt'ama'tapatsan tatso'ottanilh la xjach'aja, chi juniy: —Lamapaynin ak'imp'akxanin, akmapalhni'oyan.
40018030	Pero yucha ntu k'is pakxaniputulh, lhinawllhi li kamalaklhchawkalh sta li kamapalh'olh.
40018031	An ali'in ixt'ama'tapatsanin mu tala'ts'ilhi tacha an tapasalh, pus sawalhcha talhila'ta'oxila'alhilh, chi ta'alhcha juninini an ay jamach'alhkat tacha an tapasalh.
40018032	Wachuncha an ay jamach'alhkat, t'asanilhi anchunu ixma'tapatsana, chi juniy: —¡Ayajk'atsan ma'tapatsan! kit'in ikmak'akxani'ojoni an yu k'ilhip'ini, mu k'int'ap'ayninin.
40018033	¿Jantu wachuchuni k'axmak'akxanin amint'ama'tapatsan?
40018034	Wachuncha an ay jamach'alhkat, mu talh'amancha, pus lhinawlhi li kamalaklhchawkalh, sta li kamapalh'olhi an yu lhi'aniy.
40018035	Akxni chunchacha jajun'olh an Jesús, jajuniy: —Wachuchuni kata'ilhtuyan an Kimpay, yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan, li ntu chux la mijalhunutk'an mala'mixiniyat ixtala'alhin mint'ala'ajunk'an.
40019001	Akxni chunchacha chiwin'olh an Jesús, taxtulhcha an xalakaat'un Galilea, alhcha xalakaat'un Judea, ixtapiktutamcha ay xkan junkan Jordán.
40019002	Chi lhuw lapanaki tat'a'alh, ancha jak'uch'uchalhcha.
40019003	Wachuncha tala'cha'alh an lapanakni an yu ixjajunkan fariseojnin chi ixtalhila'ts'intanuycha, ixtajuniy: —¿Oxi li xamati lapanak kamakawlh ixt'iwi wa tuchicha ixlakata?
40019004	An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Jant'u p'unawt'at'iti tan najun Dios, li akxni ilhtulh an lapanak, ilhtulhcha an lapanak chi ilhtulhcha an t'aku',
40019005	chi an Dios najun li xliyu an lapanak kamakawna ixpay chi ixnati, li ixt'iwicha kat'atawla', chi an ixt'uyunk'an li tachanu wa pumatamcha katajuna'?
40019006	Jantucha tacha ixt'uyunk'ani katitawalh, tachanu wa pumatamcha katajuna', pus xliyu li yu Dioscha jamala'xt'o'lhi, an lapanak jantucha kajalamamakawnilh.
40019007	An Jesús tajuniy: —¿Pus tasu li najuncha an Moisés li layi ak'ilhtuw la'atam jalhiki yu akpumakaju kint'iwik'ani?
40019008	Yucha jajuniy: —Wa xliyu nt'u k'is ja'asmatnanat'it, xliyu talhimakawnincha an Moisés; pero an Dios tu chuni najun.
40019009	Kit'in klajunaw, wa tichicha lapanak yu makajun ixt'iwi, li ntu ixlakata li wa xamaticha t'atamalhi an t'aku, chi li t'atsukupalaycha pumatam t'aku an lapanak, tala'alhincha ilhtuy, chi yu t'atsukupalaycha wachu an yu makawkantacha t'aku, wachu tala'alhincha ilhtuy.
40019010	Tajuniy an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús: —Li chuncha t'atapasay ixt'iwi an lapanak, jantu oxi akt'atsukukalh.
40019011	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Jantu lhichuxi lay chuncha tsukukan, wa yu chuncha jalhisakxtulh an Diosi lay chuncha tatsukuy.
40019012	Ta'alini yu ntu katijat'atsukukalh, yu wa chunchacha tatsukulh. Chi ta'alini yu wa yucha an xt'alapanaknichak'an chuncha ta'ilhtulh para li ntu kajat'atsukukalh. Chi ta'alini yu wa ix'akstuchak'an jantu jat'atsukukan wa xliyu li palay oxi tat'atapatsaputun an Dios yu ch'alhkatnan lakt'iyan. Yu layi tsukuy wa ix'akstu, chunchacha katsukulh.
40019013	Wachuncha jalhicha'anikalh jas'at'ani an Jesús, para li kajalaklakpach'apalh chi li kajat'atapaynilh, walh an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, talaj'aymastuklhi an yu ixtalhi'anta ixjas'at'ank'an.
40019014	Pero an Jesús, jajuniy: —K'ajamak'awnit'iti an jas'at'an li kachajcha kintala'milh, jant'u k'ajalaj'aymast'ukt'it, mu yu'uncha ixnawink'ani an lhich'alhkat an lakt'iyan.
40019015	Wachuncha, jalaklakpach'apa'olh an jas'at'an, alhcha.
40019016	La'atam wilhchan pumatam ts'alh yu ixlit'ajun ixtumin, juniy an Jesús: —Oxi maestro, ¿tasu aklhit'alalhcha para li aklhitsukulh an jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoyi?
40019017	An Jesús, alhtaylh juniy: —¿T'asu li k'i'unicha li sawalhcha oxi ikmaestrojo? Jantu xamati yu oxi lapanak, yu chun wa pumatam, Dios. Li lhits'uk'up'ut'uni an jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy wa k'a'ilht'ucha tacha an najunta laka lhamap'a'sin.
40019018	An ts'alh najun: —¿Tanyucha lhamap'a'sini? Pus an Jesús juni, an tan najunta: —Jant'u kat'ijama'nin, jant'u wa aya k'at'ilat'i, jant'u k'at'ija'alhawan, jant'u k'at'imaslak'at'in.
40019019	Oxi k'ala'ts'i mimpay chi minati; chi k'amap'aynit'i mint'alapanak t'ach'a akst'u map'aynik'an.
40019020	Pus an ts'alh najun: —Chunchacha k'ilhtuy wa kintajas'at'at, ¿tanyucha yu kintits'an'aniya?
40019021	An Jesús juniy: —Li ts'ajwi ts'uk'up'ut'un, k'ast'at'i an yu lhit'a'un, ch'i k'ajaxt'a'nincha an jakilhpatinin, chuncha k'alhits'uk'uya'a yu laj'oxi tanlhun an lakt'iyan, chi k'at'ana'acha, ak'inch'a'o'aya'acha.
40019022	Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an ts'alh, ancho'olhcha, sawalhcha ta'oxila'alhi'alh, mu lhuw ixtanlhuni ixlit'ajun.
40019023	Pus akxni an Jesús, jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan: —Sawalh lhima'anxkayi kacha'ana pumatam yu jamatumin laka lhich'alhkat an lakt'iyan.
40019024	Chi a'tam klajumpalaw, li palay wa lasi la'atam kameyo kala'pusli la x'istaj makskat, walh jantu li katanuchalh la xlich'alhkat Dios xamati jamatumin lapanak.
40019025	Pus sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, chi tajuniy: —¿Pus chuncha tisiyuchacha lay kata'alhtaxtuya'a?
40019026	Chi sa'cha jala'ts'in, jajuniy: — Yu ntu lay ilhtuy an lapanak, an Dios yucha layi ilhtu'ojoy watuchicha.
40019027	An Pedro, ja'alhtayanalh, najun: —Kitnan iklhimakaw'otawcha kilaktanlhunk'an chi iklach'a'o'atawcha, ¿tisuncha akla'a'iyawi?
40019028	An Jesús jajuniy: —Sawalhi ani yu klajunaw akxni chuxcha kalaklasast'i'okana, kit'in iksTs'alh Lapanak aktawlanta la kilhich'alhkat, tan iklhajaxtuta, uxitnan yu kilach'a'o'ayaw, wachu ka'alina tan k'at'awlht'achi'it, lakakawt'uyi juntachalh, chi uxitnani k'ajach'alhk'atnaniya'it an kilhmakkawt'uy xalapanakni Israel.
40019029	Watichicha yu kint'alhtanan chi lhimakajuncha ixcha'a, u ixjat'ala'awnin, u ixjamatsanan, u ixpay, u ixnati, u ixt'iwi, u ixjas'at'an, u ixlakaat'un, tam ciento palayi kaxta'nikana', chi kaxta'nikana jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy.
40019030	Pero xluwk'ani yu p'ulhnaj chaway, yu'uncha astani katajuna', chi yu astan chaway p'ulhnaja katajuna'.
40020001	Mu an lhich'alhkat awint'i lakt'iyan tachanu pumatam jamalakaat'un, yu ka'alh japuxkawna wats'isin lapanakni yu tama'tapatsay, para li kata'alh tapatsanin tan ch'anta ix'uva.
40020002	Chi akxni jat'atamakawlhcha an lapanakni tani chunchacha kajamapalhniya tamin wilhchan, jamala'achalhcha an tan ch'anta ix'uva.
40020003	Walh a'tam taxtunipalhi an jamalakaat'un akxni ntuka' ix'atunkujun, katacha las nuevejcha, chi jala'ts'impalh ali'ini an ixtan'ajni la'acha'an yu jantu tu'u ixta'ilhtuy.
40020004	Pus jajuniy: —Wachu akilat'a'awi tapatsanin an tan ikch'anta ki'uva, aklamapalhniyawcha mimpanch'e'exk'an. Pus tat'a'alhcha.
40020005	Ka atunkujuncha, an jamalakaat'un a'tam taxtunipalh. Chi akxni ixta'oxat'ajuncha, las trescha, a'tam taxtunipalh, chi wanajcha chuni jamala'achapalh an tan ch'anta ix'uva an yu jakila'cha'alh.
40020006	Walh a'tam taxtunipalhi puta'oxay katacha las cincojcha ixjunt'ajun, jala'cha'ampalhi yu ntu tu'u ixtapatsatk'an, jajuniy: —¿Tasu li wa anicha tuntakuju t'aunat'iti?
40020007	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Wa xliyu jantu xamati ikt'atapatsayaw. —Yucha jajuniy: —Pus wachu akilat'a'awi tapatsanin an tan ikch'anta ki'uva, aklamapalhniyawcha mimpanch'e'exk'an.
40020008	Chi akxni tats'isit'ajuncha, an jamalakaat'un juniy an yu mala'ts'ilhi'anita tan ch'anta ix'uva: —K'ajat'asanincha an lapanakni an yu tatapatsalh chi k'ajaxt'a'nincha ixtalhajak'an, p'ulhnajcha k'ajamap'alhnini an yu astancha tatanulh, chi xli'astan yu'uncha an yu p'ulhnajcha tatanulh tatapatsay.
40020009	Pus akxni tacha'alhcha an yu ta'oxaycha las cincojcha ixjunt'ajun tatanulh, pumatamjtamin a'tsayi talhajalh, tacha lhajakan tam wilhchan.
40020010	Chi akxni wachucha tacha'alhi an yu p'ulhnaj tatanuchalh tatapatsay, ixtapast'ak'a li sna palaycha katalhajaya'; pero wachu wa chuni tajama'lhtayanalh ixtalhajak'an.
40020011	Pus akxni tajama'lhtayanalhcha, talhichiwiniycha an jamalakaat'un,
40020012	chi tajuniy: —Ani yu astancha tachilh wa tam horaja tatapatsalh, walh wanajch'a ch'uni jamap'alhnin. Kitnan iklhitayaniwi kilho'otk'an chi an lhi'ichi tam wilhchan.
40020013	Pus an jamatunin juniy xapumatam: —Kint'ala'ajun, jantu tu'u yu jantucha oxi k'ilhtut'ajun, ¿ch'u nt'u k'int'at'amak'awi t'ani ch'unch'ach'a k'alhajaya'a tam wilhchan?
40020014	K'alhip'inchicha yu mintalhaja, chi ani yu astancha tanulh tapatsay wanajcha chuni akmapalhniya'.
40020015	¿Chu xamati akijuna li ntu chuni yu k'ilhtuy li kintumini yu iklimapalay?, ¿U sna wa lhaxk'ayanani li kit'in oxi klapanak?
40020016	Chuncha yu kuna', xluwk'ani yu p'ulhnaj chaway, yu'uncha astani katajuna', chi yu astan chaway p'ulhnaja katajuna', mu lhuwi yu jat'asanikanta, pero wa lakats'uniya yu jasakxtukan.
40020017	Akxni an Jesús tama'ast'a'alhcha an la'acha'an Jerusalén, laka tijcha, an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan wa lakatamcha ja'ilhtu'olh, jajuniy:
40020018	Chaway ti'anawcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, an isTs'alh Lapanak la xmaknichak'an an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sini kama'axta'kana', katalhimuk'aya wa tanlhuncha chi katama'niya'.
40020019	Chi yu'uncha wachucha katama'axt'a'a la xmaknik'an an yu ntu judiojnin, para li wa katalhila'ts'ilhcha chi katala'ana'malhcha, chi katamakxtukmuk'alhcha la xCruz, pero xlila'at'utu wilhchan kala'awcho'oya'.
40020020	Wa chuncha tichiyucha t'aku ixt'iwi tichi lapanak ixjunkan Zebedeo, la'cha'alhi an Jesús, ixjat'a'anta ixt'uyunk'an ists'alan, Jacobo chi Juan, tatso'ottanikalhcha an Jesús, chi isk'inicha lamapaynin.
40020021	Pus an Jesús juniy: —¿T'isunch'a lak'ask'ini? An t'aku najun: —K'anawi li ani ixt'uyunk'an kints'alan katapiktutawlhcha'ani an la milhich'alhkat, pumatam tan oxi mimpa'xti, chi an pumatam la milhijama'xi.
40020022	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Jant'u k'ats'ayat t'uch'ini sk'inatcha. ¿Layi k'alhit'ayaniya'it an ma'alh'ajnat yu akma'alh'ajnana'? Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —Chun kalaya'.
40020023	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Chun, k'ap'uma'alh'ajnana'itcha yu akpuma'alh'ajnana', pero li akilalakpa'xtitawlaw jantu lay kit'in aktilamakawniw, yucha an kimPayi kajamakawniya yu ancha jalhisakxtuta.
40020024	Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi an ali'in ixpumakawk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tat'alatalh'amnilhi an ixt'uyunk'an.
40020025	Pus an Jesús, jat'asanilh, jajuniy: —K'ats'ayat'iti li an xajamach'alhkatni laj'ay la'acha'anaxni wa talhinajuncha, chi an yu xalaj'ajin yu'uncha yu palaycha wa talhinajun.
40020026	Pero aniy uxitnan, tam. Aniy yu lhitapalay jumputun p'ulhnajcha kajatapatsanilhi an ali'in.
40020027	Chi yu tukancha palay xa'ay jumputun uxitnan, mima'tsukuk'ani kuna';
40020028	Mu masi kit'in yu ikjunlhi isTs'alh Lapanak, jantu ikminta li wa akilak'ilhtunikalhcha an tapatsat, kit'in iklamintaw tapatsaninin, chi ikminta ma'axta'na an kijatsukunti para li lhuw lapanakni katata'alhtaxtulh.
40020029	Akxni tataxtucho'olhcha la'acha'an Jericó, an Jesús, wa ts'ananacha ixch'a'o'akanta.
40020030	Walh ixt'uyunk'an la'la'lhtulu'un lapanakni, yu sa' ixtawilanalh waniy laka tij, taxa'alaycha an Jesús, akxni ta'asmatlhi li ancha ixla'pust'ajun, tajuniy: —¡Jamach'alhkat, Ists'alh David, lamapaynin akilalhi'a'tayju!
40020031	Pero an ali'in lapanakni wa talaj'aymalhi an la'la'lhtulu'un lapanakni, para li ma sa'cha katalajkilhulh; pero yu'uncha palay p'as ixtaxa'alay, ixtajuniy: —¡Jamach'alhkat, Ists'alh David, akilalhi'a'tayju!
40020032	Pus an Jesús, sa'cha tayalh, jat'asanilhcha chi jajuniy: —¿T'isunch'a lak'ask'inat akla'ilhtuniwi?
40020033	Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, klakask'inaw li akilamalakawaniw.
40020034	Pus wachuncha an Jesús, jamapaynicha, pus jalaklakpuch'apalh, walh wa tukan tajalakawanalh; chi tach'a'o'alhcha.
40021001	Akxni wanicha ixtacha'ant'ajun la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi ixtacha'antacha la'acha'an Betfagé, a'stitawk'acha ixtat'ajun tan junkan laka'olivojnin, an Jesús jamala'achalhcha ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan,
40021002	jajuniy: —K'ap'inchi'it an tan tasuy la'acha'an, k'ala'ch'ip'ina'it ch'iyawkanta la'atam xanati burro chi t'ayalh ixjas'at'a, k'ajax'ot'iya'it'iti la'at'uy, akilalhiminiyaw.
40021003	Li xamati tu'u tajunan, k'a'una'it li yucha an Jamach'alhkati jama'lhtask'ini, li wa tukan kajaxta'nicho'oya'.
40021004	Tacha ani tapasalh, para li kawalhi tacha an ixnajunta an yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, akxni nawlh:
40021005	K'a'uni an istsi la'acha'an Sión: —La'mintancha amiRey, yucha ntu ayajk'atsay, puminta la'atam burro, xajas'at'a burrojo puminta, ixjas'at'a la'atam jatapakxat yu mak'uk'anan.
40021006	Pus an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, ta'alhcha, chi chunchacha ta'ilhtulh tacha an jajunilh;
40021007	talhiminilhcha an xanati burro chi an xajas'at'a, talak'aymuk'anilhcha ixla'la'ch'itk'an chi yucha putawk'alhcha.
40021008	Chi mu wanajcha lhilhuw, ixtamamanicha ixla'la'ch'itk'ani an laka tij, chi an ali'in ixtala't'e'e'icha xax'oy k'iw, ixtamamanicha an laka tij.
40021009	An yu ixtaap'ulanan chi an yu astan ixtamintachalh, ixtalhit'asaycha, ixtalaknajun: —¡Alhp'asi an ists'alh David!, ¡Oxi yu an Dios makmintalh!, ¡Hosanna kanawkalhi an lakt'iyan!
40021010	Akxni tanuchalhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén an Jesús, chux an lapanakni an yu ancha jamacha'an sawalhcha ixtalhakapu'an, ixtalaknajun: —¿Tisiyuchacha aniya?
40021011	Pus an ali'in lapanakni tanajun: —Aniy Jesús, yucha lhichiwiniy ixchiwiti Dios, jamacha'a Nazaret, xalakaat'un Galilea.
40021012	Tanuchalhi laka tajtan an Jesús, jalakxkawxtu'olhi an yu ixtajast'anan chi ixtajatamawnan laka tajtan; jala'ma'pusp'itni'olhi an ixmesajk'an an yu ixtamapaxay tumin chi an ixtants'ik'an an yu ixtast'ay paloma.
40021013	Jajuniy: —Ts'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: —An kincha'a putapaynin cha'a kajunkana'; walh uxitnan wa minpa'alhawnachak'ani ilht'ut'at'it.
40021014	Xli'astan an laka tajtan, an Jesús tala'cha'alh yu wa la'la'lhtulu'un chi yu wa lakch'anlht'ulukun, chi jak'uch'ulhcha.
40021015	Walh an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, mu ixtala'ts'incha tacha an laj'oxi tanlhun ixlak'ilhtuy an Jesús, chi ixta'asmat'acha li an jas'at'an ixtalhit'asaycha an laka tajtan, ixtalaknajun: —¡Jama'alhtaxtununi an ists'alh David! —Pus talhitalh'amalh.
40021016	Chi tajuniy an Jesús: —¿Asmat'a tacha an talaknajun? An Jesús jajuniy: —Chun k'asmat'a. ¿Jant'u a't'am p'unawt'at'iti tan najunta?: —La xmilhpatk'an an jas'at'an chi an lakt'ikt'inka yu tats'ik'ikaa ilht'u li oxi katamilhpanin.
40021017	Pus jalaj'oslicha an Jesús, taxtulhcha an la'acha'an, alhcha la'acha'an Betania, anchacha la'akujchalh.
40021018	Wats'isin ancho'olhcha an tan ay la'acha'an, walh chawanalhcha.
40021019	Chi wani an laka tij la'ts'ilh a'atam xak'iw higo, pus alh, pero ntu tu'u la'cha'aninilh xajatawk'at, wa siy xax'oy, chi juniy: —¡Jantu a'tam katawk'anini mijatawk'at! Walh watukan xixli an xak'iw higo.
40021020	Chi mu tala'ts'incha an ixt'alhtanan, talhi'a'nicha, tajuniy: —¿Tasu li wa lascha xixli an xak'iw higojo?
40021021	Pus an Jesús, jajuniy: —Iklajunaw, li jak'iklak'a'ininat'it sawalh, li ntu wa tamj tamjcha p'ast'ak'at'it, jantu wa tacha ani k'ilhtulh an xak'iw higojo k'at'i'ilht'ut'it, layi k'a'una'it ani a'stitawk'a: K'a'ost'i, an alamalhcha k'at'a'uchi'; chi kajuna'.
40021022	Chi wa tuchicha k'at'ap'aynisk'ina'it, li jak'iklak'a'ininat'it, k'axt'a'nik'ana'it'it.
40021023	Akxni cha'alhchaa laka tajtan an Jesús, an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an laktatanincha yu ancha jamacha'an, tala'cha'alhi akxni ixmasut'ajun, chi tajuniy: —¿T'asu li ch'unch'ach'a lak'ilht'uy aniy tanlhuni? ¿Tisiyuchacha makawniyan li k'alak'ilht'u?
40021024	Yucha ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Wachu aklalhisakmiyaw la'atam chiwinti, li akilajunaw, wachu aklajunawi tuchini laycha chuncha iklhilak'ilhtuy aniy tanlhun.
40021025	Tacha an ixjama'paxanan an Juan, ¿tisiyuchacha ixlijuniya, Dios u wa yucha an lapanaknicha ixtalhijuni? Pus wachuncha tsukulhcha talhilakchiwiniy, talajuniy: —Li kajunaw li Dios, akintajunan: ¿P'us ch'i li nt'uch'a k'iklak'a'it'iti?
40021026	Chi li kajunaw li wa yu'uncha an lapanaknicha ixtalhijuni, jalhitalhamniti an lapanakni, mu ixchuxk'ani takiklaka'iy li an Juan ixchiwinti Diosi ixlichiwiniy.
40021027	Pus tajuniy an Jesús: —Jantu ijk'atsayaw. Pus yucha wachu jajuniy: —Wachu ntu aktilajuniwi tuchini chunchacha iklhilak'ilhtuy aniy tanlhun.
40021028	Chi, ¿T'asuch'a lhiwilayat'iti? Pumatam lapanak ixjalhit'ajun ixt'uyunk'an ists'alan, chi an lapanak juniy an xapumatam ists'alh: —Kints'alh, k'ap'inchiy tapatsana an tan ikch'anta ki'uva.
40021029	An ts'alh alhtaylh an ixpay, juniy: —Jantu ijk'uxa'an. Pero xli'astan, astan nawlh, chi alh.
40021030	Chi an pumatam ts'alh wanajcha chuni junkan li ka'alh tapatsan; yucha najun: —Chuni kimpay, ak'ana'. Pero yucha ntu alh.
40021031	¿Ani ixt'uyunk'an ts'alan, tisiyuchacha yu ilhtulh an yu jalhijunilh an ixpayk'ani? Ta'alhtaylh an Jesús, tajuniy: —Yucha an p'ulhnaj junikalh. Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Klajunaw li an yu talaklhach'inin tanlhun lhimapalhlhi'at chi an wa aya talay t'akunin, tatap'ulhniyani tatanuyachalh an la xlich'alkat Dios.
40021032	Mu takimasunichincha an jama'paxanaj Juan yu oxi tij, walh uxitnan jant'u k'iklak'a'it'it, apalij yucha an talaklhach'inin tanlhun chi an wa aya talay t'akunini takiklaka'ilh. Pero uxitnan masi chuxi la'ts'in'o'ot'it, jant'u mak'a'unt'iti mintala'alhink'an, jant'u k'iklak'a'it'it.
40021033	K'a'asmatp'alat la'atam pulhamacha'xan: ixt'ajun pumatam jamalakat'un lapanak, yucha ch'anlhicha ix'uva chi kurralhnulhcha, chi ilhtulhcha tan kapach'itkana an uva, chi yawlhcha a'atam torre, yu palhistakna, chi xli'astan jamach'ixta'nilhcha tichi yu'uncha lapanakni an ixlakaat'un, chi yucha alhcha ma'at.
40021034	Akxni chilhcha ixpaku an uva, jamala'achachalhcha ixma'tsukunini an jamaalakaat'un lapanak, para li an yu jamach'ixta'nita ixlakaat'un kataxta'nilhcha yu ixnawin.
40021035	Pero an yu jamach'ixta'nikanta lakaat'un, t'o' tach'apa'ochalhi an ixma'tsukunin an jamalakaat'un: pumatam stakcha talakasamalh, an pumatam tama'nilhcha, chi an pumatam stakcha talakat'alhmalh.
40021036	An jamanawin lakaat'un a'tam jamala'achapalhchalhi ali'in ixma'tsukunin, palaycha ixluwk'an; pero an yu ixjamach'ixta'nikanta lakaat'un wanajcha chuni ta'ilhtupalh.
40021037	Xli'astan makminchalhcha yu ists'alh an jamalakaat'un lapanak, mu ixnajun: —Aniy mu kints'alh, kata'asmatniya'.
40021038	Pero akxni tala'ts'ilhcha an ists'alh, an yu ixjamach'ixta'nikanta lakaat'un, talajuniy: —Yucha anicha yu jamanawin kajuncho'oya an lakaat'un; kama'niw, walh ki'anuchak'ani kajuna an yu ixnawin kax'walh.
40021039	Pus tach'apachalh, tamaxtulhi an tan ch'ankanta uva, tama'nilh.
40021040	Chaway akxni kamina an jamanawin an tan ch'ankanta uva, ¿T'asuch'a lhiwilayat kaja'ilhtuya an yu tatapatsay tan ch'ankanta uvaja?
40021041	Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh, tajuniy: —Kajama'ni'oya', jantu k'is katijamak'akxanilh, chi xamati'incha kajamach'ixta'nicho'oya an ixlakaat'un, yu kataxta'niya wa tukani yu ixnawin akxni ixpakucha an ix'uva.
40021042	An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Jant'u a't'am p'unawt'at'iti an tan ts'o'muk'akanta?, tan najun: —An chiwx an yu tala'amaj'alh an yu tayajuy cha'a, apalij yucha p'ulhnaj ulakalh tan pu'a'taynikalh. Yucha an Diosi chuncha ilhtulh. Chi chaway sawalhcha lhi'a'niyaw.
40021043	Xliyu klalhijunaw, li uxitnan k'amaxt'unik'ana'it'iti an xlich'alhkat Dios, chi la'atam la'acha'ani kama'axta'nikana yu kama'alaya sawalhi xajatawk'at.
40021044	Yu la x'ukxni ani chiwx katamayanta, wanaj lakt'ikt'iy kajun'oya', chi yu kaputamaya ani chiwx, wanaj po'xmi kajun'oya'.
40021045	Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmat'olh an Jesús, an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an fariseojnin, talhimacha'xalhi li yu'uncha ixjalhichiwint'ajun.
40021046	Pus ixtach'apayawputuncha, wa yu tatalhanajlalh, mu an lapanakni an yu ancha jamacha'an ixtakiklaka'iya li yucha ixchiwinti Diosi ixnajun.
40022001	A'tam jalhixa'alapalh la'atam pulhamacha'xani an Jesús, jajuniy:
40022002	An lhich'alhkat anu lakt'iyan, tachanu pumatam rey, yu mala'asijninilh k'atan ists'alh akxni tama'xto'lhi.
40022003	An rey jamala'achalhcha an ixma'tsukun li kata'alhcha jalakt'asaninini an yu jat'awayputunkan, pero yu'uncha ntu tak'uxa'alhi ma'waynin.
40022004	Chi a'tam jamala'achapalhi ali'in ixma'tsukun an rey, jajuniy: —K'ajak'i'unitcha an yu jamak'atsanikantacha, li ikmala'asijnitacha an wayt; an kin torojnin chi an ali kijatapakxat yu ixtalaj'ontacha jala'ma'nikalhcha, la'asij'ojotacha, katamilhcha aniy laka k'atan.
40022005	Pero an yu jat'awayputunkan jantu k'is talhakapu'alh, atamj atamj intacha lhitaxtunilh; pumatam alh la xkuxtu, pumatam alhcha jast'ana',
40022006	chi an ali'in tach'apachalhcha an ma'tsukunin stakcha talaksamalh, sta jala'manikalhi an ma'tsukunin.
40022007	Akxni k'atsaalhi an rey, lhitalh'amalh, pus jamala'achalh isoldadojnin, takima'ni'olh wachu an yu ixtajama'nininta chi an la'acha'an an tan ixtawilanalh tala'xawalhcha.
40022008	An rey jajuniy an ixma'tsukunin: —La'asij'ojotacha an wayt; pero an yu ixjat'asanikan ixjat'awayputunkan jantu ixtat'acha'ani li kaxtamilh.
40022009	K'ap'inchi'it'iti an tan laala'paxto'ta tij chi chux yu p'axt'o'at'it k'a'aylhit'ana'it'itcha.
40022010	Pus tataxtunilhcha laka tij an ma'tsukunin, lhuwcha tama'ayxto'lhi yu ixtapaxt'o'a, yu wa ay tajunita lapanakni chi yu oxi lapanakni, wanajcha lhilhuwi junkalh an tan lakwaykan.
40022011	Walh akxni tanuchalhcha an rey, jala'ts'incha an yu talakwajin, la'ts'ilh pumatam lapanak yu ntu ixla'ch'ita yu pu'ankan tan tama'xto'kan.
40022012	Pus juniy: —Uxint'i ¿t'asich'a lhit'anuch'ita li nt'u la'ch'ita yu task'iniy tan tama'xto'kani? —Pero yucha ntu k'is ja'alhtayanalh.
40022013	Wachuncha an rey, jajuniy an yu ixtala'ts'ilhi'an an tan lakwaykan: —K'alakch'anch'it'it ch'i k'ala'ma'ch'it'it, ch'i k'ak'imak'ap'it'itcha anu ma'spa tan puts'ista; ancha ka'alina alhut chi wa xwat'at'a kalaktasat'awkana'.
40022014	Mu lhuwi yu jat'asanikan, pero wa lakats'uniya yu jasakxtukan.
40022015	Wachuncha ta'alhcha an fariseojnin, chi talalhima'achiwinilhcha tani katalhit'alalhcha para li an Jesús tu'ucha kanawlh yu ntu chun, para li kata'alhtasulhcha.
40022016	Chi tamala'achachalhcha ixt'alhtanank'ani an fariseojnin ali an ixt'alhtanan Herodes, an tan ixt'ajun an Jesús, tajuniy: —Maestro, ijk'atsayaw li sawalhi yu na'un, chi li ixtij Dios sawalhi an yu masuy, ch'i nt'u lhak'ap'up'ini masi tani katanawlhcha an lapanakni, mu uxint'i nt'u yu la'ts'in tani tasuycha an lapanak.
40022017	Akilajuniwi t'ani lhiwilaycha, ¿Oxi li akmapalhlhi'aniw an xajamach'alhkat la'acha'an Roma u jantu?
40022018	Pero an Jesús, ixjak'atsanicha li wa ixtalhila'ts'intanuycha, pus jajuniy: —¿Tasu li wa kilalhila'ts'intanuyawcha?
40022019	Akilamasuniwi an tumin yu pujamapalanaj'ankan. —Pus tamasunilhcha.
40022020	Chi an Jesús, jajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha ani puwilh chi an ta'a'ut ani ts'o'ulakanta?
40022021	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Yucha an xajamach'alhkat la'acha'an Roma. —Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Pus k'axt'a'nitcha yu ix'anu an jamach'alhkat Roma chi yu ix'anu an Dios wach'uch'a k'axt'a'nit'it.
40022022	Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi, ixtalhi'a'nicha, xli'astan, ta'alhcha.
40022023	Yuchaka wilhchan, an Jesús, tala'cha'alh an lapanakni yu ixjajunkan saduceojnin, yu an tanajun li ntu lay katila'awcho'okalh, chi tajuniy:
40022024	Maestro, an Moisés nawlh: —Li xamati lapanak kaniya chi li ntu tu'u lhitsukunikalh ixjas'at'a, ixt'ala'ajuncha kat'atsukucho'oya an ixt'iwi, para li kata'alilhi xas'at'an an yu nilhcha.
40022025	Kitnan ijkamispaw ixpumatujunk'an wa lhit'ala'awnin, an xa'aycha t'atsukukalhcha, walh nilh, tu tu'u makawlh xas'at'a, pus an ixt'iwi yucha an ixt'ala'ajuncha t'atsukucho'olh.
40022026	Walh wanajcha chuni putapasapalh an ixlipumat'uycha, chi an ixlipumat'utucha wanajcha chun, sta talakni'olhi an ixpumatujunk'an.
40022027	Chi akxni talakni'olhcha, wachucha nilhi an t'aku'.
40022028	Pus akxni kala'awcho'okana, ¿Tisiyuchacha an ixpumatujunk'an lhit'ala'awnini yu ixt'iwi kajuna an t'aku, mu ixchuxk'ani tat'atsukulhi?
40022029	An Jesús jajuniy: —Wa xliyu uxitnan t'u k'ats'ayat'iti tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios, chi li an Dios layi ilhtu'ojoy watuchicha.
40022030	Akxni katala'awcho'oya an yu tanitacha, jantu katitalat'atsukulh, mu tacha an ix'angelhnincha Diosi katajuna anu lakt'iyan.
40022031	Ch'i li nt'u lhiwilayat'iti li katala'awcho'oya an yu talaknitacha, ¿Ch'unt'u p'unawt'at'iti li Diosi najun:
40022032	"Kit'ini ixDios Abraham, chi Isaac chi Jakob"? An Dios jantu ixDiosk'an janinin, yucha ixDiosk'an yu tala'ajunta.
40022033	Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi an Jesús, sawalhcha talhi'a'nilhi tacha an ixmasuy.
40022034	Pero an fariseojnin akxni ta'asmatlhi li sa' jamakilhunilhi an Jesús an saduceojnin, tata'ayxto'lhicha.
40022035	Chi pumatam yu yu'uncha, yu ixlajk'atsay lhamap'a'sin ixlila'ts'intanuycha an Jesús, junkan an Jesús:
40022036	Maestro, ¿Tanyucha yu palay ay lhamap'a'sini?
40022037	An Jesús alhtaylh, juniy: —K'amap'ayniya'a amijamach'alhkat Dios, chux la mijalhunut, chux la mintakuwin, chux la mijatapast'ak'at.
40022038	Yucha yu p'ulhnaj chi ay lhamap'a'sin.
40022039	Chi ixlitipat'uy lanancha wa ixt'atam: —K'amap'ayniya'a mint'alapanak t'ach'a map'aynik'an mi'akstu.
40022040	Yucha anicha la'at'uy lhamap'a'sini t'alach'apa'ojota chux an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés, chi an ali'incha yu ixtalhichiwiniy wachu ixchiwinti Dios.
40022041	Akxni wa lakatam ixta'ayxto'nun'ojoy an fariseojnin, an Jesús jalhisakmilh, jajuniy:
40022042	¿T'asuch'a p'ast'ak'at'iti?, ¿An Cristo tisiyuchacha pu'a'p'unminchalhi? —Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Yucha an David.
40022043	Chi an Jesús, jajuniy: —¿Pus tasucha li akxni an ixTakuwin Dios machiwinilh an David nawlh; "kiJamach'alhkati an Cristo"? Akxni nawlh:
40022044	An Jamach'alhkat Dios juniy an kiJamach'alhkat Cristo: —Ak'inp'ikt'ut'a'ulhcha tan oxi kimpa'xti'. Sta akxni ajkamama'oya lamijach'aja an yu wa taxkayan para li k'ajap'ut'ach'at'acha.
40022045	An David ixjamach'alhkati juniy an Cristo, ¿Pus tasicha li ists'alh a'tami?
40022046	Pus wachuncha ntu layi xamati tu'u alhtaylh, chi sta akxni jantucha k'is xamati ali tapujulh kalhisakmilh tu'u an Jesús.
40023001	Xli'astan, tsukulhcha jaxa'alayi an lapanakni chi an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jajuniy:
40023002	An tan ixtawlay Moisesi talaktawlay an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin.
40023003	Pus xliyu, k'a'ilht'u't'iti wa tuchicha yu tajunan, pero nt'u k'a'ilht'ut'iti yu tacha an talay yu'uncha, mu yu'uncha tanajuni yu ka'ilhtukalh, pero yu'uncha ntu ta'ilhtuy.
40023004	Tachanu tapach'iya tu'u yu ts'ink'i, yu lhima'anxkay lhi'ankan, chi tajamak'uk'aninincha, pero yu'uncha masi wa katamalaklalhcha ma'atam ixk'its'ilimakak'an jantu tamak'aniputun.
40023005	Chux an yu ta'ilhtuy yu'uncha ma wa kajapula'ts'inkalhcha. Palaycha laj'o'xapa'ay jaxt'a'ani talakma'stumpatawk'ay, yu puwilh ixchiwinti Dios, chi an ixla'la'ch'itk'an la'lhmancha palayi lachaj talakstamuk'ay jaxpatanti hilo yu lajk'usi.
40023006	Chi yu'uncha la xlakapuw talaktawlhputunachalh an tan lakwaykan, chi an laka lakcha'a tan pulakta'ayxto'kan.
40023007	Chi yu'uncha talakask'in li sawalhcha kajala'axa'alakalhi an lakalaktij, talakask'in li kajunkalh maestrojnin.
40023008	Pero uxitnan nt'u k'ana'unt'iti li k'a'unk'ant maestrojnin; mu wa pumatami mimaestrojk'an, Cristo, chi chux uxitnan lhit'ala'awnin.
40023009	Chi nt'u xamat'i k'a'unit mimpayk'an aniy lakaat'un; mu wa pumatami mimPayk'an, an yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan.
40023010	Ch'i nt'u k'ana'unt'it'i li k'a'unk'at maestrojnin; mu wa pumatami mi maestrojk'an, Cristo.
40023011	Yu palay xa'ay uxitnan, yucha katalak'ilhtuniyan tanlhun.
40023012	Mu yu sawalhcha lhitapalayi najun jantu tu'u katilhitapalalh, pero yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay lay, yucha kalhitapala'.
40023013	¡Payni'incha uxitnani xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi uxitnani fariseojnin, mu wa ja'o'xch'o'onunat'itcha! Jant'u jamak'awniyat'iti katatanuchalh laka lhich'alhkat an lakt'iyan an lapanakni, chi uxitnan jant'u t'anuyat'it, wa jamama't'ijlayatcha an yu tatanuputunachalh.
40023014	¡Payni'incha uxitnani xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi uxitnani fariseojnin, wa ja'o'xch'o'onunat'itcha! Mu wanajch'a jat'ulo'ni'oyat'iti ixcha'ak'an an yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapak'an t'akunin, chi para want'uch'a k'ak'ats'anik'ant'it wa panijnich'a t'ap'ayniyat'it; xliyu palay k'alhila'a'iya'it'iti lhima'alh'ajna.
40023015	¡Payni'incha uxitnani xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi uxitnani fariseojnin, wa ja'o'xch'o'onunat'itcha! T'a'a'ch'o'oyat'itcha aniy lakaat'un chi an alamalh, jap'uxk'awyat yu katach'a'o'an; pero akxni jala'ch'ip'inatcha apalijcha wa palaycha jat'isamak'ap'inat'iti li katawalh ixjas'at'an lhinin uxitnan jantu.
40023016	¡Payni'incha uxitnani la'la'lhtulu'un jamap'a'sinin!, uxitnan nawnat'it: —Li xamati pujurarnan an tajtan, tu tani lay; pero li xamati pujurarnan an oro xanawin laka tajtan, jalhi'aninincha.
40023017	¡Laktontojnin la'la'lhtulu'un! ¿Tampiyuchacha yu palay lhitapalay, yucha an oro, u yucha an tajtan, tan matajtanilakan an oro?
40023018	Wach'u nawp'alat'it: Li xamati tu'u najun ka'ilhtuya, chi pujurarnancha an tan xta'kan lha'ulan, li ntu tani lay masi ntu ka'ilhtulh. Pero li xamati pujurarnan an lha'ulan yu o'slay an tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan, nawnat li jalhi'aninincha.
40023019	¡La'la'lhtulu'un! ¿Tampiyuchacha yu palay lhitapalay, yucha an lha'ulan u an tan muk'akan lha'ulan, tan matajtanilakan an lha'ulan?
40023020	Yu pujurarnan an tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan jantu wa yucha an puma'axta'kan lha'ulancha pujurarnan, chuxi pujurarnan'ojoy an yu ancha o'slay.
40023021	Chi yu pujurarnan an tajtan, jantu wa yucha an tajtancha pujurarnan, wachu pujurarnani an Dios, mu ancha wilh.
40023022	Chi yu pujurarnani an lakt'iyan, pujurarnancha an tan wilhchalh Dios, chi pujurarnancha an Dios mu ancha wilhchalh.
40023023	¡Payni'incha uxitnani xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi uxitnani fariseojnin, wa ja'o'xch'o'onunat'itcha t'ach'a an lhimasuyat'it! Mu diezmarlayatcha an lhaklhi xax'oy menta chi an eneldo chi an comino; pero k'apmaj'anat'iti an yu palay lhitapalay lhamap'a'sin: an oxi lanti, an jamapayninti chi an jakiklaka'inti, walh chi lhitask'iniya li k'a'ilht'ut, pero nt'u k'alhik'apmaj'amp'alat'iti an ali'.
40023024	¡La'la'lhtulu'un jamap'a'sinin, t'ank'alhamaj'anatcha an x'an, pero an camello t'olo'at'it!
40023025	¡Payni'incha uxitnani xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi uxitnani fariseojnin, wa t'a'ukxp'ut'uyununat'it! Lakmak'axak'ayatcha an vaso chi an pulatoj, pero la xpulakni wa stakcha a'tsamantaa ja'alhawanti chi tanlhun yu ntu oxi.
40023026	¡La'lhtuluw fariseo! P'ulhnajch'a k'ap'ulakxak'at'i an vaso chi an pulatoj, para li an ixmakan wachucha sut'ut'u kawalh.
40023027	¡Payni'incha uxitnani xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi uxitnani fariseojnin, wa t'a'ukxp'ut'uyununat'it! Uxitnan tachanu panteonin yu wa k'usicha sot'o' lakmakamanikanta, pero ixlipulakni wa stakcha taputanumanalh ixjalukutk'an janinin, chi tanlhuncha yu wa stakcha lakp'uch'ita.
40023028	Chuncha uxitnan; lhimasuyat'iti li oxi lapanakni, pero mimpulaknik'an wa stakcha tapu'a'tsamtani mija'o'xcho'ontik'an chi lhi'ay junita!
40023029	!Payni'incha uxitnani xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi uxitnani fariseojnin, wa ja'o'xch'o'onunat'itcha! Jala'laa'oxiniyatcha an ixputa'aknunk'an an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi jalakmalht'ak'aniyatcha an ixmonumentojk'an an yu ts'awj ixtat'ajun.
40023030	Ch'i nawnat: —Li akxniy istsuku akxni ixtat'ajun kilakpaynink'an, jantu akixtat'alhimuk'akani an xak'alhnik'an an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
40023031	Ch'unch'ach'a p'unawnat'it mi'akstuk'an li uxitnan ixjas'at'ank'ani an yu tama'nilh an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
40023032	Apalijcha wa xawa'a'tami k'a'ilht'u'o'ot'it yu talhi'a'taynilh milakpaynink'an.
40023033	¡Tsapulin! ¡Xjas'at'an tsapulin! ¿T'asuch'a k'alhit'a'alht'axt'uya'it'it laka lhima'alh'ajnajlhinini?
40023034	Kit'in aklamala'achaniyawi yu katalhixa'alayan ixchiwinti Dios, chi yu tajalakpastaknan, chi xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin; pero uxitnan wa k'ajama'niya'it'iti ali'in, chi ali'in k'ajamakxt'ukmuk'aya'it'iti laka Cruz, ali'in k'ajala'na'maya'it'iti an laka cha'a tan puta'ayxto'kan, chi k'ajach'a'o'aya'it'iti lakatamj lakatamj la'acha'an kata'ana'.
40023035	Pus uxitnani katala'cha'anan an tala'alhin, tacha an stak jats'alalh xjak'alhnik'an an yu ts'awj ixtat'ajun. Xlakata an xjak'alhni Abel, yu ts'awj ixt'ajun sta an Zacarías, ists'alh tichi lapanak ixjunkan Berequías, yu ma'nit'it waniy laka tajtan chi wani tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan.
40023036	Klajunaw yu sawalh, k'amap'ala'it'iti chux an tala'alhin yu chaway ani t'awnat'it.
40023037	¡Jerusalén, Jamacha'an Jerusalén, jama'niyat'iti an yu talhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi jalakt'alhmayat'iti an yu jamakt'anik'anat'it! !A'lhuwcha ijkamach'ixtamiputulh mijas'at'ank'an, tacha xanati piyu yu jama'ay xas'at'an la ixpa'achuj, pero nt'u k'is la'a'it'it!
40023038	Chawayi jamacha'an Jerusalén, ani la'acha'an kakapmaj'ankana'.
40023039	Mu klajunaw, sta chaway jantucha ali akintilala'ts'iw, sta akxni k'anawna'it: —Ikxta'niy lhimaala'puchajuni an yu Dios mala'achatachalh.
40024001	Akxni taxtulhcha an laka tajtan an Jesús chi ixti'ancha, stalh tala'alhi an ixt'alhtanan chi tsukulhcha tamasuniya an ay tajtan.
40024002	Yucha ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —¿Chux tacha an lapu'ukxyalh la'ts'inat'it? Wanaj kalakt'ilhi'okana', tu tu'u masi wa chiwxcha katila'ukxtawk'atawilh.
40024003	Chi akxni sa'cha ix'wilh an Jesús a'stitawk'a, tan junkan laka'olivojnin an ixt'alhtanan stalhcha tala'alh, wa ixpu'akstuchak'ani talhisakmi, tajuniy: —¿Tasu wanancha chuncha kalaktapasaya an tanlhuni, tisuncha katapasaya akxni k'at'anch'o'oya'a, chi akxni ka'ukla'oya an lakaamunulhpa'a? Akilajuniw.
40024004	An Jesús jajuniy: —K'as'alajnant'iti li ntu xamati kata'o'xcho'on.
40024005	Mu lhuwi katamina yu katanawna li yu'uncha Cristo, chi lhuwi katata'o'xcho'oya'.
40024006	Chi k'a'asmat'a'it'iti li lasakancha chi lat'alhkancha, pero nt'u k'alakt'alhanant'it, mu lhitask'iniya li chuncha katapasalh; pero ntuka' kati'ukla'olh.
40024007	Mu la'atam ay la'acha'an kat'alasaya la'atam ixt'a'ay la'acha'an chi pumatam ay jamach'alhkat kat'alasaya pumatam ixt'a'ay jamach'alhkat chi watanchuncha kalaklaya an lakaat'un chi ka'alinacha chawan. Yucha wa kapu'a'tayniyaka an lhima'alh'ajna.
40024008	Pero masi chunchacha, yucha wa kapu'a'tayniyaka an lhima'alh'ajna.
40024009	Chi k'ama'axt'a'k'ana'itcha laka lhima'alh'ajna, k'ama'nik'ana'it, t'uch'a k'is k'at'ila'ts'imp'ut'unk'ant'iti aniy lakaamunulhpa' ixlakata li kilakiklaka'iyaw.
40024010	Lhuwi yu katamakawnacha an ixjakiklaka'intik'an, chi katalama'axta'paxayacha chi katalaxkayacha.
40024011	Wanajcha lhuwi kata'alina yu ntu ixlisawalh u yu ntu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios katitalhichiwinilh, chi lhuwi kata'o'xcho'oya'.
40024012	Wa stakcha ka'alina lakmakxkay tanlhun, chi an lapanakni jantucha katitalamapaynilh.
40024013	Pero yu kalhitayaniya sta akxni ka'ukla'oya, yucha kata'alhtaxtuya'.
40024014	Chi kalhichiwinkana ani laj'oxi chiwinti yu puch'alhkatnan an Dios chux an lakaamunulhpa', para li chux an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni katak'atsaalh, xli'astan ka'ukla'oyacha.
40024015	Akxni k'ala'ts'ina'itcha pumatam lapanak yu sawalhcha ay junita an laka tajtan, an la'acha'an Jerusalén chi tacha Dioscha kala'ts'inkana, tacha nawlh an Daniel, yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, kalhimacha'xalhcha yu punajun tacha an najunta.
40024016	Yu xalakaat'un Judea t'awnachalh, ka'os'alhcha lakaa'a'stitawk'an.
40024017	Yu ix'a'sti ixcha'a uk'achalh, jantu kata'alhtajulhi para li ka'alh maxtunu tu'u la ixcha'a'.
40024018	Chi yu la xkuxtu t'awnachalh, jantu ka'alhi p'uxnu ixpu'ayxt'a'kan tan muk'atachalh.
40024019	¡Chi payni'incha an t'akunin yu ixt'a'akxni tukan taja'aynanta, chi yu ixt'a'akxni tukan talhit'ajun xjas'at'ank'an yu tats'ik'ika', mu akxni lhima'anxkay!
40024020	K'at'ap'aynit'it, para li akxni k'aja'osnunt'it akxni ntu ixpaku lhik'asnin, chi ntu kawalh la'atam wilhchan akxni wa jastaknankan.
40024021	Mu ka'alina ay lhima'alh'ajna, tacha yu ntu a'tam alinta akxni ilhtukalhcha an lakaamunulhpa', chi ntu a'tam chuncha kati'alincho'olh.
40024022	Chi li ntu kaxlalakat'ikt'ilhi Dios anchunu panch'e'ex, jantu xamati kaxta'alhtaxtulh; pero mu jamapayniya an Dios an yu jasakxtukantacha, kalaalakat'ikt'ikana an panche'ex.
40024023	Pus xliyu li xamati tajunan: "Anicha t'ajuni Cristo, u anucha t'awnachalhi Cristo," jant'u k'ak'iklak'a'it.
40024024	Mu kata'alina yu ntu Cristojnin sawalh, chi yu ntu ixlisawalh ixchiwinti Dios katitalhichiwinilh, chi layi kata'ilhtuya laj'ay tanlhun tu'u', tacha jak'uchunti, pero wa ixpa'o'xcho'onchak'an, chi li lay, kata'o'xcho'oputuna an yu jasakxtukantacha.
40024025	Pus chaway klamak'atsaaniwcha.
40024026	Li xamati tajunan: —K'ak'ila'ts'int'it, an tan wa jasa'nik'a t'awnachalh, jant'u k'ap'it'it; u li tajunan, awint'i laka cha'a tanumachalh, jant'u k'ak'iklak'a'it.
40024027	Mu tacha an jamakalipnin, akxni slimj tak'ut'achalh an tan akxajachilh wilhchan, chi sta tan ta'aknucho'oyachalhi makacha'an, chuncha kala'ts'inkana kalaya akxni kamina an isTs'alh Lapanak.
40024028	U tacha akxni inta nimalh tu'u', ancha la'ts'inkani mu ancha tata'ayt'o'a an ch'unin.
40024029	Watukan tacha kala'oya an ay lhima'alh'ajna, anchunu panch'e'ex, an wilhchan kataputs'isiya', chi an malhkuyu jantucha katimapulhkulh, chi an st'akunin katapatajuyanta an lakt'iyan, chi an takuwinin yu an lakt'iyan tat'ajun kajalakchikixkana'.
40024030	Wachuncha katalakasuyacha an isTs'alh Lapanak an lakt'iyan; akxni chun, chux an la'acha'anaxni aniy lakaamunulhpa kalaktalhanankanacha chi kalaj'alhunkanacha. Katala'ts'inacha an isTs'alh Lapanak li alhp'ascha minta lakajataputs'i chi wa xlimjnik'acha.
40024031	Chi an ix'angelhnin p'ascha kajas'olhniya laka la'atam s'olh, kajamala'achayacha para li katamach'ixtamilhcha an yu jasakxtutacha ta ixlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa'.
40024032	K'ap'ulhimach'a'xatcha tacha an lhixa'alak'ant'it xak'iw higo: Akxni alhajas'at'alacho'oycha chi xajnicho'oyachilhcha sast'i xax'oy, k'ats'ayatcha li wa nicha ixpaku lhi'ichi.
40024033	Pus chunchacha uxitnan, akxni k'ala'la'ts'ina'itcha tacha an kalaktapasaya, k'ak'ats'atcha li wa nicha laka maticha ikminta.
40024034	Kit'in klajunaw yu sawalh: —Akxni chuxcha chuncha kalaktapasaya, lhilhuwi kala'ts'inkana', mu katsukukanaka'.
40024035	An lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un ka'ukla'oya', pero an kinchiwinti yucha jantu.
40024036	Tuchini wilhchancha chi tuchi horajcha katapasaya jantu xamati k'atsay, masi an angelhnin awint'i lakt'iyan, chi an isTs'alh Dios, wa yucha an Diosi k'atsay.
40024037	Tacha akxni an ixt'ajun Noeje katapasaya akxni kamina an isTs'alh Lapanak.
40024038	Anchunu panch'e'ex akxni ixt'ajun an Noé, akxni ntuka' ix'a'muxtukan, an lapanakni ixtalakwajin chi ixtalaj'ot'a chi ixtalat'atsukuy, sta wa cha'alhcha wilhchan akxni tanulhcha an laka aya barco an Noé,
40024039	yu'uncha ntu k'is taja'asmatnamputulh; walh milhcha an a'muxtut, wanaj jama'ni'olh, chuncha katapasaya akxni kamina an isTs'alh Lapanak.
40024040	Kamina panch'e'exi akxni ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni tat'ajun lakakuxtu, an pumatam kalhi'ankana chi an pumatam katamakawna'.
40024041	Chi tan ixt'uyunk'an t'akunin taskitit'ajun, an pumatam kalhi'ankana chi an pumatam katamakawna'.
40024042	K'as'alaj ts'uk'ut'it, mu nt'u k'ats'ayat'iti tuchi panch'e'excha kamina an miJamach'alhkatk'an Jesús.
40024043	Chi k'alhimach'a'xat'iti aniy: li tam lapanak jamanawin laka cha'a kak'atsaalhi tuchi jatats'isnicha kamina xamati ja'alhawna, kakujtawla', chi ntu katimakawnilhi katanuchalh para li kaja'alhawanalh.
40024044	Xliyu uxitnan wach'u k'ala'asijt'it, mu an isTs'alh Lapanak kamina akxni nt'u lhiwilayat'it li lay kamilh.
40024045	A ma'tsuku yu jalajk'atsanan chi yu oxi jalhistaknan la ixcha'a ixpatrón, yuchacha kamalhistaknikana an cha'a, chi yuchacha kajaxta'niya yu kata'uya an ali'in ixt'ama'tsukunin akxni katalakwaynacha.
40024046	Sawalhcha oxi anchunu ma'tsuku li akxni kachina an ixpatrón, oxi tapatsat'ajun.
40024047	Yucha klajunaw li an ixpatrón o'sliyancha li kamalhistakni'oya an ixtanlhun.
40024048	Pero li anchunu ma'tsuku kapastaklhi, kanawlh: 'Tu so'ojo katimilh an kinpatrón.
40024049	Chi kajalaksamalhcha an ali'in ixt'ama'tsukunin, an t'akunin chi lapanakni, chi kawaylhcha chi ka'otlhicha yu otputun chi wa kat'a'ap'alhcha;
40024050	akxni ntu k'atsay tuchi horajcha chi tuchi wilhchancha kachina an ixpatrón,
40024051	chi akxni alhp'asi kastak mama'alh'ajnikana', kajat'amak'ankana an yu wa taja'o'xcho'onun, tan kalaj'alhunkana chi tan wa xwat'at'acha kalaktasat'awkana'.
40025001	Chunchuniya katapasaya an lhich'alhkat anu lakt'iyan, tachanu ixpumakawk'an jatsi'in yu taxa'a'ilh ixpumaklhkuk'an chi ta'alhcha paxto'nini an ts'alh yu kat'atsukukana'.
40025002	An ixkisink'an s'alaj tat'ajun chi an ali'in ixkisink'an jantu.
40025003	An yu ntu s'alaj tat'ajun jantu talhi'alhi xa'asaytej an ixpumaklhkuk'an, yu sast'icha katamunicho'olh.
40025004	Pero an yu s'alaj tat'ajun ixkisink'an jatsi'in, talhi'alhi xa'asaytej xpumaklhkuk'an laka frasco.
40025005	Mu ntu so'ojo chin an ts'alh, pus sawalhcha talaklhtataputulh, talaklhtatalhcha.
40025006	Jaytatnancha, p'aschaa chiwinkan, nawkan: —¡Mintacha an ts'alh an yu kat'atsukukana'! ¡K'at'axt'utcha, k'alak'at'ast'ukt'itcha!
40025007	Pus an ixpumakawk'an jatsi'in talaj'ostaya'olh chi tamala'asijnilhcha an ixpumaklhkuk'an.
40025008	An ixkisink'an an yu ntu s'alaj tat'ajun tat'alajuni an yu s'alaj tat'ajun: —Akilaxta'niwka lakats'uniya ami'asaytejk'an; mu mixt'ajuncha an kimpumaklhkuk'an.
40025009	Pero an yu s'alaj tat'ajun jatsi'in tat'ala'alhtaylh, tat'alajuniy: —Jantu, mu chuncha wa lasi kaxaw'oya kitnan chi uxitnan. Apalij k'ak'it'ama'ut'it wachu yu mi'anuk'an an tan st'akan.
40025010	Pus an ixpumakisik'an jatsi'in anchaka ta'ampalh, walh chilhcha an ts'alh. An ixpumakisik'an an yu ixtala'asijta, tat'atanulhcha an ts'alh an tan tama'xt'o'a laka cha'a chi talaklhchawlhcha an malhticha.
40025011	Xli'astan tacha'alhka wachuu an ali'in jatsi'in, tanajun: —¡Jamach'alhkat, Jamach'alhkat, akilamati'aniw!
40025012	Pero an Jamach'alhkat, jajuniy: —Klajunaw yu sawalh, jantu klamispayaw tichini uxitnancha.
40025013	Jaxa'ala'olh an Jesús jajuniy: —Chuncha uxitnan, k'as'alaj ts'uk'ut'it, mu nt'u k'ats'ayat'it tuchi wilhchancha chi tuchi horajcha kamina an isTs'alh Lapanak.
40025014	An lhich'alhkat anu lakt'iyan wachu tacha xamati lapanak yu jamatumin, yu ti'ancha inta ma'at la'acha'an, chi an yu tat'atapatsay kajat'asanilhcha chi kajamalhistaknilhcha an ixtumin.
40025015	Pumatam la'akisi milhcha tumini xta'nilh, chi pumatam la'at'uycha milh, chi pumatam tam milhcha, atamj atamjcha malhistaknikalh tacha laycha la'ts'ilhi'an. Chi wachuncha alhcha ma'at an jamatumin.
40025016	An yu la'akisi milh jama'lhtayanalh putapatsalhcha, chi la'akisi milhcha lhajanicho'olh.
40025017	Wanajcha chuni ilhtulh an yu wa la'at'uy milh jama'lhtayanalh, la'at'uycha milhi lhajanicho'olh.
40025018	Pero an yu wa tam milh jama'lhtayanalh, alh maknunu an ixtumin an ixpatrón.
40025019	Ma'ancha walh, chincho'olhcha an ixpatronk'an an ma'tapatsanin chi jalakt'asanicho'olhcha, jalhisakmilhcha tuchini tapu'ilhtulhcha an tumin.
40025020	Cha'alhcha p'ulhnaja an yu la'akisi milh ixjama'lhtayananta tumin, chi t'axta'lhicha an la'akisi milh yu ilhajanitacha, najun: —Patrón, la'akisi milhi an k'ixt'a'nin, anicha malh, chi anicha malhi an yu iklhajanilh, wachu la'akisi milh.
40025021	An ixpatrón juniy: —Sawalhcha oxi, oxi ma'tapatsank'at'i chi sawalhi yu na'un; tu lhuwi an xlist'akt'a pero ilht'u sawalh, chaway yu lhuwcha akmalhistakiyan. K'at'anut'icha, kalaj'achanawcha.
40025022	La'cha'ampalh wachu an yu wa la'at'uy milh tumin ixjama'lhtayananta, najun: —Patrón, la'at'uy milhi an k'ixt'a'nin, anicha malh, chi anicha malhi yu iklhajanilh, wachu la'at'uy milh.
40025023	An ixpatrón juniy: —Sawalhcha oxi, oxi ma'tapatsank'at'i chi sawalhi yu na'un; jantu lhuwi an xlist'akt'a pero ilht'u sawalh, chaway yu lhuwcha akmalhistakniyan. K'at'anut'icha, kalaj'achanawcha.
40025024	Pero akxni cha'alh an yu wa tam milh tumin ixjama'lhtayananta, juniy an ixpatrón: —Patrón, kit'in xajk'atsaycha li sawalhch'a unit'a, uxint'i jax'anani masi t'ant'u uxint'i ch'ant'a ch'i p'ulasak'a masi t'ant'u uxint'i ma'p'its'it'a.
40025025	Pus iktalhanalh, ik'alh maknunu lakaat'uni amintumin, pero anicha malhi amintumin.
40025026	An ixpatrón, alhtaylh juniy: —Uxint'i wa ay unit'a ma'tapatsan, ch'i nt'u t'u'u ilht'up'ut'un; mu li ixk'ats'aycha li ijkax'anani tan tu kit'in ikch'an chi li ikpulasak'a tan tu kit'in ikma'pitsiy tu'u,
40025027	pus k'axlip'i laka bancojo an kintumin, walh akxni xakchincho'olh, xajkama'lhtayanalhcha an kintumin chi xajas'at'a.
40025028	Chi jajuniy an patrón an yu ancha ixtayanalh: —K'amaxt'unit'iti an tam milh tumin, yucha an yu la'akaw milh tumin lhit'ajuni k'axt'a'nit'it.
40025029	Mu yu lhit'ajun, kaxta'nikana palay, pus palay kalhitsukuya'; pero yu ntu lhit'ajun, masi yu wa lakats'unicha kaxlitsukulh kamaxtuni'okana'.
40025030	Ani yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay ma'tapatsan, k'amak'ap'itcha ma'spa tan puts'ista; tan kalaj'alhunkana chi wa xwat'at'acha kalaktasat'awk'ana'.
40025031	Akxni kaxlimjcha jat'amina an isTs'alh Lapanak an ix'angelhnin, yucha katawlacha an la xputawlan yu ta lhichux kapumispa'okana li yucha ay.
40025032	Chux an lapanakni ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni la xlakapuchaa katata'ayxto'oya', chi yucha kajamala'apitsiyacha, tacha an ja'ilhtuy yu jalhist'ak'a ixborregojnin chi ixcabrajnin.
40025033	An borregojnin lhilax'oxicha ixmakaa kajalhiyawyanta chi an cabrajnin lhilaxjama'xicha.
40025034	Chi akxni an Rey kajajunacha an yu lhilax'oxi ixmaka tayanalh: —Uxitnan yu tamapayniyan an Kimpay k'at'at'itcha; k'ajama'lht'ayanant'itcha an lhich'alhkat yu mala'asijninik'ant'at'it sta akxni an Dios ilhtulh an lakaamunulhpa'.
40025035	Mu ikchawanalh, chi uxitnan kilat'awajiw; ijkikxixli, chi uxitnan kilat'a'ot'wi xkan; tan xakcha'an chi ntu inta xakla'akuja, uxitnan kilaxta'niwi tan aktawilh.
40025036	Tu tu'u kila'ch'iti xakla'ch'ita, uxitnan kilaxta'niwi kila'ch'it; xakta'an'ay, uxitnan kilakila'kilaw; xaklaklhchajuy chi uxitnan kilakila'ts'iw.
40025037	Akxni, katalhisakmiya an yu ntu ay tajunita lapanakni, katajuna: —Rey, ¿Tasu wananch'a ixch'awani chi iklat'awajiwi?, ¿U tasu wananch'a ixk'ikxixa chi iklat'a'ot'wi xkani?,
40025038	¿Chi tasu wananch'a nt'u int'a ixla'ak'uja chi iklaxta'niwi t'an k'at'a'ulhi, chi akxni alhalha ixt'a'un, chi iklaxta'niwi mila'ch'iti?
40025039	¿Chi tasu wananch'a ixt'a'an'ay chi ixlaklhch'a'uy, chi klakila'ts'iwi?
40025040	An Rey kaja'alhtaya, kajajuna: —Wa tichicha yu ch'unch'a ilht'ut an kijat'ala'awnin masi yu wa xalakt'ikt'incha, tachanu kit'ini chuncha kila'ilhtuw.
40025041	Xli'astan an Rey kajajunacha an yu xlila'ama'xi tayanalh: —¡Uxitnan yu laka lhima'alh'ajna k'ap'ina'it k'a'ost'itcha ani, k'ap'inchi'itcha laka lhinin, tan mala'asijninikanta an xapay makxkay'un chi an lakmakxkay'un!
40025042	Mu ikchawanilh, chi ntu kilat'awajiw; ijkikxixli, chi ntu kilaxta'niwi xkan;
40025043	akxni jantu inta xakla'akuja tan xakcha'an, tu kilaxta'niwi tan aktawilh; tu tu'u kila'ch'it ixjunita, jantu kilaxta'niw; xakta'an'ay chi xaklaklhchajuy, walh tu kilakila'kilaw.
40025044	Akxni, yu'uncha katalhisakmiya, katajuna: —"Rey, ¿tasu wanancha iklala'ts'iw ixch'awani, u ixk'ikxixa, u nt'u int'a ixla'ak'uja, u ntu tu'u mila'ch'it, u ixt'a'an'ay, u ixlaklhch'a'uy, chi ntu iklalhi'a'tayjuwi?"
40025045	An Rey, kajajuna: —"Tacha jantu xamati ch'unch'a ilht'ut an xalakt'ikt'in yu kilapanakni, jant'u t'u'u ilht'ut kilakata".
40025046	Yu'uncha kata'anacha laka lhima'alh'ajna tan tu a'tam min'ojota, chi an yu oxi lapanakni kajaxta'nikanacha jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
40026001	Akxni chunchacha ja'jun'olh an Jesús, jajunicha an ixt'alhtanan:
40026002	K'ats'ayatcha li wa la'at'uycha wilhchani ts'an'ay ixk'atan paxku, an istsT'alh Lapanak kama'axta'kanacha para li katamakxtukmuk'alhcha laka Cruz.
40026003	Wachuncha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an laktatanincha yu ancha ixla'acha'ank'an, tata'ayxto'lhicha an la xjatalakxtut an xa'aycha tukan sacerdote, yu junkan Caifás.
40026004	Chi anchacha talhilakchiwinilh tani katalhi'o'xcho'och'apayawlhcha an Jesús, para li katama'nilhcha.
40026005	Pero talajuniy: —Tukan k'atan jantu, para li ntu katala'talh'amalh an lapanakni.
40026006	An Jesús, la'acha'an Betaniaja ixt'ajun, la ixcha'a Simón, yu ixlakap'uch'i'ojota.
40026007	Walh ancha la'cha'alh pumatam t'aku yu ixli'anta la'atam perjume la xafrasco, yu wanaj la'lhuw ixtapalay, chi ukmuk'akalhi an Jesús akxni sa' ix'wilh laka mesa.
40026008	Chi mu tala'ts'incha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, pus talhitalh'amalh, tajuniy: —¿Tasu li wa lha'amanancha an perjumeje?
40026009	Yucha layi kaxlist'akalh la'lhuw, chi kaxjamala'pitsinikalhcha an jakilhpatinin.
40026010	Pero an Jesús asmat'a, pus jajuniy: —¿T'asu li la'a'aymayatcha ani t'aku'u? Oxicha tacha ani ki'ilhtulh.
40026011	Mu an jakilhpatinin lhilhiji k'ajat'a'aklats'uk'uya'it'it, pero kit'in jantu.
40026012	Ani t'aku kilakamuk'alhcha an perjume ixlakata li mala'asijnicha li akxni akimaknukana'.
40026013	Chaway sawalh, klajunaw, wa tanchuncha kalhichiwinkana ani laj'oxi chiwinti, chux lakaamunulhpa, wachu kalhichiwinkana an yu ilhtulh ani t'aku', para li kalhipastakkalh.
40026014	Xapumatam an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, yu ixjunkan Judas Iscariote, jala'alhi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin,
40026015	chi jajuniy: —¿Tasuncha kilaxta'niyaw para li aklama'axta'niw an Jesusi? Yu'uncha taxta'nilh a'xp'uxamkaw (30) tumin de plata.
40026016	Pus sta akxni wa ixlipuxkawnicha tani kalhima'axta'lhicha.
40026017	Walhcha la'atam wilhchan ixk'atan pan yu ntu lhiyalh lhamaskajan, tala'cha'alhcha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tajuniy: —¿T'anisch'a na'un akmala'asijniw para li k'awaycha laka paxku?
40026018	Yucha jajuniy: —K'ala'p'inchi'it tichi lapanak an la'acha'an, k'a'una'it: An Maestro najun: Wanicha kimpanch'e'ex; an la mincha'a akmak'ataniya an paxku ali an kint'alhtanan.
40026019	Pus an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús chunchacha ta'ilhtulh tacha an jajunilh, tamala'asijnilhcha ixlakata an paxku.
40026020	Akxni tats'isilhcha, jat'atawilhcha laka mesa an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús.
40026021	Chi akxni ixtalak'wayt'ajuncha, jajuniy: —Sawalhi ani yu klajunaw, xapumatam yu uxitnani yu akima'axt'a'a'.
40026022	Pus sawalhcha ixtata'oxila'alhi, atamj atamjcha ixtalhisakmi, ixtajuniy: —¿Kit'in sna'a, Jamach'alhkat Jesús?
40026023	Wachuncha yucha ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Yucha an kint'atamaj'oy lakimpulatojo akima'axt'a'a'.
40026024	Sawalhi li an isTs'alh Lapanak ts'ajwi ti'an, tacha an lhits'o'muk'akanta, pero an lapanak an yu kama'axt'a'a an isTs'alh Lapanak kapulhik'atsaya'. Yucha palay oxi jantu kastsukulh.
40026025	Wachuncha an Judas Iscariote, an yu kama'axt'a'a, alhtaylh juniy: —¿Maestro, chu sna kit'in? An Jesús juniy: —Uxint'ich'a naw.
40026026	Chi ixtalak'wayt'ajunka, an Jesús xa'a'ilhcha an pan, chi xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun, la'ch'e'elhcha jaxta'nilhcha an ixt'alhtanan, jajuniy: —Ni'ijcha, k'a'ut'itcha, aniy kilakatunaj.
40026027	Xli'astan xa'a'ipalh la'atam vaso yu ixputajun xaxkan uva, chi wachucha lhixta'nilh lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, chi jaxta'nilhcha an ixt'alhtanan, jajuniy: —Minchuxchak'ani k'ap'u'ott'it ani vaso,
40026028	mu aniy yucha kijak'alhni, yu sast'icha putamakawkan li ani jak'alhni kamaj'ankana, para li lhuw lapanakni katapumala'mixilh ixtala'alhink'an.
40026029	Kit'in klajunaw sta chaway tu akti'otcho'olhi an xaxkan uva, sta akxniy aklat'alaj'otcho'otacha'aw yu sast'icha an la xlich'alhkat kimPay.
40026030	Akxni talakmilhpa'olhcha la'atam milhpat, ta'alhcha a'stitawk'a tan junkan laka'olivojnin.
40026031	Ancha jajuniy an Jesús: —Ani katats'isiya wanaj akilamakaw'oyaw; mu ts'o'muk'akanta an la ixchiwinti Dios tan najunta: —Akma'niya an yu jalhist'ak'a ixborregojnin, chi an ixborregojnin wanaj tilh katata'a'pitsi'oya'.
40026032	Pero akxni akla'awcho'oyacha kit'ini aklatap'ulhniyaw ak'ana xalakaat'un Galilea.
40026033	An Pedro, alhtaylh juniy: —Masi katamakaw'ojon, kit'in jantu aktimakajun.
40026034	An Jesús juniy: —Kit'in sawalhi yu ijkunan li ani katats'isiya, akxni jantuka' k'is tu'u katit'asalh puyux, a't'utu k'anawna'a li nt'u k'imisp'ay.
40026035	Pero an Pedro juniy: —Masi akt'anin jantu aktimakajun. Chi an ali'in ixt'alhtanan wachu chuni tajunilh.
40026036	Wachuncha jat'acha'alhcha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tan jalakch'ananankanta Getsemaní, jajuniy: —K'alakt'awlatka ani, kit'in ikti'an anu', ikti'an tapaynini'.
40026037	Pus ja'aylhi'alhcha an Pedro, chi an ixt'uyunk'an ists'alan tichi lapanak junkan Zebedeo, walh sawalhcha tsukulh ta'oxila'alhiya an Jesús.
40026038	Jajuniy: —An kintak'atsan sawalhcha ta'oxila'alhi, wanajcha akniyacha ijk'atsan; ani akilapakxaw jant'u k'alaklht'at'at'it.
40026039	Pus stalhcha alh lakats'uni, tatso'ottalhcha chi tamuntitachalhcha an lakaat'un, tsukulhcha tapayni, najun: —Kimpay, li lay, ak'imala'xt'inunini ani ay lhima'alh'ajna; pero ntu tacha kit'in klakask'ini kawalh, tacha uxint'i lak'ask'ini kawalh.
40026040	Xli'astan jala'cha'ancho'olhcha an ixt'aalhtanan, walh ixtalaklhtatanancha. Pus junkan an Pedro: —¿Jantu layi masi wa tamcha hora akilat'a'alhkujwi?
40026041	K'ak'ujt'it ch'i k'at'ap'aynit, para li nt'u k'alhila'ts'int'anuk'ant'it li k'a'ilht'up'ut'ut yu ntu oxi. Mu an takuwin yucha ilhtuputuni yu oxi, pero an lakatunaj yucha yu ntu k'ut'ilh.
40026042	A'tam ampalh, a'tam tapaynipalhi ixlipu'a't'uycha, najun: —Kimpay li ntu layi ak'int'imala'xt'inunin ani ay lhima'alh'ajna, chunchacha kawalh t'ach'a oxi lhiwilay.
40026043	Jala'cha'ampalh a'tami an ixt'alhtanan, a'tamcha ixtalaklhtatanampalay, mu sawalhcha ixjala'cha'an ilhtatapututk'an.
40026044	Pus jamakawlh, a'tam ampalh, ixlipu'a't'utucha alh tapaynini', wanajcha yu chiwinti nawpalh.
40026045	Wachuncha jala'cha'ampalh an ixt'alhtanan, jajuniy: —¿Jast'aknant'awnatka ch'i laklht'at'ayatka'? Chilhcha panch'e'ex, an Ists'alh Dios kajama'axta'nikanacha la xmaknik'an an la'ma'lhta'alhinin.
40026046	K'alaj'ost'ayatcha, ka'awcha, jo' mintacha an yu akima'axt'a'a'.
40026047	Ixchiwint'ajunka an Jesús, la'cha'alhcha an Judas, xapumatam an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan, t'o'o'ocha jat'acha'alh lhuw lapanakni, ixtalaklhi'antacha ix'espadajk'an chi ixk'iwk'an. Yu'uncha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an laktatanincha yu ancha ixla'acha'ank'ani ixtalhinajunta.
40026048	An ja'o'xcho'onuj Judas la'asiyaj ixjajunitacha tani kajapumasuniyacha, ixjajunita: —Yucha an akla'xtikilhtast'uk'a yu Jesús, k'ach'ap'ayawya'itcha.
40026049	Pus an Judas la'cha'alhcha an Jesús la'axa'alalhcha, juniy: —¡Xaycha Maestro! —Chi la'xtikilhtastuklhicha.
40026050	Pus an Jesús alhtaylh: —Kint'ala'ajun, ¿tisunch'a la't'ant'a? Wachuncha an ali'in t'o'cha tala'cha'an'olhi an Jesús, tach'apayawlhcha.
40026051	Pero xapumatam yu ixtat'a'anta an Jesús, xtalan xa'axtullhi an ix'espada chi xtalh akatuch'uk'up'uxli xapumatam ixma'tsuku an yu tukancha xa'ay sacerdote.
40026052	Wachuncha an Jesús juniy: —K'ama'at'i ami'espada, mu yu espadaja pulasay, wachu espadaja kapuniya'.
40026053	¿Ch'u na'uncha li ntu layi aktapayninilh an kimPay chi akimakminilh palay de la'akawt'uy batallón angelhnin?
40026054	Pero li chuncha, ¿tasucha lay kalhitapasaya tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta tan najun li chuncha katapasalhi?
40026055	Pus akxni an Jesús jajuniy an lapanakni: —¿Chu ijka'alhawna li kilamintawcha ch'apayawnin laka espada chi laka k'iw? Lhilhiji xak'an masunu an laka tajtan, chi akxni ntu kilach'apayaju.
40026056	Pero wa xliyu li chuncha katapasaya tacha an tats'o'muk'ata an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios. Wachuncha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, wanaj tamakaw'olh, ta'oslicha.
40026057	An yu tach'apayawlh an Jesús talhi'anilhcha an Caifás, yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote, tan ixta'ayxto'nun an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an laktatanincha.
40026058	An Pedro wa ma'atcha ixch'a'o'alhi'anta sta an la xjatalakxtut an yu xa'aycha tukan sacerdote, walh tanuchalhcha, sa'cha jat'atawilh an yu ixtajalhistaknan, para li kala'ts'ilhcha tuchini katapasayacha.
40026059	Walh an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi chux an yu ancha ixta'ayxto'nun, ixtapuxkajuycha tu'u maslakatinti para li katalhimuk'alhcha an Jesús, chi laycha katama'nilh.
40026060	Pero ntu tu'u tala'cha'alh, masi ixluwk'ancha ixtacha'an yu ixtanajun tu'u yu ntu sawalh. Xli'astan tacha'ampalh ixt'uyunk'an,
40026061	tanajun: —Aniy lapanak najun: Layi aklakt'ilhilh an ixtajtan Dios chi ixlila'at'utu wilhchan akla'oxicho'olh.
40026062	Pus tayalhi an yu tukancha xa'ay sacerdote, chi xa'alaycha an Jesús, juniy: —¿Jant'u k'at'ija'alht'ayan? ¿Tisuncha tacha ani talhimuk'ayani?
40026063	Pero an Jesús tu k'is alhtaylh. Wachuncha an xa'aycha tukan sacerdote jumpalay an Jesús: —La xtalakask'i an yu la'ajunta Dios iklhisk'iniyan akilajuniwi li uxint'iy Cristo, an isTs'alh Dios.
40026064	Pus an Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Uxint'ich'a naw; chi atumpaj klajunaw sta chaway k'ala'ts'ina'itcha an isTs'alh Dios katawlanta tan oxi la xpa'xti an Dios tan ch'alhkatnan, ch'i k'ala'ts'ina'it'iti akxni kaminanta lakt'iyan laka jataputs'i.
40026065	Wachuncha, an tukancha xa'ay sacerdote la'lh'alhcha an ixla'ch'it, najun: —¡Wa aya juniya an Dios! ¿Ali jama'lhtask'iniyawi yu kata'alhtasulh? Alha'asmat'atcha tacha an wa aya juniy an Dios.
40026066	¿T'asuch'a lhiwilayat'iti? Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh, tajuniy: —¡T'acha'ancha kama'nikalh!
40026067	Pus akxni tsukulhcha tala'puchuj'way, chi ixtalakasamaycha chi ali'in ixtalakpusaycha.
40026068	Xtajuniy: —Akilajuniwcha tichini muk'anincha Cristo.
40026069	An Pedro sa'cha ix'wilh ma'spa jatalakxtut; walh la'cha'alh pumatam t'aku ma'tsuku, juniy: —Uxint'i wachu ixt'alhtanak'at'i an Jesús, jamacha'a Galilea.
40026070	Pero an Pedro najun ma jantu, ixchuxk'ani ta'alha'asmat'olh, najun: —Tu ijk'atsay t'uch'ini unicha.
40026071	Xli'astan an Pedro, alhi an jatalakxtut, walh a'tam la'ts'impalh pumatam t'aku ma'tsuku', an t'aku jajuniy an yu ancha ixtat'ajun: —Aniy wachu ancha ixt'a'aklat'ajun an Jesús, jamacha'a Nazaret.
40026072	Pero an Pedro a'tam nawpalhi li ntu mispay, najuncha li ntu sawalh, najun: —¡Jantu ikmispayi tichini yuchacha an lapanak!
40026073	Pants'ik'ischa jumpalh, an yu ancha ixtat'ajun tala'cha'alh an Pedro tajuniy: —Chun sawalh uxint'i wachu de yu'uncha, mu wanaj ch'unch'a ch'iwiniy.
40026074	Pus akxni wa aya najuncha, chi ixnajuncha li xasawalh, najun: —Jantu ikmispayi an lapanak. Walh wa akxni t'asalhcha an puyux.
40026075	Pus akxni, an Pedro pastaklhicha tacha an ixjunita an Jesús, akxni junikalh an Pedro: —Jantuka' katit'asalh puyux, a't'utucha k'anawna'a li nt'u k'imisp'ay. Pus taxtulh ma'spa, wa stakcha alhulh.
40027001	Akxni tunkulhcha, ixchuxk'an an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an laktatanincha an jamacha'an Israel, tatamakawlhcha li katama'niyacha an Jesús.
40027002	Pus tach'ilhi'anilhcha an Pilato, tama'axta'nilhcha, mu yucha gobernador ixjunita.
40027003	Wachuncha an Judas, an yu ma'axta'lhi an Jesús, akxni la'ts'incha li kama'nikanacha, astancha najun, pus jama'axta'nicho'olhi an a'xp'uxamkaw tumin de plata an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an laktatanincha,
40027004	jajuniy: —Tala'alhincha k'ilhtuy li ikma'axt'a'acha ani lapanak yu ntu tani lay. Pero yu'uncha wa tajuniy: —Kitnan ntu kintala'alhink'an. ¡K'ala'ts'icha uxint'i!
40027005	Pus tilh maka'alhi an tumin an laka tajtan, taxtulhcha, alhcha, chi lhtujcha ch'ikilhtakalh ix'akstu.
40027006	Chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin talaksaklhicha an tumin talajuniy: —An lhamap'a'sin tu najuni li layi kamucho'o ani tumin, an tan mukan xatumin laka tajtan, mu ixtapalhcha jak'alhni.
40027007	Xli'astan talakchiwinilhcha chi tatamakawlhcha li katalhitamawyacha lakaat'un, pus talhitamawlhcha lakaat'un tan junkan ixlakaat'un yu la'la'oxiy a'cho'o, tan kajamaknukalhcha yu ntu an jamacha'an.
40027008	Xliyu anchunu lakaat'un sta chaway junkan de jak'alhni lakaat'un.
40027009	Chunchacha walh sawalh tacha an ixnajunta Jeremías, yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios akxni nawlh: —"Taxa'a'ilhi an a'xp'uxamkaw tumin de plata yu ixtapalhcha ixta'ulanita an jamacha'an Israel,
40027010	chi talhitamawlhcha an ixlakaat'un yu la'la'oxiy a'cho'o, tacha kilhijunilh an Dios."
40027011	An Jesús la xlakapucha an Pilatojo ixyalh; pus an Pilato lhisakmicha an Jesús, juniy: —¿Uxint'i ixrejk'an jamacha'an Israel? An Jesús ja'alhtayanalh: —Uxint'ich'a na'un.
40027012	Chi akxni ixta'alhtasuycha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an laktatanincha, an Jesús tu k'is ja'alhtayanalh.
40027013	Pus an Pilato juniy: —¿Jant'u asmat'a tacha an stak talhimuk'ayan?
40027014	Pero an Jesús tu k'is tu'u alhtaylh, pus an Pilato sawalhcha ixli'a'ni.
40027015	Chi mu a'tamincha akxni ix'alin k'atan, an Pilato ixmakajun xamati tach'in, watichicha ixtask'iniy an lapanakni.
40027016	Walh akxni, ixmalaklhchawkanta pumatam tach'in ixjunkan Barrabás, sawalhcha ixmispakan.
40027017	Pus akxni anchacha ixta'ayxto'nun an lapanakni, an Pilato jajuniy: —¿Tisiyuch'ach'a lak'ask'inat aklamakawniwi?, ¿Yucha an Barrabás u yucha an Jesús, an yu tajuniy li Cristo?
40027018	Chunchacha jajunilh an Pilato mu yucha ixk'atsayi li wa ixtaxkajiya an Jesús, xliyu talhima'axta'nilh.
40027019	Walh akxni sa'cha ix'wilh la xtants'i an Pilato, tan ixnajun tichini ixlhi'ancha tala'alhin chi tichini yu jantucha, an ixt'iwi mala'achanilh chiwinti tan juniy: —Jant'u t'ani k'a'ilht'u anchunu yu ntu ta lay lapanak; mu ts'isicha makxkay tukani ijkala'awanalh, yucha ixlakata.
40027020	Pero an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an laktatanincha, tamatanunilhi an lapanakni li yucha an Barrabasi katask'inilh an Pilato chi an Jesús kama'nikalhcha.
40027021	Pus an Pilato jalhisakmipalh jajuniy: —¿Tanyuchacha an ixt'uyunk'ani nawnat aklamakawniwi? Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh: —¡Yucha an Barrabás!
40027022	An Pilato jajuniy: —¿Chi an Jesús yu unat'it li Cristo, tasicha ak'ilhtuya'a? Ixchuxk'ani tajun'olh: —!K'amakxt'ukmuk'acha laka cruz!
40027023	An Pilato jajuniy: —¿Tasu'u, tisuncha tala'alhini ilhtuta? Pero yu'uncha palay p'as ixtalaknajun: —¡K'amakxt'ukmuk'akalhcha laka cruz!
40027024	Pus la'ts'incha an Pilato li ntucha lay tu'u ilhtuy, li apalijcha wa palay tala'talh'amani an lapanakni, pus sk'inlhicha xkan, chi ix'ukxlakapuchak'an ixchuxk'an an lapanakni ma'ch'a'alhcha, jajuniy: —Kit'in tu kintala'alhini an xak'alhni ani lapanak, mu ntu tani lay; k'ala'ts'int'itcha uxitnan.
40027025	Pus chux an lapanakni taja'alhtayanalh, tanajun: —¡Kitnancha aklhitawk'ayaw an xak'alhni, chi an kilakjas'at'anink'an!
40027026	Wachuncha an Pilato jamakawnilhcha an Barrabás; pero an Jesús lhimawlhcha li kala'ana'makalhcha, chi ma'axta'lhicha li kamakxtukmuk'akalhcha laka cruz.
40027027	An isoldadojnin an Pilato talhi'alhcha an Jesús an laka palacio, chi anchacha talama'ayxto'olh ixchuxk'an an soldadojnin, lhtayancha tala'atanchanulh.
40027028	Tamaxtunilhcha an ixla'ch'it, chi tamala'ch'inilhcha slapulh la'ch'it.
40027029	Chi tama'tanulhcha ixcorona, si jalhtukun, chi tamach'apalhcha ma'atam wa tacha ch'ankat an tan lhi'oxi ixmaka'. Ixtatatso'ottanicha, ixtamamaxanicha, ixtajuniy: —¡K'ajama'alht'axt'uncha ixrejk'an judiojnin!
40027030	Xtala'achuj'waycha, chi ixtapula'pana'acha an wa tacha ch'ankat ixtamach'apata.
40027031	Xli'astan tamamaxani'olh, tamaxtunicho'olhcha an slapulh la'ch'it chi tamala'ch'inicho'olhcha an yu ixla'ch'it, chi talhi'alhcha tan katamakxtukmuk'aya laka cruz.
40027032	Akxni ixtita'ancha, tapaxto'lhi pumatam lapanak jamacha'a Cirene, Simón ixjunkan, asi tamalhi'anilhi an ixcruz an Jesús.
40027033	Chi akxni tacha'alhcha tan junkan Gólgota (nawputun "la ixla'pa'axi sue'elukut"),
40027034	ixtama'ot'uycha xaxkan uvaja an Jesús yu ixta'a'munita ix'alhch'ajat sun jach'itin; pero akxni kilhk'atsalh tu otlhi.
40027035	Chi akxni tamakxtukmuk'alhcha, an ixla'ch'it talamala'pitsilhcha, wa ta'amanalh suerte para li katak'atsaalhcha tichini yu laycha kalhi'alh.
40027036	Chi anchacha sa' ixtalak'wilanalh, ixtalhist'ak'acha.
40027037	An la x'akpuxni ixtats'o'nitacha tuchini talhima'nilhcha, ixtats'o'nita: —Ani Jesús, ixrejk'an judiojnin.
40027038	Jat'amakxtukmuk'akalh ixt'uyunk'an ja'alhawnan, ixtapiktutamincha ixjat'ayawkanta, lhilaxjama'xi chi tan oxi ixmaka'.
