40027039	An yu ancha ixtapula'pusa wili wilicha ixtatalakpayajuy chi xkayajcha ixtajuni.
40027040	Xtajuniy: —¡Li k'axlakt'ilhi tajtan, chi li wa la'at'utu wilhchan k'axla'oxich'o'ocha, k'ama'alht'axt'uk'acha mi'akstu!, ¡Li isTs'alhk'at'i Dios, k'at'a'alht'a'ut'icha an laka cruz!
40027041	An xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin, chi an laktatanincha wanajcha chuni ixtamamaxani, ixtajuniy:
40027042	Ali'in jama'alhtaxtulh chi yucha ntucha layi ma'alhtaxtunikan ix'akstu; li xarey Israel kata'alhtaxtulhcha chaway an laka cruz, walh chuncha kakiklaka'iyawcha.
40027043	Sawalhcha kiklaka'iya Dios; pus kama'alhtaxtunilhcha li mapayni sawalh; mu najun: —Kit'in isTs'alh Dios.
40027044	An ixjat'amakxtukmuk'akanta ja'alhawnan, xkayajcha ixtajuni wachu'.
40027045	Chux an lakaat'un wanaj taputs'isi'olhi atunkucha walh sta las tres yu ta'oxaycha.
40027046	Ixjunt'ajuncha las tres yu ta'oxaycha, an Jesús p'asi chiwinilh, najun: —Eli, Eli, ¿Lama sabactani? Nawputun: KiDios, kiDios ¿t'asu li k'imak'a'unt'acha?
40027047	Ali'in yu ancha ixtayanalh talajuni akxni ta'alha'asmatlhi: —Yucha an Eliasi t'asani.
40027048	Pus jats'alaj'alh pumatam watukan, xa'a'ilh la'atam watacha panimak, chi mala'ch'uch'uwalhcha vinagre chi kinkach'imuk'alhcha ma'atam sua'alh k'iw, para li yuchacha kapuma'ot'ulh.
40027049	Pero an ali'in tanajun: —K'amak'awcha, kala'ts'inawcha li kamina ma'alhtaxtunu an Elías.
40027050	Walh an Jesús, a'tam p'asi chiwimpalh, ma'axta'lhicha an ixtakuwin.
40027051	Pus akxni, an la'ch'it an yu ix'uk'alh laka tajtan, lht'it'in tapu'exli, aklht'uyi walh, talhmani pu'a'taynichalh ta'exa sta talaktsin. Chi an lakaat'un laklalhcha, an chiwx la'tapup'a'xli.
40027052	Chi an tan ixlak'aknukan la'ta'a'mix'alh, pus ixluwk'an an yu ixtajakiklaka'inin yu ixtanitacha, tala'awcho'olh.
40027053	Pus akxni tatakutlhicha an tan ixta'aknunun, ixlila'awcho'otacha an Jesús, ta'alhcha an la xla'acha'an Dios, Jerusalén, pus ixluwk'ani yu tala'ts'ilh.
40027054	An ixkapitank'an an soldadojnin chi an ali'in yu an ixtat'alhistakta an Jesús, sawalhcha talaktalhanalhi akxni tala'ts'ilhcha tacha an laktapasalh chi tacha an ixlaklay an lakaat'un, pus talajuniy: —Sawalhi li ani isTs'alh Diosi ixjunita.
40027055	Wa ma'at ixluwk'an t'akunini ixtalaka'an, yu'uncha an ixta'a'tayjuy an Jesús, yu ixtach'a'o'atachalh sta xalakaat'un Galilea.
40027056	Ancha ixtama'yanalh an María Magdalena, chi an María, an ixnati Jacobo chi José, chi an ixnatik'an an ists'alan tichi lapanak junkan Zebedeo.
40027057	Akxni tats'isilhcha, cha'alh pumatam lapanak jamatumin, José junkan, jamacha'a Arimatea, yucha wachucha ixt'alhtana an Jesusi ixjunita.
40027058	La'cha'alhi an Pilato, sk'inilhi an ixlakatunaj an Jesús. Pus an Pilato lhinawlhi li kaxta'nikalh.
40027059	An José pula'apamililhcha laka sut'ut'u sábanaja an ixlakatunaj an Jesús.
40027060	Chi maknulhcha tan wa sast'ika ixja'ajnanta ixtamp'in laktalhpa, xli'astan ma'atamp'ililhi'alhcha la'atam aya chiwx yu pumalaklhchawlhcha an tan putanukan, chi ancho'olhcha.
40027061	Ancha sa' ixtalak'wilanalh an María Magdalena chi an pumatam María la xlakapu an tan maknukalh an Jesús.
40027062	Tunkunchalh, sábado, an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an fariseojnin wa ayxtamcha ta'alh la'ts'inin an Pilato.
40027063	Tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat, ikpastakwi li akxni ixt'ajunka anchunu ja'o'xcho'onu, nawlh: —"Xlila'at'utu wilhchan akla'awcho'oya'".
40027064	K'alhinaw li oxi kalhistakkalh an tan aknuy sta la'at'utu wilhchan, wa lay kata'alh an ixt'alhtanan puts'ista, chi kataki'alhawlhi an ixlakatunaj chi katanawlh li la'awcho'olh, li chuncha katapasaya palaycha ay la'o'xcho'o kuna', walh jantu xlip'ulhnaj.
40027065	Pus an Pilato jajuniy: —Anich'a jalhit'awnat'iti soldadojnin yu katajalhistaknana'. K'ap'inchi'itcha lhistaknini tacha yu laycha.
40027066	Pus ta'alhcha, oxicha ta'o'slamnilhi an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús chi ta'ulanilhcha la'atam sello, chi tamalhistaknilhcha an soldadojnin.
40028001	La'puslicha akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan, tunkuncho'olhcha la'atam wilhchan yu pu'a'taynicho'oycha la'atam samana, an María Magdalena chi an pumatam María ta'alhcha laka'anini an tan ix'aknuy Jesús.
40028002	Walh p'asi laklalh an lakaat'un; mu pumatam ix'angelh an Dios minchalh lakt'iyan, ta'alhtajulh, chi cha'alhcha an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús, ma'osunilhi an aya chiwx an yu ixpu'o'xt'alhkanta, sa'cha putawilh.
40028003	Wa tacha wa jamakalipnicha ixtasuy, chi an ixla'ch'it wa tacha wa sut'ut'ucha nieve.
40028004	An yu ixtajalhistaknan soldadojnin sawalhcha talaktalhanalh wa xk'ip'ip'icha ixtalaklay chi tala'ta'a'talhcha, wa tacha wa talaknilhcha sa' talaktamalh.
40028005	Pero an angelh jajuniy an t'akunin: —Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'iti uxitnan; kit'in ijk'atsay li yucha an Jesusi p'uxk'awyat, an yu tamakxtukmuk'alh laka cruz.
40028006	Yucha ntucha tu'u tanun, la'awcho'olhcha, tacha an ixnajunta. Li k'at'atcha la'ts'inini an tan ixmamakanta.
40028007	K'alas jak'i'unit'iti an ixt'alhtanan li la'awcho'otacha. Yucha katatap'ulhniyan ka'ana xalakaat'un Galileaja, ancha k'ala'ts'int'achi'it. Chaway klajuniwcha.
40028008	Pus an t'akunin so'ojo tataxtulh an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús, p'ascha ta'alh, mu ixtalaktalhanancha, pero wachu ixtalaj'achampalay. Ta'alhcha mak'ats'aaninini an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús.
40028009	Akxni wa ixtita'anka an t'akunin, an Jesús jatalakasunilh chi jala'axa'alalhcha. Pus stalhcha tala'alh, tatatso'ottanilhcha chi tala'atanunilhcha an ixch'aja'.
40028010	Pus akxni an Jesús jajuniy: —Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'it; k'ap'inchi'it jamak'atsaaninini an kijat'ala'awnin li kata'alhi xalakaat'un Galilea, ancha akintala'ts'inanta.
40028011	Pus akxni anchaka ixtita'an an t'akunin, ali'in an yu ixtajalhistaknanta soldadojnin ta'alhi an la'acha'an, takimak'atsaanilhi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin tacha an laktapasalh.
40028012	Pus an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin tat'ata'ayxto'lhi an laktatanincha, chi talakchiwinilhcha, chi jaxta'nikalhcha la'lhuw tumini an soldadojnin,
40028013	jajunkan: —K'anawna'it li akxni ixlaklht'at'ayat'it puts'ista taki'alhawlh an ixlakatunaj an Jesús an ixta'lhtanan.
40028014	Chi li kak'atsaya an Pilato, kitnancha akt'achiwininaw para li nt'u t'a k'a'ilht'uk'ant'it.
40028015	An soldadojnin tajama'lhtayanalhi an tumin chi chunchacha tanawlh tacha an ixjajunkanta. Tacha an jajunkalh an soldadojnin li katanawlh, sta chaway an judiojnin chuncha talajuni.
40028016	Pero an ixpumakawtamk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús yu'uncha ta'alhcha an xalakaat'un Galilea, an a'stitawk'a an tan Jesús ixjajunita li kata'ana'.
40028017	Akxni tala'ts'ilhcha, tatatso'ottanilhcha; pero an ali'in tu tukancha ixtalhiwilay.
40028018	Pus an Jesús stalh jala'alh, chi jajuniy: —Chux lhich'alhkat an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un la kimaknicha kima'axta'nikalh.
40028019	Chaway k'ap'inchi'itcha chi k'aja'ilht'utcha kint'alhtan ta kilhmakchux ta'alin an lapanakni k'ajama'p'axaya'itcha la ixta'a'ut an kimPay chi an isTs'alh chi an Stalan'a Takuwin,
40028020	k'ajamasuniya'it'itcha li katakiklaka'ilhi tacha an klajuntawcha uxitnan; lhilhiji aklat'a'aklatsukuyaw uxitnan sta akxni ka'ukla'oya an lakaamunulhpa'.
41001001	Aniya a'taynilh an laj'oxi chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy Jesucristo, ists'alh Dios.
41001002	An tan ts'o'muk'ata an Isaias, yu ma'anchacha xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, najun, tan manawnilh an Dios: P'ulhnaj akmak'ana yu ka'ana lhichiwiniy an kinchiwinti para li kamala'asijnilhi min tij.
41001003	—Chiwijlakaminkani an tan tu xamati wilh lakak'iwin, nawkan: "K'ala'asijt'itcha, k'ala'oxit'itcha an ixtij an ay jamach'alkat, oxicha k'ats'uk'ut'it.
41001004	Pus an Juan, tsukulhcha jama'paxayi an lapanakni an lakak'iwin chi xjalhixa'alaycha li astancha katanawlh, li katamakawlhcha ixtala'alhink'an, para li an Dios kajamala'mixinilhcha.
41001005	Pus wanajcha lhilhuwi ixtala'cha'an yu ixtaminachalh xalakat'un Judea chi la'acha'an Jerusalén. Xtanajuncha tuchini ixtala'alhinchak'an pus xjama'paxaycha, tanchun ayxkan junkan Jordán.
41001006	An xla'ch'it an Juan wa xjaxt'a'an camello chi xch'axpawilhcha a'xtam jaxt'a'an. Chi akxni xwajin wa t'axkat yu alin lakak'iwini x'uy chi sele' yu junkan camarón, yu tacha alin lakakuxtu.
41001007	Xnajun: —Xli'astan kamina pumatam yu palay alhp'asni, kit'in tuk'is ixt'achun, yucha masi li wa akta'antalhcha ak'o'x'otnilh xwarachi, jantu ikt'acha'an.
41001008	Kit'in wa laka xkani klama'paxayaw pero yucha katama'paxayan laxtakuwin Dios.
41001009	Walh la'atam wilhchan an Jesús minchalh la'acha'an Nazaret xalakat'un Galilea. La'cha'alhcha an Juán, juniy: —Ak'ima'p'axat'i. Pus an Juán ma'paxalhcha an Jesús, an ayxkan tan junkan Jordán.
41001010	Walh wa ixtakutt'ajunka an Jesús an lakxkan, la'ts'incha an lakt'iyan tati'alh, chi ta'alhtajulhcha wa tacha la'atam paloma, tan ixyalh, yucha an ixtakuwin Dios.
41001011	Xli'astan chiwinkancha an lakt'iyan nawkan: —Uxint'i kints'alhk'at'i, ikmapayniyan. Uxint'i k'ima'an'ach'ay.
41001012	Wa chuncha watukan lhi'alhi an ixtakuwin Dios lakak'iwin,
41001013	chi anchacha aklatsukuchalh t'up'uxam wilhchan, tan ta'alin ma'tilin. Chi an Satanás xlila'ts'intanuycha an Jesús. Akxni makawlhcha an Satanás, tala'cha'alhcha an angelhnin chi ixtatapatsaanicha.
41001014	La' puslicha wilhchan akxni an Juán ixmalaklhchawkanta, an Jesús alh lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios an xalakaat'un Galilea.
41001015	Najun: chilhcha panch'e'ex, an xlich'alhkat Dios wanicha minta, k'ak'iklak'a'itcha an ixchiwinti Dios jantucha ali k'a'ilht'ut'iti mintala'alhink'an.
41001016	Akxni wa nicha x'antachalh xpiktu xa'alamalh Galilea, an Jesús jala'ts'ilh ixt'uyunk'an xch'apayawnan jatanti, wa lhit'ala'awnin. Yu'uncha an Simón chi Andrés. Ixtamujuy xpaxo'tank'an an lakxkan.
41001017	Jajuni an Jesús: Akilat'a'awcha walh ixma'alhilanancha lapanakni akla'ilhtuyaw.
41001018	Pus watukan tamakawlhi an xpaxo'tank'an, chi tat'a'alhcha.
41001019	Lanancha ma'ati ixta'antalh, an Jesús jala'ts'impalh an Jacobo chi an Juan, ists'alan Zebedeo, ixtalakch'it'ajun xpaxo'tank'an laka barco.
41001020	Jat'asanilh, pus tamakawchalhi an xpayk'an Zebedeo laka barco ali an yu tat'atapatsay, chi tat'a'alhcha.
41001021	Tacha'alhcha Capernaúm. Chi akxni ntu ixtapatsakan wilhchan ixmasuycha an Jesús an laka cha'a yu puta'ayxto'kan.
41001022	Ixtalhi'a'nicha tacha an ixmasuy, mu yucha ixjamasuniy tachanu yu lhit'ajun lhich'alhkat, jantu wa tacha an xamaestrojnincha lhamap'a'sin.
41001023	Walh an laka tajtan ixtanun pumatam lapanak yu ixlakpach'apata makxkay'un, t'asaycha,
41001024	najun: —¡Jijwa! Jesús de Nazaret ¿T'isunch'a la't'ant'a? ¿Wa kilamintawcha lalakt'ilhi'ulanin? Kit'in ikmispayan, uxint'i xnawin Dios.
41001025	Pero an Jesús la'a'aymalh, juniy: —¡Wa sa'cha! ¡Lasch'a k'amak'aw ani lapanak!
41001026	Pus an makxkay'un p'ascha lakchikixli an lapanak, chi p'ascha t'asalh, chi makawlhcha an lapanak.
41001027	Pus sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya an yu ancha ixtatanumanalh, ixtalajuniy: —¿Tisuncha aniya? ¿Tisu sast'icha lhamap'a'sini li layi jalaj'aymay an makxkay'un chi ta'asmatniya?
41001028	Watukan ta'a'pitsi'olhi an chiwinti chux Galilea.
41001029	Akxni tataxtulhcha an laka tajtan, ta'alhcha ixcha'a an Simón chi Andrés, ali an Jacobo chi Juan.
41001030	Walh an ixput'icha'o'olh Simón wa ixmalhcha, stak ixch'apata alhp'asni iskakat, pus tajunicha an Jesús.
41001031	Wachuncha yucha la'alh chi ma'ch'apasaklhicha, walh watukan makawlhi an alhp'asni iskakat chi tsukulhcha jamaway.
41001032	Akxni tats'isilhcha wanaj lhuw ta'an'anini jalhicha'anikalh an Jesús chi yu wa ixtalakpachapay makxkay'un.
41001033	Chux an lapanakni yu an tawilanalh an la'acha'an tacha'an'olhi an jatalakxtut.
41001034	Pus tsukulhcha jak'uch'uyi an ta'an'anin, watuchicha ta'an'at ixtalhit'ajun, chi jak'uch'ulhcha wachu an yu wa ixtala'apaxto'ta makxkay'un, jantu ixjamakawniya katachiwinilh an lakmakxkay'un, mu ixtamispay.
41001035	Sawalhka wats'isin puts'istaka an Jesús ostayalh, taxtulhcha, alhcha tapaynini tan lakak'iwin.
41001036	Walh an Simón ixpuxkajuycha chi an yu ancha ixtat'atamakajunta.
41001037	Akxni tala'cha'alh tajuniy: —Wanaj si tapuxkawyan.
41001038	Yucha jajuniy: —Ka'aw an tan wa lakwanicha lakwilakalh wachu aklhichiwinina ixchiwinti Dios, mu yucha ikla'minta.
41001039	Pus ixlichiwiniycha an laka lakcha'a yu xpula'ta'ayxto'kan chux Galilea, chi ixjak'uch'uycha yu wa ixtala'apaxto'ta lakmakxkay'un.
41001040	La'cha'alh pumatam lapanak yu ixlakap'uch'i'ojotacha an Jesús, tatso'ottanilhcha juniy: —Li sna ak'ink'uch'up'ut'u, ak'ink'uch'ut'ika'..
41001041	Pus mapaynicha an Jesús, lats'awalalhi an ixmaka chi lakpach'apachalhcha, juniy: —Chun, k'at'ala'a'oxit'icha.
41001042	Wachuncha junilh, watukan wak tala'a'oxilh.
41001043	Xli'astan p'ascha watukani mala'achalh an Jesús.
41001044	Juni: —Jant'u xamat'i tu'u k'a'un, wa k'ap'inchicha talakasunini an sacerdote. Chi k'ama'axt'a'a'acha milha'ulan ixlakata li t'ala'a'oxit'icha, tacha lhinawlh a Moisés para li katak'atsaalhi an sacerdotejnin.
41001045	Pero yucha akxni alhcha, tsukulhcha laknajuni tani putapasalhcha, pus an Jesús xli'astan tucha wanaj lay ixtanuyachalhi xlitalakasun an la'acha'an, wa ma'atcha istsukuyachalh tan wa la'asa'nik'a, pero wa tanchuncha ixtalakminachalh ixtala'cha'an.
41002001	Jantu la'alhuw wilhchani ixtaxtuta an Jesús, xli'astan cha'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Capernaúm, walh watukan lajk'atsakalhi li ma cha'ancho'otacha.
41002002	Pus watukan lhuwi tata'ayxto'lhi, tucha ixtalhilayi masi wa jatalakxtutcha, chi ixjalhixa'alaycha an ixchiwinti Dios an Jesús.
41002003	Walh tichi yu'uncha ixt'at'ink'an lapanakni tach'ixlicha'anilh pumatam lapanak yu wa ixlakalhtukulunta.
41002004	Pero ntu lay ixtala'cha'ani wani mu lhilhuw, pus ta'a'stilhukukulh lakats'uniya an cha'a'. Anchacha taputamaknulh laxputamat an yu lakalhtukulunta.
41002005	Akxni jala'ts'ilhcha an Jesús li tajakiklaka'inin, junicha an yu lakalhtukulunta: —Ikmala'mixiniyancha mintala'alhini kints'alh.
41002006	Walh mu ancha ixtawilanalh an ali'in xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, pus sa'cha ixtalhatapastaknan:
41002007	“¿Tasu li chunchacha najuni? Wa aya najun, wa Diosi lay mala'mixiy tala'alhin. ¿Tisiyuchacha lay kamala'mixipala tala'alhini?”
41002008	Wayu mu an Jesús ixjak'atsaniya tani ixtapast'ak'acha, jajuniy: —¿T'asu li ch'unch'ach'a jat'ap'ast'aknanat'iti?
41002009	¿Tanyucha yu palay jantu lhima'anxkay ajkunilh: “Amintala'alhin ikmala'mixinincha”, u ajkunilh: “K'at'aycha k'asakt'icha amimputamat k'ap'inchicha”?
41002010	Chaway kit'in yu ijkwalh isTs'alh lapanak aklamasuniyawi li layi ikmala'mixi tala'alhin aniy lakamunulhpa'. —Junilh an yu lakalhtukulunta:
41002011	—Chaway uxint'i ijkunan k'a'ost'aycha, k'asakt'icha amimputamat chi k'ap'inchicha mincha'a'.
41002012	Pus ostayalhcha an yu ixlakalhtukulunta, chi saklhicha an ixputamat, tala'ts'in'ojoycha, pus sawalhcha talhi'a'niy, tanajun: —Tu a'tam ixla'ts'intawi tacha aniy. An Dios ay sawalh.
41002013	Xli'astan an Jesús ampalhi an xpiktu lakxkan, anchacha ixjamap'a'si mu lhuw lapanakni ixtala'cha'an.
41002014	Tan ixla'pust'ajun an Jesús la'ts'ilh an Leví, ists'alh Alfeo, sa' ixwilh tan mapalhlhi'ankan ixlakata tanlhun, pus juniy: —Ak'int'ap'it'icha. Walh t'a'alhcha.
41002015	Xli'astan an Jesús chi an ixt'alhtanan ixtat'awilanalhcha laxmesa an Leví, laxcha'a, xluwk'an wachu ixtat'awilanalh an yu ixtalhach'inin tanlhun chi, an yu ixtalhit'ajun ixtala'alhink'an, mu wanaj lhilhuwi ixch'a'o'akanta an Jesús.
41002016	Pus an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin tala'ts'incha li tat'alakwajini an Jesús an yu talhach'inin tanlhun chi an yu talhit'ajun ixtala'alhink'an, pus jajunkancha an ixt'alhtanan Jesús: —¿Tasu li jat'alakwajincha an yu talhach'inin tanlhun chi an yu talhit'ajun ixtala'alhink'ani?
41002017	An Jesús asmatlhi, jajuniy: —Yu oxi tat'ajun jantu tama'lhtask'iniya jak'uch'unu', yu tata'an'ay chun. Kit'in ikminta jat'asanini an yu talhit'ajun ixtala'alhink'an, jantu yu oxi tat'ajun.
41002018	An ixt'alhtanan Juán chi an fariseojnin tu ixtawajini a'tamin. Chi tala'alh an Jesús tajuniy: —¿Tasu li an ixt'alhtanan Juán chi an fariseojnin tu tawajini a'tamini, chi amint'alhtanan yu'uncha tawajini?
41002019	An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Chu laycha ntu katitawaylh yu tat'ajun tan tama'xto'kan? Li anchaka tat'ayanalh an yu tama'xt'o'a ntu layi ntucha katitawaylh.
41002020	Pero kamina wilhchani akxni an yu tama'xto'lhi ntucha ani katitsukulh. Akxni ntucha katitawaylhi a'tamin.
41002021	Jantu xamati ts'ap'amuk'ani yu sast'ika la'ch'it yu at'ilhcha la'ch'it, li chuncha, an yu sast'ika la'ch'it wa palay exa an yu at'ilhcha.
41002022	Chi ntu xamati mujuy yu sast'ika xaxkan uva laka at'ilh jaxt'a'an, li chuncha, an sast'i xaxkan uva laj'exa an jaxt'a'an, pus pu'ancha an xaxkan uva chi an jaxt'a'an talaj'exacha. Yu sast'ika xaxkan uva laka sast'i jaxt'a'ani kamujukalh.
41002023	La atam wilhchan akxni wa jastaknankan ixla'pust'ajun tan jach'ananankanta an Jesús, walh an ixt'alhtanan tsukulhcha ta'akatan'ex'iya an trigo.
41002024	Pus an fariseojnin tajuniy an Jesús: — K'ajala'ts'i, ¿tasu li ta'ilhtuycha, yu ntu makawkan akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchani?
41002025	Yucha jajuniy: — ¿Jant'u a'tam p'unawt'at'iti tani lalhcha an David chi an yu ixtat'a'anta akxni tachawanalh;
41002026	tani lhitanulhcha an la ixcha'a Dios akxni xa'ay sacerdote ixjunita an Abiatar, chi ulhi an jamatajtanilanti pan, walh tu lay xamati x'uy, wa yu'uncha an sacerdotejnin, walh an David wachu jat'a'ulhi an yu ixtat'a'anta?
41002027	Chi jajumpalay: —An wilhchan yu ntu tapatsakan ilhtukalh ixlakata an lapanak, jantu ilhtukalh an lapanak ixlakata an wilhchan yu ntu tapatsakan.
41002028	Xliyu kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh lapanak ikch'alhkatnani masi akxni jantu tapatsakan wilhchan.
41003001	A'tam tanupalhi an Jesús an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni, walh ancha ixtanun pumatam lapanak yu ntu lay ixlak'anuy ma'atam ixmaka'.
41003002	Chi mu akxni jantu xtapatsakan wilhchan, an yu ixtaxkaji an Jesús sawalhcha ixtalhist'ak'a li katapujuya kamajk'uch'uya an lapanak, para li katapu'alhtasulh.
41003003	Walh an Jesús juniy an lapanak: — K'at'aycha, tan'ajnich'a k'at'ay.
41003004	Chi jalhisakmilhcha an ali'in an Jesús, jajuniy: — ¿Oxi li ka'ilhtukalh yu oxi tu'u akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan? ¿U ani wilhchan ixpu'ilhtuka yu ntu oxi? ¿Ani wilhchan layi akma'alhtaxtunilh jatsukunti, u akma'nilh? Jantu xamati alhtaylh.
41003005	Pus talh'amancha jala'ts'in an Jesús chi lhita'oxila'alhicha li yu'uncha ntu talhakapu'ani li kataja'a'tayjunulh, juniy an lapanak: —K'alats'awalat'icha amimaka'. Walh lats'awalalhcha, tamaj'oxilhcha.
41003006	Wachuncha tataxtulhcha an fariseojnin ta'alhcha lhilakchiwinin ali an herodianojnin tani katalhima'nilhcha an Jesús.
41003007	Walh an Jesús chi an ixt'alhtanan ta'alhcha ixpiktu an lakxkan, lhuw lapanakni tama'alh. Jamacha'an Galilea, chi Judea,
41003008	chi Jerusalén, chi Idumea, chi xlitapiktutamcha an ayxkan Jordán, chi laxtuntala'acho'ocha an la'acha'an Tiro, chi Sidón, lhuw lapanakni tala'cha'alh, mu ixta'a'smat'acha li laj'ay tanlhuni ix'ilhtuy.
41003009	An ixt'alhtanan jajuniy li katamala'asijninilh la'atam barco, para li ntu katapa'asilh, mu wanajcha lhilhuwi ixjunkanta.
41003010	Ixluwchak'ani ixjak'uch'uta pero an ali'in yu wachu ixtata'an'ay ixtalakask'in wachu masi wa kaxta'aych'apachalhcha, wa ixtaputamacho'oycha.
41003011	An lapanakni yu ixtalakpach'apata makxkay'un akxni ixtala'ts'incha an Jesús ixtata'a'tso'ottanicha chi p'ascha ixtachiwiniy, ixtanajun: —Uxint'i isTs'alh Dios.
41003012	Pero yucha sawalhcha ixjalaj'aymayi para li ntu katanawlhi tichini yuchacha.
41003013	Xli'astan alhcha a'stitawk'a an Jesús, chi anchacha jat'asanichalh yu yuchacha jat'asaniputulh, pus tala'cha'alhcha.
41003014	Ixpumakawt'uychak'ani jasakxtulh yu katat'alhtanana chi kajamak'anacha kata'ana lhichiwinin ixchiwinti Dios.
41003015	Ja'ilhtulhcha li layi katatamakxtuya lakmakxkay'un:
41003016	An ixpumakawt'uyk'an chunchuniya ixjajunkan: Simón, yu wachu junikalh Pedro,
41003017	chi Jacobo, chi Juán, sts'alan tichi lapanak junkan Zebedeo, yu'uncha jalhimapa'a'ulh Boanerges, nawputun ists'alan xalapanak xkan.
41003018	chi Andrés, chi Felipe, chi Bartolomé, chi Mateo, chi Tomás, chi Jacobo, ists'alh Alfeo; chi Tadeo, chi Simón yu ixjach'a'o'ay yu partido Cananista.
41003019	chi Judascha Iscariote, yu an ma'axta'lhi Jesús. Xli'astan ta'alhcha lakatam lakacha'a'.
41003020	Wanajcha lhilhuwi jumpalakalh, tuchalayi masi wa katitalakwaylhcha.
41003021	Akxni an ixt'alalhila'ts'inin Jesús tak'atsalh, ta'alhcha puxkawnini an Jesús para li katalhi'alhcha, mu ixtalaknajun ma wa locojlaycha.
41003022	Ixpulaknicha ch'a'a an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, yu ixtamintachalh Jerusalén ixtanajun: —Xliyu lay jalhitamakxtuy mu yucha an Beelzebú xapay makxkay'uni t'atapatsay.
41003023	Pus jaxa'alalhi an Jesús, chi tsukulhcha jajuniya tacha laycha talhimacha'xay, jajuniy: —¿Tasicha lay kalhitamakxtukana wa ix'akstucha an satanasi?
41003024	Li la'atam lhich'alhkat wa lapu'aykan, yucha ntu a'tam oxi katitaylhi'alh,
41003025	chi lakatam laka cha'a, li wa siya yu'unchacha wachu tala'aji, katatalakt'ilhitawla'.
41003026	Chi mu li an satanás wa ix'akstucha t'ala'aykan, jantu layi katitaylhi'alh, yucha ixputs'an'ancha.
41003027	Jantu xamati lay an tanunu laxcha'a xamati lapanak yu k'ut'ilh, li ntu p'ulhnajcha ma'ch'imay chi xli'astan ka'alhawniyacha an ixtanlhun.
41003028	Klajunaw yu sawalh, watuchicha tala'alhin kamak'akxanikana an lapanak, wa tani lhichiwinintacha an Dios.
41003029	Pero watichicha yu wa aya lhichiwiniy an ixTakuwin Dios, jantu a'tam katimala'mixinikalh, yucha ixpujun'alhincha kuna tach'in.
41003030	Chuncha jajunilh mu ixtajuni li ma makxkay'uni ixlakpach'apata.
41003031	Akxni tacha'alhcha an ixnati Jesús chi an ixjat'ala'awnin an tan ixtanumalh, tamala'achalhcha pumatam li ka'alh t'asanini'.
41003032	Pus tacha an ixtala'acho'owilananilh, tajuniy: —Ma tapuxkawyan an mijat'ala'awnin chi an minati.
41003033	Yucha ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha kinati chi kijat'ala'awnini?
41003034	Pus sa'cha jala'ts'ini an ixtala'acho'owilananilh, jajuniy: —Uxitnani tacha kinati chi tacha kijat'ala'awnin,
41003035	mu wa tichicha yu ilhtuyi tacha an najun Dios, yucha kint'ala'ajun, kijamatsan chi kinati.
41004001	A'tamcha tsukulh jamasunipalayi an Jesús laxpiktu an lakxkan, walh wanajcha lhilhuwi ta'ayxto'palakalh pus tajulhcha lakatam laka barco anchacha sa' tawlhchalh chi chux an lapanakni ixpiktucha an lakxkani ixtayanalh.
41004002	Lhuw tanlhuni jajunilh pulhamacha'xan, chi tu'ucha xjapumasuni, tacha ani jajunilh:
41004003	—A'tamchacha pumatam lapanak alh jach'anana'.
41004004	Walh akxni tsukulhcha ch'an, an ali wa laka tiji tamachalh, pus ta'usaklhi an ts'o'on.
41004005	An ali lakachiwxini tamachalh, tan tutukancha lhiyalh t'un, pus wa tukancha la'awlh, mu ntu talhmani yu t'un.
41004006	Akxni xajchilhcha an wilhchan, la'xlo'lhi chi lakxixli, mu ntu tu'u ixjataxiyak.
41004007	An ali lakalhtukunani tamachalh, walh ta'ayalhi an jalhtukun, pus maxixilh, jantu tawk'anilhi xajatawk'at.
41004008	Pero an ali tan oxi t'uni tamachalh, la'tampa'lhicha chi ta'ayalhcha. Tawk'anilhcha xajatawk'at, lhuwcha talhawalh. Wa la'atamin xatalhts'i alilhcha yu xta'cho'olhcha treinta chi sesenta chi tamcientocha xatalhts'i.
41004009	Chi jajuniy: —Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna ka'asmatlhi.
41004010	Akxni wa ix'akstucha tamakawlh, an yu wa niy ixtayanalh chi an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan talhisakmicha tuchini nawputuncha.
41004011	Pus jajuniy: "Uxitnan layi k'alhimach'a'xaya'it an yu ntu tasuy xlich'alhkat Dios, pero an yu ma'spa tat'ajun wanaj wa laka pulhamacha'xani jajunkan,
41004012	mu masi tajalakawanan, tachanu ntu tajalakawan chi masi taja'asmatnan tachanu jantu taja'asmatnan, pus tu layi jamala'mixinikan ixtala'alhink'an mu ntu tach'a'o'ayi Dios."
41004013	Chi jajuniy: —¿Jant'u lhimach'a'xayat'iti an tacha klajuniw?, ¿chuncha tasicha k'alhimach'axaya'it an ali'i?
41004014	An jach'anana yucha an yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios,
41004015	chi an yu wa laka tij tamachalh jach'ananti yu'uncha an yu jalhixa'alakancha, pero akxni ta'asmattacha, an satanás jamak'ap'apalaycha laxjalhunutk'an.
41004016	Wanajcha chuni an yu wa lakachiwxin tatamachalh, mu masi sawalhcha ta'achani ta'asmat'a akxni jalhixa'alakan,
41004017	jantu tajataxiyaklay, wa putamcha pants'ik'is, mu akxni lhima'anxkaycha talhiwilay u jalhich'a'o'akancha ixlakata an ixchiwinti Dios, tamakawcho'oycha.
41004018	An yu lakaalhtukunan tamachalh, yu'uncha an yu ta'asmat'acha,
41004019	pero mu sawalhcha talhakapu'ani tacha an lak'alincha tanlhun chi lhuw tumini lhitsukuputun. Pus chux aniy tanlhun maksk'anjwacho'oyi an ixchiwinti Dios jantu tu'u ta'ilhtuy yu laj'oxi.
41004020	An yu tan oxi t'un tatamachalh, yu'uncha an yu ta'asmat'acha ixchiwinti Dios chi takiklaka'i, pus lhuwcha talalalhaway, wa pumatamjtamin, alincha yu treinta, sesenta chi cien xt'a'a ixjatawk'at.
41004021	Wachu jajumpalay: —¿Chu sna li makilhnukan pumaklhku, a't'alh'ulakancha laka kajon u la xtan'apucha putamati tamaknukan? ¡Jantu! yucha muk'akancha tan oxicha kamapulhkulh.
41004022	Jantu tu'u yu ntuchalay katik'atsakalh yu ntu xk'atsakan, chi ntu tu'u yu ntucha katimalakasukalh tan putunku.
41004023	Li xamati lhit'ajun ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhi.
41004024	Chi jajumpalay an Jesús: —K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti an t'ach'a asmat'at, mu t'ani p'alhk'ananatcha, wach'u ch'uni k'ap'ulhk'ak'ana'it, ch'i p'alay k'alhimo'slanik'ana'it'iti uxitnan yu asmat'atcha.
41004025	Mu an yu lhit'ajun palay kajama'lhtayanana', pero an yu ntu lhit'ajun, masi wa k'ischa kaxlitsukulh kamaxtuni'okana'.
41004026	Ixnawpalay: —An ixlich'alhkat Dios tacha xamati lapanak yu jach'ananan.
41004027	Puts'ista lhtatay chi wats'isin ostayapalaycha. An yu ch'anta tamp'a'acha chi ta'ayaycha, pero yucha ntu k'atsayi tani lhita'ayaycha.
41004028	An lakaat'un ix'akstucha ma'alay an jach'ananti, p'ulhcha taxtuniya xax'oy, p'a'acha xli'astan tawk'anicha xajatawk'at.
41004029	Chi li akxni li oxicha k'at'ata, p'uxacha an lapanak, mu ixpakucha chi cha'xmaj'ancho'oycha.
41004030	An Jesús wachu jajumpalay: —¿Tasicha lay aklalhimalakxtuniw an ixlich'alhkat Diosi? Chunchuni:
41004031	Tachanu la'atam lakat'ikt'i xatalhts'i mostaza, masi yucha wanaj wa lakat'ikt'i,
41004032	apalij yucha yu palay ay lhtinin ta'ayay, tan tamuk'aycha ixpamaj'ank'an an ts'o'on chi tapamalhk'iknincha.
41004033	Tamj tamjcha ixjaxta'niy pulhamacha'xan an Jesús, tacha yu ixta'asmatniputun.
41004034	Wa laka pulhamacha'xani xjajuniy wa chuncha ixjaxa'alay. Pero li akxni wa la'stu an ixt'alhtanan ixtat'atawlay ixjajun'ojoy, mu yu'uncha ixtalhimacha'xay.
41004035	Akxni tats'isilhcha jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan: —An ixtakilhtutamcha an lakxkani ka'aw.
41004036	Pus jamakawyawlhcha tacha an lhilhuw ixlakyakalh, tatajulhcha an laka barco, ta'alhcha. Ali barco ixtach'a'o'alhi'anta.
41004037	Walh tsukulh lay p'as un, an xkan tsukulhcha putajuyi an barco, ixtalak'aknut'ajuncha.
41004038	An Jesús ilhtatajtajumachalh lax'istaj an barco, ix'a'ts'inta ix'a'ts'i. Mu sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan tamakujulhcha an ixt'alhtanan, tajuniy: Maestro, talak'aknut'awnawcha uxint'i nt'u lhak'ap'up'in.
41004039	Pus ostayalh, la'a'aymalhi an p'as un, chi an alamalh, juniy: —Sa'ch'a k'at'a'ulh chi sa'ch'a k'ak'ilhu. — Pus wanaj sa' tawlhcho'olh.
41004040	Chi jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan: —¿T'asu li sawalhch'a lakt'alhananat'iti, ch'u nt'u jak'iklak'a'ininat?
41004041	Pus sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan, ixtalajumpaxay ¿tisiyuchacha ani li an un chi an xkan ta'asmatniya?
41005001	Tacha'alhcha ixtapiktutam an lakxkan la ixlakat'unk'ancha an jamacha'an Gadara.
41005002	An Jesús takutlhicha an laka barco. Walh xajnichilh pumatam lapanak an kampusantuj yu lakpach'apata makxkay'un.
41005003	An tan ixlak'aknukani ixtawlay, chi ntucha xamati lay ixch'i'ulay masi laka kadena.
41005004	Mu a'lhucha ixch'i'ulakan laka kadena pero ixlaj'ex'ulay, pus tu xamati lay ilhajay.
41005005	Stakcha ixt'asajtsukuyi tunku chi puts'ista an lakak'iwin chi an kampusantu. Chi ixlakamak'atsanikancha laka chiwx.
41005006	Walh, akxni la'ts'inkalhcha an Jesús akxni ma'atka ix'antachalh, la'ats'alaj'ankalhcha chi tatso'ottanikalhcha.
41005007	P'ascha ixa'alakan an Jesús, ixjunkan: ¡Jesús, isTs'alh Dios yu wilhchalh talhman! ¿Tasicha k'ilhtuyani? Iksk'iniyan la ixtalakask'i Dios, jant'u ak'imama'alh'ajnit'i.
41005008	Chuncha ixnajun an makxkay'un mu an Jesús juniy: —Makxkay'un k'amak'awcha ani lapanak,
41005009	¿T'asich'a unk'an? —juniy. —Legión, mu wanaj kilhuwk'an, —najun.
41005010	Sawalhcha tapayniniya an makxkay'un an Jesús li ma ntu kajatamakxtulhi an tan tat'ajun.
41005011	Chi mu wani ancha a'stitawk'a ixta'ex'wayt'ajun lhuw p'axnin,
41005012	pus an lakmakxkay'un tatapayninicha an Jesús, tajuniy: —Yu'uncha an p'axnincha ajkalakpach'apayaw. Anchacha akilamak'aw.
41005013	Jamakawnilhi an Jesús, pus tamakawlhcha an lapanak. Yucha an p'axnincha talakpach'apalh, ka tacha la'at'uy milh p'axnin. Talakats'alaj'alhi an p'axnin an tan a'talhman chi tata'aj'ajulh, chi talaj'aksk'anj'u'olhi an lakxkan.
41005014	An yu ixtalhist'ak'a an p'axnin talakats'alalh chi ixtajamak'atsaaninincha an la'acha'an chi masi tan wa jalhi'ay tacha an tapasalh. Pus ta'alhcha la'ts'inini tuchini tapasaycha.
41005015	Tala'cha'alhcha an Jesús, chi tala'ts'incha an yu xlakpach'apata makxkay'un tan sa'cha ixwilh, ixmala'ch'inincho'otacha, oxicha ixjalakpastaknancho'oy, pus ixtalaktalhanancha an lapanakni.
41005016	An yu tala'ts'ilh tani tapasalhcha an yu ixlakpach'apata makxkay'un, xtat'alajunicha an ali'in, chi tani talalhcha an p'axnin.
41005017	Pus tatapayninilhcha an Jesús li ma kataxtucho'olhcha.
41005018	Akxni tajucho'olhcha an laka barco an Jesús, an yu ixlakpach'apata makxkay'un sawalhcha tapayniniya li ma kat'a'ana'.
41005019	Pero an Jesús jantu makawnilh, yucha juniy: —K'ap'inchicha mincha'a'. K'ajala'p'inchicha yu t'a jalhila'ts'in, k'aja'una'acha li an Dios yucha k'uch'un chi li yucha mapaynin.
41005020	Pus alhcha, chi tsukulhcha laknajuni an xala'acha'anaxni Decápolis tani lhik'uchulhcha an Jesús. Sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni.
41005021	Akxni pupatakutcho'ochalhcha an barco an Jesús an ixtakilhtutamcha lakxkan, lhuwcha tala'cha'ampalh. Wa an ixkilhtucha lakxkani ixyalh yucha.
41005022	Walh la'cha'alh pumatam lapanak yu ixjunkan Jairo, yu ixla'ts'ilhi'an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, tatso'ottanilhcha an Jesús.
41005023	Sawalhcha tapaynini, juniy: —An kints'i nit'ajuncha. Ak'int'ap'it'i. K'alakp'ach'ap'aya'a para li kata'oxilh chi kala'awcho'oya'.
41005024	Pus an Jesús t'a'alh. Lhilhuwi ixch'a'o'akanta, wa ixtapa'asicho'oycha.
41005025	Pumatam t'aku la'akawt'uycha k'ata ixta'an'ay, wa ixmaj'an ixjak'alhni.
41005026	Jantu layi ixta'oxi masi ix'ancha laka jak'uch'unun, apalijcha wa ixlita'o'slay, chi ixmakamin'ojotacha ixtumin.
41005027	Akxni asmatlhi li tanchuncha t'ajun an Jesús, ch'a'o'ayawlh, japujatanulhi an lapanakni chi ch'apanichalhcha an ixla'ch'it.
41005028	Mu ixnajun: —Masi wa akch'apanichalh an ixla'ch'it, aktak'uch'uya'.
41005029	Walh watukan sa' aninilhi an ixjak'alhni, oxicha lakak'atsancho'olh li ta'oxilhcha tacha an ixma'alh'ajnajt'ajun.
41005030	Xli'astan an Jesús mu k'atsayi li xamati k'uch'ulh. Tala'asp'itlhi, jajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha kinch'apanichalh an kila'ch'it?
41005031	An ixt'alhtanan tajuniy: —Pero sawalhcha tapa'asiyan ch'i lhasakminini tichini aych'apacha'ancha.
41005032	Pero yucha sa'cha jalakawanani tichini yuchacha kawalh.
41005033	Pus an t'aku xk'ip'ip'icha lay talhanancha, mu k'atsaycha tacha tapasalh, pus la'alh, tatso'ottanilhi an Jesús, chi jun'olh.
41005034	An Jesús juniy: —Amijakiklaka'inti p'ut'ak'uch'ut'icha kintsi', lhi'achacha k'ap'inch'o'ochi mu t'ak'uch'ut'icha.
41005035	Walh ixchiwint'ajunka an Jesús, tacha'alhcha yu taminchalh la ixcha'a an yu xla'ts'ilhi'an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, tajuniy: —Amintsi nilhcha, t'uch'a ali k'ama'ach'ap'u an Maestro.
41005036	Walh mu asmat'a an Jesús, pus juniy an yu ixla'ts'ilhi'an laka tajtan: —Jant'u k'at'alhan. Wa k'ak'iklaka'incha.
41005037	Chi ntu xamati makawnilh li kat'a'alh an Jesús, wa yucha an Pedro chi Jacobo chi Juan ixt'ala'ajuncha an Jacobo.
41005038	Ta'alhcha la ixcha'a an yu ixla'ts'ilhi'an laka cha'a tan xtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin. An Jesús jala'ts'incha tacha sawalhcha tala'ta'oxila'alhi chi wa tilh tilhcha xtalay chi xtalaj'alhuncha.
41005039	Pus jala'tanuchalh an Jesús, jajuniy: —¿Tasu li wa tilh tilhch'a layat'iti ch'i laj'alhunatcha? An jatsi ntu nita, wa lhtatay.
41005040	Pero yu'uncha wa ixtalhits'i'in. Pus jatamakxtu'olh, wa yucha an ixpay chi an ixnati jatsi, chi an yu ixtat'a'anta an Jesusi tat'atanulh an tan ixmalh an jatsi'.
41005041	Ma'ch'apachalhi an jatsi an Jesús, juniy: —Talita kumi— Yucha nawputun: Jatsi', uxint'i ijkunan ¡k'a'ost'aycha!
41005042	Watukan ostayalhi an jatsi, tsukulhcha jalhtanan. Mu la'akawt'uycha k'ata ixpakxanta. Chi sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya an lapanakni an yu tala'ts'ilh.
41005043	Wachuncha jajuniy an Jesús li ntu xamati katajunilh tacha an tala'ts'ilh, chi lhinawlhcha li kamawakalhcha an jatsi'.
41006001	Taxtulh an Jesús, jat'amilhcha la'ixt'un an ixt'alhtanan.
41006002	Walh, akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan, tsukulhcha masuyi an laka tajtan. Lhuwi yu sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni. Ixtanajun: —¿Tani laklanilhcha an jatapast'ak'at chi tacha an jak'uch'ununcha la ixmaka'a? ¿Tisu jatapast'ak'atcha ani xta'nikanta?
41006003	Pero mu yucha an jaxpitni', an ists'alh María, an ixt'ala'ajunk'an Jakobo chi José chi Judas chi Simón chi an ixjap'isa'an wachu aniya tawilanalh. Tucha oxi ixtalhiwilay an Jesús an lapanakni.
41006004	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Jantu xamati yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios la'ts'inputunkan la ixt'un chi la ixt'alalhila'ts'inin chi la ixcha'a'.
41006005	Pus tu tu'u lay ilhtulh ancha tu'u yu laj'ay tanlhun an Jesús, yu masuy ix'alhp'asninti an Dios, wa ali'in ta'an'anini jak'uch'ulh yu jalakpach'apalh.
41006006	Wachuncha sawalhcha lhi'a'niya an Jesús li ntu k'is tajakiklaka'inini yu'uncha. Ix'ancha masunu an lakt'ikt'i la'acha'anaxni.
41006007	Jat'asanilhcha an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, chi tsukulhcha jamala'pitsi ixpumat'uyunk'an. Ja'ilhtulhcha li layi katalhajaya an tanlhuncha lakmakxkay'un.
41006008	Jajuni li ntu tu'u katalhi'alh, ixnik'an, chi ixbolsajk'an chi tumin, wa ma'atamin ixpalikk'an,
41006009	chi ixwarachijk'an, pero alht'uy xla'ch'itk'an jantu.
41006010	Jajuniy: —Wa t'anch'unch'a k'ach'ip'ina'it laka cha'a wa anch'ach'a k'at'awla'it, sta akxni k'at'axt'uch'o'oya'it an la'acha'an.
41006011	Chi wa t'anch'unch'a nt'u la'a'ik'anat, u nt'u asmatnik'anat, akxni t'axt'uch'o'oyatcha, k'ach'ank'alhap'uxk'ana'it'iti an po'xmi para li katak'atsalh, mu yu chuncha talay jantu ta'asmatputun, palay katama'alh'ajnana akxni ka'akla'oya, walh masi an la'acha'an Sodoma chi an la'acha'an Gomorra palay wa xlak'anti katama'alh'ajnana'.
41006012	Pus tataxtunilhcha, ixtanajuncha li katamapaxalhcha ixjatapast'ak'atk'an an lapanakni.
41006013	Xluchak'ani tak'uch'ulh yu wa ixtala'apaxt'o'a makxkay'un, chi ixluchak'ani yu ixta'ukmuk'aycha aceite yu wa ixtata'an'ay, chi ixtatak'uch'uycha.
41006014	An rey Herodes k'atsalhi li an Jesús sawalhcha ixmispakan. Ixtalaknajun yucha an ixjama'paxanancha Juani la'awcho'olh xliyu lay lhilak'ilhtuy masi yu la'lhima'anxkay laj'ay tanlhun, yu masuy ix'alhp'asninti an Dios.
41006015	An ali'in ixtanajun: —Yucha an Elias. Chi an ali'in ixtanajun: —Ka xamaticha yu wachu chun tacha an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios ma'anchacha.
41006016	Akxni asmatlhi an Herodes, najun: —Yucha an Juancha la'awcho'olh an yu iklhinawlh li ka'a'cha'xkalh.
41006017	Mu yucha an Herodesi ixmalaklhchajuta an Juan, xliyu chuncha lhinajun, ixch'i'ulatacha laka kadena, wa xliyu li an Herodes ixt'at'awniya an ixt'iwi wa ixt'ala'ajuncha junkan Felipe, an ixjamach'a Felipe ixjunkan Herodías.
41006018	Chi mu an Juan ixjuniya an Herodes: —Jantu oxi li t'ats'uk'uni an ixt'iwi mint'ala'ajun Felipe.
41006019	Pus xliyu an t'aku Herodías sawalhcha ixma'niputuni an Juan, pero ntu lay ixma'ni.
41006020	Mu an Herodes ixtalhamniya an Juan, mu ixk'atsayi li yucha oxi ixt'ajun, yucha ntu ix'ilhtuyi ixtala'alhin, pus an Herodes oxi ixlist'ak'a an Juán. Sawalhcha ix'alha'asmatputuni an Herodes an Juan, pero ntu oxi ixlimacha'xay.
41006021	Milh la'atam wilhchan akxni la'tsalh ixk'ata an Herodes tacha ixput'ajun, jat'awaylh an ix'a'tayjunin chi an xalaj'ajin lapanakni la'acha'an Galilea.
41006022	Pus an istsi an t'aku Herodías tanuchalh chi jat'ínilhcha. Walh an Herodes oxicha lhiwilalh chi an yu ixjat'alakwajin wachu', pus an Herodes juniy an jatsi: —Wa t'uch'ich'a k'isk'inip'ut'un, ak'isk'inincha.
41006023	Chi jurarlanilhcha juniy: —Akxta'niyani wat'uch'ich'a ak'isk'iniya'a, sta paytat an kilhich'alhkat.
41006024	Pus an jatsi taxtulh chi juniy an ixnati: —¿Tisuncha aksk'inilh? An ixnati an jatsi juniy an istsi: —Yucha an ix'a'tsulh jama'paxanaj Juani k'ask'int'i.
41006025	So'ojo tanucho'ochalh an jatsi, junicha an rey: —Yucha an ix'a'tsulh jama'paxanaj Juani ak'ixt'a'nin laka la'atam pulatoj.
41006026	Pus an rey sawalhcha ta'oxila'alhilh, pero mu ixjunitacha li kaxta'niya sawalhi watuchicha kask'iniya an jatsi, chi ixta'alha'asmat'ojotacha ixchuxk'an, pus tucha taa laputulh.
41006027	Watukancha mak'alhi pumatam isoldado, juniy li kalhiminilhi an ix'a'tsulh jama'paxanaj Juán. Pus chunchacha ilhtulh an soldado. Ki'a'cha'xlicha an Juán an laka pulach'in.
41006028	Chi lhicha'alhcha an a'tsulh laka pulatoj an soldado, pus xta'nilhcha an jatsi', chi an jatsi yucha xta'nilhcha an ixnati.
41006029	Akxni tak'atsalhcha an ixt'alhtanan an Juán, taki'inilhi an ixlakatunaj, chi tamaknulhcha.
41006030	An ixt'alhtanan Jesús tat'atala'xto'lhicha chi tajunicha tuchini ta'ilhtulhcha chi tuchini tamasulhcha.
41006031	Yucha jajuniy: —K'at'at'itcha, katala'xtinucha, tan wa jasa'nik'acha k'at'ijast'aknana'it. Mu lhuwi yu ixtacha'an chi yu ixtatasp'itcho'oyachalhcha, pus tucha layi masi wa katitawaylhcha.
41006032	Tapu'alhcha la'atam barco tan wa jasa'nik'a.
41006033	Pero mu xluwk'ani yu tala'ts'ilh tan tapu'alh. Pus tamispalhi an Jesús, wachuncha chux an la'acha'anaxni an lapanakni tataxtulh talakats'alaj'alh yu'uncha p'ulh tacha'alh.
41006034	Akxni tatakutlhicha an laka barco, an Jesús jala'tsincha tan ts'anan ixtayanalh, pus jamapaynicha, mu wa tacha borregojnincha yu ntu xamati jalhist'ak'a. Pus tsukulhcha jamasuni lhuw tanlhun.
41006035	Sawalhcha ta'oxay, an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tala'alh, tajuniy: —Sawalhcha ta'oxay, chi ani wa jasa'nik'a,
41006036	k'aja'un li kata'alhcha an lakt'ikt'i la'acha'anaxni, katatamawyacha ancha yu kata'uya.
41006037	Yucha ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —K'ajamawatcha uxitnan. Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¿Tasicha? Kawanajcha la'lhuwi ajkalhimawaw pan ixchuxk'an.
41006038	Pus jajuniy: —¿Tasu a'xchuxcha pani lhit'ant'at'it? Ak'ila'ts'int'it. Akxni tala'cha'ancho'olh, tajuniy: —A'xkisi pan chi la'at'uy jatanti.
41006039	Ixchuxk'an jajuniy li katatala'apitsilhcha kilhmaktamin, chi li katalaktawilhcha an tan st'a'an malh jats'in.
41006040	Pus talaktawilhcha, kilhmaktamin taminciento chi kilhmaktamin t'up'uxamkawin.
41006041	Yucha xa'a'ilhcha an a'xkisi pan chi an a'xt'uy jatanti chi tala'st'alhcha an lakt'iyan, xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajun an Dios. La'ch'e'elhcha an pan chi jaxta'nilhcha an ixt'alhtanan para li katamala'pitsilhcha, chi an jatanti wanajcha chun.
41006042	Ixchuxchak'ani oxi talak'ulh tacha talhikiklalhcha.
41006043	La'akawt'uy kanastaja a'tsamcho'olh yu wa xaxajnicha an pan chi an jatanti, yu ntucha ta'u'olh.
41006044	La'akisi milh lapanakni yu an talakwaylh.
41006045	Ixli'astan an Jesús jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan li katapu'alhcha an ixtapiktutam lakxkan an barco, tanchun la'acha'an junkan Betsaida, mu yucha ma katijala'axa'alaya an lapanakni para li kata'ancho'oyacha.
41006046	Jala'axa'ala'olh, alhcha tapayninini Dios a'stitawk'a.
41006047	Walh puts'istacha, ixpaytatcha an lakxkani ix'anta an barco. Wa ix'akstucha ixt'awnachalh an Jesús lakaat'un.
41006048	Chi mu jala'ts'incha tacha lhita'ay talay tax'elhni an barco an ixt'alhtanan, mu an un wa ixjalakatast'uka, pus ka tacha las trescha tunkunmintacha jala'alhcha. Ukxjalhtanaj'alhcha an xkan, ixjapu'iniputuncha ixja'ilhtuy.
41006049	Akxni tala'ts'ilh li ukxjalhtanani an lakxkan, tanajun li sna wa takuwincha, ixtalakt'asaycha.
41006050	Mu ixchuxchak'ani ixtala'ts'in ixtalaktalhanancha, pero yucha watukan jaxa'alalh, jajuniy: —¡Oximaj'ayi k'a'unt'it, jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'it, mu kit'in!
41006051	Jala'tajuchalh an laka barco an Jesús, sa'cha walhi an un, pus sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niy,
41006052	mu wachuka ntuka' ixtalhimacha'xapalayi an tan ixlalhawata pan, mu ntu ixtakiklaka'iya li layi ka'ilhtulh.
41006053	Akxni tapatakutchalhcha an lakxkan, tacha'alhcha xalakaat'un tanchun junkan Genezaret
41006054	An Jesús watukan tamispalhi akxni tatakutlhicha an laka barco.
41006055	Pus watukan tata'a'pitsi'olhi an lapanakni, ta'alhcha lak'inini an ta'an'anin, chi talakch'ixlicha'a'nilhcha la'ixputamatk'an an ta'an'anin an Jesús, tan an ixtak'atsay li ancha ixt'ajun.
41006056	Watanchuncha ixcha'an an Jesús, laj'ay la'acha'anaxni, chi lakt'ikt'i la'acha'anaxni, u masi tan wa jalhi'ay, an laka laktij ixtamamaycha an yu wa ixtata'an'ay chi ixtatapayninicha li ma kajamakawnilhi masi wa katapikch'apanichalhcha an ixla'ch'it. Ixchuxk'an an yu ixtach'apaniyachalh an ixla'ch'it, ixtatak'uch'uycha.
41007001	An fariseojnin chi ali'in xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, yu ixtamintachalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, tala'cha'alhcha an Jesús.
41007002	Walh tala'ts'ilhi li an ali'in ixt'alhtanan an Jesús jantu ixtama'ch'a'ayi ixtalakwajin, pus tanajuni li ntu oxi chuncha.
41007003	Mu yu'uncha chi an judiojnin jantu ixtawajini li ntu ixtala'ma'ch'a'ay, tacha ixtanajun an yu laktatanincha.
41007004	Li ixtakitasp'it'acha tiankis, yu'uncha ixtala'ma'ch'a'apalaycha akxni tu'u kata'uya'. Atumpaj yu wachu sawalhcha ixtalhismanita ixta'ilhtuy, li ixtala'ch'a'ay an vaso, chi jarro, chi yu de tsasnatcha pala'oxin chi putamat.
41007005	Pus talhisakmicha an Jesús an fariseojnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, tajuniy: —¿Tasu li amint'alhtanan jantu ta'ilhtuyi tacha an tanajun an yu laktatanincha. Tawajini masi ntu tala'ma'ch'a'ayi?
41007006	Yucha jajuniy: —¡Uxitnan wa t'a'ukxp'ut'uyununat'it! Ts'ajwi talhichiwinin an Isaias, an tan ts'o'muk'akantalh laxchwinti Dios, tan najunta: 'Aniy lapanakni oxi kintalhichiwiniy, pero laxjalhunutk'an tu ixlisawalh.
41007007	Wa la'a'ijcha oxi kintalhipast'ak'a, mu yu'uncha tamasuyi yu wa ixjatapast'ak'atchak'an lapanakni.
41007008	Tamakajuni an ixlamap'a'sin Dios, wa yucha an ixjatapast'ak'atchak'an lapanakni p'as tach'a'o'ay: an ixla'ch'a'aka vaso, chi jarro, chi tanlhuncha ali yu wanajcha chun.
41007009	Jajumpalay: —An xlamap'a'sin Dios lhimap'axayatcha wa milhamap'a'sinchak'an.
41007010	An Moisés nawlh: k'a'asmatnini yu junan minpay chi minati; chi nawpalay, yu xkayaj juniya ixpay chi ixnati kaniya'.
41007011	Walh uxitnan nawnat'iti li ntu tani lay masi ntu kata'a'tayjulh ixlakpaynink'an an lapanakni, yu tama'lhtask'iniy la'a'tayjun, mu li yu ixtaxta'nilh ixlakpaynink'an li kataxta'ni'oyacha Dios.
41007012	Jant'uch'a jamak'awniyat'iti li kata'a'tayjulh ixlakpaynink'an.
41007013	An ixchiwinti Dios lhimap'axayatcha an wa mi jatapast'ak'atchak'an, lhuwi yu ch'unch'a ilht'uyat'it.
41007014	Wachuncha jat'asani'olhi an Jesús an lapanakni, chi jajuniy: —Akila'asmatniw chi k'alhimach'a'xat'it minchuxk'an.
41007015	Jantu yu an yu ukani lhkiliki an lapanak; yu kalhkilikin yucha an tacha kilhtaxtukan chiwinti.
41007016	Li xamati lhit'ajun ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhi.
41007017	Tala'xtinulhcha an tan ts'anaks ixlakyakalh tanulhcha lakacha'a', pus an ixt'alhtanan talhisakmicha tuchini nawputuncha.
41007018	Yucha jajuniy: —¿Wach'u nt'u lhimach'a'xayat'it? ¿Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti li chux an yu uy an lapanak jantu layi katimama'lhta'alhinilhcha?
41007019	Mu ntu lisna la ixjalhunuti tanuy, laxpalakni tanuy, chi ixli'astan maj'ancho'oycha. Yucha nawputulh an Jesús li chux an yu ukan si laj'oxi.
41007020	Wachu jajumpalay: —Yucha an ixchiwinti an lapanakcha yu mama'lhta'alhiniy.
41007021	Mu laxpulakni an ixjalhunutk'an lapanakni taxtuy an lakmakxkay jatapast'ak'at: chi yu talat'atamay yu ntu talat'at'ajun, yu wa aya talay, yu jama'ninin,
41007022	yu ja'alhawanan, yu sawalhcha a'sputni, yu jalhitama'chapunun, yu ja'o'xcho'onun, yu ayajk'atsay, yu xkayaj najun, yu lhita'ayay tu'u, chi yu ntu ja'asmatnan.
41007023	Chux ani yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun ixpulakni an jalhunuti minachalh, yucha yu mama'lhta'alhini an lapanak.
41007024	An Jesús taxtuchalhcha Galilea alhcha la'acha'anaxni xalakaat'un Tiro chi xalakaat'un Sidón; tanuchalhcha lakatam lakacha'a'. Jantu ixlakask'in li xamati kala'ts'ilh, pero ntu lay tats'e'lhi.
41007025	Mu tichi t'aku ixlit'ajun istsi, wa ixlakpach'apata makxkay'un. K'atsalhi li ancha t'ajun an Jesús, pus la'cha'alh chi tatso'ottatawlhnilhcha laxjach'aja'.
41007026	Tapayninicha li kak'uch'unilhi an istsi'. An t'aku lhigriegojo ixchiwiniy chi jamacha'a Sirofenicia.
41007027	An Jesús juniy: —Kachajcha p'ulhnaj tita'o'atsalh an jas'at'an, mu ntu oxi xajachalh li ajkama'osunilhcha yu ta'ut'ajun chi ajkamaka'anilhcha an x'oyun.
41007028	Pus an t'aku juniy: —Chuni, Jamach'alhkat, pero an x'oyun ta'usak'a masi wa ixtach'e'echak'an an jas'at'an an ixtan'api mesa.
41007029	Pus akxni juniy an Jesús an t'aku: —T'ach'a an na'un chunchacha sawalh, chaway kap'inch'icha, an makxkay'un makawlhcha amintsi'.
41007030	Akxni cha'ancho'olhcha laxcha'a an t'aku, an makxkay'un tucha tu'u ixlakpach'apata an istsi', chi sa'cha ixmalhi an la ixputamat.
41007031	Taxtucho'ochalhcha xalakaat'un Tiro an Jesús, la'puslicha xalakaat'un Sidón, chi pula'pus'alhcha xalakaat'un Decápolis, chi cha'alhcha laxalakxkan Galilea.
41007032	Talhicha'anilh pumatam lapanak yu ntu lay ixja'asmatnan chi ntu lay oxi ixchiwiniy. Tatapayninicha an Jesús li kak'uch'ulh.
41007033	Mu lhilhuw, pus mala'xtinulh, tan wa ix'akstucha lhi'alh, lak'akatutamaknulhcha chi lhilakapuch'apanilhcha ixchuj'uti an isima'at.
41007034	Chi tala'st'alhcha an Jesús an lakt'iyan, jama'aninilh, najun: "¡Efata!" Nawputun: "¡K'alakt'a'a'at'umix'at'icha!"
41007035	Walh watukan la'ta'a'atumix'alh chi ta'oxinilhcha an isima'at, oxicha chiwinilh.
41007036	—Tu xamati k'a'unit'it, —jajuniy an Jesús. Pero masi li chuncha ixjajuniy palay ixtalaknajun.
41007037	Chi sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni, ixtalaknajun: —Sawalh oxi tacha an ilhtulh, layi jak'uch'uy masi an yu wa laj'a'atapan chi an yu ntu lay tachiwiniy.
41008001	La'atam wilhchan wanajcha lhilhuwi ixjumpalhkanta, walh tutu'u yu kati'ukalh, pus an Jesús jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan:
41008002	—Ijkamapayniya ani lapanakni, mu la'at'utucha wilhchani kintala'chinta chi ntu tu'u yu katita'ulh,
41008003	li wachunchacha ajkamala'achacho'oya ixcha'ak'an katala'awitijtayaya lakatij, mu ali'in ma'ati tamintachalh.
41008004	An ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tajuniy: —¿Pero tanischa lay xamati ka'inilh pan ani li ntu xamati wilhi?
41008005	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —¿Tasu a'xchuxcha pani lhit'ant'at'it? Yu'uncha tajuniy: —A'xtujun.
41008006	Pus wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy tacha an ts'anaks ixta'ayxto'nun li katalaktawilhka an lakaat'un, chi yucha xa'a'ilhcha an a'xtujun pan, chi xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios chi la'ch'e'elhcha, xli'astan jaxta'nilhcha an ixt'alhtanan, chi yu'uncha tamala'pitsilhcha.
41008007	Wachu ixtalhi'anta lakats'uni lakt'ikt'i jatanti, an Jesús wachu lhixta'palh lhimala'puchajun chi jamamala'pitsinilhcha wachu an ixt'alhtanan.
41008008	Xchuxchak'ani talak'ulh chi talhikiklalhcha. Ixli'astan la'atujun kanastaja tapusakcho'olh yu wa lakt'ikt'icha xaxajni.
41008009	An yu talakwaylh lapanakni ka tacha la'at'at'i milh. Xli'astan an Jesús jala'axa'alalhcha an lapanakni chi talak'ancho'olhcha.
41008010	Chi an Jesús jat'atajulhcha laka barco an ixt'alhtanan, ta'alhcha xalakaat'un Dalmanuta.
41008011	Tala'cha'alh an fariseojnin an Jesús, tsukulhcha tat'alakikxtukuy, tajuniy ma kajamasunilh tu'u an lakt'iyan para li ma katakiklaka'ilh.
41008012	Pus an Jesús jama'aninilh laxta'oxila'alhit, najun: —¿Tasu li talakask'incha kamasunikalh tu'u ani lapanakni? Chaway sawalh klajunaw jantu tu'u katijamasunikalh ani yu chaway tat'ajun.
41008013	Pus tajupalhi an laka barco an Jesús, jamakawyawlhcha. An ixtapiktutamcha lakxkani alh.
41008014	Walh takaplhi li katalhi'alh pan, wa a'xtam pani ixtalhi'anta an laka barco.
41008015	Chi jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús: —K'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti li ntu katamatsaman an ixlamaskajank'an an fariseojnin chi an ixlamaskajan Heródes.
41008016	Pus yu'uncha ixtalalhisakmipaxaycha li sna xliyu li ntu tu'u ixtalhi'anta pan.
41008017	Chi mu jalhimacha'xanicha an Jesús, pus jajuniy: —¿Xliyu lint'u lhit'ant'at pani lhilakch'iwininat'it? ¿Ch'unt'u lhimach'a'xayat'it, sawalhka lakt'ak'alha mijalhunutk'an?
41008018	Masi li lhit'awnat'iti mi la'chulhk'an, ¿jant'u jalak'awananat'it? Chi masi li lhit'awnat'iti mi a'ax'olhk'an ¿jant'u ja'asmatnanat'it? ¿Jant'u p'ast'ak'at'iti
41008019	akxni an kla'puch'e'elh a'xkisi pan, chi ijkamawalh la'akisi milh lapanakni? ¿Tasu la'achuxcha kanastaja a'tsamcho'olh an xaxajni yu p'usakch'o'ot'iti? —La'akawt'uy kanasta, —tajuni.
41008020	—Chi akxni ijkamawalh a'xtujun pan la'at'at'i milh lapanakni, ¿Tasu la'achuxcha kanastaja a'tsamcho'olh an xaxajni yu p'usakch'o'ot'iti? —La'atujun kanasta, —tajuni.
41008021	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: ¿Chi tasucha li nt'uch'a lay lhimach'a'xayat'iti?
41008022	Tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Betsaida an Jesús, walh talhicha'anilh pumatam la'lhtulu lapanak. Tatapayninicha li kalakpach'apalh.
41008023	Pus an Jesús ma'ch'apachalhi an yu wa la'lhtulu, mala'xtinulhcha an la'acha'an. La'puchujwalhcha chi lakpuch'apalhcha, xli'astan lhisakmicha li laycha tu'u la'ts'in.
41008024	Yucha jalakawanalh, najun: —Wa tacha wa k'iwi ijkala'ts'in an lapanakni, pero talakjalhtanan.
41008025	Pus a'tam lakpuch'apapalhi an Jesús, oxicha malakawanilh, tala'pu'oxilhcha, ma'atcha ixlakacha'an chi oxicha ixjala'ts'in'ojoy.
41008026	Walh mala'achalhcha ixcha'a juniy: —Jant'u k'ap'it'i an la'acha'an ch'i nt'u xamat'i ka'un.
41008027	An Jesús chi an ixt'alhtanan ta'alhcha an lakt'ikt'i la'acha'anaxni lhila'acha'an Cesarea de Filipo. Walh lakatijcha jalhisakmicha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jajuniy: —¿An lapanakni tisi kit'incha tanajuni?
41008028	Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh, tajuniy: —Ali'in tanajun ma jama'paxanaj Juank'at'i, ali'in ma Eliask'at'i, chi ali'in tanajun ma xamaticha yu wachu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
41008029	Wa chuncha yucha jajuniy: —¿Chi uxitnan, tisi kit'inch'a nawnat'iti? An Pedro alhtaylh, juniy: —Uxint'i Cristojk'at'i.
41008030	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Jant'u xamat'i k'a'unit'it.
41008031	Tsukulhcha jajuniya li an ists'alh Dios kastak ma'alh'ajnana'. Li ntu katitala'ts'imputulhi an laktatanincha, chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin. Jajunilhi li katama'niya', pero li ixlila'at'utu wilhchan kala'awcho'oya'.
41008032	Ts'ajwi ixjajuni. Walh an Pedro aylhi'alh tan wa ix'akstu an Jesús, chi tsukulhcha juniya li ntu chuni kanawlh.
41008033	Pero an Jesús tala'asp'itlhi chi sa'cha jala'ts'ini an ali'in ixt'alhtanan, pus la'a'aymalhcha an Pedro, junkan an Pedro: —¡K'a'ost'i laki'ukxlakapu'u Satanás!, mu uxint'i nt'u lhak'ap'up'ini yu ix'anu Dios wa yucha an ixjatapast'ak'atk'an lapanakni lhak'ap'up'in.
41008034	Wachuncha an Jesús, jaxa'alalhi an lapanakni chi an ixt'alhtanan, chi jajuniy: —Li xamati kint'alhtana jumputun, kamakawlhcha yu wa xjatapast'ak'atcha, kaxa'a'ilhcha xcruz yu lay kapuma'nikalh chi akinch'a'o'alhcha.
41008035	Mu yu kama'alhtaxtuputuna ixjatsukunti, kama'ats'an'aya', pero yu kama'ats'an'aya ixjatsukunti kilakata chi ixlakata an ixchiwinti Dios, kama'alhtaxtuya'.
41008036	Jantu tani lhila'an masi wanajcha amaj ix'anu kajun'olh an lapanak an lakamunulhpa', li kama'ats'an'alh an ixjatsukunti.
41008037	¿Tasucha lay kalhila'cha'ancho'oya xjatsukunti?
41008038	Aniy lapanakni yu chaway tat'ajun ta'ilhtuyi ixtala'alhink'an chi ntu ta'ilhtuyi yu sawalh. Yu kint'amaxanani kit'in chi an kinchiwinti, kit'in isTs'alh Dios wachu akt'amaxanana akxni akmina lax'alhp'asninti an kimPay ali an ix'angelhnin yu stalan'a.
41009001	Jajumpalay: —Ani sawalhi ani yu klajunaw, ali'in yu an ani tat'ajun jantu katitanilh, sta akxni katala'ts'inacha kamina alhp'as an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
41009002	Ixlila'achaxancha wilhchan la'pusli, an Jesús jalhi'alhcha an Pedro chi an Jacobo chi an Juán wa ix'akstuk'an tanchun talhman a'stitawk'a. Chi laxjalakawantichak'an tapaxalhcha an Jesús.
41009003	An ixla'ch'it xlimjcha walh, wa lhi'o'slaycha sut'ut'u walh, tacha yu ntu lay tu'u chuncha kamasut'ut'ulh xamati masi wa stakcha kama'pajlhi an la'ch'it.
41009004	Chi tatalakasulhcha an Elias ali an Moisés, ixtat'achiwiniycha an Jesús.
41009005	Pus an Pedro juniy an Jesús: —Maestro, oxi li ani ikt'awnaw, akla'oxiyaw a'at'utu de jach'itin cha'a', a'atam mi anucha, a'atam ix'anucha an Moisés chi a'atam ix'anucha an Elías.
41009006	Jantucha ixk'atsay tani kanawlhcha an Pedro, mu ixtalaktalhanancha.
41009007	Wa akxni ta'alhtajulh la'atam jataputs'i jala'atanchanulhcha, chi chiwinkalhcha an laka jataputs'i nawkan: —Yucha aniya yu ikmapayni kints'alh, yuch'a k'a'asmatnit'it.
41009008	Xli'astan akxni tajalaklakawanancho'olh tucha xamati ali tala'ts'ilh, wa yucha an Jesuscha.
41009009	Tata'alhtajucho'olhcha an a'stitawk'a, an Jesús jajuniy li ntu xamati katajunilh tacha an tala'ts'ilh, jajuniy li katalaknawnaka sta akxni kala'awcho'oya an Jesús an yu walh isTs'alh Lapanak.
41009010	Pus wa sa'cha tak'atsalh. Wa yu'unchacha ixtalalhisakmipaxay tuchini jumputuncha li kala'awcho'oya an laka lhinin.
41009011	Tsukulhcha talhisakmiya an Jesús, tajuniy: —¿Tasu li tanajun an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin li task'iniya li p'ulhnaja kamilh an Eliasi?
41009012	An Jesús yucha jajuniy: An Elías p'ulhnaja kamina sawalh, kamina lats'awalana chux an tanlhun. ¿Chi k'ats'ayat'iti tacha kilhits'o'muk'akanta kit'in yu ikwalh wa tacha isTs'alh lapanak, li akstak mina ma'alh'ajna chi ntu tu'u akintitalhiwilalh?
41009013	Pero kit'in klajunaw an Elías kilachilhcha, chi wa tani ta'ilhtuputulhcha ta'ilhtulhcha, tacha an lhits'o'muk'ak'anta laxchiwinti Dios li kaputapasaya'.
41009014	Akxni jala'cha'ancho'olhcha an ali'in ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jala'ts'incha tacha ts'anan ixja'a'yakalh, chi ixjat'alakikxtukut'awkancha yu'uncha an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin.
41009015	Chi an lapanakni talhi'a'nicha li cha'alhcha an Jesús, pus tala'ats'alaj'alhcha chi ixtala'axa'alaycha.
41009016	Yucha jalhisakmilh jajuniy: —¿Tisunch'a lalhik'ikxt'uk'uyat'iti?
41009017	Pus pumatam najun an tan ts'anan ixlakyakalh: —Maestro, wa iklhiminitan an kints'alh wa lakpach'apata makxkay'un, tucha makawniya kachiwinilh.
41009018	Wa tanchuncha putawlachilh ma'taycha, xut'ut'ucha ma'pupuy chi wa xwat'at'acha tasat'ajun, wa k'alijicha junt'ajun, chi ijkajunicha a mint'alhtanan li katak'uch'ulhka', pero ntu lay tak'uch'uy.
41009019	Pus an Jesús jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan: —¡Yu chaway ani t'awnat jant'u jak'iklak'a'ininat'it!, ¿Tasu wanancha wa aktilat'a'aklatsukuyaw chi wa aktilalhilhitayaniyawi? Akilalhiminiw.
41009020	Pus talhi'anilhcha an ts'alh an Jesús. Walh akxni an makxkay'un la'ts'ilhcha an Jesús, ma'tapalhcha an ts'alh, p'ascha ixlakchikixa chi ixma'atamp'ilicha, chi ixma'pupuycha.
41009021	An Jesús lhisakmicha an ixpay an ts'alh tani ixlima'ancha chuncha lay, yucha najun: —Wa ixtajas'at'at,
41009022	a'lhucha ma'niputun ma'tay lakajikmi chi lakxkan. Li sna layi k'ak'uchut'i lamapaynin akilalhi'a'tayjuka'.
41009023	An Jesús juniy: —¿Sna layi ajk'uch'ulh? Watuchicha layi li k'iklak'a'i.
41009024	Pus watukan najuni an ixpay an ts'alh: —Chun, ijkiklaka'i, pero ak'ila'alhp'asninini an kijakiklaka'inti.
41009025	Chi mu la'ts'incha an Jesús li wanjacha lhilhuwi ixcha'ant'awkan, pus akxni la'a'aymalhcha an makxkay'un, juniy: —Makxkay'un yu nt'u ch'iwiniy chi a'atapak'at'i, k'amak'awcha ani ts'alh, chi nt'uch'a ali k'alakp'ach'ap'a.
41009026	An makxkay'un ch'ik'ik'icha t'asalh, chi p'ascha lakchikixli an ts'alh, makawlhcha, wa tacha wa nitacha sa' tamalh, ixtalaknajun ma nilhcha.
41009027	Walh an Jesús ma'ch'apasaklhi an ts'alh, oxicha tayacho'olh.
41009028	Tanulhcha laka cha'a an Jesús, chi tan wa ix'akstuchak'an an ixt'alhtanan tajuniy: —¿Tasu li kitnan tulay ijk'uch'uwi?
41009029	Pus yucha jajuniy: —Wa xliyu li ani makxkay'un jantu taxtuyi li ntu tapayninikani an Dios chi li ntu lhimakawkani kiwaytk'an.
41009030	Wa ancha ta'alhcha, xalakaat'uncha Galileaja tapu'alh, chi ntu ixlakask'ini an Jesús li xamati kak'atsalh.
41009031	Mu ixjamasuni an ixt'alhtanan ixjajuniy: —Kit'in yu ikjunlhi isTs'alh lapanak akima'axta'kana laxmaknik'an an lapanakni, chi akintama'niya', walh ixlila'at'ut'u wilhchan akla'awcho'oya'.
41009032	Pero yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xanilh chi ixtatalhanani li katalhisakmilh.
41009033	Tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Capernaúm, chi laka cha'acha an Jesús, jalhisakmicha an ixt'alhtanan tuchini ixtalhilakchiwij'antacha an laka tij.
41009034	Yu'uncha sa' talajkilhulh, mu yu'uncha ixtalhilakchiwij'anta tichini palaycha lhitapalayi yu yu'uncha.
41009035	Wachuncha tawilhcha an Jesús, chi jaxa'alalhcha an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan, jajuniy: —Li xamati palay lhitapalay jumputun, yucha xalakat'ikt'i kawalh chi kajatapatsani'olhcha an ali'in.
41009036	Chi ma'ch'apachalh pumatam jas'at'a an Jesús, ixtan'ajnichak'ani yawlh, chi ch'ix'ilhcha, jajuniy:
41009037	Li xamati la'a'i xamati jas'at'a tacha aniy lakintalakask'i, kit'ini kila'a'i, chi li kila'a'i, yucha an yu kimakminta la'a'i.
41009038	An Juán alhtaylh, juniy: —Maestro, ikla'ts'iw pumatam lapanak yu jak'uch'uyi laminta'a'ut an yu wa lakpach'apata makxkay'un, walh chi ntu kintat'alhtananan, pus tucha ikmakawniw, mu ntu kintach'a'o'an.
41009039	An Jesús juniy: —Jantu, jant'u ch'uni k'a'unit'it, mu ntu xamati yu lay ilhtuy laj'ay tu'u lakinta'a'ut, chi xli'astan wa tani akilhipastakpalhcha.
41009040	Yu ntu kintat'alaxtukuyan, kintat'a'anan.
41009041	Chi wa tichicha yu taxta'niyan masi wa tamcha vaso xkan kilakata, mu uxitnan kint'alhtanan, yucha o'sliyajcha li kamaapalhnikana'.
41009042	Pero li xamati jama'o'xcho'oy xapumatam an jas'at'an an yu kintakiklaka'iy, palay oxi kalhtuj ch'ipixtanukalh aya xwati, chi kawarjcha maka'ankalh tan talhman lakxkan.
41009043	Chi li amimaka ma'ilhtuyani tala'alhin, k'at'iklh ch'a'xmaj'a, mu palay oxi wa maklht'uluku k'a'unt'i ch'i k'ach'ip'i laka jatsukunti, walh jantu li a'tsa'ojoy mi maka chi k'ap'it'i laka lhinin tan tu a'tam mixta jikmi,
41009044	tan an ixlakatsapulhk'an tu a'tam tanini, chi an jikmi wachu ntu a'tam mixa.
41009045	Chi li aminch'aja ma'ilhtuyani tala'alhin, k'at'iklh ch'a'xmaj'a, palay oxi wa ch'anlht'uluku k'ach'ip'i laka jatsukunti, walh jantu li ch'an'a'ts'a'o'oy k'amakp'ink'a laka lhinin, tan tu a'tam mixa jikmi,
41009046	tan an ixlakatsapulhk'an tu a'tam tanini chi an jikmi wachu ntu a'tam mixa.
41009047	Chi li amila'chulh ma'ilhtuyani tala'alhin, k'at'ap'axt'u, palay oxi k'ach'ip'i tan ch'alhkatnan Dios wa mintalaktam, walh jantu li masi a'tsa'ojoy mila'chulh k'amakp'ink'a laka lhinin,
41009048	tan an ixlakatsapulhk'an tu a'tam tanini chi an jikmi wachu ntu a'tam mixa.
41009049	Chux lapanakni laka jikmi kajala's'o'okana', chi chux lha'ulan laka matsati kala'oxikana'.
41009050	An matsat oxi, pero li kama'ats'an'alh an is'o'onti ¿t'asich'a k'alhis'o'och'o'oya'it'iti? Jant'u k'ama'ats'an'at'iti ami matsatk'an, para li oxi k'alalhip'it'it.
41010001	Taxtulh an Jesús la'acha'an Capernaúm, alhcha xalakaat'un Judea chi an ixlitapiktutamcha ayxkan junkan Jordán, walh wanajcha lhilhuwi la'cha'ampalhkalh, pus tsukulhcha jamasunipalay tacha ixlismanitacha.
41010002	Tala'cha'alh ali'in fariseojnin talhila'ts'intanuycha an Jesús, tajuniy li sna oxi li xamati lapanak kamakawlh ixt'iwi'.
41010003	Yucha ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —¿Tasicha tajunin an Moisés?
41010004	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —An Moisés, makawnilhi an lapanak li layi kaxta'niya ixt'iwi la'atam jalhiki yu katalapumakawna', chi kamakawnacha.
41010005	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Chunchacha lhinawlh an Moisés mu wa xliyu nt'u k'is ja'asmatnanat'it,
41010006	pero an Dios akxni ilhtulh an lapanak, ilhtulhcha an lapanak chi ilhtulhcha an t'aku'.
41010007	Xliyu an lapanak, kamakawna ixpay chi ixnati, ixt'iwicha kat'atala'xt'o'a'.
41010008	An ixt'uyunk'an tachanu wa pumatamcha katajuna', jantucha ixt'uyunk'an, tachanu wa pumatamcha.
41010009	Yu Dioscha jamala'xto'lhi jantucha kajalamamakawnilhi an lapanak.
41010010	Laka cha'acha, a'tam talhisakmipalhi an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús yu yucha ixlakata.
41010011	Pus jajuniy: —Wa tichicha yu makajun ixt'iwi chi t'atsukupalaycha pumatam t'aku, tala'alhincha ilhtuy.
41010012	Chi tam t'aku yu makajuni ixt'apapa chi t'atsukupalaycha pumatam lapanak, wachucha tala'alhini ilhtuy.
41010013	Ixtalhicha'anicha an jas'at'an an Jesús para li kajalaklakpach'apalh, pero an ixt'alhtanan talaj'aymastuklhi an yu ixtalhicha'ani.
41010014	Walh akxni jala'ts'ilh an Jesús lhitalh'amalh chi jajuniy: —Kachajcha tamilhi an jas'at'an, jant'u k'ajalaj'aymast'ukt'it, mu an ixlich'alhkat Dios ixnawink'an yu tacha yu'uncha.
41010015	Kit'in sawalhi an yu klajunaw li yu ntu la'a'iya an ixlich'alhkat Dios tacha pumatam jas'at'a, jantu katicha'alhi tan ch'alhkatnan Dios.
41010016	Chi jalakch'ix'ilhcha an jas'at'an, jalaklakpach'apalhcha, jalhisk'inilhcha an Dios li oxi katatsukulh.
41010017	Akxni ixti'ancho'oycha an Jesús, la'ats'alajcha'alh pumatam lapanak, chi tatso'ottanilhcha laxlakapu', juniy: —Oxi maestro ¿tasicha aklhit'alalh para li aklhitsukulh an yu ntu min'ojoy jatsukunti?
41010018	An Jesús juniy: —¿Tasu li k'i'unicha li oxi klapanaki? Tu xamati yu oxi lapanak, wa pumatami yu chun, Dios.
41010019	K'ats'aycha an lhamap'a'sin: "Jant'u wa aya k'alat'i, jant'u k'ajama'nin, jant'u k'aja'alhawan, jant'u k'amaslak'at'in, jant'u k'a'o'xch'o'on, oxi k'ala'ts'i mimpay chi minati".
41010020	Pus an lapanak juniy: —Maestro, chuxcha chuncha ik'ilhtu'ojoy wa kintats'alat.
41010021	Pus an Jesús sa'cha ixla'ts'in chi ixmapaynicha, juniy: —Pero ts'an'aniyanka la'atami yu k'a'ilht'u, k'ast'a'o chux an yu lhit'a'un chi k'ajamala'p'its'inincha an jakilhpatinin, chuncha yu k'alhits'uk'uya'a laj'oxi mintanlhun an lakt'iyan, xli'astan k'at'ana'acha ak'inch'a'o'aya'acha kaxa'a'iya'acha mincruz yu lay kap'uma'nik'a.
41010022	Ancho'olhcha an lapanak, sawalhcha lhita'oxila'alhiya tacha an junkalh, mu lhuw ixtanlhuni ixlit'ajun.
41010023	Chi an Jesús jalaklakawanancha, jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan: —¡Sawalhcha lhima'anxkayi katacha'ana an laxlich'alhkat Dios an yu talhit'ajun lhuw ixtumink'an!
41010024	An ixt'alhtanan sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya tacha an jajunilh, pus an Jesús jajumpalay: —Kints'alan, ¡sawalh lhima'anxkayi katatanuyanta laxlich'alhkat Dios an yu tachanu tumin takiklaka'iy!
41010025	Palay wa lasi kastaala'pusli lax'ista makskat la'atam camello, walh jantu li katanuchalh xamati jamatumin an laxlich'alhkat Dios.
41010026	Pus palaycha ixtalhi'a'ni, ixtalajumpaxay: —¿Pus tisiyuchacha lay kata'alhtaxtuya'a?
41010027	Pus an Jesús sa'cha jala'ts'in, jajuniy: —Yu an lapanak tulay ilhtuy, an Dios yucha layi ilhtu'ojoy chux.
41010028	Xli'astan an Pedro tsukulhcha juniya an Jesús: —Kitnan iklhimakaw'otawcha kintanlhunk'an, mu klach'a'o'atawcha.
41010029	Pus an Jesús najun: —Aklajunaw yu sawalh, masi yu lhimakajuntacha ixcha'a, u ixjat'ala'awnin, u ixjamatsanan, u ixpay, u ixnati, u ixt'iwi, u ixjas'at'an, u ixlakaat'un, kilakata chi ixlakata an laj'oxi chiwinti,
41010030	tam ciento palayi kaxta'nikana aniy lakamunulhpa: ixcha'a, ixjat'ala'awnin, ixjamatsanan, ixnatin, ixjas'at'an chi ixlakaat'un, masi aniy lalhilhitama'chapukan. Atumpaja kaxta'nikana jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy, akxni kamina an yu tumpajcha lakamunulhpa'.
41010031	Pero xluwk'ani yu p'ulhnaj chaway, yu'uncha astani katajuna', chi yu astan chaway p'ulhnaja katajuna'.
41010032	Ixtitatama'ast'a'ancha la'acha'an Jerusalén an Jesús ali an ixt'alhtanan, ixp'ulayi an Jesús, an ixt'alhtanan jantucha ixtalhimacha'xayi li an Jesús o'sliyani ixti'an an la'acha'an masi ixk'atsaycha li kaniya', chi an yu astan ixtamintachalh ixtalaktalhanancha. Pus an Jesús a'tam jalhi'ampalhi tan wa ixpu'akstuk'an an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan, tsukulhcha jajuniya tani kaputapasayacha, jajuniy:
41010033	Titama'ast'a'anawcha Jerusalén, tan kama'axta'kana an yu junlhi Ists'alh Lapanak. La xmaknik'an an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sini kama'axta'kana', chi yu'uncha katanawna li kama'nikalhcha. Katama'axt'a'a la xmaknik'an an yu ntu judiojnin.
41010034	Jantu tu'u katitalhiwilalh, katala'ana'maya, katala'achuj'waya, chi katama'niya', walh ixlila'at'utu wilhchan kala'awcho'oya'.
41010035	An Jacobo chi an Juán, ists'alan tichi lapanak junkan Zebedeo, wanicha tala'alh an Jesús, tajuniy: —Maestro, klask'iniputunaw lamapaynin.
41010036	Yucha jajuniy: —¿Tisunch'a lak'ask'inat akla'ilhtuniwi?
41010037	Pus tajuniy: —Akilamakawniw li aklapiktutawlhcha'awi tapiktutamin t'an k'ap'ina'a ch'alhkatna', pumatam tan oxi mimpa'xti, chi an pumatam la milhijama'xi.
41010038	An Jesús jajuniy: —Jant'u k'ats'ayat t'uch'ini sk'inatcha. ¿Layi k'alhit'ayaniya'it an ma'alh'ajnat yu akma'alh'ajnana', chi k'aniya'it'iti tacha akniya'?
41010039	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¡Chun kalaya'! —Pus an Jesús jajuniy: — K'ama'alh'ajnana'itcha tacha kit'in, chi k'aniya'itcha tacha kit'in.
41010040	pero li akilalakpa'xtitawlaw jantu lay kit'in aktilamakawniw, mu ancha katatawla yu anchacha jalhisakxtukanta.
41010041	Akxni ta'asmatlhi an ixpumakawk'an ali'in ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tat'alatalh'amajla'ts'ilhcha an Jacobo chi an Juán.
41010042	Pus an Jesús, jaxalalh jajuniy: —Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li an yu tajun xajamach'alhkatni an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni wa talhinajuncha, chi an yu palay xalaj'ajin, yu'uncha yu palaycha wa talhinajun.
41010043	Pero aniy uxitnan, tam. Aniy yu lhitapalay jumputun p'ulhnajcha kajatapatsanilhi an ali'in,
41010044	chi yu palaycha tukan xa'ay jumputun yu uxitnan, mima'tsukuk'ani kuna'.
41010045	Mu masi kit'in yu ikjunlhi Ists'alh Lapanak, jantu ikminta li wa akilak'ilhtunikalhcha an tapatsat, kit'in iklamintaw tapatsaninin, chi ikminta ma'axta'na an kijatsukunti para li lhuw lapanakni katata'alhtaxtulh.
41010046	Wachuncha la'acha'an Jericojcha tacha'alh. Chi akxni ixtitataxtucho'oycha an Jesús ali an ixt'alhtanan ts'ananacha ixjach'a'o'akanta, walh pumatam la'lhtulu lapanak junkan Bartimeo, ists'alh tichi lapanak junkan Timeo, an ixpiktu tiji sa' ixwilh, isk'in la'a'tayjun.
41010047	Pus akxni asmat'acha li yucha an Jesús yu jamacha'a Nazareti ix'antachalh, tsukulhcha t'asay najun: —¡Jesús, Ists'alh David, lamapaynin ak'ilhi'a't'ay'ut'i!
41010048	Pero an ali'in lapanakni tala'a'aymalh para li sa'cha kakilhulh. Pero yucha palay p'as ixt'asay: —¡Ists'alh David lamapaynin ak'ilhi'a't'ay'ut'i!
41010049	Wachuncha an Jesús sa'cha tayalh, chi jajuniy an yu ixtat'a'anta li katat'asanilhcha an la'lhtulu lapanak, pus tat'asanilhcha chi tajuniy: —T'ut'ani k'anaw, k'at'aycha, t'asaniyani an Jesús.
41010050	Pus lht'ele' maj'alhi an ixpupula'axt'a'kan an la'lhtulu lapanak, tayalhcha, la'alhcha an Jesús.
41010051	An Jesús juniy: —¿Tasu ak'ilhtunch'a na'uni? Pus an la'lhtulu lapanak juniy: —Maestro, ijkalakawanamputun.
41010052	An Jesús juniy: —An mijakiklaka'inti p'ut'ak'uch'ut'icha, k'ap'inchicha. Pus wa akxni jalakawanalhcha, chi ch'a'o'alhi'alhcha an Jesús an laka tij.
41011001	Akxni ixtacha'ant'ajuncha la'acha'an Jerusalén, wa nicha la'acha'an Betfagé chi wanicha la'acha'an Betania, laxlakapucha an a'stitawk'a junkan laka'olivojnin, an Jesús jamala'achalhcha ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan.
41011002	Jajuniy: —K'ap'inchi'it'it an tan tasuy la'acha'an, chi akxni k'ach'ip'ina'itcha k'ala'ch'ip'ina'it'it la'atam jas'at'a burro, ch'iyawkanta, jantuka' a'tam putawk'akan, k'ax'ot'iya'it, akilalhiminiyaw.
41011003	Li xamati talhisakmiyan t'uch'ini lhix'ot'iyatcha, k'a'una'it'it li yucha an jamach'alhkati ma'lhtask'ini, li wa tukan kama'axta'cho'oya'.
41011004	Pus ta'alhcha, walh tala'cha'alhcha an burro, ixch'iyawkanta lakamaticha lhilaka tij, pus tax'ot'ilhcha.
41011005	Walh tichi yu'uncha yu ancha ixta'wilanalh tajuniy: —¿Tasu li x'ot'iyatcha an burrojo?
41011006	Pus yu'uncha chunchacha tanajun tacha an ixjajunita an Jesús, pus jamakawnikalhcha.
41011007	Talhi'anilhcha an Jesús an burro chi an lapanakni talak'aymuk'anilhcha an burro yu ixtaputala'axt'a'ta yu'uncha, chi putawk'alhcha an Jesús.
41011008	An ali'in ixtalakmamaycha an yu ixtaputala'axt'a'a an tan ixpu'anta an Jesús, chi an ali'in ixtala't'e'emanicha jach'itin.
41011009	An yu ixtap'ulanan chi an yu astan ixtamintachalh ixtalakt'asaycha, ixtalaknajun: —¡Kajama'alht'axt'uncha chaway! ¡Oxi ani lapanak yu Dios makmintalh!
41011010	¡Oxi an minta lhich'alhkat, xlich'alhkat kimpayk'an David! ¡Hosanna kanawkalh an lakt'iyan!
41011011	Cha'alhcha Jerusalén an Jesús chi tanuchalhcha an laka xa'ay tajtan, sa'cha ixjalaklakawanan wayu, mu tats'isicha, ta'alhcha Betania ali an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan.
41011012	Xlila'atamcha wilhchan, akxni ixtitataxtucho'oycha Betania, chawanalhcha an Jesús.
41011013	Walh laka'an ma'at lanan, st'a'aj yachalh a'atam xak'iw higo, pus alh laka'ana li sna uk'alh, walh cha'alh la'ts'in tu tu'u uk'alh, wasiy xax'oy mu ntu ixpaku'.
41011014	Pus an Jesús juniy an xak'iw higo: —Jantu a'tam ka'unini xamati mijatawk'at. Walh ta'alha'asmatlhi an ixt'alhtanan.
41011015	Tacha'ampalhcha Jerusalén, walh an Jesús akxni tanuchalh an laka xa'ay tajtan, tsukulh jatamakxtuyi an yu ixtajast'anan chi an ixtajatamawnan ixpulakni tajtan. Jala'ma'atasp'itni'olhi an mesa an yu ixtamapaxay tumin chi an ixtants'ik'an an yu ixtast'ay paloma.
41011016	Jantucha ixmakawniya li xamati ali kat'atanuchalh tu'u'.
41011017	Tsukulhcha jamasuni jajuniy: —Mu ts'o'kanta an laxchiwinti Dios tan najun: Chux an lapanakni ta ixlijalhi'ay an lakamunulhpa an kincha'a katajuna putapaynin. Walh uxitnan wa p'a'alhawnanatcha.
41011018	Pus ta'alha'asmat'acha an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin. Pus talhipuxkawnilhcha tani katalhima'nilhcha, mu ixtatalhamnicha chi, mu ta lhichux an la'acha'an ixtalhi'a'ninicha an ixlamap'a'sin.
41011019	Pero an Jesús akxni tats'isilhcha taxtulhi an la'acha'an.
41011020	Tala'puspalhcha wats'isin an tan yalh xak'iw higo, xixtacha chux xajataxiyak.
41011021	Wachuncha an Pedro past'ak'ach'a, juniy: —Maestro, jo'o k'ala'ts'i, an xak'iw higo an yu la'a'aymat'i xixtacha.
41011022	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —K'ak'iklak'a'it'iti an Dios.
41011023	Mu wa tichicha yu kajunilh ani a'stitawk'a: K'a'ost'i, an alamalhch'a k'at'a'uchi', li kiklaka'iya chux la xjalhunut chi li lhiwilayi an yu najun li kuna, kuna sawalh.
41011024	Xliyu klalhijunaw, watuchicha t'ap'aynisk'inat'it, k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti li k'axt'a'nik'ana'it'it sawalh, walh k'axt'a'nik'ana'it'it sawalh.
41011025	Chi akxni t'ap'ayniyat, k'amala'mixinit'iti xamati yu ta'ilhtuniyan tu'u tala'alhin, walh wachu katamala'mixiniyani mintala'alhink'an an mimPayk'an yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan.
41011026	Pero li nt'u mala'mixiyat'it, wachu ntu katitamala'mixinini an mimPayk'an yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan.
41011027	Wachuncha ta'ampalhcha Jerusalén, walh akxni ix'aklat'ajuncha laka tajtan an Jesús, tala'cha'alhcha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an laktatanincha.
41011028	Tajuniy: —¿T'asu li ch'unch'ach'a layi, tisiyuchacha makawniyan li k'ajalakt'amakxt'u an tajast'anani?
41011029	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Wachu aklalhisakmiyaw la'atam chiwinti, li akilajunaw, wachu aklajunawi tuchini laycha chuncha iklhilak'ilhtuy aniy tanlhun.
41011030	¿An ixjama'paxanti Juán, Diosi ixlijuni u wa ixjatapast'ak'atcha lapanak? Akilajuniw.
41011031	Pus wachuncha tsukulhcha talakchiwiniy talajuniy: —Li kajunaw li Diosi ixlijuni, akintajunan; ¿P'us ch'i li nt'uch'a k'iklak'a'it'iti?
41011032	Chi li kajunaw li wa ixjatapast'ak'atcha lapanak, chux an lapanakni akintatayla'minan, mu yu'uncha tak'atsayi li an Juán ixchiwinti Dios sawalhi ixlichiwiniy.
41011033	Pus an Jesús ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —Jantu ijk'atsayaw. Pus yucha wachu jajuniy: —Wachu ntu aktilajuniwi tuchini chunchacha iklhi'ilhtuy.
41012001	Tsukulhcha jaxa'alay wa laka pulhamacha'xani an Jesús, jajuniy: —Pumatam lapanak ch'anlhi ix'uva chi kurralhnulhcha, chi ja'ajnalhcha tan kapach'itkana',chi ilhtulhcha la'atam torre, jamach'ixta'nilh tichi yu'uncha lapanakni, chi yucha ma'atcha alh.
41012002	Walh akxni chilhcha ixpaku an ix'uva, makminchalhcha pumatam yu kamilh inini yu ixnawincha.
41012003	Pero an yu ixjamalhistaknikanta wa talakasamalhi an yu ixmala'achakantachalh, pus wachuncha tamala'achacho'olh.
41012004	An yu jamanawin a'tam mala'achapalhchalh pumatam ixma'tsuku', pero palaycha talakasamanilh, tamalakpak'atsanilh, chi stakcha tamamaxanilh.
41012005	A'tam mala'achapalhchalh pumatam, walh tama'ninilh. Chi ali'incha yu ixjamala'achapalachalh, ixjama'ninikan chi ixjalaksamanikan.
41012006	Xli'astan wa pumatamcha yu sawalh ixmapayniy ists'alhi ixlit'ajun, pus yuchacha makminchalh, mu ixnajun: —Aniy mu kints'alh, kata'asmatniya'.
41012007	Walh an yu ancha ixtajalhistaknan talajuniy: —Yucha anicha jamanawin kuncho'oya an lakaat'un. Kama'niw, walh ki'anuchak'ani kuna'.
41012008	Pus tach'apachalh, tama'nilh, ma'spacha an tan ixtalhistakta lakaat'uni takimaj'alh.
41012009	¿T'asich'a lhiwilayat kalaya an yu jamanawin an tan ch'ankanta uvaja? Yucha kamina chi kajama'ni'oya an yu ixtajalhistaknan, ali'ini kaxta'niya an lakaat'un an tan ixch'an ix'uva.
41012010	¿Jant'u p'unawt'at'iti tacha an najunta tan an ts'o'muk'akanta an laxchiwinti Dios? Tan najun: —An chiwx an yu tala'amaj'alh an yu tayajuy cha'a, apalij yucha palay lhitapalalh.
41012011	Yucha an Diosi chuncha ilhtulh. Chi lhi'a'niyawcha li chunchacha la'ts'inaw.
41012012	Pus ixtach'apayawputuncha an Jesús, mu talhimacha'xalhi li yu'uncha jajuni, pero wa tatalhanajlalh, mu lhilhuw, pus ta'ancho'olhcha.
41012013	Tamala'achachalhcha ali'in fariseojnin chi yu ixt'apartidojnincha an Herodes an tan ixt'ajun an Jesús, para li tu'ucha kata'alh'a'taymalh.
41012014	Tala'cha'alh tajuniy: —Maestro, ijk'atsayaw li sawalhi an yu na'un chi li nt'u xamat'i t'alhamni, mu uxint'i ntu yu lhak'ap'up'in tani tasuycha xamati', uxint'i ts'ajwi masuy an ixtij Dios. ¿Oxi li akmapalhlhi'aniw tanlhun an ay xajamach'alhkat la'acha'an Roma u jantu?
41012015	Walh yucha mu ixjak'atsanicha li wa tajunicha, pus jajuniy: —¿Tasu li wa kilalhila'ts'intanuyawcha? K'alhit'at'it a'xtami an tumin, akla'ts'ina'.
41012016	Pus talhicha'anilhcha chi jajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha ani puwilh chi an ixta'a'ut? — Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Ix'anu an ay xajamach'alhkat Roma.
41012017	Pus yucha jajuniy: —K'axt'a'nitcha yu ix'anu an ay jamach'alhkat Roma, chi yu ix'anu Dios wach'uch'a k'axt'a'nit. Pus sawalhcha talhi'a'nilh.
41012018	An saduceojnin yu ntu takiklaka'iy li kala'awcho'okana tala'cha'alh, tajuniy:
41012019	Maestro, a Moisés kintats'o'nini an laxchiwinti Dios li ma xamati niy ixt'ala'ajun chi li t'ajuni ixt'iwi, pero li ntu tu'u ixjas'at'an, ma tamcha ixt'ala'ajuni kat'atsukucho'olh, para li ma kat'ajamas'at'analhcha.
41012020	Ixtat'ajun ixpumatujunk'an wa lhit'ala'awnin; an xa'aycha t'atsukukalhcha, walh nilh, tu tu'u jamakawlh ixas'at'an,
41012021	pus an yu ixt'ala'ajuncha yuchacha t'atsukucho'olh an t'aku', walh wachu nipalh, jantu tu'u ixjas'at'an jamakawpalh. Chi an ixlipumat'utucha t'atsukulh ixt'ala'ajuk'an wanajcha chun nipalh.
41012022	Sta tat'atsuku'olhi an ixpumatujunk'an an t'aku', chi talakni'olh, jantu tu'u tamakawlh ixjas'at'ank'an, xliastan an t'aku wachucha nilh.
41012023	Akxni kala'awcho'okana, mu an ixpumatujunk'an tat'atsuku'olhi an t'aku, ¿Tisiyuchacha ixt'iwi kuna'a?
41012024	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Wa xliyu nt'u k'ats'ayat an ixchiwinti Dios, chi li yucha layi ilhtu'ojoy watuchicha, walh o'palaj xliyu k'a'ilht'ut yu ntu oxi.
41012025	Akxni kala'awcho'okana, ntu xamati katit'atsukukalh, mu tacha an angelhnini kajun'okana'.
41012026	Chi li sna nt'u k'ats'ayat'iti li kala'awcho'okana, ¿Ch'u nt'u p'unawt'at'iti an laxlibro Moisés, tacha an xa'alalh Dios akxni ixla'xawt'ajun a'atam k'iw yu junkan zarza, tan junkalh a Moisés: —Kit'ini ixDios Abraham, chi Isaak, chi Jakob?
41012027	An Dios tu ixDiosk'an janinin, ixDiosk'an yu tala'ajunta. Uxitnan sawalhch'a lhits'an'ayat.
41012028	Pumatam xamaestro lhamap'a'sin jala'cha'alh, mu ja'alha'asmat'acha li talakikxtukuy, chi k'atsayi li oxi ja'alhtaylh an Jesús, pus lhisakmicha, juniy: —¿Tanyucha yu palay ay lhamap'a'sin?
41012029	An Jesús juniy: —Tan an najunta: —Israel, k'a'asmatt'i; an kijamach'alhkatk'an Dios, wa pumatam.
41012030	Chi k'amap'ayniya'a amijamach'alhkat Dios, chux la mijalhunut, chux la mintakuwin, chux la mijatapast'ak'at chi chux la mintachaput. Yucha yu ay lhamap'a'sin.
41012031	Xlitipat'uy wa ixt'atamcha lanan, k'amap'ayniya'a mint'alapanak t'ach'a map'aynik'an mi'akstu. Ani la'at'uy lhamap'a'sin yucha yu laj'ay, tu tu'u atumpaj.
41012032	Wachuncha an xamaestro lhamap'a'sin juniy: —Chun sawalhi maestro, t'ach'a an na'un li wa pumatami Dios, jantu tu'u t'awpalay,
41012033	chi li kamapaynikalhi chux laka jalhunut, chi chux laka jatapast'ak'at, chi chux laka tak'atsan, chi chux laka tachaput, sawalh. Chi li akmapayniwi kint'alapanakk'an tacha ikmapaynikanaw, palay lhitapalay, walh jantu masi chux tacha an jama'nikan jatapakxat chi jala'xawakancha tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan.
41012034	An Jesús, mu la'ts'incha li oxi tacha an ja'alhtayanalh, pus juniy: —Jantu ma'ati t'a'un an la xlich'alhkat Dios. Wachuncha jantucha xamati k'is tapujucho'olh kalhisakmilh tu'u'.
41012035	Akxni ixmasuy an Jesús an laka tajtan ixjajuniy: —¿Tasu li tanajuncha an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin li an Cristo ists'alh Daviti?
41012036	Pero mu an David yucha nawpalay akxni machiwinilh an ixtakuwin Dios, najun: "An jamach'alhkat Dios juniy an kijamach'alhkat Cristo: Tan oxicha kimpa'xtiy ak'imp'ikt'ut'a'ulh, sta akxni ajkamama'oyacha lamijach'aja an yu wa taxkayan."
41012037	An David yucha najun li an Cristo ixjamach'alhkat, ¿tasicha li ists'alh a'tami? Pus tacha an wanajcha lhilhuw ts'anaks ixlakyakalh sawalhcha ixta'achani ixta'alha'asmat'a an Jesús.
41012038	Ixjamap'a'siy ixjajuniy: —K'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, mu an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin sawalhcha ta'achaniya tala'la'ch'iy la'lhman ixla'ch'itk'an, chi ta'achaniya kajala'axa'alakalh laka tiankis.
41012039	Chi tan p'ulhnaja talaktawlhputunachalh an laka lakcha'a tan pulakta'ayxto'kan, chi tan alin k'atan tan lakwaykan.
41012040	Yu'uncha yu wanajcha tamaxtuni'ojoy ixcha'ak'an an yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapak'an t'akunin. Chi sawalhcha oxi lapanakni talay, panijnicha tatapayni. Yu'uncha palay ay lhima'alh'ajna kajaxta'nikana'.
41012041	An Jesús sa'cha ixwilh lhilaxlakapu an caja tan ixtamujuy ixla'ulank'an an lapanakni, sa'cha ixjala'ts'in, ixpumalhuk'an an yu jamatuminin la'lhuwi ixtamujuy.
41012042	Walh cha'alh pumatam jakilhpatinij t'aku yu maticha ixt'apapa, wachu mujulh a'xt'uy lakt'ikt'i ixtumin.
41012043	Wachuncha an Jesús jaxa'alalhi an ixt'alhtanan, chi jajuniy: —Ani jakilhpatinij t'aku yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapa palay mujulh, walh jantu an ali'in.
41012044	Mu yu'uncha wa xaxajnicha tamujulh; pero ani t'aku, masi wa ixkilhpatitcha muju'olhi yu ixch'apata, chux yu kaxlitamawwaylh.
41013001	Akxni taxtucho'olhcha an laka tajtan an Jesús, pumatam ixt'alhtana juniy: —¡Maestro, k'ala'ts'i an chiwx chi an cha'a wa lajk'usicha!
41013002	Alhtaylh an Jesús juniy: —T'ach'a ani la'ts'in laj'ay cha'a, wanaj kama'ta'okana', tu tu'u masi wa katila'ukxtawk'atawilhcha chiwx.
41013003	Chi akxni sa'cha tawilh an Jesús an a'stitawk'a tan junkan Lakaa'olivojnin, lhilaxlakapu an tajtan, an Pedro chi an Jacobo chi an Juán chi an Andrés wa ixpu'akstuk'an talhisakmicha,
41013004	tajuniy: —¿Tasu wanancha chuncha katapasaya'a? ¿Chi tasucha aklhik'atsayaw akxni chunchacha kalaktapasaya'a? Akilajuniw.
41013005	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh tsukulhcha jajuniy: —K'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, para li ntu xamati kata'o'xcho'on.
41013006	Mu ixluwk'ani katamina yu katanawna li yu'uncha Cristojnin, chi ixluwk'ani katata'o'xcho'oya'.
41013007	Akxni k'a'asmat'a'it'iti li lasakancha chi lat'alhkancha, pero nt'u k'alakt'alhanant'it, mu lhitask'iniya li chuncha katapasalh; pero ntuka' kati'ukla'olh.
