41013008	Mu la'atam ay la'acha'an kat'alasaya la'atam ixt'a'ay la'acha'an chi pumatam ay jamach'alhkat kat'alasaya pumatam ixt'a'ay jamach'alhkat chi watanchuncha kalaklaya an lakaat'un chi ka'alinacha chawan. Yucha wa kapu'a'tayniyaka an lhima'alh'ajna.
41013009	Pero uxitnan, uxitnani k'alhak'ap'up'ink'ant'it, mu k'ama'axt'a'k'ana'it'it laka lakjamach'alhkat, chi k'a'ayna'k'ana'it'iti tan tata'ayxto'ojoy an lapanakni, chi ixlakapuk'an an jamach'alhkatni k'alhip'ink'ana'it'it kilakata. Akxniy lay k'aja'una'it an laj'oxi chiwinti.
41013010	Task'iniya li an laj'oxi chiwinti katilhichiwin'okalhcha p'ulhnaja ta kilhmakchux an lapanakni, xli'astan ka'ukla'oyacha.
41013011	Chi akxni ma'axt'a'k'anat'it, jant'u k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti t'ani k'anawna'itcha, k'anawna'it yu anchacha katamapast'ak'aniyan an Ixtakuwin Dios, mu ntu uxitnani k'at'ichiwinint'it yucha an Ixtakuwin Dios.
41013012	Akxni masi yu tam mint'ala'ajunk'an katama'axt'a'aniy laka lhinin, chi tam xapay kama'axt'a'a masi ists'alh; chi katat'ala'ayacha an ixpaynink'an an xajas'at'an, katama'niya ixlakpaynink'an.
41013013	Tucha k'is k'at'ila'ts'imp'ut'unk'ant'iti kilakata, pero yu kalhitayaniya, yucha kata'alhtaxtuya'.
41013014	K'ala'ts'ina'itcha an ay tuchichun yu ntu k'is lhitayanikan la'ts'inkan yu lhichiwinilh an Daniel, yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios. Anchunu ay tuchichun ka'ulakanacha tan tu ixlitask'inin katawilh, (yu punajun kalhimacha'xalhcha), pus yu katatsukuya lakaat'un Judea, kata'os'alhcha an lakaa'a'stitawk'an.
41013015	Chi yu ix'a'sti ixcha'a uk'achalh, jantu kata'alhtajulhi para li ka'alh maxtunu tu'u la ixcha'a'. Chi yu la xkuxtu t'awnachalh, jantu ka'alhi p'uxnu ixpu'ayxt'a'kan tan muk'atachalh.
41013016	Chi yu t'awnachalh lakakuxtu, jantu ka'alhi xa'a'ini ixpu'ayxt'a'kan.
41013017	¡¡ Chi payni'incha an t'akunin yu ixt'a'akxni tukan taja'aynanta, chi yu ixt'a'akxni tukan talhit'ajun xjas'at'ank'an yu tats'ik'ika', mu akxni lhima'anxkay!
41013018	K'at'ap'aynit'it, para li ntu akxni ixpaku lhik'asnini k'aja'osnunt'it.
41013019	Mu ay lhima'alh'ajna ka'alina', tacha yu ntu a'tam alinta sta wa tawanancha ilhtutachalh an lakamunulhpa an Dios, sta chaway, chi ntu a'tam chun katitapasacho'olh.
41013020	Li ntu kaxlalakat'ikt'ilhi an xapanch'e'ex lhima'alh'ajna an Dios, jantu xamati ixta'alhtaxtulh, pero mu jamapayniya an Dios an yu jasakxtutacha, pus kalalakat'ikt'iya an xapanch'e'ex ma'alh'ajnat.
41013021	Li xamati tajunan, "Anicha t'ajuni Cristo, u anucha t'awnachalhi Cristo," jant'u k'ak'iklak'a'it.
41013022	Mu kata'alina yu ntu Cristojnin sawalh, chi yu ntu ixlisawalh ixchiwinti Dios katitalhichiwinilh, chi layi kata'ilhtuya laj'ay tanlhun tu'u', tacha jak'uchunti, pero wa ixpa'o'xcho'onchak'an, chi li lay, kata'o'xcho'oputuna an yu jasakxtukantacha.
41013023	Pus chaway klamak'atsaniwcha, ¡k'ajalajk'ats'anant'itcha!
41013024	Chi anchunu panch'e'ex, xli'astancha an ay lhima'alh'ajnat, an wilhchan kataputs'isiya', chi an malhkuyu jantucha katimapulhkulh.
41013025	Chi an st'akunin katapatajuya', chi an tanlhuncha yu talhit'ajun ix'alhp'asnintik'an awint'i lakt'iyan kajalakchikixkana'.
41013026	Wachuncha an yu kijunchilh Ists'alh Lapanak, sawalhcha alhp'asi kala'ts'istukkana kamina an laka jataputs'i, chux laxta'ayaxtu.
41013027	Chi an ix'angelhnin, kajamala'achayacha li katamach'ixtamilhcha an yu jasakxtutacha, ta ixlijalhi'ay an lakamunulhpa chi an lakt'iyan.
41013028	’K'ap'ulhimach'a'xatcha tacha an lhixa'alak'ant'it xak'iw higo. Akxni alhajas'at'alacho'otacha, chi xajnicho'oyachilhcha sast'i xax'oy, k'ats'ayatcha li wa nicha ixpaku lhi'ichi.
41013029	Xliyu li akxni k'ala'ts'ina'itcha kalaktapasaya tacha an klajuniw, k'ats'ayatcha li wa nicha laka maticha ikminta.
41013030	Kit'in klajunaw yu sawalh: — Akxni chuxcha chuncha kalaktapasaya, lhilhuwi kala'ts'inkana', mu katsukukanaka'.
41013031	An lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un ka'ukla'oya,' pero an kinchiwinti jantu.
41013032	Chi tuchi wilhchancha chi panch'e'exi chuncha katapasaya, jantu xamati k'atsay, masi an angelhnin awint'i lakt'iyan chi an Istsálh Dios, wa yucha an ixPayi k'atsay.
41013033	K'as'alaj ts'uk'ut'it chi k'at'ap'aynit'it, mu nt'u k'ats'ayat'iti tani wanancha chuncha katapasaya'.
41013034	Tacha xamati lapanak yu ka'alh ma'at, chi an ixma'tapatsanin kajamalhistaknilhcha an ixcha'a', chi atamj atamjcha yu la'tapatsay. Chi an yu jalhistaknan laka malhticha, kajunkalh li kas'alaj tayalh.
41013035	K'as'alajnant'it, mu nt'u k'ats'ayat'iti tani wanancha kamina an yu jamacha'a', sna ta'oxay, u jaytatnan, u akxni t'asaycha puyux, u wats'isin.
41013036	Para li ntu akxni laklht'at'ayat'iti wa puwalas kachilh.
41013037	Chi ani klajunaw para lhichux, k'as'alajnant'it.
41014001	Wa la'at'uycha wilhchani ists'an'ay para kachilhcha ixpaku paxku chi ixk'atan pan yu ntu lhiyalh lhamaskajan. An xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin ixtalhipuxkawnicha tani katalhi'oxcho'och'apayawlhcha an Jesús, para li katama'nilhcha.
41014002	Chi ixtalajuniy: —Tukan laka k'atan jantu, para li ntu kach'ilili talaknawlh an lapanakni.
41014003	Pero an Jesús, la'acha'an Betaniaja ixt'awnachalh, laxcha'a Simón, yu ixlakap'uch'i'ojota laxts'its'i, sa' ix'wilh laka mesaj. Walh cha'alh pumatam t'aku ixli'anta la'atam lhaklhi perjume laxafrasco sawalh k'usi, yu wanaj la'lhuw, a't'olhicha chi ukmuk'alhcha an Jesús.
41014004	Walh an ali'in talhitalh'amalh, tanajun: —¿Tasu li wa lhitama'chapuycha an perjumeje?
41014005	Yucha layi ixlist'akalh tacha lhajay pumatam lapanak la'at'utu ciento wilhchan chi ixjamala'pitsinikalhcha an jakilhpatinin. —P'ulu p'ulucha ixtalhichiwiniya an t'aku'.
41014006	Pero an Jesús jajuniy: —K'amak'a'unt'itcha; ¿T'asu li ma'ach'ap'uyatcha?, li mu yucha oxi tacha an ki'ilhtulh.
41014007	Uxitnan lhilhiji k'ajat'a'aklats'uk'uya'it'it an jakilhpatinin, layi k'ajaxt'a'niya'it tu'u akxni jaxt'a'nip'ut'unat'it, pero kit'in tu lhilhiji akintilat'a'aklatsukuw.
41014008	Ani t'aku ilhtulhcha yu lay, mu la'asiyaj kilakamuk'alhcha an perjume para li akxni akimaknukana'.
41014009	Aniy sawalhi an yu klajunaw, watanchuncha kalhichiwinkana ani laj'oxi chiwinti, chux lakaamunulhpa, wachu kalhichiwinkana an yu ilhtulh ani t'aku', para li kalhipastakkalh.
41014010	Wachuncha an Judas Iscariote, xapumatam an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jala'alhi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, chi jajunicha li kajama'axta'niya an Jesús.
41014011	Pus yu'uncha akxni ta'alha'asmatlhi talaj'achalhcha, chi tajuniy li kataxta'niya tumin. An Judas ixlipuxkawnicha tani kalhima'axta'lhicha an Jesús.
41014012	Xlila'atamcha wilhchan ixk'atan pan yu ntu lhiyalh lhamaskajan, akxni ma'nikancha borrego para paxku, an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tajuniy: —¿T'anisch'a lak'ask'in ak'aw jala'oxinin para li k'awaycha laka paxku?
41014013	Pus yucha jamala'achalhcha ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan, jajuniy: —K'ap'inchi'it an la'acha'an, chi k'ap'axt'o'a'it pumatam lapanak yu lhi'anta ixkan lax'uyuli', k'ach'a'o'aya'it.
41014014	Tan katanuyanta k'una'it an yu jamacha'a lapanak: An maestro najun: ¿tanischa laka cha'a tan ajkat'alakwayna an kint'alhtanan ixlakata Paxku?
41014015	Yucha katamasuniyan pulaktam aya cha'a talhman ixlitala't'uycha, sawalhcha oxi ilhtukanta, anchacha k'ala'oxinina'it para kitnan.
41014016	Pus ta'alhcha an ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan. Tacha'alhcha an la'acha'an, walh tala'cha'alhcha an lapanak, tacha an ixjajunita an Jesús, chi tamala'asijnilhcha ancha ixlakata an paxku.
41014017	Akxni taputs'isilhcha jat'acha'alhcha an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan,
41014018	chi talaktawilhcha, tsukulhcha talak'wajini an laka mesaj, walh an Jesús jajuniy: —Sawalhi ani yu aklajunaw, xapumatam yu uxitnani akima'axt'a'a', yu wachu kint'alak'wayt'ajun.
41014019	Wachuncha tsukulhcha tala'ta'oxila'alhi, chi atamj atamjcha talhisakmi, tajuniy: ¿Kit'in sna'?
41014020	Yucha jajuniy: —Xapumatam uxitnan ani mimpumakawt'uyk'an, yu kint'atamaj'oy laka pulatoj.
41014021	Sawalhi li an isTs'alh Lapanak ts'ajwi ti'an, tacha an lhits'o'muk'akanta, pero an lapanak an yu kama'axt'a'a an isTs'alh Lapanak kapulhik'atsaya'. Yucha palay oxi jantu kastsukulh.
41014022	Chi ixtalak'wayt'ajunka, an Jesús xa'a'ilh a'xtam pan, xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun chi la'ch'e'elhcha, jala'xta'nilhcha, jajuniy: —K'a'utcha, aniy kilakatunaj.
41014023	Chi xa'a'ipalh vaso yu ixputajun xaxkan uvaj, wachu xta'palhi lhimala'puchajun, chi jaxta'nilhcha, tapulaj'otlhicha ixchuxk'an.
41014024	Jajuniy: — Aniy kijak'alhni, yu sast'icha putamakawkan li ixluwk'ani ijkalhimaj'an kijak'alhni an tacha t'awkan.
41014025	Kit'in klajunaw yu sawalh, tu ali akti'otlhi an xaxkan uvaj, sta akxni akcha'ana an tan ch'alhkatnan Dios, akxniy ak'otcho'oya yu sast'i.
41014026	Akxni talakmilhpa'olhcha la'atam milhpat, ta'alhcha an a'stitawk'a tan junkan lakaa'olivojnin.
41014027	An Jesús jajuniy: —Chaway ani jata'oxana wanaj akilamakaw'oyaw, mu ts'o'muk'akanta an la ixchiwinti Dios tan najun: "Akma'niya an yu jalhist'ak'a ixborregojnin, chi an ixborregojnin wanaj tilh katata'a'pitsi'oya'."
41014028	Pero akxni akla'awcho'oya kit'ini aklatap'ulhniyaw ak'ana xalakaat'un Galilea.
41014029	Wachuncha an Pedro juniy: —Masi katamakaw'ojon, kit'in jantu.
41014030	Pus an Jesús juniy: —Kit'in sawalhi yu ijkunan, ani katats'isiya akxni ntuka' a't'uy t'asay pullux, a't'utu k'anawna'a li nt'u k'imisp'ay.
41014031	Pero yucha ali juniy: —Masi k'ama'nik'a chi kit'in wachu, jantu aktimakajun. Chi an ali'in wachu chuni tajunilh.
41014032	Wachuncha ta'alhcha tanchun tan jalakch'ananankanta tan junkan Getsemaní, jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús: —K'alakt'awlatka aniy, kit'in ikti'an tapaynini'.
41014033	Ja'aylhi'alhcha an Pedro chi an Jacobo chi an Juan, walh tsukulhcha ta'oxila'alhi.
41014034	Jajuniy: —Sawalhcha ta'oxila'alhiya an kintak'atsan, watacha akniyacha ijk'atsan; akilapakxaw aniy, jant'u k'alaklht'at'at'it.
41014035	Lanancha ma'ati alh, lilijcha tatso'ottalh chi tamuntitachalhcha, tsukulhcha tapayni, najun li sna ma layi kamala'pusunikalh an makxkay panch'e'ex yu ixmininita akxni.
41014036	Najun: —Kimpay, kimpay, uxint'i ntu tu'u yu ntucha lay k'a'ilht'u; ak'imala'xt'inunini ani ay lhima'alh'ajna, pero yu tacha uxint'i lak'ask'ini kawalh, jantu yu tacha kit'in iknajun.
41014037	Walh akxni jala'cha'ancho'olh an ixt'alhtanan, ixtaalaklhtatanancha, pus juniy an Pedro: —Simón, ¿Lht'at'ay? ¿Jantu layi masi wa tamcha hora akint'a'alhkujt'i?
41014038	K'ak'ujt'it ch'i k'at'ap'aynit, para li nt'u k'alhila'ts'int'anuk'ant'it li k'a'ilht'up'ut'ut yu ntu oxi. Mu an takuwin yucha ilhtuputuni yu oxi, pero an lakatunaj yucha yu ntu k'ut'ilh.
41014039	A'tam ampalhi tapaynini an Jesús, wanajcha chuni nawpalh tacha an ixnajuntacha p'ulhnaj.
41014040	Walh a'tamcha ixtaalaklhtatanampalayi an ixt'alhtanan akxni jala'cha'ancho'opalh, mu wa sawalhcha ixjala'cha'an ilhtatapututk'an, chi ntucha ixtak'atsay tani katajunilhcha an Jesús.
41014041	Xli'a't'utucha jala'cha'alh jajuniy: —¿Jast'aknant'awnatka ch'i laklht'at'ayatka'? Chilhcha panch'e'ex, an Ists'alh Dios kajama'axta'nikanacha la xmaknik'an an la'ma'lhta'alhinin.
41014042	K'alaj'ost'ayatcha, ka'awcha, jo' mintacha an yu akima'axt'a'a'.
41014043	Ixchiwint'ajunka an Jesús, la'cha'alhcha an Judas, xapumatam an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan, ts'ananacha tat'acha'alhi ali'in lapanakni, ixtalaklhi'antacha ix'espadajk'an chi ixk'iwk'an. Yu'uncha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an laktatanincha ixtamala'achata.
41014044	An ja'o'xcho'onuj Judas la'asiyaj ixjajunitacha tani kajapumasuniyacha, ixjajunita: — Yucha an akla'xtikilhtast'uk'a yu Jesús, k'ach'ap'ayawya'itcha chi k'alhip'ina'itcha.
41014045	Pus akxni la'cha'alhcha, juniy: —Maestro, maestro. Chi la'xtikilhtastuklhicha.
41014046	Wachuncha t'o'cha tala'alhi an Jesús chi tach'apayawlhcha.
41014047	Pero pumatam yu ancha ixma'yalh, xtalaj xa'axtulhi an ix'espada, xtalh akatuch'uk'up'uxli an ixma'tsuku xa'ay sacerdote.
41014048	Chi an Jesús jajuniy: —Watacha wa p'uxk'awyatcha ja'alhawna t'ant'at li kilach'apayawputunaw. Laklhit'ant'atcha mi'espadajk'an chi mink'iwk'an.
41014049	Lhilhiji xaklala'cha'anaw xakmasuy an laka ay tajtan, walh akxni ntu kilach'apayaju; pero wa xliyu li chuncha kuna tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta laxchiwinti Dios.
41014050	Wachuncha tamakaw'olhi an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, talakats'alalhcha.
41014051	Pero pumatam ts'alh ch'a'o'alhi'alh, ixla'axt'a'kanta laka sábana; walh tach'apayawlh,
41014052	pero ayputaxtumakawlhi an sábana, ix'alhalhanti osli.
41014053	Talhicha'anilhcha an Jesús an yu tukancha xa'ay sacerdote, pus anchacha tata'ayxto'olh an ali'incha xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, chi an laktatanincha, chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin.
41014054	An Pedro wa ma'atcha ixch'a'o'alhi'anta sta ixpulakni an tan jalhi'ay laxjatalakxtut an tukancha xa'ay sacerdote, chi ixjat'ala's'on'wilhcha an yu ixtajalhistaknan laka tajtan.
41014055	Walh an xalaj'ajincha sacerdotejnin chi ixchuxk'ancha an yu ancha ixtatanumanalh, ixtalhipuxkawnicha tani katalhima'nilhcha an Jesús; pero ntu tu'u ixtala'cha'anini yu ntu oxi.
41014056	Mu xluwk'ani yu ixtalhimuk'ay yu ntu sawalh, pero tacha an ixtalhimuk'ay tu watami ixtanajun.
41014057	Wachuncha ali'in tatayalh, talhimuk'alhcha yu ntu sawalh, tanajun:
41014058	Kitnan k'alha'asmattawi tan najun: Aklakt'ilhiya ani ay tajtan yu wa laka maka yawkanta, chi xlila'at'utu wilhchan akla'oxicho'oya yu ntu wa laka maka yawkan.
41014059	Pero masi chuncha ntu wa tami tacha an ixtalhimuk'ay.
41014060	Pus an tukancha xa'ay sacerdote japujatayalhi ixtan'ajnik'an, chi lhisakmicha an Jesús, juniy: —¿Jantu tu'u k'at'ija'alht'ayan? ¿Tisuncha tacha ani talhimuk'ayani?
41014061	Yucha ntu ja'alhtayanalh. An tukancha xa'ay sacerdote a'tam lhisakmipalh, juniy: —¿Uxint'i yu Cristo, Ists'alh Dios?
41014062	Pus an Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Chun kit'in; chi kit'in yu ikminta juna watacha Ists'alh Lapanak akilala'ts'inawi akxni akpiktutawlanta an kimPay tan ch'alhkatnan, chi akxni akminanta an lakt'iyan laka jataputs'i.
41014063	Wachuncha an tukancha xa'ay sacerdote, la'lh'alhi an ixla'ch'it wa xliyu talh'amalhcha, chi najun: —¿Tisu wa tiyuchacha ali ma'lhtask'iniyaw ali akintajunini?
41014064	Alha'asmat'at'itcha tacha an wa aya juniy Dios. ¿T'asuch'a nawnat'iti? Pus ixchuxk'ani talakt'asa'olh, tanajun li ma kama'nikalhcha.
41014065	Tsukulhcha tala'achuj'wayi an ali'in, chi tala'puch'ilhcha, ixtalakasamaycha, ixtajuniy: —¡K'alhajachicha tichini muk'anincha! Chi an yu ixtajalhistaknan laka tajtan wachucha lo's lo's ixtala'xtisay.
41014066	An Pedro talaktsini ixt'awnachalh tan jalhi'ay, walh cha'alh pumatam t'aku ixma'tsuku an xa'ay tukan sacerdote,
41014067	pus la'ts'incha tan is'on'wilh an Pedro, chi juniy: —Uxint'i wach'u anch'a ixt'a'aklat'a'un an Jesús yu jamacha'a Nazaret.
41014068	Yucha najun ma jantu, najun: —Tu ijk'atsay t'uch'ini unicha, kit'in tukmispay. Walh taxtulh an tan putanukanachalh, asmat'a t'asaycha an pullux.
41014069	Walh an t'aku a'tam sa' la'ts'impalayi an Pedro, pus jalakjunicha an yu ancha ixtat'ajun: —Ani wachu de yu'uncha.
41014070	Pero an Pedro a'tam nawpalay ma ntu sawalh. Pants'ik'ischa walh, an yu ancha ixtat'ajun a'tamcha tajumpalayi an Pedro: —Chun sawalh, uxint'i de yu'uncha ; mu uxint'i jamacha'a Galilea, ch'i wach'u ch'uni ch'iwini.
41014071	Pus akxni tsukulhcha wa aya najun, chi ixnajuncha li ma sawalh: —Tukmispayi an lapanak yu lhich'iwinat'it.
41014072	Walh t'asalhcha an pullux ixli'a't'uycha, wachuncha pastaklhicha an Pedro tacha an ixjunita an Jesús: —Jantuka' a't'uyi katit'asalh an pullux, a't'utucha k'anawna'a li nt'u k'imisp'ay. —Pus sa'cha lhatapastaknani an Pedro, tsukulhcha alhun.
41015001	Sawalhka wats'isin, tata'ayxto'opalhcha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, chi an laktatanincha, chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, chi ixchuxk'an an israelitajnin yu ixtach'alhkatnan laxla'acha'ank'an. Tach'ilhi'anilhcha an Jesús an Pilato.
41015002	An Pilato lhisakmi, juniy: —¿Uxint'i ixrejk'an judiojnin? —Yucha alhtaylh juniy: —Uxint'ich'a nawt'a'un.
41015003	Pus an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin ixta'alhtasuycha, pero an Jesús tu tu'u ja'alhtaylh.
41015004	A'tam lhisakmipalhi an Pilato juniy: —Tacha an stak talhimuk'ayan ¿jant'u tu'u k'at'ija'alht'ayan?
41015005	An Jesús masi chuncha ntu k'is ja'alhtayanalh; pus an Pilato ixli'a'nicha.
41015006	An Pilato akxni k'atan ixjun ixmakajuni watichicha tach'in yu ixtask'iniy an lapanakni.
41015007	An lakapulach'in ixtanun pumatam tach'in ixjunkan Barrabás, ixjat'atanun ixkompañerojnin yu ixtat'ajama'nininta akxni tat'alasalh jamach'alhkatni.
41015008	Ts'anan tala'cha'alhi an Pilato, tajuniy li ma tacha a'tajcha ilhtuyi ka'ilhtulh.
41015009	Pus an Pilato jajuniy: —¿Lak'ask'inat'iti li akmakawlh an ixrejk'an judiojnin?
41015010	Chuncha jajunilh an Pilato mu yucha ixjak'atsaniya li an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin xliyu ixtalhima'axtani an Jesús li wa ixtaxkaji.
41015011	Wachuncha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin tachiwiwalhi an lapanakni para li katajunilhi an Pilato li yucha an Barrabasi kamakawlh.
41015012	Pus akxni jaxa'alapalh an Pilato, jajumpalay: —¿Pus t'asuch'a nawnat ak'ilhtulh an yu unat li ixrejk'an judiojnini?
41015013	Yu'uncha ixchuxk'ani talakt'asa'opalh tanajun: —¡K'amakxt'ukmuk'acha laka cruz!
41015014	An Pilato jajuniy: —¿Tisuncha tala'alhini ilhtuta? —Pero yu'uncha wa palay p'as ixtalakt'asapalay ixtanajun: —¡K'amakxt'ukmuk'acha laka cruz!
41015015	Pus an Pilato mu sa'cha ixja'ulaputuni an lapanakni tacha an ixtala'talh'amanta, jamakawnilhcha an Barrabás. Chi an Pilato lhinawlhcha an Jesús li kastakcha ta'ayna'lhi, xli'astan ma'axta'lhicha para li kamakxtukmuk'akalhcha.
41015016	Wachuncha an soldadojnin talhi'alhcha tan jalhi'ay junita an laka palacio tan tawlay jamach'alhkat, chi tat'alat'asanilhcha an ali'in ixt'asoldadojnink'an.
41015017	Tamala'ch'inilhcha xmumu la'ch'it, chi tama'tanulhcha corona de jalhtukun.
41015018	Tsukulhcha tamat'asay ixtajuniy: —¡K'ajama'alht'axt'uncha ixrejk'an judiojnin!
41015019	Chi ixtala'pana'acha laka aktiyak chi ixtala'achuj'waycha chi ixtatatso'ottanicha, chi ixtatapayninicha.
41015020	Akxni stakcha tamamaxani'olh, tamaxtunicho'olhcha an xmumu la'ch'it chi tamala'ch'inicho'olhcha an yu ixla'ch'it tukan. Xli'astan talhi'alhcha tan tamakxtukmuk'alhcha laka kruz.
41015021	Pumatam lapanak yu ancha ixla'pust'ajun, wa tanuchilhka an la'acha'an, junkan Simón, jamacha'a Cirene, ixpayk'an Alejandro chi Rufo, ta'asi t'amalhi'anilhi an ixkruz an Jesús,
41015022	tanchun junkan Gólgota, nawputun la'ixla'pa'axi sue'elukut.
41015023	Chi ixtama'ot'oputuncha jamaskajanti xaxkan uvaj yu ixtalhiyawnita lhaklhi perjume junkan mirraj, pero ntu otlhi.
41015024	Akxni tamakxtukmuk'alhcha an Jesús, an soldadojnin talamala'pitsilhcha an ixla'ch'it, wa ta'amanalh suerte, para li tuchini katalhi'alhcha atamj atamj.
41015025	Wats'isini tamakxtukmuk'alh, katacha las nueve.
41015026	An la x'akpuxni ixtats'o'nitacha tuchini talhima'nilhcha, ixtats'o'nita: Ixrejk'an judiojnin.
41015027	Wachu jat'amakxtukmuk'akalh ixt'uyunk'an ja'alhawnan, ixtapiktutamincha ixjat'ayawkanta tan laxcruschak'an, lhilaxjama'xi chi tan oxi ixmaka'.
41015028	Ts'awjcha tapasalh tacha an najunta laxchiwinti Dios, tan najunta: —Wa tachanu wa aycha ma'lhta'alhini wachu talhimalakxtulh.
41015029	Yu ancha ixtala'pusa xkayajcha ixtajuni chi wili, wilicha ixtatalakpayajuy. Xtajuniy: —¡ Li k'axlakt'ilhi tajtan, chi li wa la'at'utu wilhchan k'axla'oxich'o'ocha,
41015030	¡Chaway k'ama'alht'axt'uk'acha mi'akstu, chi k'at'a'alht'a'ut'icha an laka kruz!
41015031	An xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin, wanajcha chuni ixtamamaxani, ixtajuniy: Ali'in jama'alhtaxtulh chi yucha ntucha layi ma'alhtaxtunikan ix'akstu
41015032	¡Kata'alhtajulhcha an laka kruz an Cristo, xarey Israel, kala'ts'inawcha, chuncha kakiklaka'iyawcha! Chi masi an yu anchacha ixjat'amakxtukmuk'akanta, wachu ixtamamaxaniya an Jesús.
41015033	Atunkulhcha, taputs'isi'olhi chux an lakaat'un, sta las tres akxni ta'oxaycha.
41015034	Pus las trescha an Jesús, p'asi chiwinilh, najun: —Eloí, Eloí, ¿lama sabactani? nawputun: KiDios, kiDios ¿tasu li k'imak'a'unt'acha?
41015035	Akxni ta'alha'asmatlhi an yu ancha ixtayanalh, talajuniy: —¡Jo'! t'asani an Elías.
41015036	Pumatam jats'alaj'alh, mala'ch'uch'uwalh la'atam wa tacha panimak laka vinagre, chi kinkach'imuk'alhcha laka ma'atam k'iw, para li kapuma'ot'ulhcha, chi jajuniy an ali'in: —K'amak'a'untcha, kala'ts'inawcha li kamina ma'alhtajunu an Elías.
41015037	Walh an Jesús p'asi chiwimpalh, nilhcha.
41015038	Wa akxni an la'ch'it yu ix'uk'alh an laka tajtan lht'it'in tapu'exli, aklht'uyi walh, an talhmani pu'a'taynichalh sta talaktsin.
41015039	An ixkapitank'an an soldadojnin oxi la'ts'ilh an Jesús akxni t'asalh chi nilh, pus najun: —"Chun sawalh, ani lapanak Ists'alhi an Dios".
41015040	Ali'in t'akunin wachu ani ixtayanalh wa ma'atcha ixtalaka'an. Ancha ixma'yalh an María Magdalena, chi an María ixnatik'an Jacobo xalakat'ikt'i chi José, chi pumatam t'aku yu ancha ixjat'ayapalh yucha an Salomé.
41015041	Ani t'akunin ixtach'a'o'ayi an Jesús chi ixta'a'tayjuy akxni ixt'awnachalh Galilea; chi ali'incha t'akunin yu wachu ixtat'a'anta Jerusalén ancha wachu ixtayanalh.
41015042	Tats'isilhcha, chi mu akxniy ixmala'asijnikan para li kajastaknankana katunkunanta,
41015043	an José, jamacha'a Arimatea jantu talhanan, la'alhi an Pilato, kisk'inilhi an ixlakatunaj an Jesús. Mu yucha wachu ixpakxan'iya an ixlich'alhkat an Dios, chi yucha wachu ay lapanaki ixjunita an tan ix'alin lakchiwinti laka ay juntaj.
41015044	Jantu ixliwilayi an pilato li ixnitacha an Jesús, pus t'asanilhi an ixcapitank'an an soldadojnin chi lhisakmilhcha.
41015045	An capitán juniya li chun sawalh, pus an José makawnikalhcha an ixlakatunaj an Jesús.
41015046	Ixtamajutacha alhtam sábana, yuchacha pula'apamililh akxni ma'alhtajulhcha, chi maknulhcha tanchun ixtantilhpatakanta laktalhpa, an tan ixputanukan yawnilhcha aya chiwx.
41015047	An María Magdalena chi an María ixnati José tala'ts'ini tan maknukalh.
41016001	La'puslicha an wilhchan akxni jastaknankan, an María Magdalena chi an María ixnati Jacobo, chi an Salomé, takilaktamawlhcha laklhaklhi perjume yu kata'ana lakamuk'anin an ixlakatunaj an Jesús.
41016002	Pus xlila'atamcha wilhchan a'taynicho'olh samana, sawalhka wats'isin, ta'alhcha an tan aknuy Jesús, chi jask'unulhcha.
41016003	Talajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha akintama'osuniyan an chiwx an tan putanukani?
41016004	Walh akxni tacha'alh, tala'ts'in mala'xtinukanta an aya chiwx.
41016005	Chi tatanuchalh tala'ts'in ch'up'e' wilh pumatam ts'alh, lhilaka oxi ixpa'xti an puta'aknun, wanaj lhmani an sut'ut'u ixla'ch'it, pus ixtalaktalhanancha.
41016006	Yucha jajuniy: —Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'it; ¿yucha an ka tamakxtukmuk'alh Jesús jamacha'a Nazareti p'uxk'awyat'it? yucha la'awcho'olhcha, tucha tu'u tanun; jo' k'ala'ts'int'it, tucha tu'u malh an tan ixtamamata.
41016007	K'ajak'i'unit'iti an ixt'alhtanan chi an Pedro, Yucha katatap'ulhniyan ka'ana xalakaat'un Galileaja, ancha k'ala'ts'int'achi'it tacha tajunin.
41016008	An t'akunin so'ojo tataxtulh an tan ix'aknuy mu ixtalaktalhanancha, wa xk'ip'ip'icha ixtalay; tu k'is xamati tu'u ixtajuni mu ixtalaktalhanancha.
41016009	Mu ixla'awcho'otacha wats'isin an Jesús, yu xlila'atamcha wilhchan a'taynicho'olh samana, yucha an María Magdalenajcha p'ulhnaj talakasunilh, yu ixk'uch'uta akxni ixtala'apaxto'ta la'atujun makxkay'un.
41016010	Pus yucha alh jamak'atsanini an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tan ixtalhita'oxila'alhi chi ixtalhi'alhun.
41016011	Akxni ta'alha'asmatlhi an María Magdalena, li t'ajuni an Jesús chi li la'ts'ilh, jantu takiklaka'ilh.
41016012	La'puslicha panch'e'ex, an Jesús tamcha jalhitalakasunipalh ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan, akxni ixtat'ajun tanchun laka tij, ma'spa an la'acha'an.
41016013	Chi yu'uncha wachucha tat'alajunilhi an ali'in ixt'alhtanank'an; walh wachu ntu jakiklaka'ikalh.
41016014	Xli'astan jatalakasunilhcha an Jesús an ixpumakawtamk'an ixt'alhtanan akxni ixtalakwilanan'olh laka mesaj, chi jalaj'aymalhi mu ntu ixtat'alakiklaka'iya an ali'in li ixtala'ts'intacha li ixla'awcho'otacha, mu sawalhcha lakt'ak'alha ixtajuninita an ixjalhunutk'an.
41016015	Chi jajuniy: —K'ap'inchi'it'iti ta ixlijalhi'ay an lakamunulhpa chi ixchuxk'ani k'ajalak'unit'it an lapanakni an laj'oxi chiwinti.
41016016	Yu kakiklaka'iya chi ka'a'paxa, kata'alhtaxtuya'; pero yu ntu katikiklaka'ilh, kala'a'iya lhima'alh'ajna.
41016017	Chunchuniya katamasuya an yu tajakiklaka'inin: layi katak'uch'uya lakintalakask'i an yu wa tala'apaxt'o'a maxkay'un, chi layi katachiwinina tipalhuw tumpaj chiwinti.
41016018	Layi katach'apayanta tsapulin, chi masi kata'otlhi veneno, tu katitalhinilh; katalakpach'apaya an ta'an'anin, chi katatak'uch'uya'.
41016019	Xli'astan jaxa'ala'olh an jamach'alhkat Jesús, lhi'ankalhcha an lakt'iyan, piktutawlhchalhcha tan oxi ixpa'xti an Dios.
41016020	Chi yu'uncha an ixt'alhtanan tataxtunilhcha talhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios, ta ixlijalhi'ay, chi an jamach'alhkat Jesús ixja'a'tayjuycha, ixjamasunicha an lapanakni li an ixchiwinti Dios sawalh, tacha an ixtala'ts'incha yu la'lhi'a'nin tanlhun ixlaktapasay. Chunchacha kawalh.
42001001	Ixluwk'ancha yu ta'a'taynita tats'o'a tani laktapasalhcha an tanlhun yu k'atsayaw kitnan li sawalh,
42001002	tacha an kintalakmasunin yu la ixla'chulhk'an tala'ts'ilh akxni a'taynichalh, chi mu yu'uncha jalhimap'a'sikalh li katalaknawlh an chiwinti,
42001003	kit'in wachu oxi iklhiwilay, mu oxicha xlak'anti iklhakapu'alh chux an tanlhun, tanchunchaa pu'a'taynichalh. Pus chawayi Teófilo uxint'i mu ayk'at'i lapanak akts'o'niyani ixlakata aniy tanlhun tanischa yu pu'aklaminchalh,
42001004	para li oxi k'ak'ats'at'i an yu sawalh t'ach'a an masunik'ant'acha.
42001005	Akxni ixjunita rey an Herodes, xalakat'un Judea, ixt'ajun pumatam sacerdote ixjunkan Zacarías ixjat'atala'xt'o'a an Abías; chi yu ixt'iwi ixjunita Elisabet ixjunkan, ixt'alalhila'ts'i an Aarón.
42001006	An ixt'uyunk'an oxi ixtat'ajun la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios, chi ixta'ilhtuy sawalhi an ixlamap'a'sin an Dios chi yu ixjalhijuni kata'ilhtulh pus tu xamati lay tu'u ixjalhimuk'ay.
42001007	Pero ntu ixtalhit'ajuniy ixjas'at'ank'an, mu an Elisabet tu lay ixjamas'at'anan, chi an ixt'uyunk'an laj'ajincha ixtajunita.
42001008	Walh milh wilhchan akxni an Zacarías yucha ixtapatsat'ajun ixlisacerdote la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios, chux ali an yu ixjat'ata'ayxt'o'a.
42001009	Ta'amanalh suerte chi yucha la'cha'alh li kala'xawalh an cenciaj, tacha ixtalhilaniycha an sacerdotejnin, pus tanulhcha an Zacarías tan wa lhilakatijtam ma'axta'kan lha'ulan an Dios.
42001010	Chi chux an lapanakni ma'spacha ixtatapaynit'ajun akxni ixla'xawat'ajuncha an cenciaj.
42001011	Walh talakasunilh pumatam ix'angelh an Diosi an Zacarías, sa'cha ixyalh tan oxi ixpa'xti an tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan tan ixla'xawat'ajun an cenciaj.
42001012	Pus an Zacarías akxni la'ts'ilh an angelh talhanalh.
42001013	Pero an angelh juniy an Zacarías: —Zacarías, jant'u k'at'alhan; mu amintapaynit asmatnik'acha, chi amint'iwi Elisabet kaxta'niyan pumatami mints'alh, Juan k'a'ulaniya'a ixta'a'ut.
42001014	Sawalhcha oxi k'alhiwilaya'a, k'a'ach'ana'a, chi ixluwk'ani yu sawalhcha katalaj'achana akxni katsukuyacha.
42001015	Mu ayi kajuna la ix'ukxlakapu Dios. Jantu kati'otlhi xaxkan uvaj chi k'uch'u, sawalhcha kalhitsukuya an ixTakuwin Dios, masi palaktajunka an ixnati.
42001016	Ka'ilhtuya li ixluwk'an an jamacha'an Israel katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios yu xJamach'alhkatk'an.
42001017	Chi an Juan katap'ulhniya an Cristo kalhichiwinina an ixchiwinti Dios la ixTakuwin an Dios, chi la ix'alhp'asninti an Elías, para li an xalakpaynin katat'ala'oximixnicho'olhcha an ixjas'at'ank'an, chi an yu ntu k'is taja'asmatnan kataja'asmatnalhcha tacha an yu taja'asmatnan, para li axkni kachina an Jamach'alhkat taja'asmatnancha kajala'china'.
42001018	An Zacarías juniy an angelh: —¿Tasucha aklhik'atsalh li sawalhi an yu k'i'uniya? Mu kit'in k'aycha chi an kint'iwi wachucha ay.
42001019	An angelh alhtaylh juniy: —Kit'in ijGabriel, la ix'ukxlakapu an Diosi ikt'ajun; yuchaa kimala'achatachalh para li akmin mak'atsaaninin ani laj'oxi chiwinti.
42001020	Chaway jant'u lay k'at'ich'iwin, sta akxni chunchacha katapasaya', mu nt'u k'ink'iklak'a'it'i tacha an ijkunan li katapasaya akxni kachinacha ixpanch'e'ex.
42001021	An lapanakni sa'cha ixtapakxanta an Zacarías, tucha ixtalhimacha'xayi tuchini ntucha so'oj ixlitaxtuy an laka tajtan.
42001022	Walh akxni taxtulhcha, jantucha lay ixjaxa'alay, pus talhimacha'xanilhcha li tu'u talakasunilh an laka tajtan. Wa ixjatamakyawniycha; chunchacha taylhi'alh tuchalay ixchiwiniy.
42001023	Akxni la'tsalhcha wilhchan yucha ixtapatsat'ajun ixlisacerdote, ancho'olhcha ixcha'a'.
42001024	Xli'astan an Elisabet an ixt'iwi an Zacarías, ja'aynalhcha, pus la'akisi malhkuyu jantucha ixtaxtuy la ixcha'a', ixnajun:
42001025	An Dios oxi lapanak, chaway kima'osunilhcha an maxanti xaklhit'ajun la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an ali'in.
42001026	Xlila'achaxancha malhkuyu, an Dios mala'achalh an ix'angelh junkan Gabriel tanchun xala'acha'an Galilea junkan Nazaret,
42001027	tan ixwilh pumatam jatsi ixjunkan María, tuka' ixt'atsukukan, pero isk'in'ulatacha pumatam ts'alh ixjunkan José, ixt'alalhila'ts'i an rey David.
42001028	Pus an angelh tanuchalhi tan ixwilh an María, juniy: —¡Sawalhch'a map'aynik'an! An Dios lhistaktan; chux tacha an tat'ajun an t'akunin, uxint'i sawalhch'a oxi la'ts'ink'an.
42001029	Akxni chunchacha alha'asmatlhi chi chunchacha la'ts'ilh an María an ángelh, tucha ixlimacha'xaniy tuchi jala'axa'alanticha tacha an junilh, ixtalhanancha.
42001030	Pus an angelh juniy a María: —Jant'u k'at'alhan, mu an Dios oxi lhiwilayan.
42001031	Chaway k'ap'akxana'a mijas'at'a, k'alhits'uk'uya'a pumatam mints'alh, chi k'a'ulaniya'a ixta'a'ut Jesús.
42001032	Yucha ay lapanaki kajuna', chi isTs'alh yu wilhchalh talhmani kajunkana'. An Jamach'alhkat Dios, reje ka'ilhtuya tacha an David yu ma'anchacha ta ixlila'ts'in.
42001033	Yucha ixpujun'alhincha kach'alhkatnaniya an ixla'acha'an Jacob, tu a'tam katimin'olhi an ixlich'alhkat.
42001034	Wa chuncha an María alhtaylh an angelh juniy: —¿Pero tasicha li ntuka' ikt'at'awkani?
42001035	An angelh alhtaylh juniy: —Yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini kala'chinan, chi an ix'alhp'asninti an yu wilhchalh talhman Dios kamatanchaniyan la ixma'stele', xliyu an stalan'a jas'at'a katsukuya, Ists'alh Diosi kajunkana'.
42001036	An mint'alalhila'ts'i Elisabet, an yu ixtajuniy li ntu lay jamas'at'anan wachu kalhitsukuya pumatam ists'alh masi yucha nanacha, la'achaxancha malhkuyu chaway yucha pakxanta.
42001037	Mu an Dios yucha jantu tu'u yu ntucha lay ka'ilhtulh.
42001038	Pus akxni an María najun: —Kit'in ixma'tsuku an Dios; kachajcha walhi la kijatsukunti t'ach'a an k'i'uniy. Pus an angelh akxni ancho'olhcha.
42001039	Alhcha lakats'uniya panch'e'ex, an María sawalhcha so'oyi alh tanchun a'stitawk'a la'acha'an, xalakat'un Judá,
42001040	walh tanuchalhcha la ixcha'a an Zacarías, pus la'axa'alaycha an Elisabet.
42001041	Walh akxni asmatlhicha an Elisabet li la'axa'alay an María, an ixpalaktajun ixjas'at'a an Elisabet jalht'ujnulh. Chi wanajcha la'tanu'olhi an Elisabet an Stalan'a ixTakuwin,
42001042	pus p'aschaa chiwiniy najun: —Chux an t'akunin, uxint'i sawalhch'a map'aynik'an chi an palaktajuman mijas'at'a.
42001043	¿Tasu li kit'inchaa kila'minta pixiyalhna an ixnati kiJamach'alhkati?
42001044	Mu watacha k'alha'asmatni k'ila'axa'alat'i, sawalhcha achaniy jalht'ujnulh la kimpalakni an jas'at'a.
42001045	Sawalhcha oxi para uxint'i li k'iklak'a'it'i yu junin an Dios, mu chunchaa katapasaya'.
42001046	Wachuncha an María najun: —La kintak'atsaan ijkuniya an Dios li yucha ay.
42001047	Chi an kiJama'alhtaxtunuj Dios ma'an'achayi an kintakuwin,
42001048	mu yucha lhakapu'alhi masi wa ixjakilhpatinij ma'tsukucha. Chaway, sta chaway chux tacha an kala'aw'ankana katanawna li sawalhcha oxi yu ikputapasalh.
42001049	Mu an yu lay ilhtu'ojoy wa tuchicha, laj'ay tanlhuni pu'ilhtut'ajun an kijatsukunti. Yucha Stalan'a junkan.
42001050	Chi tacha an la'aw'ankanta yucha si mapayniya yu kiklaka'iy.
42001051	Yucha laj'ay tanlhuni ilhtulh la xmaka'. Ilhtulhi li ntu kawalhi tacha an ixtapast'ak'a an yu wa talaj'ayajk'atsay.
42001052	Jamaxtunilhi an ixlich'alhkatk'an an laj'ajin jamach'alhkatni, yu'uncha an wa tajakilhpatinijk'atsayi xalaj'ajin ja'ilhtulh.
42001053	An yu ixtalakchawaniy jaxta'nilhi yu ixtama'lhtask'iniy. Chi an jamatuminin wanaj jamaxtuni'olhi ixtanlhunk'an, wachunchacha jamala'achacho'olh.
42001054	Ja'a'tayjulhi an jamacha'an Israel, yu'uncha tacha ixma'tsukunin, jantu kapmaj'alhi an ixjamapayninti
42001055	tacha ixjajunita an kilakpaynink'an. Masunikalhcha an jamapayninti an Abraham chi an yu katapu'a'p'un'ana, mu ixpujun'alhincha.
42001056	An María t'atamakawlhi an Elisabet la ixcha'a ka tacha la'at'utu malhkuyu'. Ixli'astan ancho'olhcha la ixcha'a.
42001057	Akxni cha'alhcha wilhchan lhitsukulh ixjas'at'a an Elisabet, ts'alhi lhitsukulh.
42001058	Chi an yu wani ixjat'awilh chi an taa ixjalhila'ts'in talakcha'alhcha akxni tak'atsaalh, sawalhcha tat'alaj'achan, mu an Dios masunilhi an Elisabet an ay ixjamapayninti.
42001059	La'atsajincha wilhchan cha'alh, talhi'alhcha an jas'at'a tan akach'uk'up'uxnikalh an ix'a'axt'a'a. Chi tacha an junkancha ixpayi ixtalhimapa'a'uputun, ma Zacarías.
42001060	Pero an ixnati jajuniy: —Jantu, jantu chuni junkan, kajunkana Juan.
42001061	Pus ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —¿Tasu'u? Tu xamati t'aa lhila'ts'in yu chuncha junkan.
42001062	Pus wachuncha tatamakyawniycha an ixpay an jas'at'a tani jumputuncha yucha.
42001063	Yucha jask'inilh lakat'ikt'i lht'a'alak'iw chi anchacha ts'o'lhi, najun: —Juani junkan. Pus sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni.
42001064	Chi wanaj wa akxni an Zacarías laycha chiwincho'olh, tsukulhcha oxi lhipast'ak'a an Dios.
42001065	Ixchuxk'an an yu wani ixjat'awilh sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan; chi taa ixlijalhi'ay an ixla'a'a'stitawk'an Judea ixlaknawkancha tacha an tapasalh.
42001066	Yu ixta'asmat'a ixtapast'ak'a: —¿Tisuncha ixlijunti kajuna ani jas'at'a? Mu an Dios ixlistakta an jas'at'a.
42001067	An Zacarías, an ixpay an jas'at'a, la'chilhi an Stalan'a ixTakuwin Dios chi manawnilhi yu katapasaya', najun:
42001068	Lhimala'puchajuncha an Dios ixJamach'alhkat Israel, mu jala'pixiyalhnalhcha an ixlapanakni, chaway jama'alhtaxtulhcha.
42001069	Kintamakminincha pumatami yu lay jama'alhtaxtunun, pumatam yu taa lhila'ts'in an David, an ixma'tsuku Dios.
42001070	Tacha an ixjamanawnita an la'stalan'an ixlapanakni yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti ma'anchacha,
42001071	li akintamala'xtinuniyani an yu sawalh kintaxkayan chi an yu ntu k'is kintala'ts'imputunan,
42001072	li kapast'ak'a tacha an ixjat'atamakajunta laka laj'oxi ixchiwinti an yu japu'a'p'unmincha'aw, li kajalhi'a'tayjuya'.
42001073	An kimpayk'an Abraham jurarlanikalh, tan junkan:
42001074	Li ka'ilhtuya an Dios katsukuyaw tucha xamati akintitaxkayajla'ts'in, li kinta'achaninchak'ani kat'atapatsayaw,
42001075	laka la'stalan'a jatsukunti chi laka laj'oxi lanti la ix'ukxlakapu', chux wilhchan la kijatsukuntik'an.
42001076	Chi uxint'i kints'alh, uxint'i kapuchiwininan an yu talhman wilhchalh, mu k'at'ap'ulhniya'a an Jamach'alhkat para li k'ala'oxinin an ixtij.
42001077	K'ajamak'ats'aaniya'a an ixlapanakni li yucha jamala'mixiniya ixtala'alhink'an para li katata'alhtaxtulh.
42001078	Mu an kiDiosk'an ay jamapayninti lhit'ajun, an lakt'iyan la'atam jatapulhkunu akintamapulhkuniyan.
42001079	Kajamapulhkuniya an yu lakaaputs'isni tat'ajun chi an yu la ixma'stele' lhinin tat'ajun. Akintapulhi'anani tan oxi tij.
42001080	An jas'at'a tacha ixta'ayay, wachu palay k'ut'ilhi ixjun la ixtakuwin. Chi tan jantu la'acha'ani ta'ayalh sta akxni tsukulhcha jalhixa'alay an ixchiwinti Dios an israelitajnini talakasulh tan lhilhuw.
42002001	Lanancha alhi panch'e'ex ixlila'ajunta an jama'paxanaj Juan, an ay xajamach'alhkat Roma ixjunkan Augusto César, lhinawlh li kasakkalh censo taa ixlijalhi'ay an Roma.
42002002	Aniy p'ulhnaj censo sakkalh, akxni gobernador ixjunita an Cirenio xalakaat'un Siria.
42002003	Atamj atamjcha ixta'an tats'o'nin tanchuncha la ixla'acha'ank'an.
42002004	Xliyu an José taxtulhi Nazaret, xalakaat'un Galilea, chi alhcha Belén, xalakaat'un Judea, la ixla'acha'an an rey David yu ma'anchacha taa ixlila'ats'in an José.
42002005	Anchacha ta'alh tats'o'nin an José ali an María tacha ixt'iwicha, pero ntuka' ixt'at'ajun. An María ixja'aynantacha.
42002006	An la'acha'anka Beleni ixtat'ajun, walh cha'alhcha wilhchan li an María kata'oxiyacha.
42002007	Pus anchacha lhitsukulh yu p'ulhnajcha ixjas'at'a, pasmililhcha la ixtipa'at chi p'ilikscha mamalh tan ixjamawakan jatapakxat, mu ntucha inta ixjunita yu para yu'uncha tan laka cha'a'.
42002008	Wanicha ancha lanan tan wa jalhi'ay, ixtat'ajun yu ixtalhist'ak'a ixborregojk'an puts'ista.
42002009	Walh jatalakasunilh an ix'angelh an Dios. Xlimjcha jamapulhkunilhi tuntala'acho'o an Dios; pus sawalhcha talaktalhanalh.
42002010	Pero an angelh jajuniy: —Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'it, kit'in klalhiminitaw laj'oxi chiwinti, yu oxi k'alhiwilaya'it'it chi ixchuxk'an an ali'in.
42002011	Chaway tsukulhcha an la ixla'acha'an David yu katama'alhtaxtuniyan, yucha an Cristo, yucha Jamach'alhkat.
42002012	Chunchuniya k'ap'ula'ch'ip'ina'it'it an jas'at'a: K'ala'ch'ip'ina'it'it tan pasmilhmakanta la ixtipa'at tan jamawakan jatapakxat.
42002013	Wa akxni, lhuw angelhnin yu tat'ajun an lakt'iyani tat'atalakasulh an angelh, ixtalhilakmilhpaycha an Dios, ixtanajun:
42002014	¡An Dios ayi an talhman chi an lakaat'un oxi sa' ja'ulay an yu tala'a'iy an ixjamapayninti!
42002015	Akxni ta'ancho'olhcha an angelhnin lakt'iyan, an yu ixtalhist'ak'a ixborregojk'an talajuniy: —Ka'awi sta Belén, ka'aw la'ts'inini an yu kintamak'atsaanin an Dios li tapasalh".
42002016	Pus watukan ta'alh, p'asi ta'alh; walh tala'cha'alhcha an María chi an José, chi an jas'at'a sa'cha ixmalh an tan tawajin jatapakxat.
42002017	Akxni tala'ts'ilhcha an jas'at'a, tanajuncha tani ixjalhixa'alakantacha.
42002018	Pus ixchuxk'an an yu ta'asmatlhi, sawalhcha talhi'a'nilhi tacha an tanawlh an yu ixtalhist'ak'a ixborregojk'an.
42002019	Pero an María yucha wa la ixjalhunutcha sa' ixlhatapastaknan'ojoy chux tacha an ixlaktapasay.
42002020	An yu ixtalhist'ak'a ixborregojk'an ta'ancho'olhcha, oxicha talhilakchiwij'alh an Dios chi ixtaxta'niycha lhimala'puchajun, xliyu li tacha an tala'ts'ilhcha chi tacha an ta'asmatlhicha, mu chunchacha ixjajunkanta.
42002021	Akxni ilhtulhcha la'atsajin wilhchan an jas'at'a, akaxwililich'uk'up'uxnikalhcha an ix'a'axt'a'a, chi Jesuscha junikalh, tacha ixnajunta an angelh li kajunkana' akxni ntuka' istsukuy.
42002022	Chi akxni ta'a'tsalhcha wilhchan para li laycha kata'alh stalan'ancho'onin an ixpay chi an ixnati an Jesús, tacha najun an ixlamap'a'sin an Moisés, an José chi an María ta'alhcha Jerusalén malakasuninini an Dios an jas'at'a.
42002023	Chunchacha ta'ilhtulh mu an la ixlamap'a'sin an Dios chuncha ts'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: —Yu p'ulhnaj katsukuya jas'at'a li ts'alh, yucha an Diosi kama'axta'nikana'.
42002024	Chi para li katastalan'ancho'olhcha tacha an najunta la ixlamap'a'sin an Dios, kalhi'ankalh la'at'uy tuluway u la'at'uy paloma, yuchacha kajama'nikalh.
42002025	Akxni chuncha tapasalh, ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak an Jerusalén ixjunkan Simeón, sawalh ixjakiklaka'inin chi oxi lapanak, ixpakxan'iya li an la'acha'an Israel kata'alhtaxtulh. An Stalan'a Takuwin xt'a'aklat'ajuni an Simeón,
42002026	pus ixjunita li ntuka' katinilhi li ntuka' la'ts'ini an Cristo yu yucha Jamach'alhkat Dios kamala'achayanta.
42002027	An Stalan'a Takuwin ilhtulhi li an Simeón ka'alhi an laka tajtan. Walh akxni, an ixpaynin an Jesús talhicha'alhcha an laka tajtan, para li kata'ilhtuyacha tacha an najun laka lhamap'a'sin.
42002028	An Simeón jama'alhtaylhi an jas'at'a chi xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios najun:
42002029	Chaway chuni, Jamach'alhkat, tapasalhcha t'ach'a an xak'i'unit'a, chaway lhi'achacha ak'imak'aw li ajkastaknalhcha, mu kit'in mima'tsuku'.
42002030	Chaway kla'ts'ilhcha an minpama'alhtaxtun,
42002031	takilhmakchux lapanakni tala'ts'incha li mala'asijnit'acha.
42002032	Yucha tacha jatapulhkunu', kajaxa'ala'oya an la'acha'anaxni, chi an xalapanakni Israel ayi katapujuna'.
42002033	Tacha an ixlichiwint'ajun an Simeón an Jesús, sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya an ixpay chi an ixnati.
42002034	Chi an Simeón tapayninilhcha an Dios para oxi katatsukulh. An Simeón juniy an María: —Ani jas'at'a lhimakminkanta para li xluwk'ani katata'a'talh u xluwk'ani kata'ostayalh an xalapanakni Israel. Chi xluwk'ani yu ntu k'is katitala'ts'imputulh.
42002035	Pus chunchacha kapuk'atsakana tanischa tajatapastaknan an lapanakni. (Uxint'i tachanu wanaj an la mintak'atsani kapala'pusa espada).
42002036	Wachu ani ixt'ajun pumatam t'aku junkan Ana, istsi Fanuel, ixt'alalhila'ts'i an Aser, ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti an Dios. Nanacha ixjunita. Lakat'ikt'ika lanani t'atsukukalh, pero cha'alh la'atujun k'ata nimakawtijlakalh.
42002037	Pus t'at'ip'uxamt'at'i k'ata (84) wa ix'akstucha ixt'ajun. Jantucha ixtaxtuyi an laka tajtan, wa anchacha ixt'atapatsay an Dios, ixlitask'ajayi, akxni jantu ixwajin, chi tunku chi ts'isii xtapayniy.
42002038	An Ana jala'cha'alhi akxni ancha ixtayanalh, tsukulhcha xta'niya lhimala'puchajun an Dios, chi ixjalhixa'alaycha an jas'at'a ixchuxk'an an yu ixtapakxan'iy li an Jerusalén kata'alhtaxtulh.
42002039	Akxni taki'ilhtu'olhcha tacha an najunta la ixlamap'a'sin an Jamach'alhtkat, ixli'astan ta'ancho'olhcha ixla'acha'ank'an Nazaret, xalakaat'un Galilea.
42002040	An jas'at'a tachapuncha tsukulh ta'ayay, sawalhcha tsukulh jalakpastaknan chi an Dios ixmapayniy, ixlist'ak'a.
42002041	An ixpaynin an Jesús chux k'ata ixta'an Jerusalén la ixk'atan paxku.
42002042	Akxni la'tsalhcha la'akawt'uy k'ata an Jesús, ta'alhi k'atan Jerusalén tacha ixlismanikantacha, ixchuxk'ani ta'alh.
42002043	Akxni tamincho'ochalhcha, mu la'ochalhcha an k'atan, tamakawchalhi an Jesús Jerusalén, tu talhakapu'ani an ixpaynin.
42002044	Ixtanajun li sna inta ma'minta, tam wilhchancha tajalhtanalh. Walh akxni tapuxkajuycha tan ixtalakminta yu taa talhila'ts'in chi yu tat'alamispay,
42002045	jantu tala'cha'alh, pus ta'ampalhi Jerusalén puxkawnin.
42002046	La'at'utucha wilhchan walh, laka tajtani tala'cha'alh, sa'cha ixjapujawilh an yu ixtamasuy lhamap'a'sin, ixja'asmatniycha chi ixjalhisakmiycha.
42002047	Ixchuxk'an an yu ixta'alha'asmat'a an Jesús sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niniya an ixjatapast'ak'at chi tacha an ixja'alhtajiy.
42002048	Akxni tala'ts'ilhcha an ixpaynin ixtalhi'a'nicha, an ixnati juniy: —Kints'alh ¿Tasu li chunchacha kila'ilhtuyawi? Aminpay chi kit'in tucha oxi ijk'atsanaw li ntucha lay xaklalhitajuyaw.
42002049	An Jesús jajuniyan ixpaynin: —¿Tasu li kilapuxkawyawcha, ch'unt'u k'ats'ayat'iti li an la ixcha'a kimPayi lhitask'ini aktawilh?
42002050	Pero yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xanilhi tacha an jajunilh.
42002051	Wachuncha, jat'ataju'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Nazaret an ixpaynin chi taylhi'alhi ixja'asmatni yu ixtajuniy. An ixnati an Jesús wa ixma'a'ojoycha la ixjalhunuti tacha an ixla'ts'in.
42002052	An Jesús tacha ixta'ayay wachu palay ixjalakpastaknan, chi an Dios ixmapayni chi an lapanakni wachu ixtamapayniy.
42003001	La'akawkisicha k'ata ixch'alhkatnant'ajun an ay jamalch'alhkat Tiberio, akxni gobernador ixjunita an Poncio Pilato, xalakaat'un Judea, chi an Herodes ixch'alhkatnan xalakaat'un Galilea, chi an ixt'aala'ajun junkan Felipe ixch'alhkatnant'ajun xalakaat'un Iturea chi Traconite, chi an Lisanias ixch'alhkatnan xalakaat'un Abilinia,
42003002	chi akxni tukancha xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin ixtajunita an Anás chi an Caifás, an Dios xa'alalhi an Juan, ists'alh Zacarías, tan wa la'asa'nik'a.
42003003	Pus yucha alhcha ta'a'cho'onu an la'acha'anaxni yu waniy an ayxkan Jordán ixlaklhitamakawni, ixjajuniy an lapanakni li katamapaxalhcha ixjatapast'ak'atk'an, chi li kata'a'paxlicha para li an Dios kajamala'mixinilhi ixtala'alhink'an.
42003004	Tapasalhcha tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta laka libro an ixchiwinti Isaias yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tan najun: —Pasi chiwinkan an tan tu la'acha'an, nawkan: "K'amala'asijnit'itcha an ixtij an Jamach'alhkat; k'ala'ts'awalanitcha an tan kapumina'.
42003005	Tan wa japulh'ot'alh kajat'ap'ujununkana', chi tan lakaa'a'stitawk'an ja'o'spiti ka'ilhtukana'. An tij yu la'lh'awilh kalats'awalakana', chi tan wa la'jalh'ot'alh an laka tij kajat'ap'ujununkana'.
42003006	Chux lapanak kala'ts'ina an ixjama'alhtaxtunti an Dios.
42003007	Akxni ixtala'cha'ancha an lapanakni an Juan para li kajama'paxalh ixjajuniy: —¡Xjas'at'ank'an tsapulin! ¿Tisiyuchacha tajunan li k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'it'iti an laka lhima'alh'ajna yu minta?
42003008	Pus k'a'ilht'utcha yu oxicha tanlhun para li katasulhcha li mak'a'unt'itcha mintala'alhink'an, ch'int'u k'ap'ast'akt'iti li mimpayk'an sna an Abraham, mu an Dios yucha layi kaja'ilhtulh ixjas'at'an an Abraham ani lakwilh chiwx.
42003009	An achaj chaway wachucha mala'asijnikanta para li chux an k'iw yu ntu oxi xt'a'a xajatawk'at katicha'xkana', chux ixjataxiyak chi kala'xawakana'.
42003010	Pus an lapanakni ixtajuniy: —Pus ¿Tasucha yu aklawi?
42003011	An Juan ixjajuniy: —K'axt'a'nit'iti yu ntu tu'u lhit'ajun ixla'ch'it li uxitnan alht'uyi lhit'awnat'it, chi li alini yu uyat'it, k'at'a'ut'iti yu ntu tu'u uy.
42003012	Wachu tala'cha'alh ali'in an yu ixtalhach'inin tanlhun para li kajama'paxalh, tajuniy: —Maestro, kitnan ¿tisuncha lay ak'ilhtuwi?
42003013	An Juan ja'alhtaylh: —Jant'u k'alhimo'slat'iti k'ajach'inint'it, wa t'ach'a lhi'unk'anat'itch'a k'a'ilht'ut.
42003014	Chi ali'in soldadojnin wachu talhisakmilh tajuniy: —Chi kitnan ¿tisuncha ak'ilhtuwi? Yucha jajuniy: —T'u xamat'i k'a'asi maxt'unit tu'u', k'alhimamatcha yu lhajayat'it, chi nt'u k'a'alht'asut'iti xamati yu ntu tu'u ilhtuta.
42003015	An lapanakni sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni, ixtanajun li sna an Juan yuchacha Cristo.
42003016	Pero an Juan jajuniy: —Kit'in wa laka xkani klama'paxayaw, pero kamina pumatam yu palay ay, kit'in jantu, yucha katama'paxayan la ixTakuwin an Dios chi laka jikmi, yucha ntu ikt'acha'ani masi wa ak'o'x'otnilhcha ixwarachi.
42003017	Yucha ch'apatacha an xpala, kamaxtuniyacha an xajamakxtalh an ixtrigo, chi kama'ayacha an ixtrigo laka cha'a tan la'oxinita chi an xajamakxtalh kala'xawayacha laka jikmi tan tu a'tam mixa.
42003018	Chunchacha ixjajuniy an Juan chi tamj tamjcha ixjapumak'atsaani an laj'oxi chiwinti an lapanakni.
42003019	Atumpaj an Herodes yu gobernador ixjunita, an Juan ixjuniya li ntu oxi tacha an ixlay, mu an Herodes ixt'at'awniya ixt'iwi wa ixt'ala'ajuncha yu ixjunkan Felipe chi an ixt'iwi ixjunkan Herodias, chi tanlhuncha ali ixlakata yu ntu oxi tacha ixlay an Herodes,
42003020	walh a'tam ilhtupalhi yu ntu oxi an Herodes, palay lhimo'slapalh, malaklhchawlhi an Juan laka pulach'in.
42003021	Akxni ixchuxk'an an lapanakni ixjama'paxat'ajun an Juan, an Jesús wachu a'paxli, walh akxni ixtapaynit'ajunka an Jesús, an lakt'iyan tati'achalh.
42003022	Chi ta'alhtajulhi an ixTakuwin an Dios, tan ixyalh an Jesús, wa tacha paloma, chi chiwinkanchalhi an lakt'iyan nawkan: —Uxint'i kinTs'alhk'at'i ikmapayniyan, uxint'i k'ima'an'ach'ay.
42003023	Katacha la'ap'uxamkawcha k'ata ixpakxanta an Jesús akxni tsukulhcha lhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios. Ixtalhi'ilhtuy li an Jesús ists'alh an José, an ists'alh Elí.
42003024	An Elí ists'alh Matat ixjunita; an Matat ists'alh Leví; an Leví ists'alh Melqui; an Melqui ists'alh Jana; an Jana ists'alh José;
42003025	an José ists'alh Matatías; an Matatías ists'alh Amós; an Amós ists'alh Nahum; an Nahum ists'alh Esli; an Esli ists'alh Nagai;
42003026	an Nagai ists'alh Maat; an Maat ists'alh Matatías; an Matatías ists'alh Semei; an Semei ists'alh José; an José ists'alh Judá;
42003027	an Judá ists'alh Joana; an Joana ists'alh Resa; an Resa ists'alh Zorobabel; an Zorobabel ists'alh Salatiel; an Salatiel ists'alh Neri;
42003028	an Neri ists'alh Melqui; an Melqui ists'alh Adi; an Adi ists'alh Cosam; an Cosam ists'alh Elmodam; an Elmodam ists'alh Er;
42003029	an Er ists'alh Josué; an Josué ists'alh Eliezer; an Eliezer ists'alh Jorim; an Jorim ists'alh Matat; an Matat ists'alh Leví;
42003030	an Leví ists'alh Simón; an Simón ists'alh Judá; an Judá ists'alh José; an José ists'alh Jonán; an Jonán ists'alh Eliaquim;
42003031	an Eliaquim ists'alh Melea; an Melea ists'alh Mainán; an Mainán ists'alh Matata; an Matata ists'alh Natán; an Natán ists'alh David;
42003032	an David ists'alh Isaí; an Isaí ists'alh Obed; an Obed ists'alh Booz; an Booz ists'alh Salmón; an Salmón ists'alh Naasón;
42003033	an Naasón ists'alh Aminadab; an Aminadab ists'alh Admín; an Admín ists'alh Aram; an Aram ists'alh Esrom; an Esrom ists'alh Fares; an Fares ists'alh Judá;
42003034	an Judá ists'alh Jacob; an Jacob ists'alh Isaac; an Isaac ists'alh Abraham; an Abraham ists'alh Taré; an Taré ists'alh Nacor;
42003035	an Nacor ists'alh Serug; an Serug ists'alh Ragau; an Ragau ists'alh Peleg; an Peleg ists'alh Heber; an Heber ists'alh Sala;
42003036	an Sala ists'alh Cainán; an Cainán ists'alh Arfaxad; an Arfaxad ists'alh Sem; an Sem ists'alh Noé; an Noé ists'alh Lamec;
42003037	an Lamec ists'alh Matusalén; an Matusalén ists'alh Enoc; an Enoc ists'alh Jared; an Jared ists'alh Mahalaleel; an Mahalaleel ists'alh Cainán;
42003038	an Cainán ists'alh Enós; an Enós ists'alh Set; an Set ists'alh Adán; chi an Adán ists'alh Dios.
42004001	An Jesús sawalhcha ixla'tanu'ojota an ixTakuwin Dios akxni tasp'itcho'ochalh an ayxkan tan junkan Jordán; chi an ixTakuwin Dios lhi'alhcha lakaak'iwin.
42004002	T'up'uxam wilhchani ancha ixt'awnachalh. Ancha an xapay makxkay'un ixlila'ts'intanuycha an Jesús. Jantu k'is tu'u ix'uy an Jesús an t'up'uxam wilhchan, xli'astan chawanalhcha.
42004003	Pus an xapay makxkay'un juniy: —Li isTs'alhk'at'i Dios, k'aja'un ani chiwx li katatapalalh pan.
42004004	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Ts'o'kanta tan najun: —Jantu wa pancha katiputsukulh an lapanak, wachu kaputsukuya chux an ixchiwinti Dios.
42004005	Wachuncha an xaapay makxkay'un a'tam lhi'ampalh lakatam laka ay a'stitawk'a an Jesús, chi lakmasuni'olhcha an laj'ay lhich'alhkat alin lakaamunulhpa chi an ixk'usinti.
42004006	Juni: —Akxta'ni'oyancha chux ani lhich'alhkat chi an ixk'usinti, mu kit'ini kima'axta'nikanta, kit'in layi akma'axta'niya yu ikma'axta'niputun.
42004007	Li ak'int'ats'o'ott'aniya'a mi'anucha kajun'oya chux.
42004008	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —¡K'ap'inchicha Satanás, mu ts'o'muk'akanta an la ixchiwinti Dios tan najun: "Wa yucha an miJamach'alhkat Diosi k'at'ats'o'ott'aniya'a chi wa yucha k'ak'iklak'a'iya'a."
42004009	Walh lhi'ampalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, muk'achalhcha la ix'ukxni an tajtan, chi juniy: —Li isTs'alhk'at'i Dios, k'awarj p'it'i an talaktsin;
42004010	mu ts'o'muk'akanta an la xchiwinit Dios: "An Dios kajamakminiyani ix'angelhnin para li katalhistakni,
42004011	katama'ch'apayani para li nt'u k'a'ayst'uk'uk'a laka chiwx."
42004012	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Ts'o'muk'akanta tan najun: "Jant'u wa k'at'ilhila'ts'int'anut'i an miJamach'alhkat Dios."
42004013	Pus an xaapay makxkay'un akxni la'ts'ilhi li ntucha lay ali lhila'ts'intanuy, makawlhcha, sta apu'a'tamka'.
42004014	Ancho'olhcha xalakaat'un Galilea an Jesús, sawalhcha ixla'tanuni an ixTakuwin Dios, chi sawalhcha ixtamispayi taa ixlijalhi'ay an tan ixt'ajun.
42004015	Ixjamasunicha an laka lakcha'a tan ixtala'ta'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, chi oxicha ixtalhipast'ak'a ixchuxk'an.
42004016	Alhcha la'acha'an Nazaret, tan ta'ayachalh, chi akxni sábado tanuchalhcha an laka cha'a an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, mu chunchacha ixlismanita, chi sa'cha ixyalh tsukulhcha punajuni an ixchiwinti Dios.
42004017	Chi taxta'nilhcha an ixlibro Isaias, an yu ma'anchacha ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, pus pux'otlhicha, walh ancha la'cha'alh tan najunta:
42004018	"An ixTakuwin Dios la ki'ukxni t'ajun, mu yuchaa kilakpach'apalh la ixmaka para li ajkalhixa'alalh an laj'oxi chiwinti an jakilhpatinin. Chi kimakminta para li ajkak'uch'ulh an yu wa tala'ta'oxila'alhiy la ixjalhunutk'an. Chi para li p'asi aknawlh li an yu taalaklhchawnan kajamakawkalh, chi katajalakawanalhi an yu ntu tajalakawanan. Chi para li kajamakawkalhi an yu sawalhcha jamama'alh'ajnikan.
42004019	Chi para li aklhichiwinilhi yu chaway aniy oxi panch'e'ex yu ixnawin an Dios."
42004020	Mala'apuxto'cho'olhcha an libro an Jesús, xta'nicho'olhcha an yu ixja'a'tayjunun lapanak, chi tawilhcha. An yu ancha ixtat'aw'ojoy wa sa'cha ixtala'ts'ini an Jesús.
42004021	Yucha tsukulhcha jajuniy: —Chaway walhcha la mi'ukxlakapuk'an tacha an ts'o'kantalh.
42004022	Ixchuxk'an oxicha ixtalhichiwiniy an Jesús, chi sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya tacha an laj'oxi chiwinti ixchiwiniy, ixtalajuniy: —¿Aniy chu ntu yu an ists'alh José?
42004023	Yucha jajuniy: —Ijk'atsaycha li akilajunaw aniy chiwinti: —"Jak'uch'unu', k'ak'uch'uk'a mi'akstu! Wach'u k'a'ilht'u ani la mint'un yu t'ach'a lak'ilht'uchi la'acha'an Capernaúm."
42004024	Chi jajumpalay: —Ani sawalhi an yu klajunaw, jantu xamati la'a'ikan yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios tan la ixla'acha'an.
42004025	Chi xluwk'an t'akunini ixtat'ajun an la'acha'an Israel yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapak'an akxni ixt'ajun an Elias, akxni la'at'utu k'ata apaytat tu ixmin xkan, ay lhichawani ix'alin aniy lakaat'un.
42004026	Walh an Elias jantu mala'achakalhi para li ka'alh jala'ts'ini an t'akunin yu jamacha'an Israel, apalij la'acha'an Sareptaja mala'achakalh wani la'acha'an Sidón, para li ka'alh la'ts'ini pumatam t'aku yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapa'.
42004027	Chi xluwk'an yu ixtalaklakap'uch'i'ojotacha ixtat'ajun an la'acha'an Israel akxni ixt'ajun an Eliseo, yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, walh tu xamati k'uch'ukalh, apalij yucha an Naamán jamacha'a Siriaja k'uch'ukalh.
42004028	Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi, ixchuxk'an an yu ixtatanumanalh an tan ixta'ayxt'o'nun sawalhcha tala'talh'amalh.
42004029	Pus tatamakxtulhcha an Jesús an la'acha'an, talhi'alhcha tanchun la ix'ukxni a'stitawk'a tan ixla'acha'ank'an ixjuntachalh yu'uncha, sta anchacha ixtama'aj'ajuputun.
42004030	Pero yucha japujataxtulh, alhcha.
42004031	An Jesús alh Capernaúm xalakaat'un Galilea, chi akxni ntu xtapatsakan wilhchan, ixjamasunicha.
42004032	Ixtalhi'a'nicha tacha an ixmasuy mu ixchiwiniy tacha yu lhit'ajun lhich'alhkat.
42004033	An tan ixta'ayxto'nun ixtanun pumatam lapanak yu ixlakpach'apata makxkay'un, pus p'ascha pukilht'asay
42004034	najun: —¡ Jijwa! Jesús de Nazaret ¿T'isunch'a la't'ant'a? ¿Wa kilamintawcha lalakt'ilhi'ulanin? Kit'in ikmispayan, uxint'i xnawin Dios.
42004035	Pus an Jesús la'a'aymalh juniy: —¡Wasa'cha k'ak'ilhu, chi k'amak'awcha ani lapanak! Wachuncha an makxkay'un, ma'talhi an lapanak tan an ixtayanalh ali'in, pero ntu tani ilhtulh.
42004036	Pus ixchuxk'an an yu tala'ts'ilh ixtalaktalhanancha, chi ixtalajumpaxay: —¿Tisu wa tichiwinticha aniy li layi ilhtuy li kata'osli an lakmakxkay'un chi ta'osa?
42004037	Taa ixlijalhi'ay an tan ixt'ajun an Jesús sawalhcha ixmispakan.
42004038	Akxni taxtulhcha an Jesús an tan ixta'ayxto'nun an lapanakni, la ixcha'acha an Simoni tanuchalh, walh an ixput'icha'o'olh an Simón sawalhcha ixch'apata alhp'as iskakat, pus tatapayninicha an Jesús li kak'uch'ulh.
42004039	Yucha tantawilhi an tan ixmalh, la'a'aymalhi an alhp'as jaskakana', pus makawlhcha an alhp'as iskakat, chi wa akxni tayalhcha an ixput'icha'o'olh an Simón tsukulhcha jamaway.
42004040	Akxni ta'aknuchalhcha an wilhchan, wa tuchicha ta'an'at ixtapakxanta yu ixtalaklhit'ajun ixta'an'ank'an, talhicha'anilhcha an Jesús, pus yucha ixjalaklakpach'apaycha pumatamjtamin chi ixjak'uch'uycha.
42004041	Wachu tamakawlhi tanlhun lakmakxkay'un ixluwk'an an ta'an'anin, akxni ixtat'asay an lakmakxkay'un ixtanajun: —Uxint'i isTs'alh Dios. Pero an Jesús tu ixjamakawniya katachiwinilh. Ixjalaj'aymay, mu yu'uncha ixtak'atsayi li yucha Cristo.
42004042	Akxni tunkulhcha an Jesús taxtulh, alhcha tan tu la'acha'an. Pero an lapanakni ixtapuxkajuy pus tala'cha'alhi tan ixt'awnachalh, tu ixtamakawniya li ka'alh, ixtach'apa'ulaputun,
42004043	pero an Jesús jajuniy: —Wachu lhitask'iniya li ak'alh nawna an ali la'acha'anaxni an laj'oxi chiwinti yu alin la ixlich'alhkat Dios, mu yuchaa kilhimakminkanta.
42004044	Pus an laka lakcha'a an yu ixpulakta'ayxt'okan an Galilea, an Jesús ixlichiwiniycha an ixchiwinti Dios.
42005001	A'tamchacha akxni an Jesús ixpiktu an ay xalakxkan Genesaret ixt'ajun, an lapanakni wa ixtapa'asicho'oycha li ixta'asmatputun an ixchiwinti Dios.
42005002	Walh an Jesús jala'ts'ilh la'at'uy barco yu wani ixpiktu an lakxkan ixtawilanalh, mu an yu ixtach'apayajuy jatanti ixtaputakutta, ixtala'ch'a'ay an ixpaxo'tank'an.
42005003	Pus putajulh la'atami an Jesús an barco, ma ix'anu Simón. Chi sk'inilhka lamapaynin li kastalhka mujulh palay an lakxkan; chi sa'cha tawlhchalh, sta anchacha ixjamasuniyachalh an laka barco tacha an ts'anan ixlakyakalh.
42005004	Akxni chiwin'olhcha, juniy an Simón: —Tan talhmancha k'alhip'inchi', chi k'amutcha an minpaxo'tank'an.
42005005	An Simón alhtaylh juniy: —Maestro, tuntats'isnicha iktapatsaw, pero ntu lay tu'u ikch'apayawyaw, pero li uxint'ich'a na'un, akmuyacha an paxo'tan.
42005006	Walh akxni tamujulhcha, lhuw jatanti tama'alhilalh, ixla'ta'exacha an ixpaxo'tank'an.
42005007	Pus tatamakyawlaka'anicha an yu lakatam laka barco ixtatajumananchalh, para li katamilhcha t'ala'a'tayjunin, pus tamilhcha. Tala'tsamalhi an la'at'uy barco, walaycha tatalak'aknulh.
42005008	Akxni chunchacha la'ts'in an Simón Pedro, tatso'ottanilhcha an Jesús, juniy: —Ak'ilaj'ost'i Jamach'alhkat Jesús, mu kit'in lhuwi kintala'alhin.
42005009	Wa xliyu an Simón chi an ali'in ixtalaktalhanancha li tacha an tach'apayawlhcha an jatanti.
42005010	An Jakobo chi an Juan, ists'alan Zebedeo yu ixjat'a'anta an Simón wachucha ixtalaktalhanan. Pero an Jesús juniy an Simón: —Jant'u k'at'alhan; chaway tukan lapanaknicha k'ajama'alhilaya'a tacha ixjama'alhilay jatantin.
42005011	Akxni talakmakutu'olhcha an ixbarcojk'an, chuxi talakmakaw'ula'olh, chi tat'a'alhcha an Jesús.
42005012	La'atam wilhchan akxni an Jesús ixt'ajun tanchun la'acha'an, la'cha'alh pumatam lapanak yu ixlakap'uch'i'ojota, an lapanak akxni la'ts'incha an Jesús tatso'ottanilhcha chi tamuntitachalhcha lakaat'un, tapayninicha juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, li sna ak'ink'uch'up'ut'u, ak'ink'uch'ut'ika'.
42005013	Pus lats'awalalhi ixmaka an Jesús, chi lakpach'apachalhcha, juniy: —Chun, k'at'ala'a'oxit'icha. Wa akxni watukan tala'a'oxilhi an lapanak.
42005014	Chi juniy li ntu xamati kajunilh, juniy: —Wa k'ap'inchicha talakasunini an sacerdote, chi k'ama'axt'a'a'acha milha'ulan ixlakata li t'ala'a'oxit'icha, tacha lhinawlh a Moisés, para li katak'atsaa'olhi an sacerdotejnin.
42005015	Pero ali ali ixmispakani an Jesús, chi lhilhuwi ixla'cha'ankan mu ixta'alha'asmatputun chi ixtalakask'in li kajalajk'uch'ulh.
42005016	Pero yucha ix'an tapaynini tan wa ix'akstu, tan tu la'acha'an.
42005017	Tapasalh la'atam wilhchan akxni ixmasut'ajun an Jesús, ali'in fariseojnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin ancha sa' ixtalakwilanalh, yu ixtalakmintachalh xala'acha'anaxni Galilea, chi Judea chi Jerusalén. Walh an ix'alhp'asninti an Dios ancha ixt'a'aklat'ajun an Jesús para li lay kak'uch'unulh.
42005018	Wachuncha tichi yu'uncha lapanakni talhicha'alh la ixputamat pumatam lapanak, yu wa ixlaklhtukulunta. Ixtama'anuputunachalhi an laka cha'a', la ix'ukxlakapu an Jesús,
42005019	pero ntu tala'cha'alhi tan kataputamaknulh, mu wanajcha lhilhuwi ixjunkanta, pus an ix'a'sti cha'a tatawk'alh, ta'a'stip'uxli lakats'uniya an ix'a'sti cha'a ancha taputamaknuchalh an ta'an'an la ixputamat, ixtan'ajnichak'an an lapanakni tamamalh, la ix'ukxlakapu an Jesús.
42005020	An Jesús mu jala'ts'incha li tajakiklaka'inin, pus juniy an yu ta'an'ay: —Amigo, ikmala'mixini'oyani mintala'alhin.
42005021	Pus an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin tsukulhcha tajatapastaknan, tanajun: —¿Tisiyuchacha ani li wa lhila'ts'incha Diosi? Wa Diosi yu lay mala'mixi tala'alhin.
42005022	Pero mu an Jesús ixjak'atsaniya tacha an ixtajatapastaknan, pus jajuniy: —¿Tasu li ch'unch'ach'a jat'ap'ast'aknanat'iti?
42005023	¿Tampiyu yu palaycha wa las, aknawlh: "Ikmala'mixini'ojoncha mintala'alhin", u aknawlh: "k'a'ost'aycha, k'ajalht'ancha"?
42005024	Pus para li k'ak'ats'at'iti li kit'in yu kwalh isTs'alh Lapanak layi kakmala'mixiya tala'alhin aniy lakaat'un, La'alhi an yu lakalhtukulunta lapanak, juniy: —Chaway uxint'i ijkunan, k'a'ost'aycha, k'asakt'icha amimputamat chi k'ap'inch'o'ochicha mincha'a'.
42005025	Wa akxniy ostayalh an yu ixlakalhtukulunta, sakcho'olhcha an ixputamat, chi ancho'olhcha la ixcha'a'. Xta'nilhi'alhcha lhimala'puchajun an Dios, chi ixchuxk'ani tala'ts'ilh.
42005026	Pus sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan chi oxicha ixtalhipast'ak'a an Dios. Laka ay ixtalhantik'an ixtanajun: —Chaway la'ts'iw yu lhi'a'nin.
42005027	Xli'astan tacha an laktapasalh, an Jesús alhcha, walh la'ts'ilh pumatam lapanak yu ixlaklhach'inin tanlhun an laka banco, Leví ixjunkan, sa' ix'wilh tan an ixjach'inin, pus an Jesús juniy: —Ak'int'ap'it'icha.
42005028	Yucha makaw'olhi an yu ix'ilhtuy, tayalh chi ch'a'o'alhcha.
42005029	Xli'astan an Leví, an la ixcha'a ilhtunilh la'atam wayti an Jesús. Ixluwk'an an yu ixtalhach'inin tanlhun ancha ixtama'wilanalh chi ali'incha lapanakni wachu ancha ixtama'wilanalh laka mesaj.
42005030	An xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin kalaks kalakscha ixtaxa'alayi an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, ixjajunkan: —¿Tasu li jat'alakwaynatcha chi jat'alaj'ot'atcha an yu talaklhach'inin tanlhun chi an ma'lhta'alhinini?
42005031	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Yu oxi tat'ajun tu tama'lhtask'iniya jak'uch'unu', an ta'an'anin chun.
42005032	Kit'in tu ikminta jat'asanini yu ntu tu'u ixtala'alhink'an, kit'in ikminta jat'asanini yu talhit'ajun ixtala'alhink'an para li katamakawlhcha.
42005033	Wachuncha yu'uncha tajuniy: —¿Tasu li an ixt'alhtanan Juan chi an ixt'alhtanank'an fariseojnin sawalh tatapayni chi a'lhuwi ntu tawajini? Amint'alhtanan talakwajin chi ta'ot'a li tu'u'.
42005034	An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Chu laycha k'a'ilht'uya'it'it li ntu katawaylhi yu jat'asanikanta tan tama'xto'kan, li ancha jat'a'aklat'ajun an ts'alh yu tama'xt'o'a?
42005035	Kachina wilhchani akxni an ts'alh an yu tama'xt'o'a kama'osukana' pus akxni an yu ixtalakwajin wachucha ntu katitawaylhi a'tamin.
42005036	Wachu jajumpalh la'atam pulhamacha'xan: —Jantu xamati sit'iy sast'i la'ch'it chi lhila'ts'ap'ancha yu at'ilhcha; li xamati chuncha ilhtuy, tu oxi t'atasuy an la'ch'it, chi an sast'i la'ch'it exa an yu at'ilhcha.
42005037	Chi ntu xamati pumujuy yu sast'ika xaxkan uvaj yu laj'at'ilhcha jaxt'a'an, mu an sast'i xaxkan uvaj tan'exa an jaxt'a'an, pus pu'an'ojoy, chi an jaxt'a'an ts'an'aycha.
42005038	Yu sast'ika xaxkan an uvaj, yu sast'ika wachu jaxt'a'ani pumujukan, chuncha an xaxkan uvaj chi an jaxt'a'an tu tani talay.
42005039	Chi ntu xamati yu ot'a an yu xama'ancha xaxkan uvaj watukan ka'otputumpalhi an yu wa sast'ika', mu najun: —Palay oxi an yu xama'ancha.
42006001	La'atam wilhchan akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan, an Jesús ixla'pust'ajun tan ch'ankanta trigo. An ixt'alhtanan ixta'akatan'ex'iycha an trigo chi ixta'akatanswajp'uxacha, ixta'uycha.
42006002	Walh ali'in fariseojnin tat'alajuni an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús: —¿T'asu li ilht'uyatcha yu ntu ixpu'ilhtuka akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchani?
42006003	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Jant'u p'unawt'at'iti tani lalhcha an David akxni chawanalh, chi an yu ixtat'a'anta?
42006004	Yucha tanulhi an la ixcha'a Dios chi xa'a'ilhi an pan yu jamatajtanilanti, chi ulh chi jaxta'nilhcha wachu an yu ixtat'a'anta; walh yucha wa yucha an sacerdotejnini lay ixta'uy.
42006005	Chi jajumpalay an Jesús: —Kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak ikch'alhkatnani masi akxni jantu tapatsakan wilhchan.
42006006	Tapasapalh a'tam la'atam wilhchan akxni jantu tapatsakan wilhchan, an Jesús tanuchalhi an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxto'a an israelitajnin, chi ixmasuycha. Walh ancha ixtanun pumatam lapanak yu ntu lay xlak'anuy an yu oxi ixmaka'.
42006007	Pus an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin sawalhcha ixtalhakapu'ani an Jesús li sna kak'uch'uya an lapanak mu akxni jantu xtapatsakan wilhchan, para li ka'alilhi yu lay katapu'alhtasulh.
42006008	Pero mu yucha ixjak'atsaniya an ixjatapast'ak'atk'an; pus juniy an yu ixmaklhtukulunta lapanak: —K'at'aycha, an ixtan'ajnicha k'at'ay. Pus yucha tayalh, sa'cha tayalh.
42006009	Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —Aklalhisakmiyaw la'atam jasakminti: —¿Oxi li ak'ilhtulh yu oxi u yu ntu oxi tu'u akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan?, ¿u li akma'alhtaxtulh jatsukunti u akma'nilh?
42006010	Sa'cha jala'ts'ini tuntala'acho'o an Jesús, juniy an lapanak: —K'alats'awalat'icha amimaka'. Pus chunchacha ilhtulh, walh ta'oxinilhcha an ixmaka'.
42006011	Pus yu'uncha sawalhcha tala'talh'amalh, tsukulhcha talalhima'achiwiniya tani kata'ilhtulhcha an Jesús.
42006012	Anchunu panch'e'ex an Jesús alh tapaynini a'stitawk'a, tuntats'isni tapayninilh an Dios.
42006013	Akxni tunkuncho'olhcha, jat'asanilhcha an ixt'alhtanan, chi ixpumakawt'uychak'ani jasakxtulh yu katat'alhtananacha chi kajamala'achayacha kata'alh lhichiwinin an ixchiwinti Dios.
42006014	An ixpumakaut'uyk'an chunchuniya ixjajunkan: Simón, yu wachu ixjumpalhkan Pedro, chi Andrés ixt'ala'ajun an Pedro; chi Jacobo chi Juan chi Felipe chi Bartolomé
42006015	chi Mateo chi Tomás chi Jacobo ists'alh Alfeo chi Simón yu ixtajumpalay Zelote
42006016	chi Judas ixt'ala'ajun Jacobo chi Judas Iscariote an yu ma'axta'lhi an Jesús.
42006017	Xli'astan jat'ajatajununcho'ochalhcha an Jesús, chi tan jaswa'alhcha sa' jat'atayalh. Wanajcha ixluwk'an an yu ixtat'alhtanani ixtala'cha'anta. Chi lhuw lapanaki ixtala'cha'anta yu ixtamintachalh xalakaat'un Judea, chi la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi an la'acha'an Tiro chi Sidón yu ixpiktu lakxkan ixtalakwilanalh. Mu ixta'alha'asmatputun chi ixtalakask'in li kajalajk'uch'ulh.
42006018	An yu wa ixtala'apaxto'ta makxkay'un ixjalajk'uch'uycha,
42006019	pus ixchuxk'an an lapanakni wa laycha li kata'aych'apa'ochalhcha an Jesús, mu ixtala'ts'incha li layi ixjak'uch'u'ojoy.
42006020	Chi sa'cha jala'ts'ini an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jajuniy: —Oxi para uxitnani jakilhpatinin mu uxitnan minawink'ani an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
42006021	Oxi para uxitnani yu ch'away lakch'awananat'it, mu oxi k'a'o'ats'aya'it'it akxni k'alakwayna'it'it. Oxi para uxitnani yu ch'away laj'alhunat'it, mu k'alakts'i'ina'it'it.
42006022	Oxi para uxitnani akxni xk'ayk'anat'it, ch'i akxni nt'uch'a la'ts'imp'ut'unk'anat'it, chi akxni wa t'ani k'alhich'iwink'ana'itcha, ch'i akxni nt'uch'a oxi lhip'ast'akk'anat'it li kilakiklaka'iyaw kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak.
42006023	K'alaj'ach'ant'iti akxni ch'unch'a ilht'uk'anat'it st'a k'ala't'a'a'lht'ujt'it, mu an yu k'alhajaxt'uya'it an lakt'iyan yucha ay. An ixlakpaynink'an yu'uncha chuncha stak ta'ilhtulh an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
42006024	¡Payni'incha uxitnani jamatuminin k'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'it'it! mu jama'lht'ayanant'atcha mi'achatk'an.
42006025	¡Payni'incha uxitnani yu o'ats'at'atcha k'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'it'it! mu k'ast'ak lakch'awanana'it'it. ¡Payni'incha uxitnani yu lakts'i'inat'it, k'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'it'it! mu k'ala't'a'oxila'alhiya'it chi k'alaj'alhuna'it'it.
42006026	¡Payni'incha uxitnani yu sawalhch'a oxi lhip'ast'akk'anat'it k'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'it'it, mu aminlakpaynink'an chuncha oxi ixtalhipast'ak'a an yu ntu xasawalh ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
42006027	Pero uxitnan yu kila'alha'asmat'aw, klajunaw: —K'ajamap'aynit'iti masi yu ntu tala'ts'imputunan, oxi k'aja'ilht'ut masi yu wa taxkayan.
42006028	K'ask'init'iti an Dios li oxi katatawilh masi yu wa aya tajunan, chi k'alhit'ap'aynit'iti masi yu wa talhitama'chapuyan.
42006029	Li xamati la'xtisayan, k'alhip'inip'alhi amintala'xtitam; chi li xamati maxtuniyan mixkuju wach'u k'axt'a'nini aminkutun.
42006030	Watichicha tu'u sk'iniyan, k'axt'a'nin, chi li xamati xa'a'iniyan tu'u yu minawin, jant'ucha k'ask'inich'o'o.
42006031	T'ach'a lak'ask'inat'iti li k'a'ilht'uk'ant'it, wachu chuni k'aja'ilht'ut an ali'in.
42006032	Mu li wa yu tat'alamapayniyani jat'alamap'ayniyat'it, ¿T'anyuch'a yu p'alaych'a oxi ilht'uyat'iti? An ma'lhta'alhinin wachu chuni talay.
42006033	Ch'i li wa yu'unch'a oxi jala'ts'inat'it yu oxi tala'ts'inan, ¿T'anyuch'a yu p'alaych'a oxi ilht'uyat'iti? An ma'lhta'alhinin wachu chuni talay.
42006034	Chi li wa yu'unchaa jamach'ixt'a'niyat'it tu'u yu jalhiwilayat'it li tu'u kataxta'niyan, ¿Tanyu yu p'alaych'a t'am ilht'uyat'iti? An ma'lhta'alhinin wachu chuni talamach'ixta'ni.
42006035	Uxitnan k'ajamap'aynit'iti masi yu ntu tala'ts'imputunan, oxi k'aja'ilht'ut, chi k'ajamach'init'iti tu'u masi ntu tu'u kataxta'nin. Chuncha ayi yu k'ajama'lht'ayanana'it'it uxitnan, chi ixjas'at'an Dios an yu wilhchalh talhmani k'a'una'it'it, mu yucha oxi ja'ilhtuy masi an yu ntu taxta'niy lhimala'puchajun chi an yu wa ay tajunita.
42006036	Pus uxitnan k'ajamap'ayninint'it wachu tacha jamapayninin aminPayk'an
42006037	Jant'u k'ajalhimuk'at'iti li tuchini ta'ilhtutacha ali'in para li an Dios wachu ntu katalhimuk'ani t'uch'ini ilht'ut'atcha uxitnan. Jant'u k'ajamuk'anit'it'i lhima'alh'ajna an ali'in, walh an Dios wachu ntu chuni katita'ilhtun. K'ajamala'mixinit'iti ixtala'alhink'an an ali'in, walh wachu k'amala'mixinik'ana'it'it.
42006038	K'axt'a't'it, walh wach'u k'axt'a'nik'ana'it'it. Palay lhuwi k'axt'a'nik'ana'it'it yu wa t'ak'alhcha a'tsamanta, yu wa lhi'o'slaycha a'tsamanta. Tacha p'alhk'ananat'it wach'u ch'uni k'ap'ulhk'ak'ana'it.
42006039	Chi jajumpalh la'atam pulhamacha'xani an Jesús, jajuniy: —¿Chu layi xamati lapanak yu la'lhtulu kamalhtanalh yu ixt'ala'lhtulu?, ¿Jantu wa ayxtami kajuluklh ta'alh tan jalh'ot'alh?
42006040	An jatalanini jantu yu palay k'atsay, yucha an ixmaestro, pero li akxni jatalaninin'olhcha tacha an ixmaestrojcha kajuna'.
42006041	¿Ch'i t'asich'a li la'ts'inicha an k'is laktanun xatap'aksni ts'a'am amint'ala'ajuni, chi uxint'i nt'u la'ts'ini an p'amj laktanuman a'tolo'ontawlhna'a?
42006042	¿T'asu li unicha amint'ala'ajun: "Aklakpumaxtuyani an xatap'aksni ts'a'am"? ¿chi uxint'i nt'u la'ts'ini an p'amj laktanuman a'tolo'ontawlhna'a? ¡Uxint'i wa t'a'ukxp'ut'uyunun! P'ulhnajch'a k'alakp'umaxt'uk'a an p'amj laktanuman a'tolo'ontawlhana' walh chuncha laycha k'alakp'umaxt'uya'a an laktanun xatap'aksni ts'a'am amint'ala'ajun.
42006043	Jantu tu'u yu oxi k'iw yu ntu oxi kaxta'lhi xajatawk'at, chi ntu tu'u yu ntu oxi k'iw yu oxi kaxta'lhi xajatawk'at.
42006044	A'atamin k'iw xajatawk'ati pumispakan, mu ntu layi aktip'uxlicha higo lakaalhtukunan u akp'uxli uvaj lakaajawana'.
42006045	An yu oxi lapanak, yu laj'oxi jatapast'ak'ati makutuy la ixjalhunut; chi an yu ntu oxi lapanak, yu ntu oxi jatapast'ak'ati makutuy la ixjalhunut. Mu chux chiwinti laka jalhunuti minachalht.
42006046	¿Tasu li Jamach'alhkat, Jamach'alhkat kilajunawcha ch'i nt'u ilht'uyat'iti yu klajunawi?
42006047	Watichicha yu kila'min chi ilhtuyi an kinchiwinti yu ijkuni, aklajunawi tichini ixt'achunchacha.
42006048	Wanaj tacha an lapanak yu yawlh ixcha'a'. Yucha p'ulhnajcha ja'ajnalh talhman chi akxni la'cha'alhcha an chiwx anchacha mach'atalh. Pus akxni ja'a'muxtunulh tu tani ilhtunilh an xkan an ixcha'a masi p'as talakanuchalh, mu an xjach'aja de chiwx.
42006049	Pero yu ki'alha'asmat'a chi ntu ilhtuy, tachanu an lapanak yu mach'atalh ixcha'a wa la ix'ukxni an lakaat'un, jantu laka chiwxi mach'atalh. Pus akxni p'as talakanuchalh an xkan, wa lasi juluklh ta'a'talh wanaj talakt'ilhi'olh.
42007001	Akxni chunchacha jajun'olh an Jesús, alhcha la'acha'an Capernaum.
42007002	Walh ancha ixt'ajun pumatam xkapitank'an soldadojnin de Roma, ixlit'ajun pumatam ixma'tsuku yu sawalh ixmapayni, an ixma'tsuku p'asi ixta'an'ay, ixnit'ajuncha.
42007003	Pus akxni k'atsaalhi an kapitán li ancha t'ajun an Jesús, jamala'achalh ali'in an xalaj'ajin judiojnin, tapayninicha li ka'alh k'uch'unu an ixma'tsuku'.
42007004	Yu'uncha tala'cha'alhcha an Jesús, sawalhcha ixtatapaynini, ixtajuniy: —Ka t'acha'ani li k'a'a't'ay'ut'i;
42007005	mu yucha mapayniya an kila'acha'ank'an, yucha kintayawnin a'atam cha'a tan ikta'ayxt'o'aw.
42007006	Pus an Jesús jat'a'alh. Pero akxni ntucha tukan ma'at ixtacha'ant'ajun an laka cha'a, an capitán jamala'achanilh ali'in ix'amigojnini an Jesús, tan junkan: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, t'u k'alhak'ap'up'i, jantu k'is ikt'acha'ani li k'at'anuch'ita an la kincha'a',
42007007	xliyu wanaj tu iktapujulh ak'ancha'an t'asaninin kit'in. Wa k'anawcha li kata'oxilhcha an kima'tsuku kata'oxiyacha.
42007008	Mu masi kit'in wachu wa kintalhijuniya an yu palaycha xalaj'ajin, chi wachu ijkalhit'ajuni soldadojnin yu wachu ijkalhijuni. Akxni ijkuni xapumatam li inta ka'alh, an; chi akxni xapumatam ijkuni li kamilh, min; chi akxni iklhijuni tu'u ka'ilhtulh an kima'tsuku, ilhtuy.
42007009	An Jesús lhi'a'nilhcha akxni chunchacha alha'asmatlhi, pus sa'cha jala'ts'ini an lapanakni yu an ixtat'a'anta, jajuniy: —Klajunaw, masi an la'acha'an Israel tu tu'u kla'ts'in ay jakiklaka'inti ka'alilh tacha ani jakiklaka'inin ani lapanak.
42007010	Akxni tacha'ancho'olhcha laka cha'a an yu ixjamala'achata an capitán, tala'ts'ilhcha li ta'oxitacha an ixma'tsuku'.
42007011	Xli'astan tapasapalh akxni an Jesús ixti'an la'acha'an Naín, ixluwk'ani ixtat'a'anta an ixt'alhtanan chi wanaj lhilhuwi ixjat'a'ankanta.
42007012	Walh akxni ixcha'ant'ajuncha an tan putanukanachalh la'acha'an, la'ts'in li ixti'ankan maknuka janini', ists'alh tichiyucha t'aku yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapa', wa pumatami ixlit'ajun ists'alh. Lhilhucha ixt'a'ankanta an t'aku'.
42007013	An Jesús la'ts'incha an t'aku pus mapaynicha, juniy: —T'uch'a k'a'alhu.
42007014	Stalh la'alhi an yu ixpulhi'ankanta, chi ch'apachalh, pus an yu ixtalhi'anta sa'cha tat'atayalh. Chi junicha an Jesús an yu ixli'ankanta: —Ts'alh, ijkunan, ¡K'a'ost'aycha!
42007015	Pus ostayalhcha an yu ixnitacha, sa'cha tawilh chi tsukulhcha chiwiniy. An Jesús ma'axtanilhcha an ixnati.
42007016	Ixchuxk'an an yu ixtama'anta talaktalhanalh, chi ixtaxta'nicha lhimala'puchajun an Dios, ixtalaknajun: —Ayi ani yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, yu makminkanta ani tan t'awnaw. An Dios minta ma'alhtaxtunu an ixla'acha'an.
42007017	Wanajcha ta'a'pitsi'olhi an chiwinti chux la'acha'an Judea, chi chux an la'acha'anaxni yu ixtala'acho'owilananilh.
42007018	An Juan k'atsalhi tacha an laktapasalh, mu an ixt'alhtanan tamak'atsaanilh. Pus jat'asanilh ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan
42007019	jamala'achanilhi an Jesús para li katalhisakmilhi li yucha yu kamina u katapakxan'ipala pumatam.
42007020	Akxni tala'cha'alhcha an Jesús an yu jamala'achalh an Juan, tajuniy: —Yucha an Jama'paxanaj Juani kintamala'achatacha'an para li ma aklalhisakmiw li sna uxint'icha yu k'at'ana'a u akpakxan'ipalaw pumatam.
42007021	Walh ixt'a'akxni tukan an Jesús, ixluwk'ani jak'uch'ulh yu wa ixtata'an'ay, chi yu wa ixtala'ma'alh'ajnan, chi yu wa ixtala'apaxto'ta makxkay'un, chi ixluwk'an yu wa la'la'lhtulu'un, jamalakawanilh.
42007022	Pus an Jesús ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —K'ap'inchi'itcha mak'atsaninini an Juan yu la'ts'int'it ch'i yu asmatt'it: an la'la'lhtulu'un tajalakawanancha, chi an lakch'anlht'ulukun, talakalhtanancha, an yu xtalaklakap'uch'ita tala'tala'a'oxilhcha, an laj'a'atapan taja'asmatnancha, an yu xtalaknitacha jala'mala'awnicho'okalh, chi an jakilhpatinin jamak'atsaanikancha an laj'oxi chiwinti.
42007023	¡Oxi para yucha yu ntu akintiputa'a'talh!
42007024	Akxni ta'ancho'olhcha an yu ixjamala'achata an Juan, an Jesús tsukulhcha jalhixa'alayi an Juan an lapanakni, jajuniy: —¿T'isunch'a k'ila'ts'int'it an tan wa jasa'nik'a? ¿Ma'atam ts'a'am yu xmalaklay un?
42007025	Li ntu yu, ¿T'isunch'a k'ila'ts'int'iti? ¿Pumatam lapanak yu sawalhcha k'usi ixmala'ch'ininta? Jantu, yu k'usi tala'mala'ch'inin chi yu sawalhcha tama'an'achaputun an la ixpalaciojk'an rejnini tawilanalh.
42007026	Pero uxitnan ¿t'isunch'a k'ila'ts'int'iti? ¿Pumatam yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios? Chun, yucha sawalh, walh tu wa yuchacha lhilakatijtami la'minta.
42007027	Aniy lapanak, yucha an lhits'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: —P'ulhnaj akmak'ana yu ka'ana lhichiwiniy an kinchiwinti para li kamala'asijnilhi min tij.
42007028	Klajunaw tu xamati apumatam lapanaki aniy yu chuncha ixli'ay tacha an Juan, walh masi chuncha, anu la ixlich'alhkat Dios masi yu palay wa xalakat'ikt'i, palay ay, an Juan jantu.
42007029	Pus chux an la'acha'an chi an yu ixtalhach'inin tanlhun akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi, tapastaklhicha li oxi an ixtij Dios, pus jama'paxalhcha an Juan.
42007030	Pero an fariseojnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin jantu tala'a'ilhi li kajama'paxalh an Juan, pus chunchacha tapula'amaj'alh yu oxi ixja'ilhtuniputun an Dios.
42007031	Chi an Jesús najun: —¿Tasucha ajkalhimalakxtulh an lapanakni yu chaway tat'ajuni? ¿Tisuncha ixt'atamk'ani?
42007032	Wanaj tacha an jas'at'an akxni an talaj'amanajtawlay xtan'ajni an la'acha'an chi talamat'asaycha talajuniy: Klala's'olhniwcha laka s'olh pero, nt'u lak'at'inint'it, chi klamilhpaniwcha yu wa lhita'oxila'alhikan pero, nt'u laj'alhunt'it.
42007033	Mu kilachilhcha an Jama'paxanaj Juan yu ntu wa sawalhcha ixwajin chi ntu ix'ot'a xaxk'an uva, ch'i unat'iti li makxkay'uni ixlakpach'apata.
42007034	Chi milhcha an isTs'alh Dios yu ixwajin chi ix'ot'a li tu'u, ch'i ch'unch'a ix'ump'alat li wa sawalhcha wajin chi li wa sawalhcha ot'a xaxkan uva, chi li x'amigojnini an talaklhach'inin tanlhun chi an la'ma'lhta'alhinin.
42007035	Pero tacha an laj'oxi xajachalh an tanlhun anchacha putasuy an ixjatapast'ak'at Dios.
42007036	Pumatam fariseo juniy an Jesús li ka'alh t'alakwayna la ixcha'a'. Pus an Jesús t'a'alhcha la ixcha'a an fariseo, tanuchalh tawilhcha laka mesaj an Jesús.
42007037	Walh pumatam t'aku yu ancha ixla'acha'an, yu wa sawalhcha ix'ilhtuy ixtala'alhin, akxni k'atsalhi li an Jesús alh t'alakwayna la ixcha'a an fariseo, lhicha'alh la'atam perjume la xafrasco.
42007038	An t'aku ix'alhuncha, chi tantawilhcha la ixjach'aja an Jesús, tsukulhcha lhich'ampaxayi an ix'alhut, xli'astan ch'anxakalhcha la ix'ay chi lakch'ankilhtastuklhicha chi lakch'anmuk'alhcha an perjume.
42007039	Akxni chunchacha la'ts'in an fariseo yu ixt'alakwajin an Jesús, ixpast'ak'a: —Aniy li ixchiwinti Dios sawalhi lhichiwiniy ka ixk'atsaalhi tani t'ajuncha ani t'aku an yu lakch'anch'apay, yucha wanaj tu oxi tacha t'ajun.
42007040	Wachuncha an Jesús juniy: —Simón, aklhisakmiyan tuchichun. Yucha alhtaylh: —Ak'i'uncha, maestro. An Jesús najun:
42007041	—Ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni ixtalhi'ani tichi lapanak yu ixjamach'inita ixtumin: pumatam quinientojo ixli'ani chi an pumatam cincuentaj,
42007042	chi mu ntucha lay tu'u ixtalhimapalhnicho'oy, yucha jamak'akxanilh. Chi ¿tisiyuchacha an yu palay kalhimapayniya lhiwilayi? Ak'i'un.
42007043	An Simón alhtaylh, juniy: —Kit'in ikpast'ak'a ka yucha an yu palay la'lhuw ixli'ani. An Jesús juniy: —Chun sawalh, chuncha t'ach'a an p'ast'ak'a.
42007044	Chi an Jesús la'ts'impalhi an t'aku, juniy an Simón: —¿La'ts'ini ani t'aku'? Iktanuchilhcha an la mincha'a chi nt'u k'ixt'anini xkan yu aklhich'anch'a'alh; pero ani t'aku kilhich'anch'a'alhi ix'alhut chi kilhich'anxakalhi an ix'ay.
42007045	Jant'u k'ila'xt'ik'ilht'ast'ukt'i; pero ani t'aku, wa iktichilh tuka' kilakch'ankilhtastuk'ojoy.
42007046	Jant'u k'i'ukmuk'a asaytej; pero ani t'aku kilakch'anmuk'alhi perjume.
42007047	Xluyu iklhijunan li masi lhuwi ixtala'alhin, mala'mixini'okalhcha, mu sawalhcha jamapayninilh; pero yu wa lakats'uniya mala'mixinikan, wa k'isi jamapayninin.
42007048	Pus an Jesús juniy an t'aku: —Amintala'alhin mala'mixini'ok'acha.
42007049	Wachuncha an yu ancha ixtat'awilanalh laka mesaj tsukulhcha tapast'ak'a: —¿Tisiyuchacha aniy li wachu mala'mixiya tala'alhini?
42007050	Pero an Jesús juniy an t'aku: —Amijakiklaka'inti ma'alhtaxtuncha, k'ap'inch'o'ochicha. Jant'uch'a t'u'u k'alhak'ap'up'i.
42008001	Xli'astan an Jesús alhcha lhichiwiniy an laj'oxi chiwinti yu mintachalh la ixlich'alhkat Dios, ta lakachux an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni chi tan wa lakt'ikt'i. Ixtat'a'anta an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan,
42008002	chi ali'incha t'akunin yu ixjak'uch'uta akxni wa ixtala'apaxto'ta makxkay'un chi yu akxni wa ixtala'ta'an'ay. Ancha ixma'anta an María yu ixtajuni ma Magdalena, yu la'atujun maxkay'un tamakawlh,
42008003	chi Juana, ixt'iwi Chuza, yu ixt'atapatsay an Herodes, chi Susana, chi ixlukancha ali'in t'akunin yu ixta'a'tayjuycha laka tu'u an Jesús chi an ixt'alhtanan.
