42008004	Lhilhuwi lakminkanchalh lakatamincha la'acha'an, pus wanajcha lhilhuwi la'cha'ankalh an Jesús, chi yucha jajunilh la'atam pulhamacha'xan, jajuniy:
42008005	Pumatam lapanak alh maj'ana ixt'in, walh akxni ixmaj'ant'ajuncha, an ali xatalhts'i an yu ixmaj'an waniy laka tiji tamachalh, pus putayakalh chi ta'usaklhi an ts'o'on.
42008006	An ali an ixt'in an yu ixmaj'an laka chiwxini tamachalh; pus akxni la'awlhcha lakxixli, mu ntu tu'u xkan.
42008007	An ali laka jalhtukunani tamachalh, chi mu wa ayxtami t'ata'ayalh an jalhtukun, pus maxixilh.
42008008	Pero an ali tan oxi t'uni tamachalh, pus p'unlhicha, chi oxi alilh, la'atamin t'in tamciento xatalhts'i xta'cho'olh. Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Jesús, p'ascha najun: —Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhi.
42008009	Pus an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tajuniy: —¿Tisuncha nawputun t'ach'a an na'un?
42008010	Yucha jajuniy: —Uxitnan layi k'alhimach'a'xaya'it an ixlich'alhkat Dios masi ntu tasuy; pero an ali'in wanaj laka pulhamacha'xani ijkajuni, mu masi tajalakawanan tachanu ntu tajalakawanan, chi masi taja'asmatnan tachanu ntu katalhimacha'xalh.
42008011	Aniy pulhamacha'xan yucha aniya jumputun: An t'in yucha an ixchiwinti Dios.
42008012	Chi an t'in an yu tamachalh laka tij yu'uncha an yu ta'asmat'acha an ixchiwinti Dios, pero akxni jala'cha'an an xapay makxkay un jamaxtuni'ojoyi an la ixjalhunutk'an an ixchiwinti Dios, para li ntu katajakiklaka'inilh chi ntu katata'alhtaxtulh.
42008013	An t'in an yu laka chiwxnan tamachalh, yu'uncha an yu akxni ta'asmat'acha an ixchiwinti Dios, sawalhcha ta'achani ta'asmat'a; pero ntu tajataxiyaklay, jantu ma'ani tajakiklaka'inin, mu akxni jalhila'ts'intanukancha tamakawcho'oycha.
42008014	An yu laka jalhtukunan tamachalh t'in, yu'uncha an yu ta'asmat'acha an ixchiwinti Dios, pero ancha panch'e'ex, xli'astan talhimakawcho'oycha an ixlitsukuputunka laj'oxi tanlhun, lhuw tumin chi an ixma'an'achaka jatsukunti, pus tu tu'u taxt'a'a ixjatawk'atk'an.
42008015	Pero an yu tan oxi t'un tamachalh an t'in, yu'uncha an yu oxi tama'ay la ixjalhuntk'an an ixchiwinti Dios chi ta'ilhtuy sawalh, pus oxi taxt'a'a ixjatawk'atk'an mu ali tataylhi'an.
42008016	Tu xamati makilhnuy la'atam pumaklhku chi ka'a't'alhmuk'alhcha laka a'cho'o, u ixtan'apucha putamat katamaknulh, talhmancha muk'ay para li yu tanuyachalh oxicha kajalakawanalh.
42008017	Pus wanajcha chuni tapasay, tu'u yu ntu k'atsakan kak'atsakana', chi yu tats'e'ta kala'cha'ankana', pus kak'atsa'okana'.
42008018	Pus chunchacha, oxi k'a'asmatt'it. Yu lhit'ajun, palay kaxta'nikana'; pero yu ntu tu'u lhit'ajun, masi wa k'ischa kaxlitsukulh, kamaxtuni'okana'.
42008019	Wachuncha an ixnati chi an ixjat'ala'awnin an Jesús tala'cha'alh; pero ntu lay ixtala'cha'ani an tan ixyachalh mu wanajcha lhilhuw.
42008020	Pus xapumatam juniy an Jesús: —Aminati chi amijat'ala'awnin ma'spa tayananchalh, ma tat'achiwimputunan.
42008021	Pero yucha jajuniy: —Yu kinati chi kijat'ala'awnin yu'uncha an yu ta'asmat'a an ixchiwinti Dios, chi ta'ilhtuy.
42008022	La'atam wilhchan an Jesús jat'atajulh laka barco an ixt'alhtanan, chi jajuniy: —Ka'aw an ixtapiktutam lakxkan. Pus ta'alhcha.
42008023	Walh akxni ixtala'pust'ajuncha an lakxkan, yucha lhtatalh. Pus tsukulhcha lay p'as uni an lakxkan, an barco lhuwcha putajulh an xkan walaycha katatalak'aknulh.
42008024	Pus tala'alh tamakujulh, tajuniy: —¡Maestro, Maestro, ka kalakniyawcha! Yucha ostayalh, la'a'aymalhi an un chi tacha an milh milh ixlaklay an alamalh, pus wanaj sa' tawilh, sa'cha juncho'olh.
42008025	Chi jajuniy: —¿Tanischa t'ajun mijakiklaka'intik'ani? Pus ixtalaktalhanancha chi ixtalhi'a'nicha, ixtalajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha ani li masi an un chi an xkan ta'asmatniya li jalaj'aymayi?
42008026	Xli'astan tacha'alhcha tan talhiwilananchalh an jamacha'an Gadara, ixtapiktutamcha an lakxkan, yu t'alalakapu'anitacha an xalakaat'un Galilea.
42008027	Akxni takutlhicha an Jesús tayachalhcha lakaat'un, la'cha'alh pumatam lapanak yu ancha jamacha'a', ma'anchacha ixla'apaxto'ta makxkay'un, jantucha ixmala'ch'ininta chi ntucha ixcha'a ixwilh, wa laka lakpanteoncha ixtawlay.
42008028	Pus an lapanak akxni la'ts'ilhcha an Jesús, p'ascha t'asalh chi tatso'ottatawlhnilhcha la ixjach'aja an Jesús, najun: —¿Tasicha k'ilhtuyani Jesús, isTs'alh Dios yu wilhchalh talhman? ¡Lamapaynin jant'u ak'imama'alh'ajnit'i!
42008029	Chunchacha najun mu an Jesús la'a'aymalhcha an makxkay'un, juniy li kamakawlhcha an lapanak. Wanajcha a'lhuwi ixputawlachilh, masi ixch'i'ulakan laka cadena ixlaj'exa chi an makxkay'un ixli'ancha tan tu la'acha'an.
42008030	An Jesús lhisakmi juniy: —¿T'asich'a unk'an? Yucha najun: —Legión. Mu wanaj lhuw makxkay'uni ixtala'apaxto'ta.
42008031	An lakmakxkay'un sawalhcha ixtatapayniniya an Jesús li ntu kajamak'alhi tan tu inta kilhimaktay putalhman.
42008032	Ixtajuniy li kajamakawnilh li yu'uncha an p'axnincha katala'apaxt'o'a', mu wa ancha a'stitawk'a lhuw p'axnini ixta'ex'wayt'ajun, pus jamakawnilhcha.
42008033	Akxni tamakawlhcha an lapanak an lakmakxkay'un, yu'uncha an p'axnincha tala'apaxto'olh, pus wanaj t'o'o'o tata'aj'aju'olh an lakxkan, talak'aksk'anj'u'olh.
42008034	Pus an yu ixtalhist'ak'a an p'axnin akxni chunchacha tala'ts'ilh, talakats'alalhcha, ta'alhcha jamak'atsaaninini an la'acha'an chi masi tan wa jalhi'ay.
42008035	Pus an lapanakni ta'alhcha la'ts'inini tuchini tapasalhcha; tala'cha'alhcha an Jesús, chi an lapanak an yu tamakawlh lakmakxkay'un sa'cha ix'wilh la ixjach'aja an Jesús, ixmala'ch'inincho'otacha chi oxicha ixjalakpastaknancho'oy; pus ixtalaktalhanancha.
42008036	An yu tala'ts'ilh tanischa lhik'uch'uk'alh an yu ixtala'apaxto'ta makxkay'un ixtat'alajunicha an ali'in.
42008037	Wachuncha ixchuxk'an tacha an ts'anaks ixta'ayxto'nun an yu ancha ixtalhilakwilanalh xalakat'un Gadara, tatapayninilhcha an Jesús li ka'alhcha, mu sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan, pus an Jesús tajucho'olhcha an laka barco, alhcha.
42008038	Pero an lapanak an yu tamakawlh lakmakxkay'un sawalhcha ixt'ak'uxa'ani an Jesús, pero an Jesús tu makawnilh, juniy:
42008039	K'ap'inch'o'ochicha mincha'a, k'alaknawna'acha tuchi laj'ay tanlhuncha lay ilhtuy an Dios, tani ilhtuncha. Pus yucha alhcha, ixlaknajuncha an la'acha'an tuchi laj'ay tanlhuncha lay ilhtuy an Jesús, tani ilhtulhcha yucha.
42008040	Akxni cha'ancho'olhcha an ixtapiktutam lakxkan an Jesús, sawalhcha talaj'achani talakatastuklhi an lapanakni, mu anchacha ts'anaks ixtapakxan'ita.
42008041	Wachuncha cha'alh pumatam lapanak junkan Jairo, xajefe an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, tatso'ottanilhcha la ixjach'aja an Jesús, chi tapaynisk'inilhcha li kat'a'alh la ixcha'a'.
42008042	Mu wa pumatam istsi ixlit'ajun katacha la'akawt'uycha k'ata ixpakxanta chi ixnit'ajuncha. Akxni ixtit'a'ancha an Jesús sawalhcha ixtapa'asi mu wanajcha lhilhuwi ixch'a'o'akanta.
42008043	Pus pumatam t'aku yu ancha ixma'anta, la'akawt'uycha k'ata ixta'an'ay, wa ixmaj'an ixjak'alhni, chi ixmakamin'ojotacha ixtumin laka lakjak'uch'unu pero ntu layi ixtak'uch'uy.
42008044	Pus ch'a'o'ayawlh, la x'a'lhch'a pupiktuch'apanichalh an ixla'ch'it, walh wa akxniy sa' tayanilh an ixjak'alhni.
42008045	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha ki'aych'apachalh? Pero ntu xamati tu'u alhtaylh. Pus an Pedro chi an yu ancha ixtat'ayanalh tajuniy: —Maestro, sawalhcha tapa'asiyan chi tatisamaj'anan, mu wanajcha lhilhuw, ch'i lhasakminini tichini aych'apacha'ancha.
42008046	Pero an Jesús wa jajumpalay: —Kaxamati ki'aych'apachalh, mu ijk'atsayi li tak'uch'ulhi akxni an ki'aych'apachalh.
42008047	Pus akxni an t'aku la'ts'ilhi li ntu lay kati'alhtats'e'lhi, talhanajla'alhi an Jesús chi tatso'ottanilhcha la ixjach'aja. Junilhcha an Jesús la ix'ukxlakapuk'an chux an yu ixta'ayxto'nun tuchini lhi'aych'apachalhcha chi li akxnicha ta'oxilh.
42008048	Pus an Jesús juniy: —Kintsi', amijakiklaka'inti p'ut'ak'uch'ut'icha. Lhi'achacha k'ap'inch'o'ochi.
42008049	Ixchiwint'ajunka an Jesús, cha'alhcha pumatami yu minchalh la ixcha'a an xla'ts'ilhi'an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, juniy: —Amintsi nilhcha, t'uch'a ali k'ama'ach'ap'u an Maestro.
42008050	Pero an Jesús asmatlhi pus juniy: —Jant'u k'at'alhan, wa k'ajak'iklak'a'incha, walh kata'alhtaxtuya'.
42008051	Akxni cha'alhcha an laka cha'a an Jesús, jantu wa tichicha makawnilhi kat'atanulh, wa yucha an Pedro chi Jacobo chi Juan chi an ixpay chi an ixnati an jatsi'.
42008052	Ixtalhita'oxila'alhicha chi ixtalhilaj'alhuncha an yu ancha ixtatanumanalh, pero an Jesús jajuniy: —Jant'u k'alaj'alhunt'it; mu ntu nita an jatsi', wa lhtatay.
42008053	Yu'uncha wa xtalhits'i'in, mu ixtala'ts'incha li ixnitacha.
42008054	Pero an Jesús ma'ch'apachalh, p'ascha juniy: —¡K'a'ost'aycha jatsi'!
42008055	Wachuncha la'awcho'olh watukan, chi ostayalhcha, chi an Jesús lhinawlhcha li kamawakalh.
42008056	Pus an ixpaynin an jatsi ixtalhi'a'nicha; pero an Jesús jajuniyli ntu xamati katajunilh tacha an tapasalh.
42009001	An Jesús jama'ayxto'olhi an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan chi ja'ilhtulhcha li lay katatamakxtuya tanlhun lakmakxkay'un chi li layi katak'uch'uya wa tuchicha ta'an'at.
42009002	Jamala'achalhcha li kata'alh lhichiwinin an ixlich'alhkat Dios chi li katak'uch'ulh an ta'an'anin.
42009003	Jajuniy: —T'u t'u'u k'alhip'it'it para laka tij, t'u k'alhip'it'iti minpalikk'an, chi mibolsajk'an, chi pan, chi tumin, chi alht'uy mila'ch'itk'an.
42009004	Wa t'anch'unch'a k'ach'ip'ina'it laka cha'a wa anch'ach'a k'at'awla'it, sta akxni k'ap'inch'o'oya'itcha.
42009005	Chi wa tanchuncha la'acha'an t'u la'a'ik'anat'it, k'at'axt'ut'it, chi k'alakch'ank'alhap'uxk'ant'iti an po'xmi para li katak'atsalhi li ntu oxi tacha an talay.
42009006	Pus yu'uncha tataxtunilhcha ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni, ixtalhichiwiniycha an laj'oxi chiwinti chi ixtajak'uch'ununcha.
42009007	An rey Herodes k'atsalhi tacha an ixlaktapasay, pus tucha ixlimacha'xay mu ali'in ixtalaknajun li ma yucha an Juancha la'awcho'olh,
42009008	ali'in ixtalaknajun ma yucha an Eliascha talakasucho'olh, chi ali'in ixtalaknajun ma wa xatichicha an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Diosi la'awcho'olh.
42009009	Pero an Herodes najun: —An Juan kit'ini iklhinawlh li ka'a'cha'xkalh, ¿tisiyuchacha an yu lhichiwinkani? Pus ixmispaputuncha.
42009010	Akxni tala'cha'ancho'olhcha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tajunicha tuchini ta'ilhtulhcha. Yucha ja'aylhi'alhcha tan wa ix'akstuk'an an la'acha'an Betsaida tan tu la'acha'an.
42009011	Pero akxni an lapanakni tak'atsaalh, tach'a'o'alh, pus tala'cha'alhi an Jesús, yucha jala'a'ilh, tsukulhcha jalhixa'alayi an ixlich'alhkat Dios chi ixjak'uch'uycha an yu wa ixtata'an'ay.
42009012	Akxni ixta'oxat'ajuncha tala'cha'alhcha an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tajuniy: —K'ajamala'ach'ach'o'ocha an lapanakni para li kata'alhcha puxkawnini tanchuncha katajastaknana chi para li kata'alhcha puxkawnini an la'acha'anaxni u masi tan wa lakalakrancho yu kata'uya', an tan wani laklhitamakajun, mu ani ntu tu'u alin.
42009013	An Jesús jajuniy: —K'ajaxt'a'nitcha uxitnani yu kata'uya'. Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh: —Wa a'xkisi pan chi ma'at'uy jatanti iklhit'awnaw, ka wanaj ak'aw jatamawninini yu kata'ulh tacha an ta'ayxto'nun.
42009014	Tacha la'akisi milh lapanakni ixta'ayxto'nun. An Jesús jajuniyan ixt'alhtanan: —K'a'unitka li katalaktawilhka', t'up'uxamkawincha (50) katalaktawilh kilhmaktamin.
42009015	Pus chunchacha ta'ilhtulh.
42009016	Chi an Jesús xa'a'ilhcha an a'xkisi pan chi an ma'at'uy jatanti, tala'st'alhcha an lakt'iyan, li xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun chi la'ch'e'elhcha, jala'xta'nilhcha an ixt'alhtanan para li katamala'pitsilhcha.
42009017	Pus ixchuxk'ancha talak'ulh, talhikiklalhcha. Chi an yu ntucha lay ta'o'olh xaxajni tamach'ixtamicho'olh la'akawt'uy canasta.
42009018	A'tamchacha akxni ixtapaynit'ajun wa ix'akstu an Jesús, jajuniyan ixt'alhtanan mu ancha ixtat'a'aklat'ajun: —¿Tisi kit'incha tanajun an lapanakni?
42009019	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Ali'in tanajun ma Jama'paxanaj Juank'at'i, ali'in ma Eliask'at'i, chi ali'in tanajun ma xamati yu an ma'anchacha ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Diosi la'awcho'olh.
42009020	Pus yucha jajuniy: —¿Chi uxitnan tisi kit'inch'a nawnat'iti? An Pedro juniy: —Uxint'i ixCristo Dios.
42009021	An Jesús sawalhcha jajuniyli ntu k'is xamati katajunilh.
42009022	Chi jajuniy: —Kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak akstakma'alh'ajnana', chi ntu akintitala'ts'imputulhi an laktatanincha chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin. Akintama'niya pero ixlila'at'utu wilhchan akla'awcho'oya'.
42009023	Chi tan ixchuxchak'an jajuniy: —Li xamati kint'alhtana jumputun, kamakawlhcha yu wa xjatapast'ak'atcha, kaxa'a'ilhcha xcruz yu lay kapuma'nikalh chi akinch'a'o'alhcha.
42009024	Mu yu kama'alhtaxtuputuna ixjatsukunti, kama'ats'an'aya', pero yu kama'ats'an'aya ixjatsukunti kilakata, kama'alhtaxtuya'.
42009025	¿Tasipi lhila'ancha masi an lapanak wanajcha ix'anu kajun'olh an lakamunulhpa, li wa akstu lakt'ilhi'ulakancha chi wa akstu ma'ats'an'akancha?
42009026	Yu kint'amaxanan chi t'amaxanani an kinchiwinti wachu akt'amaxanana akxni akmina tacha Rey, la ixmakalip'at an kimPay chi la ixmakalip'atk'an an stalan'a ix'angelhnin.
42009027	Pero klajunaw an ali'in yu ani tat'ajun jantu katitanilhi li ntuka' tala'ts'ini an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
42009028	Xli'astan katacha la'atsajincha wilhchan la'pusli chuncha ixjalhixa'alata an Jesús, jat'a'alhcha an Pedro chi Juan chi an Jacobo tanchun a'stitawk'a, alhcha tapaynini'.
42009029	Akxni ixtapaynit'ajuncha, an ix'ukxpu tapaxalhcha, chi an ixla'ch'it wa sut'ut'ucha walh chi wa xlimjnik'acha.
42009030	Chi tatalakasulhcha ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni yu ixtat'achiwiniy. Yu'uncha an Moisés chi an Elías.
42009031	Wa xlimjcha ixjunita ixtuntala'acho'ok'an, ixtalhit'alakchiwiniycha an Jesús li ka'anacha, mu wa k'ischa ists'an'ani yu kamuktaxtuya an la'acha'an Jerusalén.
42009032	Pus an Pedro chi an yu ixtat'a'anta masi sawalhcha ixtalaklhtataputun talhitayanilh, tala'ts'ilhi li an Jesús ay, wa xlimnik'acha ixjunita chi an ixt'uyunk'an an yu ixjat'achiwiniy.
42009033	Akxni ixtita'ancho'oycha an yu ixjat'achiwiniy an Jesús, an Pedro juniy an Jesús: —Maestro, ¡Oxi li ani ikt'awnaw! akyawyaw a'at'utu mulht'a', a'atam mi'anucha, a'atam ix'anucha Moisés chi a'atam ix'anucha Elías. Tu ixk'atsay tani ixnawt'ajuncha an Pedro.
42009034	Chunchaka ixnawt'ajun, ta'alhtajulh la'atam jataputs'i, jala'atanchanulhcha, pus ixtalaktalhanancha akxni ixjala'atanchanutacha an jataputs'i.
42009035	Wachuncha an laka jataputs'i chiwinkalhcha, nawkan: —Yucha aniya yu iksakxtuta kinTs'alh, yuch'a k'a'asmatnit'it.
42009036	Akxni chunchacha naw'okalh, an Jesús wa ix'akstucha tala'ts'incho'olh. Chi yu'uncha ntu k'is talaknawlh, alhcha panch'e'ex akxni chuncha tapasachalh tu xamati ixtajuni tacha an tala'ts'ilh.
42009037	Tunkunchalh akxni tata'alhtajucho'olhcha an a'stitawk'a, lhuw lapanaki talakatastuklhi.
42009038	Ancha ixma'anta pumatam lapanak p'ascha xa'alay an Jesús, juniy: —Maestro, iktapaynisk'iniyan li k'ala'ts'ika an kints'alh, wa ix'akstu kints'alh;
42009039	walh chi wa la'apaxto'palay makxkay'un, wa la'a'ijcha tsukuy t'asay chi p'ascha lakchikixa, wa xut'ut'ucha a'pupuy stakcha lhitama'chapuy chi ntu makawputun.
42009040	Ijkatapaynisk'inilhcha amint'alhtanan li akintak'uch'unilhka', pero ntu lay tak'uch'uy.
42009041	An Jesús alhtaylh najun: —¡ Yu ch'away t'awnat jant'u jak'iklak'a'ininat'it, wa t'ani lap'ut'unatcha layat'itcha! ¿ Tasu wanancha wa aktilat'a'aklatsukuyawi? ¿ Tasu wanancha wa aktilalhilhitayaniyawi? K'alhit'a amints'alh.
42009042	Akxni stalhcha la'alhi an ts'alh an Jesús, an makxkay'un ma'talh, p'ascha lakchikixli; pero an Jesús la'a'aymalhi an makxkay'un pus ta'oxilhcha an ts'alh chi ma'axta'nicho'olhcha an ixpay.
42009043	Sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya ixchuxk'an li an Dios ay. Chunchaka ixtalhi'a'nit'ajun tacha an ixlak'ilhtuy an Jesús, yucha jajuniyan ixt'alhtanan:
42009044	Oxi kata'akatutanun aniy chiwinti yu aklajunaw: kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak akima'axta'kana la ixmakak'an an lapanakni.
42009045	Pero yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xanilhi tuchini ixjajunicha, mu lhima'anxkayi para yu'uncha kaxtalhimacha'xalh, chi ntucha talhisakmiputulh, mu ixtatalhanajlay.
42009046	Wachuncha tsukulhcha talalhisakmipaxay tichini palaycha xa'ayi kajuna de yu'uncha.
42009047	Chi mu an Jesús ixjak'atsaniya tani ixtajatapastaknancha la ixjalhunutk'an, xa'a'ilh pumatam jas'at'a la ixpa'xticha yawlh.
42009048	Chi jajuniy: —Watichicha yu la'a'iya ani jas'at'a la kintalakask'i, kit'ini kila'a'i, chi yu kila'a'i, yucha la'a'i an yu kimakmintalh; xliyu yu palay wa xalakat'ikt'i de chux uxitnan, yucha yu palay xa'ay.
42009049	Pus an Juan alhtaylh juniy: —Maestro, kla'ts'inaw pumatam lapanak yu ixjak'uch'uyi la mintalakask'i an yu wa tala'apaxt'o'a makxkay'un; pero ntucha ikmakawniw mu ntu kintach'a'o'ayan.
42009050	An Jesús juniy: —Jantu k'ala'aymat'it, mu yu ntu tani kinta'ilhtuyan, kintat'a'anan.
42009051	Akxni wanicha ixchint'ajun panch'e'ex para li an Jesús ka'anacha lakt'iyan, wachunchacha t'ak'alh lhi'ilhtulh ixtak'atsan li ka'anacha la'acha'an Jerusalén.
42009052	Jamala'achalhcha lapanakni p'ulhnaj yu ta'alh puxkawninin tan kacha'ana', lakatam xala'acha'an Samariajcha tacha'alh,
42009053	pero an yu ancha jamacha'an tu tala'a'ilh, mu ixtak'atsayi li Jerusaleni ka'ana an Jesús.
42009054	Pus akxni tak'atsaalhi an Jacobo chi an Juan yu ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ¿Na'uni li akma'alhtajuwi jikmi an lakt'iyan para li katala'xaw'olh?
42009055	Pero an Jesús yucha jalaj'aymalh, jajuniy: —Uxitnan jantu k'ats'aaya tuchi takuwincha lhit'awnat.
42009056	Kit'in yu kwalh isTs'alh Lapanak ikminta jama'alhtaxtunu an ixjatsukuntik'an lapanakni, jantu ikminta jama'nini'. Chi ta'alhcha lakatam la'acha'an.
42009057	Akxni laka tijcha ixtat'ajun, pumatam juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, wa t'anch'unch'a k'ap'ina'a akt'a'anan.
42009058	An Jesús alhtaylh: —An zorrajnin talhit'ajuni ixcha'ak'an, chi an ts'o'on talhit'ajuni ixpamaj'ank'an; pero kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak jantu inta ikmast'ak'ay ki'a'tsulh.
42009059	Chi pumatam jumpalay: —Ak'inch'a'o'acha. Yucha juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, kachajcha p'ulhnaj ikti'an maknunu an kimpay.
42009060	An Jesús juniy: —K'amak'awcha, kachajcha tamaknulhi ixjaninink'an an janinin, uxint'i k'ap'inchicha lhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios.
42009061	Chi pumatam wachu najun: —Akch'a'o'ayani, Jamach'alhkat, pero kachajcha p'ulh ikti'an jamak'atsanini an yu taa ijkalhila'ts'in an la kincha'a'.
42009062	An Jesús juniy: —Tu xamati li akxni ma'lhts'anch'apatacha ixtarpalaj la ix'a'lhch'acha kalaka'alh, yu chuncha lay, jantu lhitapalayi an la ixlich'alhkat Dios.
42010001	Xli'astan an Jesús pumat'utump'uxamkawt'uy (70) lapanakni jasakxtupalh, chi jala'mala'achalhcha ixlipumat'uyunk'an p'ulhnaj, ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni chi tanlayjcha tan ixpast'ak'a li ka'ana'.
42010002	Ixjajuniy: —Lhuwi an tapatsat walh chi ntu ixluwk'ani an yu tatapatsay, xliyu k'at'ap'ayninit'iti an yu jamanawin an tapatsat li kajamakmilh aliy yu katatapatsalh.
42010003	Uxitnan k'ap'inchi'itcha, k'ats'ayatcha li kit'in klamak'anaw tacha borregojnin ixtan'ajni tan wanaj lhuw tat'ajun ma'tilin.
42010004	Jant'u k'alhip'it'iti mintumink'an chi mibolsajk'an chi miwarachijk'an, chi ntu xamati k'at'ilhima't'ijlat'it k'at'ila'axa'alat'it laka tij.
42010005	Wa tanchuncha k'ach'ip'ina'it laka cha'a p'ulhcha k'anawna'it: —Dioscha kajalhistaklhi yu ani tawilanalh laka cha'a'.
42010006	Chi li xamati ancha wilh yu ists'alhi an oxi jatawlhnat, an mi jama'oxintik'an la ixjatsukunticha katsukuya'; pero li jantu, tu tu'u kati'alilh yu oxi tu'u ancha.
42010007	Wa anchacha k'at'awla'it t'an ch'ip'inat laka cha'a', jant'u k'at'alak'ap'axats'uk'ut'iti laka cha'a', ancha k'awayna'it chi k'a'ot'a'it yu xt'a'nik'anat'it; mu yu tapatsay cha'ani li kamapalhnikalh.
42010008	Wa tanchuncha la'acha'an ch'ip'inat li la'a'ik'anat, k'a'u't'iti yu xt'a'nik'anat'it.
42010009	Chi k'ajak'uch'ut'iti yu ancha ta'alin ta'an'anin, k'aja'una'it: —Wa nicha tala'chint'awnan an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
42010010	Pero wa tanchuncha la'acha'an ch'ip'inat'it tan t'u la'a'ik'anat'it, akxni laka callejcha t'awnat k'aja'una'it:
42010011	masi wa xapo'xmicha a mila'acha'ank'an iklakch'ank'alhap'uxkanaw, mu ntu oxi t'ach'a an layat. Pero klamak'atsaaniyaw, an ixlich'alhkat Dios wa nicha tala'chintan.
42010012	Kit'in klajunaw akxni kachinacha panch'e'ex, anchunu la'acha'an yu ntu tala'a'iyan, palay kala'a'iya lhima'alh'ajna walh jantu an la'acha'an Sodoma.
42010013	¡K'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'a la'acha'an Corazín! ¡K'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'a la'acha'an Betsaida! Li an la'acha'an Tiro chi an la'acha'an Sidoni chuncha ixlaktapasalh tacha an laj'oxi tanlhun laktapasalh t'an wilat'it, ma'anchacha ixtaja'asmatnalh yu'uncha. Ixtala'la'ch'ilhi laklhwat'aka ixla'ch'itk'an chi ixtalaktawilhi laka lhk'ak'a.
42010014	Xliyu li akxni kachinacha panch'e'ex kanawkana tanchuncha ka'ana atamj atamj, uxitnan p'alay k'ama'alh'ajnana'it, an la'acha'an Tiro chi Sidón jantu.
42010015	Chi uxint'i la'acha'an Capernaúm ¿na'uncha li sta lakt'iyancha k'ach'ixk'ana'a? Jantu, uxint'i k'ama'alht'a'uk'ana'a laka lhinin.
42010016	Yu ta'asmatniyan, kit'ini ki'asmatni; chi yu ntu ta'asmatniyan, kit'ini ntu ki'asmatni; chi yu kila'amaj'an yucha an yu kimakminta la'amaj'an.
42010017	An ixt'utump'uxamkawt'uyk'an (70) lapanakni sawalhcha ixtalaj'achani akxni tatasp'itcho'ochalhcha, tajuniy an Jesús: —Jamach'alhkat, masi an lakmakxkay'un kinta'asmatniyani akxni ijkalaj'aymayaw la minta'a'ut.
42010018	Yucha jajuniy: —Kit'in kla'ts'ini an Satanás akxni watacha jamakalipnicha patajulh an lakt'iyan.
42010019	Uxitnan kla'ilhtuyawi li layi k'ajap'ut'ayaya'it an tsapulin chi an kululhnin, chi wa tuchicha ixmakxkayaxtu an xapay makxkay un, pero ntu lay taa katita'ilhtun.
42010020	Pero ntu xliyu k'alhilaj'ach'ant'it li ta'asmatniyan an lakmakxkay'un, k'alaj'ach'ant'it li aminta'a'utk'an ts'o'muk'akantacha awint'i lakt'iyan.
42010021	Wa akxni an Jesús achalhcha, yucha an ixTakuwin Dioscha chuncha ilhtulh, najun: —KimPay, uxint'i ayk'at'i, Jamach'alhkatk'at'i lakt'iyan chi lakaat'un, uxint'i ilht'u li ntu katalhimacha'xalhi an tanlhun an yu sawalhcha tajalakpastaknan tanajun chi an yu sawalhcha lay talhimaacha'xay tanajun, yu'uncha an yu tajakilhpatinijk'atsayi ja'ilht'u li katalhimacha'xalh. Chuni kimPay, uxint'ich'a ch'unch'a oxi lhi'ach'anin.
42010022	Chux an tanlhun kima'axta'ni'olhi an KimPay. Chi ntu xamati kimispay tichini kit'incha, wa yucha an KimPay; chi an KimPay wachu ntu xamati mispay tichini yuchacha, wa kit'ini ikmispay chi yu ijkamamispaniputun.
42010023	Jala'ancho'olhcha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús jajuniytan wa ixpu'akstuk'an: —Oxi para yu'uncha an yu tala'tsin t'ach'a an la'ts'inat'it,
42010024	mu ixluwk'an yu an ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios chi an rejnini ixtala'ts'imputun t'ach'a an la'ts'inat'it, pero ntu tala'ts'ilh, chi ixta'asmatputuni an yu asmat'at'it, pero ntu ta'asmatlhi.
42010025	Wa chuncha pumatam yu la'mispay lhamap'a'sin tayalh lhila'ts'intanuycha an Jesús, juniy: —Maestro, ¿tisuncha ak'ilhtulh para li akixta'nikalhi yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy jatsukunti?
42010026	An Jesús juniy: —¿Tasicha ts'o'kanta an laka lhamap'a'sin? ¿T'asich'a p'una'un?
42010027	An xamaestro lhamap'a'sin najun: —K'amap'ayniya'a amijamach'alhkat Dios, chux la mijalhunut, chux la mintakuwin, chux la mintachaput chi chux la mijatapast'ak'at. Chi k'amap'ayniya'a mint'alapanak t'ach'a map'aynik'an mi'akstu.
42010028	An Jesús juniy: —Oxicha t'ach'a an ja'alht'ayan; wa k'a'ilht'ucha, walh k'alhits'uk'uya'a an jatsukunti.
42010029	Pero yucha ntu tu'u lhitamaxaniputulh, jumpalayi an Jesús: —¿Chi tisiyuchacha kint'alapanaki?
42010030	An Jesús juniy: —Pumatam lapanak tajuminchalh la'acha'an Jerusalén ixti'an la'acha'an Jericó. Walh tapaxto'lhi ja'alhawnan wanaj tamaxtuni'olhi ixtanlhun. Stakcha talakasamalh wanajcha ixtama'nit'ajun chi xli'astan tamakawlhcha, ta'alhcha.
42010031	Walh o'palaj chuncha lhila'cha'alh pumatam sacerdote ancha ixpula'pust'ajun, wa sa' a'la'ts'imay, wakcha alh.
42010032	Wanajcha chun pumatam lapanak levitaj ancha pula'puspalh, sa'cha a'la'ts'imay wachu chi wakcha alh.
42010033	Pero pumatam lapanak de Samaria yu ancha ixla'pust'ajun la'ts'incha, pus la'alh chi mapaynicha.
42010034	La'cha'alhcha, chi muk'anilhcha asaitej chi alhcolhi an tan ixlajk'atsanini chi la'apach'inilhcha laka la'ch'it. Ixli'astan ch'ixmuk'alhcha la ixjatapakxat yu ixpulhi'anta ixlaktanlhun, lhi'alhcha tan laka cha'a', chi lhistaklhicha.
42010035	Tunkunchalh, an lapanak de Samaria makutulh a'xt'uy ixtumin chi xta'nilhcha an yu jamacha'a', mu yucha taylhi'alhi ixjalhtanti, juniy: "K'alhist'akt'ika ani lapanak, chi tani chunchacha ali k'alhits'an'aya'a mintumin akmapusp'itnicho'oyani akxni aktasp'itcho'oyanta."
42010036	Ani ixt'utunk'an lapanakni, ¿tisiyuch'ach'a lhiwilay li ixt'alapanak sawalh an yu tapaxto'lhi ja'alhawanani?
42010037	An la'mispay lhamap'a'sin najun: —Yucha an yu mapaynilh. Pus an Jesús juniy: —K'ap'inchicha, wachucha chuni k'ak'i'ilht'u.
42010038	An Jesús taylhi'alhi ixtij, walh akxni cha'alh lakatam la'acha'an, pumatam t'aku junkan Marta aylhi'alh la ixcha'a'.
42010039	Ixlit'ajun pumatam ixp'isa'a an Marta, María ixjunkan. An María yucha sa'cha tawilh la ixjach'aja an Jesús, chi ix'alha'asmat'acha.
42010040	Pero an Marta wa yuchacha ixlatapastaknan li lhuwi ixlilat, pus stalh la'alhi an Jesús, juniy: —Jamach'alkat, ¿jant'u t'ani na'un masi an kimp'isa'a ntu kint'a'ilhtuyi an kilhilat? K'a'unka li aki'a'tayjulh.
42010041	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Marta, Marta, sawalhch'a lhak'ap'up'ini li wanajcha lhuwi amintapatsat, ch'i nt'uch'a lay sa' t'awlay.
42010042	Pero wa la'atami yu lhitapalay kalhakapu'ankalh, an María sakxtulhcha yu palay oxi chi ntu xamati katimaxtunilh.
42011001	A'tamchacha akxni ixtapaynit'ajun an Jesús tanchun, akxni tapayni'olhcha pumatam ixt'alhtana juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, akilamasuniwi tani lhitapaynikancha, tacha an Juan jamasunilh wachu an ixt'alhtanan.
42011002	Pus jajuniy: —Akxni t'ap'ayniyat k'anawna'it: KimPay, uxint'i yu wilhchi lakt'iyan, aminta'a'ut stalan'a. Kamakachilhi amilhich'alhkat.
42011003	Akilaxta'niwi yu ak'uw chaway, yu lhilhij ikma'lhtask'iniyaw.
42011004	Chi akilamala'mixiniwi kintala'alhink'an, mu kitnan wachu ijkamala'mixiniyawi yu ntu oxi tu'u kinta'ilhtuniyan. Chi jantu akilamakajuwi li akintalhila'ts'intanukan, akilama'alhtaxtuwi tan tu oxi.
42011005	Chi jajumpalay: —Kanaju xapumatam de uxitnan lhit'ajun pumatam ix'amigo, chi akxni jaytatnancha kala'alh la ixcha'a kajunilh: "Amigo, ak'imach'inin a'xt'utu pan,
42011006	mu kila'chilh pumatam ki'amigojo an kincha'a', ma'ati mintachalh, chi ntu tu'u yu akt'a'ulh."
42011007	O'sliyani li kachiwijtalakxtunikana kajunkana: "Jant'u ak'ima'ach'ap'u, laklhchajuycha an maticha chi an kijas'at'an chi kit'in klakma'ojocha, tuchalayi akti'ostayalh para akxta'nin tu'u'."
42011008	Kit'in klajunaw masi li ntu ka ix'ostayalhi para li ka 'ixta'nilhi tu'u yu ma'lhtask'iniy, mu li yucha ix'amigo, o'sliyani ka'ostayaya chi kaxta'niya yu sk'iniy li lhima'achapuy.
42011009	Xliyu kit'in klalhijunaw: K'ask'int'it, walh k'axt'a'nik'ana'it'it, k'ap'uxk'a'u't'it, walh k'ala'ch'ip'ina'it, chi k'ach'iwinint'it, walh k'amat'i'anik'ana'it.
42011010	Mu wa tichicha yu sk'in, xta'nikan, chi yu puxkajuy, la'cha'an, chi yu chiwiniy, mati'anikan.
42011011	¿Chu sna xamati de uxitnan yu xapay, kaxta'nilh tsapulh xas'at'a akxni sk'iniy jatanti?
42011012	¿U kaxta'nilh la'atam kululh akxni sk'iniy la'atam ja'axwat?
42011013	Pero masi uxitnan ay unt'at'it layi jaxt'a'niyat yu laj'oxi tanlhun amijas'at'ank'an, ¡pus aminPayk'an yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan, palaycha kajaxta'niya yu task'iniy an Stalan'a ixTakuwin!
42011014	An Jesús a'tamchacha ixtamakxtunit'ajun la'atam makxkay'un pumatam lapanak, an makxkay'un tucha ixmakawniya li kachiwinilh an lapanak, Pero akxni tamakxtulhcha an Jesús an makxkay'un la ixlakatunaj an lapanak tsukulhcha chiwiniy. Pus an yu tala'ts'in ixtalhi'a'nicha.
42011015	Pero an ali'in ixtanajun: —Aniy lapanak yucha an Beelzebú xajefe an lakmakxkay'uni t'atapatsay para li lay kajatamakxtulh an lakmakxkay'un.
42011016	Chi an ali'in ixtajuni ma kajamasunilh tu'u an lakt'iyan, ixtalhila'ts'intanuycha an Jesús.
42011017	Pero yucha ixjak'atsaniya an ixjatapast'ak'atk'an, jajuniy: —Wa tuchicha lhich'alhkat li wa lapu'aykan talakt'ilhi, chi tan wilakalh laka cha'a li wa la'aykan talakt'ilhitawlhkan.
42011018	Chi li wachu an Satanás wa ix'akstucha t'ala'aykan ¿tasucha kalhich'alhkat najtsukuya'a?, mu uxitnan nawnat li Beelzebuju ki'ilhtuy li lay ajkatamakxtulh an lakmakxkay'un.
42011019	Pus li kit'in Beelzebuju ikpak'uch'unun, an yu tach'a'o'ayan ¿tisiyuchacha tapak'uch'ununi? Yu'unchacha katajunan li sawalh u jantu t'ach'a an nawnat'it.
42011020	Li la ixmakni Diosi ijkatamakxtuy an lakmakxkay'un, tasuycha li an ixlich'alhkat Dios tala'chintancha.
42011021	Akxni xamati lapanak yu jalhistaknan la ixcha'a li k'ut'ilh chi oxi lhit'ajun ixpat'alan, lhitala'si yu laklhit'ajun la ixcha'a'.
42011022	Pero li xamati yu palay k'ut'ilh kala'cha'alh, chi kalhajalh, kamaxtuniya an ixpat'alan yu ixputa'a'tayjuy chi chux an ixlaktanlhun, yuchacha ix'anu kajuna'.
42011023	Yu ntu kint'a'an, kint'alaxkaji. Chi yu ntu kint'amala'xt'o'a wa laktilha.
42011024	Akxni an makxkay'un makajuncha an lapanak, wa lakaaxixnicha puxkawlhitsukuy tan katawilh, chi li ntu la'cha'an,
42011025	najun: — Ak'ancho'oya lakincha'a tan iktaxtuchalh; chi akxni cha'ancho'oycha, li wa sp'uijcha jalakp'alhnankanta chi jamalht'ak'anankanta,
42011026	ancha jat'ala'iniy ixpumatujunk'an yu palay wa tani talaycha lakmakxkay'un masi jantu yucha. Pus tatanuycha, anchacha tatawlay, xli'astan anchunu lapanak palaycha wa tani laycha walh masi ntu tukancha akxni wa ixlip'ulhnaj.
42011027	Chunchaka ixnawt'ajun an Jesús, pumatam t'aku an tan lhilhuw ixlakyakalh, p'ascha juniy: —Oxi para yucha an t'aku yu mala'awnin chi la'ayan.
42011028	Yucha alhtaylh juniy: —Kit'in iknajun palay oxi para yu'uncha an yu ta'asmat'a ixchiwinti Dios chi takiklaka'i.
42011029	Chi mu ali ixcha'ant'awkan, tsukulhcha jajuniy: —An lapanakni yu chaway ani tat'ajun jantu tajakiklaka'inin, task'in li tu'u kajamasunikalh, pero ntucha tu'u katijamasunikalh wa yucha an tacha putapasalhcha Jonás.
42011030	Mu tacha an Jonás yucha japumak'atsaanikalh an jamacha'an Nínive li Diosi ixmak'anta. An kit'in yu ijkwalh isTs'alh Lapanak wachu chuni ajkapumak'atsaaniya an lapanakni yu chaway tat'ajun.
42011031	An xareina la'acha'an Sabá wachu ayxtami kajat'a'ostayaya an yu chaway tat'ajun akxni kala'puskana lax'ukxlakapu Dios, chi kanawna li yu chaway t'awkani jantu ja'asmatnankan, mu yucha ma'ati minchalh akxni ki'alha'asmatchilh ixjatapast'ak'at an Salomón. Chi uxitnan masi aniya t'a'aklat'awnat'it yu palay xa'ay, an Salomón jantu, ch'unch'a nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'it.
42011032	An jamacha'an Nínive wa ayxtami katat'a'ostayaya an lapanakni an yu chawayka tat'ajun akxni kala'puskana la x'ukxlakapu Dios. Chi yu'uncha katanawna li an yu chaway tat'ajun jantu k'is taja'asmatnamputun, mu yu'uncha an jamacha'an Nínive, taja'asmatnalhi akxni jalhixa'alalh ixchiwinti Dios an Jonás. Chi uxitnan masi aniya t'a'aklat'awnat'it yu palay xa'ay, an Jonás jantu, ch'unch'a nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'it.
42011033	Jantu xamati makilhnuy la'atam pumaklhku chi kamats'e'lhicha, u ka'a't'alh'ulalhcha laka kajon. Apalij talhmancha muk'ay para li yu tanuyachalh kala'ts'ilhcha an jatapulhkunu'.
42011034	An la'chulh yucha xalampraj an lakatunaj. Li amila'chulh oxi, chux amilakatunaj lhit'aw'ojoyi jatapulhkunu'; pero li ntu oxi amila'chulh, wachu chuxi amilakatunaj lakaaputs'isni t'ajun.
42011035	K'alhak'ap'up'i, o'palaj an jatapulhkunu an lhit'a'un jatats'isni.
42011036	Li chux la milakatunajch'a lhit'aw'o'oy an jatapulhkunu, li nt'uch'a k'is int'a lhit'a'un yu jatats'isni, chuxcha katapulhku'oya', tacha akxni la'atam pumaklhku mapulhkuniyan la ixjatapulhkunu'.
42011037	Akxni chiwin'olhcha an Jesús, pumatam fariseo aylhi'alh la ixcha'a', ma kat'a'alh lakwayna'. Pus tanuchalhcha an lakacha'a an Jesús sa'cha tawilh tan yalh mesa.
42011038	Chi mu an Jesús jantu p'ulhcha ma'ch'a'alhi para li kawaynacha, tacha ancha ixtalamalaniy an judiojnin, pus an fariseo ixli'a'niycha.
42011039	Pero an Jesús juniy: —Uxitnan an fariseojnin la'ma'ach'a'ayat'iti an vaso chi an pulatoj, pero mimpulaknik'an uxitnan wa stakcha tapu'a'tsamtani yu wa alhawt'atcha chi yu ntu oxi tanlhun.
42011040	¡Tontojnin! ¿An yu ilhtulh lhima'spa, chu ntu wachu yu ilhtulh yu lhipulakni?
42011041	Palay oxi k'ajaxt'a'nit an jakilhpatinin yu lhit'awnat'it, chuncha chuxi stalan'a k'a'un'oya'it.
42011042	Pero ¡Payni'incha uxitnani fariseojnin! Ma'axt'a'atcha lakats'uniya an xax'oy menta chi an laksun mijach'itink'an chi watuchicha milhala'oxink'an, tacha najunta la kilhamapa'sink'an, pero nt'u lhak'ap'up'inat'iti an oxi lanti chi an ixjamapayninti Dios. Walh chi lhitask'iniya li k'a'ilht'ut, pero nt'u k'alhik'apmaj'amp'alat'iti an ali'.
42011043	¡Payni'incha uxitnani fariseojnin! sawalhch'a lakt'awlhp'ut'unat'iti an laka lakcha'a tan an ta'ayxt'o'aw tan lhitapalay putawlan, chi lak'ask'inat'iti li an lapanakni sawalhcha katalhiwilan, li katala'axa'alani an laka laktij.
42011044	¡Payni'incha uxitnan wa t'a'ukxp'ut'uyununat'it, wa tacha wa tan ntucha tasuy tan lak'aknukan, an lapanakni taputayayancha walh tu tak'atsay!
42011045	Pumatam an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin alhtaylh juniy: —Maestro, t'ach'a ani na'un wachucha kilalhilakajunawi kitnan.
42011046	Pus an Jesús najun: —¡Payni'incha uxitnan wachu'u xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin! Jamak'uk'ayat'iti an lapanakni yu ts'ink'i lhi'ankan, pero uxitnan masi wa laka ma'atamcha mink'its'ilimakak'an k'ap'uch'ap'achi'it, t'u ilht'up'ut'unat'it.
42011047	'¡Payni'incha uxitnani! Jala'la'oxiniyatcha an tan talak'aknunun an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, yu tama'nilh amilakpaynink'an.
42011048	Ch'unch'ach'a p'ulhimalaksuyat'it li oxi lhiwilayat'it an yu ta'ilhtulh amilakpaynink'an, mu yu'uncha tama'nilh, chi uxitnan jala'la'oxiniyatcha an tan ta'aknunun.
42011049	Xliyu wachu an Dios nawlhi la ixjatapast'ak'at: 'Ajkamak'aniya yu katalhichiwinina an kinchiwinti chi yu katanawna yu katapasaya', walh chi ali'in kaama'nikana chi an ali'in kajamama'alh'ajnikana.'
42011050	'Pus an lapanakni yu chaway tat'ajun, an Dios kajalhich'iya an ixjak'alhnik'an an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tacha an tamaj'alh, sta akxni ilhtukanchalh an lakamunulhpa',
42011051	sta akxni an maj'anchalh xak'alhni an Abel, sta akxni an maj'alh xak'alhni an Zacarías, yu ma'nikalh la ixpujan tan yalh tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan chi laka tajtan. Xliyu klalhijunaw kit'in, an Dios kajalhich'iya an yu chaway tat'ajun ixlakatak'an an yu jama'nikalh.
42011052	¡Payni'incha uxitnani xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin! Uxitnani a'ch'ap'at'at'it an xayave jalakpastaknat, pero jant'u t'anuyat'it ch'i nt'u jamak'awniyat'iti katatanulh an yu tatanuputun.
42011053	Akxni an Jesús taxtulhcha ancha, an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin, sawalhcha talhila'talh'amalh, pus tsukulhcha talhisakmi lhuw tanlhuni an Jesús,
42011054	para li tu'ucha kanawlh yu laycha katapu'alhtasulh.
42012001	Wachuncha, wanajcha la'alhuw milh lapanakni ixta'ayto'nun wa ixtalapa'ucho'oycha. Pus an Jesús tsukulhcha jaxa'alay p'ulhnaja an ixt'alhtanan, jajuniy: —K'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti li ntu katamatsaman an ixlamaskajank'an an fariseojnin, mu yu'uncha wa taja'o'xcho'onun.
42012002	Chi mu wa tuchicha yu ntu k'atsakan, kak'atsakana', chi yu wa la'asa', wachu kak'atsakana'.
42012003	Xliyu wa tuchicha tu'u nawt'at tan lakaaputs'isni, an tan putunku ka'asmatkana'; chi yu nawt'at'iti wa la'asa' chi tan laklhchajuy maticha, kalhit'asakana sta la ixlaj'a'sti an cha'a'.
42012004	Pero kit'in klajunawi ki'amigojnin: —Jant'u k'ajat'alhamnit'iti an yu tama'ni lakatunaj, mu xli'astan tucha lay ali tu'u ta'ilhtuy.
42012005	Aklajunawi kit'in tichini yu k'at'alhamnit'itcha: Yucha k'at'alhamnit'it an yu lay maxtuy jatsukunti, chi xli'astan layi kamak'ampalan laka lhinin. Yucha chun, yucha yu klajunaw k'at'alhamnit'it.
42012006	¿Chu ntu jalhist'aakani la'akisi lakt'ikt'i ts'o'on wa a'xt'uy lakt'ikt'i tumin? Walh masi chuncha, an Dios tu tu'u yu kajakaplhicha an ts'o'on.
42012007	Pus uxitnan masi wa mi'aychak'an chuxi put'e'e'okanta. Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'it, palay lhit'ap'alat'it, walh jantu masi lhuw ts'o'on.
42012008	Chi klajunaw wa tichicha yu kimispayi la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an lapanakni, kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak wachu akmispaya la ix'ukxlakapuk' an an ix'angelhnin an Dios.
42012009	Pero yu najuni li ntu kimispay la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an lapanakni, wachu ntu katimispakalhi la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an ix'angelhnin an Dios.
42012010	Wa tichicha yu wa aya kilhichiwiniy kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak kamala'mixinikana', pero yu wa aya lhichiwiniy an Stalan'a ixTakuwin Dios jantu katimala'mixinikalh.
42012011	Akxni lhip'ink'anat laka lakcha'a tan ta'ayxt'o'aw u la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an jueznin chi an jamach'alhkatni, jant'u k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti tanischa u tuchini k'aja'alht'ayanana'itcha, u t'ani k'anawna'itcha;
42012012	mu an Stalan'a ixTakuwin Dios yucha katajunan tani k'anawna'itcha akxni k'ach'iwinina'it.
42012013	Pumatam lapanak an tan lhilhuw ixlakyakalh juniy an Jesús: —Maestro, k'a'un an kint'ala'ajun li akint'alamapitsilhi an yu kintamakawnin kimpayk'an.
42012014	Pero an Jesús alhtaylh: —¿Tisiyuchacha kilhka'ulata kilhijuez u li lay aklamala'pitsiniw tu'u'u?
42012015	Chi jajuniy: K'ajalajk'atsanant'iti an la ixlitsukuputunka lhuw tanlhun, mu ntu yu xt'a'a jatsukunti.
42012016	Chi jajumpalh la'atam pulhamacha'xan, jajuniy: —Pumatam lapanak jamatumin lhuwi ma'alalh yu ixch'anta la ixlakaat'un.
42012017	Chi sa'cha ixjatapastaknan, ixnajun: ¿Tasucha aklhit'alaya li ntucha intaa aktima'alh an yu ikma'alalhi?
42012018	Chi najun: —Chunchunicha ak'ilhtuya', aklakt'ilhiya an tan ijkama'anan chi yu palaycha ayi akyawya', anchacha akma'a'oya an yu ikma'alay chi chux an kilaktanlhun.
42012019	Chi ajkunkanacha ki'akstu: Amigo, lhuwcha mintanlhun ma'at'a, para la'alhuwcha k'ata; k'asa'ch'a t'a'ulh, k'awaycha, k'a'ott'icha, chi k'ama'an'ach'at'icha.
42012020	Pero an Dios juniy: —Tonto, chawaycha aniy jatats'isni k'ama'ats'an'ach'o'oya'a amijatsukunti; an yu ma'at'a ¿tisiyuchacha ix'anu kajuna'a?
42012021	Chuncha putapasay an lapanak yu wa lhuwcha ma'ayxt'o'a ixtumin, pero la ix'ukxlakapu Dios wa jakilhpatini'.
42012022	Xli'astan jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús: —Xliyu klalhijunaw: "Jant'u k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti amijatsukuntik'an, t'uch'ini k'a'uya'itcha, ch'i t'uch'ini k'ala'ch'iya'itcha la milakatunajk'an.
42012023	Mu an jatsukunti palay lhitapalay, an wayt jantu, chi an lakataunaj wachu palay lhitapalay, an la'ch'it jantu.
42012024	K'ajala'ts'int'it an pa'an, yu'uncha ntu tach'an chi ntu tajax'anan, chi ntu tu'u talhit'ajun xmulht'a'ak'an tan katama'alh xjax'antik'an, walh an Dios jamaway. ¿Ch'u nt'u p'alay lhit'ap'alat'iti uxitnan chi an ts'o'on jantu?
42012025	Chi masi sawalhch'a k'ajat'ap'ast'aknant'it, ¿tisiyuchacha lay k'is kalhimo'slaya ixta'ayati?
42012026	Pus mu li nt'u layi ilht'uyat masi wa lakat'ikt'icha tu'u, ¿t'asu li lhak'ap'up'inatcha an ali tanlhuni?
42012027	K'ajala'ts'int'it an xanti tacha tata'ayay, yu'uncha ntu tatapatsay, chi ntu tasiwnin, walh an Salomón jantu a'tami chuncha oxi mala'ch'inilh tacha an xanti, masi yucha lhuwi ixlaklhit'ajun oxi xma'a'alit (riquezas).
42012028	Chi li an Dios chuncha jamala'ch'iniy an jach'itin an tan wa jalhi'aycha tala'ajunta, chi lhiy jala'xawapalhkancha, ¿Pus tasu li uxitnan jantu palaycha oxi katamala'ch'iniyani? ¡Wa nt'u t'uk'ancha k'iklak'a'iyat!.
42012029	Klajunawcha, uxitnan jant'u k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti t'uch'ini k'a'uya'itcha u t'uch'ini k'a'ot'a'itcha, t'uch'a k'alhak'ap'up'it.
42012030	Mu yu chuncha talay yu'uncha an lapanakni yu ntu tamispay Dios, pero uxitnan aminPayk'an k'atsaycha li ma'lht'ask'iniyat'iti an tanlhun.
42012031	Wa k'ap'uxk'a'utcha an ixlich'alhkat Dios, walh chux an ali tanlhun wa katat'axta'niyancha.
42012032	Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'iti masi ntu milhuwk'ani, kiborregojnin, mu amimPayk'an kataxta'niyani an lhich'alhkat.
42012033	K'ast'at'iti yu lhit'awnat'it, chi an tumin k'ajamala'p'its'initcha an jakilhpatinin, chuncha tachanu lak'ilht'utawnatcha bolsaj yu ntu laj'at'ilin, yu laj'oxi tanlhun (ma'a'alit) yu ntu min'ojoy an lakt'iyan, tan tulay cha'an an ja'alhawna chi an xatsapulh tu'u yu kalaj'ats'ilh.
42012034	Mu t'anch'unch'a yu k'alhits'uk'uya'it laj'oxi mintanlhunk'an, wachu ani katsukuya amijalhunutk'an.
42012035	Lhilhiyji k'ala'asijt'it chi k'alakmap'ulhk'ut'iti an pumakaklhku.
42012036	Tacha an ma'tsukunin yu tapakxan'iy ixpatronk'an akxni alh ma'wayna tan tama'xto'kani k'alat'it, para li tacha kachina chi kachiwinina k'amat'i'aniya'itcha.
42012037	Oxi para yu'uncha an ma'tsukunin li akxni kachina an ixpatronk'an takujta kajala'chimpulaya'. Yucha klajunaw o'sliyancha li kaja'ulaya laka mesa, chi kajamuniyacha apalij yucha yu kata'uya'.
42012038	Anchunu ma'tsukunin oxi para yu'uncha li takujta wa ta wanancha kachina an ixpatronk'an, jaytatnan u wats'isin.
42012039	K'ak'ats'at'iti ani: Li xamati lapanak, kak'atsalhi tuchi panch'e'excha kacha'ana ja'alhawna la ixcha'a, jantu katimakawnilhi li katanuchalh an ja'alhawna'.
42012040	Pus uxitnan wach'u k'ala'asijt'it, mu an isTs'alh Lapanak kamina akxni nt'u lhiwilayat'it li lay kamilh.
42012041	Wa chuncha an Pedro juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, ¿ani palhamacha'xan na'un wa para kitnan u para lhichux?
42012042	An Jesús najun: A ma'tsuku yu jalajk'atsanan chi yu oxi jalhistaknan la ixcha'a ixpatrón, yuchacha kamalhistaknikana an cha'a, chi yuchacha kajaxta'niya yu kata'uya an ali'in ixt'ama'tsukunin akxni katalakwaynacha.
42012043	Sawalhcha oxi anchunu ma'tsuku li akxni kachina an ixpatrón, oxi tapatsat'ajun.
42012044	Yucha klajunaw li an ixpatrón o'sliyancha li kamalhistakni'oya an ixtanlhun.
42012045	Pero li anchunu ma'tsuku kapastaklhi, kanawlh: 'Tu so'ojo katimilh an kinpatrón. Chi kajalaksamalhcha an ali'in ixt'ama'tsukunin, an t'akunin chi lapanakni, chi kawaylhcha chi ka'otlhicha yu otputun chi wa kat'a'ap'alhcha;
42012046	an ixpatrón anchunu ma'tsuku, kamina akxni ntu s'alaj wilh chi akxni ntu k'atsay tuchi panch'e'excha. Chi an ixpatrón ay lhima'alh'ajna kaxta'niya', kajat'amak'ana an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin.
42012047	'Pus anchunu ma'tsuku mu li ixk'atsaycha li tani lhi'achanicha an ixpatrón, walh chi li ntu mala'asijnilh chi ntu chuni ilhtulh tacha an ixjunkanta, kastak ayna'kana'.
42012048	Pero yu ntu ixk'atsay chi li xliyucha lhi'ilhtulh yu lay kalhimama'alh'ajnikalh, wa xlak'anti ka'ayna'kana'. Yu lhuwi ixta'nikanta, wachu lhuwi kask'inikana', chi yu palay lhuwi ixmalhistaknikanta, palay lhuw wachu kask'inikana'.
42012049	Kit'in wa tacha wa ikmintacha mama'tayana jikmi an lakamunulhpa'; chi !iknajun wa laycha li kama'taylhcha!
42012050	Akla'pusa tan alhp'as akilhila'ts'intanukana laka lhima'alh'ajna, chi sawalhcha ikma'alh'ajnan sta wa akxni chunchacha katapasaya'.
42012051	¿Ch'u nawnatcha li ikminta, sawalhcha lhi'acha katawlhkana aniy lakaat'un? Jantu, kit'in klajunaw kala'aykana'.
42012052	Chaway ati'anta, tan lhipumakisi wilakalh, katala'apitsikana'. An ixpumat'utuk'an katat'ala'aya an ixt'uyunk'an chi an ixt'uyunk'an katat'ala'aya an ixt'utunk'an.
42012053	An xapay kat'ala'aya an ists'alh, chi an ts'alh kat'ala'aya an ixpay; chi an xanati kat'ala'aya an istsi', chi an jatsi kat'ala'aya an ixnati; chi an xaput'icha'o'olh kat'ala'aya an ixput'i, chi an xaput'i kat'ala'aya an ixput'icha'o'olh.
42012054	Chi tacha an ts'anan ixlakyakalh jajumpalay an Jesús: —Akxni la'ts'inat tak'ut'achalh jataputs'i an tan ta'aknuyachalh wilhchan nawnat: "Kamina an xkan," walh chi min sawalh.
42012055	Chi akxni minachalh un lhitalaktsin, nawnat: "Lhi'ichi kajuna'." Chi chuncha jun sawalh.
42012056	¡Wa layatcha! Layi lhimacha'xayatit tani tasuycha an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un, ¿tasuch'a nt'u lay lhimacha'xayat tani t'awkancha chawayi?
42012057	'¿T'asu li nt'u akst'u p'u'unk'anatcha tanyucha yu ts'ajwi?
42012058	Li xamati chiwimaj'anan, ch'i li t'it'ap'incha laka jamach'alhkat, k'at'alakch'iwini laka tij akxni pulhijunka' para li k'ala'oxamixnit, jantu junita kamaj'ajuni la ix'ukxlakapu an juez, chi an juez kama'axta'niy la ixmakni an policia, chi an policia kamalaklhchajuncha.
42012059	Ancha ijkunan jant'u k'at'it'axt'u li nt'u map'alh'o'oy stunij yu jalhip'ininin.
42013001	Yuchaka anchunu panch'e'ex, ali'in yu ancha ixta'a'yanalh an Jesús, ixtajuniycha li an Pilato jama'nilh lapanakni jamacha'an Galilea, chi an xak'alhnik'an t'alalhitayalhcha an ixjakalhnik'an an jatapakxat yu ixtama'axta't'ajun ixla'ulank'an.
42013002	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —¿Nawnatcha li an lapanakni jamacha'an Galilea yu tani taputapasalhcha, xliyu palay ixtalhit'ajun ixtala'alhink'an, chi an ali'in yu de ancha wachu, jantu?
42013003	Klajunaw, jantu. Li nt'u mak'awnat'iti mintala'alhink'an, wach'u k'alakniya'it.
42013004	¿U sna nawnat'iti li anchunu ixpumakawtsajink'an yu tanilh akxni ja'a'lhtants'ilh an torre an laka Siloé, palay ixtajalhi'aninin walh masi jantu an ali'in yu wachu an la'acha'an Jerusalén tawilanalh?
42013005	Klajunaw, jantu. Li nt'u mak'awnat'iti mintala'alhink'an wach'u kalakniya'it.
42013006	Chi jajumpalh ani pulhamacha'xan: —Pumatam lapanak ixch'anta a'atam higo tan stak ixch'anta ix'uvaj, akxni alhcha puxkawnini xajatawk'at an ix'higo tu tu'u la'cha'aninilh.
42013007	Pus juniy an yu ixmalhistaknita an ix'uvaj: "La'at'utucha k'ata chaway ikmin puxkawnini xajatawk'at ani xak'iw higo, pero ntu tawk'ay. K'at'ich'a'xt'icha, wa la'a'ijcha yalh aniy lakaat'un."
42013008	'Pero an yu ixjalhist'aknan an tan stak ixch'ankanta uvaj, alhtaylh an ixpatron, juniy: "Patrón, k'at'imak'awnin aniy k'ata, aktanti'aj'ulaya chi akmuniya abono.
42013009	Li katawk'aniya xajatawk'at, oxicha, pero li jantu, k'at'ich'a'xa'acha.
42013010	La'atam wilhchan akxni jastaknankan an Jesús ixmasut'ajun lakatam laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin,
42013011	walh ancha ixtanun pumatam t'aku yu la'akawtsajincha k'ata ixta'an'ajt'ajun. La'atam makxkay'uni chuncha ix'ilhtuy, wanajcha ixpuxk'awitta, tucha k'is lay ixtats'awalay.
42013012	Akxni la'ts'ilh an Jesús t'asanilh, juniy: —Jant'uch'a ali k'at'it'a'an'at'i.
42013013	Chi lakpach'apachalhcha. Pus an t'aku wanaj wa akxni tats'awalalhcha, chi a'taynilhcha xta'niy lhimala'puchajun an Dios.
42013014	Pero an xajefe laka ch'a'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a, lhitalh'amalhi li an Jesús k'uch'ulhi akxni wa xawilhchan jastaknat, pus jajuniyan lapanakni: —La'achaxan wilhchani yu tapatsakan, wa akxni k'at'at tak'uch'unin, jantu akxni xawilhchan jastaknat.
42013015	Wachuncha an Jamach'alhkat alhtaylh, juniy: —¡Wa t'a'ukxp'ut'uyununat'it! ¿Chu ntu atamj atami x'ot'i ixburro u ixtoroj tan ch'iyajuta, chi ancha ma'ot'unu xkan akxni wa xawilhchan jastaknat?
42013016	Chi ani istsi Abraham yu tachanu la'akawtsajincha k'ata ixch'i'ulata an Satanás, ¿jantu layi katix'otkalhi akxni wa xawilhchan jastaknat?
42013017	Akxni chunchacha nawlh an Jesús, ixtalhimaxanancha an yu wa ixtaxkajiy, pero chux an ali'in ixtalaj'achancha li tacha an ixtala'ts'incha an Jesús ixlak'ilhtuy an yu ntu lay xamati chuncha ixlak'ilhtuy.
42013018	Chi jajuniyan Jesús: —An ixlich'alhkat Dios ¿tisuncha ixt'achuncha, chi tisuncha lay akt'alamaklhkalhi?
42013019	Wanaj tacha an xatalhts'i mostaza, yu xamati lapanak ch'an la ixlakaat'un. Ta'ayaycha, aycha k'iwi jun, chi an ts'o'on anchacha tamuk'ay ixpamaj'ank'an.
42013020	Chi jajumpalay: —An ixlich'alhkat Dios, ¿tisuncha lay akt'alamaklhkalhi?
42013021	Xt'atami an lhamaskajan, li xamati t'aku lhiyajuy lhuw harina, wanaj maskaja'ojoy.
42013022	An Jesús ixla'la'pus'antacha lakt'ikt'i la'acha'anaxni chi tan laj'ay, akxni ixti'ancha la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi ixmasulhi'antacha an ixchiwinti.
42013023	Tichiyucha juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, ¿chu wa lakats'uniya yu katata'alhtaxtuya'? Yucha juniy:
42013024	K'alhit'aalaat'iti li k'at'anuchi'it an tan wa put'ikt'i malhticha, mu klajunaw xluwk'ani yu katatanuputunanta, pero ntu katilalh.
42013025	Xli'astan akxni an jamanawin an laka cha'a katayayacha chi kamalaklhchawyacha an ixmalhticha, yu ma'spa katalaktamakawtayayanta, katalaknawna: "Jamach'alhkat, Jamach'alhkat, akilamati'aniw." Yucha kaja'alhtaya, kajajuna: "Jantu ijk'atsay t'anch'unch'a t'ant'achi'it."
42013026	Pus yu'uncha katajuna: "Ayxtami klat'alakwaytaw,chi klat'alaj'ottaw, chi an la kilajcallejk'an masut'i.
42013027	Pero yucha kajajuna: "Klajunaw jantu ijk'atsay t'anch'unch'a t'ant'achi'it'it. ¡Ix'ilhtunan tala'alhin, minchuxk'an k'ap'inchi'itcha!
42013028	Ancha kastak laj'alhunkana chi wa xwat'at'acha kalaktasat'awkana', mu katala'ts'inacha an Abraham chi an Isaac chi an Jacob chi ixchuxk'an an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios li la ixlich'alhkatcha Diosi tat'ajun, pero yu'uncha ma'spacha jamaka'ankalh.
42013029	Ali'in lhitan akxajachilh wilhchani kataminanta, chi ali'in tan lhita'aknuyachalh, chi ali'in lhitalaktsin chi ali'in lhi'alhma'ast'ay, katalaktawlacha laka mesa an la ixlich'alhkat Dios.
42013030	Kata'alina an yu chaway xati'astan tajunita, p'ulhnaja katajuna', chi an yu p'ulhnaj tajunita, xati'astani katajuna'.
42013031	Wayuchaka wilhchan tacha'alh ali'in fariseojnin, tajuniy an Jesús: —K'ap'inchicha, k'at'axt'ucha aniy mu an Herodes ma'niputunan.
42013032	Yucha jajuniy: —Anchunu ayajk'atsan k'ak'i'unit'it: "Li chaway chi lhiy ajkak'uch'uya an yu wa tala'apaxt'o'a makxkay'un chi ajkak'uch'uya an ta'an'anin, chi t'uxam ak'ilhtu'oyacha".
42013033	Pero aktaylhi'ana kintij chaway, chi lhiy chi t'uxam, mu ntu layi ma'spacha la'acha'an Jerusalén katinilh yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
42013034	¡Jerusalén, Jamacha'an Jerusalén, jama'niyat'iti an yu talhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi jalakt'alhmayat'iti an yu jamakt'anik'anat'it! !A'lhuwcha ijkamach'ixtamiputulh mijas'at'ank'an, tacha xanati piyu yu jama'ay xas'at'an la ixpa'achuj, pero nt'u k'is la'a'it'it!
42013035	Pus chaway amincha'ak'an aklakamakawna', chi klajunaw jantu akintilala'ts'incho'o, sta akxni k'anawna'it: "Lhimala'puchajuncha an yu Dios mala'achatachalh".
42014001	A'tamchacha akxni wa xawilhchan jastaknat an Jesús alh t'alakwayna pumatam xa'ay fariseo, akxni tanuchalhcha laka cha'a, an ali'in wa ixtalhist'ak'acha li tu'ucha ka'ilhtulh yu ntu oxi.
42014002	Chi an la ixlakapu ixwilh pumatam lapanak wa ixpakxanta ixjak'unti.
42014003	Pus an Jesús jajuniyan yu ixtala'mispay lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin: —¿Layi ajkak'uch'unulh akxni wa xawilhchan jastaknat?
42014004	Pero yu'uncha ntu ta'alhtaylh. Pus an Jesús ma'ch'apachalhi an yu wa ixta'an'ay, k'uch'ulh chi mala'achacho'olhcha.
42014005	Chi jajuniy an fariseojnin: —¿Xamati uxitnan, li ixburro u ixtoroj ka'alh tan a'talhman, jantu wa tukan kamakutulhi masi akxni ntu patsakan wilhchan?
42014006	Yu'uncha ntu lay tu'u ta'alhtaylh.
42014007	An Jesús sa'cha ixjala'ts'ini tacha ixtalaksakxtuy tan palay lhitapalay putawlan an laka mesaj, an yu ixjat'awaykan. Chi jajunilh la'atam pulhamacha'xan, jajuniy:
42014008	—Akxni xamati aylhi'anan k'ap'it'i t'ama'wayna tan tama'xto'kan, jant'u k'at'a'ulhi tan palay lhitapalay, walay chilh yu palay lhitapalay, yu wachu t'awayputunkan,
42014009	chi kajunin an yu tat'awaynan: "Yucha aniya katawla an t'an wilht'i, chi uxint'i k'amaxanajp'it'icha tan xati'astan wilhchalh putawlan."
42014010	Apalij akxni t'asanik'an t'awayp'ut'unk'an, xati'astani k'at'awlhchi', walh akxni kachina an yu t'awayputunan kajunan: "Amigo, palaych'a k'ast'alh t'at'i. Chuncha oxicha katala'ts'inan an ali'in yu k'ajat'at'awla'a laka mesaj."
42014011	Mu yu sawalhcha lhitapalayi najun jantu tu'u katilhitapalalh, pero yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay lay, yucha kalhitapala'
42014012	Chi an Jesús, wachu jumpalayi an lapanak an yu ix'aylhi'anta ka'alh t'alakwayna, juniy: —Akxni ilht'uy la'atam wayt, jant'u k'ajat'asanini mi'amigojnin, chi mijat'ala'awnin, chi yu t'aa jalhila'ts'in chi yu wanich'a jat'alakwilht'i yu talhit'ajun ixtumink'an, mu yu'uncha wachu wa katat'a'upalani tu'u', pus k'amap'usp'itnich'o'ok'ana'acha.
42014013	Akxni ilht'uy la'atam wayt, k'ajat'asanin an jakilhpatinin, chi an lakmaklht'ulukun, chi an lakch'anlht'ulukun, chi an la'la'lhtulu'un;
42014014	walh lani chuncha oxi para uxint'i, mu yu'uncha ntu lay katitamapusp'itnicho'on, pero anchacha oxi k'alhi'o'xla'ts'inch'o'ok'ana'a akxni katala'awcho'oya an yu ixtajakiklaka'inin.
42014015	Akxni chunchacha alha'asmat'a pumatam yu ancha ixt'awilh laka mesaj, juniy: —¡Oxi para yucha yu kama'waynanta an la ixlich'alhkat Dios!
42014016	Pus an Jesús juniy: —Pumatam lapanak mala'asijnilh ay wayt chi ixluwk'ancha jajunilh li kata'anacha ma'waynin.
42014017	Chi akxni chilhcha ixpaku an wayt, mala'achalhcha pumatam ixma'tsuku ka'alh jalakjunini an yu ixjamak'atsaanikantacha, jajuniy: "K'at'atcha, mala'asijni'okantacha an wayt ."
42014018	Pero tachalayjcha ixtalhikilh'an. Pumatam najun: "Iktamawlh ay kilakaat'un, pus ancha ak'ana laka'ana'. Lamapaynin ak'imak'akxanin."
42014019	Chi pumatam najun: "Ijkatamawlh la'akaw xapay torojnin yu japutapatsakan chi ak'ana jalhila'ts'intanunu'. Lamapaynin ak'imak'akxanin."
42014020	Chi pumatam najun: "Wa ikt'atsukukalhka, pus tulay akti'alh."
42014021	Akxni tasp'itcho'ochalhcha an ma'tsuku, jun'olhi an ixpatrón. Pus lhitalh'amalhi an ixpatrón, chi juniy an ixma'tsuku: "Watukan k'ap'inchi an laka lajcalle chi an tan wa lakt'ikt'icha calle, k'ajalhit'ana'acha an jakilhpatinin, chi an lakmaklht'ulukun, chi an lakch'anlht'ulukun, chi an la'la'lhtulu'un."
42014022	Xli'astan walh an ma'tsuku najun: "Patrón, k'ilhtulhcha an t'ach'a k'ilhi'un, pero alinka tan kalaktawlakalh."
42014023	Pus an ixpatrón juniy: "K'ap'inchi an laka laktij chi an tan wa lakput'ikt'icha tij yu lhima'spacha an la'acha'an, chi k'a'asilhit'ana'a an la kincha'a yu k'ala'ch'ip'ina'a para li ka'a'tsamkalh.
42014024	Mu klajunaw jantu xamati kati'ulh ani wayt an yu p'ulhnaj xajkat'awayputun.
42014025	Wanajcha lhilhuwi ixch'a'o'akanta an Jesús, chi tala'asp'itlhi, jajuniy:
42014026	—Li xamati kint'ak'uxa'an, pero li ntu palay kimapayniy, li palay mapayniya ixpay u ixnati u ixt'iwi u ixjas'at'an u ixjat'ala'awnin u ixjamatsanan chi yu wa ix'akstucha ixjatsukunti, jantu lay katiwalh kint'alhtana'.
42014027	Yu ntu ma'alh'ajnamputun tacha kit'in chi ntu kinch'a'o'aputun, jantu lay katiwalh kint'alhtana'.
42014028	Tacha uxitnan, li xamati yawputun la'atam torre, p'ulhnaj kasa'tawla chi ka'ilhtuyacha ixkwentaj para li kak'atsalhi li kata'a'tsaniya yu kalhiyaw'oya'.
42014029	Li jantu, li ka'ilhtuniyacha ixjach'aja, chi xli'astan tucha lay kati'ilhtu'olh, yu an tala'ts'in katamamaxaniyacha,
42014030	katajuna: "Aniy lapanak lhi'a'taynilhcha yajuy an torre, walh tu lay ilhtu'olh."
42014031	U xamati rey, akxni ka'ana t'alat'alhna pumatam ixt'arey, ¿jantu p'ulhnaj sa' tawlay chi past'ak'acha li layi kalakatast'uk'a an ixt'arey, li yucha wa la'akawmilhi ixlapanak, chi an ixt'arey yucha la'ap'uxammilh?
42014032	Chi li ntu katilalh, akxni an pumatam ma'atka mintachalh, kajamak'aniya yu kata'ana mak'ats'aninin li wa oxicha katalalhi'alh.
42014033	Pus wanajcha chuni watichicha de uxitnan, yu ntu makaw'ojoyi watuchicha lhit'ajun, jantu lay katiwalh kint'alhtana'.
42014034	An matsat oxi, pero li ma'ats'an'ay an is'o'onti, ¿tasicha lay kalhitapalhpala'a?
42014035	Masi wa an lakaat'uncha u an abono jantucha tu'u lhitapalhniy, yucha wa maj'ankancha. Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhi.
42015001	Ixchuxk'an an yu ixtalaklhach'inin tanlhun chi an la'ma'lhta'alhinin ixtala'cha'ancha an Jesús, para li kata'alha'asmatlhicha.
42015002	Pus an fariseojnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin ixtalhichiwiniycha an Jesús, ixtajuniy: —Aniy jala'a'iya an ma'lhta'alhinin chi jat'alakwajin.
42015003	Wachuncha an Jesús jajunilh la'atam pulhamacha'xan, jajuniy:
42015004	—Uxitnan xamati li yu lhit'ajun tam ciento ixborregojnin chi li akxni kama'ats'an'alh la'atam, ¿jantu katijamakawlhi an t'at'ip'uxamkawnajatsi (99) an tan jama'amani, chi ka'anacha puxkawna an yu ma'ats'an'ata sta lintu kalhitajuya'?
42015005	Li akxni lhitajucho'oycha, achancha a'x'o'alhimincho'oy.
42015006	Chi akxni cha'ancho'oycha la ixcha'a, jama'ayxt'o'acha an yu oxi jat'alalhi'an chi yu wanicha jalakt'awilh, jajuniy: —Kalaj'achawcha, mu kla'cha'ancho'olhi an kiborrego yu ists'an'ata.
42015007	Kit'in klajunaw chuncha palay lhi'acha junachalh an lakt'iyan akxni xamati makajun ixtala'alhin chi tapaxaycha, walh jantu masi ixt'at'ip'uxamkawnajatsik'an (99) yu oxi tat'ajun, yu ntu tu'u ixtala'alhink'an.
42015008	U kanajuw, xamati t'aku li lhit'ajun a'xkaw ixtumin, chi kama'ats'an'alh a'xtam, ¿jantu kamapulhkuya ixpumaklhku, chi kajap'alhnanacha, chi sawalhcha xlak'anti kapuxkawya sta li ntu kala'cha'ana'?
42015009	Akxni la'cha'ancho'oycha, jama'ayxt'o'acha an yu oxi jat'ala'lhi'an ixt'at'akunin, chi yu wa nicha jalakt'awilh, jajuniy: —Kalaj'achawcha, mu kla'cha'ancho'olhi an kintumin yu xakma'ats'an'ata.
42015010	Klajunaw chuncha talaj'achanachalh an ix'angelhnin Dios akxni pumatam ma'lhta'alhini makajuncha ixtala'alhin.
42015011	Chi nawpalay an Jesús: —Pumatam lapanak ixjalhit'ajun ixt'uyunk'an ists'alan.
42015012	An xalakat'ikt'i juniy an ixpay: —Kimpay, ak'ixt'a'nincha amintanlhun yu ki'anucha kajuna'. Pus jala'xta'nilhcha yu ix'anuchak'an kajuna'.
42015013	Jantu tukancha ma'an walh, an xalakat'ikt'i ists'alh an lapanak, st'amaj'an'olhi an yu xta'nikalh, pus ma'atcha pu'alh an tumin, lakatamcha lakat'un stak lakch'apachalh an ixtumin, wa tani ixputijunt'ajuncha.
42015014	Akxni lakch'apa'olhcha, alilh ay chawani anchunu lakat'un, pus tsukulhcha pachawaniya yucha.
42015015	Pus wachuncha la'alh pumatam lapanak yu ancha jamacha'a', sk'inilhcha tapatsat. Pus mala'achakalhcha ka'alh jalhistakna p'axnin.
42015016	Walaycha li wachucha chuni ka ixwaylh tacha an ixtawajin an p'axnin, pero ntu xamati ixta'niy yucha.
42015017	Pus sa'cha ixjatapastaknan, ixnajun: "La ixcha'a an kimpay xluwk'ani jalhit'ajun ixma'tsukunin, chi yu'uncha wa taxajnicho'oyachalhcha yu ta'uy. Chi kit'in ani iknit'ajuncha kinchawan
42015018	Akla'ancho'oya an kimpay, chi ajkuna: Kimpay, wa stakcha k'ilhtunitani tala'alhin uxint'i chi an Dios.
42015019	Jantucha ikt'acha'ani ak'i'un mints'alh. Wa tacha xapumatamcha amima'tsukunini ak'i'ilht'u!"
42015020	Pus wachuncha wakcha ancho'olh, cha'ancho'olhcha an la ixcha'a ixpay. Akxni ma'atka ix'antachalh, an ixpay la'ts'istuklhi, pus mapayniycha, la'ats'alaj'alhcha chi la'atanustuklhicha chi la'xtikilhtastuklhicha.
42015021	An ists'alh juniy: —Kimpay, wa stakcha k'ilhtunitani tala'alhin chi an lakt'iyan, jantucha ikt'acha'ani ak'i'un mints'alh.
42015022	Pero an ixpay jajuniyan ixma'tsukunin: —K'alas lhit'anchi'it la'ch'it yu palay oxi, k'amala'ch'init'it, chi k'amamakt'anut ix'aniyo, chi k'amach'ant'anut'it ixwarachi.
42015023	K'ak'i'it an yu ontacha jas'at'a toroj chi k'ama'nit'itcha, kalak'uyaw, ka'ilhtuyaw k'atan.
42015024	Mu ani kints'alh tachanu ixnitacha, walh tachanu la'awcho'olh, chi tachanu ists'an'atacha, walh la'cha'ancho'ow. Pus tsukulhcha talaj'achan.
42015025	An yu xa'ay ists'alh an lapanak ma'spa an la'acha'ani ixt'awnachalh, walh akxni ixcha'ancho'ot'ajuncha an la ixcha'ak'an, asmat'acha li lakasanankan chi li lakat'ininkan.
42015026	Pus t'asanilh pumatam ixma'tsuku an ixpay, lhisakmiycha tuchini alincha.
42015027	An ma'tsuku juniy: —Yucha amint'ala'ajuni chincho'olh, chi aminpayk'an lhinawlhi li kama'nikalhcha an yu ix'ontacha jas'at'a toroj, wa xliyu li ma oxi t'ajun chincho'olh amint'ala'ajun.
42015028	Wachuncha lhitalh'amalhi an xa'aycha ists'alh an lapanak, jantucha ixtanuputuni an la ixcha'ak'an, pus an ixpay taxtulh tapayniniycha li katanulh.
42015029	Pero yucha alhtaylh juniy an ixpay: "La'alhucha k'ata ikt'atapatsat'awnan kit'in, chi ntu a'tami wa ak'asmatmaj'anincha, walh tu a'tami masi wa lakat'ikt'icha chivo ak'ixt'a'nin para li ajkat'alak'ulhcha yu oxi ijkat'alalhi'an.
42015030	Pero li chilh ani mints'alh yu wa stakcha jakit'alakch'apalh mintumin yu wa aya talay t'akunin, lhima'nit'i an yu ix'ontacha jas'at'a toroj."
42015031	Pus wachuncha juniy an ixpay: "Kints'alh, uxint'i lhilhiji ani k'int'awilht'i, pus chux an yu iklhit'ajun minawin.
42015032	Pero chaway chuncha yu lhitask'iniy li ka'ilhtuwi ani k'atan chi kalaj'achaw, mu amint'ala'ajun, tachanu ixnitacha, pero la'awcho'olh, chi tachanu ists'an'atacha, chi la'cha'ancho'ow."
42016001	Wachu jajumpalay an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús: —Ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak jamatumin, ixlit'ajun pumatam xa'ay ixma'tsuku', walh an ixma'tsuku ta'alhtasulh li ma wa la'lha'amananicha an ixlaktanlhun.
42016002	Pus t'asanilh chi juniy: —¿Tasu li tacha anicha k'asmat'a tajunani? Ak'i'uncha t'ani yu t'ap'ats'at'a, mu chaway tucha lay ali uxint'i ak'int'it'ala'ts'ilhip'i an kintapatsat.
42016003	Pus an xa'ay ma'tsuku najun: —¿Tasucha aklhit'alaya chawayi, mu an kimpatrón akimaxtuniyacha an kintapatsati? Chi ntucha ijk'ut'ilhi para li aktapatsalh chi wa aksk'inlhicha tu'u, ikmaxanan.
42016004	Ijk'atsalhcha tani aklhit'alayacha para li kata'alilhi yu akintala'a'ilh la ixcha'ak'an akxni akimaxtunikanacha an kintapatsat.
42016005	Pus atamj atamjcha jat'asanilh an yu ixtalhi'ani an ixpatrón, pumatam juniy: —¿T'asunch'a lhip'ini an kimpatrón?
42016006	Yucha alhtaylh juniy: —Tamciento barrilh de aceiteje iklhi'ani. Pus an xa'ay ma'tsuku alhtaylh, juniy: —Ni'ijcha an jalhiki tan tasuy t'anich'unch'ach'a jalhip'ininin, k'at'a'ulhcha chi k'ats'o'muk'acha wa cincuentaj.
42016007	Xli'astan jumpalay pumatam: —¿Chi uxint'i, tasunch'a jalhip'ininini? Yucha juniy: —Tamciento kuxtalh de trigo. Pus an xa'ay ma'tsuku alhtaylh, juniy: —Anicha malhi an jalhiki tan tasuy yu p'alhip'ininin, k'ala'oxich'o'o a'xtam yu wa ochentajcha katasulh.
42016008	Pus an jamatumin lapanak najuni li sawalhcha s'alalhi an ixma'tsuku ixjunita, mu sawalhcha lhipuxkawnilhi tani lhit'alalhcha an tanlhun. Chunchacha an yu chaway ani t'awkan lakamunulhpa', yu wa tu'ucha tu'u talat'atamakajun wa li sawalhcha la's'alalan, chi an yu t'awkan laka jatapulhkunu tachanu apalij jantu.
42016009	Kit'in klajunaw, k'ajapulhajaxt'ut'iti mi'amigojnink'an an tanlhuncha alin laj'oxi aniy lakamunulhpa', walh lani akxni kamin'oya, uxitnan k'ala'a'ik'ana'it'iti an lakt'iyan tan minputawlh'alhinchak'an.
42016010	Yu oxi lhist'ak'a masi wa lakats'uni tu'u, wachu oxi kalhist'ak'a yu lhuw tu'u', pero yu ntu oxi lhist'ak'a masi wa lakats'unicha tu'u, wachu ntu oxi katilhistaklhi yu lhuw tu'u'.
42016011	Pus mu li an yu ntu xasawalh laj'oxi tanlhun lak'alin aniy lakamunulhpa jantu wa oxich'a lhist'ak'at, ¿tisiyuchacha katalhiwilayan li oxi k'alhist'ak'a'it an yu laj'oxi tanlhun sawalhi?
42016012	Chi mu li nt'u oxi lhist'akt'it yu ntu mi'anuk'an, jant'u k'at'ixt'a'nik'ant'iti yu mi'anuk'an.
42016013	Jantu xamati ma'tsuku lay ixt'uyunk'an patronin jat'atapatsay; mu an pumatam tu oxi katila'ts'ilh, chi an pumatam chun, u an pumatam kakiklaka'iya, chi an pumatam jantu. Jantu lay wa ayxtam t'atapatsakan Dios chi an tumin.
42016014	An lapanakni yu ixjajunkan fariseojnin sa'cha ixta'alha'asmat'a an Jesús, chi mu yu'uncha sawalhcha ixta'achaniya an tumin, pus tucha oxi xtalhichiwiniy an Jesús.
42016015	An Jesús jajuniy: —Uxitnani yu ntu tu'u mintala'alhink'an layat t'an la'ts'ink'anat, pero an Dios yucha tak'atsaaniyani tani mijalhunutchak'an, mu an lapanakni masi yu sawalhcha talapulhiwilay tu'u, an Dios yucha ntu k'is la'ts'imputun.
42016016	Akxni ntuka' istsukuy an Jama'paxanaj Juan, an Dios ixlakask'in li an lapanakni chuncha kaxtatsukulh tacha an ixnajunta la ixlamap'a'sin an Moisés chi tacha an ixtats'o'ta an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios. Sta akxnicha tsukulh lhichiwinkan an ixlich'alhkat Dios, pus chaway wa tichi kawalhcha lhit'aalay tanuputunachalh.
42016017	Pero palay wa lasi li an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un ka'ukla'olh, walh jantu masi wa k'ischa jantu chun kawalh tacha an ts'o'kanta laka lhamap'a'sin.
42016018	Wa tichicha yu makajun ixt'iwi chi t'atsukupalaycha pumatam t'aku, tala'alhincha ilhtuy; chi yu t'atsukuy an t'aku an yu makawkalh, wachu tala'alhincha ilhtuy.
42016019	Ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak jamatumin, sawalhcha oxi ixmala'ch'inin chi lhilhiji ix'ilhtuy oxi k'atan, ixlakwaykan.
42016020	Chi wachu ixt'ajun pumatam jakilhpatinij lapanak ixjunkan Lázaro, wa stakcha ixlakats'its'ita chi sa'cha ixtalakxtutawlay an la ixmaticha an jamatumin lapanak.
42016021	Wa laycha li ka ix'usaklhicha an tacha ixpatajuy xatach'e'e yu ixlak'ukan la ixmesaj an jamatumin, chi masi wa x'oyuncha ixtacha'an ixtalaksnawnicha an la ists'its'i.
42016022	Walh milh wilhchan an jakilhpatini, nilhcha. Pus an angelhnin talhi'alhcha tan kat'atawlantacha an Abraham, chi an jamatumin wachucha nilh, pus maknukalhcha.
42016023	Walh akxni an jamatumin lapanak stakcha ixma'alh'ajnant'ajuni an laka lhinin, tala'st'aycha, pus wa ma'at la'ts'incha an Abraham, chi an Lázaro sa'cha piktuwilhchalh.
42016024	Pus t'asajlaka'anicha, juniy: —¡Kimpay Abraham! Lamapaynin k'amala'ach'achi an Lázaro para li ka'awalhi an ix'akatan ixmaka laka xkan, chi akimats'uk'unk'unilhi an kisima'at, mu sawalhcha ikma'alh'ajnani aniy laka jikmi.
42016025	Pero an Abraham juniy: —Kints'alh, k'ap'ast'akt'i, uxint'i jama'lht'ayancha la mijatsukunti laj'oxi mintanlhun, chi ani Lázaro wa stakcha ma'alh'ajnalh; pero chaway yucha anicha ma'oxamixikan, chi uxint'i st'akch'a ma'alh'ajnan.
42016026	Atumpaj wanaj a'talhmani yu kintamala'apitsiyan, pus masi xamati yu kitnan ka'amputunchalh anchunu, jantu katilalh, chi xamati yu uxitnan kamimputulh ani, wachu ntu katilalh.
42016027	Pus an jamatumin lapanak ixjunita, najun: —Pus sawalh iktapaynisk'iniyani kimpay Abraham li k'amala'ach'at'ika an Lázaro an la ixcha'a kimpay,
42016028	mu ijkalhit'ajun ixkisink'an kijat'ala'awnin, kajamak'atsaanilh, para li ntu katamilh wachu ani tan ay lhima'alh'ajna.
42016029	An Abraham juniy: —Talhit'awnachalhcha an tan ts'o'muk'ata Moisés chi an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, yuchacha kata'asmatchalh.
42016030	Yucha najun: —Jantu, kimpay Abraham, li xamati ka'alh yu ixnitacha kataja'asmatnantachalh.
42016031	Pero an Abraham alhtaylh: —Li ntu ta'asmatniya an Moisés chi an yu talhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, wachu ntu katitakiklaka'ilhi masi xamati kajala'alh yu ixnitacha.
42017001	An Jesús jajuniyan ixt'alhtanan: —Jantu layi jantucha kati'alilh yu kaputa'a'takalh, pero yu walhuncha ilhtuyi li xamati ka'ilhtulh tala'alhin,
42017002	yu ilhtuyi li kats'antijlalhi xapumatam ani xalaktikt'in, palay oxi kalhtuj ch'ipixtanukalh xachiwx palakskitin, chi kawarjcha maka'ankalh alamalh.
42017003	K'ajalajk'ats'anant'it. Li xamati mint'ala'ajun ilhtuniyan tu'u tala'alhin, kala'a'aymat'i, chi li astan najun, k'amala'mixinin.
42017004	Chi li tam wilhchan, a'tujuni tu'u yu ntu oxi ilhtunin, chi li a'tujuni la'cha'ancho'on junan: —Astan iknajun, tucha chuni aktilalh. K'amala'mixinin.
42017005	An ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixtat'alhtanan an Jesús, tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat, ali akilaxta'niwi jakiklaka'inti.
42017006	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Li k'ajak'iklak'a'inint'it masi wa tacha an xatalhts'icha mostaza, layi k'a'una'it'it ani k'iw junkan sicómoro: K'a'ost'i, an lakxkancha k'at'ayachi', walh kata'asmatniyan.
42017007	Li xamati de uxitnan lhit'ajun pumatam ixma'tsuku yu anta jalhistakna mintorojk'an u anta jalakpujnu la minkuxtuk'an, akxni chincho'oycha, ¿ch'u unat'it?: K'at'anut'icha, k'at'a'ulhcha, k'awaycha.
42017008	Li mu jantu, uxitnan unat: —K'ajamap'axancha oxi, ak'ila'oxinincha yu ak'uya chi ak'i'iniya'acha, xli'astan k'awayna'acha wachu chi k'a'ot'a'acha wachu yu otp'ut'un akxni ikway'ojotacha kit'in p'ulhnaj.
42017009	Chi wachu ntu xta'niya lhimala'puchajun an ixma'tsuku an yu lhinajun li ilhtunilhcha yu lhijunilh.
42017010	Wanajcha chuni uxitnan, akxni ilht'ut'atcha yu talhijunan Dios, k'anawna'it: —Jantu oxi ma'tsukunini kitnan, mu an yu k'ilhtu wa xliyu kilhi'ilhtutk'an.
42017011	Akxni ixti'ancha la'acha'an Jerusalén an Jesús, lhitapitsicha xalakaat'un Samaria chi Galileaja ixpula'pust'ajun.
42017012	Walh akxni cha'alh lakatam la'acha'an, taxajnichilh ixpumakawk'an lapanakni yu wanajcha ixtalakap'uch'i'ojota, wa ma'atcha sa' tatayachalh
42017013	chi ixtat'asajlaka'anicha, ixtajuniy: —¡Jesús, Maestro, klask'iniyaw ay lamapaynin!
42017014	Akxni jala'ts'ilh an Jesús jajuniy: —K'ajak'it'alak'asunit'it an sacerdotejnin. Walh akxni wa ixtita'anka, tatala'a'oxi'olhcha.
42017015	Pus xapumatam, la'ts'inkancha li tala'a'oxilhcha, tasp'itcho'ochalh, ixta'nicha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, ixlipukilht'asaycha.
42017016	Tatso'ottatawlhnilhcha la ixlakapu an Jesús, tamuntitachalhcha, ixta'nicha lhimala'puchajun. Aniy lapanak jamacha'a Samaria.
42017017	An Jesús najun: —¿Chu ntu ixpumakawk'ani an yu tatala'a'oxilh, an ixpumanajatsik'an tanischa tat'ajuni?
42017018	¿Jantucha xamati kak'uxamilh xta'nini lhimala'puchajun Dios, wa yucha anicha yu ntu ani jamacha'a'?
42017019	Pus an Jesús juniy an lapanak: —K'at'aycha, k'ap'inch'o'ochicha; mu jak'iklak'a'inin p'us t'ak'uch'ut'icha.
42017020	An lapanakni yu ixjajunkan fariseojnin talhisakmilh an Jesús taniwanancha kachina an ixlich'alhkat Dios, yucha ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —An xlich'alhkat Dios jantu katila'ts'inkalhi akxni kamina'.
42017021	Jantu katinawkalh: —¡Jo', k'ala'ts'int'itcha, anicha t'ajun! u ¡anucha t'awnachalh!; mu an ixlich'alhkat Dios tat'a'aklat'awnancha.
42017022	Chi jajuniyan ixt'alhtanan: —Kamina panch'e'exi akxni uxitnan akilala'ts'imputunawi kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak, masi wa la'atamcha wilhchan, pero ntu akintilala'ts'iw.
42017023	Chi k'a'unk'ana'it: —¡Aniya t'ajun, u anu t'awnachalh! Pero nt'u k'ap'it'it, jant'u k'ajach'a'o'at'it.
42017024	Mu akxni akmina kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak, wa tacha akxni an jamakalipnini kalaya', limj jamakalipnini ixlitapiktutam an lakt'iyan chi sta ixtapiktutami makacha'an.
42017025	Pero p'ulhnaj akstak ma'alh'ajnana', jantu k'is akintitala'a'ilhi an yu chaway tat'ajun.
42017026	Tacha akxni an ixt'ajun Noeje katapasaya akxni kamina an isTs'alh Lapanak.
42017027	Akxni ixt'ajun an Noé, an lapanakni ixtalakwajin, ixtalaj'ot'a, chi ixtalat'atsukuy chi ixtalamat'atsukuy; sta wa akxni tajulhcha an laka ay barco an Noé, chi an lapanakni yu'uncha wanaj talakni'olhi an laka a'muxtut.
42017028	Wanajcha chun tacha tapasalh akxni ixt'ajun an Lot; ixtalakwajin, ixtalaj'ot'a, ixtajatamawnan, ixtajast'anan, ixtajach'ananan chi ixtayajuy ixcha'ak'an.
42017029	Pero akxni taxtulhcha an la'acha'an Sodoma an Lot, an lakt'iyan tacha wa xkancha patajulh jikmi, wanaj jama'ni'olhi an lapanakni.
42017030	Chuncha katapasaya akxni kamina an isTs'alh Lapanak.
42017031	Akxni, yu uk'achalh la ix'a'sti ixcha'a, jantu kata'alhtajulhi ka'alh maxtunu ixlaktanlhun, chi yu t'awnachalh la ixkuxtu jantu katasp'itcho'ochalh.
42017032	K'ap'ast'akt'iti tacha putapasalh an ixt'iwi Lot.
42017033	Yu kama'alhtaxtuputuna ixjatsukunti, kama'ats'an'aya', chi yu kama'ats'an'aya, kama'alhtaxtuya'.
42017034	Klajunaw anchunu jatats'isni tan ixt'uyunk'an tamanalh la ixputamatk'an, an pumatam kalhi'ankana', an pumatam jantu.
42017035	Li ixt'uyunk'an t'akunin wa lakatam taskitit'ajun, an pumatam kalhi'ankana', chi an pumatam jantu.
42017036	Tan ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni tat'ajun laka kuxtu, an pumatam kalhi'ankana chi an pumatam jantu.
42017037	Pus ta'alhtaylh an Jesús, tajuniy: —¿Tanischa chuncha katapasaya'a, Jamach'alhkat? Yucha jajuniy: —Tan tamay tu'u yu nitacha, ancha tatawlachalh an ch'unin.
42018001	Chi jalhixa'alapalh la'atan pulhamacha'xani an Jesús tan japujuni li lhitask'iniya li lhilhi katatapaynilh, chi li ntu a'tami wa katakapmaj'ancho'olhcha,
42018002	jajuniy: —Ix'alin pumatam juez lakatam la'acha'an, jantu ixkiklaka'iya Dios chi ntu xamati tu'u ixliwilay ixt'alapanak.
42018003	Chi anchunu la'acha'an wachu ixt'ajun pumatam t'aku yu ntucha tu'u ixt'ajun ixt'apapa', ixla'cha'an an juez, ixjuniy: —Ak'int'alats'awalat'i ixlakata an yu wa kint'ala'ajiy.
42018004	Pero an juez ma'ani jantu ix'asmatni, walh ixli'astan pastaklhi: —Masi ntu iktalhamniya Dios chi ntu xamati tu'u iklhiwilay,
42018005	ak'a'tayjuyacha ani yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapa t'aku', mu sawalhcha kimin ma'achapunu', jantu junita li wa paktsincha min sawalhcha akija's mawalh.
42018006	Chi nawpalay an Jesús: —K'a'asmatt'iti tacha an nawlh an tu oxi juez.
42018007	¿Chu laycha an Dios tu katijat'alats'awalalhi li tu'u an yu jasakxtutacha li ts'isi chi tunkuwi talhitapaynisk'ini? ¿Kata'a'ma'aya para li kaja'alhtaylh?
42018008	Kit'in klajunaw watukan kajalhi'a'tayjuya'. Pero akxni akmina kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak, ¿ajkala'cha'ana yu tajakiklaka'inin?
42018009	An Jesús jalhixa'alapalh la'atam pulhamacha'xan, ixlakatak'an an yu ixtapast'ak'a li ntu tu'u ixtala'alhink'an, chi ntucha tu'u ixtat'alalhiwilay an ali'in, jajuniy:
42018010	Ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni ta'alh tapayninin laka tajtan, pumatam yu'uncha an jajunkan fariseojnin chi pumatam yu'uncha an talaklhach'inin tanlhun lhimapalhlhi'at.
42018011	An fariseo wa sa' ixyalhi ixtapaynit'ajun, ixnajun: —Ikxta'niyan lhimala'puchajuni Dios, mu ntu chuni iklay tacha an ali'in. Yu'uncha taja'alhawanan, chi sawalh ay tajunita, chi wa ayacha talay, chi ntu chuni iklay tacha ani yu laklhach'inin tanlhun.
42018012	Kit'in a't'uyi jantu ikwajin tam samana, ikxt'a'a kidiezmo yu iklhajay.
42018013	Pero an yu ixlaklhach'inin tanlhun ma'ati ixyachalh, yucha masi wa katala'st'alhcha an lakt'iyan tu ixtala'st'aputun, wa p'as ixtankilhaksakan, ixnajun: —Lamapaynini Dios, ak'imala'mixinini kintala'alhin.
42018014	Iklajunaw an yu ixlaklhach'inin tanlhun yucha oxicha tsukulh la ix'ukxlakapu Dios, pero an fariseo jantu. Mu yu sawalhcha lhitapalayi najun jantu tu'u katilhitapalalh, pero yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay lay, yucha kalhitapala'.
42018015	Wachu ixjalhicha'anikan lakt'ikt'in jas'at'ani an Jesús para li kajalaklakpach'apalh la ix'a'tsulhk'an; pero an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús talaj'aymastuklhi an yu ixtalhicha'an ixjas'at'ank'an.
42018016	Pus an Jesús jat'asanilh jajuniy: —Kachajcha kintala'milhi an jas'at'an, jant'u k'ajalaj'aymast'ukt'it, mu an ixlich'alhkat Dios ixnawink'an yu tacha yu'uncha.
42018017	Sawalhi ani yu klajunaw, yu ntu la'a'iya an ixlich'alhkat Dios tacha pumatam jas'at'a, jantu a'tam katitanuchalhi ancha.
42018018	Pumatam xa'ay lapanak lhisakmi an Jesús, juniy: —Oxi Maestro, ¿tisuncha lay ak'ilhtulh para li aklhitsukulhi jatsukunti yu ntu a'atam min'ojoyi?
42018019	An Jesús juniy: —¿T'asu li k'i'unicha li oxi klapanaki? Wa pumatami yu oxi lapanak, Dios.
42018020	K'ats'aycha an lhamap'a'sin tan najun: "Jant'u wa aya k'alat'i, jant'u k'ama'nin, jant'u k'a'alhawan, jant'u xamat'i wa aya k'alhich'iwin, chi oxi k'ala'ts'i mimpay chi minati."
42018021	An lapanak najun: —Chunchacha ik'ilhtu'ojoy wa kintats'alat.
42018022	An Jesús mu alha'asmat'acha, juniy: —Ts'an'aniyanka la'atami yu k'a'ilht'u: K'ast'a'o chux an yu lhit'a'un chi k'ajaxt'a'nincha an jakilhpatinin. Chuncha k'alhits'uk'uya'acha laj'oxi mintanlhun an lakt'iyan. Chi k'at'ana'acha, ak'inch'a'o'aya'acha.
42018023	Pus an lapanak akxni chunchacha alha'asmatlhi an Jesús, sawalhcha lhita'oxila'alhilh, mu sawalh ix'alin ixtumin.
42018024	Chi an Jesús, mu la'ts'incha li lhita'oxila'alhicha, najun: —¡An yu jamatuminin lhima'anxkayi katatanuchalh an la ixlich'alhkat Dios!
42018025	Palay wa lasi la'atam kameyo kastala'pusli ma'atam makskat, walh jantu li katanuchalh pumatam jamatumin la ixlich'alhkat Dios.
42018026	An yu ta'alha'asmatlhi tanajun: —¿Pus tisiyuchacha lay kata'alhtaxtuya'a?
42018027	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Yu ntu lay ilhtuy an lapanak, an Dios yucha layi ilhtuy.
42018028	Pus an Pedro juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, kitnan iklach'a'o'atawcha chi iklhimakaw'otawcha kintanlhunk'an.
42018029	Yucha juniy: —Watichicha li yu lhimakajuntacha ixcha'a, ixt'iwi, u ixjat'ala'awnin u ixpaynin u ixjas'at'an ixlakata an ixlich'alhkat Dios, o'sliyani
42018030	li palay kajama'lhtayanana masi wa anika t'awkan, chi an yu mimpalhtachalh jatsukunti kama'lhtayanana yu ntu min'ojoy jatsukunti.
42018031	Wa lakatamcha jama'ayxto'lhi an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, chi jajuniy: —Akxni kacha'anawcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, kalaktapasayacha tacha an kintalhits'o'muk'ata yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak.
42018032	Mu akima'axta'kanacha la ixmaknik'an an yu ntu judiojnin, chi akintalhilaktsi'inacha, akixkayaj tajuna, chi akintala'achujwaya'.
42018033	Chi xli'astan akxni akintala'ana'ma'oyacha, akintama'niyacha; pero ixlila'at'utu wilhchan akla'awcho'oya'.
42018034	Yu'uncha ntu tu'u talhimacha'xanilh, tuchini ixjalhixa'alaycha tacha ani jajunilh, mu yu chuncha ntu lay ixtalhimacha'xay.
42018035	Akxni wanicha ix'antachalh la'acha'an Jericó an Jesús, pumatam la'lhtuluw lapanak yu sa' ixwilh la ixpiktu tij, ixpusakt'ajun la'a'tayjun,
42018036	lhasakminilhi tuchini ixtapasaycha akxni asmatlhi li lhilhuw ixla'pust'awk'an.
42018037	Pus tajuniy li yucha an Jesús jamacha'a Nazareti ixla'pust'ajun.
42018038	Yucha p'asi chiwinilh, najun: —¡Jesús, Ists'alh David, lamapaynin ak'ilhi'a't'ay'ut'i!
42018039	An yu ixtap'ulanan tala'a'aymalh para li ma sa'cha kakilhulh, pero yucha palay p'as ixt'asay, ixnajun: —¡Ists'alh David, lamapaynin ak'ilhi'a't'ay'ut'i!
42018040	Pus an Jesús sa'cha tayalh, chi mala'achalhcha pumatam para li kaki'ilh. Akxni la'cha'alhcha an Jesús, junkan an la'lhtuluw lapanak:
42018041	¿Tasucha ak'ilhtun na'uni? An la'lhtuluw lapanak najun: —Jamach'alhkat, iklakask'in li ajkalakawanalh.
42018042	An Jesús juniy: —K'ajalak'awancha, mu jak'iklak'a'inin p'us p'ut'ak'uch'ut'icha.
42018043	Wanaj wa akxni, wa tukan tala'pu'oxilhi an la'lhtuluw lapanak ixjunita, chi ch'a'o'alhcha an Jesús, ixta'nilhi'antacha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios. Chi ixchuxk'an an yu tala'ts'ilh, wachucha oxicha ixtalhichiwin an Dios.
42019001	Akxni tanuchalhcha an Jesús la'acha'an Jericó, anchacha ixla'pust'ajun.
42019002	Walh pumatam lapanak ixjunkan Zaqueo, xa'ay an yu ixtalaklhach'inin tanlhun, chi jamatumin,
42019003	ixmispaputuni an Jesús, pero ntu lay ixla'ts'in, mu wanajcha lhilhuwi ixjunkanta chi yucha wa putant'ikt'i ixjunita.
42019004	Pus jats'alaj'alhi tan ixtipu'an an Jesús, chi tawk'alhcha laka a'atam k'iw junkan sicómoro para li laycha kala'ts'ilh, mu ancha ixla'pust'ajun an Jesús.
42019005	An Jesús akxni anchacha ixla'pust'ajun tala'st'alh, pus la'ts'ilh, chi juniy: —Zaqueo, lasch'a k'at'a'alht'a'ut'i, mu chaway an la mincha'a aktamakawna'.
42019006	Wachuncha so'ojo ta'alhtajulh chi sawalhcha ixta'achanini lakatastukli.
42019007	Akxni chunchacha tala'ts'ilh, ixtalhichiwiniycha an Jesús, ixtanajun ma t'a'alhcha la ixcha'a pumatam ma'lhta'alhini'.
42019008	Wachuncha an Zaqueo tayalh, chi juniy an Jamach'alhkat Jesús: —Jamach'alhkat, an paytat kintanlhun ajkaxta'niyacha an jakilhpatinin; chi li xamati tu'u ik'o'xcho'otalh, a't'at'i akmapusp'itnicho'oya'.
42019009	An Jesús juniy: —Chaway aniy laka cha'a' chilhcha ta'alhtaxtut, mu ani lapanak wachu ists'alh an Abraham.
42019010	Mu kit'in yu kwalh isTs'al Lapanak ikminta japuxkawna chi ikminta jama'alhtaxtunu an yu wa tats'an'ata.
42019011	Chunchacha ixta'alha'asmatt'ajun an lapanakni an Jesús. Chi taylhi'alh jajumpalh la'atam pulhamacha'xan, mu wanicha la'acha'an Jerusaleni ixt'ajun chi yu'uncha ixtanajun li an ixlich'alhkat Dios akxnicha kachina'.
42019012	Jajuniy: —Pumatam lapanak jamatumin chi lhitapalay, alh jama'lhtayana ixlich'alhkat tanchun ma'at lakatam la'acha'an, pero katasp'itcho'oyanta.
42019013	Akxni ntuka' ixtaxtuy p'ulhnajcha jat'asanilh ixpumakawk'an ixma'tsukunin, chi pumatamincha jaxta'nilh ixtumin, jajuniy: —K'ap'ut'ap'ats'atka kachajcha iktichincho'oya'.
42019014	Pero an yu ancha ixt'amacha'an sawalhcha ixtaxkajiy, pus tamach'a'o'alhi yu kanawnanta: "Jantu kla'a'iyawi li ani lapanak akintach'alhkatnanin".
42019015	Pero yucha lhka'ulakanchalhcha ixlich'alhkat, chi akxni tasp'itcho'ochalhcha, lhinawlhcha li kajat'asanikalhi an ixma'tsukunin an yu ixjaxta'nita ixtumin, para li katajunilhcha tanichunchacha talhajanilh pumatamin.
42019016	Pumatam yu p'ulhnajcha cha'alh najun: "Jamach'alhkat, an mintumin a'kawcha lhajacho'olh t'ach'a an k'ixt'a'nin".
42019017	An jamach'alhkat alhtaylh: "Oxicha, oxi ma'tsukuk'at'i; mu oxi lhist'akt'i masi yu ntu lhuw, chaway lakakaw la'acha'anaxni k'ajach'alhk'atnaniya'a".
42019018	Cha'ampalh pumatam, najun: "Jamach'alhkat, an mintumin a'kisicha chuncha lhajacho'olh".
