42019019	Yucha wachu juniy: "Uxint'i lakakisi la'acha'ani k'ajach'alhk'atnaniya'a."
42019020	Pero pumatam cha'ampalh, najun: "Jamach'alhkat, ani iklhiminitani an mintumin, xakpach'ima'ata laka payo,
42019021	mu iktalhamniyan, mu uxint'i sawalhch'a unit'a, maxt'uyi masi tantu uxint'i t'amaknut'i, ch'i jax'anani masi tan ntu uxint'i ch'ant'i.
42019022	Pus an jamach'alhkat juniy: "Uxint'i ntu oxi ma'tsukuk'at'i, t'ach'a an ch'iwinicha ikpuk'atsaaniyan. Li ixk'ats'aay li kit'in sawalhcha ikjunita, chi wanaj snij iksk'in'ojoyi li tu'u, chi ikjap'uxnuni tan ntu kit'in ikch'anlhi,
42019023	¿pus tasu li nt'u ma'anut'i laka bancojo an kintumini, para li akxni xakchincho'olh xajkama'lhtayanalhcha an xajas'at'a?
42019024	Chi jajuniyan yu ancha ixtayanalh: "K'amaxt'unit'iti an tumin, yucha an yu a'kaw pulhajacho'olhi k'axt'a'nit'it."
42019025	Yu'uncha tajuniy: "Jamach'alhkat, pero yucha a'kawcha chuncha lhit'ajun.
42019026	Pus an jamach'alhkat ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: "Kit'in klajunaw, li yu lhit'ajun, ali kaxta'nikana', pero yu ntu tu'u lhit'ajun, masi wa lakat'ikt'icha kaxlitsukulh, kamaxtuni'okana'.
42019027	Chi an yu ntu kintala'ts'imputun, an yu ntu ixtala'a'i li ajkach'alhkatnanilh, k'ajalhit'at'it chi tan ijkala'ts'incha k'ajama'nit'it."
42019028	Akxni chunchacha naw'olh, taylhi'ampalhcha ixtij an Jesús, tama'ast'a'alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén.
42019029	Walh akxni ixcha'ant'ajuncha la'acha'an Betfagé chi la'acha'an Betaniaj, wanicha a'stitawk'a tan junkan Laka'olivojnin, jamala'achalh ixt'uyunk'an an ixt'alhtanan,
42019030	jajuniy: —K'ap'inchi'it an tan tasuy la'acha'an, chi akxni k'at'anut'achi'it k'ala'ch'ip'ina'it la'atam burro, ch'iyawkanta, tuka' a'tam putawk'ak'an, k'ax'ot'iya'it chi akilalhiminiyaw.
42019031	Li xamati talhisakmiyan t'uch'ini lhix'ot'iyatcha, k'a'una'it li yucha an Jamach'alhkati ma'lhtask'iniy.
42019032	Ta'alhcha an yu jamala'achakalh, walh tala'cha'alhcha sawalhi an burro tacha an ixjajunita an Jesús.
42019033	Akxni ixtax'ot'it'ajuncha an burro, an yu jamanawinin talhasakminilhcha tanajun: —¿T'asu li x'ot'iyatcha an burrojo?
42019034	Yu'uncha taja'alhtayanalh: —Mu yucha an Jamach'alhkati ma ma'lhtask'iniy.
42019035	Pus ta'aymuk'alhcha an burro an yu ixjapupula'la'axt'a'kanta, talhi'anilhcha an Jesús chi tapumuk'alhcha.
42019036	Tan ixpu'anta laka tij an Jesús, an lapanakni ixtalakmamaycha an yu ixjapupula'la'axt'a'kanta.
42019037	Chi akxni ixcha'ant'ajuncha an Jesús tan a'taynitacha jatajunti an a'stitawk'a tan junkan Laka'olivojnin, chux an yu ixtach'a'o'ata ixtalaj'achancha, p'ascha tsukulh talakt'asay, ixtaxta'niycha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios ixlakata li lhuwcha ixtala'ts'inta yu ilhtuy an Dios.
42019038	Ixtalaknajun: —¡An Dios kintamakminitan pumatam rey! ¡Alincha oxamixat an lakt'iyan chi an Dios yucha ayi anu lakt'iyan!
42019039	Wachuncha ali'in lapanakni an yu ixjajunkan fariseojnin yu ancha ixtama'anta tajuniy an Jesús: —Maestro, k'ajalaj'aymat'i an mint'alhtanan.
42019040	Yucha jajuniy: —Li kasa' talajkilhulh, yu'uncha an chiwxi katalakt'asaya'.
42019041	Akxni wanicha cha'alh an la'acha'an Jerusalén an Jesús, la'ts'incha, pus lhi'alhulhcha,
42019042	najun: —Walaycha li k'a ixk'ats'at'icha tichini yu laycha ka'ixta'nin oxi jatawlhnat chaway. Pero chaway t'ulay k'at'ila'ts'i.
42019043	Kamina wilhchani akxni katala'atanchanuyan an yu taxkayan. Katalakyawya' eskalera an laka ay axi an yu pula'atanchanukanta la'acha'an, chi wa lhitanchuncha kawalh kataput'alasayan,
42019044	chi katama'ni'oyan. Katama'niniyani an mi jas'at'an aniy ixpulakni la mincha'a', chi ntu tu'u katitamakawlh masi wa kala'ukxtawk'atawilhcha chiwx aniy, mu nt'u asmatp'ut'u akxni an Dios kila'pixiyalhnanchin.
42019045	Xli'astan an Jesús tanuchalhcha an laka tajtan chi jatamakxtu'olhi an yu ancha ixtajast'anant'ajun,
42019046	Jajuniy: —Ts'o'muk'akantalhi tan najun: —An kincha'a putapaynin; pero uxitnan wa ixcha'achak'an ja'alhawnani ilht'ut'at.
42019047	Lhilhiji ixmasuy an laka tajtan an Jesús, pero an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an xalaj'ajin lapanakni la'acha'an wa ixtama'niputujlhit'ajuncha.
42019048	Pero ntulay ta ixta'ilhtuy, mu chux an lapanakni yucha ixtalhakapu'anini yu ixjajuniy.
42020001	La'atam wilhchan akxni an Jesús ixjamasunit'ajun an lapanakni laka tajtan chi akxni ixjajunt'ajun an laj'oxi chiwinti, tala'cha'alh an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, chi an laktatanincha,
42020002	chi taxa'alalh tajuniy: —Akilajuniwi t'uch'ini ch'unch'ach'a lhi'ilht'uy ani laktanlhun, u tichini yuchacha makawniyan li ch'unch'a k'a'ilht'u.
42020003	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —Kit'in wachu aklalhisakmiyaw la'atam lhasakminti. Akilajuniw:
42020004	Tacha an ixjama'paxanan Juan, ¿Diosi ixlijuniy, u wa yucha an lapanaknicha?
42020005	Pus yu'uncha tsukulhcha talhilakchiwiniy, talajuniy: —Li kajunaw li Diosi ixmakmintachalh, akintajunan: ¿P'us ch'i li nt'ucha k'iklak'a'it'iti?
42020006	Chi li kajunaw li wa yu'uncha an lapanaknicha ixtalhijuniy, chux an lapanakni akintalakat'alhmayan, mu ixchuxk'ani takiklaka'iy li an Juan ixchiwinti Diosi ixlichiwiniy.
42020007	Pus taja'alhtayanalh li ntu tak'ats'ayi tichini yuchacha ixmala'achatachalh an Juan li kajama'paxanalh.
42020008	Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'in wachu ntu aktilajuniywi tuchini laycha chuncha iklhi'ilhtuy aniy tanlhun.
42020009	Wachuncha an Jesús tsukulhcha jajuniy la'atam pulhamacha'xani an lapanakni, jajuniy: —Pumatam lapanak ch'anlhi ix'uvaj, chi jamach'ixta'nilhcha tichi yu'uncha lapanakni, chi yucha ma'ancha tanchun ma'at alh.
42020010	Akxni ixpakucha walh an uvaj, mala'achachalhcha pumatam ixma'tsuku para li kataxta'nilhcha an yu ixjamalhistaknita yu ixnawincha, pero yu'uncha wa talakasamanilh, pus wachunchaa cha'ancho'olh.
42020011	Chi a'tam mala'achapalhchalh pumatam ixma'tsuku, pero wachu wa talakasamanipalh, xkayajcha tajunilh chi wachuncha wachu tamala'achacho'opalh.
42020012	Walh a'tam mala'achapalhchalh pumatam ixma'tsuku; pero wanajcha chun, tatamakxtupalh chi tamak'atsanilh.
42020013	Pus wachuncha an jamanawin an tan ch'ankanta uvaj najun: —¿Tasucha aklhit'alaya'a?, akmala'achaya an kints'alh, masi wa pumatami kints'alh, ka sna katakiklaka'iyanta yucha.
42020014	Pero an yu ixjamalhistaknikanta uvaj, akxni tala'ts'ilh, talajuniy: —Yucha aniycha yu kajama'lhtayanana an herencia, kama'niw, walh lani ki'anuchak'ani kajuna'.
42020015	Pus tatamakxtulhi an tan ixch'ankanta uvaj chi tama'nilhcha. ¿Chaway uxitnan t'asuch'a lhiwilayat kaja'ilhtuya an jamanawin uvaj an yu ixjamalhistaknita ix'uvaja?
42020016	Yucha ka'ana, chi kajama'ni'oya an yu ixtajalhistaknanta, ali'ini kajaxta'niya an tan ch'anta ix'uvaj. Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi tanajun: —¡Dioscha akintama'alhtaxtun!
42020017	Pero an Jesús sa'cha jala'ts'in chi jajuniy: —Pus ¿tasipi nawputuncha an tan ts'o'muk'akanta? tan najun: "An chiwx an yu tala'amaj'alh an tayajuy cha'a, apalij yucha yu palay lhitapalalh."
42020018	Yu la ix'ukxni aniy chiwx katamayanta, wanaj lakt'ikt'iy kajun'oya', chi yu kaputamaya ani chiwx, wanaj po'xmi kajun'oya'.
42020019	Wa akxni an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin wa laycha li ka ixtach'apayawlhcha an Jesús, mu talhimacha'xalhi li yu'uncha jajunilh an tacha nawlh; pero ntu tach'apayawlhi mu ixtatalhamniya an lapanakni.
42020020	Xli'astan tamala'achalhcha yu kata'alh jalakawanin an tan ixt'ajun an Jesús, ma wa oxicha lapanakni katalalh, para li kata'alh'a'taymalhcha tu'u chi chuncha laycha katama'axta'nilh an xajamach'alhkat Roma.
42020021	An yu ixta'anta jalakawanin tajuniy an Jesús: —Maestro, ijk'atsayawi li an yu na'un ch'i an masuy chuncha sawalh, chi para lhichuxi an yu na'un, uxint'i ts'awj sawalhi masuy an ixtij Dios.
42020022	¿Oxi li akmapalhlhi'aniwi an xajamach'alhkat Roma, u jantu?
42020023	Pero an Jesús ja'uksak'atsalhi li ntu oxi an yu ixtala'anta, pus jajuniy: —¿Tasu li kilalhila'ts'intanuyawcha?
42020024	Akilamasuniw a'xtami an tumin. ¿Tisapiyuchacha an puwilh chi an ixta'a'ut? Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh, tajuniy: —Yucha an ay xajamach'alhkat Roma.
42020025	An Jesús jajuniy: —Pus k'axt'a'nitcha yu ix'anu an jamach'alhkat Roma chi yu ix'anu an Dios wach'uch'a k'axt'a'nit'it.
42020026	Wachuncha ntu layi tu'u ta'alh'a'taymalh yu ixjajuniy an lapanakni, para li katach'apayawlhcha, apalijcha sa' talajkilhulh mu ixtalhi'a'nicha tacha an ja'alhtaylh.
42020027	Xli'astan an Jesús tala'cha'alh ali'in lapanakni yu ixjajunkan saduceojnin, yu an tanajun li ntucha lay katila'awcho'okalh, talhisakmilh.
42020028	Tajuniy: —Maestro, an Moisés kintats'o'nin tan najun: Li xamati tam t'aku li nimakawtijlakalh chi li ntu t'ajamas'at'analhi ixt'apapa pero li an yu nilh lhit'ajuni ixt'ala'ajun, yuchacha kat'atsukucho'oya an t'aku para li katajamas'at'analhi tacha ka ixt'ajamas'at'analh an ixt'ala'ajun.
42020029	Pus ixtat'ajun ixpumatujunk'an wa lhit'ala'awnin, an xa'aycha t'atsukukalhcha walh nilh, chi ntu tu'u jamakawlh ixjas'at'an.
42020030	Pus wachuncha an t'aku t'atsukupalhi an ixt'ala'ajun an yu nilhcha, walh wachu nipalh, chi ntu tu'u jamakawpalh ixjas'at'an.
42020031	Chi a'tam t'atsukupalhi yu ixlipumat'utucha, chi sta jat'atsuku'olhi an ixpumatujunk'an, walh talakni'olh, tu tu'u tamakawlh ixjas'at'ank'an.
42020032	Xli'astan, wachucha nilhi an t'aku'.
42020033	Pus akxni kala'awcho'okana, ¿an ixpumatujunk'an wa lhit'ala'awnin tisiyuchacha ixt'iwi kuna an t'aku, mu an ixpumatujunk'an tat'atsuku'olhi?
42020034	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —Yu chaway aniy t'awkan an lapanakni chi an t'akunin talat'atsukuy;
42020035	pero li yu an Dioscha kanawna li katala'a'iya an mimpalata jatsukunti, chi katala'awcho'oya, akxni jantucha katitalat'atsukulh.
42020036	Mu akxni ntucha lay katitanilh, akxni tacha an angelhnincha katajuna', chi ixjas'at'ancha an Dios, mu xliyu li katala'awcho'oya'.
42020037	Pero an Moisés wachu najuni li kala'awcho'okana', tan an lhits'o'muk'alhi an jach'itin yu junkan zarzaj yu ixma'tajita, akxniy nawlh an Moisés li an Dios, ixDios Abraham, chi ixDios Isaac chi ixDios Jacob,
42020038	mu an Dios tu ixDiosk'an janinin, yucha ixDiosk'an yu tala'ajunta, mu para yucha li tat'aw'ojoy.
42020039	Ali'in an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin ta'alhtaylh, tajuniy: —Oxi t'ach'a an na'uni Maestro.
42020040	Pus tucha tu'u tatapujulh ali katalhisakmilh.
42020041	Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —¿Tasu li tanajuncha li an Cristo Ists'alh Daviti?,
42020042	Pero wanaj yucha an Daviti nawpalay an laka libro tan junkan Salmos, najun: An Jamach'alhkat Dios juniy an kiJamach'alhkat Cristo: K'at'a'ulhcha tan oxi la kimpa'xti',
42020043	sta kachajcha aktijamama'oya la mijach'aja an yu wa tat'alaxkayan para li k'ajap'ut'aycha.
42020044	Pus an David ixJamach'alhkati juniy an Cristo, ¿tasucha li Ists'alh a'tami?
42020045	Ixchuxk'an an lapanakni ixta'alha'asmat'acha an Jesús chi jajuniyan ixt'alhtanan:
42020046	Walh kata'o'xcho'oni an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, mu yu'uncha ta'achaniy tala'la'ch'iy la'lhman ixla'ch'itk'an, chi talakask'in li sawalhcha kajalhiwilakalhi kajala'axa'alakalh an lakalaktij. Chi tapuxkajuy tan lhitapalay putawlani an laka lakcha'a tan pulakta'ayxto'kan chi tan p'ulhnaja talaktawlhputun an tan lakwaykan.
42020047	Tamaxtuniya ixcha'ak'an an yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapak'an t'akunin, chi para wa ntucha kajak'atsaanikalh wa panijnicha tatapayniy. Yu'uncha palay katala'a'iya lhima'alh'ajna.
42021001	An Jesús sa'cha ixjala'ts'ini an jamatuminin lapanakni tacha ixtamujuy ixtumink'an laka la'atam kaja.
42021002	Chi wachu la'ts'ilh pumatam jakilhpatinij t'aku yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapa, ma'mulh a'xt'uy lakt'ikt'i ixtumin yu ntu de oxi tsasnat.
42021003	Chi najun: —Sawalhi aniy yu klajunaw, aniy t'aku yu ntucha tu'u lhit'ajun ixt'apapa palay mulh, walh jantu ixchuxk'an an ali'in.
42021004	Mu ixchuxk'an an ali'in wa xaxajnicha talha'ulananilh an Dios; pero aniy t'aku masi wa kilhpaticha wanaj mu'olhi masi yu ka ixlitamawwaytsukulh.
42021005	Ali'in ixtalhilakchiwint'ajun an tajtan, tacha an ixtala'ts'in lajk'usi an chiwx chi li lhuwcha lha'ulani ixta'kanta yu lhiyawkalh. Pero an Jesús jajuniy:
42021006	—Kamina wilhchani t'ach'a aniy la'ts'inat'it, tu tu'u katitayalh, masi wa kala'ukxtawk'atawilhcha chiwx. Kalakt'ilhi'okana'.
42021007	Wachuncha talhisakmiy, tajuniy: —Maestro, ¿tasu wanancha chuncha katapasaya'a? chi ¿tisuncha kapuk'atsakana akxni chunchacha katapasaya'a?
42021008	Yucha jajuniy: —K'ajalajk'ats'anant'it para li nt'u k'a'o'xch'o'ok'ant'it, mu xluwk'ani yu katamina katanawna li yu'uncha Cristojnin, chi ntucha ma'an, wa nicha, pero nt'u k'ach'a'o'at'it.
42021009	Akxni k'a'asmat'a'it'iti li lasakancha chi lat'alhkancha, pero nt'u k'alakt'alhanant'it, mu lhitask'iniya li chuncha katapasalh; pero ntuka' kati'ukla'olh.
42021010	Wachuncha jajumpalay: —La'atam ay la'acha'an, kat'alasaya lakatam ay ixt'ala'acha'an, chi tan rey ch'alhkatnan ay la'acha'an wachu kat'alasaya tan wachu rey ch'alhkatnan.
42021011	Kastak laklaya p'asi an lakaat'un, chi lakalhuwi ka'alina chawan, chi ta'an'at, chi kalaktalakasuya tanlhun lhitalhamnit an lakt'iyan, chi tanlhuncha laj'ay tu'u katalakasuyanta an lakt'iyan.
42021012	Pero akxni ntuka' chun tapasay, k'ach'ap'ayawk'ana'it'it, chi k'ach'a'o'ak'ana'it'it, k'ama'axt'a'k'ana'it'iti an laka lakcha'a tan puta'ayxto'aw chi laka lakpulach'in, k'alhip'ink'ana'it'iti tan tawilanalh an rejnin chi an jamach'alhkatnin, wa kilakata.
42021013	Chuncha yu lay k'ajap'u'una'it an kinchiwinti.
42021014	Pero ntu li sna p'ulhnajcha k'at'ip'ast'akt'iti t'ani k'anawna'itcha akxni k'aja'alht'ayanana'it,
42021015	mu kit'ini aklaxta'niyaw laj'oxi jatapast'ak'at chi chiwinti yu ntu lay ta katita'alhtaystukni chi ntu katitalhitayanilhi an yu wa taxkayan.
42021016	Masi minpayk'an u mijat'ala'awnink'an, u yu t'aa jalhila'ts'inat u mi'amigojnink'an, kata'o'xcho'oma'axt'a'an. Chi ali'in k'ama'nik'ana'it'it.
42021017	Chi ta lhichuxi k'axk'ayk'ana'it kilakata.
42021018	Pero masi wa ma'atamcha mi'ayk'an, tu tu'u katits'an'alh.
42021019	¡Li t'aylhip'inat'it, chuncha k'ap'ut'a'alht'axt'uya'it'it!
42021020	Akxni la'ts'inatcha li tala'atanchanu'olhcha soldadojnin an la'acha'an Jerusalén, k'ats'ayatcha li chilhcha ix'wilhchan li kalakt'ilhikanacha.
42021021	Akxni, yu la'acha'an Judea tat'ajun, an laka'a'stitawk'ancha katalaj'os'alh; chi yu an la'acha'an Jerusalén tat'ajun, katataxtulh, chi yu lakakuxtun inta tat'ajun, jantu kata'alhi an la'acha'an.
42021022	Mu akxni ixpaku ay lhima'alh'ajna kuna', tan katapasa'oya tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta.
42021023	¡Payni'itnicha an t'akunin yu ixt'a'akxni taja'aynanta, chi yu ixt'a'akxni talhit'ajun yu tamats'ik'ika ixjas'at'ak'an, mu ka'alina ay lhima'alh'ajna an lakaat'un chi ay talhanti ka'alina anchunu la'acha'an.
42021024	Ali'in kajama'nikana laka espada, ali'in kajalhi'ankanacha tacha tach'inin wa tanchuncha la'acha'anaxni. An yu ntu Judiojnin kastak talhitama'chapuya an jamacha'an Jerusalén, sta tacha xlima'an jamakawnikanta.
42021025	Chi tuchichuncha kalaktapasaya an laka wilhchan, chi an laka malhkuyu, chi an laka lakst'aku; chi an lakaat'un chux an la'acha'anaxni kalaktalhanankanacha, chi ntucha katilhimacha'xakalhi tacha an lhitalhan kamakat'awna an alamalh, chi tacha an kamilh milh laya'.
42021026	An lapanakni katala'la'awitiyacha ixtalhantik'an, mu katapast'ak'acha tani katapasayacha an lakamunulhpa'. Sta tacha an lakwilhchalh lakt'iyan, wachu kajalakchikixkana'.
42021027	Wachuncha kala'ts'inkanacha an yu walh isTs'alh Lapanak, tacha kaminanta laka jataputs'i, alhp'as chi wa xlimjnik'acha.
42021028	Akxni chunchacha kalaj'a'tayniya kalaktapasaya ani laktanlhun, oximaj'ayi k'a'unt'it, k'alakt'alak'at'iya'ut'it, mu akxni wa k'ischa k'ama'alht'axt'unik'ana'itcha.
42021029	Wachu jajumpalh ani la'atam pulhamacha'xan an Jesús, jajuniy: —K'alhak'ap'up'it'it an xak'iw higo u watuchicha k'iw.
42021030	Akxni la'ts'inatcha li lakmininicho'otacha xax'oy, k'ats'ayatcha li waniycha lhi'ichi kajuncho'oya'.
42021031	Pus wanajcha chuni uxitnan, akxni la'ts'inatcha li chunchacha laktapasay, waniycha minta an xlich'alhkat Dios.
42021032	Kit'in klajunaw yu sawalh: — Akxni chuxcha chuncha kalaktapasaya, lhilhuwi kala'ts'inkana', mu katsukukanaka'.
42021033	An lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un ka'ukla'oya', pero an kinchiwinti jantu.
42021034	K'as'alajnant'it, jantu junita kat'ak'alh lalhi mijalhunutk'an ixlakata an wa tanlhuncha: t'a'ap'at, u wa tanlhuncha lhatapastaknat aniy laka jatsukunti. Li chuncha k'alaya'it, akxni nt'u s'alaj wilat'iti chunchacha katapasaya tacha an klajuniw.
42021035	Mu wa tacha s'apa kamina para ixchuxk'an an yu aniy tawilanalh lakaat'un.
42021036	Lhilhiji k'as'alajnant'it, chi k'at'ap'aynit'it, para li layi k'at'a'alht'axt'ut'it tacha an kalaktapasaya', chi chuncha lay k'ach'ip'it la ix'ukxlakapu an isTs'alh Lapanak.
42021037	An Jesús, tunku ixmasuy an laka tajtan, pero puts'ista an a'stitawk'a tan junkan Laka'olivojnini ix'an.
42021038	Chi wa ts'isini an lapanakni ixta'an alha'asmatnin an Jesús an laka tajtan.
42022001	Wanicha ixchint'ajun ixk'atan pan yu ntu ixliyawkan lhamaskajan, yu junkan Paxku.
42022002	Chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin ixtalhipuxkawnicha tani katalhima'nilhcha an Jesús, pero jantu lay ixta'ilhtuy mu ixtatalhanani li wa lay katalhitalh'amalh chux an lapanakni.
42022003	Wachuncha an Satanás, lakpach'apalhcha an Judas, xapumatam an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, yu ixtajumpalay ma Iscariote,
42022004	alhcha jala'ts'ini an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xalaj'ajin an yu ixtajalhistaknan laka tajtan, jajunicha tanischa kajalhima'axta'niya an Jesús.
42022005	Yu'uncha sawalhcha oxi talhiwilalh, chi tajuniy li kataxta'niyacha tumin.
42022006	An Judas jama'lhtayanalh chi a'taynilhcha lhipuxkawniy tani wanancha lay kama'axta'lhi an Jesús, akxni ntu xamati la'ts'in.
42022007	Chilhcha k'atan akxni ix'ukan pan yu ntu ixliyawkan lhamaskajan, akxni ixma'nikan borrego ixlakata Paxku.
42022008	An Jesús jamala'achalh an Pedro chi an Juan, jajuniy: —K'ap'inchi'itcha la'oxinini an wayt ixlakata Paxku, kalakwaynawcha.
42022009	Chi talhisakmiy, tajuniy: —¿T'anisch'a lak'ask'in ak'aw la'oxinini?
42022010	An Jesús jajuniy: —Akxni k'at'anut'achi'it an la'acha'an, k'ap'axt'o'a'it pumatam lapanak yu lhi'anta xkan la ix'uyuli, k'ach'a'o'alhip'ina'it sta tan laka cha'a katanutachalh.
42022011	Chi k'a'una'it an yu jamacha'a: An maestro najun: ¿tanischa laka cha'a tan ajkat'alakwayna an kint'alhtanan ixlakata Paxku?
42022012	Yucha katamasuniyan pulaktam laxcha'a tan talhman chi ay, mala'asijnikantacha, anchacha k'ala'oxiya'it yu katask'iniya'.
42022013	Yu'uncha ta'alhcha, walh chunchacha sawalhi tapasalh tacha an ixjajunita an Jesús, pus anchacha tamala'asijnilh ixlakata an Paxku.
42022014	Akxni cha'alhcha ixpaku, an Jesús jat'alaktawilhcha an ixt'alhtanan.
42022015	Chi jajuniy: —¡Chunchacha xaklhi'achaniy li p'ulhnajcha aklat'alakwaynawi laka Paxku akxni ntuka' ikniy!
42022016	Mu klajunaw jantu chuni aktiwaycho'olh laka Paxku, sta akxni kajunacha tuchini jumputuncha ani Paxku an la ixlich'alhkat Dios.
42022017	Pus xa'a'ilhcha la'atam vaso yu ixputajun xaxkan uvaj chi xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun, chi jajuniy: —Niicha aniy, k'alaxt'a'nitcha, k'alhawap'u'ott'itcha,
42022018	Mu kit'in klajunaw jantu ali akti'otcho'olhi ani xaxkan uvaj sta akxni kaminacha an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
42022019	Chi xa'a'ipalhi an pan, wachucha lhixta'lhi lhimala'puchajun, chi la'ch'e'elhcha, chi jaxta'nilhcha, jajuniy: —Aniy kilakatunaj, yu kama'axta'kana milakatak'an; chunchacha wachu k'a'ilht'uya'it'it para li akilalhipastakkwi.
42022020	Chi akxni talakway'olh, wanajcha chuni ilhtupalh an vaso yu ixputajun xaxkan uvaj, xa'a'ilh jajuniy: —Aniy vaso yu putajun xaxkan uvaj yucha yu sast'icha putamakawcho'oyaw li milakatak'ani aklhimaj'ana an kijak'alhni.
42022021	Pero chaway xapumatam yu uxitnan yu akima'axt'a'a an laka mesaja kint'amaj'o'slay.
42022022	Mu sawalhi li an isTs'alh Lapanak ts'ajwi ti'an, tacha an lhits'o'muk'akanta, pero an lapanak an yu kama'axt'a'a an isTs'alh Lapanak kapulhik'atsaya'.
42022023	Wachuncha tsukulhcha talalhisakmipaxay, tichini yuchacha yu kama'axt'a'a'.
42022024	Chi atumpaj wachu tsukulh talalhixtukupalay tichini yuchacha yu palay kalhitapala'.
42022025	Pero an Jesús jajuniy: —An xarejnin an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni tach'alhkatnancha watani tach'alhkatnamputuncha, chi an yu wa talhinajuncha anchunu la'acha'anaxni ma oxicha ja'a'tayjununi jajunkan.
42022026	Pero uxitnan tuchun, yu palay lhitapalay de uxitnan, tacha yu palayka ts'alhi kalalh, chi yu wa lhinajuncha, yucha yu kalak'ilhtulhcha an tanlhun.
42022027	¿Tisapiyuchacha yu palay lhitapalay, yucha an yu wa tawlaycha wajin, u yucha an yu iy pulatoj? Yu palay lhitapalay yucha an yu wa tawlaycha wajin. Pero kit'in ani iklat'a'aklat'awnaw tachanu yu wa talak'iniyan mimpulatojk'an.
42022028	Uxitnan akxni lhima'anxkay lhilhiji kilat'a'aklat'awnaw,
42022029	xliyu aklalhixta'niyaw la'atam lhich'alhkat, tacha an kimPay kixta'nilh wachu'.
42022030	Uxitnan k'alakwayna'it'it chi k'alaj'ot'a'it'iti tu'u la kimesaj tan akch'alhkatnana', chi k'alakt'awla'it'iti tan k'anawna'it li oxi u jantu yu ta'ilhtuy an kilmakkawt'uy xalapanakni Israel.
42022031	Chi nawpalh an Jamach'alhkat: —Simón, Simón, an Satanás task'inani li ma katalaktilhan tacha trigo;
42022032	pero uxint'i iklhitapayniyani para li nt'u k'ama'ats'an'at'i an mijakiklaka'inti. Chi akxni ak'ink'iklak'a'ich'o'oya'acha, k'aja'at'ay'uya'a amijat'ala'awnin para li ixlisawalhi katajakiklaka'inilh.
42022033	An Simón juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, kit'in akt'a'anani masi lakapulach'in, chi sta masi akintama'nikan.
42022034	An Jesús alhtaylh, juniy: —Pedro, chaway ijkunan akxni ntuka' t'asay puyux, a't'utucha k'anawna'a li nt'u k'imisp'ay.
42022035	Chi ixchuxk'an jalhisakmilh, jajuniy: —Akxni iklamala'achaw li nt'u k'alhip'it mintumink'an chi mibolsajk'an chi miwarachik'an, ¿tu'u tats'an'atayanin? Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Jantu.
42022036	Pus jajuniy: —Pus chaway chun, yu lhit'ajuni ixtumin kalhi'alh, chi ixbolsaj wachu'; chi yu ntu tu'u ix'espada, kast'alh ix'aytanut chi kalhi'ilhcha la'atam.
42022037	Mu klajunaw, kajuna la kijatsukunti tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: "Jat'aput'e'ekalhi an yu wa ay tajunita". Mu chux tacha an kilhits'o'muk'akantalh katapasa'oya'.
42022038	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat, aniy iklhit'awnaw ma'at'uy espada. Yucha ja'alhtaylh: —¡Wachunchacha kawalhcha!
42022039	Wachuncha taxtulhcha, alhcha tan a'tajcha ix'an a'stitawk'a tan junkan Lakaa'olivojnin, chi an ixt'alhtanan tach'a'o'alhcha.
42022040	Akxni cha'alhcha, jajuniy: —K'at'ap'aynit'it, para li nt'u k'a'ilht'up'ut'ut'iti yu ntu oxi.
42022041	Chi jamakawyawlhcha, alhcha tacha ixlima'at lay akmakat'alh'alh laka chiwx, tatso'ottatawlhchalhcha chi tsukulhcha tapayniy,
42022042	najun: —Kimpay, li lay, ak'imala'xt'inunini ani ay lhima'alh'ajna, pero jantu yu wa tacha kit'incha iknajuni kawalh, yu t'ach'a na'un uxint'i kawalh.
42022043	wachuncha talakasunilh pumatam xa'angelh an lakt'iyani an Jesús, chi laak'ut'ililh.
42022044	Pero mu akxni sawalhcha ixma'alh'ajnant'ajun, pus palay p'as ixtapayni; an ixchanit watacha wa laj'aya jak'alhnicha xt'amj xt'amj ixtamayachalh an lakaat'un.
42022045	Akxni tapayni'olhcha tayalhcha, jala'alhcha an ixt'alhtanan, walh ixtalaklhtatanani jala'cha'alh, mu sawalhcha ixtala'ta'oxila'alhi,
42022046	pus jajuniy: —¿T'asu li laklht'at'ayatcha? K'alaj'ost'ayat'it, k'at'ap'aynit'it para li nt'u k'a'ilht'ut'iti yu ntu oxi.
42022047	Chunchaka ixchiwint'ajun an Jesús, walh lhilhucha cha'ankalh, an yu ixjunkan Judas, xapumatam an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, ixjap'ulhnitacha an lapanakni, chi la'cha'alhcha an Jesús, la'xtikilhtastuklhicha.
42022048	Pus an Jesús juniy: —Judas, ¿la'xt'ik'ilht'ast'ukma'axt'a'acha an yu isTs'alh Lapanak?
42022049	Mu tala'ts'incha tuchini katapasayacha an yu ancha ixtat'ayanalh an Jesús, pus tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat, ¿akmak'atsaniyaw laka espada?
42022050	Wachuncha xapumatam de yu'uncha, mak'atsaninilh xapumatam ixma'tsuku an xa'ay sacerdote, xtalh akatuch'uk'up'uxli an oxi ix'a'ax'olh.
42022051	Chi an Jesús jajuniy an yu ixtat'a'anta: —Wa sa'ch'a k'at'awlat'it, k'ajamak'a'unt'itcha. Chi akatuch'apalhi an yu akatuch'uk'up'uxkalh, akatuk'uch'ulh.
42022052	Xli'astan an Jesús jajuniy an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xalaj'ajin an yu ixtajalhistaknan laka tajtan chi an laktatanincha, li ma wa ta'antacha ch'apayawnin, jajuniy: —¡Watacha wa ch'a'o'ayatcha ja'alhawna laklhit'ant'at mi'espadajk'an chi mink'iwk'an!
42022053	Pero mu lhilhiji xaklapaxt'o'aw an laka tajtan, walh chi akxni ntu kilach'apayaju. Pero chaway chilhcha minpanch'e'exk'an para li k'a'ilht'ut'it, chi yucha an jatats'isnicha ch'alhkatnan.
42022054	Pus tach'apayawlhcha an Jesús, talhi'alhcha, talhi'alhcha la ixcha'a an xa'ay sacerdote. An Pedro wa ma'atcha ixch'a'o'alhi'anta.
42022055	Chi an tan jalhi'ay jatalakxtut, ixtan'ajni, ta'ulalhcha jikmi chi tala'atanchanulhcha, an Pedro anchacha japujatawilh wachu'.
42022056	Pero pumatam t'aku, ma'tsuku, la'ts'ilhi li ancha ixma'wilh tan an ixla's'onkan, pus najun: —Aniy wachu ancha ixt'a'aklat'ajun an Jesús.
42022057	Pero an Pedro najun ma jantu, najun: —¡Jantu ikmispayi, t'aku'!
42022058	Panch'e'excha lakats'uniya jumpalh, pumatamcha la'ts'impalh, juniy: —Uxint'i wachu ixt'alhtanak'at'i an Jesús. An Pedro najun: —¡Jantu kit'ini, lapanak!
42022059	Katacha tamcha horaja jumpalh, pumatamcha nawpalay, najun: —Chun sawalh, aniy wachu ani ixt'a'aklat'ajun, chi wachu jamacha'a Galilea.
42022060	An Pedro najun: —Jantu ijk'atsay t'uch'ini unicha, lapanak. Walh wa akxni, chunchaka ixnawt'ajun, t'asalhcha an puyux.
42022061	Pus wachuncha an jamach'alhkat tala'aspitlaka'alhi tan ixyalh an Pedro. Pus pastaklhicha an Pedro li an Jamach'alhkat ixjunitalh: —Jantuka' katit'asalhi an puyux, a't'utucha k'anawna'a li nt'u k'imisp'ay.
42022062	Pus an Pedro taxtulh ma'spa, chi wa stakcha alhulh.
42022063	An lapanakni an yu ixtalhist'ak'a an Jesús, ixtamamaxanicha chi ixtamuk'anicha.
42022064	Tala'puch'ilhcha chi ixtalakpusaycha, ixtajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha muk'anini? k'anawcha.
42022065	Chi tachalayjcha aliy ixtalhimamaxani.
42022066	Akxni tunkulhcha, tata'ayxto'lhicha an xalaktatanin la'acha'an, chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin. Talhi'alhcha an Jesús laka ay junta, tajuniy:
42022067	¿Uxint'i Cristo k'at'i? Akilajuniw. Yucha jajuniy: —Li aklajuniw jantu akintilakiklaka'iw,
42022068	chi li aklalhisakmiw tu'u, jantu akintilajuniw chi ntu akintilamakaju.
42022069	Pero chaway ati'anta kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak kakpiktutawlantacha tan oxi ixpa'xti an Dios, yu lay ilhtu'ojoy watuchicha.
42022070	Pus wa ayxtami ixchuxk'an talhisakmilh, tajuniy: —¿Uxint'i Ists'alh Dios? Yucha jajuniy: —Uxitnanch'a nawnat li kit'in.
42022071	Wachuncha talajuniy: —¿Ali ma'lhtask'iniyawi yu akintajunin? Wanajcha kitnani alha'asmat'aw.
42023001	Pus ixchuxk'an an yu ancha ixta'ayxto'nun laka junta talaktaya'olh chi talhi'anilhcha an Jesús an Pilato.
42023002	Chi tsukulhcha talhimuk'ay, tajuniy: —Aniy lapanak ik'a'taymaw li wa jalaktilha an lapanakni yu aniy jamacha'an, chi najun li ntu kamapalhlhi'anikalhi an ay xajamach'alhkat Roma, najun li ma Cristojo yucha, ma rey.
42023003	Pus an Pilato lhisakmiy, juniy: —¿Uxint'i ixrejk'an judiojnin? Yucha ja'alhtayanalh, najun: —Uxint'ich'a na'un.
42023004	Wachuncha an Pilato, jajuniy an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an lapanakni: —Jantu tu'u tala'alhini ikla'cha'anini aniy lapanak.
42023005	Pero yu'uncha palay p'as ixtanajun: —Wa jalaktilhnini aniy la'acha'an tacha an masuy, an xalakaat'un Galileaja pu'a'taynichalh chi chaway aniycha xalakaat'un Judeaja taylhi'anta.
42023006	Pus an Pilato akxni asmatlhi nawkalh Galilea, lhasakminilhi li an Jesús sna jamacha'a Galilea.
42023007	Akxni k'ats'aalhi an Pilato li an Jesús jamacha'a tan ixch'alhkatnan an Herodes, ancha mala'achanilh, chi mu akxni an Herodes wachu Jerusaleni ixt'ajun.
42023008	An Herodes akxni la'ts'ilhcha an Jesús, sawalhcha achalh, mu ma'anchacha sawalhcha ixla'ts'imputun. Mu lhuwcha tanlhuni ixlaj'asmatta ixlichiwinkan yu ixlak'ilhtuy, chi ixla'ts'imputuncha li tu'ucha lhi'a'nini ka ix'ilhtulh.
42023009	Tipalhuwcha tu'u ixlisakmiy, pero yucha ntu tu'u alhtaylh.
42023010	An xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin wachu an ixtayanalh, p'ascha ixtalhimuk'ay tanlhun.
42023011	Pus wachuncha an Herodes ali an ixsoldadojnin tu tu'ucha ixtalhiwilay an Jesús, tamala'ch'inilhcha yu k'usi la'ch'it, wa ixtapumamaxaniycha chi an Herodes mala'achanipalhi an Pilato.
42023012	Pus akxni, oxicha talalhi'alh an Pilato ali an Herodes, mu ixlip'ulhnaj wa ixtalaxkajiy.
42023013	Wachuncha an Pilato, jama'ayxto'olhi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an jamach'alhkatni chi taa ixlijalhi'ay an la'acha'an,
42023014	jajuniy: —Aniy lapanak kilalhiminitaw kilajunaw li wa jalaktilhnini an la'acha'an; pero la mi'ukxlakapuchak'ani iklhisakmilh, chi ntu tu'u ikla'cha'aninilh tala'alhin t'ach'a an lhimuk'ayat'it.
42023015	Chi an Herodes, wanajcha chun kintamala'achanicho'ochin. La'ts'inat'itcha, jantu tu'u ilhtuta yu laycha kalhima'nikalh.
42023016	Akxta'niyacha la'atam lhima'alh'ajna chi akmakawcho'oyacha.
42023017	Chuncha jajunilh mu akxni k'atan ixjun an Pilato ixjamakawniy pumatam tach'ini an lapanakni.
42023018	Pero ixchuxk'an wa ayxtami talakt'asa'olh, tanajun: —¡Ani Jesús jantu! ¡Yu akilamakawniw yucha an Barrabás!
42023019	An Barrabás ixmalaklhchawkanta mu ixjama'nininta chi wa ixt'alaxtukuy an xajamach'alhkat an la'acha'an.
42023020	An Pilato a'tam jalhisakmipalhi mu ixmakawputuni an Jesús,
42023021	pero yu'uncha a'tam palay p'as talakt'asapalh, ixtalaknajun: —¡K'amakxt'ukmuk'acha, k'amakxt'ukmuk'acha!
42023022	Pero an Pilato, ixlipu'a't'utucha a'tam jajumpalh: —¿Tisuncha tala'alhini ilhtuta?, jantu tu'u tala'alhini ikla'cha'anini para li kama'nikalhcha; akmama'alh'ajniyacha pero akmakawcho'oya'.
42023023	Pero yu'uncha palay p'as ixtalakt'asay, ixtalhisk'in li ma kamakxtukmuk'akalhcha. Pus tacha an ixtalakt'asay an lapanakni chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, tamatapujunilhcha.
42023024	Pus an Pilato ilhtulhcha yu an ixtalakask'in yu'uncha.
42023025	Jama'axta'nilhcha an Jesús an lapanakni para li kata'ilhtulhcha wa tani ta'ilhtuputuncha chi an yu ixlimalaklhchawkanta ixjama'ninti chi ixlakata li wa ixt'ala'ajiy an xajamach'alhkat la'acha'an yucha makawlhcha, mu chunchacha ixtajuniy.
42023026	Akxni ixtitalhi'ancha an Jesús, tach'apayawlh pumatam lapanak ixjunkan Simón, jamacha'a Cirene, la ixlhima'spa la'acha'ani minchalh, tamak'uk'alhcha an cruz para li ma kach'a'o'alhi'alhcha an Jesús.
42023027	Wanajcha lhilhuwi ixch'a'o'akanta chi lhuw t'akunini ixtama'anta, sawalhcha ixtalhita'oxila'alhi chi ixtalhilaj'alhuncha.
42023028	Pero an Jesús tala'asp'itlhi chi sa'cha ixjala'ts'in, ixjajuniy: —Ixjatsi'in la'acha'an Jerusalén, jantu akilalhi'alhuw; mijas'at'ank'ani k'ajalhi'alhunt'it chi milakatak'an,
42023029	mu kamina wilhchani akxni kanawkana: —Oxi para yu'uncha an t'akunin an yu ntu lay tajamas'at'analh, chi an yu ntu a'tam tajamas'at'analh chi an yu ntu a'tam tajamats'ik'inilh.
42023030	Akxni katajuna an laj'a'stitawk'a: "Akila'a'lhtants'iwcha", Chi an tan laklakatitawk'a katajuna: "Akilamats'e'wi",
42023031	mu li kit'in tacha kinta'ilhtuy, walh chi tacha ikst'a'aw k'iw, pus uxitnan ¿tasu li ntucha chun k'at'i'ilht'uk'ant'it li tachanu xaxixni k'iwi unt'at'it'i?
42023032	Ixjat'alhi'ampalhkanta ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni an Jesús, para li kajat'ama'nikalhcha. Yu'uncha ixta'ilhtuta ixtala'alhink'an.
42023033	Akxni tacha'alhcha tan junkan la Ixla'pa'axi Swe'elukut, anchacha makxtukmuk'akalh an Jesús chi an ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni yu ixta'ilhtuta tala'alhin, ixtapiktutamincha, lhilaxjama'xi chi tan oxi ixmaka'.
42023034	An Jesús nawlh: —KimPay, k'ajamala'mixinin, mu wa ntu tak'atsay tuchini ta'ilhtuycha. —Chi talamala'pitsilhcha an ixla'chit an Jesús, wa ta'amanalh suerte.
42023035	Chi chux an lapanakni sa'cha ixtala'ts'in, chi masi an jamach'alhkatni ixtamamaxaniycha, ixtalajuniy: —Ali'in jama'alhtaxtulh, kama'alhtaxtukalhcha ix'akstu li Cristo sawalh, yu sakxtuta Dios.
42023036	An soldadojnin wachucha ixtamamaxaniy, waniycha ixtala'an ixtama'ot'uycha vinagre
42023037	chi ixtajuniy: —Li ixrejk'at'i judiojnin, k'at'a'alht'axt'ucha mi'akstu.
42023038	An la ix'akpuxni ists'o'nikanta tan ixnajunta: "Aniy ixrejk'an Judiojnin".
42023039	Pumatam an yu ixjat'amakxtukmuk'akanta an Jesús, ixlilakajuniycha, ixjuniy: —Li Cristojk'at'i, k'ama'alht'axt'uk'acha chi akilama'alhtaxtuw.
42023040	An pumatam la'a'aymalh juniy: —Masi wanajch'a ch'uni ma'alh'ajnant'a'un jant'u t'alhamniya an Dios.
42023041	Kitnan t'acha'anawi li chuncha kama'alh'ajnaw, mu mapalht'awnawi yu ilhtutaw tala'alhin, pero aniy lapanak tu tu'u tala'alhini ilhtuta.
42023042	Chi juniy an Jesús: —Jesús, ak'imp'ast'ak'a'a akxni k'ach'alhk'atnana'acha.
42023043	Pus an Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Uxint'i chaway ak'int'ap'ina'acha tan lhi'acha alin jatsukunti, sawalhi aniy yu ijkunan.
42023044	Ka tacha atunkujuncha sta las tres yu ta'oxaycha, chux an lakaat'un taputs'isilh.
42023045	An wilhchan taputs'isilh, chi an la'ch'it an ix'uk'alh laka tajtan lht'it'in tapu'exli, tukan ixpaytat aklht'uyi walh.
42023046	Akxni an Jesús, p'ascha t'asalh najun: —KimPay, an kintakuwin la mimakacha ikma'axta'niyan. Chi akxni chunchacha naw'olh, nilhcha.
42023047	An capitán akxni la'ts'ilhcha li chunchacha tapasalh xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, najun: —Chun sawalh, aniy lapanak tu tu'u ixtala'alhin.
42023048	Ixchuxk'an an yu chunchacha tala'ts'ilh tacha an tapasalh, ta'ancho'olhcha, jalaktankilhaksalhi'ankalhcha.
42023049	Ixchuxk'an an yu ixjamispay an Jesús chi an t'akunin yu ixtat'amintachalh sta la'acha'an Galilea wa ma'atcha ixtalakaminachalh tacha an ixtapasay.
42023050	Ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak ixjunkan José, jamacha'a Arimatea, xala'acha'an an Judea. Yucha wachu ixma'ta'ayxt'o'a an laka ay junta yu ixta'ilhtuy an Judiojnin,
42023051	pero mu yucha oxi lapanak chi ixkiklaka'iy Dios, yucha ntu oxi ixliwilay tacha an tatamakawlh laka junta, mu yucha wachu ixpakxan'iya an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
42023052	Yucha la'alhi an Pilato chi sk'inilhi an ixlakatunaj an Jesús.
42023053	Akxni ma'alhtajulhcha an laka cruz, la'apamililhcha laka sábana, chi maknulhcha tan ixtantipujkanta a'stitawka la'stu de chiwx, jantuka' k'is xamati ancha ixmaknukan.
42023054	Akxni chuncha tapasalh sawalhcha ixtala'asijt'ajuni an lapanakni, mu katunkunanta xawilhchan jastaknat.
42023055	An t'akunin an yu ixtat'amintachalh an Jesús sta la'acha'an Galilea tat'a'alh, tala'ts'ilhi tan kimaknukalh chi tani lhimamakalhcha an ixlakatunaj.
42023056	Akxni ta'ancho'olhcha ixcha'ak'an, tamala'asijnilhcha laklhaklhi perjume yu lay lakatawk'akan; chi tajastaknalhcha akxni xawilhchan jastaknat, tacha najunta laka lhamap'a'sin.
42024001	A'taynicho'olhcha la'atam wilhchan, sast'icha samana, sawalh wats'isin ta'alhcha an t'akunin an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús, ixtat'a'antacha ali'in ixt'at'akunink'an chi ixtalhi'antacha an yu ixtamala'asijnita laklhaklhi perjume.
42024002	Walh akxni tacha'alh, tala'ts'in an aya chiwx an yu ixpumalaklhchawkanta an tan ix'aknuy, ma'osukanta.
42024003	Chi tatanulh, walh tu tala'cha'alhi an ixlakatunaj an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
42024004	Pus tucha ixtalhimacha'xay, walh wa akxni tatalakasulh ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni waniy an tan ixtalakyanalh, wa la'xlimjnik'acha an ixla'ch'itk'an.
42024005	Chi mu ixtalaktalhanancha an t'akunin, tala'ta'antatawilhcha an lakaat'un, pus jajunkan: —¿T'asu li p'uxk'awyatcha an yu la'ajunta an tan tamanalh janinini?
42024006	Yucha ntu aniya t'ajun, yucha la'awcho'olh. K'ap'ast'akt'iti tacha an tajunin akxni an ixt'ajunka xalakaat'un Galilea,
42024007	pero tajunan: —Lhitask'iniya li an isTs'alh Lapanak kama'axta'kalhi la ixmakak'an an ma'lhta'alhinin, chi li kamakxtukmuk'akalh, pero kala'awcho'oya ixlila'at'utu wilhchan.
42024008	Wachuncha yu'uncha tapastaklhi tacha an ixnajunta,
42024009	pus tataxtulh an tan ix'aknuy, ta'ancho'olhcha chi tamak'ats'aanilhcha an ixpumakawtamk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús chi ixchuxk'ancha an ali'in tacha an tapasalh.
42024010	An t'akunin an yu tajamak'atsaaninilh yu'uncha an María Magdalena, chi Juana, chi María ixnati Jacobo, chi an ali'incha ixt'at'akunink'an yu ixtat'a'anta.
42024011	Pero an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jantu ixtakiklaka'iya an t'akunin, ixtalhi'ilhtuy li wa lhilocojcha li katakiklaka'ilh.
42024012	Pero an Pedro jats'alaj'alhi an tan ixmaknukanta an Jesús, chi kiila'ts'ilhi li wa yucha an la'chitcha ancha ixlaktanun. Wachuncha alhcha ixcha'a, chi ixli'a'nicha tacha an tapasalh.
42024013	Wayuchaka anchunu wilhchan, ixt'uyunk'an an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, ixtita'an tanchun la'acha'an junkan Emaús, ka tacha la'akawtam kilómetrojo lhitamakawni an la'acha'an Jerusalén,
42024014	ixtalhilakchiwij'antacha chux tacha an laktapasalh.
42024015	Walh akxni chunchaka ixtalalhikikxtukulhi'anta, an Jesús wanicha jala'cha'alh, ixjat'alakjalhtanaj'antacha.
42024016	Pero an ixla'chulhk'an yu'uncha watachanu tu'ucha kajala'puchapalh para li ntu katamispalh.
42024017	An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Tisunch'a lhilakch'iwijp'int'at'it? Pus sa'cha tatayalh chi ixtata'oxila'alhicha.
42024018	Chi pumatam ixjunkan Cleofas alhtaylh, juniy: —An yu ntu jama'cha'an Jerusalén wa uxint'i yu nt'u k'a k'ats'ay tacha an tapasalh wa anika'.
42024019	Pus yucha ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —¿Tisuncha tapasalhi? Chi tajuniy: —Yucha an Jesús, jamacha'a Nazaret yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi alhp'asi lay ixlak'ilhtuy an tanlhun tapatsat, alhp'asi ixchiwiniy la`ix'ukxlakapu an Dios chi la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an lapanakni;
42024020	walh chi li laycha tama'axta'lhi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an kijamach'alhkatnank'an para li kamakxtukmuk'akalh chi li kama'nikalh.
42024021	Kitnan xakpakxan'iyaw li yuchacha akintama'alhtaxtuyan yu kwilaw Israel. Pero chaway la'at'utucha wilhchani yu chunchacha tapasalh.
42024022	Masi ali'in an t'akunin, yu ancha kintat'awilanan kintame'e'swayan, mu takilaka'alhi wats'isin an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús.
42024023	Ma ntu tu'u tanun, pus tacha'ancho'olh, tanajun ma tala'ts'ilh angelhnin yu ma tanajun li an Jesús la'ajunta.
42024024	Pus ali'in an yu kintat'aalach'a'o'ayan wachu takilaka'alhi an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús. Chi chuncha sawalhi takila'ts'ilh tacha an tanajun an t'akunin, pero an Jesús jantu tala'ts'ilh.
42024025	Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —¡Laj'a'atu'axixin, sawalhcha laksniya k'iklak'a'iyat tacha an tanawlh an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios!
42024026	¿Chun tu ixlitask'iniya li an Cristo chuncha p'ulhnaj ka ixlaktapasanilh la ixjatsukunti aniy tanlhun, para li xli'astan kaxlimjcha juna chi ay tukani kala'ts'inkana'?
42024027	Pus tsukulhcha jalhixa'alayi an Jesús chux an tan lhichiwininta ixlakata yu yucha, sta la ixlaklibro an Moisés sta tacha an alin ali ixlaklibrojk'an an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
42024028	Akxni tacha'alhcha an la'acha'an tan ixtita'an, an Jesús ixlay li palay ma'ati ixti'an.
42024029	Pero yu'uncha p'asi tajunilh li anchacha kajat'atamakawlh, tajuniy: —Kakilat'atamakajucha, mu ta'oxaycha, taputs'isit'ajuncha. —Pus anchacha jat'atamakawlh.
42024030	Akxni sa'cha ixtalakwilanalh laka mesaj, xa'a'ilhcha an pan chi xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun, puch'e'elhcha chi jala'xta'nilhcha.
42024031	Akxni chun tamispalhcha mu tachanu tajalakawanalhcha; pero la ixjalakawantik'ani la'mixpalh.
42024032	Chi ixtalajumpaxay: —Sawalh, ¿chun tu xakintaxawniyani an kijalhunutk'an la kintankilhaknik'an akxni an xakintat'alakchiwijmintan laka tij chi xakintalhixa'alayan an tacha ts'o'muk'akanta la ixchiwinti Dios?
42024033	Wachuncha jantu ali tapakxalh, watukan ta'ancho'olhi la'acha'an Jerusalén. Chi tala'cha'alhi an ixpumakawtamk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tan ixtat'a'ayxto'nun an ali'in yu wachu ixtach'a'o'ay an Jesús,
42024034	ixtalajuniy: —Chun sawalh la'awcho'ota an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, chi talakasunilhi an Simón.
42024035	Pus akxni yu'uncha wachucha tanawlhi tani tala'ts'ilhcha an laka tij, chi li tamispalhi an Jesús akxni puch'e'elh an pan.
42024036	Chunchaka ixtalhilakchiwint'ajun aniy tanlhun, an Jesús japujatayachalhcha chi jajuniy: —¡Oxicha k'at'awlat'tit'i!
42024037	Pus yu'uncha sawalhcha talaktalhanalh, ixtanajun li sna wa uncha.
42024038	Pero an Jesús jajuniy: —¿T'asu li lakt'alhananatcha ch'i li nawnatcha li sna ntu kit'ini?
42024039	K'ala'ts'int an kimaka chi an kinch'aja', kit'in. Akilalakach'apaw chi k'ala'ts'int'itcha. Yu wa takuwincha ntu tu'u ixjakanit chi ixjalukut t'ach'a la'ts'inat iklhit'ajun.
42024040	Chunchacha jajun'olh chi ixjamasuniycha an ixlakmaka chi an ixlakch'aja'.
42024041	Pero mu yu'uncha ntuka' oxi ixtalhimacha'xay mu sawalhcha ixtalaj'achan chi sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niy, pus jajuniy an Jesús: —¿T'u'u lhit'awnat aniy yu ukan?
42024042	Wachuncha taxta'nilh lakats'uniy jamaxkawawanti jatanti chi t'axkat.
42024043	Jama'lhtaylhcha chi ulhcha la ix'ukxlakapuk'an.
42024044	Xli'astan jajuniy: —Chunchuniya an klajuniw akxni an xaklat'a'aklat'awnaw: li xlitask'iniya li chuncha katapasa'olh tacha an kilhits'o'muk'akanta an la ixlamap'a'sin Moisés, chi an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi an Salmos.
42024045	Pus wachuncha ja'ilhtulhi li katalhimacha'xalhi an tan chuncha ts'o'muk'akanta;
42024046	chi jajuniy: —Chuncha ts'o'muk'akanta li an Cristo kaniya chi kala'awcho'oya ixlila'at'utu wilhchan;
42024047	chi li chux an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni kalhichiwinkalhi la ixtalakask'i li katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios, para li kajamala'mixinilhi ixtala'alhink'an. Sta la'acha'an Jerusaleni kapu'a'taynikana'.
42024048	Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'it'i tacha aniy laktapasalh.
42024049	Chi kit'in aklamakminiyawi an yu nawlh kimPay li kamakmina'; pero uxitnan k'asa' t'awlat'iti aniy la'acha'an Jerusalén, sta li akxni k'ala'a'iya'itcha an yu alhp'as k'ap'u'una'it an yu kaminanta lakt'iyan.
42024050	Xli'astan chux an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús jamaxtulhcha an la'acha'an Jerusalén, jalhi'alhcha sta la'acha'an Betaniaj, chi tamakch'ixlicha chi tapayninilhcha an Dios para oxi katatsukulh.
42024051	Akxni jalhitapayni'olhcha, wa akxni jamakawyawlhcha, chi alhcha lakt'iyan.
42024052	Yu'uncha akxni stakcha taxta'olh lhimala'puchajun, talaj'achaj'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén.
42024053	Chi lhilhiji ixtatsukuy an laka tajtan, ixtalakmilhpaniycha an Dios chi ixtaxta'nicha lhimala'puchajun. Chunchacha kajunlhi.
43001001	Akxni ntuka' tu'u ix'alin, ix'alincha pumatam yu junkan Chiwinti, chi an Chiwinti yucha an Diosi ixt'a'aklat'ajun, an Chiwinti yucha an Dios.
43001002	Akxni ntuka' tu'u ix'alin, yucha ixt'ajuncha, ixt'a'aklat'ajuncha an Dios.
43001003	Chi chux an laktanlhun, yucha pu'ilhtukalh, jantu tu'u an yu alin laktanlhun yu ntu yu kapu'ilhtukalh.
43001004	Mu yucha ixlhit'ajun an jatsukunti, chi an jatsukunti, ixjatapulhkunuk'an an lapanakni.
43001005	An jatapulhkunu mapulhkuyi an tan lakaaputs'isni, chi an jatats'isni jantu lay mamixiya an jatapulhkunu'.
43001006	Kilachilh pumatam lapanak yu ixmala'achatachalh an Dios, ixjunkan Juan.
43001007	Yucha kilhichiwinchilh an jatapulhkunu para li katapukiklaka'i'olhi an lapanakni, kijamak'ats'aanininchilhi ixlakata an jatapulhkunu'.
43001008	An Juan tu yu jatapulhkunu', yucha wa kijamak'atsanininchilh ixlakata an jatapulhkunu'.
43001009	An yu sawalh jatapulhkunu yu jamapulhkuni'ojoy chux an lapanakni kaminaka aniy lakamunulhpa'.
43001010	Chi akxni ixt'ajuncha an yu jatapulhkunu sawalh aniy lakaamunulhpa, masi yucha pu'ilhtukalh an lakaamunulhpa, an lapanakni ntu tamispalh.
43001011	Kilachilhi an la xlakaamunulhpa pero an yu ancha jamala'awnita jantu tala'a'ilh.
43001012	Pero ixchuxk'an yu tala'a'ilh, chi takiklaka'ilh, ja'ilhtulhi li xas'at'an Diosi katawalh.
43001013	Yu'uncha ntu wa laka jak'alhni tapula'ajun, chi ntu wa laka jakanit, chi ntu wa laka lapanak, yu'uncha Diosi jamala'awni laxtakuwink'an.
43001014	An Chiwinti junlhi lapanak chi kintakit'atawlhchin. Chi la'ts'iwi an ix'alhp'asninti, yu xta'niy an ixPay, mu wa ix'akstu isTs'alh, chi yucha lhuwi ixjamapayninti chi chux an ixchiwinti sawalh.
43001015	An Juán lhichiwinilh ixnajun: —Yucha aniya an yu xaklalhixa'alayaw, akxni xaklajunaw: "Yu aminta xli'astan palay lhitapalay, mu yucha o'sliyancha ixt'ajun, kit'in astani ikt'ajun".
43001016	Yucha pula'a'i'oyaw wa tuchicha, chi yucha ali ali lalhawayi ixjamapayninti.
43001017	Mu an lhamap'a'sin yucha an Moisesi puxta'kalh, pero an jamapayninti chi an yu sawalh yucha an Jesucristojo japu'ilhtukalh.
43001018	An Dios tu a'tam xamati la'ts'inta; pero an isTs'alh, mu wanajcha yucha an Dios, yucha kintamamispanin, mu yucha lhilhiji t'awilhchalh an ixPay.
43001019	Yucha anicha yu lhichiwiniy an Juan, akxni an judiojnin yu ixtat'ajun la'acha'an Jerusalén, tamala'achalh sacerdotejnin chi levitajnin para li kata'alh lhisakminin an Juán tichini yuchacha.
43001020	An Juán ixla'ts'awalanti nawlh, najun: —Kit'in jantuj Cristo.
43001021	Pus talhisakmi tajuniy: —¿Pus tisu uxint'icha? ¿Uxint'i Elías? Yucha najun: —Jantu, jantu kit'ini Elías. ¿Uxint'i yu lhich'iwini ixchiwinti Dios? Yucha ja'alhtaypalh: —Jantu.
43001022	Wachuncha tajuniy: —¿Pus tisu uxint'icha? Mu ajkamak'atsaaniyawi tichini uxint'icha an yu kintamala'achatacha'an. ¿Tisu uxint'icha kilajunawi?
43001023	An Juán ja'alhtaylh: —Kit'ini an chiwinti an yu ixchiwiniy p'as an tan wa sa' junita, tan ixnajun: "K'alats'awalat'iti an ixtij an Jamach'alhkat Cristo". Tacha an nawlh Isaías, yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
43001024	An yu ixjamala'achakanta li katakila'ts'ilh an Juán yu'uncha an fariseojnin.
43001025	Tajuniy an Juán: —¿Pus mu li ntu uxint'i Cristojk'at'i, chi ntu Elíask'at'i chi ntu uxint'i an yu kamina lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tasu li jama'p'axanancha?
43001026	An Juán ja'alhtaylh: —Kit'in wa laka xkani ijkama'paxanan, pero t'a'aklat'awnat pumatami yu nt'u misp'ayat.
43001027	Yucha yu kamina ixli'astan, yucha masi wa ak'o'x'otnilhcha ixwarachi jantu ikt'acha'an.
43001028	Tan chuncha laktapasalh aniy tanlhun, la'acha'an tan junkan Betaniaj, ixtapiktutam an ayxkan junkan Jordán, ancha an Juan ixjama'paxanant'ajun.
43001029	Tunkunchalh an Juan, la'ts'ist'uk'acha an Jesús li ixla'antachalhcha, pus najun: —¡Yucha aniya yu ixborrego an Dios, yu lha'ulanalh, para li kamala'mixinilhi ixtala'alhin an lakaamunulhpa'!
43001030	Yucha an yu ijkuni akxni iknajun: "Xli'astan kit'in, kamina pumatam lapanak yu palay lhitapalay, mu yucha p'ulhnajcha ixt'ajun".
43001031	Kit'in wachu ntu xakmispay, pero para li katamispalhi an jamacha'an Israel, xliyu kit'in xajkama'paxanancha lakaxkan.
43001032	Atumpaj an Juan nawpalh: —Ikla'ts'ilhi an ixTakuwin Dios akxni ta'alhtajulh an lakt'iyan, watacha paloma, tan ixyalh.
43001033	Kit'in tu xakmispay; pero an yu kimakmilh li akmilh jama'paxana lakaxkan kijunilh: "An yu k'ala'ts'ina'a li kalakpatawlanta an ixTakuwin Dios akxni kata'alhtajuya, yucha yu jama'paxanan laka Stalan'a ixTakuwin Dios".
43001034	Chi kit'in kla'ts'ilhcha, pus iknajuncha li aniy yucha isTs'alh an Dios.
43001035	Tunkunchalh an Juán anchacha ixt'awpalay ali ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan.
43001036	Chi la'ts'ilhi an Jesús li ancha ix'aklat'ajun, pus an Juán najun: —¡Yucha anu yu ixborrego an Dios yu lha'ulancha makminkanta!
43001037	An ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan an Juán ta'alha'asmatlhi, pus tach'a'o'alhi an Jesús.
43001038	An Jesús tala'asp'itlhi pus jala'ts'ilhi li ixtach'a'o'ata, chi jajuniy: —¿T'isunch'a p'uxk'awyat'iti? Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¿T'anisch'a wilht'i Maestro?
43001039	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —K'at'at'itcha chi k'ala'ts'ina'itcha. Yu'uncha tat'a'alhcha chi takila'ts'ilhcha tan ixtawlay, chi mu ixta'oxaycha ka tacha las cuatrojcha, pus tat'atamakawchalhcha yu akxni ixtunkujunta.
43001040	An Andrés, ixt'ala'ajun Simón Pedro, yucha xapumatam an ixt'uyunk'an an yu ta'alha'asmatlhi an Juan chi tach'a'o'alh an Jesús.
43001041	Chi an Andrés watukan la'alhi an ixt'ala'ajun yu junkan Simón, chi juniy: —Ikla'cha'aw an Cristo.
43001042	Pus t'a'alhcha an tan ixt'awnachalh an Jesús, chi an Jesús juniy an Simón: —Uxint'i Simonk'at'i, ists'alh Jonás, chaway Cefascha k'a'unk'ana'a (nawputun Pedro).
43001043	Tunkumpalhchalh, an Jesús k'uxa'alh xalakaat'un Galilea, walh paxto'lhicha an Felipe, pus juniy: —Ak'int'ap'it'icha.
43001044	An Felipe, jamacha'a Betsaida, tan ixla'acha'ank'an an Andrés chi an Pedro.
43001045	An Felipe la'cha'alh an Natanael, pus juniy: —Ikla'cha'awcha an yu ts'o'muk'ata an Moisés an laka lhamap'a'sin, chi an tacha ixtanajun wachu an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios: Yucha an Jesús, ists'alh José, jamacha'a Nazaret.
43001046	An Natanael najun: —¿Jamacha'a Nazaret, laycha oxi tu'u kaminchalh ancha? An Felipe alhtaylh juniy: —Li k'at'at'icha k'ala'ts'ina'acha.
43001047	Akxni an Jesús la'ts'incha li la'antachalhcha an Natanael, najun: —¡Aniy minta pumatam jamacha'a Israel, yu ntu ja'o'xcho'onun!
43001048	An Natanael ja'alhtayanalh: —¿T'asich'a k'ilhimisp'ayi? An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Akxni ntuka' ixt'asaniyan an Felipe, ikla'ts'inani akxni ixyat'i ixtamp'in an xak'iw higo.
43001049	An Natanael, juniy an Jesús: —¡Maestro, uxint'i isTs'alhk'at'i Dios! ¡Uxint'i ixRey an la'acha'an Israel!
43001050	Yucha alhtaylh juniy: —¿K'iklak'a'iya mu wa xliyu ijkunan li kla'ts'ini an ixtamp'in xak'iw higo? Tacha aniy palay k'ala'ts'ina'a yu palay laj'ay tanlhun.
43001051	Chi nawpalay an Jesús: —Sawalhi an yu klajunaw, ati'anta uxitnan k'ala'ts'ina'it'iti an lakt'iyan katati'ayanta chi k'ajala'ts'ina'it'iti an ix'angelhnin an Dios tacha tatach'ixa chi tata'alhtajuy la ix'ukxni an isTs'alh Dios.
43002001	Xlila'at'utucha wilhchan walh, tama'xto'kalh la'acha'an Caná, xalakaat'un Galilea, chi ancha ixt'ajun an ixnati Jesús.
43002002	Chi an Jesús chi an ixt'alhtanan wachu jamak'atsaanikalhi li kata'alh.
43002003	Walh ancha min'olhcha an yu ixlaj'otkan xaxkan uvaj. Pus wachuncha an ixnati an Jesús, juniy: —Jantucha tu'u an xaxkan uvaj.
43002004	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —¿Chi kit'in tasu li k'i'unicha? Jantuka' chini kimpanch'e'ex.
43002005	An ixnati an Jesús, jajuniy an yu ixtamala'pitsi tanlhun: —Chux yu tajunan, yucha yuch'ach'a k'a'ilht'ut'it.
43002006	Ancha ixlakwilh la'achaxan wa tacha a'xaw de chiwx, yu ixpumukan xkan, cincuentaj u setentaj litro xkani lay ixputajuy, yucha ixtaxa'a'iy an judiojnin akxni ixta'ilhtuy yu tacha ixtamasunita ixlakpaynink'an para li katastalan'alh.
43002007	An Jesús jajuniy: —K'ala'la'ts'amat laka xkani anchunu lakwilh yu pumukan xkan. Pus oxicha tala'la'tsamalh.
43002008	Chi xli'astan jajuniy: —Chaway k'amak'ut'utcha lakats'uni chi k'alhip'inichi'itcha an yu la'ts'ilhi'anta aniy wayt. Pus talhi'anilhcha.
43002009	Kilhk'atsalhcha an yu ixla'ts'ilhi'anta laka k'atan li junitacha tacha xaxkan uvaj an xkan, masi yucha ntu ixk'atsayi tanchuncha minchalh. Pero an yu ixtamala'pitsi tanlhun yu'uncha ixtak'atsay, mu yu'uncha tamakutulh an xkan an laka pozo. An yu ixla'ts'ilhi'anta laka k'atan t'asanilhi an yu tama'xt'o'a lapanak,
43002010	chi juniy: —Watichicha lapanak p'ulhnajcha yu an oxi xaxkan uvaja xt'a'a, chi akxni lhucha laj'otkanta, yucha an yu palaycha wa aktayi xt'a'a, walh chi uxint'i an yu oxi lhi'ot'at ma'at'aka sta astan.
43002011	Yucha anicha yu p'ulhnajcha malaksulh an Jesús, la'acha'an Caná xalakaat'un Galilea, masulhcha li alhp'asi yucha, chi an ixt'alhtanan takiklaka'ilhcha.
43002012	Xli'astan akxni chunchacha tapasalh, an Jesús jat'a'alhcha an ixnati chi an ixjat'ala'awnin chi an ixt'alhtanan la'acha'an Capernaúm; anchacha tatamakawlh, jantu la'alhuw wilhchan.
43002013	Mu wanicha ixminta ixk'atan paxku, ixk'atank'an an judiojnin, an Jesús alh la'acha'an Jerusalén.
43002014	Walh an lakatajtan jala'cha'alh an yu ixtast'ay torojnin chi borregojnin chi palomajnin chi an yu ixtamapaxay tumin, anchacha ixtalakwilanalh.
43002015	Mu chunchacha jala'ts'in an Jesús, pus xa'a'ilh ma'atam lazo, ilhtulhcha ixpa'ayna'na, wanaj jatamakxtu'olhi an lakatajtan chux an ixborregojnink'an chi an ixtorojnink'an an lapanakni; chi tilhcha jamaj'anilhi an ixtumink'an an yu ixtamapaxay tumin chi jala'ma'pusp'itnilhcha an ixmesajk'an.
43002016	Jajuniy an yu ixtast'ay paloma: —¡K'alakt'amakxt'ut'iti an tanlhun aniy, jant'u k'a'ilht'ut'iti mimpast'ank'an an ixcha'a kimPay!
43002017	Pus akxni tapastaklhicha an ixt'alhtanan li ts'o'muk'akanta, tan najunta: ¡Sawalh aklhitalh'amna an mincha'a'!
43002018	An judiojnin tajuniy an Jesús: —Li ch'unch'ach'a lay, ¿tisuncha akilamasuniyaw li t'ach'ip'ini li ch'unch'ach'a k'alat'i?
43002019	An Jesús jajuniy: —K'alakt'ilhit'iti aniy tajtan, walh chi wa la'at'utu wilhchan akyawcho'oya'.
43002020	Pus an judiojnin tajuniy: —¿Wa la'at'utu wilhchani k'ayawch'o'oya'a? Aniy tajtan t'up'uxamchaxan (46) k'ata yawkalh.
43002021	Pero an Jesús yucha an ixlakatunaja ixjuniy.
43002022	Xliyu akxni la'awcho'olhcha, an ixt'alhtanan tapastaklhi li chuncha ixnajunta, pus takiklaka'ilhi an tan ts'o'muk'akanta chi an ixchiwinti an Jesús.
43002023	Akxni la'acha'anka Jerusalén ixt'awnachalh an Jesús, la ixk'atan Paxku, ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh, mu ixtala'ts'incha tacha an tu'u ixlak'ilhtuy yu ntu wa tichicha lay ilhtuy.
43002024	Pero an Jesús jantu ixjalhiwilay, mu yucha ixjamispa'ojoy.
43002025	Yucha ntu xamati ixma'lhtask'iniy kajunilh tani ixlaycha xamati'. Mu yucha ixjamispani'ojoyi an ixjalhunutk'an an lapanakni.
43003001	Ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak yu'uncha an yu ixjajunkan fariseojnin, ixjunkan Nicodemo, an judiojnin xa'ayi ixta'ilhtuta.
43003002	Aniy lapanak la'alhi an Jesús puts'ista, chi juniy: —Maestro, ijk'atsayawi li Diosi mala'achatacha'an para li akilamiw masuninin, mu ntu xamati lay kati'ilhtulh t'ach'a an lak'ilht'uy tanlhun yu wa tichicha lapanak li yu ntu Dios t'a'aklat'ajun.
43003003	An Jesús juniy: —Sawalhi aniy yu ijkunan, yu ntu sast'i tsukucho'oy jantu lay katila'ts'ilh an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
43003004	An Nicodemo juniy: —¿Tasicha lay kalhitsukucho'olh xamati li papacha? ¿Laycha kapalaktajucho'olh ixnati chi katsukupalh?
43003005	An Jesús juniy: —Kit'in sawalhi aniy yu ijkunan, li yu ntu tsukuyi laka xkan chi la ixTakuwin an Dios, jantu lay katitanuchalh an la ixlich'alhkat Dios.
43003006	Yu wa laka lakatunaja pula'ajun, wa lakatunaj, yu laka Takuwin pula'ajun, yucha takuwin.
43003007	Jant'u k'alhi'a'nit'i li ijkunan: "Li lhitask'iniya li sast'i kala'awcho'okalh".
43003008	An un wa lhitanchuncha minachalh, chi masi k'a'asmatt'icha makat'ajun, pero nt'u k'ak'ats'ati tanchuncha minachalh chi tanchuncha ti'an. Chuncha yu la'ajun laka Takuwin.
43003009	An Nicodemo lhisakmilh juniy: —¿Chi tasicha aklhit'alalhi?
43003010	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Uxint'i li xamaestro la'acha'an Israel, ¿ch'i nt'u k'ats'ayi aniy tanlhun?
43003011	Sawalhi an yu ijkunan, kitnan iknawnawi yu ijk'atsayaw, chi yu ikla'ts'intaw kitnan, iknawnaw; pero uxitnan jant'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an yu klajunaw.
43003012	Li nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an yu klalhixa'alayaw yu wa aniy lakaamunulhpa alin, ¿t'asu laych'a k'alhik'iklak'a'iya'it an yu lakt'iyan alinachalhi?
43003013	Jantu xamati anta an lakt'iyan, wa yucha an yu ancha minchalh, an yu kijunchilh isTs'alh Lapank.
43003014	Chi tacha an tanxtukmuk'alhi an tsapulh an Moisés an tan wa jasa'nik'a lakaat'un, chuncha wachu an yu kijunchilh isTs'alh Lapanak kaxtukmuk'akana laka k'iw,
43003015	para li watichicha yu kakiklaka'iya, katsuku'alhiya', jantu katits'an'alh.
43003016	Mu an Dios sawalh jamapayniya an lapanakni yu tat'ajun an lakamunulhpa', yucha lhixta'lhi an isTs'alh masi wa ix'akstu, para li yu kiklaka'iy jantu kats'an'alh, kalhitsukulhi jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
43003017	An Dios jantu mala'achachalh an isTs'alh aniy lakaamunulhpa para li kamilh jalhitama'chapunu', yucha minta jama'alhtaxtunu'.
43003018	Yu kiklaka'iy jantu katimama'alh'ajnikalh, pero yu ntu kiklaka'iy yucha o'sliyancha li kamama'alh'ajnikana', mu ntu kiklaka'iya an isTs'alh Dios.
43003019	Yucha aniya ixlakata an lhima'alh'ajnat, li an jatapulhkunu yucha kilachilhcha aniy lakaamunulhpa', pero an lapanakni ntu tala'ts'imputulh, palay ta'achanilhi an lakaputs'isni, mu wa yu ntu oxi laktanlhuncha ixta'ilhtuy.
43003020	Watichicha yu wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi lak'ilhtuy, jantu la'ts'imputuni an jatapulhkunu', chi ntu k'uxa'ani tan pulhkuy para li ntu katasulhi yu an ilhtuy.
43003021	Pero yu ilhtuyi yu laj'oxi tanlhun yucha tan pulhkuyi an, para li katasulhi li an yu ilhtuy yucha an tacha najun Dios.
43003022	Xli'astan an Jesús ali an ixt'alhtanan ta'alhcha xalakaat'un Judea, anchacha ixtat'awnachalh chi ixjama'paxanancha an Jesús.
43003023	Chi an Juán, tanchun junkan Enón wani Salim ancha ixjama'paxanan, mu ancha lhuwi ix'alin xkan. Ixtalaj'a'paxacha an lapanakni akxni ixtacha'an,
43003024	mu an Juan akxni ntuka' ixmalaklhchawkan.
43003025	Wachuncha an ixt'alhtanan an Juan chi ali'in judiojnin tsukulhcha talalhikikxtukuyi ixlakata an stalan'anti.
43003026	Chi tala'alhi an Juan, tajuniy: —Maestro, an yu ixt'ayan an ixtapiktutam ayxkan Jordán, an lapanak an yu jalhixa'alat'i, wachu jama'paxanan, chi yucha tala'an'ojoy.
43003027	An Juán jajuniy: — Jantu xamati lay la'a'i t'u'u li ntu yucha an Diosi xta'niy.
43003028	Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li iknajun li ntu kit'ini ijCristo, kit'in wa p'ulhnajcha kimakminkanchalh.
43003029	Lakatam tan tama'xto'kan, an ts'alh yucha yu lhit'ajun an ixli'it, chi an ix'amigo an ts'alh an yu tama'xt'o'a, yu wani t'ayalh chi alha'asmat'a yu najun, sawalhcha achan. Xliyu kit'in an ki'achat a'tsay.
43003030	Yucha task'iniya li kata'ayalhi laka lhitapalat, chi kit'in aktalakat'ikt'ilh.
43003031	Yu talhman mintachalh jantu xamati ixt'achun. Chi yu wa aniycha lakaat'un alin wa de lakaat'uncha, chi wa yu aniycha alini lhichiwiniy. Pero yu lakt'iyan mintachalh jantu xamati ixt'achun,
43003032	chi yucha lhichiwiniy yu la'ts'intacha chi asmattacha, pero ntu xamati kiklaka'iy.
43003033	Li xamati kiklaka'iy an tacha najun, yucha najuni li sawalhi an tacha najun an Dios,
43003034	mu an yu Dios makminta, yucha an ixchiwinti Diosi lhichiwiniy, chi mu an Dios yucha jantu wa jatapulhkanti xt'a'a an ixTakuwin.
43003035	An Dios mapayniya an isTs'alh, pus ma'axta'ni'olhi an laktanlhun la ixmaka'.
43003036	Yu kiklaka'iya an isTs'alh Dios lhit'ajuncha an jatsukunti yu ntu katimin'olh; pero yu ntu kiklaka'iputun jantu katila'ts'ilhi an jatsukunti, yucha kala'a'iya an ay lhima'alh'ajna yu kaxta'niya an Dios.
43004001	Akxni k'atsalhi an Jesús li an fariseojnin tak'atsalhi li ixnawkan li an Jesús palay ixjama'paxanan chi an Juan jantu,
43004002	masi an Jesús jantu yu ixjama'paxanan, yu'uncha an ixt'alhtanan,
43004003	an Jesús taxtulhi xalakaat'un Judea k'uxa'ancho'olhi xalakaat'un Galilea.
43004004	Chi ixlitask'iniya li kala'pusli o'sliyani xalakaat'un Samaria.
43004005	Pus cha'alhcha lakatam xala'acha'an Samaria, junkan Sicar, wani la ixlakaat'un an Jacob yu ixta'nitacha an ists'alh José.
43004006	Ancha ix'ulata ixpozojo an Jacob, pus anchacha sa' tawilh an Jesús, mu sawalhcha ilho'onta la ixjalhtanti, wa k'ischa ix'atunkunt'ajuncha.
43004007	Walh cha'alh pumatam t'aku, jamacha'a Samaria, ixmakutuycha xkan, pus an Jesús juniy: —Ak'int'a'ott'ika lakats'uniy mixkan.
43004008	Mu an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús ixta'anta an la'acha'an tamawnin yu kata'uya'.
43004009	An t'aku jamacha'a Samaria alhtaylh juniy: —¿Tasu li k'isk'inicha xkan li akt'a'otni li uxint'i jamacha'a Judeajk'at'i chi kiti'n ijkamacha'a Samariaja? Chuncha junilh mu an judiojnin chi an samaritanojnin jantu ixtalala'ts'imputum.
43004010	Pus an Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Li k'a ixk'ats'at'i yu xt'a'a an Dios, chi tichini yuchacha an sk'iniyan xkan, uxint'i yucha k'a isk'inin, chi yucha ka ixta'nini xkan yu la'ajunta.
43004011	An t'aku juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, jant'u t'u'u lhit'a'un yu k'ap'umak'ut'u an xkan chi an pozo putalhman. ¿T'anisch'a k'a'iya'a xkan yu ak'ixt'a'niya'a yu la'ajunta?
43004012	¿Chu sna palay ayk'at'i, palay jantu an kimpayk'an Jacob yu kintaxta'nin aniy pozo, tan otlhi xkan chi an ixjas'at'an chi ixjatapakxat?
43004013	An Jesús juniy: —Watichicha yu ot'a aniy xkan kakikxixpala',
43004014	pero yu ka'ot'a an xkan yu kit'in akxta'niya jantucha a'tam katikikxixli. Mu an xkan yu kit'in akxta'niya la ixjatsukunticha kataxtutawla yu kaxta'niyacha ixjatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy.
43004015	An t'aku juniy: —Ak'ixt'a'nini yu yucha xkani, jamach'alhkat, para li ntucha ali ajkikxixli chi ntucha ali akmilh makutunu aniy.
43004016	An Jesús juniy: —K'ap'inchi t'asanini mint'apapa chi k'at'at'ana'acha.
43004017	An t'aku alhtaylh juniy: —Jantu tu'u kint'apapa'. An Jesús juniy: —Chunchacha sawalhi t'ach'a an na'un li ntu tu'u mint'apapa',
43004018	ixkisinchak'ani jamak'a'unt'a chi chaway an yu lhit'a'un jantu mint'apapa'. Sawalhi an yu na'un.
43004019	Akxni chunchacha alha'asmat'a an t'aku, juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, kit'in iklhiwilay ka ixchiwinti Diosi lhich'iwiniy.
43004020	Kitnan an kilakpaynink'an aniy a'stitawk'a ixtatapaynini Dios, pero uxitnan yu judiojnin nawnat li la'acha'an Jerusaleni katapayninikalh.
43004021	An Jesús juniy: —Aniy ijkunan sawalh, kachina panch'e'exi akxni k'at'ap'ayniniya'it'it an Dios wa tanchuncha masi ntucha aniy a'stitawk'a chi Jerusalén.
43004022	Uxitnan jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti t'ich'ini t'ap'ayniniyatcha, pero kitnan ijk'atsayawi tichini iktapayniniyawcha, mu tuchi lhita'alhtaxtukan ixlakatak'an an judiojnin.
43004023	Pero an panch'e'ex kachinacha, chi chawaycha, akxni an yu ixlisawalh tatapayniniy an Dios katatapayniniya laka takuwin chi ixlisawalh, chi mu wachu an Dios, an yu tatapayniniy japuxkajuyi li katatapayninilh.
43004024	An Dios wa Takuwin, chi an yu tatapayniniy laka takuwin chi ixlisawalh task'iniya li katatapayninilh.
43004025	An t'aku juniy an Jesús: —Ijk'atsayi li kamina an Mesías, yu junkan Cristo; akxni kaminacha akintajun'oyani an tanlhun.
43004026	An Jesús alhtaylh: —Yucha kit'in, kit'in yu ikt'achiwint'awnan.
43004027	Wa akxni tachincho'olhcha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, pus ixtalhi'a'niycha li ixt'achiwint'ajun pumatam t'aku'. Pero ntu xamati lhisakmilh tani ixnajuncha an t'aku u tuchini ixlit'alakchiwint'ajuncha.
43004028	Wachuncha an t'aku makaw'ulalhi an ix'a'xaw, chi alhcha jamak'atsanini an la'acha'an an lapanakni, jajuniy:
43004029	—K'at'at'it, ka'aw la'ts'inin pumatam lapanak yu kijunilhi tuchini k'ilhtutacha. ¿Jantu yucha an Cristojcha?
43004030	Pus tataxtulhi an la'acha'an chi tala'cha'alhi an Jesús.
43004031	An ixt'alhtanan an Jesús yu'uncha ixtalhitapayniniyanalh, ixtajuniy: —Maestro, k'awaycha.
43004032	Yucha jajuniy: —Kit'in iklhit'ajun la'atam wayt yu uxitnan jant'u misp'ayat.
43004033	Pus an ixt'alhtanan ixtanajun: —¿Xamati sna lhiminilh tu'u yu ka'ulh?
43004034	An Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'in kiwayt yucha li ak'ilhtulh tacha an lakask'in an yu kimakmintalh, chi li ak'ilhtu'olhi an ixtapatsat.
43004035	Uxitnan nawnat: —Ts'an'ayka la'at'at'i malhkuyu para li kajap'uxnunkalhcha; pero kit'in klajunaw li k'alhak'ap'up'it'itcha an jach'ananti, mu k'at'atacha para li kajap'uxnunkalhcha.
43004036	Yu ma'tapatsay an tan jap'uxnunkan kamapalhnikana', chi mach'ixtami jatawk'ati an yu ma'tapatsay para li ka'alilh jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh, chi katalaj'achana an yu jach'ananalh ali an yu jap'uxnun.
43004037	Ts'awjcha tacha an nawkan, li: "ali'ini yu tach'an chi ali'ini an yu tajap'uxnun".
43004038	Kit'in klamak'antaw para li k'ap'uxt'iti yu ntu uxitnan lhit'ap'ats'at'it, ali'ini yu tatapatsalh, chi uxitnanch'a yu oxi la'a'iyat an yu talhitapatsalh yu'uncha.
43004039	Ixluwk'an an lapanakni an yu ancha jamacha'an anchunu xala'acha'an Samaria takiklaka'ilhi an Jesús, xliyu tacha an ixjajunitacha an t'aku', li an Jesús junilhi tuchini ix'ilhtutacha.
43004040	Wachuncha tala'cha'alhi an jamacha'an Samaria an Jesús chi tajuniy li ma kajat'atamakawlh, pus jat'atamakawlhcha la'at'uy wilhchan.
43004041	Palaycha ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh an Jesús, mu wanajcha yucha ixta'alha'asmat'a.
43004042	Chi ixtajuniy an t'aku: —Jantucha wa xliyu iklhikiklaka'iyaw li t'ach'a an na'un, wanajcha kitnani ik'alha'asmat'aw chi ijk'atsayawi li aniy yucha sawalhi yu jama'alhtaxtunun aniy lakamunulhpa', aniy Cristo.
43004043	La'puslicha la'at'uy wilhchan, an Jesús taxtulhcha xalakaat'un Samaria, alhcha xalakaat'un Galilea.
43004044	Mu wanaj yucha ixnajunta, li yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios jantu la'a'ikani la ixla'acha'an.
43004045	Akxni cha'alhcha Galilea, an jamacha'an Galilea tala'a'ilhcha an Jesús, mu ixtala'ts'intacha tacha an ixlak'ilhtutachalh tanlhun an la'acha'an Jerusalén, akxni k'atan ixjunita, mu yu'uncha wachu ixta'anta an lakak'atan.
43004046	Pus an Jesús a'tamcha ampalhi Caná, xala'acha'an Galilea, tan an ix'ilhtuta tacha xaxkan uva wa de xkan. Walh an la'acha'an Capernaúm ixt'ajun pumatam xa'ay ixt'atapatsan an rey, wa ixta'an'ay ists'alh.
43004047	Akxni asmatlhi an ixt'atapatsan an rey li an Jesús Galileajcha ixt'ajun, la'alh chi ixtapayninicha li kat'a'alhi la ixcha'a para li kak'uch'unilhi an ists'alh, mu ixnit'ajuncha.
43004048	Wachuncha an Jesús juniy an lapanak: —Uxitnan li nt'u la'ts'inat'iti tu'u yu lhi'a'nin jant'u jak'iklak'a'i'ninat'it.
43004049	An xa'ay ixt'atapatsan an rey juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, li ntuka' niya an kints'alh watukancha ak'int'ap'it'i.
43004050	An Jesús juniy: —K'ap'inch'o'ochicha mincha'a', amints'alh t'ajun. An lapanak kiklaka'ilhi tacha an junilh an Jesús, pus alhcha.
43004051	Akxni ixcha'ant'ajuncha la ixcha'a, an ixma'tsukunin talakatastuklhicha, tajuniy: —Amints'alh ta'oxilhcha.
43004052	Pus jalhisakmilhcha tuchi panch'e'excha akxni ta'oximaj'ayacho'olhcha. Tajuniy: —Kutanchacha ta'oxay, la unaj, akxnicha makawlh an alhp'as iskakat.
43004053	Pus an ixpay an ts'alh lhimacha'xalhcha li chunchacha horaja ixjunita akxni an junilh an Jesús: "Amints'alh t'ajun". Pus kiklaka'ilhcha yucha chi chux an yu ta jalhila'ts'in.
43004054	Yucha aniycha yu ixlitipat'uycha yu laj'oxi masulh an Jesús, akxni minchalh xalakaat'un Judea chi cha'alhcha xalakaat'un Galilea.
43005001	Xli'astan jumpalh, an judiojnin ixta'ilhtuy la'atam k'atan, pus an Jesús tama'ast'a'alhi Jerusalén.
43005002	An Jerusalén, alin lakatam tan nap'an tajun xkan, lakakisi xamalhticha lhit'ajun. Tan junkan lhihebreo Betesda. Wani tan junkan ixmalhtichak'an borregojnin
43005003	An tan ixlakputanukanachalh, lhuw ta'an'anini ixtalakmanalh, yu la'la'lhtulu'un, yu lakch'anlht'ulukun, chi yu wa ixtalaklakalhtukulunta, ixtapakxancha li kalaklalh an xkan.
43005004	Mu an tan nap'an ixtajun xkan ixlila'paj'ayan ixta'alhtajuy pumatam ix'angelh an Dios chi ixlaklaycha an xkan, pus yu p'ulhcha ixtajuy an lakxkan akxni ixlaklaycha, ixtak'uch'uycha, watuchicha ta'an'at ka ixlitsukulh.
43005005	Ancha ixmalh pumatam lapanak la'ap'uxamkawtsajincha k'ata ixta'an'ajmalh.
43005006	Pus akxni an Jesús la'ts'ilhi li ancha ixmalh, chi k'atsalhi li ma'anchacha chuncha ixta'an'ajmalh, juniy: —¿T'ak'uch'up'ut'un?
43005007	An ta'an'an alhtaylh juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, jantu xamati kintamaj'oy an tan wilh xkan akxni laklay, akxni wa ik'amputunka pumatamcha las tajuyachalh.
43005008	Pus an Jesús juniy: —K'a'ost'aycha, k'asakt'icha aminputamat ch'i k'alht'ancha.
43005009	Pus wa akxni anchunu lapanak ta'oxilhcha, saklhicha an ixputamat chi jalhtanajtsukulhcha. Akxni chuncha tapasalh, akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan.
43005010	Wachuncha an judiojnin tajuniy an yu k'uch'uk'alh: —Chaway wa jastaknankan wilhchan, tu'oxi li ch'ixlit'a'un amimputamat.
43005011	Yucha jajuniy: —An yu kink'uch'ulh yucha kijuniy: "K'asakt'icha amimputamat ch'i k'alht'ancha".
43005012	Pus tajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha yu junan: "Li k'asakt'icha minputamat ch'i k'alht'ancha?
43005013	Pero an lapanak an yu k'uch'ukalh tu ixk'atsayi tichini yuchacha an yu k'uch'ulh, mu an Jesús tucha aniy ixt'ajun an tan lhilhuw ixlakyakalh.
43005014	Xli'astan an Jesús la'cha'alh an lakatajtan chi juniy: —Chaway t'ak'uch'ut'icha, jant'uch'a ali k'a'ilht'u mintala'alhin para li nt'u t'u'u k'ap'ut'ap'asa yu palay makxkay.
43005015	An lapanak alhcha chi jalakjunilhcha an judiojnin li yucha an Jesusi yu k'uch'ulh.
43005016	Pus an judiojnin ixtalhich'a'o'aycha an Jesús, ixtama'niputuncha, wa xliyu li ixlak'ilhtuyi aniy tanlhun akxni masi wa jastaknankan wilhchan.
43005017	An Jesús jajuniy: —An kimpay masi tacha chaway tapatsay, kit'in wachu iktapatsay.
43005018	Pus an judiojnin palaycha ixtalhima'niputun li ixnajun li yucha Ists'alh Dios, chi li yucha tapatsayi akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan, tacha Dios.
43005019	An Jesús jajuniy: —Aniy klajunaw sawalh: Jantu lay tu'u kati'ilhtulhi an Ists'alh Dios wa ix'akstucha ka'ilhtuputulh, yucha ilhtuy yu la'ts'in ilhtuy an ixpay. Chux yu ilhtuy an ixpay wanajcha chuni ilhtuy an Ists'alh.
43005020	Mu an ixpay mapayniya an Ists'alh chi masuniya chux tacha an lak'ilhtuy; chi palay kalakmasunikana yu palay laj'ay tanlhun, yu sawalhch'a k'alhi'a'niya'it'it uxitnan.
43005021	Mu tacha an ixPay jamala'awniya an janinin chi jaxta'niy jatsukunti, an isTs'alh wachu jaxta'niy jatsukunti yu jaxta'niputun.
43005022	An ixPay jantu xamati lhimuk'ay tuchini ilhtutacha xamati', yucha an isTs'alhi ma'axta'nita li kanawna tuchini yu ilhtutacha xamati',
43005023	para li lhichuxi kakiklaka'ikalh chi kalhiwilakalh an isTs'alh tacha kiklaka'ikan an ixPay. Yu ntu kiklaka'iya an Ists'alh Dios, wachu ntu kiklaka'iya an ixpay, yu mala'achatachalh.
43005024	Aniy klajunaw sawalh: Yu asmat'a an kinchiwinti chi kiklaka'iya an yu kimala'achatachalh lhit'ajuni jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy, jantu katima'nikalh, yucha la'puslicha lakalhinin, lakajatsukunticha cha'alh.
43005025	Kamina panch'e'ex chi sawalh, chi an panch'e'ex chawaycha, akxni an janinin kata'alha'asmat'a an Ists'alh Dios; chi an yu kata'alha'asmat'a katatsukuya'.
43005026	Mu tacha an ixpay lhit'ajuni jatsukunti, wanajcha chuni ilhtuta an ists'alh li kalhitsukulhi jatsukunti,
43005027	chi atumpaj, xta'nipalhi lhich'alhkat li yucha kanawna tuchini ilhtulhcha atam, mu yucha Ists'alh an Dios.
43005028	Pero nt'u k'alhi'a'nit'iti ani, mu kachina panch'e'ex akxni ixchuxk'an an yu ta'aknunun kata'alha'asmat'a an ixchiwinti;
43005029	chi yu ta'ilhtulhi yu oxi tanlhun katatak'ut'acha chi katala'awcho'oyacha ixpujun'alhincha; pero yu ta'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi, katala'awcho'oya para li katama'alh'ajnanacha.
43005030	Jantu layi tu'u k'ilhtuy wa ki'akstucha ak'ilhtuputulh; tacha k'asmat'a kijuniy an kimpay chunchacha k'ilhtuy, pus an yu k'ilhtuy ts'awj, mu ntu yu wa kit'incha iknajuni k'ilhtuy, yu najun an kimpayi k'ilhtuy, yu kimakmintalh.
43005031	Li wa ki'akstucha aklhichiwinkalhk, an yu aknawna jantu katilhitapalalh.
43005032	Pumatami yu kilhichiwiniy kit'in, chi jk'atsayi li tacha an kilhichiwiniy sawalh.
43005033	Uxitnan jamala'ach'anit'iti yu kata'alh lhisakminin an Juán tichini yuchacha, chi yucha ts'ajwi lhichiwinilh yu sawalh.
43005034	Pero ntu lisna wa ijkiklaka'it'ajuncha xamati wa lapanak; aniy klajunaw para li uxitnan k'at'a'alht'axt'ut'it.
43005035	An Juán tachanu la'atam pumaklhku ixjunita, yu ixma'tajiy chi ixmapulhkuy, chi uxitnan p'ulaj'ach'amp'ut'unt'iti an ixjatapulhkunu wa tam pants'ik'is.
43005036	Pero kit'in klalhiminitaw yu palay laj'ay pujamak'atsaninti, an Juán palay wa lakat'ikt'i. Yu k'ilhtuy kit'in, yucha yu kilhijuniy an kimpay, chunchacha putasuy li yucha an kimpayi kimakminta.
43005037	An kimpay an yu kimakminta wachu kilhichiwiniya kit'in, masi uxitnan t'u a'tam alha'asmatt'at'it ch'i nt'u a'tam la'ts'int'at'it,
43005038	ch'i nt'u mak'awniyat'iti li an ixchiwinti kataputsuku'alhin, mu nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an yu mala'achatachalh.
43005039	Sawalhcha ixlak'anti p'unawnat an tan ts'o'muk'akanta an ixchiwinti Dios, mu lhiwilayat li anch'a la'ch'ip'imp'ut'unat an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy, chi ancha kilhichiwininta,
43005040	walh tu kilala'minputunawi para li k'alhits'uk'ut'iti an jatsukunti.
43005041	Kit'in jantu yu iklhakapu'an li an lapanakni ayi akintala'ts'ilh.
43005042	Atumpaj klamispayawi uxitnan chi ijk'atsayi li nt'u lhit'awnat'iti an xjamapayninti Dios.
43005043	Kit'in yucha an kimpayi kimakminta, walh chi ntu kilala'a'iyaw; pero li xamati lapanak ka ixmilh yu wa ix'akstucha kaxk'uxamilh, yuch'a k'axla'a'it'it.
43005044	¿Tasich'a k'ajalhik'iklak'a'inina'it uxitnan li wa mi'akstuchak'ani sawalh lalhiwilayat'iti, ch'i nt'u p'uxk'awyat'iti yu ix'alhp'asninti an yu wa yuchacha Dios sawalhi?
43005045	Jant'u k'ana'unt'it li sna akla'alhtasuyawi la ix'ukxlakapu an kimpay; yucha an Moisesi kata'alhtasuyan, an yu uxitnan k'iklak'a'iyat.
43005046	Mu li uxitnan k'axk'iklak'a'it'iti an Moisés, kit'in wachu xakilakiklaka'iw, mu an Moisés yucha kilhits'o'muk'alh.
43005047	Pero li nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an yu ts'o'muk'ata, ¿t'asich'a k'alhik'iklak'a'iya'it kinchiwinti?
43006001	Xli'astan, an Jesús alhcha an ixtapiktutam xalakxkan la'acha'an Galilea, jumpalhkan Tiberias.
43006002	Wanaj lhilhuwi ixch'a'o'akanta, mu ixtala'ts'incha tacha an ixjak'uch'uy an ta'an'anin.
43006003	Wachuncha tama'ast'a'alhcha tanchun a'stitawk'a chi anchacha sa' tawlhchalh ali an ixt'alhtanan.
43006004	An Paxku iso'omintacha, ixk'atank'an an judiojnin.
43006005	Akxni an Jesús talakatiyawlh chi la'ts'ilhi li wanajcha lhilhuw, lhisakmilhi an Felipe juniy: —¿Tanischa kajatamawniyaw pan aniy lapanakni para li kata'ulhcha?
43006006	Pero an Jesús yucha wa ixjunicha an Felipe, wa xlila'ts'intanuycha, mu yucha ixk'atsaycha tani kalhit'alayacha.
43006007	An Felipe najun: —Masi la'at'uy ciento wilhchan aklhima'tapatsalh jantu katicha'alhi para li lakts'unijcha kata'ulh.
43006008	Xapumatam an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, junkan Andrés, ixt'ala'ajun Simón Pedro, juniy an Jesús:
43006009	Aniy t'ajun pumatam ts'alh lhit'ajun a'xkisi pan de cebada chi la'at'uy jatanti; pero ¿tisuncha li wanajcha lhilhuwi?
43006010	Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —K'aja'unitka li katalaktawilhka'. Ancha wastakcha ixjala'awnininta, pus talaktawilhcha, katacha la'akisi milh lapanakni.
43006011	An Jesús xa'a'ilhcha an pan, chi xli'astan xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun, chi jaxta'nilhcha an ixt'alhtanan, chi yu'uncha tamala'pits'inilhcha ixchuxk'an an lapanakni yu ancha ixtawilanalh; chi an jatanti wanajcha chuni ilhtulh, chi jaxta'nilhcha, tacha oxicha talhikiklalh.
43006012	Akxni talaj'o'atsa'olhcha, an Jesús jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan: —K'amach'ixt'amitcha an yu xajchalh lakt'ikt'i, para li ntu tu'u kats'an'alh.
43006013	Pus tamach'ixtamilhcha la'akawt'uy kanastaja an xala'tach'e'en yu xajchalh an yu ta'ulh an a'xkisi pan de cebada.
43006014	An lapanakni akxni chunchacha tala'ts'ilh ilhtulh an Jesús, ixtanajun: —Yucha aniycha sawalhi an li yu kamina lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios aniy lakamunulhpa'.
43006015	Pero an Jesús jalhimacha'xanilhi li ka'asi talhi'amputuna para li kata'ilhtulh rey, pus ampalhi an a'stitawk'a wa ix'akstu.
43006016	Akxni tats'isilhcha, an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús ta'alhcha an lakxkan,
43006017	chi tatajulhcha lakatam laka barco, ixtapatakutt'ajuncha an lakxkan, ixtita'ancha la'acha'an Capernaúm. An Jesús tuka' ixjala'cha'an, walh chi puts'istacha ixjunita.
43006018	Wa akxni an lakxkan ts'ukulhcha laklay, mu p'ascha ixmin un.
43006019	Katacha la'akisi u la'achaxan kilometrojo ixta'antachalh, tala'ts'ilhcha an Jesús li ix'ukxjalhtanaj'antachalhcha an lakxkan chi wanicha ixla'antachalh an barco, pus tatalhamnilh.
43006020	Pero yucha jajunilh: —¡Mu kit'in, t'u k'alakt'alhanant'it!
43006021	Pus wachuncha yu'uncha ixtalaj'achancha akxni jala'cha'alh an laka barco, chi an barco cha'alhcha an tan ixtita'an lakaat'un.
43006022	Tunkunchalh, an lapanakni yu ixtawilananchalh an ixtapiktutam lakxkan, talhakapu'alhi li an Jesús jantu jat'a'alhi an ixt'alhtanan an laka barco, tak'atsalhi li wa ix'akstuk'ani ta'alh chi mu wa la'ata'mi barco ancha ixwilh.
43006023	Pero ali barco yu ixtamintachalh la'acha'an Tiberias, ixtacha'anta wani an tan ixtalak'uta pan, akxni ixta'ojotacha lhimala'puchajun an jamach'alhkat Jesús.
43006024	Pus akxni an lapanakni tala'ts'ilhi li an Jesús jantu tu'u ancha ixt'ajun, chi an ixt'alhtanan, talaktajulhi an laka lakbarco ta'alhcha puxkawnini la'acha'an Capernaúm an Jesús.
43006025	Akxni tacha'alhcha an ixtapiktutam lakxkan ancha tala'cha'alh, pus tajuniy: —Maestro, ¿t'asu wananch'a ch'it'a aniya?
43006026	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Ijk'atsaycha, xliyu kilalhipuxkawyaw mu oxi o'ats'at'it akxni an lakwa'int'it, jantu xliyu kilalhipuxkawyaw li wa lhimach'a'xat'itcha an t'ach'a la'ts'int'it.
43006027	Jant'u k'alhit'ap'ats'at'iti an wayt yu wa lakp'uch'i u wa min'ojoy, yucha an yu ntu min'ojoyi k'alhit'ap'ats'at'it, yu xt'a'a jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy, yu kataxta'niyan an Ists'alh Dios, mu an Dios, an ixPay Jesús yucha ma'axta'nilh.
43006028	Wachuncha tajuniy: —¿Tisuncha ak'ilhtu para li ak'ilhtucha an tapatsat yu tacha lhi'achaniy an Diosi?
43006029	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —An tapatsat yu an Dios lakask'in, yucha li k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti an yu mala'achatachalh.
43006030	Pus tajuniy: —¿Pus tisuncha akilamasuniyaw para li akla'ts'iwcha chi aklakiklaka'iwcha? ¿tisuncha tapatsati ilht'uyi?
43006031	An kilakpaynink'an ixtajunita ta'ulhi an pan yu patajulh lakt'iyan an tan wa lakaaxixnicha lakaat'un, tacha ts'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: "Jamawalh xapan lakt'iyan".
43006032	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Aniy klajunaw sawalh, jantu yu an Moisesi yu taxta'nin an xapan lakt'iyan, yucha an kimpayi yu taxta'niyan an yu xapan sawalh lakt'iyan.
43006033	Mu an ixpan an Dios yucha an yu minchalh talhman chi xta'niya jatsukunti an lakaamunulhpa'.
43006034	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, lhilhiji akilaxta'niw yu yucha pan.
43006035	An Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'ini ikpan yu xt'a'a jatsukunti. Yu akint'amina jantu a'tam katichawanalh, chi yu kinkiklaka'iy jantu a'tam katikikxixli.
43006036	Pero tacha klajuniwcha, masi kilala'ts'inawcha jant'u jak'iklak'a'ininat.
43006037	Ixchuxk'an yu kijaxta'niy an kimpay, akintala'mina', chi yu kintala'min jantu aktijasastuklhi.
43006038	Mu kit'in ikminchalh an lakt'iyan para li ak'ilhtulhi yu tacha lhi'achaniy an kimpay yu kimakmintachalh, jantu yu kit'in iknajun.
43006039	An kimpay yu kimakminchalh lakask'in li ntu k'is tu'u akma'ats'an'alh yu yucha kijaxta'niy, yucha lakask'in li ajkamala'awnilhi akxni xati'astancha wilhchan kuna'.
43006040	Chunchuniya lakask'in an kimpay, li ixchuxk'an an yu tala'ts'in an Ists'alh Dios chi takiklaka'iy, katalhits'ukulhi jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy; chi kit'in ajkamala'awnicho'oya akxni xati'astancha wilhchan kuna'.
43006041	An judiojnin tsukulhcha talhichiwiniy, xliyu najun: "Kit'in pan yu ta'alhtajulh lakt'iyan",
43006042	chi ixtalaknawpalay: —Aniy ¿chun ntu yu an Jesús an ists'alh José? jamispayawi ixpay chi ixnati. Chi chaway najun li lakt'iyani minchalh.
43006043	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Jant'uch'a ali k'alakna'unt'iti wa siya uxitnancha.
43006044	Jantu xamati lay akintich'a'o'alh li an kimPay yu kimakmintalh jantu kilhiminiy, para li lay akmala'awnicho'olh axkni xati'astancha wilhchan.
43006045	An la ixlibrojk'an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios najunta: "Yucha an Diosi kajamalaklani'oya ixchuxk'an". Pus ixchuxk'an yu ta'asmatniya an kimpay chi talaklaniya yu jamasuniy, akintach'a'o'aya'.
43006046	Chi ntu nawputun li sna xamaticha la'ts'ilh an kimpay; wa kit'ini yu kla'ts'intacha, mu ancha ikminchalh tan wilhchalh.
43006047	Aniy sawalhi an yu klajunaw, yu kinkiklaka'iy lhit'ajunijatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy.
43006048	Kit'in pan yu xt'a'a jatsukunti.
43006049	Amilakpaynink'an ixtajunita ta'ulhi an xapan lakt'iyan an lakaxixni lakaat'un, walh chi lanani tanilh.
43006050	Pero kit'in iklhichiwiniy pan yu lakt'iyan minachalh; yu yucha uy, jantu katinilh.
43006051	Kit'ini an pan yu la'ajunta yu lakt'iyan mintachalh; yu yucha uy aniy pan, katsuku'alhiya'. An pan yu kit'in akxt'a'a, yucha an kilakatunaj. Aklhima'axt'a'a ixlakata tacha an t'aw'ok'an aniy lakaamunulhpa'.
43006052	Wachuncha an judiojnin tsukulhcha talhilakchiwiniy, talajuniy: —¿Tasicha akintalhimawayan ixlakatunaj aniya?
43006053	An Jesús jajuniy: —Chun sawalhi aniy yu klajunaw, li nt'u k'at'i'ut'iti an xakanit an Ists'alh Dios ch'i nt'u k'at'i'ott'iti an xak'alhni, jant'u k'at'ilhits'uk'ut'iti an jatsukunti.
43006054	Yu ka'uya an kijakanit chi ka'ot'a an kijak'alhni katsuku'alhiya', akmala'awnicho'oya akxni xati'astancha wilhchan kuna',
43006055	mu an kijakanit yucha yu wayt sawalh, chi an kijak'alhni yucha yu lhi'ot'at sawalh.
43006056	Yu uyi an kijakanit chi ot'a an kijak'alhni akimputsuku'alhiya chi akputsuku'alhiya'.
43006057	Tacha an kimakmilhi an yu lhit'ajun jatsukunti kimpay, chi yucha ikput'ajun, wanajcha chuni yu aki'uya akinputsukuya'.
