43006058	Yu iklhichiwiniy yucha an pan yu minchalh an lakt'iyan. Aniy pan jantu tacha an yu talak'ulh amilakpaynink'an ixtajunita, an tan wa ixjaxixnintacha lakaat'un, yu'uncha masi ta'ulh talaknilh. Yu ka'uya an pan yu iklalhixa'alayaw kit'in, yucha katsuku'alhiya'.
43006059	Chuncha nawlh an Jesús akxni ixmasut'ajun lakatajtan an la'acha'an Capernaúm.
43006060	Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi, ixluwk'an an ixt'alhtanan tanajun: —Tacha aniy najun lhima'anxkay; ¿tisiyuchacha lay kakiklaka'iya'a?
43006061	An Jesús lhakapu'alhi li an ixt'alhtanan wa ixtalhichiwiniya tacha an jajunilh, pus jajuniy: —¿Jant'u oxi lhiwilayat?
43006062	¿Li k'a ixla'ts'int'iti an Ists'alh Dios katach'ixcho'olh tan p'ulhnaj ixwilhchalh, t'asu k'a ixna'unt'itcha?
43006063	An takuwin yucha yu xt'a'a jatsukunti; an lakatunaj yucha yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay. An chiwinti an yu klalhixa'alayaw yucha takuwin chi jatsukunti.
43006064	Chi ta'alinka yu uxitnan yu ntuka' tajakiklaka'inin. Mu an Jesús yucha ixk'atsaycha ixlip'ulhnaj ixjuntachalh, tichini yu'unchacha yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin, chi tichini yuchacha yu kama'axt'a'a'.
43006065	Chi nawpalay: —Xliyu klalhijunaw li ntu xamati lay akintila'milh li ntu yu an kimpay makawniy.
43006066	Wachuncha, ixluwk'an an yu wachucha ixtat'alhtanan an Jesús tamakawlhcha, jantucha ixtach'a'o'ay.
43006067	Pus an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan jajuniy an Jesús: —¿Uxitnan wach'uch'a k'uxap'inat'it?
43006068	An Simón Pedro alhtaylh: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ¿tisiyuchacha akch'a'o'ayawi? Aminchiwinti yucha yu xt'a'a jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
43006069	Chi kitnan ijkiklaka'itawcha, chi ijk'atsayawcha li uxint'i Cristo, Ists'alh Dios yu la'ajunta.
43006070	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —¿Jantu kit'ini klasakxtutaw amimpumakawt'uyk'an? chi xapumatam de uxitnan yucha xapay makxkay'un.
43006071	An Jesús yucha an Judas Iscarioteje ixlichiwint'ajun, ists'alh tichi Simón, mu yucha yu kama'axt'a'a', masi yucha yu ixlipumakawt'uychak'an ixtajunita an ixt'alhtanan.
43007001	Xli'astan an Jesús, xalakaat'un la'acha'an Galileajcha ixt'awnachalh, mu ntu ixtawlhputuni xalakaat'un Judea, wa xliyu an judiojnin wa ixtama'niputun.
43007002	Pero mu wanicha ixminta ixk'atank'an an judiojnin akxni ixtala'la'oxiy ixmulht'a'ak'an de jach'itin,
43007003	pus an ixjat'ala'awnin an Jesús tajuniy: —K'at'axt'ucha aniy, k'ap'inchicha la'acha'an Judea, para li wachucha katak'atsalhi amint'alhtanan an t'ach'a lak'ilht'uy tanlhun laj'oxi tapatsat,
43007004	mu ntu xamati lapanaki li yu lakask'in li kamispakalh, tan wa la'asa'nik'acha kalak'ilhtulh tu'u'. Li lak'ilht'uycha aniy tanlhun, k'alak'ilht'ucha tan ixlitalakasun.
43007005	Masi ixjat'ala'awnin jantu ixtakiklaka'iy.
43007006	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'in tuka' chini kimpanch'e'ex, pero uxitnan minpanch'e'exk'an lhilhiji alin.
43007007	Uxitnan tulay taxkayani an lapanakni, pero kit'in kintaxkajiy, mu kit'in xla'ts'awalanti iknajun li an yu ta'ilhtuy tu oxi.
43007008	K'ap'inchi'itcha uxitnaniy laka k'atan, kit'in ntuka' akti'alh, mu ntuka' chini kimpanch'e'ex.
43007009	Chuncha jajunilh, chi yucha an la'acha'an Galileajcha tamakawlh.
43007010	Pero xli'astan akxni ta'alhcha an ixjat'ala'awnin, wachucha alhi an laka k'atan, wa la'asa', jantu xamati mak'atsaanilh.
43007011	An judiojnin ixtapuxkajuycha an laka k'atan, chi ixtanajun: —¿Tanischa t'ajun anchunu lapanaki?
43007012	An lapanakni sawalhcha ixtalhichiwiniy an Jesús. Ali'in ixtanajun: —Yucha oxi lapanak. Pero ali'in ixtanajun: —Jantu, wa ja'o'xcho'oycha an lapanakni.
43007013	Pero masi chunchacha, jantu xamati ts'awjcha ixlichiwiniy an Jesús, mu ixjatalhamnikani an judiojnin.
43007014	Ixpaytatcha an k'atan, an Jesús tanulhcha an laka tajtan chi tsukulhcha jamasuniy.
43007015	An judiojnin ixtalhi'a'niycha, ixtanajun: —¿Tasicha sawalhcha lhilajk'atsay li ntu tu'u jatalanininta?
43007016	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh: —An tacha kmasuy jantu kinawin, ixnawin an yu kimala'achatachalh.
43007017	Yu ilhtuputuni tacha an lhi'achaniy Dios, kak'atsayacha li an tacha ikmasuy Diosi kilhijuniy u wa kit'incha iknajun.
43007018	Yu wa ix'akstucha lhichiwinkan, wa ix'akstucha puxkajuy yu sawalhcha kapulhiwilakalh; pero yu yucha lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti an yu mala'achatachalh, yucha xasawalh, chi ntu tu'u yu ntucha oxi ka'ilhtulh.
43007019	Pero yucha an Moisesi taxta'nin an lhamap'a'sin, walh ch'i nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat. ¿Tasu li kilama'niputunawcha?
43007020	An lapanakni ta'alhtaylh, tajuniy: —Wa lakpach'apayan makxkay'un, ¿tisiyuchacha ma'niputunani?
43007021	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —Sawalhch'a lhi'a'niyat'iti masi wa la'atamcha tu'u ikmasulh akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan.
43007022	Pero an Moisés tajunini li k'ala'ak'axwililich'uk'up'uxt'iti mi'a'axt'a'ak'an, pero ntu yu tukani lhinajun, yu'uncha an yu t'a ixjalhila'ts'inat'it. Chi masi akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan, ak'axwililich'uk'up'uxat'iti ix'a'axt'a'a xamati lapanak.
43007023	Li an lapanak akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkani ix'a'axt'a'a akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan para li an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés jantu kats'an'alh, ¿tasu li lhit'alh'amnatcha li wanaj ijk'uch'u'ojoyi kit'in ta ixlila'a'ay an lapanaki?
43007024	Jant'u k'alhich'iwinint'iti xamati wa xliyu t'ani la'ts'inatcha, akxni t'u'u nawnat, k'ana'unt yu ixla'ts'awalanti.
43007025	Pus wachuncha ali'in jamacha'an Jerusalén ixtalaknajun: —¿Jantu yucha aniy lapanaki yu tapuxkajuy li tama'niputun?
43007026	Chi aniya t'ajun, ixlitalakasuni chiwiniy chi ntu tu'u tajuniy. ¿Xliyu sna li takiklaka'ilhcha an jamach'alhkatni li yucha Cristo sawalh?
43007027	Pero mu kitnan k'atsayawi tanchuncha mintachalh aniy, pero akxni kamina an Cristo, jantu xamati katik'atsalh tanchuncha kaminanta.
43007028	Pus wachuncha an Jesús ja'alha'asmatlhicha, mu ixmasut'ajun an laka tajtan, pus p'ascha jajuniy: —¡Pus kakilamispayaw ch'i k'ak'ats'ayat'it'i tanchuncha ikmintachalh! Pero kit'in tu wa kijatalapututcha li ikminta, yu kimakmintachalh yucha yu sawalh, uxitnan t'u misp'ayat.
43007029	Kit'in ikmispay, mu yucha ikpula'awlh, chi yucha kimala'achatachalh.
43007030	Pus wachuncha ixtach'apayawputuncha; pero ntu xamati maktapujulh, mu ntuka' ixcha'ani ixpanch'e'ex.
43007031	Ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh an Jesús chi ixtanajun: —Akxni kamina an Cristo ¿chu sna palay kalak'ilhtuya tanlhun yucha?
43007032	An fariseojnin ta'alha'asmatlhi an lapanakni li chunchacha ixtalhichiwiniy an Jesús; pus an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an fariseojnin tamala'achalhi lapanakni para li katach'apayawlh.
43007033	An Jesús najun: —Wa lakats'uniycha panch'e'exi aklat'a'aklatsukuyaw, chi xli'astan akla'ancho'oyacha an yu kimakmintachalh.
43007034	Akilapuxkawyaw, pero ntu akintilala'cha'aw chi tan ikti'an jant'u lay k'at'ip'it'it.
43007035	Wachuncha an judiojnin ixtalajuniy: —¿Tanischa ka'ana aniy li ntucha lay katila'cha'awi? ¿Kajala'anacha sna an yu ta'a'pitsinin jamacha'an Grecia chi yu'unchacha kajamasuniya'?
43007036	¿Tasicha nawputun li najuncha li "Akilapuxkawyaw, pero ntu akintilala'cha'aw, mu tan ak'ana uxitnan nt'u lay k'at'ip'it'iti'?
43007037	Akxni wa x'amancha wilhchan an laka k'atan, mu yucha yu palaycha ixlitapalay, an Jesús tayalhcha chi p'ascha najun: —Li xamati kikxixa, akila'milhcha, chi ka'ot'a' xkan.
43007038	Tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'omuk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios, li yu kinkiklaka'iy, tachanu ma'alhuw ayxkani la ixpulakni kap'ats'alaya xkan yu la'ajunta.
43007039	An Jesús nawputun li yu katakiklaka'iya, katala'a'iya an ixTakuwin Dios, mu akxni an ixTakuwin Dios tuka' ixmakminkan.
43007040	Wachuncha an ali'in tacha an lhilhuw ixlakyakalh, akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi, ixtanajun: —Aniy yucha ixchiwinti Dios sawalhi lhichiwiniy.
43007041	Ali'in ixtanajun: —Aniy yucha an Cristo. Pero ali'in ixtanajun: —Jantu, an Cristo jantu la'acha'an Galileaja katiminchalh.
43007042	An tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta li an Cristo yucha an rey Daviti kapu'a'p'unminanta, yucha jamacha'a Beléni ixjunita, ancha kaminanta an Cristo.
43007043	Pus an lapanakni ixlakata an Jesús tatala'apitsilhcha.
43007044	An ali'in lapanakni ixtach'apayawputuncha an Jesús, pero ntu xamati ch'apayawlh.
43007045	An yu ixtajalhistaknan an laka tajtan ta'ancho'olhcha an tan ixtat'awnachalh an fariseojnin chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, walh akxni tacha'alhcha jalhisakmikancha tuchini ntucha talhilhi'alh.
43007046	Yu'uncha taja'alhtayanalh: —¡Tu a'tam chuncha xamati lapanak kachiwinilh!
43007047	Pus an fariseojnin tat'alajuniy: —¿Uxitnan wach'uch'a o'xch'o'ok'ant'it?
43007048	¿Chu sna xamati kiklaka'iy an kijefejnink'an u an fariseojnin?
43007049	An lapanakni an yu takiklaka'iy wa ntu tak'atsay an lhamap'a'sin, tu oxi tacha an talay.
43007050	An Nicodemo, pumatam fariseo yu ixkila'pixiyalhnanta an Jesús la'atam jatats'isni, jajuniy:
43007051	An la kilhamap'a'sink'an tasuyi li jantu layi katima'niw xamati lapanak li ntu alha'asmat'awi yu najun, para li kak'atsawi tuchini yu ilhtutacha.
43007052	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¿Chu wachu jamacha'a Galileajk'at'i? K'ap'unawi an tan ts'o'muk'akanta para li k'ak'ats'at'i li Galilea tu a'tami ancha katiminchalh yu kalhichiwinina ixchiwinti Dios.
43007053	Chi atamj atamjcha ancho'olh la ixcha'a'.
43008001	Pero an Jesús alhcha an a'stitawk'a tan junkan laka 'olivojnin.
43008002	Wats'isin chincho'olhcha an laka tajtan, pus ta lhichux tacha an wilakalh an la'achan tala'cha'alhcha, chi yucha tawilhcha, tsukulhcha jamasunin.
43008003	Wachuncha an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin talhicha'anilh pumatam t'aku', yu ta'a'taymalh tan ixa'alat'ajun yu ntu yu ixt'apapa', ixtan'ajnicha tayawlh an tan lhilhuw ixlakyakalh,
43008004	chi tajuniy an Jesús: —Maestro, aniy t'aku a'taymakalh tan ixa'alat'ajun lapanak,
43008005	chi an la ixlamap'a'sin Moisés kintajunan li yu chuncha lay t'aku aklakat'alhma'niyaw. ¿Uxint'i t'asich'a na'uni?
43008006	Chunchacha ixtajuniy wa ixtalhila'ts'intanuycha, para li ka'alilhcha yu katapu'alhtasulh. Pero an Jesús ix'antawilh chi ixjats'o'nuncha la ixmaka an lakaat'un.
43008007	Walh ali ixtalhisakmi, pus tats'awalatawilh chi jajuniy: —Yu ntu tu'u ixtala'alhin yuchacha p'ulhnaj kamakat'alh'anilh.
43008008	Chi a'tam ta'an tatawlhpalh, tsukunipalh jats'o'nuni an lakaat'un.
43008009	Pus an lapanakni mu ta'alha'asmatlhicha tacha an jajunilh an Jesús, tapastaklhi li wachu talhit'ajuni ixtala'alhink'an, pus talak'ancho'olhcha, p'ulhnajcha yucha an yu laktatanincha talak'alh, chi xli'astan yucha an palayka lakts'alanin, xli'astan wa yucha an t'akucha chi an Jesuscha tatamakawlh.
43008010	Pus tats'awalatawilhcha an Jesús chi mu ntucha xamati la'ts'in wa yucha an t'akucha, pus juniy: —¿Tanischa tat'ajun yu ixta'alhtasuyani? ¿jantu xamati lakat'alhman?
43008011	An t'aku alhtaylh: —Jantu, jantu xamati kilakat'alhmalh. Wachuncha an Jesús juniy: —Kit'in wachu ntu aktilakat'alhman; k'ap'inch'o'ochicha pero nt'uch'a ali k'a'ilht'u mintala'alhin.
43008012	An Jesús a'tam ixjajumpalayi an lapanakni, ixjajuniy: —Kit'ini xajatapulhkunu an lakaamunulhpa', yu akinch'a'o'aya ntu wa lakaaputs'isni katitsukulh, kalhitsukuya an jatapulhkunu yu xt'a'a jatsukunti.
43008013	Wachuncha an fariseojnin tajuniy: —Uxint'i wa mi'akst'uch'a lhich'iwink'an, aminchiwinti ntu lhitapalay.
43008014	An Jesús jajuniy: —Masi wa ki'akstucha iklhichiwinkan, an kinchiwinti lhitapalay, mu ijk'atsayi tanchuncha ikmintachalh chi tanchuncha ikti'an; pero uxitnan nt'u k'ats'ayat tanchuncha ikmintachalh chi tanchuncha ikti'an.
43008015	Uxitnan ch'unch'ach'a lhich'iwinat t'anisch'a la'ts'inat lay an lapanak, pero kit'in tu xamati iklhichiwiniy.
43008016	Chi li iknajuni tani laycha xamati, an yu iknajun yucha sawalh, mu ntu wa ki'akstucha iknajun, ali an kimPay yu kimakmintachalhi iknawnaw.
43008017	An la milhamap'a'sink'an ts'o'muk'akanta li akxni ixt'uyunk'an yu tala'ts'ilh wa tami tanajun, an ixchiwintik'an lhitapalay.
43008018	Kit'in iklhichiwinkani wa ki'akstucha, pero an kimPay yu kimakmintachalh wachu kilhichiwiniy.
43008019	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¿Tanischa t'ajun mimpayi? An Jesús jajuniy: —Uxitnan tu kilamispayaw chi an kimPay wach'u nt'u misp'ayat; li xakilamispaw, an kimPay wach'u k'a ixmisp'at'it.
43008020	An Jesús chuncha nawlh akxni ixmasut'ajun an laka tajtan, tan ixlakwilh yu pumujukan tumin yu ixla'ulanankan, chi ntu xamati ch'apayawlh mu ntuka' ixcha'ani ixpanch'e'ex.
43008021	A'tam jajumpalhi an Jesús: —Kit'in ikti'ancha, chi uxitnan akilapuxkawyaw, pero uxitnan la mintala'alhink'ani k'alakniya'it. Tan ikti'an kit'in, uxitnan jant'ulay k'at'ip'it'it.
43008022	Pus an judiojnin ixtanajun: —¿Tasu li chunchacha najunili tan ti'an kitnan ntulay kati'awi? ¿Sna wa ka'akstuma'nikanacha?
43008023	An Jesús jajuniy: —Uxitnan aniy talaktsini mincha'ak'an, pero kit'in awint'i talhman; uxitnan aniy lakaamunulhpa k'at'amak'awna'it, pero kit'in jantu ikde aniy.
43008024	Xliyu klalhijunaw li la mintala'alhink'ani k'alakniya'it'it; mu li ntu kilakiklaka'iyawi li kit'in, la mintala'alhink'ani k'alakniya'it'it.
43008025	Wachuncha tajuniy: —¿Tisu uxint'icha k'at'i? An Jesús jajuniy: —Yu p'ulhnajcha klajuntaw.
43008026	Wanaj lhuwi yu aknawna chi yu aklajunaw t'ani layatcha; pero an yu kimakmintachalh yucha sawalhi an yu najun, chi kit'in, wanajcha yu iklajunaw aniy lakaamunulhpa an yu k'alha'asmat'a an yu kimakminta.
43008027	Pero yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xalhi li yucha an ixPayi ixjalhixa'alat'ajun.
43008028	Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Akxni talhmancha k'amuk'aya'it an yu ists'alh lapanak kijunchilh, akxnich'a k'ak'ats'aya'it li kit'in, chi li ntu tu'u k'ilhtuy yu wa kit'incha iknajun, kit'in ikchiwiniy tacha kimasuniy an kimPay,
43008029	mu an yu kimakminta aniya kint'a'aklat'ajun; jantu wa ki'akstucha kimakajunta an kimPay, mu kit'in lhilhiji k'ilhtuy yu oxi lhiwilay.
43008030	Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Jesús, ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh.
43008031	An Jesús jajunilh an judiojnin an yu ixtakiklaka'itacha: —Li k'iklak'a'iyat sawalhi an kinchiwinti, kint'alhtanan sawalhi k'a'una'it'it;
43008032	k'amisp'aya'it'iti an yu sawalh, chi an yu sawalh katama'alhtaxtuniyan chi k'amak'awk'ana'it'itcha.
43008033	Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh: —Kitnan yucha an Abrami ikpu'a'p'unmintacha'aw, chi ntu a'atam xamati la ixmaka akintalhitsukun, ¿t'asu li na'uncha li akmakawkanawcha?
43008034	An Jesús jajuniy: —Sawalhi an yu klajunaw, watichicha yu ilhtuy tala'alhin, la ixmaka an tala'alhini t'ajun.
43008035	Chi an yu wa putapatsakancha lapanak, jantu ma'tawlh'alhiya an laka cha'a tan putapatsakan, pero yu ancha xajas'at'a yucha tawlh'alhiy.
43008036	Xliyu li an yu isTs'alh lapanak kijunchilh ta'ilhtuyancha li k'amak'awk'antcha, uxitnan k'amak'awk'ana'itcha sawalh.
43008037	Ijk'atsaycha li yucha an Abrami p'u'a'p'unt'anchi'it; pero kilama'niputunaw, mu ntu kilakiklaka'iyawi an kinchiwinti.
43008038	Kit'in iklhichiwiniy yu an kimPay kimasunita; ch'unch'ach'a wach'u ilht'uyat yu alha'asmat'at mimpayk'an.
43008039	Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —¡Kitnan kimpayk'an yucha an Abram! Pero an Jesús jajuniy: —Li ixjas'at'an Abram sawalhi uxitnan, k'a ix'ilht'ut'iti tacha an ilhtulh yucha.
43008040	Pero chaway uxitnan kilama'niputunawi li klalhixa'alayaw yu sawalh, yu k'alha'asmatta an Dios. An Abram jantu a'tam chuncha lalh.
43008041	Uxitnan wanajch'a ch'uni layat tacha lay mimpayk'an. Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¡Kitnan tu ixjas'at'an yu wa aya kalalhcha lapanak! ¡Wa pumatami kimPayk'an, Dios!
43008042	Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —Li mimPayk'ani Dios ixwalh, xakilamapayniw, mu kit'in tan wilhchalh Diosi ikminchalh chi anicha ikt'ajun, jantu wa ki'akstucha ijk'uxamilh, Diosi kimala'achatachalh.
43008043	¿Tasu li ntu lay kilalhimacha'xaniyaw an kinchiwinti? Wa xliyu ntu kila'asmatniputunaw.
43008044	Uxitnan mimpayk'an yucha an xapay makxkay un, chi yuch'ach'a ilht'unip'ut'unat yu lhinajun. Yucha sta akxni ilhtukanchalh an lakamunulhpa, sta akxnicha jama'ninilh, chi ntu a'tam najunta yu sawalh, mu ntu tu'u yu sawalh kanawlh yucha. Akxni maslakatinin, najuncha tanischa yucha, mu yucha maslakatini chi xapay maslakatinti.
43008045	Pero kit'in, mu iknajun yu sawalh, tu kilakiklaka'iyaw.
43008046	Uxitnan, ¿tisiyuchacha lay kanawna li iklhit'ajun tu'u tala'alhini? Chi li iknajun yu sawalh, ¿tasu li ntu kilakiklaka'iyawi?
43008047	Yu xas'at'a Dios, an ixchiwinti Dios asmat'a; pero uxitnan nt'u asmat'at'iti mu ntu xas'at'an Dios.
43008048	An judiojnin tajuniy an Jesús: —Sawalhcha tacha an iknawnaw li jamacha'ak'at'i Samaria chi li makxkay'uni lakpach'apatan.
43008049	An Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'in tu tu'u kilakpach'apata makxkay'un. Kit'in ijkiklaka'iy an kimPay, yucha yu k'ilhtuy, pero uxitnan wa kilamamaxaniyaw.
43008050	Kit'in tu kit'ini yu ikpuxkajuy kinta'ayaxtu, alini yu yucha puxkajuy, chi yucha yu kanawna li oxi u jantu yu ilhtuy atam.
43008051	Sawalhi aniy yu klajunaw, yu kiklaka'iya an kinchiwinti, jantu a'tam katinilh.
43008052	An judiojnin tajuniy: —Chaway oxicha ijk'atsaw li wa lakpach'apatan makxkay'un sawalh. An Abraham chi an ali'in yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios talaknilh, chi uxint'i na'un: "Yu kinkiklaka'iy ntu a'tam katinilh".
43008053	¿Chu sna palay ayk'at'i, palay wa lakat'ikt'i an kimpayk'an Abraham? Yucha nilh, chi an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios wachu talaknilh. ¿Tisu milhijunt'ich'a na'uni?
43008054	An Jesús jajuniy: —Li wa kit'incha ikla'ayakan, an kinta'ayat tu tu'u lhitapalay; pero yu kila'ayay yucha an kimPay, an yu unat li miDiosk'an.
43008055	Pero uxitnan t'u misp'ayat. Kit'in ikmispay; chi li aknawlh li ntu ikmispay, wa ikmaslakatinicha tacha uxitnani akwalh. Kit'in ikmispay sawalh, chi ijkiklaka'iya tacha an najun.
43008056	An Abram, yu p'u'a'p'unt'anchi'it lhi'achalhi li kala'ts'ina kiwilhchan, chi la'ts'ilh, pus achalhcha.
43008057	Wachuncha tajuniy an judiojnin: —Jant'uk'a' lhit'a'uni t'up'uxamkaw (50) k'ata, ch'i na'un li la'ts'int'acha an Abram.
43008058	An Jesús jajuniy: —Sawalhi aniy yu klajunaw, akxni ntuka' istsukuy an Abraham, kit'in xakt'ajuncha.
43008059	Pus wachuncha talaksaklhicha chiwx ixtalakat'alhmaputuncha, pero an Jesús tats'e'lhi chi taxtulhcha an laka tajtan; chi japujataxtu'olh, alhcha.
43009001	Tan ixla'pust'ajun an Jesús, la'ts'ilh pumatam la'lhtuluw lapanak, wa chunchacha tsukulh.
43009002	An ixt'alhtanan tajuniy: —Maestro, ¿tisiyuchacha ilhtulh ixtala'alhin li chunchacha la'awlhi, ixpaynin u yucha?
43009003	An Jesús jajuniy: —Jantu xliyu aniy wa ka'ilhtulhcha tu'u ixtala'alhin u an ixpaynin, wa xliyu an Dios masuputuni ixtapatsat laxlakatunaj aniy lapanak.
43009004	Li tunkuka, task'iniya li ka'ilhtuw an ixtapatsat an yu kimakmintalh, mu mintacha an jatats'isni, akxni ntucha lay tapatsakan.
43009005	Li ikt'ajunka an lakaamunulhpa, ikxajatapulhkunu an lakamunulhpa'.
43009006	Akxni chunchacha naw'olh, a'chujlhicha an lakaat'un, chi ilhtulhcha pulh'om. Lakpuxapamuk'alhcha an la xla'chulh an yu ntu ixjalakawanan lapanak.
43009007	Xli'astan juniy: —K'ap'inchicha la'puch'a'a an tan nap'an wilh xkan junkan Siloé (nawputun "mala'achakanta"). Pus alhcha la'puch'a'a', walh tasp'itcho'ochalh, ixjalakawanancha.
43009008	An yu wani ixjalakt'awilh la ixcha'a chi an yu ixtala'ts'in tan ixtawlay isk'in tu'u la'a'tayjun, ixtanajun: —¿Chu ntu yu an aniy, an sa' ixtawlay isk'in la'a'tayjun?
43009009	Ali'in ixtanajun: —Mu chun, yucha. Ali'in ixtanajun: —Mu jantu, masi wanaj chuncha tasuy tu yu'. Pero yucha ixnajun: —Chun, kit'in.
43009010	Wachuncha talhisakmilh tajuniy: —¿Ch'i t'asich'a laych'a lhijalak'awanan chawayi?
43009011	Yucha jajunilh: —Yucha anchunu tajuniy li Jesusi ilhtulh pulh'om, chi kilakpuxapamuk'alhcha, xli'astan kijuniy: "K'ak'ila'p'uch'a'acha an laka Siloé, tan nap'an tajun xkan". Pus k'alhcha, chi kla'puch'a'alhcha, walh ijkalakawanalhcha.
43009012	Pus tajuniy: —¿Tanischa t'ajun anchunu lapanaki? Yucha jajuniy: —Jantu ijk'atsay.
43009013	Talhi'alhcha an tan ixtawilanalh an fariseojnin an yu la'lhtuluw ixjunita lapanak.
43009014	Akxni la'oxilh an pulh'om an Jesús chi malakawanilhcha an yu ntu lay ixjalakawanan akxni ntu ixtapatsakan wilhchani ixjunita.
43009015	An fariseojnin wachu talhisakmipalhi tani laycha lhijalakawanalh. Pus yucha jajuniy: —Wa kilakpuxapamuk'alhcha an pulh'om, chi kla'puch'a'alhcha chi chaway ijkalakawanancha.
43009016	Pus an ali'in fariseojnin ixtanajun: —Anchunu lapanak tu Diosi makmintalh, mu tapatsayi akxni masi ntu tapatsakan wilhchan. Pero ali'in ixtanajun: —¿Pero tasicha lay kalhilak'ilhtulh aniy tanlhun li wa ma'lhta'alhinicha? Pus tatala'apitsilhcha, tatakilhmakt'uyulhcha.
43009017	Wachuncha talhisakmipalh a'tami an yu la'lhtuluw ixjunita lapanak, tajuniy: —An yu malakawanin, ¿tisu lapanakch'a na'uni? Yucha najun: —Kit'in iknajun pumatam yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
43009018	Pero an judiojnin jantu ixtakiklaka'iya li la'lhtuluwi ixjunita chi li laycha ixjalakawanan, wanaj tat'asanilh ixpay chi ixnati
43009019	chi talhisakmilhcha, tajuniy: —¿Yucha aniya mints'alhk'an, yu nawnat li wa la'lhtuluwi tsukulh? ¿Tasicha lhijalakawanan chawayi?
43009020	An ixpaynin taja'alhtayanalh tanajun: —Ijk'atsayawi li aniy kints'alhk'an, chi li wa la'lhtuluwi tsukulh;
43009021	pero ntu ijk'atsayaw tani lhijalakawanancha chaway, chi ntu ijk'atsayaw tichini malakawanilhcha. Yuch'ach'a k'alhisakmit, mu aycha, yuchacha katajunan.
43009022	An ixpaynin wa chuncha tanawlh, mu ixtatalhanan, mu an judiojnin ixtatamakajuntacha li yu kanawna li an Jesús yucha Cristo, katamakxtukana an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a yu tajakiklaka'inin.
43009023	Xliyu talhinawlh an ixpaynin: "Yuch'ach'a k'alhisakmit, mu aycha".
43009024	An judiojnin a'tam tat'asanipalhi an yu la'lhtuluw ixjunita, chi tajuniy: —Akilajuniw yu sawalh la ix'ukxlakapu Dios. Kitnan ijk'atsayawi li anchunu lapanak wa ma'lhta'alhini'.
43009025	Yucha jajuniy: —Li ma'lhta'alhini, kit'in tu ijk'atsay. Yu ijk'atsay, li ntu lay xajkalakawanan, pero chaway ijkalakawanancha.
43009026	A'tam talhisakmipalh tajuniy: —¿Tasicha ilhtuni? ¿Tasicha ilhtulh li malakawanincha?
43009027	Yucha jajuniy: —Klajuniwcha, pero ntu kilakiklaka'iyaw. ¿Tasu li a'tam aklajumpalawi? ¿Chu wachu sna ixt'alhtanani ump'ut'unat'it?
43009028	Wachuncha tamamaxanilhcha, chi tajuniy: —Uxint'i ka ixt'alhtanak'at'i anchunu lapanak, pero kitnan ixt'alhtanan an Moisés.
43009029	Kitnan ijk'atsayaw li an Dios xa'alalhi an Moisés, pero anchunu lapanak tu ijk'atsayaw tanchuncha minchalh.
43009030	An yu la'lhtuluw lapanak ixjunita jajuniy: —¡Pus yuchacha yu lhi'a'nincha! Uxitnan t'u k'ats'ayat tanchuncha minchalh, walh chi kit'in kimalakawanilhcha.
43009031	Chi k'atsayawi li an Dios tu ja'asmatniya an ma'lhta'alhinin, pero yu kiklaka'iya an Dios chi ilhtuniya yu najun, yucha asmatni.
43009032	Tu a'tam asmatkanta li xamati lay kamalakawanilh yu wa la'lhtuluw la'awlh.
43009033	Li aniy lapanak tu Diosi makmintalh, tulay tu'u ka'ilhtulh.
43009034	Pus yu'uncha tajuniy: —Uxint'i wa tala'alhinch'a p'uts'uk'u, ¿chi uxint'icha akilamasuniyaw? Pus tatamakxtulhcha an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin.
43009035	Walh an Jesús k'atsalhi li tatamakxtulh, pus akxni paxto'lhi lhisakmiy juniy: —¿Uxint'i k'iklak'a'iya an isTs'alh Dios?
43009036	Yucha alhtaylh juniy: —¿Jamach'alhkat, tisiyuchacha, para li ajkiklaka'ilh?
43009037	An Jesús juniy: —La'ts'int'a'uncha, kit'in, yu t'ach'iwint'a'un.
43009038	Wachuncha an lapanak tatso'ottatawlhnilhcha la ixlakapu an Jesús, chi juniy: —Ijkiklaka'iyani, Jamach'alhkat.
43009039	An Jesús juniy: —Kit'in ikminta nawna aniy lakaamunulhpa tanyuchacha yu oxi chi yu jantu, para li an yu ntu tajalakawanan, katajalakawanalh, chi an yu tajalakawanan ntu katajalakawanalh.
43009040	Ali'in fariseojnin yu ancha ixtat'ayanalh, mu ta'alha'asmat'acha, pus tajuniy: —¿Chu wachu la'la'lhtulu'uni kitnan?
43009041	An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Li la'la'lhtulu'uni k'a ix'unt'it, jantu tu'u k'a ixlits'ukut mintala'alhink'an, pero mu nawnat'iti li jalak'awananat'it chaway amintala'alhink'an minkwentajk'an.
43010001	Aniy yu klajunaw sawalh, yu ntu la xamalhticha putanuyachalh an la ixkurralhk'an an borregojnin yu lakatami putanuyachalh, wa ja'alhawna'.
43010002	Pero yu la xamalhticha putanuyachalh, yucha yu jalhist'ak'a an borregojnin.
43010003	An yu jalhistaknan laka malhticha yucha mati'anicha an yu jalhist'ak'a ixborregojnin chi la ixta'a'utchak'ani jamapa'a'uy la'atamin, pus ta'alhmispaycha, chi jamaxtuycha.
43010004	Chi akxni tataxtu'ojoycha, jatap'ulhniycha, pus an borregojnin tach'a'o'aycha mu ta'alhmispaycha.
43010005	Pero yu ntu tamispay tu tach'a'o'ay, wa talakats'alhni mu ntu ta'alhmispay.
43010006	An Jesús chuncha jalhimalakxtunilh, pero yu'uncha ntu talhimach'axanilh.
43010007	Pus a'tam jajumpalhi an Jesús, jajuniy: —Aniy klajunaw yucha sawalh, kit'ini ixmalhtichak'an an borregojnin.
43010008	Akxni ntuka' xakmin, ixchuxk'an an yu p'ulhnaj takilachilh wa ja'alhawnan, pero an borregojnin jantu ta'alha'asmatlhi.
43010009	Kit'in, ikmalhticha, yu kit'ini kimputanuy kata'alhtaxtuya'. Katanuya chi kataxtuya chi kala'cha'ana jats'in.
43010010	An ja'alhawna yucha wa mintacha ja'alhawana', chi minta jama'nini, chi minta jalakt'ilhini'; pero kit'in ikminta para li k'alhits'uk'ut jatsukunti, chi li lhuwi k'alhits'uk'ut jatsukunti.
43010011	Kit'ini yu oxi ijkalhist'ak'a an borregojnin. Yu oxi jalhist'ak'a an borregojnin lhima'axt'a'a ixjatsukunti.
43010012	Pero li yu wa mapalhnikancha tapatsay, akxni la'ts'in min an ma'tili jamakajuncha an borregojnin chi jats'alaycha, mu ntu yu yu jalhist'ak'a sawalh chi mu ntu ixnawin. An ma'tili ja'uycha an borregojnin chi tatalaktilhacha.
43010013	Anchunu lapanak jats'alay mu yucha wa yucha an ixtalhajacha lhakapu'an, jantu yu an borregojnin sawalhi jalhakapu'an.
43010014	Kit'ini yu oxi ijkalhist'ak'a an borregojnin, chi ijkamispayi yu kinawin, chi yu'uncha kintamispay,
43010015	tacha kimispay an kimPay chi kit'in ikmispay wachu'. Ki'tin ijkalhima'axt'a'a kijatsukunti an borregojnin.
43010016	Atumpaj ijkalhit'awpalay ali kiborregojnin yu ntu aniy tatanumanalh aniy laka kurralh; yu'uncha wachu ajkalhimina chi akinta'asmatniya kinchiwinti, walakatamcha katatsuku'oya chi wa pumatami yu kajalhist'ak'a'.
43010017	An kimPay xliyu kilhimapayniy, mu kit'in ikma'axt'a'a an kijatsukunti para li ajkama'lhtayanancho'olh.
43010018	Jantu xamati kimaxtuniy an kijatsukunti, wa ki'akstucha ikma'axt'a'a. Ikt'acha'ani li akma'axta'lhi chi li akla'a'icho'olh. Aniy, yucha an kimPayi chuncha kilhijunilh.
43010019	An judiojnin a'tam tatala'apitsipalhi akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi.
43010020	Ixluwk'ani yu yu'uncha ixtanajun: —Wa loko chi wa lakpach'apata makxkay'un, ¿tasu li takiklaka'icha?
43010021	Pero ali'in ixtanajun: —Tu xamati yu wa lakpach'apata makxkay'un chuncha kachiwinilh. ¿Chu sna layi an makxkay'un kajamalakawanilh yu wa la'la'lhtulu'un?
43010022	An la'acha'an Jerusalén ixk'atanit'awkan, ixlakata yu ixpupastakkan an ay ixtajtank'an. Ixpaku lhik'asnini ixjunita.
43010023	Chi an Jesús an laka tajtani ix'aklat'ajun, an lhilaxmalhticha Salomón.
43010024	Walh an judiojnin tala'atanchanulh chi tajuniy: —¿Tasu wa tiwanancha chuncha akilalhilatsukuyaw li ntu oxi kilajunaw li sna uxint'i Cristojk'at'i? Li uxint'i Cristojk'at'i ixla'ts'awalanticha akilajuniw.
43010025	An Jesús jajuniy: —Mu klajunawcha, pero ntu kilakiklaka'iyaw. An tanlhun an yu klak'ilhtuy la xtalakask'i an kimPay, yuchacha masuy;
43010026	pero uxitnan nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'it, mu uxitnan ntu kiborregojnin.
43010027	An kiborregojnin yu'uncha kinta'alhmispay, chi ijkamispay chi kintach'a'o'ay.
43010028	Kit'in ijkaxta'niy jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh, chi ntu a'tam katitanilh, chi ntu xamati akintijamaxtunilh.
43010029	An kimPay yucha ntu xamati ixt'achun, yucha yu kijaxta'nilh an borregojnin chi ntu xamati katijama'xa'axtulh an kimPay.
43010030	An kimPay chi kit'in wa la'atami ijkuntaw.
43010031	Wachuncha an judiojnin ixtalakat'alhmaputumpalaycha, ixtalaksak'acha chiwx.
43010032	Pero an Jesús jajuniy: —Lhuwcha tanlhun yu laj'oxi tu'u klamasuniw yu ixnawin an kimPay; ¿tanyucha yu akilalhilakat'alhmayawi?
43010033	An judiojnin tajuniy: —Jantu xliyu li aktilalhilakat'alhmaw li laj'oxi tanlhun ilht'uy, aklalakat'alhmayaw mu wa aya uniya an Dios. Wachu wa lapanak k'at'i, chi uxint'icha na'un li Dios k'at'i.
43010034	An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Chu ntu ts'o'muk'akanta an la milhamap'a'sink'an tan najun?: "Kit'ini iknajun, uxitnan diosnin".
43010035	Li an Dios, diosnini jajunilh an yu takilhichiwinchilh ixchiwinti, pus k'atsayawi li an tan chuncha ts'o'muk'akanta jantu layi ntucha katikiklaka'iw.
43010036	Chi li an Dios kisakxtulh chi kimakmilhcha aniy lakaamunulhpa, ¿tasu li nawnatcha li wa aya ijkuniycha, li iknajun li kit'ini iksTs'alh Diosi?
43010037	Li ntu yu k'ilhtuy an tapatsat tacha an ilhtuy kimPay, jantu akilakiklaka'iw.
43010038	Pero li chuncha k'ilhtuy, masi ntu akilakiklaka'iw, yucha an yu k'ilhtuycha k'ak'iklak'a'it, para li wa xawa'a'tamch'a k'ak'ats'at li an kimPay kinput'ajun chi kit'in yucha ikput'ajun.
43010039	A'tam ixtach'apayawputumpalay, pero an Jesús tama'a'osli.
43010040	Ampalhcha ixtapiktutam an ayxkan tan junkan Jordán, tan ixlip'ulhnaj ixjama'paxanan an Juán, anchacha tamakawchalh.
43010041	Ixluwk'ani ixtala'cha'an, chi ixtanajun: —Chun sawalh, masi an Juán tu tu'u masulh yu la'lhi'a'nin, pero tacha an lhichiwinilh aniy lapanak chun sawalh.
43010042	Ixluwk'ani ancha takiklaka'ilh an Jesús.
43011001	Ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak wa ixta'an'ay ixjunkan Lázaro, jamacha'a Betaniaj, la ixla'acha'an an Marta chi an ixp'isa'a María.
43011002	Aniy María ixt'alajamatsan an Lázaro, yucha yu lhich'ampaxalh perjume an Jamach'alhkat Jesús chi ch'anxakalhcha la ix'ay.
43011003	Pus an ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alajamatsanan an Lázaro, tamala'achanilhi chiwinti an Jesús tan tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat, an yu map'ayniy wa ta'an'ay.
43011004	An Jesús, akxni asmatlhi, najun: —Aniy ta'an'at jantu katijama'ninilh, yucha apalij wa kapumasukana an ixta'ayat Dios, chi an ixta'ayat an isTs'alh Dios.
43011005	Chi masi sawalh ixmapayniya an Jesús an Marta, chi an ixp'isa'a chi an Lázaro,
43011006	la'at'uy wilhchani tawlhpalhchalh an tan ixt'ajun masi junikalhcha li an Lázaro wa ixta'an'ay.
43011007	Xli'astan jajunilh an ixt'alhtanan: —Ka'ampalawi la'acha'an Judea.
43011008	An ixt'alhtanan tajuniy: —Maestro, tuka' ma'ani an judiojnin yu ancha ixla'acha'ank'an ixtalakat'alhmaputunan, ¿ch'i a't'amch'a t'ip'imp'alay?
43011009	An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Chu ntu la'akawt'uy horaja lhit'ajun an wilhchan? Yu akxni tunkuwi jalhtanan tu kati'ayst'uk'ukalh, mu la'ts'ini an xajatapulhkunu aniy lakamunulhpa';
43011010	pero yu puts'ista jalhtanan, ayst'uk'ukan, mu ntu pulhkuyi ancha.
43011011	Xli'astan jajumpalay: —An ki'amigojk'an Lázaro lhtatalhcha, pero ikt'i'an makujunu'.
43011012	An ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat, li lhtatalhcha, nawputun li katak'uch'uya'.
43011013	Pero an Jesús yucha ixjajunt'ajun li an Lázaro nilhcha, pero an ixt'alhtanan ixtanajun li yu wa lhtatakancha sawalh.
43011014	Wachuncha an Jesús ts'awjcha jajunilh: —An Lázaro nilhcha,
43011015	chi oxi iklhiwilay por uxitnan li ntu aniy xakt'awnachalh, para li k'ak'iklak'a'it'it; ka'awcha la'ts'inin.
43011016	Wachuncha an Tomás yu ixtajuniy lhist'uy, jajuniyan ali'in ixt'alhtanan: —Wachu ka'awi kitnan, para li wachucha kat'aniyaw.
43011017	Akxni cha'alh an Jesús, la'at'at'icha wilhchani ixmaknukanta an Lázaro.
43011018	An la'acha'an Betaniaj wani la'acha'an Jerusaleni ixlitamakajun, ka wa tacha la'at'utu kilometrojo ixlima'at.
43011019	Ixluwk'an an judiojnini ixta'anta la'ts'inin an Marta chi an María, ixtat'alama'oxamixiycha li nilh an Lázaro ixt'alajamatsank'an an Marta chi an María.
43011020	Akxni an Marta k'atsalhi li an Jesús ixcha'ant'ajuncha, taxtulhcha, alhcha lakatastuknu'; pero an María tamakawlhi an la ixcha'ak'an.
43011021	An Marta juniy an Jesús: —Jamach'alhkat, li aniy k'a ixt'a'ulh, an Lázaro jantu ka ixnilh.
43011022	Pero wachu ijk'atsapalayi masi sta chaway k'ask'inin watuchicha an Dios, kaxta'niyan.
43011023	An Jesús juniy: —An Lázaro kala'awcho'oya'.
43011024	An Marta alhtaylh juniy: —Mu chun, ijk'atsayi li kala'awcho'oya akxni kala'awcho'okana', yu xati'astancha wilhchan.
43011025	An Jesús juniy: —Kit'ini yu ikpula'awcho'okan chi ijkatsukunti. Yu kinkiklaka'iy, masi kanilh, katsukucho'oya'.
43011026	Chi watichicha yu t'ajunka chi kinkiklaka'iy, jantu katiniy'alhilh. ¿K'iklak'a'iya aniy yu ijkunan?
43011027	An Marta alhtaylh juniy: —Chuni, Jamach'alhkat, kit'in ijkiklaka'iya li uxint'i Cristojk'at'i, isTs'alh Dios, yu t'ant'a aniy lakaamunulhpa'.
43011028	Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Marta, alhcha t'asanini an María, ixt'alajamatsan, kalakscha junilh: —An Maestro aniya t'ajun chi t'asaniyan.
43011029	An María wachuncha asmatlhi, las tayalh chi alhcha la'ts'ini an Jesús.
43011030	An Jesús tuka' ixtanuyachalhi an la'acha'an; wa anchaka ixt'ajun tan an kila'kilalh an Marta.
43011031	Akxni tala'ts'ilhi an María li tayalhcha, chi lascha taxtulh, an judiojnin an yu ancha ixtat'awilanalh laka cha'a yu ixtama'oxamixiy tach'a'o'alh, ixtanajun li sna an tan aknukanachalhcha alh alhunu'.
43011032	Akxni cha'alhcha an María tan ixt'ajun an Jesús, tatso'ottanilhcha la ixjach'aja', juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, li aniya k'a ixt'a'ulh, an Lázaro jantu ka ixnilh.
43011033	An Jesús akxni la'ts'incha an María li x'alhuncha chi an judiojnin an yu tat'acha'alh wachucha ixtalaj'alhun, an Jesús sawalhcha ta'oxila'alhilh.
43011034	Chi jalhisakmilhcha, jajuniy: —¿T'anisch'a maknut'iti? Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat, k'at'at'icha la'ts'ini'.
43011035	Wachuncha an Jesús alhulhcha.
43011036	Pus an judiojnin ixtanajun: —¡Jo' k'ala'ts'int'it, sawalhcha ka ixmapayniy!
43011037	Pero an ali'in ixtanajun: —Aniy mu yucha layi malakawanilh an la'lhtuluw, ¿chu ntu layi ta ka ixlit'alalh para li ntu kaxnilhi an Lázaro?
43011038	An Jesús, mu a'tamcha ixlita'oxila'alhipalay, pus alhi an tan ix'aknuyachalh an Lázaro. Wa tan'apilho'o'o an lakaachiwxin, ixlakapuyawkantacha chiwxi an tan ixputanukanachalh.
43011039	An Jesús jajuniy: —K'ama'osut'iti an chiwx. An Marta, an ixt'alajamatsan an yu ixnita, juniy an Jesús: —Jamach'alhkat, ka makxkaycha akamin, mu la'at'at'icha wilhchani nita.
43011040	An Jesús juniy: —¿Chu ntu ijkunani li jak'iklak'a'inin, k'ala'ts'ina'a an ix'alhp'asninti Dios?
43011041	Pus wachuncha tama'osulhcha an chiwx an taán ix'aknukan, chi an Jesús tala'st'alhcha, najun: —KimPay ikxta'niyan lhimala'puchajun, mu k'i'asmatnin.
43011042	Ijk'atsayi li lhilhiji k'i'asmatni; pero tuchi chuncha iklhinajun ixlakatak'an aniy tayanalh lapanakni, para li katakiklaka'ilhi li uxint'iy k'imakt'ant'a.
43011043	Xli'astan akxni chunchacha naw'olh, p'ascha chiwinilh, najun: —¡Lázaro, k'at'axt'ucha!
43011044	Pus an yu ixnitacha taxtulhcha, an la ixlakmaka chi an la ixlakch'aja ixla'la'apach'inikantacha laka laksliwilh la'ch'it chi an la ix'ukxpu yu aycha la'ch'iti ixpula'apach'inikanta. An Jesús jajuniy: —K'ala'ax'ott'itcha chi kachajcha ana'.
43011045	Tacha aniy ilhtulh an Jesús, ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh an judiojnin an yu ixtala'anta an María, mu tala'ts'ilhcha tacha an ilhtulh.
43011046	Pero an ali'in ta'alh la'ts'inini an fariseojnin, chi tajunilhi tani ilhtulhcha an Jesús.
43011047	Pus an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an fariseojnin tata'ayxto'lhi laka ay juntaj chi talajuniy: —¿Tasu ka'ilhtuyawcha? Aniy lapanak wa stakcha lakmasut'ajuni tanlhun yu la'lhima'anxkay.
43011048	Li wa chuncha kamakawniyaw, katakiklaka'i'oya', chi an yu macha'an Roma katamina, chi katalakt'ilhiya an kintajtank'an chi an kila'acha'ank'an.
43011049	Pero pumatam de yu'uncha, ixjunkan Caifás, xa'ay sacerdoteje ixjunita anchunu k'ata, jajuniy: —Uxitnan t'u t'u'u k'ats'ayat,
43011050	ch'i nt'u lhak'ap'up'inat'iti li palay oxi para uxitnani li wa pumatam lapanaki kajalhinilh ixchuxk'an an lapanakni, walh jantu li ta ixlijalhi'ay an la'acha'an kalakt'ilhikalh.
43011051	Tacha an nawlh, tu wa ix'akstucha chuncha nawputulh, wa xliyu yucha xa'ay sacerdoteje ixjunita anchunu k'ata, pus la'asiyaj manawnilhcha an Dios li an Jesús kalhiniya an la'acha'an;
43011052	chi ntu wa ixlakatacha aniy la'acha'an, wachu ixlakata li kajapuma'ayxto'kana an ixjas'at'an Dios yu ixta'a'pitsinin.
43011053	Pus chunchacha, akxnicha wilhchani tatamakawlh an xajamach'alhkatni judiojnin li katama'niyacha an Jesús.
43011054	Xliyu an Jesús jantucha ixjatalakasuniya an judiojnin, taxtulhcha an la'acha'an Judea, alhcha tanchun la'acha'an junkan Efraín, wani tan wa jaxixnintacha, anchacha jat'atamakawlh an ixt'alhtanan.
43011055	Chi wanicha ists'an'ay ixpaxkuk'an an judiojnin, pus ixluwk'ani yu wa ancha la'la'acha'anaxni ixtawilanalh tatama'ast'a'alhi Jerusalén akxni ntuka' ix'a'tayni an paxku, para li katastalan'alh.
43011056	Ixtapuxkajuycha an Jesús chi ixtalajumpaxay an laka tajtan: —¿T'asch'a lhiwilayat'iti? ¿Kamina laka k'atan u jantu?
43011057	An fariseojnin chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin ixtalhinajuntacha li ma xamati la'ts'in an Jesús, ma kanawlh, para li katach'apayawlhcha.
43012001	An Jesús alh Betaniaja akxni la'achaxanka wilhchan ists'an'ay kachilh paxku, tan ixwilhchalh an Lázaro, an yu ixmala'awnicho'ota.
43012002	Ancha tamawachalh; an Marta ixjalak'inicha ixpulatojk'an, chi an Lázaro wachu aniy ixt'awilh an Jesús an laka mesaj.
43012003	Wachuncha an María xa'a'ilh la'atam perjume yu la'stu de nardo katacha paytat litro, chi yucha wanaj la'lhuwi tapalay, pus lakch'anmuk'alhcha an Jesús, chi xli'astan lakch'anxakalhcha la ix'ay. An ixpulakni an cha'a wa pulaklhaklhicha walh.
43012004	Chi xapumatam an ixt'alhtana Jesús, junkan Judas Iscariote, ists'alh Simón, yu an kama'axt'a'a an Jesús, najun:
43012005	¿Tasu li ntu st'akalhi aniy perjume yu la'at'utu ciento wilhchan xatapatsat tapalayi, para li ka ixjamala'pitsinikalhcha an jakilhpatinini?
43012006	Pero yucha masi chuncha nawlh, jantu wa xliyu ixjalhakapu'ancha an jakilhpatinin, yucha wa xliyu ixja'alhawanan, chi mu yuchaa ixlit'ajun an bolsaj yu ixputajuy an tumin, pus ixmakutuy.
43012007	Wachuncha an Jesús juniy: —K'amak'awcha, aniy wa mala'asijniycha para li akxni akimaknukana'.
43012008	An jakilhpatinin lhilhiji k'ajat'a'aklats'uk'uya'it, pero kit'in jantu.
43012009	Ixluwk'an an judiojnini tak'atsalh li an Jesús Betaniaja ixt'ajun, pus ta'alh, pero ntu wa yuchacha ixtala'ts'imputun, wachu ixtala'ts'imputuni an Lázaro, an yu ixmala'awnicho'ota an Jesús.
43012010	Wachuncha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin tat'acha'alhcha li katama'niya wachu an Lázaro,
43012011	mu ixlakata yucha li wanajcha ixluwk'ani ixtat'alamakawt'ajun an judiojnin, yucha an Jesúscha ixtakiklaka'iy.
43012012	Lhuw tukan lapanaki ix'anta la'acha'an Jerusalén ixlakata an k'atan yu junkan paxku chi akxni tunkunchalh tak'atsalhi li kacha'ana an la'acha'an an Jesús,
43012013	tala't'e'e'ilhcha jap'ach'i chi ta'alhcha lakatastuknin, p'ascha ixtalakt'asay: —¡An Dios ay! ¡Oxi aniy yu la ixtalakaski Dios minta! ¡An xaRey Israel oxi!
43012014	An Jesús la'cha'alh la'atam burro chi putawk'alhcha, tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta:
43012015	"Jant'u k'at'alhani la'acha'an Sión; mu aminRey mintacha, pu'uk'alh la'atam xajas'at'a burro".
43012016	Wa ixlip'ulhnaj an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tu talhimacha'xalh; pero xli'astan, akxni an Jesús la'ayakalhcha, akxni tapastaklhicha li chuncha ixlits'o'muk'akanta li yucha ixlichiwininta tacha an ta'ilhtulh.
43012017	An lapanakni an yu ixtala'ts'inta akxni an Jesús t'asanilh chi mala'awnicho'olh an Lázaro an tan ix'aknuy, ixtalaknajuncha.
43012018	Xliyu an lapanakni ta'alhcha lakatastuknini an Jesús, mu tak'atsalhcha tacha an ix'ilhtuta yu lhima'anxkay.
43012019	Pero an fariseojnin ixtalajumpaxay: —La'ts'inatcha uxitnan li chuncha ntu tu'u kati'ilhtuw. K'ala'ts'int'it, ¡wanajcha ta lhichuxi tit'a'ankan!
43012020	Tacha an ix'ankanta Jerusalén laka k'atan, ixtama'anta yu griegojnin.
43012021	Pus tala'cha'alhi an Felipe, jamacha'a Betsaida, xalakaat'un Galilea, chi ixtatapayninicha, ixtajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat, kla'ts'imputunaw an Jesús.
43012022	Pus an Felipe alh junini an Andrés, chi ixlit'uyunchak'ani ta'alh juninin an Jesús.
43012023	An Jesús jajuniy: —Chilhcha panch'e'ex li an yu isTs'alh Lapanak kijunchilh kala'ayakanacha.
43012024	Chaway klajunaw li an xatalhts'i trigo patajuy an lakaat'un chi li ntu tamp'a'a, wa sa' tamay ix'akstu; pero li tamp'a'a, lhuwi xajatawk'at xt'a'a.
43012025	Yu mapayniya ixjatsukunti, kama'ats'an'aya'; pero yu xkajiya ixjatsukunti aniy lakamunulhpa, kalhitsukuya ixjatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh.
43012026	Li xamati kint'atapatsaputun, akinch'a'o'alhcha; chi tan aktsukuya, wanajcha aniy katsukuya an yu kint'atapatsay. Li xamati kint'atapatsay, an kimPay oxi kalhi'o'xla'ts'ina'.
43012027	"Chaway wanaj tu k'is oxi ijk'atsan la kintak'atsan". ¿Chi tasicha aknawna'a? ¿aknawna: KimPay ak'ima'osunini aniy tacha ijk'atsan aknawna'? ¡Kit'in yuchacha kla'minta aniy!
43012028	KimPay, k'ala'ayat'icha aminta'a'ut". Wachuncha chiwinkanchalh an lakt'iyan, nawkan: "Ikla'ayatacha, chi akla'ayapala a'tam".
43012029	An lapanakni an yu ancha ixtayanalh chi ta'asmatlhi an tacha nawkalh, ixtanajun ma wa t'asalh xalapanak xkan. Ali'in ixtanajun: —Pumatam angelhi alhtaylh.
43012030	An Jesús jajuniy: —Aniy chiwinti asmatt'it jantu para kit'in, para uxitnan.
43012031	Chawaycha kanawkana li oxi u jantu yu ta'ilhtuy an lapanakni aniy lakaamunulhpa', chi chaway katamakxtukanacha an yu ch'alhkatnan aniy lakamunulhpa'.
43012032	Pero kit'in, akxni akimakxtukmuk'akanacha laka k'iw aniy lakaat'un, wanaj lhuwi yu akintach'a'o'aya'.
43012033	Chunchacha ixjapumak'atsaaninin tani kalayacha akxni kaniya'.
43012034	An lapanakni ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —Kitnan k'asmattaw an lakalhamap'a'sin li an Cristo katsuku'alhiya'. ¿T'asuch'a li na'un li task'iniya li an yu kijunchilh isTs'alh Lapanak kamakxtukmuk'akana'a? ¿Tanyucha isTs'alh Lapanaki?
43012035	An Jesús jajuniy: —Wa lakats'uniycha aniy katat'a'aklatsukuyan an jatapulhkunu'; k'alak'alht'anant'iti li lhit'awnatka an jatapulhkunu', para li ntu wa ka kalaks katala'chini an jatats'isni akxni nt'u jalajk'ats'anant'at'it, mu yu lakaaputs'isni jalhtanan tu k'atsay tanchuncha ti'an.
43012036	Li lhit'awnatka an jatapulhkunu, k'ak'iklak'a'it'it, para li xas'at'an jatapulhkunu k'a'unt'it.
43012037	Masi an Jesús wanajcha lhuwi ix'ilhtuta la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an lapanakni yu la'lhi'a'nin tanlhun, jantu ixtakiklaka'iy,
43012038	wa xliyu li tapasalhi tacha an ists'o'muk'ata an Isaías, yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tan najun: "Dios ¿tisiyuchacha kiklaka'ita an kinchiwintik'ani? ¿An lapanak tasu wanancha la'ts'inta ix'alhp'asninti Diosi?
43012039	Pus tulay ixtakiklaka'iy, mu wachu ists'o'muk'apalata an Isaías tan najun:
43012040	"An Dios jamala'puts'inita chi t'ak'alh ja'ilhtunita an ixjalhunutk'an, para li ntu katajalakawanalh, chi para li ntu kataja'asmatnalh, chi para li ntu katawalhi ixjas'at'an Dios chi chuncha ntu ajkak'uch'ulh".
43012041	An Isaías chuncha nawlh mu ixla'ts'inta an ixta'ayaxtu an Jesús chi yuchaa lhichiwinilh.
43012042	Masi chuncha, ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh an judiojnin an Jesús, sta an jamach'alhkatni wachu'. Pero ntu ixtanajunitan lhilhuw mu ixtatalhamniya an fariseojnin, para li ntu kajatamakxtukalh an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an yu ixtajakiklaka'inin,
43012043	mu palay ixtala'a'iya li oxi kajala'ts'inkalh, pero jantu ixtala'a'iya li oxi kajala'ts'ilh Dios.
43012044	An Jesús p'asi chiwinilh, najun: —"Yu kinkiklaka'iy, jantu wa kit'incha kinkiklaka'iy, wachu kiklaka'iya an kimPay, yu kimala'achatachalh.
43012045	Chi yu kila'ts'in, wachu la'ts'ini an yu kimala'achatachalh.
43012046	Kit'in ijkatapulhkunu', chi aniy lakaamunulhpa ikminta para li chux yu kinkiklaka'iy jantu wa lakaapuuts'isnicha kats'uku'alhilh.
43012047	Yu asmat'a kinchiwinti chi ntu kiklaka'iy, jantu aktinawlhi li oxi u jantu lay, mu ntu yu ikla'minta aniy lakaamunulhpa', kit'in ikminta ma'alhtaxtunu an lakaamunulhpa'.
43012048	Yu kisamaj'an chi ntu ki'asmatniputuni kinchiwinti, alincha yu kajuna li oxi u jantu tacha lay, yucha an kinchiwinti kajuna li oxi u jantu ixt'ajun akxni xati'astancha wilhchan kajuna'.
43012049	Mu kit'in ntu wa ki'akstucha iknajun yu ikchiwiniy; yucha an kimPay yu kimala'achatachalhi kilhijuniy li aknawlh chi li akmasulh.
43012050	Chi ijk'atsayi li an ixlamap'a'sin an kimPay para jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy. Xliyu an tacha iknajun, mu chuncha kilhijunita an kimPay".
43013001	Akxni ntuka' ixchin ixk'atan Paxku, an Jesús ixk'atsaycha li chilhcha ixpanch'e'ex para li aniy lakaamunulhpa tan ixt'ajun kala'ancho'oyacha an ixPay, chi mu ixjamapayniya an yu ixtat'alhtanan aniy lakaamunulhpa, sta wa nilhcha jamapaynilh.
43013002	Akxni ixtalakkwayt'ajuncha puts'ista, an xapay makxkay un ixtamaknunitacha la ixjatapast'ak'at an Judas Iscariote, ists'alh Simón, li kama'axt'a'a an Jesús.
43013003	An Jesús ixk'atsayi li an ixPay ixma'axta'ni'ojota wa tuchicha la ixmaka'. Ixk'atsayi an Jesús li tan wilhchalh Diosi ixmintachalh chi li anchacha kacha'ancho'oya'.
43013004	An Jesús tayalhi an tan ixtalakkwayt'ajun, chi ayp'uxkalhi an ixla'ch'it an yu ixpu'ayxt'a'kanta. Xa'a'ilhcha la'atam toalla chi ch'axpach'imuk'akalhcha.
43013005	Xli'astan mulhcha xkan laka la'atam axi, chi tsukulhcha jala'ch'anch'a'ayi an ixt'alhtanan chi jalakch'anxakalhcha an laka toalla an yu ixch'axpach'imuk'akanta.
43013006	Akxni yucha an Pedrojcha kach'anch'a'akana, yucha juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ¿uxint'ich'a ak'inch'anch'a'aya'a?
43013007	An Jesús juniy: —Chaway t'u lhimach'a'xayi tuchini k'ilhtut'ajuncha, pero xli'astan k'alhimach'a'xaya'acha.
43013008	An Pedro juniy: —¡Jantu aktilhitamakawlhi li ak'inch'anch'a'at'i! An Jesús juniy: —Li ntu aktich'anch'a'an, jantu kint'alhtanak'at'i k'at'i'unt'i.
43013009	Pus an Simón Pedro juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, jant'u wa ak'ila'ch'anch'a'at'i, wach'u ak'ila'ma'ch'a'at'i ch'i ak'ila'p'ach'a'at'i.
43013010	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Yu wa pax'ojotaka ntu ma'lhtask'iniya kapaxpalh, mu oxicha paxta, wa kach'anch'a'alhcha; chi uxitnan oxich'a lakp'axt'at, masi ntu minchuxk'an.
43013011	"Jantu minchuxk'ani oxicha la'stalan'an la mijalhunutk'an" jajuniy, mu yucha ixk'atsayi tichini yuchacha yu kama'axt'a'a'.
43013012	Akxni jala'ch'anch'a'a'olhcha, la'ch'icho'olhcha an ixla'ch'it an Jesús, chi tawlhcho'olhcha an laka mesaj, jajuniy: —¿Lhimach'a'xayat'iti tacha an kla'ilhtu?
43013013	Uxitnan Maestro chi jamach'alhkati kilajunaw, chi kit'in sawalh, oxich'a t'ach'a an nawnat.
43013014	Pus kit'in ikMaestro chi ikJamach'alhkat, chi klala'ch'anch'a'awcha, chaway wachucha k'alala'ch'anch'a'ap'axat'it,
43013015	mu klamasuniwcha t'ani k'a'ilht'utcha, wachucha chuni k'a'ilht'ut tacha an kla'ilhtuw.
43013016	Tacha aniy klajunaw sawalh, an patrón yucha yu ay, an yu wa ma'tapatsay jantu, chi yu inta mala'achakan jantu yu xa'ay, yucha an yu jamala'achanan.
43013017	Li lhimach'a'xayat'iti aniy tanlhun ch'i ilht'uyat'it, oxi para uxitnan.
43013018	"Jantu minchuxk'ani klalhichiwint'awnaw; kit'in ijk'atsayi tichini yu'unchacha yu ijkasakxtuta. Pero katapasaya tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "An yu kint'alakkwayt'ajun wa akint'atasp'it'a'".
43013019	Chawaycha klamak'atsaaniyaw akxni ntuka' tapasay, para li akxni katapasayacha k'ak'iklak'a'iya'itcha li kit'in.
43013020	Ani klajunaw sawalh, yu kala'a'iya yu kit'in ikmala'achata, kit'ini kila'a'iy; chi yu kila'a'iy, la'a'iya an yu kimakminta.
43013021	Akxni chunchacha naw'olh, an Jesús sawalhcha ta'oxila'alhilh, chi ixla'ts'awalanticha nawlh, jajuniy: —Xapumatam uxitnani akima'axt'a'a', chi sawalhi tacha aniy klajunaw.
43013022	Pus wachuncha an ixt'alhtanan ixtalala'ts'impaxaycha, jantu ixtak'atsay tichini yuchacha.
43013023	Xapumatam de yu'uncha, yu an Jesús ixmapayniy, la ixpa'xti an Jesusi ixmalh,
43013024	pus an Simón Pedro tamakyawnilh, para li kalhisakmilhi tichini yuchacha an yu lhichiwiniy.
43013025	Wachuncha yucha stalhcha la'alh palayi an Jesús, chi lhisakmilhcha, juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ¿tisiyuchacha?
43013026	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Ak'awaya lakat'ikt'i xatach'e'en pan, chi an yu akxta'niya yucha. Pus awalhcha an pan, chi yucha an Judas Iscariotejcha xta'nilh, ists'alh Simón.
43013027	Akxni u'olhcha, an Satanás putanulhcha. Wachuncha an Jesús juniy: —Yu k'a'ilht'uya'a, wa t'uk'anch'a k'a'ilht'u.
43013028	Pero ntu xamati lhimacha'xalh an yu ixtawilanalh laka mesaj tuchini chunchacha lhijunilh.
43013029	Ali'in ixtanajun li sna an Jesús jumputulh: "K'at'amawcha yu kama'lhtask'iniyaw an laka k'atan", u li tu'ucha kajaxta'nilh an jakilhpatinin, mu yucha an Judasi ixma'ay an tumin laka bolsaj.
43013030	Akxni ix'u'ojotacha an pan an Judas, taxtulhcha, puts'istacha.
43013031	Chi akxni alhcha an Judas, an Jesús jajuniy: —Chaway kala'ayakanacha an yu kijunchilh isTs'alh Lapanak, chi an ixta'ayat Dios yucha an isTs'alhcha kaputasuya'.
43013032	Li an isTs'alh Dios masuyi an ixta'ayat Dios, an Dios wachu kamasuya an ixta'ayat an isTs'alh, chi watukancha kamasuya'.
43013033	Lakt'ikt'in kijas'at'an, jantucha ma'ani aktilat'a'aklatsukuw. Uxitnan akilapuxkawyaw, pero tacha an ijkajunilh judiojnin wanajcha chuni klajunaw uxitnan: T'ulay k'at'ip'it'iti tan ikti'an kit'in.
43013034	Klaxta'niyaw aniy sast'i lhamap'a'sin: Li k'alamap'aynip'axat'it. Tacha kit'in klamapayniyaw.
43013035	Li k'alamap'aynip'axaya'it'it, ta ixlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa katalhakapu'ana li kint'alhtanani uxitnan.
43013036	An Simón Pedro juniy an Jesús: —Jamach'alhkat, ¿t'anisch'a t'ip'ini? An Jesús juniy: —Tan ikti'an t'ulay ak'int'ich'a'o'a chaway, pero xli'astan chun.
43013037	An Pedro juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, ¿tasu li ntulay aktich'a'o'ani chawayi? ¡An kijatsukunti aklhima'axt'a'a milakata!
43013038	An Jesús juniy: —¿K'alhima'axt'a'a'a mijatsukunti kilakata? Kit'in sawalhi yu ijkunan, jantuka' katit'asalhi an puyux, a't'utucha k'anawna'a li jant'u k'imisp'ay.
43014001	Jant'u k'ala't'a'oxila'alhit'it; k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti an Dios chi wachu' akilakiklaka'iw.
43014002	An la ixcha'a an kimPay wanaj a'alhuwi cha'a alin; li ntu chuni ixwalh, kit'in xaklajuniw. Pus kit'in ikti'ancha, akmala'asijnitachalhcha t'an k'ach'ip'ina'it.
43014003	Xli'astan akxni akmala'asijni'oyantacha, akmimpala a'tam, chi aklalhi'anawcha, para li wachu aniy k'at'awlhchi'it tan kit'in aktawlanta.
43014004	Uxitnan misp'ayatcha an tij yu lay pucha'ankan tan ikti'an kit'in.
43014005	An Tomás juniy an Jesús: —Jamach'alhkat, tu ijk'atsayaw t'anch'unch'a t'ip'in, ¿tasicha aklhik'atsayaw an tiji?
43014006	An Jesús juniy: —Kit'ini yu iktij, kit'ini yu iksawalh, chi ikjatsukunti; li ntu kit'ini akintipu'alh watichicha, jantu lay katila'cha'alh an kimPay.
43014007	Li kilamispayaw, an kimPay wach'u k'amisp'aya'it; chi sta chaway misp'ayat'itcha, mu la'ts'inlhit'awnat'itcha.
43014008	Pus an Felipe juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, akilamasuniwi amimPay, walh wachuncha oxicha.
43014009	An Jesús juniy: —Felipe, ma'anchacha klat'a'aklat'awnaw, ¿ch'i nt'uka' k'imisp'ay? Yu kila'ts'incha, la'ts'incha an kimPay; ¿T'asu li k'i'unicha li aklamasuniwi an kimPayi?
43014010	¿Ch'u nt'u k'iklak'a'iya li kit'in ikput'ajuni an kimPay chi an kimPay kimput'ajun? An tacha klajunaw tu wa kit'incha chuncha klajunaw. An kimPay an yu kimput'ajun, yuchaa kimpulak'ilhtuy an ixtapatsat.
43014011	Akilakiklaka'iwi li yucha an kimPayi ikput'ajun, chi an kimPay kit'ini kimput'ajun; li jantu, masi wa yucha an tacha klak'ilhtuycha tapatsati akilapukiklaka'iw.
43014012	Aniy sawalh, yu kinkiklaka'iy wachu kalak'ilhtuya an tapatsat an tacha klak'ilhtuy; walh chi palay laj'ayi kalak'ilhtuya', mu kit'in iktila'ancha an kimPay.
43014013	Chi watuchicha k'ask'iniya'it an kimPay lakintalakask'i, ak'ilhtuya', para li an isTs'alh Dios kaputasulhi an ixta'ayaxtu Dios.
43014014	Wat'uch'ich'a sk'inat la kintalakask'i, kit'in ak'ilhtuya'.
43014015	Li kilamapayniyaw, k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti an kilhamap'a'sin.
43014016	Chi kit'in aktapayniniya an kimPay, walh katamak'anipalhtacha'ani pumatam yu katalhi'a'tayjuyan, yu ntucha a'tam katitamakajun:
43014017	yucha an Takuwin yu kapulhi'an tan sawalh, yu an tu tajakiklaka'inin ntulay talhitsukuy, mu ntu tala'ts'in chi ntu tamispay; pero uxitnan misp'ayat'it, mu tat'a'aklat'awnan chi kataputsukuyan.
43014018	Jantu yu tacha ntucha tu'u ixpayk'ani aktilamakawpulaw.
43014019	Wa lakats'uniycha, an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin tucha ali akintitala'ts'ilh; pero uxitnan akilala'ts'inaw, chi k'ats'uk'uya'it'it mu kit'in ikt'ajun.
43014020	Anchunu wilhchan, uxitnan k'ak'ats'aya'it'iti li yucha an kimPaycha ikput'awnachalh chi uxitnan kit'incha kilaput'awnaw chi kit'in uxitnancha klaput'awnaw.
43014021	Yu la'a'iya an kilhamap'a'sin chi kiklaka'iy, lhimasuyi li kimapayni sawalh. Chi yu kimapayniy, kamapayniya an kimPay, chi kit'in akmapayniya wachu', chi aktalakasuniya'.
43014022	An Judas juniy, (jantu yu an Iscariote pumatam yu wachu chun ixjunkan): —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ¿tasu li wa kitnani akilatalakasuniyawi, chi ntu chux lakaamunulhpa'a?
43014023	An Jesús juniy: —Yu kimapayniy, kiklaka'iya an kinchiwinti; chi an kimPay kamapayniya', chi kit'in chi an kimPay akminaw t'atawlhnin.
43014024	Yu ntu kimapayniy, jantu kiklaka'iya an kinchiwinti. An chiwinti an t'ach'a asmat'at jantu kinchiwinti, ixchiwinti an kimPay an yu kimala'achatachalh.
43014025	Li klat'a'aklat'awnawka aniy, klajunawi aniy laktanlhun,
43014026	pero an yu katalhi'a'tayjuyan, an Stalan'a Takuwin yu kamakminanta an kimPay la kintalakask'i, yucha katamasuni'oyani an laktanlhun chi katamapast'ak'ani'oyani chux tacha an klajuntaw.
43014027	Klamakawniyawi an oxi jatawlhnat, klamakawniyawi an oxi kijatawlhnat; kit'in tu tacha an yu wa lakaamunulhpa tat'ajuni klaxta'niyaw. Jant'u k'ala't'a'oxila'alhit'it ch'i nt'u k'alakt'alhanant'it.
43014028	Asmatt'itcha li klajunaw: "Ikti'ancha chi aklala'mimpalaw". Li xakilamapayniw sawalh, k'a ixlaj'ach'ant'iti li iktila'an an kimPay, mu yucha palay ay, kit'in jantu.
43014029	Chaway klamak'atsaaniwcha p'ulhnaja masi li ntuka' tapasay, para li akxni katapasayacha k'ak'iklak'a'iya'itcha.
43014030	Jantucha ali lhuwi aktilat'achiwiniw, mu mintacha an yu ch'alhkatnan aniy lakaamunulhpa'. Masi yucha ntu tu'u ix'alhp'asninti para li tu'u akilhijunilh.
43014031	Pero chunchacha yu katapasaya para li an lakaamunulhpa kak'atsalhi li kit'in ikmapayniya an kimPay chi k'ilhtuyi yu yucha kilhijuniy. ¡K'alakt'ayatcha, ka'awcha!
43015001	Kit'ini yu xak'iw uvaj sawalh, chi an kimPay yucha an yu ch'an.
43015002	Li la'atam ki'a'atan'alat jantu tawk'aniya xa'uvaj, cha'xa; pero li tawk'aniya xa'uvaj, kilhasitmaj'an chi la'alaxtuy, para li ali katawk'alh.
43015003	Uxitnan la'stalan'ancha mu klajuniwcha an kinchiwinti.
43015004	Wa akilat'a'aklatsuku'alhiwcha, chi kit'in aklat'a'aklatsuku'alhiyaw. Tacha an ix'a'atan'alat uvaj tu lay tawk'aniya xa'uvaj wa ix'akstu, li ntu t'alach'apata an yu xak'iw, pus wanajcha chuni uxitnan, li ntu kilat'a'aklatsuku'alhiyaw.
43015005	Kit'ini an xak'iw uvaj, uxitnan ix'a'atan'alatnin. Yu kint'alach'apatachalh, chi kit'in ikt'alach'apatachalh, lhuwi xt'a'a ixjatawk'at, li ntu kit'in, t'u lay t'u'u k'at'i'ilht'ut'it.
43015006	Yu ntu kint'a'aklatsuku'alhi, ma'spa kamak'ankana', tacha an ix'a'atan'alat uvaj, chi kaxixa, kala'xawakana laka jikmi.
43015007	Li kilat'a'aklatsuku'alhiyaw, chi an kinchiwinti lhits'uk'u'alhiyat'it, wa t'uch'ich'a sk'imp'ut'unat kaxt'a'nik'ana'it'it.
43015008	Chunchacha yu putasuy ixta'ayaxtu an kimPay akxni uxitnan lhuw xt'a'at mijatawk'atk'an chi ch'unch'ach'a p'umasuyat li uxitnan kint'alhtanan.
43015009	Kit'in klamapayniyaw tacha kimapayniy an kimPay; k'atsuk'u'alhitcha an la kijamapayninti.
43015010	Li k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an kilhamap'a'sin, k'ats'uk'u'alhiya'it'iti lakijamapayninti, tacha kit'in ijkiklaka'iya an kimPay chi ikt'aw'alhiya la ixjamapayninti.
43015011	Aniy klalhixa'alaw, para li k'alhits'uk'ut'iti an ki'achat chi a'tsayi k'alhits'uk'ut mi'achatk'an.
43015012	Yucha aniya kilhamap'a'sin: Li k'alamap'aynip'axat'it, tacha kit'in klamapayniyaw.
43015013	Yu lhixt'a'a ixjatsukunti ixlakatak'an ix'amigojnin yucha yu lhit'ajun ay jamapayninti.
43015014	Uxitnan ki'amigojnini li ilht'uyat'iti yu klalhijunaw.
43015015	Jantucha aktilajuniwi ma'tsukunin, mu an ma'tsuku yucha ntu k'atsayi tuchini ilhtuycha an ixpatrón. Ki'amigojnincha aklajunaw, mu klajun'ojocha yu an kimPay kimak'atsaanita.
43015016	Uxitnan ntu wa kilasakxtuw, kit'ini klasakxtuw uxitnan, chi klalhisakxtu li k'ap'inchi'it xta'nini lhuw mijatawk'atk'an, chi amijatawk'atk'an ixpujun'alhincha kawalh. Chuncha kataxta'niyani an kimPay wa tuchicha yu k'ask'iniya'it la kintalakask'i.
43015017	Pus, yuchacha yu klajunaw li k'a'ilht'ut'it: Li k'alamap'aynip'axat'it.
43015018	"Li an yu tat'ajun lakaamunulhpa taxkayan, wa k'ap'ast'akt'itcha li kit'ini p'ulh kintaxkaylh.
43015019	Li wa de lakaamunulhpa k'a ix'unt'it, an lapanakni an yu ancha tat'ajun kaxtamapaynin, tacha yu'uncha talamapayniy. Pero uxitnan kit'ini klasakxtuw an tan wa lakaamunulhpa ixma'tawnat'it, xliyu an lakaamunulhpa taxkayancha, mu chaway uxitnan tucha de lakaamunulhpa'.
43015020	K'ap'ast'akt'iti tacha an klajuntaw: "An patrón yucha yu palay ay, jantu yu an ma'tsuku". Li kit'in kixtach'a'o'ay, uxitnan wachu k'ach'a'o'ak'ana'it'it; chi li talhakapu'ani an kinchiwinti, wachu katalhakapu'ana an minchiwintik'an.
43015021	Pero chux t'ach'a aniy k'a'ilht'uk'ana'it kilakata, mu ntu tamispayi an yu kimala'achatachalh.
43015022	"Jantu tu'u ixtalhitsukulh ixtala'alhink'an li ntu xakmilh jaxa'alana'. Pero chaway ixlakata an ixtala'alhink'an tucha lay ta katitanawlh;
43015023	mu yu an kintaxkajiy, wachu taxkajiya an kimPay.
43015024	Jantu tu'u ixtalhitawk'alh li ntu tu'u ixtala'ts'ilh yu iklak'ilhtulh tanlhun, yu ntu xamati lay ilhtuy; pero chaway tala'ts'intacha. Walh masi chuncha kintaxkajiy chi an kimPay wachu taxkajiy.
43015025	Pero aniy chunchacha tapasay, wa xliyu katapasaya an tacha ts'o'muk'akanta chiwinti an la ixlamap'a'sink'an yu'uncha, tan najun: 'Jantu tu'u ixlakata, walh kintaxkajiy'.
43015026	Pero akxni kaminacha an yu katalhi'a'tayjuyan, an yu aklamakminitacha'aw; la ixtalakask'i an kimPay, an ixTakuwin yu sawalh, yu kaminanta tan wilhchalh an kimPay, yucha kamasuya tichini kit'incha.
43015027	Chi uxitnan wachu akilalhichiwininaw, mu sta akxni ik'a'taynichalhi kilat'a'aklat'awnaw.
43016001	Aniy tanlhun klajuniw para li nt'u k'ama'ats'an'at'iti mijakiklaka'intik'an.
43016002	K'alakt'amakxt'uk'ana'it'iti an laka lakcha'a tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin, chi kachina panch'e'ex akxni masi yu katama'niyan kapast'ak'a li Diosi ma'ilhtuy.
43016003	Wa xliyu li ntu tamispayi an kimPay chi kit'in, xliyu chuncha katalhilaya'.
43016004	Aniy klajunaw para li akxni kachinacha an panch'e'ex, k'ap'ast'ak'a'itcha li xaklajuntawcha. Jantu klajuniwi p'ulhnaj, mu aniya xaklat'a'aklat'awnaw.
43016005	Pero chaway ikti'ancha t'atawlhna an yu kimakmintachalh, walh chi ntu xamati de uxitnan kilhisakmi tanchuncha ikti'an;
43016006	apalijcha wa la't'a'oxila'alhiyat'iti li chunchacha klajuniw.
43016007	Pero kit'in klajunaw yu sawalh: Oxi para uxitnani li kit'in ak'alh. Mu li ntu ak'alh, an yu katalhi'a'tayjuyan jantu katitala'min, pero li ak'ana, aklamakminitacha'aw.
43016008	Akxni kachinacha, oxi kajamasuniya an lapanakni aniy lakaamunulhpa tichini yu lhit'ajuncha ixtala'alhin chi yu jantu, chi tichini kamama'alh'ajniyacha Dios.
43016009	Yu lhit'ajuni ixtala'alhin yucha an yu ntu kinkiklaka'i;
43016010	yu ntu lhit'ajun ixtala'alhin, kit'in. Mu kit'in iktila'an an kimPay, chi ntucha ali akintilala'ts'iw.
43016011	Yu kala'a'iya lhima'alh'ajna, yucha an ch'alhkatnan aniy lakamunulhpa', an xapay makxkay un, yucha o'sliyancha kama'alh'ajnana'.
43016012	Lhuwka yu lay aklajuniw, pero yu chaway para uxitnan wanaj lhuw.
43016013	Akxni kamina an Stalan'a Takuwin yu sawalh, yucha katapulhi'anani tan oxi sawalh, mu ntu wa ix'akstucha katichiwinilh, yucha kanawna yu ka'asmat'anta, chi katamak'atsaaniyancha an yu kalaktapasaya'.
43016014	Yucha kamasuya an ki'alhp'asninti, mu kala'a'iya yu ki'anun chi katamasuniyan.
43016015	Chux an yu lhit'ajun an kimPay, wachu ki'anun; xliyu iklhinajun li an Stalan'a Takuwin kala'a'iya yu ki'anun chi katamasuniyan.
43016016	Wa lakats'unicha, jantucha akintilala'ts'iw, pero xli'astan lakats'uniy a'tam akilala'ts'impalaw.
43016017	Wa chuncha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús ixtalalhisakmipaxaycha, ixtalajuniy: —¿Tisuncha nawputun tacha an najuni? Wa lakats'uniycha ntucha akintilala'ts'iw, pero xli'astan lakats'uniy a'tam akilala'ts'impalaw, mu kit'in iktila'an an kimPay.
43016018	¿Tisuncha nawputun li "wa lakats'uniycha"? Jant'u k'alhimacha'xat'i.
43016019	Pus an Jesús lhimacha'xalhi li ixtalhisakmiputun, pus jajuniy: —Kit'in klajunaw li wa lakats'uniycha jantucha akintilala'ts'iw, chi li ka'ana lakats'uniy panch'e'ex akilala'ts'impalaw. ¿Yuch'a yu lalhisakmip'axayat?
43016020	Kit'in ijk'atsaycha li k'alaj'alhuna'it chi k'ala't'a'oxila'alhiya'it, pero an lapanakni yu aniy tat'ajun lakaamunulhpa wa katalaj'achana'. Pero masi uxitnan k'ala't'a'oxila'alhiya'it, aminta'oxila'alhitk'an achati kuna'.
43016021	Akxni xamati t'aku lhits'ukuy ixjas'at'a, ma'alh'ajnan; pero xli'astan akxni t'ajuncha an ixjas'at'a, jantucha pastakcho'oyi li ma'alh'ajnalh, mu achancha li tsukulhcha pumatam lapanaki aniy lakaamunulhpa'.
43016022	Chunchacha wachu chaway uxitnan, ma'alh'ajnanat'iti chaway; pero kit'in aklala'ts'incho'oyaw, akxni ka'achana mijalhunutk'an chi ntu xamati lay katitama'osunin mi'achatk'an.
43016023	Akxni ntucha tu'u akintilalhisakmiw. Watuchicha k'ask'iniya'it la kintalakask'i an kimPay, kataxta'niyan.
43016024	Sta chaway t'u t'u'u sk'int'at la kintalakask'i; k'ask'int'it walh k'ala'a'iya'it, para li a'tsayi k'alhits'uk'ut mi'achatk'an.
43016025	"Aniy tacha klaxa'alaw wanaj klapuxkawniw tu'u t'acha' laych'a k'alhimach'axat, pero mintacha panch'e'ex akxni ntucha aktilaxa'alaw wanaj laka pulhamacha'xan, ixla'ts'awalanticha aklajunaw ixlakata an kimPay.
43016026	Anchunu wilhchan akxni mi'akstuchak'ani k'ask'iniya'it la kintalakask'i an kimPay; jantucha klajunaw li kit'ini aksk'iniya an kimPay milakatak'an,
43016027	mu an kimPay yucha tamapayniyan. Tamapayniyan mu uxitnan kilamapayniyaw, chi mu uxitnan k'iklak'a'iyat'iti li kit'in Diosi kimakminta.
43016028	Ta'an wilhchalh an kimPayi iktaxtuchalh, para li akmilh aniy lakaamunulhpa', chi chaway ikmakawcho'oycha aniy lakaamunulhpa mu iktila'ancho'oycha an kimPay.
43016029	An ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tajuniy: —Chaway ixla'ts'awalanticha ch'iwint'a'un, jantucha wanaj tu'u kilalhixa'alayaw para li lay aklhimacha'xaw.
43016030	Chaway ijk'atsayawcha li k'ats'a'o'oyi an tanlhun, jant'u ma'lht'ask'iniya li xamati kalhisakmin. Chunchacha ikpukiklaka'iyaw li Diosi makmintacha'an.
43016031	An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Ah, pus chaway ka kilakiklaka'iyawcha?
43016032	Pus mintacha an panch'e'ex, chi chawaycha, akxni atamj atamjcha kala'ts'ina tanchuncha ka'ana', wa ki'akstu akilamakawnaw. Pero ntu wa ki'akstu ikt'ajun, mu an kimPay kint'a'aklat'ajun.
43016033	Tacha aniy klajunaw para li oxi akilat'a'aklatsukuw. An lakaamunulhpa k'ama'alh'ajnana'it'it, pero oximaj'ayi k'a'unt'it, kit'in iklhajatachalhcha an lakaamunulhpa'.
43017001	Akxni chunchacha chiwin'olh an Jesús, tala'st'alhcha an lakt'iyan, najun: —KimPay, an panch'e'ex chilhcha. K'amasut'icha aminTs'alh li ay, para li aminTs'alh wachucha kamasuni li ayk'at'i,
43017002	mu uxint'iy xt'a'nit'a lhich'alhkat aminTs'alh la ix'ukxnik'an an lapanakni, para li kajaxta'nilhi jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy an yu jama'axt'anit'a.
43017003	An jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy ixlakata li katamispani uxint'i, yu wa uxint'i Diosk'at'i sawalh, chi an Jesucristo, yu uxint'i mala'ach'at'achi'.
43017004	"Kit'in ikmasuncha aniy lakaamunulhpa li ayk'at'i, k'ilhtu'olhcha an tapatsat yu k'i'uni li ak'ilhtulh.
43017005	Pus chawayi kimPay, k'amasut'icha li k'ayi la mimpa'xti', tacha an kilhi'ay xakjunita la mimpa'xti akxni ntuka' ix'alin an lakaamunulhpa'.
43017006	An yu jasakxt'u lakaamunulhpa ch'i k'ijaxt'a'nincha, ijkamak'atsaanilhcha tichini uxint'icha. Minawini ixtajunita, chi k'ijaxt'a'nin, yu'uncha tama'ata an minchiwinti.
43017007	Chaway tak'atsaycha li chux an yu k'ixt'a'nin minawin;
43017008	mu an chiwinti an yu k'i'un ijk'amak'atsaanilhcha, chi yu'uncha tala'a'ilhcha, chi tak'atsaycha li sawalhi li t'an wilhchi ikminchalh, takiklaka'iya li uxint'i k'imakt'anchi'.
43017009	Ijkalhitapayniniyani ixlakatak'an an lapanakni an yu k'ijaxt'a'nin, mu minawinin, jantu yu ijkalhitapayniniyan an yu wa lakaamunulhpacha tat'ajun, an yu wa tachalayjcha talay.
43017010	Mu chux yu kinawin, minawin, chi yu minawin, kinawin; yu'unchacha taputasuy kinta'ayat.
43017011	Jantucha aniy lakaamunulhpa ali akti'aklatsukulh kit'in, pero yu'uncha chun, kit'in ak'antacha'ancha t'atawlhnin. Stalan'ak'at'i kimPay, an yu k'ijaxt'a'nit'acha k'ajama'at'i, mu uxint'i alhp'asnik'at'i, para li tachanu wa pumatamcha katawalh, tacha kitnan.
43017012	Akxni aniy lakaamunulhpa xajkat'a'aklat'ajun, kit'in ijkama'alhi la mintalakask'i; an yu k'ijaxt'a'nin, kit'in ijkama'alh chi ntu xamati ts'an'alh, wa yucha an yu ists'an'atacha, para li katapasalhi tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta.
43017013	Pero chaway akla'ancho'otacha'ancha, chi tuchi chunchacha iklhichiwint'ajun aniy lakaamunulhpa li anika ikt'ajun, para li a'tsayi wachu katalhitsukulh an ki'achat.
43017014	Ijkamak'atsaanilhcha yu'uncha aminchiwinti, pero sawalhcha jaxkaylhi an lapanakni an yu aniy tawilanalh lakamunulhpa', mu yu'uncha ntucha de aniy lakaamunulhpa', tacha kit'in tu kde aniy.
43017015	Jantu iksk'iniyan li k'ajamaxt'u an lakaamunulhpa', iksk'iniyan li k'ajalhist'akt'i, mu t'ajuniy an ayajk'atsan xapay makxkay un.
43017016	Tacha ki'tin tu aniy lakaamunulhpa kincha'a, yu'uncha wachu ntu aniy lakaamunulhpa ixcha'ak'an.
43017017	K'ajast'alan'at'icha an la minchiwinti yu sawalh; aminchiwinti yucha sawalh.
43017018	Tacha uxint'i k'imala'ach'achi aniy lakamunulhpa, wanajcha chuni yu'uncha, ijkamala'achalhi an lakaamunulhpa'.
43017019	Ixlakatachak'an yu'uncha li ikma'axt'a'a an kijatsukunti, para li yu'uncha wachucha katapustalan'alhi an yu sawalh chiwinti.
43017020	Chi ntu wa ix'akstuchak'an yu'uncha iklhisk'iniyan, wachu an yu wa akintakiklaka'iyaka', akxni kata'asmat'antacha tacha an katanawnanta.
43017021	Iklhisk'iniyan li ixchuxk'an watami katak'atsaalh, tacha uxint'iy kimPay, uxint'i kint'a'aklat'a'un chi kit'in ikt'a'aklat'awnan, yu'uncha wanajcha chuni akintat'a'aklatsukun, para li an lakaamunulhpa kakiklaka'ilhi li uxint'i k'imala'ach'achi'.
43017022	Ijkaxta'nilhi an alhp'asninti an t'ach'a k'ixt'a'nin, para li wa pumatami katawalh, tacha kitnan wa la'atami juntaw.
43017023	Kit'in ijkat'a'aklat'ajun chi uxint'i k'int'a'aklat'a'un, para li oxi wa tam katak'atsaalh, para li an lakaamunulhpa kak'atsaalh li uxint'i k'imala'ach'achi', ch'i li jamap'ayniya t'ach'a k'imap'ayniy.
43017024	KimPay, uxint'i k'ijaxt'a'nin chi klakask'ini li akintat'atawlhchalhi tan aktawlanta, para li katala'ts'ilhi an kinta'ayaxtu, yu uxint'i k'ixt'a'nin; mu uxint'i k'imap'aynit'i akxni ntuka' ix'ilhtukan an lakamunulhpa'.
43017025	Stlan'ak'at'i kimPay, ts'ajwi minchiwinti, an lakaamunulhpa ntu mispayan, pero kit'in ikmispayan, chi aniy wachu tamispayani li uxint'i k'imala'ach'achi'.
43017026	Mu ijkamak'atsaanilhcha tichini uxint'icha, chi aktaylhi'anaka', para li amijamapayninti yu k'imp'umap'aynit'a wachu katalhitsukulh, chi kit'in ajkat'a'aklatsukuya la ixjatsukuntik'an.
43018001	Xli'astan akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Jesús, jat'ataxtulhcha an ixt'alhtanan, jat'a'alhcha ixlitapiktutam la'x'ati junkan Cedrón, tan stak ixlakyalh olivo anchacha jat'apatanulh an ixt'alhtanan.
43018002	An Judas, an yu kama'axt'a'a an Jesús, wachu ixjamispanan, mu an Jesús a'lhuwcha ancha ixjat'ata'ayxt'o'a an ixt'alhtanan.
43018003	Pus an Judas jat'acha'alhcha ixluwk'an soldadojnin chi ixpoliciajnink'an an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an fariseojnin, ixtalaklhi'antacha ixpumaklhkuk'an chi k'iw yu ixlajkinkama'tajita chi ixpama'nink'an.
43018004	Pero mu an Jesús ixk'atsaycha tuchini katapasayacha, yuchacha p'ulhnaj jalakatastuklhi, jajuniy: —¿Tisiyuch'ach'a p'uxk'awyat'iti?
43018005	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Yucha an Jesús jamacha'a' Nazaret. An Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'in. An Judas an yu kama'axt'a'a wachucha ani ixjat'ayalh.
43018006	Akxni an Jesús jajunilh: "Kit'in", tataticho'olh chi lakaat'uni tatama'ochalh, tala'ta'a'talh.
43018007	An Jesús a'tam jalhisakmipalh: —¿Tisiyuch'ach'a p'uxk'awyat'iti? Yu'uncha a'tam tajumpalay: —Yucha an Jesús jamacha'a' azaret.
43018008	An Jesús jajuniy: —Klajunawcha li kit'in. Li kit'ini kilapuxkawyaw, ani ali'in k'ajamak'awnit'iti li kata'alh.
43018009	Tacha aniy nawlh wa xliyu li katapasalhi tacha an ixnajunta an Jesús, akxni nawlh: —"KimPay, an yu k'ijaxt'a'nin tu xamati ts'an'alh".
43018010	Wachuncha an Simón Pedro, ix'atu'uk'alh ma'atam ix'espada, xtalan xa'axtulh, chi xtalh akatuch'uk'up'uxli yu lhi'oxi ix'a'ax'olh an ixma'tsuku an xa'ay tukan sacerdote, an ma'tsuku ixjunkan Malco.
43018011	An Jesús juniy an Pedro: —¡K'amat'a'uch'o'o la xakubiertaj ami'espada! Li yucha an kimPaycha kixta'niy aniy suniya lhima'alh'ajnat ¿chu laycha jantucha aktila'a'ilh?
43018012	Wachuncha an soldadojnin, chi an ixcomandantejk'an, chi an ixpoliciajnink'an an judiojnin, tach'apayawlhcha an Jesús chi tach'ilhcha,
43018013	p'ulhnajcha talhi'anilh an Anás, mu ixput'ijo'at an Caifasi ixjunita, yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote ixjunita anchunu k'ata.
43018014	An Caifás yucha yu ixjajunita an judiojnin li palay oxi li wa pumatam lapanak kajalhinilh ixchuxk'an an lapanakni.
43018015	An Simón Pedro chi apumatam ixt'alhtana an Jesús ixtach'a'o'ata. An pumatam ixt'alhtana an Jesús t'atanuchalhi an la ixcha'a an xa'ay tukan sacerdote, mu yucha ixt'alamispay;
43018016	pero an Pedro wa ma'spacha tamakawchalh, laka malhticha. Pus an ixt'alhtana an Jesús an yu t'alamispay an xa'ay tukan sacerdote, taxtulh, t'achiwinilhi an t'aku yu ixjalhistaknan an laka malhticha, pus ma'anuchalhi an Pedro.
43018017	Wachuncha an t'aku an yu ixjalhistaknan an laka malhticha, juniy an Pedro: —¿Chu ntu wachu ixt'alhtanak'at'i an anu lapanak? Yucha najun: —Jantu, kit'in jantu.
43018018	Chi mu lhik'asnini ixjunita, an ma'tsukunin chi an yu ixtajalhistaknan an laka tajtan, ixta'ulatacha jikmi, anchacha ixtala's'ont'ajun. An Pedro wachucha aniy ixma'la's'onyalh.
43018019	An xa'ay tukan sacerdote lhisakmilhcha an Jesús ixlakatak'an an ixt'alhtanan chi tuchini yu ixmasuycha.
43018020	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Kit'in chux lakaamunulhpa ixlitalakasuni xajkaxa'alay. Jantu tu'u yu wa la'asa'nik'acha akchiwinilh, o'sliyan li tan pulakchiwin ch'a'a chi laka laktajtani xakmasuy, tan tata'ayxt'o'ojoy an judiojnin.
43018021	¿T'asu li k'it'inch'a k'ilhisakmiya? K'ajalhisakmit'icha an yu kinta'asmatnita, yu'unchacha katanawlh tuchini ijkalhixa'alatacha; yu'uncha tak'atsayi tuchini iknajuntacha.
43018022	Akxni chunchacha nawlh an Jesús, xapumatam an yu tajalhistaknan an laka tajtan lo'scha la'xtisalh, juniy: —¿Ch'unch'ach'a alht'ayst'uk'a an xa'ay tukan sacerdote?
43018023	An Jesús juniy: —Li ntu oxi yu iknawlh, k'anawcha tuchini chunchacha; pero li oxi, ¿t'asu li k'imuk'anicha?
43018024	Wachuncha an Anás, mak'alhcha an Jesús tan xwilhchalh an xa'ay sacerdote Caifás, tach'ilhi'anilhcha.
43018025	Walh an Pedro, anchaka' ixyalh ixma'la's'ont'ajun, pus tajuniy: —¿Chu ntu ixt'alhtanak'at'i wachu'? Yucha najun ma jantu, najun: —¡Jantu, kit'in jantu!
43018026	Walh pumatam ixma'tsuku an xa'ay tukan sacerdote, ixt'alalhila'ts'i an yu ix'akatuch'uk'up'uxta an Pedro, juniy: —¿Chu ntu uxint'i an ikt'ala'ts'in an tan lakyalh xak'iw olivo?
43018027	An Pedro a'tam nawpalh ma jantu, walh wa naw'olhka, t'asalhcha an puyux.
43018028	Tamaxtulhcha an Jesús an la ixcha'a an Caifás, talhi'alhcha la ixpalacio an jamach'alhkat. Chi mu ixtunkunmintacha, an judiojnin jantu tatanulhi an laka palacio, para li ntu katalhkilikilhi ixjatsukuntik'an chi chuncha layi katawaylh laka Paxku.
43018029	Wachuncha taxtulhcha an Pilato, chi jala'cha'alhcha, jajuniy: —¿T'isunch'a lhi'alht'asuyat aniy lapanaki?
43018030	Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Li ntu tu'u ilhtuy tala'alhin, jantu xaklama'axta'niw.
43018031	Pus an Pilato jajuniy: —K'alhip'inchi'itcha uxitnan, chi tacha najuntacha la milhamap'a'sink'ani k'ap'umama'alh'ajnichi'it. An judiojnin tajuniy: —Pero kitnan tu kintamakawnikanani li akma'niw xamati'.
43018032	Chunchacha tanawlh para li katapasalhcha tacha an ixnajunta an Jesús, tani kapuniyacha.
43018033	Wachuncha an Pilato tanupalhi an laka palacio, chi t'asanilhcha an Jesús, juniy: —¿Uxint'i ixrejk'an judiojnin?
43018034	An Jesús juniy: —¿Wa mi'akst'uch'a k'ilhisakmiy u xamati'ini talhixa'alatan kit'in?
43018035	An Pilato juniy: —¿Chu sna ikjudio? Amint'amacha'an chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin yu'uncha tama'axt'a'an la kimakni. ¿T'isunch'a ilht'ut'a?
43018036	An Jesús juniy: —An kilhich'alhkat jantu de aniy lakamunulhpa'; li de aniy lakamunulhpa ka ixwalh kilhich'alhkat, an ki'a'tayjunin ka ixtalhilasalhi para li ntu akma'axta'kalh la ixmaknik'an an judiojnin; pero an kilhich'alhkat jantu de aniy.
43018037	Pus an Pilato juniy: —¿Pus, uxint'i ka Rejk'at'i? An Jesús alhtaylh, juniy: —Kit'in ikRey, tacha uxint'ich'a nawt'a'un. Kit'in para yucha iklhitsukulh chi yucha kla'minta aniy lakamunulhpa': para li aklhichiwinilhi an yu sawalh. Wa tichicha yu sawalhi tan t'ajun, asmat'a an kinchiwinti.
43018038	An Pilato juniy: —¿Tisuncha yu sawalhi? Chi akxni chunchacha nawlh, taxtupalh, jala'ampalhi tan ixtayanalh an judiojnin, chi jajuniy: —Kit'in tu tu'u kla'cha'anini ixtala'alhin.
43018039	Pero uxitnan ch'unch'a lhismanit'at li klamakawniyaw pumatam tach'in akxni Paxku. ¿La'a'iyat'iti li aklamakawniwi an ixRejk'an judiojnin?
43018040	Wachuncha ixchuxk'an a'tami p'as talakt'asapalh, tanajun: —¡Aniy jantu! ¡Yucha an Barrabascha! An Barrabás, pumatam ja'alhawna ixjunita.
43019001	Pus wachuncha an Pilato lhinawlhcha li kala'ana'makalhcha an Jesús.
43019002	An soldadojnin tala'oxilhcha la'atam corona de jalhtukun chi tama'tanulhcha chi tamala'ch'inilhcha la'atam ixla'ch'it yu slapulh,
43019003	ixtajuniy: —¡K'ajama'alht'axt'uncha ixrejk'an judiojnin! Chi lo's lo'scha, ixtala'xtisay.
43019004	An Pilato a'tam taxtupalhchilh chi jajuniy: —Jo' k'ala'ts'int'it, aniy klalhiminitaw, para li k'ak'ats'at'iti li ntu tu'u kla'cha'anini ixtala'alhin.
43019005	Pus taxtulhcha an Jesús, ixtama'tanutacha an corona de jalhtukun, chi an slapulh la'ch'it ixtamala'ch'initacha. Chi an Pilato jajuniy: —¡Jo' anich'a lhit'awnat'iti aniy lapanak!
43019006	Akxni tala'ts'ilhi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an yu ixtajalhistaknan laka tajtan, tsukulhcha talakt'asay, ixtalaknajun: —¡K'amakxt'ukmuk'acha laka cruz! ¡K'amakxt'ukmuk'acha laka cruz! An Pilato jajuniy: —K'alhip'inchi'itcha uxitnan, uxitnanch'a k'amakxt'ukmuk'at, mu kit'in tu tu'u kla'cha'anini ixtala'alhin.
43019007	An judiojnin ta'alhtaylh: —Kitnan iklhit'awnaw la'atam lhamap'a'sin tan chuncha t'acha'an li kanilh, mu yucha wa ix'akstucha najun li isTs'alh Dios.
43019008	Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an Pilato, palaycha talhanalh.
43019009	Pus a'tam tanupalhi an laka palacio chi juniy an Jesús: —¿T'anisch'a t'ant'achi'? Pero an Jesús tu alhtaylh.
43019010	Wachuncha an Pilato juniy: —¿Jant'u ak'int'i'alht'ay? ¿Jant'u k'ats'ayi li iklhit'ajuni lhich'alhkat li akmakxtukmuk'an u li akmakajun k'ap'it'i?
43019011	An Jesús alhtaylh, juniy: —Jant'u t'u'u ixlits'uk'u lhich'alhkat yu xak'imp'ut'alaxt'uk'u li ntu awint'i talhmani ixmakt'anik'anchi', xliyu an yu kima'axta'lhi la mimaka, palay ay tala'alhini lhit'ajun.
43019012	Pus wa akxni an Pilato ixmakawputuncha an Jesús, pero an judiojnin p'asi tamat'asalh, tajuniy: —¡Li k'amak'awna'a, ntu mi'amigojo an César! ¡Wa tichicha yu jun rey, ixt'alaxkaycha an César!
43019013	Pus an Pilato akxni chunchacha ja'alha'asmatlhi, ma'spacha lhi'alh an Jesús, chi tawilhcha an tan tawlay juez, aniy tan ixwilh ixjunkan ja'axi'ulanti de chiwx laka lhihebreo junkan Gabata.
43019014	Akxni chuncha tapasalh, ka tacha ix'atunkunt'ajuncha, chi katunkunanta Paxkucha. An Pilato jajuniy an judiojnin: —¡Ni'ijcha amiRejk'an!
43019015	Pero yu'uncha talakt'asalh tanajun: —¡Jantu, jantu, k'amakxt'ukmuk'acha laka cruz! An Pilato jajuniy: —¿Akmakxtukmuk'alhchaa amiRejk'an? An xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —Kitnan tu xamati iklhit'awpalaw pumatam kirrejk'an, wa yucha an César.
43019016	Pus wachuncha an Pilato jama'axta'nilhcha an Jesús para li katamakxtukmuk'alhcha, chi talhi'alhcha.
43019017	A'x'o'alhi'alhcha an ixcruz, tanchun junkan la ixla'pa'axi sue'elukut, lhihebreo junkan, Gólgota.
43019018	Anchacha tamakxtukmuk'alh, chi tichi yu'uncha ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni wachu jamakxtukmuk'ak'alh, tapiktutamincha jayawnikalh an Jesús, chi an Jesús tan'ajnicha lhitamakawlh.
43019019	An Pilato ts'o'lhicha jats'o'nut, chi lhinawlhcha li ka'akpuxtukmuk'akalhcha an ixcruz Jesús, tan najunta: ''JESUS JAMACHA'A NAZARET, IXREJK'AN JUDIOJNIN''.
43019020	Ixluwk'an an judiojnini tapunawlh an tacha ists'o'nikanta; mu an tan makxtukmuk'akalh an Jesús, wa niya ixlitamakajun an la'acha'an; an tacha ists'o'nikanta, lhihebreo, lhigriego chi lhilatín.
43019021	An xalaj'ajin isacerdotejnink'an judiojnin tajuniy an Pilato: —Jant'u k'ats'o't'i li ixrejk'an judiojnin, k'ats'o't'i, yu najun li ma ixrejk'an judiojnin.
43019022	Pero an Pilato jajuniy: —Yu ikts'o'tacha, ikts'o'tacha.
43019023	Akxni an soldadojnin tamakxtukmuk'a'olhcha an Jesús, taxa'a'inilhcha an yu ixma'amo'slay ixla'ch'it, aklht'at'icha ta'ilhtunilh chi pumatamjtamincha taxa'a'ilh. Chi an la'atam ixla'ch'it wachu taxa'a'inipalh, chi mu wanaj wa ixpusani'okanta, talhman sta talaktsin, jantu wa ixla'ts'ap'ankanta,
43019024	pus an soldadojnin talajuniy: —Jantu kalaj'ex'wi, wa ka'amanaw suerte, a ver tichini kalhi'anacha. Pus chunchacha ta'ilhtulh. Chi chunchacha tapasalh sawalh tacha an najunta tan ts'o'muk'akanta: Talamala'pitsilhi an yu xakma'amo'slay kila'ch'it, chi an yu xakmatan'anuta kila'ch'it, talhi'amanalhcha suerte.
43019025	Wani an la ixcruz an Jesús ancha ixtayanalh an ixnati, chi an ixt'alajamatsancha an ixnati, an María, ixt'iwi Cleofas, chi an María Magdalena.
43019026	Akxni an Jesús la'ts'ilhi an ixnati, chi la'ts'ilhi an ixt'alhtana yu ixmapayniy li ancha ixyalh, juniy an ixnati: —Anchunu yalh, mints'alh.
43019027	Chi an ixt'alhtana yucha juniy: —Anchunu yalh, minati. Pus sta akxni an ixt'alhtana an Jesús, tacha ixnaticha la'a'ilh la ixcha'a'.
43019028	Xli'astan, mu k'atsaycha an Jesús li chuxcha tapasa'olh, chi para li katapasalhi tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta, najun: —Ijkikxixa.
43019029	Walh wa ancha ixwilh la'atam xaluj snap'a' ix'a'tsamanta si vinagre, pus yu'uncha tamala'ch'uch'uwanilh la'atam watacha panimak, chi takinkach'imuk'anilhcha llaka ma'atam wa tacha k'iw, talhi'anilhcha an la ixkilhni,
43019030	pus otlhicha an Jesús, xli'astan najun: —Tapasa'olhcha. Pus lilijcha ma'alhtajulhi an ix'a'tsulh, ma'axta'lhicha an ixtakuwin.
43019031	Akxni chuncha tapasalh akxni ixmala'asijnikancha ixpaku Paxku, katunkuna Paxkucha, pus para li ntu katatamakawtawk'alhi la ixcruzk'an akxni ntu tapatsakan an yu ixjamakxtukmuk'akanta, an judiojnin tatapayninilhi an Pilato li kajalaj'atut'e'ek'alh chi kajap'uxk'alhcha an la ixcruzk'an, mu akxni ntu ixtapatsakan sawalhcha ay wilhchani para yu'uncha.
43019032	Pus ta'alhcha an soldadojnin chi talaj'atut'e'elhcha an pumatam, chi an pumatam wanajcha chun, an yu wachu ixt'amakxtukmuk'akanta an Jesús.
43019033	Pero akxni tala'cha'alh an Jesús, mu tala'ts'incha li nitacha, jantucha talaj'atut'e'elhi yucha.
43019034	Pero xapumatam an soldadojnin lit pajalhto'olhi an Jesús, pus watukan taxtunilhi xak'alhni chi xkan.
43019035	An yu la'ts'ilh tacha an tapasalh, yuchaa najun; chi tacha an najun, sawalh, yucha k'atsayi li sawalhi an yu najun, para li uxitnan wachu k'ak'iklak'a'it'it,
43019036	mu tacha aniy laktapasalh wa xliyu li katapasalhi an tacha ts'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: "Jantu katit'e'enikalhi ixjalukut".
43019037	Chi lakatam nawpalata: "K'ala'ts'ina'it'iti an yu pajalhto'okalh".
43019038	Xli'astan akxni chunchacha tapasa'olh, an José, jamacha'a Arimatea, ixt'alhtana ixjunita an Jesús, wa la'asa' mu ixjatalhamni an judiojnin, tapaynisk'inilhi an ixlakatunaj an Jesús an Pilato, pus an Pilato makawnilh. Wachuncha alhcha ma'alhtajunu chi lhi'alhcha an ixlakatunaj an Jesús.
43019039	Walh wachu cha'alhi an Nicodemo, yu an ixlip'ulhnaj ixla'pixiyalhnanta an Jesús la'atam jatats'isni, ixli'antacha yu ixlalhiyajuta perjume la'stu de jach'itin yu junkan mirraj chi de áloe, ka tacha 30 kilo.
