43019040	Pus tsukulhcha tala'apach'iya an ixlakatunaj an Jesús laka la'lhman la'ch'it chi ixtalakamuk'aycha an perjume, tacha ixtalhilanicha ixtalamaknuy an judiojnin.
43019041	An tan makxtukmuk'ak'alh an Jesús ixlakyalh k'iw, chi ancha ix'ilhtukanta la'atam sast'i puta'aknun, jantuka' k'is xamati ixmaknukan.
43019042	Pus anchacha tamaknulh an Jesús, mu ancha wa niya ixlitamakajun, chi mu akxni ixla'asijt'awkancha ixlakata ixPaxkuk'an an judiojnin.
43020001	Yu p'ulhnajcha wilhchan akxni sast'icha a'taynicho'olh samana, an María Magdalena alhi wats'isin masi puts'istaka an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús, walh akxni la'ts'in ma'osunikanta an chiwx an yu ixpu'o'xt'alhnikanta an tan ix'aknuy.
43020002	Wachuncha jats'alaj'ancho'olh, alhi an tan ixtawilananchalh an Simón Pedro chi an pumatam ixt'alhtana an Jesús an yu sawalh ixmapayniy, chi jajuniy: —¡Maxtukanta an jamach'alhkat Jesús an tan ix'aknuy, chi ntu jk'atsayaw tanchuncha lhi'ankalh!
43020003	Pus an Pedro chi an pumatam ixt'alhtana an Jesús ta'alhi an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús.
43020004	An ixt'uyunk'an wa lakatami ixtalakats'alaj'anta, pero an pumatam ixt'alhtana an Jesús palay p'asi jats'alalh, an Pedro jantu, pus p'ulhnaja cha'alh an pumatam.
43020005	Akxni cha'alhcha, la'ts'incha an la'sliwilh la'ch'it li anchacha ixlakmamakanta, pero ntu tanulh.
43020006	Xli'astan cha'alhcha wachu an Simón Pedro, yucha tanulhi an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús chi wachucha la'ts'ilhi an la'sliwilh la'ch'it li anchacha ixlakmakawnukanta,
43020007	chi an la'ch'it an yu ixpula'pamilhkanta an Jesús jantu wa lakatami ixt'amamakanta an la'sliwilh la'ch'it yucha lakatami ixpasmilhmakanta.
43020008	Wachuncha wachucha tanulhi an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús an pumatam ixt'alhana', an yu p'ulhnaj ixcha'anta; chi la'ts'ilhcha tacha an ixtapasata, pus kiklaka'ilhcha.
43020009	Mu ntuka' ixtalhimacha'xayi tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta la ixchiwinti Dios, tan najun li an Jesús kala'awcho'oya an tan tamanalh janinin.
43020010	Wachuncha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús ta'ancho'olhcha ixcha'ak'an.
43020011	Pero an María ancha tamakawtayalh ix'alhujyalh, wani an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús. Yucha ix'alhunt'ajunka, walh ta'antalh para li kala'ts'ilhi an ixpulakni an puta'aknun,
43020012	walh jala'ts'ilh ixt'uyunk'an angelhnin, la'sut'ut'u ixla'ch'itk'an, an pumatam lhilax'akpuxnicha an tan ixmalh an Jesúsi ixwilh chi an pumatam lhilaxjach'ajacha.
43020013	Chi tajuniy an María: —¿T'asu li alhuncha? Yucha jajuniy: —Wa xliyu li tamaxtuta an kiJamach'alhkat Jesús chi ntu ijk'atsay tanchuncha tamaka'alh.
43020014	Wachunchaka naw'olh, akxni talakatiyawpalh la'ts'ilhcha an Jesús li ancha ixyalh, pero ntu ixk'atsay li yucha an Jesús.
43020015	An Jesús juniy: —¿T'asu li alhuncha? ¿Tisiyuch'ach'a p'uxk'a'uy? An María ixnajun li yucha an lhist'ak'acha palakch'anan, pus juniy: —Li sna uxint'i lhip'i, ak'i'uni t'anch'unch'a mak'ap'i, aklhi'ana'.
43020016	An Jesús juniy: —¡María! Pus an María akxni lats'impalh juniy: —¡Maestro!
43020017	An Jesús juniy: —¡Jant'u ak'ilak'ach'ap'a! mu ntuka' ikla'ani an kimPay anu talhman. Pero k'ap'inchi jajunini an kijat'ala'awnin, li ikti'ancha tan wilhchalh an kimPay chi mimPayk'an, an kiDios chi miDiosk'an.
43020018	Pus wachuncha an María Magdalena alhcha jajunini an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, li yucha la'ts'ilhcha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús chi jajunilhcha wachu tani junikalhcha.
43020019	Wa yuchaka anchunu wilhchan yu a'taynicho'olhcha sast'i samana, akxni tats'isilhcha, an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús ixta'ayxto'nuncha chi ixtamalaklhchaw'ojotacha an lakalakmalhticha, mu ixtatalhamniya an judiojnin. An Jesús tanuchalh chi ixtan'ajnichak'ani tayachalh, jajuniy: —¡Oxicha k'ats'uk'ut uxitnan!
43020020	Akxni chunchacha nawlh, jamasunilhcha an ixlakmaka chi an ixpaja'elhni. Pus an ixt'alhtanan sawalhcha talaj'achalhi akxni tala'ts'ilhcha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
43020021	Xli'astan an Jesús a'tam jajumpalh: —¡Oxicha k'ats'uk'ut uxitnan! Tacha kimala'achachalh an kimPay, wachu chuni iklamala'achayaw.
43020022	Wachuncha jasunulhcha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús chi jajuniy: —K'ala'a'itcha an ixTakuwin Dios.
43020023	Yu k'ajamala'mixiniya'it'iti ixtala'alhink'an, kajamala'mixinikana', chi yu nt'u k'at'ijamala'mixinit'it, jantu katijamala'mixinikalh.
43020024	Xapumatam an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, yu ixjunkan Tomás, yu ixtajumpalay lhist'uy, jantu aniy ixjat'aaklat'ajun an ali'in akxni jala'cha'alh an Jesús.
43020025	Xli'astan an ali'in ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tajuniy: —Ikla'ts'iwi an Jamach'alhkat Jesús. Pero an Tomás ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Li ntu kla'ma'la'ts'ini an la ixlakmaka tan lakmakmak'atsanita klavos chi li ntu iktamaknuyi an kimaka, jantu aktikiklaka'ilh chi li ntu ikpajatamaknuyi an la ixpaja'elhni.
43020026	La'atsajincha wilhchan la'pusli, an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús a'tamcha ixta'ayxto'numpalayi an lakacha'a', akxni anchacha ixma'wilh an Tomás wachu'. An malhticha ixlaklaklhchaw'ojoy, pero an Jesús tanuchalh, ixtan'ajnichak'ani japujatayalh chi jala'axa'alalhcha, jajuniy: —¡Oxicha k'ats'uk'ut'it uxitnan!
43020027	Xli'astan an Jesús juniy an Tomás: —K'at'amaknut'icha amimaka aniy, chi ak'ila'ma'la'ts'icha. Chi k'alhip'icha amimaka la kimpaja'elhni, k'at'amaknut'icha. Jant'u ch'uni k'alat'i li nt'u jak'iklak'a'inin, k'ajak'iklak'a'in.
43020028	Wachuncha an Tomás alhtaylh chi juniy: —¡KiJamach'alhkat chi kiDios!
43020029	An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Mu k'ila'ts'incha Tomás, pus k'iklak'a'iycha. Sawalhcha oxi para yu'uncha an yu kintakiklaka'iy masi ntu kintala'ts'inta.
43020030	An Jesús tipalhuwi masupalh yu la'lhi'a'nin la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an ixt'alhtanan, pero yucha ntu tu'u ts'o'muk'akanta aniy laka libro.
43020031	Pero aniy ts'o'muk'akalhi para li uxitnan k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti li an Jesús yucha Cristo, isTs'alh Dios, ch'i li k'iklak'a'iyatcha k'ap'ulhits'uk'uya'it'iti jatsukunti.
43021001	Xli'astan an Jesús jatalakasunipalhcha a'tami an ixt'alhtanan wani an lakxkan tan junkan Tiberias. Chunchunicha tapasalh:
43021002	Wa lakatami ixtat'aw'ojoy, ancha ixt'ajun an Simón Pedro, chi an Tomás, yu ixtajuniy lhist'uy, chi Natanael, jamacha'a Caná xalakaat'un Galilea, chi an ists'alan Zebedeo chi ixt'uyunk'an ali'in ixt'alhtanan an Jesús.
43021003	An Simón Pedro jajuniy: —Ikti'an jach'apayawna jatanti. Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh: —Wachu aklat'a'anaw. Pus ta'alhcha chi taputajulhcha la'atam barco; pero anchunu jatats'isni akxni ntu tu'u tach'apayawlh jatanti.
43021004	Akxni tsukulhcha tunkuncho'oy, an Jesús talakasulhcha an japiktu', pero an ixt'alhtanan jantu ixtak'atsay li yucha.
43021005	An Jesús jajuniy: —Ts'alan, ¿jant'u t'u'u lhit'awnat jatanti? Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Jantu.
43021006	Pus jajuniy: —An lhitan'oxi ixpa'xti an barcojo k'amu'ut an minpaxo'tank'an ancha k'ach'ap'ayawya'it'it. Pus chunchacha ta'ilhtulh, walh xli'astan tucha lay ixtamakutuyi an ixpaxo'tank'an mu wanajcha lhuw jatanti ixtama'alhilata.
43021007	Wachuncha an ixt'alhtana an Jesús an yu sawalh ixmapayniy, juniy an Pedro: —¡Yucha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús! Wa yucha asmatlhi an Simón Pedro li yucha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, las mala'ch'inilh, mu wa alhalha ixjunita, chi chamancha alhi an lakxkan para li kacha'alh an la ixpiktu'.
43021008	An ali'in ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tacha'alhcha an la ixpiktu an lakxkan an laka barco, katacha cien metrojo ixlitamakajun tan ixtat'awnachalh, taxa'amalhicha'alhcha an paxo'tan la'stu jatanti ix'a'tsamanta.
43021009	Akxni tatayachalhcha lakaat'un, tala'ts'in ulakantacha jikmi chi ukxmuk'akantacha la'atam jatanti chi pan.
43021010	An Jesús jajuniy: —K'alhit'at la'atam la'at'uyi an jatanti yu wa jach'ap'aya'utka'.
43021011	An Simón Pedro tawk'alhi an laka barco chi xa'alhicha'alhcha an paxo'tan an la ixpiktu an lakxkan, la'stu laj'ay jatanti ixtaputajumanalh, ciento cincuenta y tres; chi masi lhuw, an paxo'tan tu ta'exli.
43021012	An Jesús jajuniy: —K'at'atcha lakwaynin. Jantu k'is xamati an ixt'alhtanan katapujulh kalhisakmilh tichini yuchacha, mu ixtak'atsayi li yucha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
43021013	An Jesús stalh alh chi xa'a'ilhcha an pan chi jaxta'nilhcha, chi an jatanti wanajcha chun.
43021014	Aniy ixli'a't'utucha ixjatalakasuni an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús akxni ixla'awcho'otacha.
43021015	Akxni talakway'olhcha, an Jesús lhisakmiycha an Simón Pedro, juniy: —Simón, ists'alh Jonás, ¿k'imap'ayni palayi kit'in, palay jantu aniy tayanalh? An Pedro alhtaylh juniy: —Chuni, Jamach'alhkat Jesús, uxint'i k'ats'ayi li ikmapayniyan. An Jesús juniy: —K'ajalhist'akt'i an kiborregojnin.
43021016	A'tam lhisakmipalh: —Simón, ists'alh Jonás, ¿k'imap'ayni? An Pedro juniy: —Chuni, Jamach'alhkat Jesús, uxint'i k'ats'ayi li ikmapayniyan. An Jesús juniy: —K'ajalhist'akt'i an kiborregojnin.
43021017	Ixlipu'a't'utucha lhisakmilh juniy: —Simón, ists'alh Jonás, ¿k'imap'ayni? An Pedro ixta'oxila'alhicha mu a't'utucha lhisakmilh li sna mapayniy, pus juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, uxint'i k'ats'a'o'oy; uxint'i k'ats'ayi li ikmapayniyan. An Jesús juniy: —K'ajalhist'akt'i an kiborregojnin.
43021018	Sawalhi an yu ijkunan, akxni palayka' ts'alh ix'unit'a, ixmala'ch'inini para li k'ap'it'icha t'anch'unch'a ixk'uxap'in; pero akxni k'at'ap'ap'aya'acha, k'alaklats'awalaya'a amimaka chi pumatami kamala'ch'iniyan chi kalhi'anani t'an t'u k'a ixk'uxap'i.
43021019	Akxni chunchacha nawlh an Jesús, ixnawt'ajun tani kaniyacha an Pedro, chi li chuncha kapumasuya an Pedro li an Dios yucha ay. Xli'astan juniy: —¡Ak'inch'a'o'a!
43021020	Tala'asp'itlhi an Pedro la'ts'in li an yu sawalh ixmapayniy an ixt'alhtana an Jesús ixjach'a'o'ata, an yu akxni ixtalakwajinta puts'ista an Jesús, ixpiktumalh chi ixlisakmita: "Jamach'alhkat, ¿tisiyuchacha yu kama'axt'a'an?"
43021021	Akxni la'ts'ilh an Pedro juniy an Jesús: —Jamach'alhkat, chi anu ¿tasu kalayacha?
43021022	An Jesús alhtaylh: —Li iknajuni li katsukulhi sta akxni akmincho'oya, yucha ntucha minkwentaj, uxint'i wa ak'inch'a'o'acha.
43021023	Wachuncha, tacha aniy nawlh an Jesús, wanaj talamak'atsaani'olhi an ixlapanakni an Jesús li ma ntu katinilhi anchunu ixt'alhtana'. Pero an Jesús jantu chuni juniy li ntu katinilh, an Jesús yucha najun: "Li kit'ini iknajun li katsukulhi sta akxni akmincho'oya, yucha ntucha minkwentaj".
43021024	Wanaj kit'in, ixt'alhtana an Jesusi yu iknajun tacha an laktapasalh chi kit'ini ikts'o'lhi, chi k'atsayawi li an yu iknajun, sawalh.
43021025	Chi wanaj lhuw tanlhuni yu ilhtupalh an Jesús, li wa ka ists'o'muk'a'okalhcha la'atam la'atam tacha an lak'ilhtulh, kit'in iknajun ka ntucha inta ka ixlitamalh aniy lakaamunulhpa an libro tacha an ists'o'kalh.
44001001	Teófilo, an p'ulhnaj libro ikts'o'lhi ancha lhichiwin'ojota chux yu a'taynilhcha lak'ilhtuy an Jesús chi yu ixmasuycha,
44001002	sta akxni alhcha an lakt'iyan. Pero akxni ntuka' ix'an jajunilhcha an ixt'alhtanan an yu ixjasakxtuta, tuchini yu kata'ilhtuyacha, yucha an Ixtakuwin Diosi japuxa'alalh.
44001003	Xli'astan akxni la'awcho'olhcha an Jesús, jatalakasunilhi an ixt'alhtanan, chunchacha japumak'atsaanilh oxi li yucha la'ajunta. T'up'uxam (40) wilhchani jatalakasunilh chi ixjalhixa'alaycha an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
44001004	Akxni anchaka ixjat'a'aklat'ajun an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jajuniy li an la'acha'an Jerusalén jantu katataxtulh, jajuniy: —K'ap'akxan'it'iti an yu iklajuntaw li katamakminiyan an kimPay.
44001005	Chun sawalh an jama'paxanaj Juan wa laka xkani jama'paxanalh, pero uxitnan wa lakats'unicha wilhchani tats'an'aniyan k'a'a'p'axa'itcha laka Stalan'a Takuwin.
44001006	An yu ancha ixtat'a'ayxto'nun an Jesús, talhisakmi tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ¿chawaycha akilaxta'nicho'oyaw kijamach'alhkatk'an an la'acha'an Israel?
44001007	Yucha ja'alhtaylh: —Uxitnan jantu layi k'at'ik'ats'at'itcha tuchi wilhchancha u panch'e'excha chuncha kuna', yucha an kimPayi yu ka'ilhtuya'.
44001008	Pero uxitnan akxni katala'chinancha an Stalan'a Takuwin, laj'alhp'asch'a k'una'it. Akila'anawcha lhichiwinini an la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi chux xalakaat'un Judea, chi xalakaat'un Samaria, chi sta masi tan ma'at tukan laklhitamakajun aniy lakaamulhpa'.
44001009	Akxni chunchacha jajunilh an Jesús, wakcha tach'ixli chi sa'cha ixtala'ts'imaka'an, walh matanchanilhcha la'atam jataputs'i chi ntucha lay ali tala'ts'ilh.
44001010	Chi akxni sa'cha ixtala'ts'imaka'ani an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús an lakt'iyan, an tan ixtalakyanalh tatalakasulhcha ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni, wa la'sut'ut'ucha an ixla'ch'itk'an.
44001011	Chi jajunkan an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús: —Jamacha'an Galilea, ¿tasu li wa sa'ch'a t'ala'st'ayat'iti an lakt'iyani? Ani Jesús yu ixtat'a'aklat'awnan, yu lhi'ankalhcha lakt'iyan, chuncha kamimpala', t'ach'a la'ts'int'it alh an lakt'iyan.
44001012	Wachuncha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús an a'stitawk'a tan junkan lakaa'olivojnini ixtat'awnachalh, chi ancha ta'alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, mu waniya ixlitamakajun, yu lay chuncha ixjalhtanankan akxni jastaknankan.
44001013	Akxni tacha'alhcha an la'acha'an, tatawk'achalhcha an tan ixtawilanalh, tan talhman lakacha'a', yu'uncha an Pedro, chi Juan, chi Santiago, chi Andrés, chi Felipe, chi Tomás, chi Bartolomé, chi Mateo, chi Santiago, ists'alh tichi lapanak junkan Alfeo, chi Simón yu ixtajumpalay ma Zelote, chi Judas, ists'alh tichi lapanak junkan Santiago.
44001014	Ixchuxk'an yu'uncha lhilhiji ixtata'ayxt'o'a, ixtatapayni, chi wachu ani ixtama'ta'ayxt'o'a ali'in t'akunin, ancha ixma'ta'ayxt'o'a an Maria, ixnati an Jesús chi an ixjat'ala'awnin.
44001015	Anchunu wilhchan an Pedro tayalhi la xpujank'an an yu ixta'ayxto'nun ixlapanakni an Jesús, katacha tamciento apumap'uxam (120) lapanakni, chi jajuniy:
44001016	—Kint'ala'awnin, ixlitask'iniya li chuncha kaxtapasalh tacha an ixnajuntacha an David akxni machiwinilh an Stalan'a Takuwin. Yucha lhichiwinilhi an Judas yu jatap'ulhnilh an lapanakni an yu tach'apayawlh an Jesús,
44001017	masi yucha xkintalhit'aput'e'ekanan chi wachu yu tapatsati ix'ilhtuy an tacha ilhtuyaw.
44001018	Aniy lapanak akxni ilhtulhcha an tala'alhin jama'lhtayanalhcha tumin chi lhitamawlhcha lakatam lakaat'un. Chi akxni patajulhcha an tan ixch'ikilhtakanta ix'akstu, ix'a'tsulhi putamachalh chi wanaj tatan'exli, p'ut'un putaxtu'olhi an ixpaluw.
44001019	Akxni tak'atsalhi an jamacha'an Jerusalén, anchunu lakaat'un talhimapa'a'ulh la ixlichiwink'an, Acéldama (nawputun ´´lakaat'un de jak'alhni.´´)
44001020	Mu ts'o'muk'akanta an laka libro yu junkan Salmos tan najunta: Wanaj kasa' walhi an la ixcha'a', Chi ntu k'is xamati katawilh ancha. Chi najun: Pumatamcha ka'a'ch'apanicho'olh an ixtapatsat.
44001021	Lhitask'iniya li ani lapanakni yu lhilhij kintat'a'aklat'awnan sta akxni an Jamach'alhkat Jesús kixtat'a'aklat'awnan,
44001022	kasakxtu pumatami yu wachu kanawna li la'ts'ilhi li la'awcho'olhi an Jesús. Mu ani lapanakni kintat'a'aklat'awnani sta akxni ixjama'paxanan an Juan sta wa akxni lhi'ankalhcha anu talhman an Jesús.
44001023	Pus tasakxtulhcha ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni: Pumatam ixjunkan José, yu ixtajumpalay Barsabás chi xtajumpalay justo, chi pumatam ixjunkan Matías.
44001024	Chi xli'astan tatapayninilhcha an Dios, tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat Dios, uxint'i jamisp'ani'o'oyi ixjalhunutk'an ixchuxk'an an lapanakni. Akilamasuniwi t'ich'ini yu sakxt'uycha ani ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni,
44001025	walh lani wachucha mintamala'achani kawalh, tacha kitnan, chi wachucha chuni katapatsalh. Mu an Judas yucha ts'antijlalhi la xtala'alhin chi makawpulalhcha an ixtapatsat, pus alhcha tan lhitamakawni.
44001026	Wachuncha an ixt'uyunk'an an yu jasakxtukalh, jats'o'muk'anikalhcha xta'a'utk'an chi yu ch'apakanchalh, yuchacha yu junlhi ixt'alhtana an Jesús. Yucha an Matiasi walh, pus wa akxni jalhit'aput'e'ekalhcha an ixpumakawtamk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús.
44002001	Alin ixk'atank'an an israelitajnin yu junkan Pentecostés. Akxni chilhcha anchunu k'atan wa lakatami ixta'ayxto'nun'ojoy an yu ixtakiklaka'iy an Jesús.
44002002	Walh akxni tak'atsanalh minchalh an lakt'iyan la'atam wa tacha p'as un, wanaj p'asi ixmakat'ajun, chi wanaj tanu'olhi an laka cha'a an tan ixtatanumanalh.
44002003	Chi wachuncha jatalakasunilhcha lhuw sima'at, wa tacha jikmi, jala'mala'pitsinikalhcha atamj atamj, jalak'uktawk'achalhcha.
44002004	Ixchuxk'an wanaj tala'a'i'olhi an Stalan'a Takuwin, chi tsukulhcha talakchiwiniy tipalhuw chiwinti, tacha yu jaxta'nilhcha an Stalan'a Takuwin li katachiwinilh.
44002005	Anchunu panch'e'ex, an la'acha'an Jerusalén ixtawilanalh judiojnin, yu xtamuktaxtuy an xlamap'a'sin Dios, ta lakachux anchanu lakamunulhpa xtamin'otachalh.
44002006	Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi an lapanakni tacha an makat'awlh, talakats'alaj'alhi an laka cha'a an tan ixtatanumanalh an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, chi akxni tacha'alh jantucha ixtak'atsay tuchini ixtapasaycha, mu an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús chunchacha ixtalakchiwiniy tacha an ixtalakchiwiniy an lapanakni, tipaspit chiwinti.
44002007	An lapanakni sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni chi ntucha lay ixtalhimacha'xay, ixtalajuniy: —¿Chu ntu si jamacha'an Galileaja ani talakchiwiniy?
44002008	¿Tasu li jalaj'alha'asmat'awcha lay talakchiwiniy tacha atamj atamj chiwininaw tanchuncha lakmintacha'awi?
44002009	Aniy, tat'ajun yu jamacha'an Partia, chi jamacha'an Media, chi jamacha'an Elam, chi de Mesapotamia chi de Judea, chi de Capadocia chi de la'acha'an Ponto chi de Asia,
44002010	chi yu xalakaat'un Frigia tamintachalh chi de Panfilia chi de Egipto chi de Libia wani la'acha'an Cirene. Chi wachu aniya tat'ajun yu ani tawilanalh yu jamacha'an Roma;
44002011	Ali'in yu ixlakpaynink'an judiojnin sawalh, chi ali'in wa tajunlhicha judiojnin. Chi wachu aniya tat'ajun yu jamacha'an Creta chi de Arabia. ¡Walh chi laycha jalaj'alha'asmat'aw an ixt'alhtanan Jesús tacha an talhichiwiniy yu la'lhi'a'nin ilhtuy an Dios, mu tacha an lakchiwininaw ta lakachux la'acha'an lakmintacha'aw chunchacha talakchiwini!
44002012	Ixchuxk'an an lapanakni sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni chi mu ntucha ixtak'atsay tuchini yu ixtapasaycha ixtalajuniy: —¿Tisuncha nawputun tacha ani tapasayi?
44002013	Ali'in wa xkayaj ixtanajun, ixtanajun: —¡Wa la't'a'ap'anincha!
44002014	Wachuncha an Pedro, jat'atayalhi ali an ixpumakawtamk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, chi p'ascha chiwinilh najun: —Jamacha'an Judea chi chux yu wilat la'acha'an Jerusalén, k'ak'ats'at'iti aniy chi oxi k'a'asmatt'it yu aklajunaw.
44002015	Aniy lapanakni jantu la't'a'ap'anin t'ach'a nawnat uxitnan, mu chaway wa ts'isinka' wa lasnuevejka'.
44002016	Aniy yu tapasat'ajun yucha an tacha nawlh an Joel, yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, akxni nawlh:
44002017	An Dios najun, "Akxni xalakti'astancha wilhchan, akpuxte'emaj'ana an kintakuwin la x'ukxnik'an chux an lapanakni; amijas'at'ank'an, ts'alan chi jatsi'in, katanawna kinchiwinti, an yu lakts'alaninka katala'puminatnana yu katapasaya', chi an yu laktatanincha katajala'awanana'.
44002018	Chi an yu kintat'atapatsaycha t'akunin chi lapanakni, ajkaxta'niya an kinTakuwin anchunu panch'e'ex, chi kata'nawna an kinchiwinti.
44002019	An lakt'iyan aklakmasuya tanlhun yu laj'ay lhi'a'nin. Chi wachu aklakmasuya tanlhun aniy lakaat'un: Jak'alhni, jikmi chi tan kasamama ostayaya jin.
44002020	Akxni ntuka' chini ix'wilhchan an Jamach'alhkat an yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan, akxni ay wilhchan kuna chi lhitapalay, an wilhchan wa ts'iticha kuna', chi an malhkuyu wa tacha jak'alhnicha kuna'.
44002021	Chi wa tichicha yu katapayniniya an Dios, kata'alhtaxtuya'."
44002022	Jamacha'an Israel, k'a'asmatt'iti aniy chiwinti: Uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat li an Dios tamasunini la mi'ukxlakapuk'an an x'alhp'asninti an Jesús, jamacha'a Nazaret. An Dios pu'ilhtulhi an Jesús laj'ay tanlhun yu lhi'a'nin chi tanlhuncha yu lakmasulh.
44002023	Chi ani lapanak, ma'axt'a'nik'ant'it, ch'i ma'nit'it, mu chunchacha ixlilaklhkata chi chunchacha ix'ilhtuputun an Dios, jalhi'unit'iti an ay tajunita lapanakni li katamakxtukmuk'alhi laka cruz.
44002024	Pero an Dios mala'awnicho'olh, chi jantucha ali ma'alh'ajnalhi laka lhinin, mu an lhinin jantu layi katit'alalhajalh an Jesús.
44002025	Pero an rey David lhichiwinilhi an Jesús, akxni nawlh: "Kit'in lhilhiji xakla'ts'in an Jamach'alhkat la ki'ukxlakapu'. Yucha yalhi tan oxi kimpa'xti para li ntu tu'u akima'talh.
44002026	Xliyu an kijalhunut achan chi an kisima'at sawalhcha achani milhpay. Chi chux an kilakatunaj lhi'acha kajastaknana',
44002027	mu nt'u ak'int'imak'awi li akta'aknu'alhilh chi li kalakp'uch'ilh an kilakatunaj yu Stalan'a, kit'in yu ikt'atapatsayan.
44002028	K'imasunini an xatij jatsukunti, lhuw achati ak'ixt'a'niya'a akxni k'at'ana'a.
44002029	"Kint'ala'awnin, akila'asmatniwi yu aklajunaw laka lakxlak'anti chiwinti, an kimpayk'an David nilh chi maknukalh, chi anika tan t'awnawi aknuy.
44002030	Chi an David ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi ixk'atsayi li an Dios ixjurarlanitalhi li reji ka'ilhtuya xapumatam yu yucha kapu'a'p'unmina'.
44002031	Pus an David akxni ntuka' ixtapasayi li kala'awcho'oya an Cristo, yucha ixk'atsaycha li kala'awcho'oya', yucha lhichiwinilh akxni a najun li ntu katita'aknu'alhilh chi li ntu katilakp'uch'ilh.
44002032	Chaway chun, an Dios mala'awnicho'olhcha an Jesús, chi kitnan kinchuxk'ani ikla'ts'iw li chuncha tapasalh.
44002033	Akxni an Dios la'ayalhcha an Jesús chi ulachalhcha tan oxi ixpa'xti chi xta'nilhcha an Stalan'a Xtakuwin, yucha wanajcha chuni kintaxta'nin tacha xakintajuntan li ka'ilhtuya'. Pus chaway yuch'ach'a t'ach'a ani la'ts'inat'it ch'i asmat'at'it.
44002034	An David jantu tu'u kilalh lakt'iyan, pero yucha najun: An Jamach'alhkat Dios juniy an kiJamach'alhkat: K'at'a'ulhcha tan oxi kimpa'xti',
44002035	sta akxni ajkamama'oyacha an yu wa taxkayan la mijach'aja', para li k'ajap'ut'aycha".
44002036	Kint'a'israelitajnin chux uxitnan oxi k'ak'ats'at'it li ani Jesús an yu makxt'ukmuk'at'it laka cruz, an Dios ilhtulhcha Jamach'alhkat chi Cristo".
44002037	Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi an yu ancha ixta'ayxto'nun, sawalhcha tala'ta'oxila'alhilh, pus talhisakmilhcha an Pedro chi an ali'in xjamala'achata an Jesús wachucha jalhisakmikalh, jajunkan: —T'ala'awnin, ¿Tisuncha lay ak'ilhtuwi?
44002038	An Pedro ja'alhtaylh: —K'amak'a'unt'itcha mintala'alhink'an ch'i k'alaj'a'p'axt'itcha la xta'a'ut an Jesucristo, para li an Dios katamala'mixinini mintala'alhink'an, walh lani chuncha kataxta'niyani an Stalan'a ixTakuwin.
44002039	Mu para uxitnani tacha an najun an Dios li ka'ilhtuya', chi para mijas'at'anink'an chi para ixchuxk'an masi yu ma'at tawilananchalh chi wa tichi kawalhcha yu an Dios kajat'asaniya'.
44002040	An Pedro chunchacha ixjajuni, chi lhuw ali chiwinti japuxa'alalh yu ixjapumap'a'si, jajuniy: —¡K'amak'a'unt'itcha tacha ani chaway wa tani t'awkancha, walh lani k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'it'it!
44002041	Pus yu ta'asmatnilhi an xchiwinti, talaj'a'paxlicha; anchunu wilhchan ka tacha la'at'utu milh lapanakni yu tat'atala'xto'lhicha an yu ixtakiklaka'icha Dios.
44002042	Chi ixta'ilhtuycha sawalhi tacha an ixtamasuy an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, wa ixtalhawaxa'a'icha yu ixtalaklhit'ajun, ixtata'ayxt'o'acha akxni ixtalakwajin chi akxni ixtatapayni.
44002043	Ixchuxk'an an lapanakni ixtalaktalhanancha, wa xliyu li an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús wanajcha lhuw tanlhuni ixtalakmasuy chi tanlhuncha yu wa tichicha lapanak jantu lay ilhtuy.
44002044	Ixchuxk'an an yu ixtajakiklaka'inincha watami ixtak'atsay chi an ixlaktanlhunk'an wa sicha ixtalamach'inipaxay.
44002045	Ixtast'aycha xlakaat'unk'an chi tanlhuncha yu xtalaklhit'ajun chi atamj atamjcha tani chunchacha yu ixma'lhtask'iniy an tumin chunchacha ixtalamala'pitsi.
44002046	Lhilhiji ixtata'ayxt'o'a an laka tajtan, chi an la xla'cha'aninchak'an anchacha lhi'acha ixtalakwajin chi ixtalamapayni sawalh.
44002047	Ayi ixtala'ts'in an Dios chi yu'uncha wachu oxi xjala'ts'inkan chux lapanaki oxi ixjalhiwilay, chi lhilhiji an Dios ali ali ixjat'amala'xt'o'a yu ixtajakiklaka'inincha yu wachucha ixjama'alhtaxtuy.
44003001	La'atam wilhchan an Pedro chi an Juan ta'alh an laka tajtan, ta'alh tapayninin yu puta'oxay, las tres.
44003002	Walh an tan ixputanukanachalh an laka tajtan ixwilh pumatam lapanak yu wa la'ch'anlh'awilh, wachunchacha tsukulh, lhilhiji ixtalhi'an chi ixta'ulaycha waniy laka maticha tan junkan k'usi para li kajask'inilhcha la'a'tayjuni an yu ixtatanuy an laka tajtan.
44003003	An la'ch'anlh'awilh lapanak akxni jala'ts'ilhi an Pedro chi an Juan, li ixtatanut'awnachalhcha an laka tajtan jask'inilh li kataxta'nilh tumin tacha la'a'tayjun.
44003004	Pus an Pedro chi an Juan wa sa'cha ixtala'pula'ts'in, chi an Pedro juniy: —Akilala'ts'iw.
44003005	Pus an lapanak sa'cha ixjala'ts'in, yucha ixnajun li sna tu'ucha kataxta'niya'.
44003006	Pero an Pedro juniy: —Jantu tu'u iklhit'ajun plata chi oro, pero yu ani iklhit'ajun akxta'niyan, la xta'a'ut an Jesucristo yu jamacha'a Nazaret, k'at'aycha chi k'ajalht'ancha.
44003007	Akxni chunchacha junilh an Pedro an yu wa la'ch'anlh'awilh lapanak, ma'ch'apayawlhcha, yucha an yu oxi ixmaka ch'apanichalh. Walh watukan la'tach'an'oxilh, an la xlakpixtu ixch'aja la'ts'awalanilhcha.
44003008	Aniy lapanak yu wa la'ch'anlh'awilh ixjunita, wanajcha jalht'ujnulhi akxni t'ujcha tayalh chi tsukulhcha jalhtanan, xli'astan jat'atanulhcha an laka tajtan, la xch'ajacha putanuchalh, ixjalht'ujnuncha chi oxicha xlichiwiniy an Dios.
44003009	Ixchuxk'an an yu tala'ts'ilh li ixjalhtanancha chi li oxicha ixlichiwiniy an Dios,
44003010	sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan chi sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya tacha an putapasalh an lapanak, mu xtamispay chi xtak'atsayi li yucha an yu xtawlay an laka maticha tan junkan k'usi, an laka tajtan, ixtak'atsayi li yucha an yu isk'in tu'u la'a'tayjun.
44003011	An yu wa la'ch'anlh'awilhcha lapanak ixjunita jantucha k'is ixjamakajuni an Pedro chi an Juan. Chux an lapanakni mu sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni, talakats'alaj'alhi an la xpa'xti an tajtan tan a'apacha'a'ikanta, tan tajuniy ma ix'anu Salomón, mu ancha ixtat'ajun.
44003012	An Pedro akxni chunchacha jala'ts'in, jajuniy: —Jamacha'an Israel, ¿tasu li sawalhch'a lhi'a'niyat'iti? ¿tasu li wa kitnancha kilala'ts'inaw li tachanu kitnancha ijk'uch'u ani lapanaki, chi li tachanu kitnancha akmalhtanaw la ki'alhp'asnintik'an u la kijamapaynintik'ani?
44003013	An IxDiosk'an Abraham, chi Isaac chi Jacob, an IxDiosk'an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw, yucha masut'ajun ixta'ayat an isTs'alh, yu junkan Jesús, an yu uxitnan ma'axt'a't'it laka lakjamach'alhkat chi uxitnan la'amaj'ant'iti akxni an Pilato ixnajuncha li kamakawna'.
44003014	Akxni uxitnan k'a'isk'int'iti li kaxmakawkalhi an yu Stalan'a chi yu ntu tu'u xtala'alhin ixlhit'ajun, apalij sk'int'iti li kamakawkalh pumatam jama'nini'.
44003015	Ch'unch'ach'a ma'nit uxitnan an yu kintalhi'anan laka jatsukunti. Pero an Dios mala'awnicho'olh, chi kitnan ikla'ts'iw.
44003016	Tacha ani ta'oximaj'ayacho'olhi ani lapanak yu la'ts'inat ch'i misp'ayat, wa xliyu ijkiklaka'iyawi li an Jesús yucha layi k'uch'uy. Tacha aniy oxi tak'uch'ulh ani lapanak yu la'ts'in'oyat'it, ancha puminachalh li kiklaka'ikan an Jesús.
44003017	Pero chaway kit'in ijk'atsaycha kint'ala'awnin, akxni an milakjamach'alhkatk'an chi uxitnan ma'nit'iti an Jesús wa xliyu nt'u xk'ats'ayat t'uch'ini x'ilht'uyatcha.
44003018	Pero an Dios chunchacha yu pumuktaxtulh yu ixnajunta li ka'ilhtuya', akxni ixjamanawnita an lapanakni yu ma'anchacha, akxni ixtanajun li an ixCristo Dios, kaniya'.
44003019	Xliyu chaway uxitnan k'amak'a'unt'itcha mintala'alhink'an chi k'ach'a'o'atcha an Dios, para li katamala'mixinini mintala'alhink'an.
44003020	Chi chuncha kachina panch'e'ex akxni k'ajast'aknana'it'it, yucha an Diosi katamast'ak'ayan, mu katamakminiyani an ixCristo yu para uxitnancha o'sliyan ixlimala'asijnikanta, yucha an Jesús.
44003021	Masi yu chaway tukan an lakt'iyanka katawlanta, sta akxni an Dios kalats'awala'oyacha an tanlhun, tacha an ixjamanawnitacha an la'stalan'an lapanakni yu ixtalhichiwni ixchiwinti Dios, yu ma'anchacha ixtat'ajun.
44003022	An Moisés jalhixa'alalhi an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw ma'anchacha, jajuniy: "An Dios miJamach'alhkatk'an ka'ilhtuya li aniya kala'awlh pumatam yu kalhichiwinina ixchiwinti Dios, tacha kit'in. K'ak'iklak'a'i'o'ot'iti wa tuchicha katajunan,
44003023	mu watichicha yu ntu katikiklaka'ilhi anchunu lapanak, an yu kamina lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, kamala'mixikana an tan tat'ajun ixlapanakni Dios," chuncha nawlh a Moisés."
44003024	Chi ixchuxk'an an tacha xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, sta akxni ixt'ajun an Samuel chi yu tataylhi'alhcha ixtalhichiwiniy wachu, talhichiwinilhi tacha katapasaya ani panch'e'ex.
44003025	Uxitnanch'a yu k'ala'a'iya'it an tacha nawlh an Dios li ka'ilhtuya', yu jamanawnilh an ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi uxitnanch'a yu k'ala'a'iya'it an tacha ixjat'atamakajunta an Dios an yu t'a ixjalhila'ts'inat'it, akxni an Dios junilh an Abraham: "Ixlakatak'an amijas'at'an yu katapu'a'p'un'anan yu'uncha katapulhitsukuya oxi jatsukunti ta kilhmakchux lapanak aniy lakaamunulhpa'.
44003026	Akxni an Dios mala'awnicho'olhcha an isTs'alh, uxitnani p'ulh tamala'acha'anin, para li kataxta'nin oxi jatsukunti. Ta'ilhtuni li atamj atamj k'amak'a'unt'itcha mintala'alhink'an.
44004001	An Pedro chi an Juan chunchaka ixtalhixa'alat'ajun an lapanakni, walh tacha'alhcha an sacerdotejnin ali an xa'ay an yu ixtajalhistaknan an laka tajtan chi an saduceojnin.
44004002	Sawalhcha ixtala'talh'aman, mu an Pedro chi an Juan ixtamasuycha an ixchiwinti Dios chi ixtanajuncha li katala'awcho'oya an yu talaknitacha, tacha an la'awcho'olh an Jesús, chunchacha kapuk'atsakalh li chuncha kala'awcho'okana'.
44004003	Jamalaklhchawkalhcha laka pulach'ini an Pedro chi an Juan, chi mu ta'oxaycha, tama'atunkuntanulhcha.
44004004	Pero xluwk'an an yu ixta'asmattacha an tacha ixtanajunta an Pedro chi an Juan, takiklaka'ilh, katacha la'akisi milh lapanakni yu ixtajakiklaka'inincha.
44004005	Chi chunchunicha tapasalh akxni tunkunchalh, tata'ayxto'lhicha an la'acha'an Jerusalén an xalaj'ajin judiojnin, chi an laktatanincha chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin.
44004006	Chi ancha wachu ixt'ajun an xa'ay tukan sacerdote yu ixjunkan Anás, chi an Caifás, chi Juan, chi Alejandro chi ixchuxk'ancha an yu ta xtalhila'ts'in an yu tukancha xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin.
44004007	Talhinawlhcha li kajalhi'anikalhi an Pedro chi an Juan, pus ixtan'ajnichak'ani jayawkalh chi jalhisakmikalhcha, jajunkan: —¿Tisiyuchacha tamakawniyan u tisiyuchacha ixtalakask'i li ch'unch'ach'a ilht'uyat ani laktanlhuni?
44004008	An Pedro mu sawalhcha ixlit'ajuni an Stalan'a Takuwin, ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Uxitnani jamach'alhkatni chi uxitnani laktatanin.
44004009	Chaway kilalhisakmiyawcha ixlakata li ijk'uch'uw pumatam lapanak, yu wa ixta'an'ay chi li tasicha lhitak'uch'ulh.
44004010	K'ak'ats'a'o'ot'itcha, chi chux an xalapanakni Israel, la xtalakask'i an Jesucristo jamacha'a Nazareti tak'uch'ulh, yu makxt'ukmuk'at'it uxitnan laka cruz chi yu mala'awnicho'olh an Dios, yucha yu puta'oxilh ani lapanak chi aniya yalh.
44004011	Uxitnan yu tachanu xyawnan cha'a la'amaj'ant'iti an Jesús yu tachanu la'atam chiwx, pero chaway yucha yu tukan apalij lhitapalay, yucha yu tukan ixtamp'in.
44004012	Chi ntu xamati apumatami lay katijama'alhtaxtunulh; mu ta xlijalhi'ay aniy lakaamunulhpa, an Dios tu xamati apumatam lapanaki kintaxta'niyan yu lay akintama'alhtaxtun.
44004013	Wachuncha akxni chunchacha tala'ts'ilh an jamach'alhkatni li an Pedro chi an Juan jantucha k'is ixtatalhanani ixtachiwiniy chi ixtak'atsaycha an jamach'alhkatni li an Pedro chi an Juan jantu ixtajatalaninin, pus sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni, chi tak'atsaalhi li ixt'alhtanan an Jesús sawalhi yu'uncha.
44004014	Atumpaj an lapanak an yu ixtak'uch'uta, wachu ani ixjat'ayalh, pus tucha layi ixtanajun an lapanakni li ntu sawalh.
44004015	Xli'astan an Pedro chi an Juan jatamakxtukalhcha, wa siya yu'uncha an jamach'alhkatnicha ixtalakchiwiniy,
44004016	ixtalajuniy: —¿Tasu kaja'ilhtuyawcha ani lapanakni? mu chaway chux an yu tawilanalh Jerusalén tak'atsaycha li yu'uncha ta'ilhtulh ani lhi'a'nin jak'uch'unti, yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanak lay ilhtuy, chi ntu lay katinajuw li ntu sawalh.
44004017	Para li ntucha ali kalajk'atsakalhi tacha ani tapasalh, kajala'me'e'swaw, para li sta chaway ati'anta ntucha ali katalhichiwinilhi an Jesús.
44004018	Pus wachuncha jat'asanipalakalhi an Pedro chi an Juan, chi jajunkalhcha li ntucha k'is katamasulh chi li ntucha k'is katalhichiwinilhi an ixchiwinti Jesús.
44004019	Pero an Pedro chi an Juan taja'alhtayanalh tanajun: —Pus uxitnancha akilajuniw, ¿an Dios chuncha oxi lhiwilay li uxitnancha aklakiklaka'iw chi yucha jantu?
44004020	Kitnan jantu layi jantucha aktinajuwi yu ikla'ts'intawcha chi yu ik'asmattawcha.
44004021	Pus wachuncha an jamach'alhkatni, a'tamcha tame'e'swapalhi an Pedro chi an Juan laka chiwinti, xli'astan jamakawkalhcha, mu ntu tu'u yu lay kajalhimama'alh'ajnikalh. Chi ixchuxk'an an lapanakni oxi ixtalhipast'ak'a an Dios wa xliyu tacha an ixtala'ts'intacha.
44004022	An lapanak an yu ixputak'uch'uta la x'alhp'asninti an Dios palaycha de la'at'up'uxam (40) k'ata ixpakxanta.
44004023	Akxni jamakawcho'okalhcha an Pedro chi an Juan, tala'alhcha an ali'in ixta'lhtanank'an chi tat'alajun'olhcha tacha an tanawlh an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an laktatanincha.
44004024	Chi akxni ja'alha'asmat'okalhcha an Pedro chi an Juan, wa ayxtamcha tatapayninilh an Dios, tajuniy: —Dios, uxint'i Jamach'alhkatk'at'i, uxint'i ilht'u an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un, chi an alamalh chi wa tuchicha yu ancha lak'alin.
44004025	La xkilhni an David yu ixt'atapatsayan mach'iwinit'i, an laka Stalan'a Mintakuwini nawlh: ¿Tasu li tala'talh'amancha an lapanakni? ¿chi tanlhuncha tatamakajun li kata'ilhtuya yu ntu lhitapalayi?
44004026	An rejnin chi an jamach'alhkatni aniy lakaat'un, tala'talh'amancha chi wa tamcha tak'atsay, tat'alaxtukuycha an Dios chi an ixCristo.
44004027	Sawalhi li an Herodes chi an Poncio Pilato aniya tatala'xto'lhi, ani la'acha'an, ali an yu ntu israelitajnin chi an yu israelitajnin, tat'alaxtukulhi an Jesús yu t'atapatsayan, yu ixint'i sakxt'u li Cristo kawalh.
44004028	Chunchacha yu'uncha tamuktaxtu'olh tacha an yu uxint'i ch'unch'ach'a ixli'ilht'ut'a li katapasalh.
44004029	Chawayi Jamach'alhkat Dios, k'alhak'ap'up'i tacha an kintala'me'e'swayan ch'i k'ajamak'awnini an yu tat'atapatsayan li ntu katalaktalhanalhi katalhichiwinilh aminchiwinti.
44004030	K'amasut'i ami'alhp'asninti, k'ajak'uch'ut'i an ta'an'anin chi k'amasut'i tanlhun yu wa lapanakcha ntu lay ilhtuy, la xtalakask'i an yu t'atapatsayan, an Stalan'a Jesús.
44004031	Akxni tatapayni'olhcha, an tan ixta'ayxto'nun, laklalh; chi ixchuxchak'ani alhp'as jala'cha'alh an Stalan'a Takuwin, chi ntucha ixtatalhanani ixtalhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios.
44004032	Ixchuxk'an an yu ixtajakiklaka'inincha wanajcha ixluwk'ani ixtajunita chi wa tamcha ixtajatapastaknan chi watamcha ixtak'atsan. Jantu xamati ixnajun li wa ix'akstucha ixnawin ixtanlhun, ancha wa siya ix'anunchak'an.
44004033	An yu xjamala'achata an Jesús palaycha alhp'as ixtalhichiwiniy li la'awcho'olhi an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, chi an Dios ixchuxk'ani sawalhcha jalakmapaynilh.
44004034	Jantucha xamati yu yu'uncha tu'u ixma'lhtask'iniy, mu an yu ixtalaklhit'ajun ixlakaat'unk'an chi ixcha'ak'an, ixtast'aycha chi an tumin
44004035	ixtaxta'nicha an yu ixjamala'achata an Jesús, para li katamala'pitsilhcha, tanichunchacha ixtama'lhtask'iniy atamj atamj.
44004036	Pumatam levita yu ixjunkan José, jamacha'a Chipre, yu talhimapa'a'upalh an yu ixjamala'achata Jesús ma Bernabé, nawputun ists'alh yu jama'oxamixinin,
44004037	yucha ixlit'ajun la'atam ixlakaat'un, walh st'alh chi an tumin jaxta'nilhcha an yu ixjamala'achata an Jesús, para li yu'unchacha katala'ts'ilh tani katalhimala'pitsilhcha.
44005001	Pero ixt'awpalay pumatam lapanak ixjunkan Ananías yucha wachu st'alh xlakaat'un ali an ixt'iwi ixjunkan Safira.
44005002	Aniy lapanak, wa tamcha t'ak'atsalh an ixt'iwi, taxa'a'ilhcha tachuni an tumin chi an ali tama'axta'nilhcha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús.
44005003	An Pedro juniy: —Ananías, ¿tasu li mak'awnincha an satanás li yuchacha kajunin t'uch'ini k'a'ilht'ucha, ch'i maslak'at'ij'wat'icha an Stalan'a Takuwini? Uxint'i xa'a'it'i an ali tumin an yu map'alhnik'a ixlakata an lakaat'un.
44005004	¿Chu ntu milakaat'uni ixjunita? Ch'i li st'at'icha, ¿An tumin jantu mi'anuncha ixjunita? ¿T'asu li ch'unch'ach'a p'ast'akt'i k'a'ilht'u? Jantu yu an lapanakni ja'o'xch'o'oy, yucha an Diosi o'xch'o'oy.
44005005	Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an Ananías, alo'cha ta'a'talh chi nilhcha. Chi ixchuxk'an an yu tak'atsaalh, sawalhcha talaktalhanalh.
44005006	Wachuncha tichi yu'uncha ts'alan, tala'apamililhcha an janini chi ta'alhcha maknunin.
44005007	Pants'ik'ischa walh katacha la'at'utucha hora la'pusli tanuchalhcha an xt'iwi an Ananías, jantu xk'atsayi tuchini tapasalhcha.
44005008	An Pedro lhisakmilh juniy: —¿Ch'unch'a lhist'at'it an lakaat'un t'ach'a an nawnat'it? Ak'i'un. —An t'aku ja'alhtayanalh najun: —Chun, wachuncha iklhist'aw.
44005009	An Pedro juniy: —¿Tasu li wa t'amch'a k'ats'ayat para li k'alhila'ts'int'anutcha an ixTakuwin Diosi? Anucha tamincho'ota an yu takimaknulh amint'apapa', chaway uxint'icha wachu katalhi'anan.
44005010	Wanaj wa akxni an Safira alo'cha ta'a'talhi la xjach'aja an Pedro. Pus akxni tatanuchalhcha an ts'alan, tala'ts'in nitacha. Pus ta'alhcha maknunini la xpa'xti an tan takimaknulh an ixt'apapa'.
44005011	Chi ixchuxk'an an yu ixtajakiklaka'inincha, chi ixchuxk'an an lapanakni an yu tak'atsaalh tacha an tapasalh, sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan.
44005012	Lhuw tanlhun yu ntu watichicha lapanak lay ilhtuyi ixjapu'ilhtukan an yu ixjamala'achata an Jesús chi lhuw tanlhuni ixjapumasukan an la'acha'an; chi wa lakatami ixtata'ayxt'o'a an tan ix'a'apacha'a'ikanta tajtan, tan ixjunkan ja'a'apacha'a'inti yu ix'anu Salomón.
44005013	An akilhmaktamin lapanakni, jantu k'is xamati ixjat'atala'xto'putun an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha, pero sawalh oxi ixjalhiwilakan.
44005014	Chi ali tatalhawalhi yu tajakiklaka'inilhcha, takiklaka'ilhi an lapanakni chi an t'akunin.
44005015	Chi an ta'an'anin ixjamamakancha an laka lajcalle la xputamatk'an, para li akxni kala'pusacha an Pedro masi wa ixma'stele'cha kala'cha'alh xapumatam.
44005016	Tanlayjcha la'acha'anaxni yu wanicha ixlaklhitamakajun an la'acha'an Jerusaleni xtalakminachalh an lapanakni, ixtalaklhicha'ancha an ta'an'anin chi yu wa ixtala'apaxto'tacha tanlhun lakmakxkay'un; chi ixchuxchak'ani ixjak'uch'ukan.
44005017	An yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote chi ixchuxk'an an yu xtach'a'o'ay, an yu xjajunkan saduceojnin, tala'talh'amalhcha, t'ilhcha xtala'ts'in,
44005018	pus jach'apayawkalhcha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús chi jamalaklhchawkalhcha lakatam laka pulach'in tan wa para tichicha.
44005019	Pero pumatam ix'angelh an Dios malhti'alhi an xamalhticha an pulach'in akxni puts'ista ixjunita chi jamaxtulh jajuniy:
44005020	"K'ap'inchi'it an laka tajtan, ancha k'aja'una'it an lapanakni chux aniy chiwinti yu xt'a'a jatsukunti".
44005021	Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi, tunkunchalh wats'isin, tatanuchalhcha an laka tajtan chi tsukulhcha tamasuy. Wachuncha, an xa'ay tukan sacerdote chi an yu ixtach'a'o'ay, tat'asanilhi ixchuxk'an an yu laktatanincha israelitajnin, chi talhinawlhcha li kaja'ankalhcha maxtuka an laka pulach'in.
44005022	Pero akxni tacha'alhcha an laka pulach'in an yu ixtajalhistaknan, jantucha tu'u ixtatanumanalh. Pus ta'ancho'olh chi takijamak'atsaaninilhcha,
44005023	tanajun an yu ixtajalhistaknan: —An pulach'in oxi xlaklhchajuy akxni ikcha'aw, chi an soldadojnin an xlakapu an malhticha tajalhistaknanta; pero akxni ikmati'awcha, tu xamati ikla'cha'aw pulakni.
44005024	Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an xa'ay an yu ixtajalhistaknan laka tajtan chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin ixtanajun: —¿Tisu katapasayacha li tacha anicha talayi?
44005025	Wachuncha pumatam jala'cha'alh chi jajuniy: —An yu xjamalaklhch'awt'at'it laka pulach'in, an laka tajtani tamasunit'ajun an lapanakni.
44005026	Pus an xa'ay an yu ixtajalhistaknan laka tajtan jat'a'alhi an yu ixtat'ajalhistaknan, ta'alhcha puxkawnin, pero ntu talhitama'chapulh, mu wachu ixtatalhanani li an lapanakni katatalh'amalh chi kajalakt'alhmakalh.
44005027	Akxni jalhicha'ankalhcha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, jalhi'ankalhcha la x'ukxlakapuk'an an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an yu xa'ay sacerdote jajuniy:
44005028	Kitnan klajuniwcha li nt'uch'a k'is k'amasut'iti xchiwinti an Jesús, walh chi uxitnan wanajcha ta xlijalhi'ay an la'acha'an Jerusaleni lakmasut'at chi kitnancha kilalhimuk'aputunaw li ma'nikalh an Jesús.
44005029	An Pedro chi an ali'in an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, taja'alhtayanalh: —Kitnan kilhi'ilhtutk'ani li ajkiklaka'iwi an Dios, yucha p'ulh ajkiklaka'iyaw, jantu yu an lapanakni.
44005030	An ixDiosk'an an yu ta xajkalhila'ts'inaw mala'awnicho'olhi an Jesús, yuch'a an yu ma'nit'it uxitnan akxni muk'at laka cruz.
44005031	An Dios ma'ostayanicho'olh chi tan oxicha ixpa'xti ulachalh, chi chaway yuchacha ilhtuta li akintatap'ulhnin chi akintama'alhtaxtun, para li an kint'a'israelitajnink'an katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios chi chuncha kajamala'mixinikana ixtala'alhink'an.
44005032	Tacha ani laktapasay kitnan ijk'atsayaw chi wachu k'atsayi an Stalan'a Takuwin, yu an Dios jaxta'niy yu takiklaka'iy.
44005033	Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi, sawalhcha talhitalh'amalh chi ixjama'niputunkancha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús.
44005034	Pero an jamach'alhkatni ixt'ajun pumatam yu ixjunkan Gamaliel yucha an yu xjajunkan li fariseojnin. Aniy lapanak sawalh ixtakiklak'a'iya an lapanakni, mu xamaestro wachu lhamap'a'sini ixjunita. Pus tayalh chi lhinawlh li kajamaxtukalhka tam pants'ik'is ma'spa an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús.
44005035	Chi xli'astan jajunicha an ali'in xt'ajamach'alhkatni: —Kint'a'israelitajnin, k'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti t'ani ja'ilht'up'ut'unat'itcha ani lapanakni.
44005036	K'ap'ast'akt'iti li tawananchacha ixjuntachalh ixt'ajun yu Teudas ixjunkan, yu ixnajun li xlitapalay lapanak, chi katacha la'at'at'i ciento lapanakni yu wa tamcha ixtat'ak'atsay. Pero an Teudas ma'nikalh, chi an yu xtach'a'o'ay tatalaktilh'olh, pus wachuncha yu kiputamaktalh.
44005037	Ampalh wilhchan akxni an isakkan censo, ixt'awpalay pumatam lapanak yu an ixjunkan Judas, jamacha'a Galilea chi wachu tach'a'o'alhi ali'in. Pero xli'astan wachu ma'nikalh, chi ixchuxk'an an yu ixtach'a'o'ay tatalaktilh'olh.
44005038	Pus yu chaway kit'in klat'alajunaw li k'ajamak'a'unt'iti ani lapanakni, jant'u t'ani k'aja'ilht'ut'it. Mu li ani yu tala't'ajun wa ix'anuchak'an an lapanakni, wa kala'pusa'.
44005039	Pero li Diosi jalhijuni, jant'u lay k'at'ijalhajat'it. K'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, jantu junita Dioscha t'alasat'awnat'it. Pus wachuncha an ixt'ajamach'alhkatni takiklaka'ilh.
44005040	Chi xli'astan jat'asanicho'okalhcha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, chi stakcha ja'ayna'kalh chi jajunikalhcha li ntucha ali katalhichiwinilhi xchiwinti an Jesús, chi wachuncha jamakawkalhcha.
44005041	An yu xjamala'achata an Jesús sawalhcha ixtalaj'achani akxni tataxtulhcha an tan ixtawilanalh an jamach'alhkatni. Wa xliyu an Dios ja'ilhtulhi li katat'acha'alhi li kajalhimama'alh'ajnikalh ixlakata an xta'a'ut Jesús.
44005042	Chux wilhchani ixtamasuy chi xtalhichiwiniy an Jesús yu Cristo. Ixtalhichiwiniya an laka tajtan chi lakatamincha laka lakcha'a'.
44006001	Anchunu panch'e'ex, mu an yu ixtajakiklaka'inincha palay palay ixtatalhaway, an yu lhigriego xtachiwiniy tsukulhcha tat'alalhichiwiniya an yu lhi'hebreo xtachiwiniy, ixtanajun an yu lhigriego xtachiwiniy li ma an yu ntucha tu'u xt'apapak'an t'akunin, an yu griegajnin, ma ntucha oxi xjaxta'nikan an tanlhuncha yu ixjamala'pitsinikan yu x'ukan.
44006002	Wachuncha an xpumakawt'uyk'an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, tama'ayxto'olhi ixchuxk'an an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi tajuniy: —Jantu oxi xajachalh li kitnan tucha ali aklhichiwiniwi an ixchiwinti Dios wa xliyu li wa akmala'pitsiwcha an tanlhun.
44006003	Pus chawayi kint'ala'awnin, klajunaw mu milhuk'an k'ajap'uxk'a'ut xpumatujunk'an lapanakni yu de uxitnan yu jalhiwilayat li oxi katatapatsalh chi yu oxi tajalakpastaknan chi yu lhuw talhit'ajun an Stalan'a Takuwin, para li yu'unchacha ajkama'axta'niw li kata'ilhtulh ani tapatsat.
44006004	Kitnan aktaylhi'anawi aktapayniyaw chi aklhichiwininaw an ixchiwinti Dios.
44006005	Pus ixchuxk'ani an lapanakni oxi talhiwilalh, chi tasakxtulhcha an Esteban yu sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun an Stalan'a Takuwin chi sawalh xjakiklaka'inin, chi tasakxtulhcha an Felipe chi Prócoro, chi Nicanor, chi Timón, chi Parmenas chi Nicolás, pumatam jamacha'a Antioquía, yu wa junlhi judio.
44006006	Wachuncha jalhi'ankalhcha tan xtat'ajun an xpumakawt'uyk'an an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús chi yu'uncha talhitapaynilhcha chi tamo'slanilhcha ixmakak'an an xpumatujunk'an lapanakni.
44006007	An ixchiwinti Dios palaycha ta'a'pitsilh, chi an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha palaycha lhuwi xtajunita an Jerusalén. Chi xluwk'an masi an yu sacerdotejnin xtajunita takiklaka'ilhcha wachu'.
44006008	An Esteban sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun i an x'alhp'asninti Dios chi an xjamapayninti. Pus tanlhuncha lay xlak'ilhtuy chi layi xjalakmasuni an lapanakni ix'alhp'asninti an Dios.
44006009	Ixta'alin lapanakni yu xtalhitapa'a'uy Jama'alhtaxtukantacha, wa lakatami ixtata'ayxt'o'a. Wachuncha yu'uncha, ali ali'in an jamacha'an Cirene chi jamacha'an Alejandría chi yu jamacha'an Cilicia chi yu jamacha'an Asia, tsukulhcha tat'alaxtukuyi an Esteban.
44006010	Pero ntu lay xtalakatast'uk'a, mu yucha, yucha an jatapast'ak'at an yu ixta'niy an Stalan'a Takuwini ixpuchiwiniy.
44006011	Pus ani lapanakni tatamaw'ilh tichi yu'uncha lapanakni para li katanawlhcha li an Esteban ta'alha'asmatta tan wa aya lhichiwiniy an Moisés chi an Dios.
44006012	Chunchacha lay tapuma'talh'amalh an lapanakni, chi an laktatanincha chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin. Pus an Esteban tatayla'alhcha chi tach'apayawlhcha, talhi'alhcha la x'ukxlakapuk'an an xjamach'alhkatk'an judiojnin.
44006013	Atumpaj tapuxkawlhcha yu katamaslakatinilh, yu tanawlh: —Aniy lapanak wa lhilhijcha wa aya lhichiwiniy ani stalan'a tajtan chi an lhamap'a'sin.
44006014	Ik'alha'asmat'awi li ma an Jesús an jamacha'a Nazaret ma kalakt'ilhiya ani tajtan chi ma kamapaxa'oya an tanlhuncha yu lhismanitawcha ilhtuyaw yu kintamakawnin an Moisés.
44006015	An jamach'alhkatni chi ixchuxk'an an yu ancha ixtawilanalh, akxni ta'ukxpula'ts'ilh an Esteban, wa tacha wa ix'ukxpucha angelhi ixjunita.
44007001	Chi an yu tukancha xa'ay sacerdote lhisakmilhcha an Esteban, junkan an Esteban li sna sawalhcha tacha an xtalhichiwiniy.
44007002	Pus yucha ja'alhtayanalh, jajuniy: "T'ala'awnin, chi xalakpaynin, akila'asmatniw: An yu ay Dios sawalh talakasunilhi an kimpayk'an Abraham, akxni ixt'ajun an xalakaat'un Mesopotamia, akxni ntuka' ix'an tawlhna la'acha'an Harán,
44007003	chi junilh: "K'at'axt'ucha, chi k'amak'awcha amilakaat'un chi an yu t'a jalhila'ts'in, an tan akmasuniyancha lakaat'uni k'ap'inchi'.
44007004	Pus wachuncha an Abraham taxtulhcha an xalakaat'un Caldea chi alhcha tawlhna Harán. Xli'astan nilhcha an xpay, chi an Dios anicha lakaat'uni lhimilh an Abraham, tan chaway uxitnan anich'a wilat.
44007005	Pero an Dios tu tu'u xta'nilh an Abraham aniy lakaat'un, masi tan wa katach'atalhcha. Pero an Dios junilhi an Abraham li kaxta'niya aniy lakaat'un para li akxni kaniyacha, yu tacha jalhila'ts'ini ix'anuk'an kajuna', masi akxni an Abraham jantuka' tu'u ixjas'at'an ixjalhit'awnikan.
44007006	Atumpaj, an Dios juniy an Abraham li an yu ta kajalhila'ts'ina katatawla lakatam lakaat'un tan tu ix'anuk'an. Chi wa kastakcha japutapatsakana', la'at'at'i ciento k'ata wa kastakcha jalhitama'chapukana'.
44007007	Pero an Dios jumpalay wachu: "Pero kit'in ajkamama'alh'ajniya anchunu lapanakni yu wa kajaputapatsayacha amijas'at'an, chi xli'astan katataxtuyantacha chi anicha akintat'atapatsaya'."
44007008	An Dios t'atamakawlhi an Abraham li an lapanakni kajalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkana'. Pus xliyu akxni la'tsalhcha la'atsajin wilhchan ixt'ajun an Isaac, ists'alh an Abraham, yucha akaxwililich'uk'up'uxlicha. An Isaac, wanajcha chuni ilhtulh yu ists'alhcha, ixjunkan Jacob, chi an Jacob wanajcha chuni ja'ilhtulh ists'alan, yu'uncha yu tawalhcha xapaynin an kilhmakkawt'uy lapanakni yu israelitajnin.
44007009	Ani sts'alan an Jacob, yu xapaynincha xtajunita, taxkaylhi an xapumatam ixt'ala'ajunk'an yu junkan José, pus tast'amaka'alhcha xalakaat'un Egipto. Pero mu an Dios xlistakta an José,
44007010	pus ma'osuni'olhi chux an ixma'alh'ajnat. Chi xta'nilhi oxi jatapast'ak'at, chi an Dios ilhtulhi li an Faraón oxi kalhiwilalh an José, mu yucha rey ixjunita an Faraón an xalakaat'un Egipto. Chi an Faraón ilhtulhcha an José li kawalh ay jamach'alhkat an xalakaat'un Egipto chi malhistaknilhcha an la ixcha'a'.
44007011	Walh anchunu panch'e'ex alilhcha chawan chi ay lhima'alh'ajna, ta xlijalhi'ay an Egipto chi an xalakaat'un Canaán, jantucha tu'u xtalhit'ajun yu kata'ulh an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inaw.
44007012	Pero akxni k'atsaalhi an Jacob li an Egipto ix'alini yu ukan, jamala'achalhi an ists'alan, an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inaw ma'anchacha. Akxnicha yu p'ulhnajcha ma'at tajalhtanalh.
44007013	Akxni xlipu'a't'uycha takilalh Egipto an xjat'ala'awnin an José, jajunilhcha li yucha xt'ala'ajunk'an. Pus an Faraón k'atsaalhi tanchuncha xmintachalh an José.
44007014	Xli'astan, an José lhinawlhcha li an ixpay, yu junkan Jacob chi ixchuxk'an an yu ta jalhila'ts'in kata'alhcha xalakaat'un Egipto. Ixpumat'utump'uxamkawkisik'an (75) lapanaknicha xtajunita.
44007015	Pus chunchacha yu pu'alhcha tawlhna xalakaat'un Egipto an Jacob; chi anchacha nichalh, chi an kilakpaynink'an wachu'.
44007016	An ixlakatunaj an Jacob chi an ali'in, la'acha'an Siquemcha jalhi'ankalh, anchacha jamaknukanchalh, lakatam tan xlamaknukan, tan an Abraham tachun lakatumini xjalhitamawnita an ists'alan tichiyucha lapanak yu ixjunkan Hamor, an Siquem.
44007017	Akxni wanicha xchint'ajun wilhchan tacha an xt'atamakajunta an Dios an Abraham li ka'ilhtuya, an kilapanaknik'an xtatalhawatacha an xalakaat'un Egipto. Wanajcha xluwk'ani xtajunita.
44007018	Chi akxni, tsukulhcha ch'alhkatnan pumatam rey an Egipto yu ntu xmispay an José.
44007019	Aniy rey wa ja'o'xcho'olhi an kilapanaknik'an chi stakcha jalhitama'chapulh. P'asi jajunilh li katamakawlhi xjas'at'ank'an yu wa xtat'ajunka chi li kachajcha tanilh.
44007020	Aniy panch'e'ex akxniy tsukulh a Moisés. Sawalhcha k'usi jas'at'a ixjunita, chi an xpaynin wa la'at'utu malhkuyu talhistaklhi la ixcha'ak'an.
44007021	Akxni takimakawjulhcha laka kanasta an lakxkan, an istsi an Faraón makutulh, pus lhi'alh chi yuchacha la'ayalh tachanu ists'alhcha.
44007022	Chi chunchacha a Moisés tamatalaninilhcha la xjatapast'ak'atk'an an jamacha'an Egipto, pus sawalhcha alhp'asi walh la xchiwinti chi laka laktanlhuncha yu xlak'ilhtuy.
44007023	Akxni t'up'uxamcha k'ata lhitsukulh an Moisés, pastaklhi li ka'alh jala'pixiyalhna an xjat'ala'awnin israelitajnin.
44007024	Pero akxni la'ts'ilhi li pumatam yu jamacha'a Egipto, wa stakcha xlitama'chaput'ajuni pumatam yu israelitaj, an Moisés lhi'a'tayjulh, ma'nilhi an yu jamacha'a Egipto.
44007025	Wa xliyu an Moisés xpast'ak'a li an xjat'ala'awnin israelitajnin katalhimacha'xalhi li yucha kajapuma'alhtaxtuya an Dios; pero yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xalh.
44007026	Tunkunchalh, a Moisés jala'cha'alh xt'uyunk'an ixt'a'israelitajnin xtala'ayt'ajun chi yucha jalamamakawniputulh, para li wa oxicha katalalhi'alh, jajuniy: "Uxitnan lhit'ala'awnin; ¿t'asu li wa lalhit'ama'ch'ap'up'axayatcha?"
44007027	Wachuncha an yu wa xlitama'chaput'ajun an pumatam, jatisamaj'analh, tisamaj'ankalhi an Moisés chi junkan: "¿Tisi yuchacha ulan milhijuez u li xa'aych'a k'a'unt'i, para li akilalaj'aymawcha?
44007028	¿Sna wach'u k'ima'nip'ut'un, t'ach'a ama'nit'i an jamacha'a Egipto kutanchacha?"
44007029	Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an Moisés oslicha, alhcha xalakaat'un Madián. Anchacha ma'tawlhchalh chi jalhitsukunikanchalhcha xt'uyunk'an xjas'at'an.
44007030	T'up'uxamcha k'ata la'pusli, tanchun lakak'iwin, wani a'stitawk'a yu junkan Sinaí, talakasunilh pumatam angelh, akxni ixma'tajita la'atam jach'itin, an laka jikmi ancha talakasulh an angelh.
44007031	A Moisés lhi'a'nilhcha tacha an la'ts'ilh, chi akxni palaycha stalh alhi para li palaycha oxi kala'ts'ilh, alha'asmatlhicha chiwinilh an Dios, tan najun:
44007032	"Kit'ini xDiosk'an an yu t'a xjalhila'ts'in, kit'ini xDios an Abraham chi an Isaac chi Jacob." Wachuncha an Moisés tsukulhcha jaxk'ip'ip'itnin la xtalhanti, jantucha xlaka'amputuni an tan xma'tajita.
44007033	Pus an Dios juniy: "K'alakch'ant'axt'u amihwarachi, mu an t'an yat'i stalan'a lakaat'un.
44007034	Oxi kla'ts'in tacha tama'alh'ajnan an kilapanakni, an yu tat'awnachalh xalakaat'un Egipto, k'asmat'a tacha tachiwiniy li tama'alh'ajnan, pus chaway ikta'alhtajuta para li akjalhi'a'tayjulh. Chaway, k'at'at'icha, akmak'anani xalakaat'un Egipto."
44007035	Masi yu'uncha wa xtala'amaj'anta a Moisés akxni an tajunilh ¿tisiyuchacha ulan uxint'i milhijuez u li xa'aych'a k'a'unt'i? An Dios mala'achalhi tachanu xa'ay chi tachanu jama'alhtaxtunu a Moisés, yucha an angelh an yu talakasunilh tan xma'tajita jach'itini t'amala'achalh.
44007036	Yucha a Moisési jakimaxtulh an xalakaat'un Egipto an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inaw. Pero anchunu xalakaat'un Egipto, a Moisés, xlip'ulhnaj tanlhun yu la'lhi'a'nin tu'u ilhtulh, yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanak lay ilhtuy. Chi an alamalh tan junkan Slapulh Alamalh chi an lakak'iwin akxni t'up'uxam k'ata ancha ixtat'ajun, wachu lhuwi lak'ilhtulh tanlhun.
44007037	Ani Moisés yucha yu jajunilh an israelitajnin: "An Dios ka'ilhtuya li yu de uxitnan, katsukulh pumatam yu kalhichiwinina an xchiwinti, tacha kit'in."
44007038	Chi akxni an jamacha'an Israel wa lakatami xtat'aw'ojoy an lakak'iwin, an angelh wanajcha yu an Moisesi yu ixa'alay an a'stitawk'a tan junkan Sinaí. Chi ancha wachu xtat'ajun an kilakpaynink'an, yucha ani Moisesi yu la'a'ilh an chiwinti yu xt'a'a jatsukunti para li akintajunancha.
44007039	Pero an kilakpaynink'an xtajunita, jantu takiklaka'iputulh, wa tala'amaj'alh, tak'uxa'ancho'olhi xalakaat'un Egipto.
44007040	Tajuniy an Aarón: "Akila'ilhtuniw dios yu akintatap'ulhnin, mu ntu ijk'atsayaw tani lalhcha a Moisés an yu kintamaxtucha'an Egipto."
44007041	Pus wachuncha akxnicha ta'ilhtulh la'atam yu tacha xdioschak'an ixtala'ts'in de jas'at'a toroj chi tama'ninilhcha lhuw jatapakxat. Talha'ulananilhcha chi ta'ilhtulhcha la'atam k'atan ixlakata an xdiosk'an de jas'at'a toroj yu wa yu'unchacha ta'ilhtulh.
44007042	Chi tacha anicha tatapasalh, an Dios jamakawlhcha, chi jamakawnilhcha li tacha xdioschak'ani katala'ts'ilh an st'akunin an yu tawilananchalh lakt'iyan. Tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta la xlibrojk'an an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tan najunta: "Israelitajnin: ¿Chu sna kit'ini kilama'niniw jatapakxat chi kilaja'ulananiw akxni xt'awnat'it t'up'uxam k'ata an lakak'iwin?
44007043	Li mu jantu, uxitnan yuch'a p'as lhak'ap'up'it an ixcha'a midiosk'an Molok chi an ist'aku an midiosk'an Renfán chi an yu wa uxitnanch'a jalak'ilht'ut yu tacha midioschak'an jala'ts'inat. Chaway xliyu uxitnan aklamak'anawi palay awint'i la'puskan la'acha'an Babilonia."
44007044	An kilakpaynink'an xtajunita xtalhit'ajuni an lakak'iwin an tabernáculo, yu ixpuma'akanta an tan ists'omuk'akanta an lhamap'a'sin. Chi ani tabernáculo ts'ajwi xla'oxikanta tacha lhijunilh an Dios a Moisés. An Dios yucha lhijunilh a Moisés li kala'oxilhi an tabernáculo xt'atam tukan tacha masunilh.
44007045	An kilakpaynink'an xtajunita tajama'tayanalhi ani tabernáculo, chi an yu tat'a'alhcha an Josué xtalhi'anta akxni tamaxtulh an xlakaat'unk'an an akilhmaktamin la'acha'an, yu an Dios jamakawnilh an kilakpaynink'an. Ancha xtalhit'ajun an tabernáculo sta akxni ixt'ajun an David.
44007046	Chi an Dios oxi la'ts'ilh an David chi an David sk'inilhi an xDios Jacob li kaxta'nilhi tan kala'oxinilh ixcha'a'.
44007047	Pero yucha an Salomoni yu la'oxinilh ixcha'a an Dios.
44007048	Masi an Dios yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan, jantu wa laka cha'acha yu wa lapanaknicha tala'oxiya putawlay. Tacha nawlh an yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios:
44007049	An lakt'iyan yucha kimputawlan. Chi an lakaat'un yucha ikputach'atay. ¿Tanyucha cha'a yu akilala'oxiniyawi? —najuni an Dios— ¿U tanischa tan ajkastaknana'a?
44007050	Kit'ini iklak'ilhtu'olh chux an tanlhun.
44007051	Chi jajumpalay an Esteban: —Uxitnan wa minchunchachak'ani jant'u k'is ja'asmatnanat'it, uxitnan lhit'awnat mi'a'ax'olhk'an chi mijalhunutk'an yu nt'u p'ak'iklak'a'ininat'it. Wa lhilhijch'a t'alaxt'uk'uyat an Stalan'a Takuwin. Wa mijalakt'atamchak'ani amilakpaynink'an xtajunita.
44007052	¿An yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tisiyu'unchacha yu ntucha talhitama'chapulh amilakpaynink'an xtajunita? Amilakpaynink'an yu'uncha tala'ma'nilhi an yu xtalhichiwiniy li kamina yu ts'awj katsukuya lapanak, chi chaway li kilachilhcha, uxitnan o'xch'o'ot'it ch'i ma'nit'it.
44007053	Uxitnan li yucha an angelhnini p'u'unk'anat'it an lhamap'a'sin, jant'u k'iklak'a'iyat'it.
44007054	Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi an Esteban, tala'talh'amalhcha, wa xwat'at'acha xtalaktasat'ajun, xtaxkajicha an Esteban.
44007055	Pero an Esteban, mu sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun i an Satalan'a Takuwin, yucha tala'st'alh chi la'ts'ilhi tacha an xlimj junita an Dios, chi an Jesús tan oxicha xpa'xti an Diosi sa' ixyalh.
44007056	Pus an Esteban najun: —¡Jo', k'ala'ts'int'it! An lakt'iyan lhti'ay, chi an isTs'alh Dios tan oxicha ixpa'xti an Diosi yachalh.
44007057	Pero yu'uncha t'ak'alhcha jalak'akatuch'apakalh, chi p'ascha talakt'asalh, tatayla'alhcha an Esteban.
44007058	Tamaxtulhcha an la'acha'an an Esteban, chi talakat'alhmalhcha. An yu xta'alhtasuy an Esteban tamalhistaknilhcha an xla'la'ch'itk'an tichiyucha ts'alh junkan Saulo.
44007059	Akxni xtalakat'alhmat'ajuncha an Esteban, tapaynilh, najun: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, k'ala'a'it'i an kintakuwin.
44007060	Chi istso'ottayka, p'asi chiwinilh najun: —Jamach'alhkat, jant'u k'ajalhak'ap'up'ininini ani tala'alhin. Akxni chunchacha nawlh, nilhcha.
44008001	An Saulo ancha ixt'ajun, wa tamcha xma'k'atsay li tama'nilhcha an Esteban. Anchunu wilhchan tsukulhcha jach'a'o'akani an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha an la'acha'an Jerusalén. Ixchuxk'ani tatalaktilh'olh, talak'alhcha an xala'acha'anaxni Judea chi Samaria, pero an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús yu'uncha jantu.
44008002	Tichi yu'uncha lapanakni yu wachucha xtajakiklaka'inin tamaknulhcha an Esteban chi stakcha talhi'alhulh.
44008003	Pero an Saulo yucha wa xjalhitama'chapuyi an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi xjach'a'o'ayi lakatamincha lakalakcha'a', ixkilaktanuycha, xjala'xa'axtuycha an lapanakni chi an t'akunin, xjalhi'ancha lakapulach'in.
44008004	An yu xtataxtutacha an la'acha'an Jerusalén xtalhichiwiniycha an laj'oxi chiwinti wa tanchuncha xta'an.
44008005	An Felipe, yucha la'acha'an Samariaja alh, chi tsukulhcha jalhixa'alayi an Cristo.
44008006	Xtata'ayxt'o'acha an lapanakni chi xchuxchak'ani sa' xta'alha'asmat'a an Felipe, chi xtala'ts'incha tacha an xlakmasuy tanlhun yu x'ilhtuy yu xmasuy ix'alhp'asninti Dios.
44008007	Lhuw lapanakni yu wa xtala'apaxto'ta lakmakxkay'un xjak'uch'uycha. An lakmakxkay'un akxni xtamakajuncha xamati lapanak, xtat'asaycha. Chi xluwk'an yu wa xtalaklakalhtukulunta chi yu wa la'ch'anlh'awilin xtajunita xjak'uch'uycha.
44008008	Tacha ani xtapasay, an la'acha'an, an lapanakni sawalhcha xtalaj'achan.
44008009	Chi ancha ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak yu ixjunkan Simón, xlip'ulhnaj jachawana ixjunita, chi stakcha xjalaj'o'xcho'ota an jamacha'an Samaria. Xjalhimasuni li sawalhcha xlitapalay lapanak.
44008010	Iixchuxk'an lakt'ikt'in chi laj'ajin, sawalhcha ixta'asmatni, ixtalaknajun: "Tacha aniy masuy yucha an ay ix'alhp'asninti Dios".
44008011	Sawalhcha xta'asmatni, mu an tacha ixjachawanan ma'anchacha stak xjapulaj'o'xcho'olhit'ajun.
44008012	Pero akxni takiklaka'ilhcha an Felipe tacha an xlichiwiniy laj'oxi chiwinti, ixlakata an xlich'alhkat Dios chi an Jesucristo, xtalaj'a'paxacha an lapanakni chi an t'akunin.
44008013	Chi an Simón wachucha kiklaka'ilh, chi akxni a'paxlicha lhilhijcha xch'a'o'ay an Felipe, sawalhcha xla'lhi'a'niya tacha an xla'ts'in xlaktapasay tanlhun chi tacha an xtata'oxicha an ta'an'anin.
44008014	Tak'atsaalhcha an xtamala'achanin an Jesús an yu xtat'awnachalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, li an la'acha'an Samaria ta'asmat'acha an ixchiwinti Dios. Tamala'achalhcha an Pedro chi an Juan la'acha'an Samaria.
44008015	Chi akxni tacha'alhcha Samaria, talhitapaynilhcha an yu tajakiklaka'inilhcha an yu ancha jamacha'an, para li katala'a'ilhi an Stalan'a Takuwin.
44008016	Mu ntuka' xamati xla'a'i yu yu'uncha. Wa xtalaj'a'paxtaka la xta'a'ut an Jamach'lhkat Jesús.
44008017	Wachuncha an Pedro chi an Juan talaklakpach'apalhcha an lapanakni, chi chuncha tala'a'ilhcha an Stalan'a Takuwin.
44008018	An Simón akxni la'ts'ilhi li an Stalan'a Takuwin xjala'chincha an lapanakni akxni xtajalakpach'apaninincha an xtamala'achanin Jesús, ixjaxta'nicha tumin.
44008019	Chi jajuniy: —Wachu akilaxta'niwi an x'alhp'asninti Dios, para li yu wachu aklakpach'apalh wachu kala'a'ilhi an Stalan'a Takuwin.
44008020	Wachuncha an Pedro alhtaylh juniy: —K'at'ats'an'a'o amintumin, mu uxint'i wa laka tumini t'amawp'ut'un an yu xt'a'a Dios.
44008021	Uxint'i jant'u t'ach'ip'ini li k'ala'a'it'i, mu la x'ukxlakapu an Dios jantu ts'ajwi t'ajun mijalhunut.
44008022	T'ach'a ani jant'uch'a k'is oxi lay, jant'uch'a ch'uni k'alat'i, k'at'ap'ayninini an Dios, kalats'inawcha li sna kamala'mixinini li ch'unch'ach'a p'ast'ak'a.
44008023	Mu kla'ts'inani li wa lhaxk'ayanani li tu'u' ch'i jant'u lay mak'awt'ijlay.
44008024	An Simón ja'alhtayanalh: —K'at'ap'ayninit'iti an Dios kilakata para li ntu tu'u katapasalh tacha an kilajunaw.
44008025	Xli'astan akxni talhichiwin'olhcha an ixchiwinti Dios an Pedro chi an Juan, ta'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi talhichiwinilhcha wachu an laj'oxi chiwinti lakalhuw xala'acha'anaxni an xalakaat'un Samaria.
44008026	Pumatam x'angelh an Dios xa'alalh an Felipe, junkan an Felipe: "K'a'ost'aycha chi k'ap'inchi anu lhitalaktsin (sur), la xatij la'acha'an Jerusalén, an tan la'pusta tij tan lakak'iwin, yu wakcha anta la'acha'an Gaza."
44008027	Pus an Felipe ostayalh chi alhcha, walh an lakatij paxto'lhicha pumatam lapanak jamacha'a Etiopía. Aniy lapanak xa'ayi ixjunita, ixtesorero an xarreina Etiopía chi kilalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, kitapayninilh an Dios.
44008028	Chi xti'ancho'oycha xla'acha'an, sa'cha xtajun la xkarro, xpunawlhi'antacha an yu ists'o'ta an Isaías yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
44008029	Pus an xTakuwin Dios juniy an Felipe: "Waniya k'ap'inchi an tan la'pust'ajun an carruaje".
44008030	Akxni an Felipe cha'alhcha, asmat'acha li an jamacha'a Etiopía xpunawlhi'antacha an yu ists'o'ta an Isaías, pus juniy: —¿Lhimach'a'xayi an yu p'una'un?
44008031	An lapanak jamacha'a Etiopía ja'alhtayanalh najun: —¿Tasucha lay aklhimacha'xaya li ntu xamati kijuniy tuchini nawputuncha? Pus an Felipe junkan li katajulhcha an laka carruaje chi li kapiktutawilhcha an lapanak jamacha'a Etiopía.
44008032	Tan an xpunawt'ajun an ixchiwinti Dios, an tan najunta: Wa tacha wa la'atamcha borregojo lhi'ankalh tan kama'nikana', chi wa tacha wa la'atamcha borrego yu ntu k'is t'asay akxni la'asitkan, jantu k'is ta'elh'a'mix'alh.
44008033	Stakcha tamamaxanilh, walh chi ntu xamati lhi'a'tayjulh. An xjatsukunti ma'osukalhi aniy lakaat'un. Jantu xamati lay katinawlh tichini yu'unchacha yu tapu'a'p'un'alh.
44008034	An jamacha'a Etiopía juniy an Felipe: —Lamapaynin ak'i'uni tichini yuchacha lhichiwiniy an lapanak an yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios. ¿Wa x'akstucha lhichiwinkan tacha ani najunta u xamati apumatami lhichiwini?
44008035	Pus an Felipe tsukulhcha lhixa'alayi an tacha xpunawt'ajun ixchiwinti Dios, an jamacha'a Etiopía. Junilhcha an laj'oxi chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy an Jesús.
44008036	Chi wakcha ta'alh, walh tacha'alhcha tan xwilh xkan, an jamacha'a Etiopía najun: —Aniy wilhi xkan, ¿jantucha layi ani ak'a'paxli?
44008037	Pus an Felipe juniy: —Li xlisawalh chux la mijalhunuti k'iklak'a'iy an Dios, laych'a k'a'a'p'axt'i. Pus an jamacha'a Etiopía najun: —Ki't'in ijkiklaka'iya li an Jesucristo isTs'alh an Dios.
44008038	Wa chuncha lhinawlhi li kasa' yawkalhi an carruaje, chi an xt'uyunk'an tata'alhtajulhcha, an Felipe ma'paxalhcha.
44008039	Akxni tatakutlhicha an lakxkan, an ixTakuwin Dios lhi'alhcha an Felipe, chi an xa'ay lapanak jamacha'a Etiopía tucha la'ts'incho'olh; pero sawalhcha x'achani taylhi'alh xtij.
44008040	An Felipe akxni k'ats'aanalh la'acha'an Azotojcha xt'awnachalh, chi lakatamj lakatamjcha la'acha'anaxni ix'an lhichiwiniy an laj'oxi chiwinti, sta la'acha'an Cesareajcha cha'alh.
44009001	An Saulo ali ali xtaylhi'anta xjala'me'e'sway li kajama'niya an yu xtakiklaka'iy an Dios. Pus xliyu lhila'alhi an xa'ay tukan sacerdote,
44009002	chi sk'inilhcha jalhiki tan tasuy li laycha ka'alh an laka lakcha'a tan ixtaputa'ayxt'o'a an yu judiojnin an la'acha'an Damasco, para li ka'alhcha japuxkawna an yu xtach'a'o'ay an Sast'i Tij, t'akunin chi lapanakni, para li kajalhi'alhcha tacha tach'inin an la'acha'an Jerusalén.
44009003	Pero akxni wanicha ixcha'ant'ajun la'acha'an Damasco, la'atam jatapulhkunu minchalh an lakt'iyan, wanaj la'atanchanu'olh, wa xlimjnik'acha.
44009004	Pus an Saulo alo' ta'a'talh, chi asmat'a junkan: —"Saulo, Saulo, ¿t'asu li k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uycha?"
44009005	An Saulo najun: —¿Tisu uxint'icha Jamach'alhkat? An yu xchiwiniy alhtaylh juniy: —Kit'in Jesús, kit'ini k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uy.
44009006	K'a'ost'aycha chi k'ap'inchicha an la'acha'an. Anchacha k'a'unk'ana'a t'uch'ini k'a'ilht'uya'acha.
44009007	An yu xtat'a'anta an Saulo sawalhcha xtalaktalhanan, mu ta'asmatlhi tacha an chiwinkalh, pero ntu xamati tala'ts'ilh.
44009008	Wachuncha an Saulo ostayalhi an lakaat'un, pero akxni tala'pumix'alh, jantucha lay ixjalakawanan. Pus wa tama'ch'apalhi'alhcha la'acha'an Damasco.
44009009	Ancha la'at'utu wilhchani xwilh jantu lay xjalakawanan chi ntucha xwajin chi ntucha x'ot'a tu'u'.
44009010	An la'acha'an Damasco xwilh pumatam lapanak yu xkiklaka'iy Dios, ixjunkan Ananías, chi an Jesús talakasunilh, wa tacha la'puminatnalh, chi juniy: —Ananías. Yucha ja'alhtayanalh najun: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús ¿tisuncha?, anicha ikyalh.
44009011	An Jamach'alhkat Jesús juniy: —K'a'ost'aycha, chi k'ap'inchi an laka tij tan junkan Ts'awj. K'ap'uxk'awya'a pumatam lapanak jamacha'a Tarso, junkan Saulo, an la ixcha'a Judasi k'ap'uxk'awya'a, mu chaway yucha tapaynit'ajun,
44009012	chi la'ts'in tacha la xla'puminatnat pumatam lapanak junkan Ananías. La'ts'in li tanuchalh chi lakpach'apalh para li laycha kajalakawanancho'olh.
44009013	Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an Ananías najun: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, wanajcha xluwk'ani kintalhixa'alata anchunu lapanak chi kintajun'ojotacha tacha jala'lhitama'chapuy an yu takiklaka'iyan, an la'acha'an Jerusalén.
44009014	Chi chaway anicha minta, mu yu'uncha an xalaj'ajincha sacerdotejnini tamakawni li kamilh, para li kajalhi'an'olhcha tacha tach'inini an yu ta'a'atant'asayan.
44009015	Pero an Jamach'alhkat Jesús juniy an Ananías: —K'ap'inchi', mu anchunu lapanak iksakxtutacha para li kakilhichiwinilhcha tan tawilanalh yu ntu judiojnin, chi li kajajunilhi kinchiwinti an rejnin chi an yu judiojnin.
44009016	Kit'in akmasuniya tacha kastak ma'alh'ajnana kilakata.
44009017	Pus an Ananías alhcha an laka cha'a tan xtanumachalh an Saulo. Akxni tanuchalhcha an Ananías lakpach'apalhcha an Saulo chi juniy: —Kint'ala'ajun Saulo, an Jamach'alhkat Jesús an yu talakasunin laka tij t'an xp'ut'ant'a yucha kimala'achachalh, para li laych'a k'ajalak'awanch'o'o chi li sawalhch'a k'alhits'uk'u an Stalan'a Takuwin.
44009018	Wa akxni, an la xla'chulh an Saulo, patajunilh wa tacha x'ayxk'ip'it jatanti chi jalakawanancho'olhcha. Wachuncha an Saulo tayalhcha chi a'paxlicha.
44009019	Xli'astan waycho'olhcha chi k'ut'ilhcha juncho'olh, chi anchacha jat'atamakawlh an jamacha'an Damasco yu an xtakiklaka'iy an Jesús, lanan la'alhuw wilhchani jat'atamakawlh.
44009020	Chi wa chuncha an Saulo tsukulhcha lhichiwiniya an Jesús, isTs'alh Dios, an laka lakcha'a an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni.
44009021	Ixchuxk'an an yu xta'alha'asmat'a xtalhi'a'nicha chi ixtanajun: —¿Chu ntu yu ani lapanak an yu xjalhitama'chapuy an yu takiklaka'iy Jesús an Jerusalén? ¿Jantu yuchacha yu ani chilh, para li kajalhi'alhcha chi kajama'axta'nilhcha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin?
44009022	Pero an Saulo ali xlichiwiniya alhp'as an xchiwinti Jesús, xjajuniya li an Jesús yucha Cristo. Pus tucha xtalhimacha'xayi an judiojnin yu la'acha'ancha Damasco xtawilanalh.
44009023	La'alhuwcha wilhchani la'pusli, an Judiojnin wa tamcha tak'atsaalh li katama'niyacha an Saulo,
44009024	pero yucha k'atsaalh. Ts'isi chi tunku xtapakxan'icha an la xalakmalhticha an la'acha'an, para li laycha katama'nilh.
44009025	Pero an yu xt'alhtanancha an Jesús xtajunita tamujulh laka la'atam ay kanasta chi yuchacha tapuma'alhtajulh puts'ista an laka axi, yu xla'acho'oni'ojoy an la'acha'an, chi chunchacha lay osli.
44009026	Akxni cha'alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén an Saulo, xjat'atala'xto'putuncha an yu xtakiklaka'iy Jesús, pero yu'uncha ixchuxk'ani wa xtatalhamni, mu ntu xtalhiwilayi li wachucha xkiklaka'i.
44009027	Wachuncha an Bernabé lhi'alhi an Saulo an tan xtat'ajun yu xjamala'achata an Jesús chi jajunilhcha li an Saulo la'ts'ilhi an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, an laka tij, chi li xa'alalh, chi li an la'acha'an Damasco an Saulo jantu wa talhanajlhichiwinilhcha an xchiwinti Jesús.
44009028	Pus an Saulo jat'atamakawlhcha an la'acha'an Jerusalén, anchacha xjat'a'aklat'ajun. Jantu wa xtalhanajlhichiwiniycha an xchiwinti Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
44009029	Xjat'achiwiniycha chi xjat'alakikxtukuycha an judiojnin yu xtachiwiniy lhigriego, pero yu'uncha wa xtama'niputun.
44009030	Akxni tak'atsaalhi an yu takiklaka'iy Jesús li wa tama'niputun, talhi'alhi an Saulo la'acha'an Cesarea, chi ancha tamak'alhcha la'acha'an Tarso.
44009031	Wachuncha an yu xtakiklaka'icha an Dios ta xlijalhi'ay an xalakaat'un Judea chi Galilea chi Samaria lhi'achacha xtawilanalh chi alhp'ascha xtajun la ixtakuwink'an chi xtakiklaka'icha an Dios, chi an Stalan'a Takuwin ali ali xjalalhaway.
44009032	An Pedro xjala'pixiyalhnant'ajuni an ixlapanakni Dios, chi wachu alh jala'ts'ini an yu xtawilananchalh la'acha'an Lida.
44009033	Walh ancha la'cha'alh pumatam lapanak junkan Eneas, la'atsajincha k'ata ixta'an'ajmalh, wa xlakalhtukulunta.
44009034	An Pedro juniy: —Eneas, an Jesucristo kak'uch'uyan, k'a'ost'aycha, ch'i k'asakt'icha amimputamat. An Eneas watukan ostayalh.
44009035	Ixchuxk'ani tala'ts'in'olh an yu xtawilanalh la'acha'an Lida chi an la'acha'an Sarón chi takiklaka'ilhcha an Jesús.
44009036	Anchunu panch'e'ex an la'acha'an Jope ixt'ajun pumatam t'aku yu xjakiklaka'inin, ixjunkan Tabita, lhigriego nawputun Dorcas. Ani t'aku wa tanlhuncha yu laj'oxi x'ilhtuy chi xja'a'tayjuycha an yu xtama'lhtask'iniy tanlhun.
44009037	Pero chilh panch'e'ex an Dorcas ta'an'alh chi nilh. Akxni paxa'okalhcha, an ixlakatunaj pulaktamcha laka cha'a tan xlitala't'uycha juntachalhi mamakanchalh.
44009038	An la'acha'an Lida wani la'acha'an Jopeje xlitamakajun, chi an Pedro ancha xt'awnachalh Lida, pus akxni tak'atsaalhi an yu xtajakiklaka'inin li ancha t'awnachalh an Pedro, tamala'achanilh xt'uyunk'an lapanakni tan tajuniy: —Pedro, k'at'at'i watukani an la'acha'an Jope".
44009039	Pus an Pedro jat'a'alhi la'acha'an Jope. Akxni cha'alhcha, talhi'alhcha an tan xmachalh an lakatunaj, chi ixchuxk'an an yu maticha xt'apapak'an t'akunin xtalhi'alhuncha. Tala'atanchanulhcha an Pedro chi tamasunilhcha yu xlak'ilhtuta la'la'ch'it an Dorcas akxni ixt'ajunka'.
44009040	Wachuncha an Pedro jajuniy li katataxtu'olhka', chi xli'astan yucha tatso'ottalhcha chi tapaynilhcha chi sa'cha xla'ts'ini an yu xnitacha, chi juniy: —¡Tabita, k'a'ost'aycha! An T'aku jalakawanalhcha, chi akxni la'ts'ilhcha an Pedro, ostawilhcha.
44009041	An Pedro ma'ch'apachalh chi ma'ch'apayawlhcha, pus akxni jat'asanilhcha an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi an t'akunin yu ntucha tu'u xt'apapak'an, xla'awcho'otacha jamasunicho'olh.
44009042	Tacha ani tapasalh wanajcha lajk'atsa'okalhi an Jope, chi lhuwi yu takiklaka'ilh an Dios.
44009043	An Pedro la'alhuw wilhchani tamakawlh an la'acha'an, la ixcha'a tichiyucha lapanak yu xla'tapatsay jaxt'a'an, ixjunkan Simón.
44010001	An la'acha'an Cesarea ixt'ajun tichiyucha lapanak ixjunkan Cornelio, xakapitan la'atam batallón yu ixjunkan Italiano.
44010002	Aniy lapanak chi chux yu xtawilanalh la ixcha'a xtakiklaka'iya an Dios. Chi ixja'a'tayjuyi an judiojnin, la'lhuwi ixt'a'a tumin chi lhilhiji xtapaynini an Dios.
44010003	La'atam wilhchan katacha las trescha yu puta'oxaycha, la'puminatnalh, sawalhcha oxi la'ts'ilh pumatam x'angelh an Dios, tanuchalhcha an tan xwilh chi juniy: —¡Cornelio!
44010004	An Cornelio wa sa'cha xla'ts'ini an angelh chi masi sawalhcha ixtalhanan lhisakmilh, juniy: —¿T'isunch'a lak'ask'ini Jamach'alhkat? An ángelh alhtaylh juniy: —An Dios lhakapu'ani amintapaynit ch'i t'ach'a an ilht'uy li ja'a't'ay'uy an yu tama'lhtask'iniy la'a'tayjun.
44010005	K'amala'ach'at'i xamati an la'acha'an Jope, kaki'ilh tichiyucha lapanak junkan Simón, yu tajumpalay ma Pedro.
44010006	Ani yucha la ixcha'a tichi yucha yu wachu Simón junkani wilhchalh, yu la'tapatsay jaxt'a'an wani an alamalh.
44010007	Akxni ancho'olhcha an ángelh an yu xa'alalh an Cornelio, an Cornelio jat'asanilhcha xt'uyunk'an xma'tsukunin chi pumatamcha soldado yu oxi xt'alalhi'an yu xkiklaka'iy an Dios.
44010008	Jajun'olhcha tacha an la'ts'ilh, xli'astan jamala'achalhcha la'acha'an Jope.
44010009	Tunkunchalh, akxni x'atunkunt'ajuncha, laka tijcha xtat'ajun wanicha la'acha'an Jope, chi an Pedro yu an ta'alh puxkawnin tawk'alhcha la x'a'sti cha'a', alhcha tapaynini'.
44010010	Walh sawalhcha chawanalh, wa laycha tu'u ka'ulh, pero akxni xla'oxinit'awkanka yu ka'uyacha la'puminatnalh.
44010011	La'ts'in li an lakt'iyan tati'achalhcha chi ta'alhtajulhcha an lakaat'un wa tacha alhtam ay sábana, an tama'ats'astut'at'i xch'apanikantachalhcha an talhman.
44010012	Chi an la xpulaknicha an sábana watuchicha jatapakxat yu ma'at'at'i xch'aja xtatajumanalh chi yu wa tatatanxe'e'an chi yu tala'pa'achujlata.
44010013	Chi an Pedro asmatlhi chiwinkalh, nawkan: —Pedro, k'at'aycha, k'ajama'nit'icha ch'i k'aja'ut'icha.
44010014	An Pedro ja'alhtayanalh najun: "Jantu Jamach'alhkat, mu kit'in tu a'tam k'uta yu ntu oxi ukan chi yu nawkan li ntu stalan'a para li ak'ulh"
44010015	An yu chiwinilh a'tam xa'alapalhi an Pedro, junkan: "Yu Dioscha mastalan'anita jant'u k'a'uni li ntu oxi."
44010016	A't'utu chuncha junikalh, xli'astan an sábana tach'ixcho'olhcha an lakt'iyan.
44010017	An Pedro sawalhcha xpast'ak'a tuchini jumputuncha tacha an la'ts'ilh, walh tatayachalhcha laka malhticha an lapanakni yu xjamala'achata an Cornelio, mu talhasakminilhcha tanchuncha la ixcha'a yu junkan Simón.
44010018	Pus mu tacha'alhcha, pus p'ascha tachiwiniy talhasakminincha li ancha wilh yu junkan Simón yu talhimispapalay Pedro.
44010019	Pus wachuncha masi xpastakt'ajunka tuchini jumputuncha tacha an la'ts'ilh an Pedro, an xTakuwin Dios juniy: "K'ajala'ts'inchi', xt'utunk'an lapanakni tapuxkawyan.
44010020	K'at'aycha chi k'at'a'alht'a'ut'icha, k'ajat'ap'inchicha, jant'u t'u'u k'alhak'ap'up'i, mu kit'ini ijkamala'achatachalh."
44010021	Pus an Pedro ta'alhtajulh chi jajuniy an lapanakni: —Kit'ini an yu p'uxk'awyat'it ¿t'isunch'a la't'ant'at'iti?
44010022	Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —Yucha an kapitan Corneliojo kintamala'achatacha'an, yucha pumatam lapanak yu ja'asmatnan, kiklaka'iya an Dios, chi ixchuxk'an an judiojnin oxi talhiwilay chi tamapayni. Pumatam x'angelh an Diosi junilh li kat'asanin, para li k'ap'it'i la ixcha'a', chi li ka'asmatnini yu k'a'una'a.
44010023	Pus wachuncha an Pedro jatamaknulhcha pulakni chi anchacha tala'akujlhi anchunu jatats'isni. Tunkunchalh, jat'a'alhcha an Pedro, chi wachu tat'a'alhi ali'in yu xtakiklaka'iy an Jesús yu jamacha'an Jope.
44010024	La'atamcha wilhchan jumpalh tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Cesarea. An Cornelio sa'cha xjapakxan'ita, xjalakt'asanitacha yu ta xjalhila'ts'in chi yu oxi xjat'alalhi'an.
44010025	Akxni cha'alhcha an Pedro la ixcha'a an Cornelio, an Cornelio taxtulhcha, lakatastuklhicha chi tatso'ottanilhcha.
44010026	Pero an Pedro xa'ayawlh juniy: —K'at'ay, kit'in wachucha wa klapanak tacha uxint'i.
44010027	Akxni chunchacha xt'achiwint'ajun, tanulhcha laka cha'a an Pedro, walh la'ts'incha li wanaj lhilhuwi xlakwilakalh.
44010028	An Pedro jajuniy: —Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li pumatam judio jantu jat'achiwiniya yu ntu xt'amacha'an chi ntu tanuyi la ixcha'ak'an, wa xliyu tumpaja yu kiklaka'iy lhamap'a'sin. Pero an Dios kimasunilhi li ntu xamati ajkunilh li lhkiliki u li ntu wa kint'atam.
44010029	Xliyu tacha kilamak'atsaaniw li akmilh, watukan ikmilh, jantu tu'u iknajun li ntu akmilh. Chaway ijk'atsaputuncha tuchini kilalhit'asaniyawcha.
44010030	An Cornelio juniy: —La'at'at'icha wilhchan xjuntachalh tacha chaway panche'ex ixjunita aniya xaktanun la kincha'a', xaktapaynit'ajun yu puta'oxaycha las tres, walh akxni kla'ts'in kintalakasunilhcha pumatam lapanak, an xla'ch'it wa xlimjnik'acha.
44010031	Kijuniy: —Cornelio, an Dios asmat'a amintapaynit chi past'ak'a an yu ilht'ut'a li ja'a't'ay'uy an yu tama'lhtask'iniy la'a'tayjun.
44010032	K'amala'ach'at'i xamati an la'acha'an Jope, para li kaki'ilh an Simón yu lhimispapalhkan Pedro. La ixcha'a yu wachu junkan Simoni wilhchalh, yu la'tapatsay jaxt'a'an chi wani an alamalhi wilhchalh.
44010033	Pus watukan iklhinawlhi li k'ap'ink'a puxkawka, walh chi uxint'i milhi'oxi lapanak ch'it'acha. Chaway kinchuxk'ani la x'ukxlakapu an Dios aniya ikt'awnaw, chi klakask'inaw li akilajun'ojowi chux yu an Dios junan li akilajuniw.
44010034	Pus an Pedro tsukulhcha chiwiniy, jajuniy: —Chaway iklhimacha'xaycha li sawalhi li an Dios jantu wa jasakxtunun,
44010035	watanchuncha la'acha'an jala'a'iya an yu takiklaka'iy chi ta'ilhtuy yu laj'oxi tanlhun.
44010036	An Dios jaxa'alalhi an jamacha'an Israel, jamak'atsanilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat, yucha an Jesucristojo puchiwinilh chi yucha kiJamach'alhkatk'an kinchuxk'an.
44010037	Uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat yu tapasalh ta xlijalhi'ay an xalakaat'un Judea. Tan pu'a'taynichalh la'acha'an Galilea, akxni an Juan xlichiwinintacha li lhitask'iniya li kalaj'a'paxkalh.
44010038	K'ats'ayat'iti li an Dios xta'nilhi x'alhp'asninti chi Stalan'a xTakuwin an Jesús yu jamacha'a Nazaret, ch'i k'ats'ayat'iti li an Jesús tanlhun yu laj'oxiy x'ilhtuy chi xjak'uch'uyi watichicha yu an xapay makxkay'un xjamama'alh'ajni. Chuncha lay x'ilhtuy mu an Dios ixt'a'aklat'ajun.
44010039	Chi kitnan ijk'atsayawi chux tacha an lak'ilhtulh tanlhun an Jesús an xalakaat'un Judea chi an Jerusalén. Xli'astan tama'nilhcha, tamuk'alhcha lakatam laka cruz.
44010040	Pero an Dios mala'awnicho'olhi xlila'at'utu wilhchan, chi ilhtulhi li akintatalakasunini kitnan.
44010041	Jantu lhichuxi jatalakasunilh, wa kitnan yu an Dios kixtasakxtutancha xlip'ulhnaj, para li aknajuwi li kla'ts'inaw. Kitnan ikt'alakwajiw chi ikt'alaj'otwi akxni xla'awcho'otacha.
44010042	Chi yucha, kintamala'achancha li ak'awcha jalakjuninini an lapanakni li an Dios ulalhcha an Jesús xlijuez, ixjuesk'an an yu tala'ajunta chi an yu tanitacha.
44010043	Ixchuxk'an an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, xtalhichiwinintacha an Jesús, chi ixtanajuntacha li yu takiklaka'iy an Jesús, kajamala'mixinikana ixtala'alhink'an.
44010044	Chunchaka xchiwint'ajun an Pedro, walh an Stalan'a Takuwin jala'cha'an'olhcha ixchuxk'an an yu xta'alha'asmatt'ajun.
44010045	Pus an yu xtat'acha'anta an Pedro, an yu wachu xtakiklaka'iy an Jesús yu judiojnin, xtalhi'a'nicha li an Stalan'a Takuwin wachu jaxta'nikalhi masi an yu ntu judiojnin.
44010046	Mu an lapanakni tipalhuwcha yu tamcha chiwinti xtalakchiwiniy chi xtaxta'nicha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios.
44010047	Wachuncha an Pedro najun: —¿Laycha jantucha kamakawkalhi li katalaj'a'paxli ani lapanakni, yu tala'a'ilhcha an Stalan'a Takuwin tacha kitnan?
44010048	Pus lhinawlhcha li katalaj'a'paxlicha la xta'a'ut an Jesucristo. Xli'astan tatapaynisk'inilhcha an Pedro li kajat'atamakawlh la'alhuw lanan wilhchan.
44011001	An yu ixjamala'achata an Jesús chi an ixlapanakni Dios yu xtawilanalh an xalakaat´un Judea tak'atsaalhi li an yu ntu jamacha'an Judea wachu tala'a'ilhi an ixchiwinti Dios.
44011002	Pus an Pedro akxni cha'ancho'olhcha Jerusalén, an ali'in judiojnin yu wachu xtajakiklaka'inin xtajuni li ntu oxi xtalhiwilay.
44011003	Tajuniy an Pedro: —¿T'asu li jak'ila'k'ilat'icha an yu ntu judiojnin ch'i jat'alakwaycha?
