44011004	An Pedro wanaj jajun'olhi tacha an tapasalh, sta tan pu'a'taynichalh, jajuniy:
44011005	Kit'in an la'acha'an Jopeje xakt'ajun, walh akxni xaktapaynit'ajun kla'puminatnalh, ikla'ts'ilh wa tacha la'atam ay sábana, an tama'ats'astut'at'i an lakt'iyani ixcha'anta chi x'alhtajuycha an tan xakt'ajun.
44011006	Chi oxicha iklhakapu'an para li oxicha akla'ts'ilh tuchini tajuncha an xpulakni, la'stu jatapakxati xtatajumanalh, yu xputach'ant'at'ik'an ta'alin aniy lakaat'un, chi yu ta'at'ajnan, chi yu tatatanxe'e'an, chi yu tala'pa'achujlata.
44011007	Chi k'asmat'a chiwinkancha, kijunkan: —Pedro, k'at'aycha chi wa tanyuchacha k'ama'nit'i, k'a'ut'icha.
44011008	Kit'in ik'alhtaylh ijkuniy: —Jantu, Jamach'alhkat, mu kit'in tu a'tam k'uta yu lhkiliki chi yu ntu oxi ukan.
44011009	Wachuncha an chiwinti, aminchalh lakt'iyan a'tam kixa'alapalh, kijumpalay: —Yu Dioscha mastalan'anita, jant'u k'a'uni li ntu oxi.
44011010	A't'utu chuncha tapasalh, chi xli'astan ch'ixcho'okalhcha an wa tacha sábana an lakt'iyan.
44011011	Walh wa akxni, tacha'alhcha an laka cha'a tan xakwilh xt'utunk'an lapanakni, yu kixtapuxkajuy, la'acha'an Cesareaja xjamakminkantachalh.
44011012	An xTakuwin Dios kijuni li ntu tani aknawlh ma ajkat'a'alhcha an lapanakni. Chi wachu kintat'akilalhi ani xpumachaxank'an t'ala'awnin; iktanu'ocha'awi la ixcha'a an lapanak an yu kint'asanilh.
44011013	Yucha kintajunini li an la ixcha'a la'ts'ilh pumatam angelh, ma ancha sa' xyalh chi an angelh ma juniy: —K'amala'ach'at'i xamati an la'acha'an Jope, para li kaki'ilhi an Simón yu lhimispapalhkan Pedro,
44011014	yucha kajunan tani laych'a k'alhit'a'alht'axt'uya'a chi chux a mifamilia.
44011015	Akxni ts'ukulhcha ijkaxa'alay, an Stalan'a Takuwin wanajcha chuni jala'chilh tacha kitnan p'ulhnaj kintala'chin.
44011016	Pus ancha ikpastaklhicha tacha an ixnajunta an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, tan an nawlh: —Chun sawalh an Juan wa laka xkani jama'paxanalh pero uxitnan an laka Stalan'a Takuwini k'ama'p'axak'ana'it.
44011017	Pus an Dios, mu li wanajcha chuni jaxta'niy tacha yu kitnan kintaxta'niyan yu kiklaka'itawcha an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo, ¿tisu kilhijunticha kit'in para li ajkunilhcha an Dios li ntu chuni ka'ilhtulhi?
44011018	Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi an Pedro an t'ala'awnin yu jamacha'an Jerusalén, sa' talajkilhun'olh chi taxta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, ixtajuniy: —¡Pus an yu ntu judiojnin wachu jamakawniya an Dios li katakiklaka'ilh, para li katalhitsukulhi an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh!
44011019	Akxni tama'nilhcha an Esteban, an yu xtakiklaka'iy Dios ts'ukulhcha jach'a'o'akan, ixjaxkaykancha, pus an ali'in ta'os'alhcha la'acha'an Fenicia, chi la'acha'an Chipre, chi la'acha'an Antioquía. Anchacha xtalhixa'alayachalh ixchiwinti Dios an jamacha'an Judea, pero an yu ntu jamacha'an Judea, yu'uncha jantu.
44011020	Pero xta'alin wachu yu xtakiklaka'iy an Dios yu jamacha'an Chipre chi jamacha'an Cirene, yu'uncha tacha'alhi an la'acha'an Antioquía chi talhixa'alalh wachu an ixchiwinti Dios an yu ntu jamacha'an Judea, tajamakatsaaninilhi an xchiwinti Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
44011021	An x'alhp'asninti an Jamach'alhkat Dios ancha xjat'a'aklat'ajun, pus lhuw lapanaki yu makawlhcha tacha yu xlip'ulhnaj xkiklaka'i, chi takiklaka'ilhcha an Dios.
44011022	An yu xtajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Jerusalén, akxni chunchacha tak'atsaalh li xtapasay, tamala'achalhcha an Bernabé la'acha'an Antioquía.
44011023	Akxni cha'alhcha an Bernabé, la'ts'ilhcha tacha an Dios sawalhcha xjalakmapaynita, pus sawalhcha x'achan. Chi ixchuxk'ani jalhimap'a'silh li la xjalhunutk'an xlisawalhcha katataylhi'alh katach'a'o'alh an Jamach'alhkat Dios.
44011024	Mu an Bernabé sawalhcha oxi lapanaki ixjunita chi sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun i an Stalan'a Takuwin chi sawalhcha xkiklaka'iya an Dios. Chi lhuw lapanaki t'atala'xto'lhi an Jamach'alkat Jesús.
44011025	Xli'astan, an Bernabé alhcha la'acha'an Tarso, alhcha puxkawna an Saulo.
44011026	Chi akxni la'cha'alhcha aylhi'alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía. Ancha, kalaks tam k'ata tat'atawlhchalh an yu xtakiklaka'iy wachu an Dios, chi lhuw lapanakni tamasunilh. An la'acha'an Antioquiaja tan p'ulhnajcha jalhimapa'a'ukanchalh li Cristianojnin an xt'alhtanan Jesús.
44011027	Anchunu panch'e'ex xjuntachalh, tacha'alhi la'acha'an Antioquía ali'in yu xtalhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios, la'acha'an Jerusaleni xtamintachalh.
44011028	Chi xapumatam de yu'uncha, yu ixjunkan Agabo, akxni sa'cha xyalh, an Stalan'a Takuwin machiwinilh, nawlh li ka'alina ay chawani ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa', chi tapasalh sawalh, akxni xch'alhkatnant'ajun an ay jamach'alhkat Claudio.
44011029	Pus an yu xtakiklaka'iy Dios yu jamacha'an Antioquía tapastaklhi li katamala'acha'nilhi la'a'tayjun an t'ala'awnin yu xtawilananchalh Judea, tacha yu laycha ixt'a'a atamj.
44011030	Chunchacha ta'ilhtulh, yu'uncha an Bernabé chi Saulojcha jamalhi'anikalh an tacha tala'xta'lhi an t'ala'awnin, para li katalhi'anilhcha an yu laktatanincha an la'acha'an Judea.
44012001	Anchunu panch'e'ex xjuntachalh, an rey Herodes tsukulhcha jalhinajuni li kajach'apayawkalhcha ali'in yu xtakiklaka'iy an Dios, para li kajalhitama'chapukalhcha.
44012002	Lhinawlhcha an Herodes li kama'nikalhcha laka espadaja an Jacobo, xt'ala'ajun an Juan.
44012003	Chi mu la'ts'ilhi an Herodes li oxi talhiwilalh an judiojnin, pus wachu lhinawlhi li kamalaklhchawkalhi an Pedro. Akxni chunchacha tapasalh akxni k'atan ixjunita, akxni x'ukan pan yu ntu tu'u lhiyalh lhamaskajan.
44012004	Akxni xch'apayawkantacha an Pedro, an Herodes malaklhchawlhcha, chi ancha kilhmakt'at'icha soldadojnini xtalhistakta. Xpumat'at'ik'an soldadojnini xtajunita kilhmaktamincha. An Herodes xli'ilhtuy li akxni kala'oyacha an xk'atan Paxku kajamalakasuniya an lapanakni .
44012005	Pus an Pedro oxicha xlistakkanta an laka pulach'in, pero an yu xtakiklaka'iy Dios alhp'asi xtataylhi'anta xtalhitapaynini.
44012006	Chi anchunu jatats'isni akxni an Herodes xpast'ak'acha li kamaxtuya katunkuna, an Pedro ilhtatay, la xpujank'an xt'uyunk'an soldadojnin, laka la'at'uy kadenajcha xma'ch'i'ulakanta. Chi an ali'in soldadojnin xtajalhistaknantacha an la xamalhticha an pulach'in.
44012007	Walh wa akxni cha'alh pumatam x'angelh an Dios, an laka pulach'in wanaj tapulhku'olh. An angelh pajach'apachalhi an Pedro, makujulh, chi juniy: —"Lascha k'at'ay". Pus wa akxni an kadena lakmakpatajulhi an Pedro.
44012008	Chi an angelh juniy: —"K'amala'ch'incha ch'i k'ach'ant'anut'icha amiwarachi". —Pus chunchacha ilhtulh an Pedro, chi an angelh jumpalay: —K'ap'ula'axt'a'k'acha ch'i ak'inch'a'o'acha.
44012009	Wachuncha an Pedro ch'a'o'alhcha an angelh, masi ntu xk'atsayi an Pedro li sawalh u jantu yu x'ilhtut'ajun an angelh. An Pedro ixnajun li sna wa xla'puminatnant'ajuncha.
44012010	Tala'puslicha tan p'ulh xtayanalh an soldadojnin chi tan xlilakat'uycha xtayanalh, chi akxni tacha'alhcha an laka malhticha wa x'akstucha tati'alh. Pus tataxtulhcha chi akxni tala'puslicha lakatam laka tij, an angelh wa x'akstucha makawlh an Pedro.
44012011	Akxni, an Pedro lhimacha'xalhcha. Chi najun: —Chaway oxicha ijk'atsay li yucha an Dios sawalhi mala'achachalh an x'angelh, para li akimilh ma'alhtaxtunu la xmaka an Herodes chi ixchuxk'an tacha an kixtalhitama'chapuputun an judiojnin.
44012012	Akxni lhimacha'xalhcha ixlakata aniy, an Pedro alhcha la ixcha'a a María, xnati Juan yu xtajumpalay Marcos, ancha lhilhuwi x'ayxto'kan xtatapaynit'ajun.
44012013	An Pedro akxni chiwinilhcha an laka malhticha yu yalh lhilaka tij, pumatam jatsi alh la'ts'ini tichini yuchacha. An jatsi ixjunkan Rode.
44012014	Akxni alhmispalhi li yucha an Pedro, wa x'achatcha jantu malhti'anilh, apalij jats'alajtanucho'olh chi jamak'atsaaninilhcha li yucha an Pedrojo yalh laka malhticha.
44012015	An yu xtatanumanalh pulakni tajuniy: —K'a wa lok'ojlay. Pero yucha jajuniy li sawalh, chi yu'uncha ixtanajun: —Jantu yu', yucha an x'angelh.
44012016	Pero an Pedro ali xchiwiniya an laka malhticha. Pus akxni tamati'anilhcha chi tala'ts'ilhcha, xtalaktalhanancha.
44012017	An Pedro jatamakyawnilh, jajuniy li wa sa'cha katalajkilhulh, chi jajunilhcha tani lhitaxtulhcha an laka pulach'in, li yucha an Diosi maxtulh, chi jajumpalay: —Tacha ani klajunaw k'ajamak'ats'aanit'iti an Jacobo chi an t'ala'awnin. Wachuncha taxtulhcha, chi lakatamcha ampalh.
44012018	Akxni tunkunchalhcha, wa tilhilhicha xtalayi an soldadojnin, mu ntu xtak'atsayi tani lhitaxtulhcha an Pedro chi tanchuncha ixt'ajun.
44012019	An Herodes lhinawlh li kapuxkawkalh, pero mu ntu lay tala'cha'alh, pus yucha an soldadojnini xkwentajk'an ja'ilhtunilh chi jalhinawlhcha kajama'ni'okalh. Xli'astan, an Herodes taxtulhcha Judea, alhcha tawlhna la'acha'an Cesarea.
44012020	An Herodes wa xjatalh'amniya an jamacha'an Tiro chi an jamacha'an Sidón, pero yu'uncha wa tami tak'atsaalh pus takila'kilalh. Talhipuxkawnilhi li oxi kajaxa'alalh xapumatam yu xt'atapatsay an rey Herodes. Chi mu wachucha xa'ayi yucha, pus yuchacha tajunilh li kajat'anawlhi li wa oxicha katat'alalhi'alh an Herodes. Mu an la'acha'an Tiro chi an Sidón ancha xta'an'ojoy lak'iinin tanlhun yu xtama'lhtask'iniy an la xlakaat'un rey Herodes.
44012021	An Herodes ja'ulanilh la'atam wilhchani tani wanancha katala'cha'ana pus takila'kilalhcha. Yucha xla'ch'itacha yu laj'oxi xla'ch'it yu xpurey, chi tawilhcha tan xtawlay tan xp'uch'alhkatnan chi jaxa'alalhcha.
44012022	Wachuncha an lapanakni tsukulhcha talakt'asay, ixtalaknajun: —"¡Aniy ixchiwinti dios jantu wa lapanak!"
44012023	Wa akxni pumatam x'angelh an Dios, ilhtulh li kata'an'alhi an Herodes, mu ntu tu'u xliwilay an Dios, pus nilhi an Herodes, wanaj pupa'olh tsapulh.
44012024	Pero an xchiwinti an Dios ali ali xta'a'pitsit'ajun, wa tanchuncha sicha xlichiwinkan.
44012025	Akxni an Bernabé chi an Saulo ta'ilhtu'olhcha xtapatsatk'an an la'acha'an Jerusalén, ta'ancho'olhcha, talhi'alhcha wachu an Juan yu xjumpalhkan Marcos.
44013001	An tacha xtata'ayxt'o'acha an yu xtajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Antioquía, xta'alin yu xtalhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios chi yu maestrojnin. Yu'uncha an Bernabé, chi Simón yu xtajumpalay ma Ts'iti, chi Lucio jamacha'a Cirene, chi Manaén yu ayxtam t'ala'ayakalh an Herodes yu ch'alhkatnalh an la'acha'an Galilea, chi Saulojcha.
44013002	La'atam wilhchan akxni xtatapayninit'ajun an Dios chi ixtalhitask'ajay jantu ixtawajin, an xTakuwin Dios nawlh: —An Bernabé chi an Saulo, akilasakxtuniw, mu yu'uncha kata'ilhtuya an tapatsat yu ijkalhisakxtuta.
44013003	Pus wachuncha tatapaynilhcha chi talhitask'ajalhcha jantu ixtawajin, chi jalaklakpach'apakalhcha la ix'a'tsulhk'an chi ixli'astan jamala'achakalhcha tan kata'ana'.
44013004	An Saulo chi an Bernabé yucha an xTakuwin Dioscha jalhi'alh tan kata'alh, ta'alhcha la'acha'an Seleucia, chi ancha tapu'alhcha la'atam barco an la'acha'an Chipre, aniy lakaat'un wanaj la'atanchanu'ojota xkan.
44013005	Akxni tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Salamina, tsukulhcha talhichiwiniya an ixchiwinti Dios an laka lakcha'a tan xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin. An Juan wachu ani xjat'a'anta tachanu x'a'tayjunchak'an.
44013006	Tata'a'cho'o'olhi aniy lakaat'un tan wanaj la'atanchanu'ojota xkan, chi tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Pafos, ancha tala'cha'alh pumatam lapanak yu jachawana', jamacha'a Judea, ixjunkan Barjesús, ani lapanak ixnajun ma xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, pero ntu yu sawalhi xlichiwiniy.
44013007	Ani jachawanaj lapanak xt'atala'xt'o'a an gobernador Sergio Paulo, pumatam lapanak yu xjalakpastaknan. Ani gobernador lhinawlhi li kajakit'asanikalhi an Bernabé chi an Saulo, mu yucha x'asmatputuni an ixchiwinti Dios.
44013008	Pero an jachawanaj lapanak yu xtalhimapa'a'uy lhigriego Elimas, wa jat'atasp'itlhi, jantu xla'a'i li an gobernador kakiklaka'ilhi an Dios.
44013009	Pus an Saulo yu wachu jumpalhkan Pablo, mu sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun i an Stalan'a Takuwin, sa'cha la'pula'ts'in
44013010	chi juniy: —¡Isas'at'a xapay makxkay'un yu maslakatinin chi ayjunita, xt'alaxkayna chux yu oxi! ¿tasu li ali ali alhap'uyawlhip'iniya an xtij Diosi?
44013011	Chaway an Dios kamama'alh'ajniyan, k'ala'ach'ixlaya'a chaway chi ma'an lanani nt'u lay k'at'ila'ts'i an xjatapulhkunu wilhchan. Pus wa tukan ma'la'ats'isli an la xla'chulh an Elimas, chi xpuxkajuycha xamati yu kama'ch'apalhi'alh, mu ntucha lay xjalakawanan.
44013012	Akxni chunchacha la'ts'ilh an gobernador, jakiklaka'inilhcha, chi xli'a'nicha tacha an xtamasuy an ixchiwinti Dios.
44013013	An Pablo chi an xt'alhtanan tataxtunilhi la'acha'an Pafos laka barco chi tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Perge xalakaat'un Panfilia; pero an Juan jantu jat'a'alh yucha ancho'olhcha Jerusalén.
44013014	Chi akxni tataxtucho'olhcha la'acha'an Perge, ta'alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía xalakaat'un Pisidia. Ancha la'atam sábado, tatanulhcha lakatam laka cha'a tan xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni judiojnin, chi sa'cha talaktawilh.
44013015	Akxni tapunaw'olhcha an lhamap'a'sin chi an xlamap'a'sink'an yu ma'anchacha xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, an xalaj'ajin an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni tanajun: —T'ala'awnin li sna tu'u k'anawna'it yu k'ajap'ula'oximaj'ayat'it an lapanakni, ch'awaych'a k'ana'unt'it.
44013016	Pus wachuncha an Pablo tayalh chi jatamakyawnilhcha, jajuniy li kasa'ka talajkilhulh, chi jajuniy: —Jamacha'an Israel chi masi yu ntu an mila'acha'ank'an, pero yu k'iklak'a'iyat'it an Dios, k'a'asmatt'it.
44013017	An xDiosk'an xalapanakni Israel yucha an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inawi jasakxtulh. Wanaj lhuwi ja'ilhtulh akxni wa xtaama'wilananchalhka xalakaat'un Egipto, ta ntu la ixlakaat'unk'an, chi xli'astan la x'alhp'asninti an Dios jamaxtulhi an la xalakaat'un Egipto.
44013018	An Dios lhitayanilhi an xlakatijlak'an an lapanakni t'upuxam (40) k'ata, an lakaalakxixni lakaat'un.
44013019	An xalakaat'un Canaán lakatujun la'acha'ani lakt'ilhilh an Dios, para li an xlakaat'unk'an ani la'acha'anaxni yucha an yu tacha xjalhila'ts'inawi kajaxta'nikalh.
44013020	Tacha ani tapasalh katacha la'at'at'i ciento at'up'uxamkaw k'ata (450) ta'a'ma'alh. Xli'astan an Dios jaxta'nilhcha juesnini an israelitajnin sta akxni ixt'ajun an yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, yu ixjunkan Samuel.
44013021	Wachuncha an lapanakni task'inlhi pumatam rey yu kajach'alhkatnanilh, pus an Dios jaxta'nilhcha an Saúl, para li yuchacha kawalh rey. An Saúl ists'alh tichi yucha yu ixjunkan Cis, yu ta xlila'ts'in an Benjamin. An Saúl t'up'uxam k'ata ch'alhkatnalh.
44013022	Xli'astan akxni ma'osukalhcha xlirey an Saúl, yucha an Davidcha jaxta'nicho'olh an lapanakni an Dios para li yuchacha kajuncho'olh rey, an Dios nawlh: —An David, ists'alh Isaí oxi iklhiwilay, mu yucha ka'ilhtuya chux yu kit'in klakask'in.
44013023	Pumatam yu yucha pu'a'p'unminchalh ani David yucha an Jesús, chi an Dios mala'achalhi an Jesús para li ka'alh jama'alhtaxtunu xalapanakni Israel, tacha ixnajuntacha li ka'ilhtuya an Dios.
44013024	Akxni ntuka' xmin an Jesús, an Juan xjalhixa'alaycha an xalapanakni Israel an ixchiwinti Dios, xjajuniy li katakiklaka'ilhcha an Dios chi li katalaj'a'paxlicha.
44013025	Chi akxni an Juan ix'ilhtu'ot'ajuncha an xtapatsat, nawlh: —Kit'in jantu yu an yu uxitnan p'ast'ak'at'it; pero xli'astan kamina pumatam yu masi wa ak'ukxmala'xtunilhcha ixwarachi kit'in jantu k'is ikt'acha'an.
44013026	T'ala'awnin, yu p'u'a'p'unt'ant'achi'it an Abraham chi wachu uxitnan masi yu ntu Israelitajnin, pero yu k'iklak'a'iyat an Dios, aniy chiwinti yu puta'alhtaxtukan yucha para kitnan.
44013027	Mu an yu xtawilanalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi an xlakjamach'alhkatnik'an, jantu tamispalhi an Jesús chi ntu talhimacha'xalhi an xchiwintik'an an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, yu xpunawkan an laka cha'a tan tata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni akxni jantu tapatsakan wilhchan. Xliyu akxni tama'nilhi an Jesús wa yu'unchacha tamuktaxtulh tacha an xnawkanta li katapasaya'.
44013028	Chi masi ntu k'is tu'u tala'cha'aninilh para li katama'nilhcha, tajunilhi an Pilato li kalhinawlhcha li kama'nikalh.
44013029	Wachuncha akxni ta'ilhtu'olhcha tacha an ixnajunta tan sts'o'muk'akanta li katapasaniya an Jesús, tama'alhtajucho'olhcha an laka cruz chi tamaknulhcha.
44013030	Pero an Dios mala'awnicho'olh.
44013031	Chi la'alhuw wilhchani an Jesús jatalakasunitsukulh an lapanakni yu xtat'a'anta la'acha'an Jerusalén, akxni tat'aminchalh sta xalakaat'un Galilea. Pus yu'uncha tala'ts'ilhi an Jesús chi chaway talhichiwiniycha la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an lapanakni.
44013032	Kitnan chaway klamak'atsaanit'awnaw an laj'oxi chiwinti yu an Dios jajunilh an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inaw li kamuktaxtuya'.
44013033	Chaway kitnancha kintamuktaxtunin, mu kitnancha xajas'at'an. Muktaxtuycha an Dios, mu mala'awnicho'olhcha an Jesús, tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta an la xchiwinti, tan junkan salmo segundo, tan najunta: "Uxint'i kints'alhk'at'i, mu kit'in chaway ikmala'awnicho'oncha."
44013034	An Dios ixnajuntacha li kamala'awnicho'oya', para li an ixlakatunaj jantu kalakp'uch'ilh, akxni nawlh: "Ak'ilhtuya sawalhi an laj'oxi chiwinti yu ijkunilh an David li ak'ilhtuya'."
44013035	Xliyu wachu an lakatam wachu nawpalata: "Jant'u k'at'imak'awi li kalakp'uch'ilh an ixlakatunaj amilapanak yu sakxt'u, yu t'atapatsayan."
44013036	Pus chun sawalh akxni ixt'ajun an David jatapatsanilhi an ali'in, tacha xlijunita an Dios li ka'ilhtulh, chi xli'astan nilhcha, pus jala'cha'ancho'olhcha an xpaynin, chi an ixlakatunaj lakp'uch'ilhcha.
44013037	Pero an ixlakatunaj an pumatam an yu Dios mala'awnicho'olh, yucha ntu lakp'uch'ilh.
44013038	Pus chaway k'ak'ats'at'itcha aniya t'ala'awnin, yucha an Jesusi p'umak'ats'aanik'anat'it li layi k'amala'mixinik'ana'it'it mintala'alhink'an.
44013039	Li k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an Jesús yuch'a k'ap'umala'mixinik'ana'it'it wa tuchicha mintala'alhink'an, yu nt'u lay mala'mixinik'ant'it an la xlamap'a'sin Moisés.
44013040	Pus k'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, para li ntu uxitnani ch'unch'a k'ap'ut'ap'asat tacha an tats'o'lhi an yu ma'anchacha xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tan najunta:
44013041	"Uxitnan yu ntu k'is tu'u jalhiwilanant'it, k'alhak'ap'up'it'itcha, chi k'alhi'a'nit'itcha chi k'alaknit'itcha. Mu chaway ani panch'e'ex t'awnat'it kit'in k'ilhtuy la'atam tapatsat yu ntu k'is k'at'ik'iklak'a'it'iti masi xamati katajunan".
44013042	Akxni an Pablo chi an xt'alhtanan tataxtucho'olhcha an laka cha'a an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni, an lapanakni tajuniy li ma akxni kachimpala wilhchan yu ntu putapatsakan ma a'tam katalhichiwimpalhi ani laktanlhun.
44013043	Pus akxni la'olhcha an lakchiwinti an laka cha'a, xluwk'an an judiojnin chi an yu wachucha judiojnin tajunlhi masi yu'uncha ntu Judea tatsukulh, tach'a'o'alhcha an Pablo chi an Bernabé. Chi yu'uncha tat'alajunilhcha li katach'a'o'a'alhilhcha sawalhi an Dios, mu yucha jat'asanij, mu jamapayni.
44013044	Akxni chimpalhcha wilhchan yu ntu putapatsakan, wanajcha lanan lhichux an la'acha'ani tata'ayxto'lhi an lapanakni para li kata'asmatlhicha an ixchiwinti Dios.
44013045	Pero an judiojnin, mu tala'ts'incha li wanajcha lhilhuw, pus talhitalh'amalhcha, tsukulhcha ta'alhapu'iyawniya an xchiwinti an Pablo, chi wa aya xtajunicha.
44013046	Pus wachuncha an Pablo chi an Bernabé, jo'ati tachiwinilh, ta'alhtaylh tat'alajuniy: —Kitnan lhitask'iniya li aklamak'atsaniwi an ixchiwinti Dios uxitnan p'ulhnaj, mu uxitnan judiojnin, pero li uxitnan jant'u asmatp'ut'unat'it ch'i li lhi'ilht'uyat'iti li nt'u t'ach'ip'inat'iti li k'alhits'uk'ut'it an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy, ak'anawcha tan tu judiojnin tawilanalh.
44013047	Mu chuncha kintalhijunin an Dios. Yucha kintajunin: "Uxint'i k'ulatan tachanu jatapulhkunu para ixchuxk'an an yu ntu judiojnin, para li k'ajalhip'inini yu kataputa'alhtaxtuya', wa tanchuncha masi ma'at aniy lakaat'un."
44013048	Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi, an yu ntu judiojnin talaj'achalhcha, chi tsukulhcha talaknajuni li an ixchiwinti Dios oxi, pus takiklaka'ilhcha ixchuxk'an an yu xjalhisakxtukanta li katalhitsukuya jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
44013049	Chi an xchiwinti an Dios wanajcha ta'a'pitsi'olhi ta xlijalhi'ay anchunu lakaat'un.
44013050	Pero an judiojnin tat'achiwinilh ali'in t'akunin yu xtapuxkajuy an Dios chi an yu xalaj'ajincha lapanakni xjalhiwilakan anchunu la'acha'an, para li kajach'a'o'akalhi an Pablo chi an Bernabé chi kajatamakxtukalhcha anchunu la'acha'an.
44013051	Pus wachuncha an Pablo chi an Bernabé talakch'ank'alhap'uxkalhi an po'xmi para li katala'ts'ilhi an lapanakni li ntu oxi tacha an talay, chi ta'alhcha la'acha'an Iconio.
44013052	Chi an xt'alhtanan an Jesús sawalhcha xtalhit'ajuni an Stalan'a Takuwin chi sawalhcha xtalaj'achan.
44014001	An la'acha'ancha Iconio, an Pablo chi an Bernabé wa ayxtamcha tatanuchalh an laka cha'a tan ixtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin chi xluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh an yu judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin an tacha talhichiwinilh.
44014002	Pero an judiojnin an yu ntu xtajakiklaka'inin ta'ilhtulhi li an yu ntu judiojnin katat'alaxkaylhi an t'ala'awnin.
44014003	Pero an Pablo chi an Bernabé ma'ani ancha xtawilanalh, jantu xtatalhanani xtalhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios, mu xtakiklaka'iya li an Dios ancha xjat'a'aklat'ajun. Xmasuyi an Dios li an yu ixtanajun, sawalh, mu an Pablo chi an Bernabé xjapu'ilhtuycha an Dios tanlhun yu la'lhi'a'nin, chi laycha xtajak'uch'unun.
44014004	An lapanakni yu ancha jamacha'an xtatala'apitsitacha, an ali'in xtat'a'ancha an yu judiojnin chi an ali'in yu'uncha an Pablojcha chi an Bernabé.
44014005	Pus akxni an yu judiojnin ali an yu ntu judiojnin tat'atamakawlhcha an jamach'alhkatni li kajalhitama'chapukanacha chi kajalakt'alhmakanacha an Pablo chi an Bernabé.
44014006	Walh yu'uncha tak'atsaalh, pus ta'alhcha la'acha'an Listra chi Derbe, xala'acha'anaxni an xalakaat'un Licaonia, chi alicha la'acha'anaxni yu anchacha xlak'alin.
44014007	Wachu talhichiwinilhi ancha an laj'oxi chiwinti.
44014008	An la'acha'an Listra ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak yu ntu lay xjalhtanan. Jantu a'tam xjalhtananta, mu wa ch'anlh'awilhi ixjunita, wachunchacha xla'ajunta. Aniy lapanak sa' xwilh,
44014009	x'asmatt'ajun yu xnawt'ajun an Pablo, walh an Pablo lhakapu'alh chi la'ts'ilhi li layi katak'uch'ulh, mu xjakiklaka'inin.
44014010	Pus an Pablo p'ascha junilh: —¡K'at'aycha ts'awjcha k'ap'ut'ay aminch'aja'! An lapanak t'ujcha tayalh chi tsukulhcha jalhtanan.
44014011	Akxni an lapanakni tala'ts'ilhcha tacha an ilhtulh an Pablo, tsukulhcha talakt'asay, xtalaknajuncha xlichiwink'an an de Licaonia: —¡Kintala'chintan diosnin yu wa tacha lapanakni, talhmani tamintachalh!
44014012	Chi an Bernabé talhimapa'a'ulhcha ma dios Jupiter, chi an Pablo ma dios Mercuriojcha, mu yucha yu xchiwiniy.
44014013	Chi an xasacerdote jupiter, yu xyalh xtajtan la xlakapu an la'acha'an, jalhimilhcha torojnin chi xanti, para li yucha ali an lapanakni katalha'ulananilhcha an Pablo chi an Bernabé.
44014014	Pero an Bernabé chi an Pablo tak'atsaalh, chi yu'uncha tala'lh'alhi an xla'ch'itk'an chi tapujatanulhi an lapanakni, p'ascha tanajun:
44014015	¡Lapanakni, ¿t'asu li ch'unch'ach'a layat'iti? kitnan wa lapanakni, tacha uxitnan, kitnan xliyu iklhimintaw li aklamak'atsaaniw an laj'oxi chiwinti, para li k'amak'a'unt'itcha aniy tanlhun yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay, chi li k'ak'iklak'a'it'itcha an Dios yu la'ajunta, yu ilhtulh an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un, chi an alamalh chi chux yu ancha lak'alin!
44014016	Masi minchalhcha panch'e'ex an Dios makawlhi li atamj atamj kalalhcha wa tani laputuncha,
44014017	pero ntu a'tami ntucha kamasulhi tichini yuchacha yucha, tacha an laj'oxi tanlhun x'ilhtuy; mu yucha yu tamakminiyan an xkan chi li oxi kalak'alilh an jach'ananti, chi yucha yu taxta'niyan li lhuwi ka'alilh yu k'a'ut'it chi k'alaj'ach'ant'it.
44014018	Pero masi chunchacha tajunilh an lapanakni, sawalhcha lhima'anxkayi talhiwilalh an Pablo chi an Bernabé para li an lapanakni jantu kataja'ulananilh.
44014019	Chi wa akxni tacha'alhcha tichi yu'uncha judiojnin jamacha'an Antioquía chi jamacha'an Iconio, chi yu'unchacha ta'ilhtulh li tamcha katapastaklhi an lapanakni; pus talakat'alhmalhcha an Pablo, chi mu talhi'ilhtulh li tama'nilhcha, taxa'axtulhcha an la'acha'an.
44014020	Pero akxni an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha tata'ayxto'lhicha xtuntala'acho'o an tan xmalh an Pablo, yucha ostayalhcha chi tanupalhchalhcha a'tami an la'acha'an, chi akxni tunkunchalhcha ta'alhcha ali an Bernabé la'acha'an Derbe. p
44014021	Akxni jamak'atsaaninin'olhcha an laj'oxi chiwinti an la'acha'an Derbe, tan wanaj lhuw tajakiklaka'inilh, ta'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Listra chi Iconio chi Antioquía.
44014022	Ani la'acha'anaxni tat'alamachapulhi an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha, xtat'alajuni li oxi katataylhi'alh an la xjakiklaka'intik'an, tat'alajuni li para lay tanukanachalh an la xlich'alhkat Dios lhuw tanlhuni ma'alh'ajnankan.
44014023	Chi an Pablo chi an Bernabé talhka'ulapalh yu laktatanincha para li katala'ts'ilhi'alhcha an ixlapanakni Dios. Chi akxni tatapayni'olhcha chi tatask'aja'olhcha jantu xtawajin, an Pablo chi an Bernabé tama'anxta'nilhcha an Dios an lapanakni an yu jalhka'ulakalh, mu yucha an Diosi yu xtakiklaka'iy.
44014024	Yu'uncha tala'puslicha xalakaat'un Pisidia chi tacha'alhcha xalakaat'un Panfilia.
44014025	Talhichiwinilhcha an ixchiwinti Dios an la'acha'an Perge chi xli'astan ta'alhcha an la'acha'an Atalía;
44014026	chi ancha tapu'alhcha barco la'acha'an Antioquía tan xtataxtunitachalh akxni ta'alhcha ilhtunin an tapatsat yu ta'ilhtu'olhcha, ancha tan xjajunkanta li Dioscha kaja'a'tayjulh para li kataki'ilhtulhi an tapatsat yu taki'ilhtu'olhcha.
44014027	Akxni tacha'alhcha Antioquía tama'ayxto'lhicha an yu xtajakiklaka'inin, chi tat'alajun'olhcha chux tacha an Dios japu'ilhtulh, chi li an Dios wachu tachanu jamalhti'anilhi an malhticha para li lay katajakiklaka'inilh an yu ntu judiojnin.
44014028	Chi an Pablo chi an Bernabé ma'ancha tat'atamakawlh ancha an yu xtajakiklaka'inin.
44015001	Tichi yu'uncha lapanakni yu xtamintachalh xalakaat'un Judea, tacha'alhi la'acha'an Antioquía. Chi tsukulhcha tamasuniya an t'ala'awnin li ma ntu katitata'alhtaxtulhi li ntu jalaj'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkani x'a'axt'a'ak'an, tacha najunta an la xlamap'a'sin Moisés.
44015002	An Pablo chi an Bernabé yu'uncha ntu xtala'a'iya tacha ani xtamasuy an tichi yu'uncha lapanakni, stak tat'alakikxtukulh, wachuncha, t'atawlhkanchalhi li an Pablo chi an Bernabé chi ali'incha, kata'alhi la'acha'an Jerusalén, para li katakit'ach'iwinilhi an yu xjamala'achata Jesús chi an yu laktatanincha, yu xalaj'ajin, ixlakata an yu talalhikixtukuy.
44015003	Pus jamala'achakalhcha, yu'uncha an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha tajamala'achaninilh, chi akxni xtala'pust'ajuncha xalakaat'un Fenicia chi Samaria ixtanajuncha li an yu ntu judiojnin tamakawlhcha yu xtakiklaka'iy p'ulhnaj, para li katach'a'o'alhcha an Dios. Pus ixchuxk'an an t'ala'awnin sawalhcha xtalaj'acha'ni akxni chunchacha tak'atsaalh.
44015004	Akxni an Pablo chi an Bernabé tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi an yu xjamala'achata Jesús chi an laktatanincha oxi tala'a'ilh. Chi yu'uncha tanaw'olhcha chux yu an Dios jat'a'ilhtulh.
44015005	Pero ali'in lapanakni an yu xjajunkan fariseojnin, yu xtajakiklaka'ininta, tatayalh, tanajun: —Lhitask'iniya li kajalaj'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalhi ix'a'axt'a'ak'an an yu ntu judiojnin yu tajakiklaka'inintacha, chi kajajunikalhi li kata'ilhtulhi an xlamap'a'sin an Moisés.
44015006	Pus wachuncha tata'ayxto'lhicha an yu xjamala'achata Jesús chi an laktatanincha, para li oxicha katalhilakchiwinilh an yu talalhikikxtukuy.
44015007	Xli'astan akxni stakcha lalhikikxtukukalh, an Pedro tayalhcha chi jajuniy: —T'ala'awinin, uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li ma'anchacha an Dios kisakxtulhi de kitnan, para li ajkamak'atsaanilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti an yu ntu judiojnin, para li yu'uncha katajakiklaka'inilh.
44015008	Chi mu an Dios yucha mispa'ojoyi chux jalhunut, yucha masulhi li wachu jala'a'i, mu jaxta'nilhi an Stalan'a Takuwin tacha kitnan kintaxta'nin.
44015009	An Dios tu tu'u najun li yu'uncha tamj chi kitnan tamcha, yu'uncha wachu jamastalan'anilhi xjalhunutk'an, mu tajakiklaka'inilhcha.
44015010	Pus chaway, ¿tasu li wa lhila'ts'inatcha an Dios li ja'unatcha ani yu tajakiklaka'inincha li katak'uk'alhcha ts'ink'i tak'uk'at yu an ta xjalhila'ts'inaw chi kitnan tu lay lhi'anawi?
44015011	Jantu chun, kitnan k'atsayawi li ntu tu'u ilhtutaw masi ta'alhtaxtutawcha, ta'alhtaxtutaw wa xliyu an Jamach'alhkat Jesús kintamapayniyan, tacha jamapayni yu'uncha.
44015012	Pus wachuncha wanaj sa' talajkilhun'olh, chi xta'asmat'acha tacha ixtanajun an Pablo chi an Bernabé, li an Dios xjapu'ilhtuycha tanlhun yu sawalh la'lhi'a'nin an tan xtawilanalh an yu ntu judiojnin.
44015013	Akxni tachiwin'olhcha an Jakobo, najun: —T'ala'awnin, akila'asmatniw,
44015014	an Simón kintajunincha tacha an Dios oxi wachu ja'ilhtuy wa xlikutsajka an yu ntu judiojnin, wachu jasakxtuyi yu yu'uncha para li katawalhi xjas'at'an.
44015015	Tacha ani tapasay, ts'ajwi t'ala'an tacha an tats'o'lhi an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tan najunta:
44015016	Xli'astan akmincho'oya chi akla'oxicho'oya an ixcha'a David yu ta'a'talh. Akla'oxicho'oya an yu tilaktamakawwilh, oxi ak'ilhtucho'oya',
44015017	para li an ali'in akintapuxkawlh chi ta kilhmakchux lapanak yu ikjasakxtuta li katamispalh kinta'a'ut.
44015018	Chuncha najun an Dios yu lak'ilhtuy ani laktanlhun, yu wa ma'anchacha lakmispakan.
44015019	Pus yu kit'in iknajun, an yu ntu judiojnin yu tamakajuncha yu xtakiklaka'iy xlip'ulhnaj chi tach'a'o'aycha Dios, jantu layi katijajunkalhcha li kata'ilhtulhi tu'u yu ntu lhitask'ini.
44015020	Oxicha li jats'o'nikancha li ntucha kata'ilhtulhi yu jasmala'aninin, ixlakatak'an an tacha la'laa'oxikanta yu tacha ixdioschak'an xtala'ts'in, chi li ntucha katalaxa'alalhi yu ntu talat'at'ajun, chi li ntucha kata'ulhi jatapakxat yu wa aksk'anj'uta chi an xak'alhni tu'u jatapakxat.
44015021	Mu ma'anchacha ta'alin lakatamin la'acha'anaxni, yu talhichiwiniy an xlamap'a'sin Moisés chi tamin sábado punawkani yu yucha an laka lakcha'a tan puta'ayxto'kan.
44015022	Wachuncha an xjamala'achata Jesús chi an laktatanincha chi ixchuxk'an an yu xtajakiklaka'inin, tasakxtulhi lapanakni yu de yu'uncha para li katat'amak'alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía an Pablo chi an Bernabé. Yu sakxtukalh yucha an Judas yu xtajumpalay ma Barsabás chi pumatam yucha an Silas. Aniy lapanakni xtalhitapalayi tacha an xtat'ajun t'ala'a'wnin.
44015023	Chi yu'unchacha japumala'achakalh aniy cartaj: —"Kitnan yu kintamala'achayan an Jesús chi an laktatanincha mijat'ala'awnink'ani uxitnan, ijkala'axa'alayawi an t'ala'awnin yu ntu judiojnin yu tawilanalh la'acha'an Antioquía chi xalakaat'un Siria chi xalakaat'un Cilicia.
44015024	Ijk'atsayawi li tichi yu'uncha lapanakni yu ntu kitnan ijkamala'achaw, aniya tataxtulh, chi li sawalhcha tama'achapuyani uxitnan la xchiwintik'an, chi li tamala'a'o'xcho'oyancha.
44015025	Xliyu iklhipastakkwi mu chuncha yu oxi iklhiwilaw li ajkalhka'ulaw lapanakni yu kitnan para li kata'ancha'an la'ts'inin ali an yu sawalhcha oxi ijkalhiwilayaw kint'ala'awnink'an Bernabé chi an Pablo.
44015026	Yu'uncha an xjatsukuntik'an wa k'is k'ischa tata'alhtaxtulh ixlakata an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo.
44015027	Pus klamak'aniyacha'awi an Judas chi an Silas, yu'unchacha katajunan la xkilhnik'an chux aniy tanlhun.
44015028	Mu an xTakuwin Dios chi kitnan oxi iklhiwilayaw li ntucha ali k'amak'uk'ak'ant'iti ali tanlhun, kalayantacha t'ach'a ani unk'anat'it,
44015029	li nt'uch'a k'a'ut'iti an lhiway yu xja'ulanikantacha an yu tacha ixdioschak'an tala'ts'in an lapanakni. Ch'i li nt'uch'a k'a'unit'iti xak'alhni tu'u jatapakxat, chi yu wa aksk'anj'uta jatapakxat, ch'i li nt'uch'a k'ajaxa'alat'iti yu nt'u t'at'awnat'it. Li ch'unch'ach'a k'a'ilht'uya'it aniy tanlhun, oxich'a k'ats'uk'uya'it'it. Iklala'axa'alayaw".
44015030	Pus akxni tajala'axa'alanan'olhcha, ta'alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía, chi akxni tacha'alhcha, tama'ayxto'lhicha an t'ala'awnin chi taxta'nilhcha an carta.
44015031	Akxni an t'ala'awnin tapunawlhcha, sawalhcha xtalaj'achan, mu xjama'oximaj'ayaycha tacha an ixnajunta.
44015032	Chi mu an Judas chi an Silas wachu ixchiwinti Diosi xtalhichiwiniy, pus sawalhcha tama'oximaj'ayalh chi sawalhcha tamachapulhi an t'ala'awnin an la xchiwintik'an.
44015033	Chi alhcha panch'e'ex ancha xtat'ajun, an yu ancha jamacha'an t'ala'awnin tamala'achacho'olhcha lakalaj'oxi chiwinti, para li kata'ancho'olhcha tan tawilananchalh yu tamala'achalh.
44015034	Pero an Silas yucha oxicha lhiwilalh li anchacha katamakawlh.
44015035	Chi an Pablo chi an Bernabé yu'uncha la'acha'an Antioquiajcha tatamakawlh, ixtamasuy ali chi xtalhichiwiniy ali an ixchiwinti Dios, ali an ali'in lapanakni.
44015036	Alhcha panch'e'ex, an Pablo juniy an Bernabé: —Ka'ampalawcha jala'pixiyalhnin an t'ala'awnin ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni tan lhichiwintawcha an ixchiwinti Dios, para li kak'atsawi tani tat'ajuncha.
44015037	An Bernabé ixnajun li kaxjat'a'alh an Juan yu xtajumpalay ma Marcos,
44015038	pero an Pablo najun li ntu ka'alh, mu an Marcos an la'acha'an Panfilia wa xjat'alamakajunta chi ntucha ali xjat'ataylhi'anta an tapatsat.
44015039	Pus yuchacha ixlakata li ntu wa tam tapastaklhi, an Pablo chi an Bernabé talamakawlhcha. An Bernabé t'a'alhcha an Marcos, tapu'alhcha barco la'cha'an Chipre,
44015040	chi an Pablo yucha an Silascha t'atala'xto'lhi. Chi xli'astan an t'ala'awnin tapayninilhcha an Dios para oxi kaamapaynilhi an Pablo, chi ancha tataxtulhcha,
44015041	xalakaat'un Siria chi Ciliciaja tala'puschalh, xtat'alamachapuycha an t'ala'awnin yu ancha jamacha'an, yu ancha xtala'ta'ayxt'o'a.
44016001	Xli'astan an Pablo cha'alhcha la'acha'an Derbe chi lakatam la'acha'an tan junkan Listra, ani la'acha'an la'cha'alh pumatam yu xjakiklaka'inin, ixjunkan Timoteo, ists'alh tichi yucha t'aku judia yu xjakiklaka'inin chi yu xpay griego.
44016002	An t'ala'awnin yu jamacha'an Listra chi jamacha'an Iconio oxi xtalhichiwiniy an Timoteo.
44016003	Pus an Pablo oxi lhiwilalh li kat'a'alh, pero p'ulhnaj ilhtulhi li ka'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxk'alh an x'a'axt'a'a, ixlakatak'an an jamacha'an Judea yu ancha xtalakwilanalh, mu ixchuxk'ani xtak'atsay li an xpay an Timoteo jamacha'a Grecia.
44016004	Ta lakachux la'acha'an xtala'pus'anta, tamak'atsaanilhi an t'ala'awnin an xlamap'a'sink'an an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús chi an laktatanincha yu xtat'awnachalh Jerusalén.
44016005	Pus ta kilhmakchux tacha an xtata'ayxt'o'acha an yu xtakiklaka'icha Dios, oxicha xtajakiklaka'inin, chi palay palay xtatalhawayi an yu xtajakiklaka'inin tamin wilhchan.
44016006	Chi mu an Stalan'a Takuwin jantu jamakawnilhi li katalhichiwinilhi an ixchiwinti Dios an xala'acha'anaxni Asia, pus ta'alhcha xala'acha'anaxni Frigia chi la'acha'an Galacia.
44016007	Chi akxni tacha'alhcha tanchun xalakaat'un Misia, de ancha xtak'uxa'ancha xalakaat'un Bitinia, pero an xTakuwin Jesús jantu jamakawnilh.
44016008	Pus wa wak tala'pusli xalakaat'un Misia, ta'alhcha la'acha'an Troas.
44016009	Ancha an Pablo, puts'ista jala'awanalh, tan la'ts'ilh pumatam lapanak jamacha'a Macedonia, anchacha sa' xyalh chi xtapaynisk'inikancha an Pablo ixjunkan: —"K'at'at'i la'acha'an Macedonia chi akilalhi'a'tayju".
44016010	Akxni chunchacha la'ts'ilh an Pablo, xli'astan watukan ikmala'asijniwi para li ak'aw la'acha'an Macedonia, mu oxicha xajk'atsayaw li yucha an Diosi kixtat'asaniyan para li ancha aklhichiwiniw an laj'oxi chiwinti.
44016011	Pus la'acha'ancha Troas xakt'awnaw, ikpu'awcha barco lakatam lakaat'un yu la'acho'oni'ojoy xkan ixjunkan Samotracia, chi tunkunchalh ik'awcha la'acha'an Neápolis;
44016012	chi de ancha ik'awcha la'acha'an Filipos, ani la'acha'an Filipos yucha yu palay xlitapalay an xalakaat'un Macedonia chi yucha la'atam la'acha'an tan xtawilanalh yu jamacha'an Roma, anchacha xakt'awnaw lanan la'alhuw wilhchan.
44016013	La'atam sábado iktaxtuw ma'spa an la'acha'an, ik'awcha waniy lakatam ayxkan, tan a'tajcha xtapaynikan, chi ancha, iklaktawlawcha, chi xajkalhixa'alayawcha an ixchiwinti Dios an t'akunin yu ancha xta'ayxto'nun.
44016014	Xapumatam ani t'akunin ixjunkan Lidia, jamacha'a Tiatira, yucha ist'ay la'ch'it yu xtapalh la'lhuw, chi mu ixkiklaka'iya an Dios, sa'cha ix'asmat'a an yu xaknawt'awnaw, walh an Jamach'alhkat Dios malhti'anilhi an xjalhunut, para li sawalhcha kalhakapu'alhi an yu xnawt'ajun an Pablo.
44016015	Akxni a'paxlicha an Lidia wanaj jat'a'a'pax'olhi chux yu ta jalhila'ts'in, chi xli'astan sawalhcha kintatapayninin kintajunan: —Li nawnatchaa li ijkiklaka'icha sawalhi an Dios, k'at'atcha tamakawnini an la kincha'a'. Pus kintamatanunini ak'aw tamakawnin an laxcha'a'.
44016016	A'tam walh, akxni xakti'anaw an tan tapaynikan, ikpaxto'wi pumatam jatsi yu ixlhit'ajun la'atam takuwin yu xpala'ts'ikutunun. Ani jatsi wa xputapatsakancha, mu esclavaja ixjunita, xjalhit'ajun xpatronin yu wanajcha la'lhuw tumini xtapulhajay li xla'ts'ikutunicha tu'u xamati'.
44016017	An Pablo chi kitnan tsukulhcha kintach'a'o'ayani an jatsi', chi p'ascha ixt'asay ixnajun: —¡Aniy lapanakni yucha an Dios yu wilhchalh talhmani tat'atapatsay, tamak'atsaaniyani an tij yu puta'alhtaxtukan!
44016018	Chi mu wanajcha la'alhuw wilhchani chuncha xlay, pus an Pablo ja'scha mawalh, chi juniy an makxkay'un, an yu ixlakpach'apay an jatsi: —¡La ixtalakask'i an Jesucristo ijkunan k'amak'awcha an jatsi'! Pus wanaj wa akxni, an makxkay'un makawlhcha an jatsi'.
44016019	Pero akxni an xpatronin an jatsi tala'ts'ilhcha li ntucha lay ali katitapulhajalh, tach'apayawlhcha an Pablo chi an Silas, talhi'anilhcha an jamach'alhkatni an ixtan'ajni la'acha'an.
44016020	La xlakapucha an jueznini jalhicha'ankalh, chi tanajun an yu xtalhi'anta an Pablo chi an Silas: —Aniy lapanakni yu'uncha judiojnin chi wa tachiwiwayi an lapanakni ani kila'acha'ank'an,
44016021	chi tanlhuncha tamasuy yu kitnan jantu katimakaju li chunchacha ka'ilhtukalh, mu kitnan jamacha'an Roma.
44016022	Pus wachuncha an lapanakni tala'talh'amalhcha, jaxkaykalhcha an Pablo chi an Silas, an jueznin talhinawlhcha li kajala'la'a'exkalhcha an xla'ch'itk'an chi li kajala'na'makalhcha laka lakmakat'ikt'i k'iw.
44016023	Akxni stakcha jala'na'ma'okalh jamakawkalhcha, chi lhijunkalhcha an yu xjamalaklhchawnan laka pulach'in li oxi kajalhistaklhi.
44016024	An yu xjamalaklhchawninin akxni chunchacha lhijunikalh, jakitamaknulhcha tan wa anchacha juntachalh pulakni an laka pulach'in chi jalakch'ampa'asi'ulalhcha laka k'iw.
44016025	Walh ka tacha xjaytatnant'ajuncha, akxni an Pablo chi an Silas xtatapaynit'ajun chi xtalakmilhpanit'ajun an Dios, an ali'in tach'inin wa sa'cha xta'alha'asmat'a.
44016026	Walh wa akxni p'asi laklalh an lakaat'un, wanaj lakchikix'olhi an xjach'aja an pulach'in. Chi wachuncha wanaj la'tati'a'olhi an xamalhticha an pulach'in, chi wanaj la'tax'ot'olhi an cadenaj an yu xjapulakch'i'ulakanta ta ixchuxk'an an tach'inin.
44016027	Wachuncha akxni kujlhi an yu xjamalaklhchawninin chi xla'la'ts'incha an malhticha li xla'ti'a'ojoy, matakutulhi an x'espada chi xma'niputunkancha, mu ixnajun li sna ta'os'olhcha an tach'inin.
44016028	Pero an Pablo p'asi xa'alalh, juniy: —¡Jant'u t'ani k'a'ilht'uk'a, mu iktanuma'ojo!
44016029	Pus wachuncha an jamalaklhchawna sk'inlhi jatapulhkunu chi jats'alajtanulhcha pulakni, wa xk'ip'ip'icha xlay la xtalhanti chi jatatso'ottatawlhnilhcha laxjach'ajak'an an Pablo chi an Silas.
44016030	Chi xli'astan jamaxtulhcha chi jajuniy an Pablo chi an Silas: —¿Tasicha aklalh para li akta'alhtaxtulh?
44016031	An Pablo chi an Silas tajuniy: —Wa k'ak'iklak'a'it'icha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, walh k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'a chi chux yu t'a jalhila'ts'in.
44016032	Chi an yu xjamalaklhchawninin talhixa'alalhcha an ixchiwinti Dios chi chux yu xtawilanalh la ixcha'a'.
44016033	Wa yucha anchunu xapanch'e'ex jatats'isni, an jamalaklhchawnini jala'ch'a'anilhcha tan xtalajk'atsanini an Pablo chi an Silas. Chi xli'astan, yucha, chi chux an yu ta xjalhila'ts'in talaj'a'paxlicha.
44016034	Wachuncha an yu xjamalaklhchawninin, jalhi'alhcha an Pablo chi an Silas la ixcha'a chi jamawalhcha, chi chux an yu ta xjalhila'ts'in sawalhcha xtalaj'achan wa xliyu takiklaka'ilhcha an Dios.
44016035	Tunkunchalhcha wats'isin, an juesnin tamala'achanilhi policiajnin an yu xjamalaklhchawninin tan tajuniy li kajamakawlhcha an Pablo chi an Silas.
44016036	An yu ixjamalaklhchawninin juniy an Pablo: —An juesnin kintamak'atsaani li ma aklamakajucha, pus chaway laych'a k'ap'inch'o'ot'it, jantu tu'u alin.
44016037	Pero an Pablo jajuniy an yu xjamala'acha'kanta policiajnin: —Li stakcha kintala'na'makani tan lhilhuw kintala'ts'inkanan masi ntu p'ulhnajcha la'ts'inkalhi li tu'u tala'alhini k'ilhtuyaw chi kintamalaklhchawkancha masi kitnan wachu Romanojnin, ¿chaway wa la'asa'cha kintamakawcho'okanan? ¡Jantu!, wanaj yu'uncha akintamin maxtunin.
44016038	Pus wachuncha an policiajnin chunchacha tamak'atsaanilh an juesnin tacha an tanawlh an Pablo chi an Silas, pus xtalaktalhanancha, mu tak'atsaalhcha li wachu Romanojnin.
44016039	Chi xli'astan an juesnin tala'alhcha an Pablo chi an Silas, ixtask'incha laamala'mixin, chi jamaxtukalhcha an Pablo chi an Silas, xjatapaynisk'inikancha li ma katataxtulhcha an la'acha'an.
44016040	Akxni tataxtulhcha laka pulach'in an Pablo chi an Silas, ta'alhcha la ixcha'a an Lidia, chi tat'alakila'ts'ilhcha an t'ala'awnin, takit'alama'oximaj'ayalhcha, xli'astan ta'alhcha.
44017001	Akxni tala'puslicha an Pablo chi an Silas la'acha'an Anfípolis chi la'acha'an Apolonia, tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Tesalónica, tan xyalh a'atam cha'a yu xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin.
44017002	Chi an Pablo, mu chunchacha xlismanita, pus jala'alhi an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a, chi la'at'utu sábadojo xjat'alakikxtukut'ajun. An Pablo an la ixchiwinti Diosi xla'ts'ilhi'anta.
44017003	Ixjajuniya li an Cristo xlitask'iniya li kaxnilh chi ixli'astan kala'awcho'oya tacha tapasalhcha. Ixjajuniy: —Aniy Jesús yu klalhixa'alayaw yucha Cristo.
44017004	Ali'in an judiojnin takiklaka'ilh, pus tach'a'o'alhcha an Pablo chi an Silas. Wachu xluwk'ani an yu tachiwiniy lhigriego takiklaka'ilh, yu xtatapayniniy an Dios, chi xluwk'ancha t'akunin yu xjalhila'sikan.
44017005	Pero tacha ani xtapasay, an judiojnin yu ntu xtajakiklaka'inin talhaxkayanalhcha, chi tama'ayxto'lhicha lapanakni yu wa ay xtajunita, yu wa xtalaktijuntsukuycha lakalaktij, para li katala'talh'amalhcha chi katajalaktilhnilhcha an la'acha'an. Atumpaj tacha'alhcha an la ixcha'a Jasón, xtapuxkajuycha an Pablo chi an Silas, para li katamaxtulhcha chi katama'axta'nilhcha an lapanakni.
44017006	Pero mu ntu tala'cha'alhi ancha, yu'uncha an Jasón chi ali'incha t'ala'awnini jala'xa'alhi'ankalh tan xtawilananchalh an xajamach'alhkatni an la'acha'an, ixtanajun: —¡Aniy lapanakni yu wanajcha ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa tajalakt'ilhi'ulanan, wachucha taminta aniy,
44017007	chi aniy Jasón la ixcha'acha ja'ulata! ¡xchuxk'an ani lapanakni jantu ta'ilhtuyi tacha an najun xlamap'a'sin an ay jamach'alhkat, yu'uncha tanajun li ma t'awpalay pumatam rey, ma Jesusi junkan!
44017008	Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi an lapanakni chi an jamach'alhkatni jantucha k'is oxi talhiwilalh.
44017009	Pero an Jasón chi an ali'in jamakawkalh, mu tamakawlh tumin chi tanajun li ntu katita'osli.
44017010	Akxni puts'istacha ixjunita, an t'ala'awnin watukan tamala'achalhi an Pablo chi an Silas la'acha'an Berea. Wa tacha tacha'alh, ta'alhcha an laka cha'a tan ixtata'axt'o'a an judiojnin.
44017011	Chi ani judiojnin mu yu'uncha palay oxi xtajalakpastaknan, jantu tacha an jamacha'an Tesalónica, pus sawalhcha oxi talhiwilalh an ixchiwinti Dios, chi lhilhiji xtapunajun an ixchiwinti Dios, para li katak'atsaalh li sawalhi an yu xjajunkan.
44017012	Pus wanajcha xluwk'ani yu yu'uncha tajakiklaka'inilh, chi wachu xluwk'ani tajakiklaka'inilh an jamacha'an Grecia, t'akunin yu xjalhiwilakan chi lapanakni.
44017013	Pero akxni an judiojnin yu jamacha'an Tesalónica tak'atsaalhi li an Pablo wachu xlichiwiniya an ixchiwinti Dios an la'acha'an Berea, ta'alhi ancha chi tsukulhcha tama'talh'amani an lapanakni chi xtajalaktilhnincha.
44017014	Wachuncha an t'ala'awnin watukan tamala'achalhi an Pablo la xkilhtu an alamalh, pero an Silas chi an Timoteo ancha tatamakawlh Berea.
44017015	Yu tat'a'alh an Pablo tat'acha'alhi sta la'acha'an Atenas. Xli'astan akxni tamincho'ochalhcha, jalhimap'a'sikanchalhcha li an Silas chi an Timoteo watukan katala'cha'ana an Pablo.
44017016	An Pablo akxni xjapakxan'iyachalhcha la'acha'an Atenas an Silas chi an Timoteo, jantu k'is oxi lhiwilalh akxni la'ts'ilh an la'acha'an li wa stakcha xlak'alin tanlhun yu tacha xdioschak'an xtala'ts'in an lapanakni.
44017017	Xliyu xjalhit'alakikxtukuycha an laka cha'a tan xtata'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin chi ali'incha an yu xtatapaynini an Dios, chi tamin wilhchan wanajcha chuni xjat'alakixtukuy an yu xtata'ayxt'o'a an pulakni la'acha'an.
44017018	Chi wachu ali'in lapanakni yu sawalh xtajatalaninin yu xjajunkan epicúreos chi yu xjajunkan estoicos tsukulhcha tat'alakikxtukuyi an Pablo. Ali'in ixtanajun: —¿Tasucha nawputun ani p'ululu kilhuyalhi? Chi ali'in ixtanajun: —Wali pumatam yu jalhichiwiniy yu tumpaj diosnin. Chunchacha xtajuni an Pablo, mu yucha xjalhixa'alay an laj'oxi chiwinti, yu xchiwinti an Jesús, chi ixlakata tani kalhila'awcho'okanacha.
44017019	Wachuncha talhi'alhcha tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a juesnin, laka Areópago junkan, chi tajuniy: —¿Tisu la'sast'icha lhamap'a'sini yu kilalhiminitawi, layi akilajuniw?
44017020	Mu wa tayawi ik'asmat'aw tacha an kilalhixa'alayaw, chi ijk'atsaputunawi tuchini jumputuncha.
44017021	Chunchacha ixtanajun mu ixchuxk'an an jamacha'an Atenas chi an yu ancha xtawilanalh yu ntu an jamacha'an wa yuchacha yu sawalh xta'asmatputun yu wa sast'ika tu'u xtapasay chi xtalhichiwinicha.
44017022	An Pablo tayalhi la xpujank'an yu'uncha, an laka Areópago, chi jajuniy: —Jamacha'an Atenas, chux tacha ani klala'ts'inaw uxitnan, sawalhch'a jak'iklak'a'ininat'iti layat.
44017023	Mu akxni ijkilaka'alh an tan t'ap'ayniniyat midiosk'an, ikla'cha'alh la'atam tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan tan chunchuni ts'o'kanta: "PUMATAM DIOS YU NTU MISPAKAN". Pus an yu uxitnan t'ap'ayniniyat masi nt'u misp'ayat, yucha yu klamintaw lhixa'alanin.
44017024	Yucha Dios yu ilhtulh an lakaamunulhpa chi chux an laktanlhun yu ancha lak'alin, yucha xaJamach'alhkat an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un. Yucha ntu ani wilh laka tajtan tan wa lapanaknicha tala'oxita.
44017025	Chi yucha jantu ma'lhtask'iniya li xamati tu'u ka'ilhtunilh, mu yucha yu kintaxta'ni'oyan kijatsukuntik'an, chi an un chi chux an ali laktanlhun.
44017026	Wa pumatam lapanaki pu'ilhtu'olh ta kilhmakchux tat'ajun an lapanakni, para li ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaat'un, katatawlh'olh, chi jamasunitacha an panch'e'ex chi tanchuncha katatawla',
44017027	para li katapuxkawlhi an Dios, masi wa kap'a'aj p'a'ajcha tajalakch'apanalh, chi katala'cha'alhcha, masi an Dios yucha ntu ma'ati t'ajun, yucha waniya t'ajun tan t'awnaw.
44017028	Mu yucha an Diosi yu pula'awtaw chi yucha pulaklayaw chi yucha put'awnaw, tacha tanawlh wachu an ali'in minpoetajnink'an, akxni tanawlh: "Kitnan Diosi kintamala'awnitan."
44017029	Pus, mu Diosi kintamala'awnitan, jantu layi katipastakwicha li an Dios tachanu la'atam lha'aman de oro u de plataj u de chiwx, yu tacha an ta'ilhtuy lapanakni, yu wa tacha tapast'ak'acha.
44017030	An Dios jantu jalhakapu'aninilhi xtala'alhink'an an lapanakni tawananchacha, li ntu tu'u xtak'atsay, pero chaway watanchuncha chi ta lhichux, najuni an Dios li kamapaxawi kijatapast'ak'atk'an.
44017031	Mu an Dios ulata la'atam wilhchani akxni chux an lakaamunulhpa kala'ts'ina tani ixt'ajuncha atamj, oxi u jantu. Pumatam lapanak yu yucha sakxtuta chuncha kapu'ilhtuya', chi yucha kintamasunitancha ta kinchuxk'an li sawalhi li chuncha kuna', mu yucha mala'awnicho'olh.
44017032	Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi an lapanakni ixlakata li kala'awcho'okana, wa xtalhilakts'i'incha chi ali'in ixtanajun: —Apu'a'tami akla'alha'asmat'aw t'ach'a ani nawt'a'un.
44017033	Wachuncha an Pablo jamakawlhcha.
44017034	Pero ali'in tach'a'o'alhcha chi takiklaka'ilhcha. An yu takiklaka'ilhcha, xapumatam ixjunkan Dionicio, yucha wachu xma'ta'ayxt'o'a an laka Areópago, chi pumatam t'aku yu ixjunkan Dámaris chi ali'incha.
44018001	Xli'astan akxni chunchacha laktapasalh, an Pablo taxtulhcha an la'acha'an Atenas chi alhcha la'acha'an Corinto.
44018002	Ancha la'cha'alh pumatam lapanak judio ixjunkan Aquila, jamacha'a Ponto, wa xmintachalhka xalakaat'un Italia ali xt'iwi junkan Priscila, wa xliyu an jamach'alhkat Claudio xlinajunta li ixchuxk'an an judiojnin katataxtulhi an la'acha'an Roma. Pus an Pablo jala'alh.
44018003	Chi mu wanajcha yu tapatsati xta'ilhtuy yu x'ilhtuy an Pablo, pus jat'atamakawchalhcha, wa lakatamcha xtatapatsay, yu'uncha wa xtala'oxiy cha'a yu wa de lona.
44018004	Chi tamin sábado, an Pablo an laka cha'acha an tan ixtaputa'ayxt'o'acha an lapanakni, ix'an, xjaxa'alaycha an lapanakni chi xlipuxkawnicha tani kajalhimatanunilhcha katajakiklaka'inilh an judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin.
44018005	Akxni taminchalhcha Macedonia an Silas chi an Timoteo, tacha'alhcha tan ixt'ajun an Pablo, wachuncha an Pablo wa yuchacha p'as tayla'alh lhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios chi xjajunicha an judiojnin li an Jesús yucha Cristo.
44018006	Pero yu'uncha wa tsukulhcha tat'atasp'it'a chi xkayajcha xtajuni, pus an Pablo k'alhalhi an xla'ch'it tan japujunicha li ntu oxi tacha an talay, chi jajuniy: —Uxitnani mintala'alhink'an li ts'an'a'oyat'it; kit'in tu kintala'alhin. Chaway kit'in ikti'ancha an tan tawilananchalh yu ntu judiojnin.
44018007	Pus taxtulhi an Pablo an laka cha'a an yu xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin, chi alhcha la ixcha'a tichi lapanak junkan Ticio Justo, yucha wani la xpa'xti an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an judiojnini ixwilh, chi yucha xkiklaka'iya an Dios.
44018008	Chi an Crispo, yu xa'ay an laka cha'a an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin, chux an yu ta jalhila'ts'in takiklaka'ilhi an Dios. Chi wachu wanaj xluwk'an an jamacha'an Corinto akxni ta'asmatlhicha an chiwinti, takiklaka'ilh chi talaj'a'paxlicha.
44018009	La'atam jatats'isni an Dios juniy an Pablo la ixjala'awanti: —"Jant'u k'at'alhan, jant'u sa' k'ak'ilhu, ali k'alhich'iwini an kinchiwinti,
44018010	mu kit'in iklhistaktan, chi ntu xamati lay ta kati'ilhtun, ani la'acha'an wanaj lhuwi yu kintakiklaka'i".
44018011	Pus an Pablo tam k'ata apaytatcha tamakawlh an la'acha'an Corinto, xjamasunicha an ixchiwinti Dios.
44018012	Pero akxni an Galión, gobernador ixjunita an xalakaat'un Acaya, an judiojnin tata'ayxto'lhi chi tat'alaxtukulhcha an Pablo, chi talhi'alhcha laka jamach'alhkat,
44018013	tajuniy an gobernador: —Aniy lapanak wa stakcha jamatanunit'ajuni an lapanakni li ma katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios, tacha ntu chun najunta an laka lhamap'a'sini jajuniy ma kata'ilhtulh.
44018014	Walh akxni an Pablo xchiwimputuncha, an Galión jajuniy an judiojnin: —Judiojnin, li ixlakata tu'u yu ay tala'alhin u ay jama'ninti kaxwalh, kit'in xakla'asmatniw,
44018015	pero mu wa ixlakatacha chiwinti chi ta'a'ut chi milhamap'a'sink'an, pus mi akstuchak'ani k'alats'awalat'it, kit'in tu ikma'tanuputuni tan ancha.
44018016	Wachuncha jatamakxtulhcha an jamach'alhkat an lapanakni an tan xtawlay.
44018017	Xli'astan t'o'cha tach'apachalhi an Sóstenes, yu xa'ay an laka cha'a an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a judiojnin, chi wa ancha, la xlakapucha an tan xtawlay jamach'alhkat, stakcha talakasamalh. An Galión tu tu'u xlakapu'an tacha an xtapasay.
44018018	An Pablo la'alhuka wilhchani ancha xwilh an la'acha'an Corinto. Xli'astan jamakawlhcha an t'ala'awnin chi, alicha an Priscila chi an Aquila taxa'a'ilhcha xtijk'an para li kata'alhcha xalakaat'un Siria. Chi akxni tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Cencrea, an Pablo uksp'iruncha ta'a'sitlhi, mu chunchacha xlitamakajunta. Tataxtupalh Cencrea tapu'alhcha laka barco para li katacha'alhcha Siria.
44018019	Chi akxni tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Éfeso, an Pablo jamakawlhcha an Priscila chi an Aquila, alhcha laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni, jat'achiwinilhcha an judiojnin yu ancha xtata'ayxt'o'a.
44018020	Chi yu'uncha xtatapaynini li ali kaxjat'atamakawlh, pero an Pablo jantu tamakawputulh,
44018021	yucha wa jajuniy: "Li Diosi chuncha lakask'in, aklamimpalawi lala'pixiyalhnin". Chi xli'astan taxtulhcha la'acha'an Éfeso, pu'alhcha barco.
44018022	Akxni cha'alhcha la'acha'an Cesarea, alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, alhcha jala'axa'alana an yu ancha xtajakiklaka'inin, chi xli'astan alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía.
44018023	Alhcha wilhchan, a'tamcha ampalhi an xala'acha'anaxni an xalakaat'un Galacia, chi xalakaat'un Frigia, xjat'alamachapuycha an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha.
44018024	Anchunu panch'e'ex cha'alh pumatam judiojo an la'acha'an Éfeso, ixjunkan Apolo, yucha jamacha'a la'acha'an Alejandría, sawalh xjalakpastaknan chi oxi xmispay an ixchiwinti Dios.
44018025	Aniy lapanak oxi xmatalaninikanta an la xtij Dios, chi sawalhcha tachapuni xlichiwiniy an Jesús chi ts'ajwi xlichiwiniy, masi wa yuchaa xmispay an xjama'paxanti Juan.
44018026	An Apolo tsukulhcha chiwiniya an laka cha'a an tan xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni, jantucha k'is xkiktalhanan, pero akxni ta'alha'asmatlhi an Priscila chi an Aquila, ta'aylhi'alhi tan wa xpu'akstu chi palaycha oxi talhixa'alalh an ixchiwinti Dios.
44018027	Akxni an Apolo k'uxa'alhcha xalakaat'un Acaya, an t'ala'awnin ta'a'tayjulh, tats'o'nilh la'atam carta li oxi katala'a'ichalh an t'ala'awnin an xalakaat'un Acaya. Akxni cha'alhcha Acaya, sawalhcha ja'a'tayjulhi an yu xtajakiklaka'inintacha ixlakata an xjamapayninti Dios.
44018028	Mu an Apolo alhp'asi xjajuniy la x'ukxlakapuk'an ixchuxk'an an judiojnin, chi sawalhi an yu xjajuni, pus tu layi ixtanajun li ntu chun, chi ixnajuni an Apolo li an Jesús yucha Cristo, mu an la ixchiwinti Diosi xla'ts'ilhi'an.
44019001	Akxni an Apolo la'acha'anka Corinto xt'awnachalh, an Pablo an tan la'a'a'stitawk'ancha xlakwilhkanchalh la'acha'anaxni la'pusli chi cha'alhcha la'acha'an Éfeso, ancha jala'cha'alh ali'in yu xtajakiklaka'inin.
44019002	Jajuniy: —¿Uxitnan la'a'itcha an Stalan'a Takuwin akxni jak'iklak'a'inint'itcha? Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —Jantu a'tam k'asmattawi tuchini yu Stalan'acha Takuwin.
44019003	An Pablo jajumpalay: —Pus, ¿tisu a'paxatch'a yu la'a'it'iti? Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Yucha an xjama'paxanti Juan.
44019004	An Pablo jajuniy: —Chun sawalh, an Juan xjama'paxaycha yu xtakiklaka'icha an Dios, pero xjajuniy li katakiklaka'ilhi an yu astan mintachalh. Yu xjajumputun li katakiklaka'ilhi an Jesús.
44019005	Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi an Pablo, talaj'a'paxlicha la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat Jesús;
44019006	chi akxni an Pablo jalaklakpach'apalhcha, wachucha jala'chilhi an Stalan'a Takuwin chi tamcha xtalakchiwiniy yu tumpaj chiwinti chi xtalhichiwiniycha an ixchiwinti Dios yu katapasaya'.
44019007	Katacha xpumakawt'uyk'an lapanakni xchuxchak'an.
44019008	An Pablo la'at'utu malhkuyu ix'ant'ajun an laka cha'a an tan xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin, xlichiwiniycha an ixchiwinti Dios, chi ntu k'is xtalhanan, xjalhixa'alaycha chi xlipuxkawnicha tani kajalhimakiklaka'inilhcha an xlich'alhkat Dios.
44019009	Pero ali'in yu sawalhcha laj'axixin, jantu tajakiklaka'inimputulh, apalijcha la x'ukxlakapuk'an an lapanakni wa aya xtalhichiwiniycha an xtij Dios. Wachuncha an Pablo jalaj'oslicha, chi jalhi'alhcha an yu xtajakiklaka'inin lakatam lakaskwela, la'iskwela tichi yucha ixjunkan Tirano, anchacha lhilhij xchiwiniy an Pablo.
44019010	La'at'uy k'ata chuncha ilhtulh, pus ixchuxk'an an yu xtawilanalh xalakaat'un Asia, yu judiojnin chi yu ntu judiojnin, ta'asmatlhi an ixchiwinti Dios.
44019011	Chi an Dios, laj'aycha tanlhun yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanaki pu'ilhtulh an Pablo.
44019012	Masi wa payojcha u wa la'ch'itcha li xla'ala'cha'an an Pablo chi li xjalhi'anikancha an ta'an'anin, xtatak'uch'uycha, chi an lakmakxkay'un xtamakajuncha an ta'an'anin.
44019013	Pero ali'in judiojnin yu ancha xtalak'aklat'ajun, yu xtatamakxtuy an lakmakxkay'un la ixlakatunajk'an an lapanakni, wachu talhila'ts'intanulhi katajak'uch'unulh la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, chi xtajunicha an lakmakxkay'un: —¡La xtalakask'i an Jesús yu lhichiwiniy an Pablo, klajunaw k'at'axt'utcha!
44019014	Yu chuncha xta'ilhtuy, tichi yu'uncha xpumatujunk'an sts'alan tichi lapanak ixjunkan Esceva, yu xa'ay ixjunita an sacerdotejnin.
44019015	Pero la'atam wilhchan an makxkay'un ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —"Kit'in ikmispayi an Jesús chi an Pablo, pero uxitnan, ¿tisu uxitnancha?
44019016	Wa akxni, an lapanak an yu xla'apaxto'ta makxkay'un jatayla'alh, chi wanaj jalhaja'olh, mu sawalhcha k'ut'ilhi ixjunita, stakcha jala'lhitama'chapulh chi wa laj'alhalhancha talakats'alalh, xjalakmak'atsanitacha.
44019017	Chux an yu xtawilanalh la'acha'an Éfeso, an judiojnin chi yu ntu judiojnin, tak'atsaalh, pus sawalhcha xtalaktalhanan. Chi chunchacha an xta'a'ut an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, palaycha xpumispakan.
44019018	Xluk'an wachu xtacha'an an yu xtajakiklaka'inintacha chi ixtanajuncha tuchini yu ntucha oxi xta'ilhtuta xlip'ulhnaj. Tan laj'asmatkancha ixtanajun.
44019019	Chi xluwk'ani an yu xtajachawanan talaklhicha'alhcha an xlibrojk'an chi tala'xawalhcha, tan jala'ts'inkan. Akxni put'e'ekalhcha tani chunchacha tawlachalh xtapalh an libro an yu la'xawakalh, tawlhchalhi li tacha a'xt'up'uxamkaw (50) milh tumin de plataja xtapalay.
44019020	Pus chunchacha an xchiwinti an Jamach'alhkat Dios palaycha xta'a'pitsiy, chi xtasuycha an x'alhp'asninti.
44019021	Akxni chunchacha laktapasalh, xli'astan, an Pablo pastaklhi li ka'alh la'pixiyalhna an xalakaat'un Macedonia chi an xalakaat'un Acaya, chi ancha ka'anchalhcha sta la'acha'an Jerusalén. Chi xnawpalay li ka'anacha Jerusalén, ka'ampala la'acha'an Roma.
44019022	Pus wachuncha p'ulhnajcha jamala'achalhi xalakaat'un Macedonia an xt'uyunk'an x'a'tayjunin, yu'uncha an Timoteo chi an Erasto, pero yucha lananka ma'ani tamakawlh xalakaat'un Asia.
44019023	Anchunu panch'e'ex an la'acha'an Éfeso sawalhcha xlilaxtukukani ixlakata an xtij Dios,
44019024	tichi yucha lapanak ixjunkan Demetriojo chuncha x'ilhtuy, yucha xla'tapatsay plata, chi xlak'ilhtuycha lakt'ikt'i templo de lha'aman de plata, yu xlimalakxtuycha an ixtajtan diosa yu ixjunkan Artemisa, chi sawalhcha la'lhuw tumini xtapulhajay an yu yucha xtala'tapatsay.
44019025	Pus an Demetrio jama'ayxto'olhi ixchuxk'an an yu yucha tapatsat xtalak'ilhtuy chi jajuniy: —"Lapanakni, uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li oxi wilaw, ixlakata ani tapatsat ilhtuyaw.
44019026	Pero chaway la'ts'inatcha ch'i asmat'atcha li an yu tajuniy li Pablo laknawt'ajuncha li yu wa la xmakacha lapanak la'oxikanta dios, jantu dios sawalh, chi chunchacha lhuw lapanak makiklaka'inita, chi ntu wa ani la'acha'an Éfeso, wachu lanan ta xlijalhi'ay an xalakaat'un Asia.
44019027	Tacha ani tapasay sawalhcha lhima'anxkay, layi kats'an'alh an kintapatsatk'an, chi an xtajtan an ay diosa Artemisa wachu ntucha katilhitapalalh, jantucha tu'u katilhiwilakalh an xta'ayat ani diosa yu chux an xalakaat'un Asia tapayninikan chi chux lakaamunulhpa'".
44019028	Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi sawalhcha tala'talh'amalh, chi p'ascha talaknawlh: —¡An Artemisa yucha ay, xdiosajk'an jamacha'an Éfeso!
44019029	Pus wachuncha jantucha xtak'atsay tani katalalhcha an lapanakni chux an la'acha'an. Tatayla'alhcha an Gayo chi an Aristarco, xt'uyunk'an lapanakni jamacha'an Macedonia, yu xtat'a'anta an Pablo, watatacha jala'xa'alhi'ankalhi sta laka cha'a tan ixtaputa'ayxt'o'a xtapulakchiwiniy.
44019030	An Pablo xtanuputunachalh, para li kaxjat'achiwinilhi an lapanakni, pero an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha wachu, tu tamakawnilh.
44019031	An xajamach'alhkatni Asia, an ali'in oxi xjat'alalhi'an an Pablo, pus yu'uncha talhinawlhi li kajunkalhi an Pablo li ntu katanulh.
44019032	An tan lhuw x'ayxto'kan tucha xamati xlimacha'xay tuchini xtapasaycha, wa tamj tamjcha xtalaknajun, chi lanan ixchuxk'ani jantu xtak'atsay tuchini xtaalhii'ayxto'nuncha.
44019033	An judiojnin tatisamaka'alhi an Alejandro la x'ukxlakapuk'an tan an lhuw xlakyakalh. An Alejandro jatamakyawnilhi li kasa' talajkilhulhi an lapanakni, para li laycha kachiwinilh, chi li kajalhi'a'tayjulhi an judiojnin.
44019034	Pero akxni tak'atsaalhi li an Alejandro wachu judío, wa ayxtami talakt'asa'olh ka tacha la'at'uy hora, xtalaknajun: —¡An Artemisa yucha ay, ixdiosajk'an jamacha'an Éfeso!
44019035	Wachuncha an yu ixmats'o'lhi'anikan tanlhun an la'acha'an, akxni laycha sa' jamakilhunilh an lapanakni, jajuniy: "Jamacha'an Éfeso, chux an lakaamunulhpa k'atsakani li yucha ani la'acha'ani lhistakta an xtajtan an ay diosa Artemisa, chi an yu patajulh an lakt'iyan yu xt'achuncha tasuy an diosa.
44019036	Chi mu ntu layi xamati katinawlh li ntu sawalhi aniy, wa k'asa'ch'a t'awlat'it, chi nt'u t'u'u k'a'ilht'ut li nt'u oxi p'ast'ak'at p'ulhnaj.
44019037	Aniy lapanakni yu uxitnan jalhit'ant'at'it jantu tu'u ta'alhajuy an laka tajtan chi ntu tu'u wa aya talhichiwiniy an kidiosajk'an.
44019038	Li an Demetrio chi an yu tat'atapatsay, li xamati jantu oxi talhiwilaniy, ta'alini juesnin chi jamach'alhkatni, anchacha kata'alh lats'awalanin tuchini talats'awalaputuncha.
44019039	Chi li uxitnan tu'u atumpaja lak'ask'inat, laka juntaja kalhilakchiwinkana'.
44019040	Yu tacha chaway ani tapasay layi akintalhi'alhtasukan li wa jalakt'ilhi'ulananawcha, chi ntu tu'u lay katinaju tuchini ixlakatacha li tacha anicha tapasay li akintalhisakmikan."
44019041	Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an yu ists'o'lhi'an tu'u an la'acha'an jamala'pitsicho'olhcha an lapanakni.
44020001	Akxni sa'cha juncho'olh an tacha xtala'talh'amanta an lapanakni, an Pablo jat'asanilhi an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi jamap'a'silhcha. Chi xli'astan jat'alamakawlhcha, alhcha la'acha'an Macedonia.
44020002	Kilajkila'olhi yu ancha xlak'alin la'acha'anaxni, sawalhcha xjat'alamachapuyi an t'ala'awnin la xchiwinti, chi xli'astan cha'alhcha xalakaat'un Grecia,
44020003	ancha la'at'utu malhkuyu tamakawlh. Chi akxni tukancha xtajuputun laka barco, para li ka'alhcha la'acha'an Siria, k'atsaalhi li an judiojnin xtatamakajuntacha li ta kata'ilhtuya', pus wa chuncha an Pablo wa lakaat'uni pu'ancho'olh, a'tam la'puspalhi la'acha'an Macedonia.
44020004	Yu tat'a'alhi sta xalakaat'un Asia yu'uncha an Sópater, jamacha'a Berea, ists'alh tichi Pirro; chi tichi yucha Aristarco, chi Segundo, jamacha'a Tesalónica, chi Gayo, jamacha'a Derbe, chi Timoteo; chi yu jamacha'an xalakaat'un Asia yu'uncha an Tíquico chi Trófimo.
44020005	Aniy yu'uncha tatap'ulalhcha chi la'acha'ancha Troasi kintapakxancha'an.
44020006	Kitnan, akxni la'puslicha xawilhchan akxni ukan pan yu ntu tu'u lhiyalh lhamaskajan, iktaxtucha la'acha'an Filipos laka barco, chi la'akisicha wilhchan walh, ijkataymawcha la'acha'an Troas, ancha la'atujun wilhchani iktamakaju.
44020007	Yu p'ulhnajcha xawilhchan an samana, ikta'ayxto'wicha, para li akla'ch'e'ewcha an pan, chi an Pablo xjamasunicha an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha. Chi mu katunkunanta kataxtuyacha an Pablo, pus stakcha chiwinilh sta jaytatnancha.
44020008	Tan xak'ayxt'o'aw lakatam laka cuarto tan talhman juntachalh, wanaj la'alhuw pumaklhku xlakpulhkuy,
44020009	walh pumatam ts'alh ixjunkan Eutico sa' xwilh an laka ventana, chi mu an Pablo wanajcha panijniya chiwinilh, pus lhtataputulhcha an ts'alh, walh akxni oxicha ilhtatay, patajulh, xlitala't'utucha juntachalh an cha'a' tan patajulh, chi akxni tasaklhi xnitacha.
44020010	Wachuncha an Pablo ta'alhtajulh, chi lhnujuncha ukxtawk'alhi an ts'alh chi la'atanulhcha, chi jajuniy: —Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'it, mu la'ajunta.
44020011	Xli'astan an Pablo tawk'acho'olhcha an laka cha'a, chi la'ch'e'elhcha an pan, chi ulhcha, chi wachuncha taylhi'alhi chiwiniy sta wats'isincha walh. Xli'astan alhcha.
44020012	Chi an ts'alh an yu patajulh laka ventana, la'ajunta talhi'alh, pus yucha sawalhcha taputa'oximaj'ayalh.
44020013	Kitnan iktap'ulawcha ik'aw laka barco sta la'acha'an Asón, ixpiktu alamalh, para li ak'itijlawcha an Pablo, mu yucha chunchacha ixnajunta chi yucha wa lakaat'uni pu'alh.
44020014	Akxni kla'cha'awcha la'acha'an Asón an Pablo, tajulhcha an laka barco chi ik'awcha la'acha'an Mitilene.
44020015	Chi akxni iktaxtupalawcha ancha, tunkunchalh ikla'pus'wicha xlakapu la'atam ay t'un yu junkan Quío, wanaj la'atanchanu'ojota an xkan, chi tunkumpalhchalh, ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Samos ixkilhtu alamalh. Chi a'tam tam wilhchan ikpu'ampalaw an barco, ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Mileto ixkilhtu alamalh.
44020016	Chunchacha iklhit'alaw para li an Pablo tu sawalh kata'a'ma'alhi xalakaat'un Asia, yucha ntu k'uxa'alhi la'acha'an Éfeso, mu sawalhcha so'ojo ixcha'amputun la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi ixnajun li wa kaxlalhcha akxni la xk'atancha Pentecostés anchacha kastsukuchalh.
44020017	Akxni la'acha'anka Mileto xt'awnachalh an Pablo, lhinawlhi li kajat'asanikalhi an yu xalaj'ajin xtajunita yu xtajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Éfeso.
44020018	Chi akxni tala'cha'alhcha jajuniy: "Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti tani xaklaat'a'aklat'awnawcha an xalakaat'un Asia sta akxni wa ikticha'alh.
44020019	Lhilhiji xaktapatsaniy an Dios chux laka jakilhpatinijk'atsat, chi laka lhuw alhut, chi ikla'ts'ilhi tanlhuncha yu la'lhima'anxkay yu an judiojnin kixtapulhitama'chapuputun.
44020020	Kit'in o'sliyani iklamak'atsaaniw yu oxi para uxitnan, tan lhilhuw xaklamak'atsaaniyaw chi la mila'cha'anink'an.
44020021	An judiojnin chi yu ntu judiojnin ijkajunilhi li katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios chi an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
44020022	Chaway ikti'ani la'acha'an Jerusalén, yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini kimala'achay, pero kit'in tu ijk'atsayi tuchini akintapasaniyacha.
44020023	Wa x'amani ijk'atsay li chux an la'acha'anaxni tan ik'an, an Stalan'a Takuwin kijuni li an pulach'in kimpakxan'i chi lhuw lhima'alh'ajna.
44020024	Pero kit'in jantu tu'u iklhilhakapu'an an kijatsukunti yu wa para ki'akstucha, para li lhi'acha akt'ala'olh an kintapatsat chi an yu kilhijuni an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, li aklhichiwinilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti yu xjamapayninti an Dios.
44020025	Chi chaway oxicha ijk'atsay li ntu xamati uxitnan akintila'ts'incho'olh, yu iklajuntawcha an laj'oxi chiwinti.
44020026	Xliyu chaway iklalhijumputunaw li kit'in tucha kinkwentaja amijatsukuntik'an,
44020027	mu kit'in iklamak'atsaani'ojocha chux yu ka'ilhtuya an Dios, jantu tu'u yu ntucha aklajuniw.
44020028	Pus chaway k'ajalajk'ats'anant'itcha chi k'ajalhist'akt'itcha chux an yu tat'ata'ayxt'o'an, mu an Stalan'a Takuwin ta'ilhtuncha li k'a'unt'iti xalaj'ajin para li k'ajalhist'akt'iti an yu takiklaka'icha Dios, yu jatamawlh la xjak'alhni.
44020029	Ijk'atsayi li akxni ak'anacha katamina ali'in yu wa tacha laj'at'ajnaj ma'tilincha katalaya', chi wanaj kask'up tamaka'amputuna an yu tajakiklaka'inincha.
44020030	Chi masi wa siya uxitnancha kata'alina ali'in yu wa maslakatinticha katamasuya', para li an yu tajakiklaka'inincha katach'a'o'alhcha.
44020031	K'as'alaj ts'uk'ut'it; k'ap'ast'akt'iti li la'at'utu k'ata, tunku chi puts'ista, klamap'a'siwi atamjtamin laka alhut.
44020032	Chawayi t'ala'awnin, wa Dioscha k'ach'a'o'at'it, chi an xchiwinti yu pamapayninin, yucha layi ka'ilhtuya li k'at'a'ayat'iti la mintakuwink'an chi kataxta'niyani chux yu jajunita li kajaxta'niya an ixlapanak Dios.
44020033	Jantu xamati iksk'unla'ts'inita xtumin u xla'ch'it.
44020034	Uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat'it li xaktapatsay, para li aklhitsukulhi yu xakma'lhtask'iniy chi an yu kixtat'a'aklat'ajun.
44020035	Lhilhiji klamasuniw li chuncha tapatsakan, para li lay ja'a'tayjukan an yu tama'lhtask'iniy la'a'tayjun, chi klamapast'ak'aniwi an ixchiwinti Jamach'alhkat Jesús, tan najunta: 'Palay oxi li xta'kan, walh jantu li wa jama'tayanankan'."
44020036	Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Pablo, tatso'ottalhcha chi ixchuxk'ancha jat'atapaynilh.
44020037	Ixchuxk'ani talaj'alhulh chi tala'atanulhcha an Pablo chi tala'xtikilhtastuklhicha.
44020038	Sawalhcha xtala'ta'oxila'alhiy, wa xliyu jajuniy an Pablo li ntucha a'tam katitala'ts'ilh, wachuncha ta'alhcha makawnini sta laka barco.
44021001	Akxni ijkamakajucha an t'ala'awnin, wa ts'awjcha ikpu'aw an barco sta la'acha'an Cos, chi tunkunchalh ik'awcha la'acha'an Rodas, chi ancha ik'awcha la'acha'an Pátara.
44021002	An la'acha'an Pátara ikla'cha'aw la'atam barco yu xti'an xalakaat'un Fenicia, pus yuchacha ikpu'aw.
44021003	Akxni xakti'anawcha, iklaka'anawcha Chipre, yu lhtayan tantanun lakaat'un an lakxkan, chi lhilakijama'xichak'ani lhitamakawlh, wakcha ik'aw sta xalakaat'un Siria. Chi an barco, mu makawtijlalh tak'uk'ati an la'acha'an Tiro, pus anchacha iktakutwi.
44021004	Ancha ijkala'cha'aw an yu wachucha xtakiklaka'iy an Dios, pus anchacha ijkat'atamakajuw la'atujun wilhchan. Yu'uncha tajuniy an Pablo li ma ntu ka'alhi la'acha'an Jerusalén, yucha an Takuwini chuncha jajunilh.
44021005	Chi la'puslicha la'atujun wilhchan, iktaxtupalawcha ancha. An lapanakni yu kintakimakawyajun sta la xpiktu an la'acha'an, xtat'a'an'ojota ixt'iwik'an chi xas'at'ank'an. Chi an la xpiktucha an lakxkan, ikla'tatso'ottawcha chi iktapayniwcha.
44021006	Xli'astan, iklala'axa'ala'ojo iktajucha laka barco, chi an lapanakni yu'uncha talak'ancho'olhcha la ixcha'ak'an.
44021007	Iktaxtu la'acha'an Tiro, kitnan iktaylhi'ampalawi kijalhtantik'an laka barco chi ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Tolemaida, ancha ijkala'axa'alawcha an t'ala'awnin chi anchacha ijkat'atamakaju tam wilhchan.
44021008	Tunkunchalh iktaxtupalawcha chi ikch'aja'awcha la'acha'an Cesarea. Ancha ik'awcha la ixcha'a an Felipe yu xlichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios, yucha xapumatam an xpumatujunk'an yu xta'a'tayjuy an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, chi anchacha iktamakaju.
44021009	An Felipe xjalhit'ajun xt'at'ink'an xjatsi'in, tuka' xjat'atsukukan, yu'uncha xtajamak'atsaanini yu xjajuniy an Dios yu katapasaya'.
44021010	Akxni la'alhuwcha wilhchan ancha xakwilaw, cha'alh pumatam lapanak ixjunkan Agabo, xalakaat'un Judeaja minchalh, yucha xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
44021011	Akxni kintala'cha'ancha tan xakt'awnaw, xa'a'inikalhcha an isinturón an Pablo chi pula'ma'ch'ikalhcha chi pulakch'anch'ikalhcha, chi najun: —An Stalan'a Takuwin najun li an la'acha'an Jerusalén, an judiojnin chuncha katach'i'ulaya an yu jamanawin ani sinturón chi katama'axta'niyacha an yu ntu judiojnin.
44021012	Akxni chunchacha k'asmatwi, an jamacha'an Cesarea chi kitnan iktapayniniwi an Pablo li ntu ka'alhi la'acha'an Jerusalén.
44021013	Pero an Pablo kinta'alhtajin: —¿Tasu li laj'alhunatcha, chi kilama'anta'oxila'alhiniyawcha? Kit'in iktapujuyi masi li akinch'i'ulakalh u masi sta akima'nikalh an Jerusalén, ixlakata an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
44021014	Chi mu ntu layi klataminiw xjatapast'ak'at, wa ijkuniwcha li yucha an Dioscha ka'ilhtulh tani yu oxicha lhiwilay.
44021015	Xli'astan kla'asijwicha chi ik'awcha Jerusalén.
44021016	Ali'in an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha an jamacha'an Cesarea kintat'a'an, chi yu'uncha kintalhi'an la ixcha'a tichiyucha lapanak jamacha'a Chipre, ixjunkan Mnasón. Aniy lapanak ma'anchacha xjakiklaka'inin chi yucha kintaxta'nincha tan iktawlaw.
44021017	Akxni ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, an t'ala'awnin lhi'acha kintala'a'in.
44021018	Tunkunchalh, an Pablo kintat'a'ancha la'ts'inini an Jacobo, chi ancha wachu xtat'ajun ixchuxk'an an xalaj'ajin.
44021019	An Pablo jala'axa'alalhcha, chi xli'astan oxicha jajun'olh an tanlhun yu an Dios xpulak'ilhtuta an la xjatsukuntik'an an yu ntu judiojnin.
44021020	Akxni ta'asmatlhicha, oxicha xtalhipast'ak'a an Dios. Tajuniy an Pablo: —T'ala'ajun, k'ats'aycha li la'alhuw milh an judiojnini yu tajakiklaka'inin, yu tanajuni li lhitask'iniya li chuncha ka'ilhtukalh tacha an najun xlamap'a'sin an Moisés.
44021021	Chi jamak'atsanikanta li ixchuxk'an an judiojnin yu ntu xla'acha'ank'an tawilanalh, li uxint'i ja'uniya li ntu chuni kata'ilhtulh tacha an najunta xlamap'a'sin Moisés, chi li ntu kata'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxli ix'a'axt'a'ak'an an sts'alank'an chi li ntucha chuni kata'ilhtulh tacha yu lhismanitawcha tanlhun.
44021022	¿Tasucha kalhit'alayaw chawayi? Mu o'sliyani an lapanakni katak'atsaya li ch'it'ant'a.
44021023	Yu oxi kaxajchalh chunchuniya k'alhit'alat'i: Chaway aniy tat'ajun xt'at'ink'an lapanakni yu tajunilh an Dios li katamuktaxtuniya yu tat'atamakawlh.
44021024	K'ajat'ap'it'icha, chi wa ayxtamcha k'ajat'ast'alan'a chi k'ajamap'alhnincha yu tama'lhtask'iniy, para li yu'uncha kajalak'ukxwikkalhcha. Chuncha katak'atsa'oya li jantu sawalhi tacha an jajunkan li na'un. Katak'atsaya li uxint'i wach'u ilht'uyi tacha an najun xlamap'a'sin Moisés.
44021025	Chi an yu ntu judiojnin, an yu tajakiklaka'inincha, ijkats'o'nitawcha tacha an lhitamakawtaw, li ntu kata'ulhi an lhiway yu xjalha'ulananikantacha an yu tacha xdioschak'an tala'ts'in, chi li ntu kata'ulhi an xak'alhni watuchicha jatapakxat, chi yu wa aksk'anj'uy jatapakxat chi li ntu kataxa'alalhi xamati yu ntu tat'at'ajun.
44021026	Wachuncha an Pablo jalhi'alhcha an xt'at'ink'an lapanakni, chi tunkunchalh wa ayxtamcha jat'astalan'alh, xli'astan tanulhcha an laka tajtan, para li kanawnacha tani wanancha la'ojoy li lay stalan'ankan, para li atamj atamjcha kama'axt'a'a xla'ulan.
44021027	Akxni xla'ot'ajuncha an la'atujun wilhchan, tichi yu'uncha judiojnin yu taminchalh xalakaat'un Asia, tala'ts'ilhi an Pablo an laka tajtan, pus tsukulhcha tachiwiwayi an lapanakni, chi tatayla'alhcha an Pablo.
44021028	P'ascha xtalaknajun: "¡Jamacha'an Israel, akila'a'tayjuw! Yucha ani lapanaki yu wa tanchuncha kawalh, jalakmasunit'ajuni an lapanakni yu ntu oxi tanlhun para akintaxkaykan kitnan yu judiojnin, yucha masuy yu ntu yu an xlamap'a'sin Moisés, chi yu ntu oxi kapulhiwilakalh an tajtan. Atumpaj, yu chaway jatamaknuta an laka tajtan tichi yu'uncha jamacha'an Grecia, yu'uncha talhkilikiya an tajtan jantucha tu'u talhiwilay, walh chi ancha ixcha'a Dios."
44021029	Chunchacha ixtanajun, mu xlip'ulhnaj an la'acha'an xtat'ala'ts'inta an Pablo an Trófimo, jamacha'a Éfeso, pus ixtanajun li an Pablo xtamaknutachalhcha an laka tajtan.
44021030	Ixchuxk'an an lapanakni an yu ancha jamacha'an tala'talh'amalhcha, pus talakats'alajcha'alhcha. Tach'apayawlhcha an Pablo chi taxa'axtulhcha an laka tajtan, chi lascha talakmalaklhchawlh.
44021031	Akxni xtama'niputuncha an Pablo akxnicha wachu la'cha'alh chiwinti an xacomandante batallón, li ta xlijalhi'ay an la'acha'an Jerusalén an lapanakni xtala'talh'amancha.
44021032	Pus an comandante jama'ayxto'lhi an isoldadojnin chi an yu xalaj'ajincha palay chi talakats'alaj'alhcha an tan xtala'talh'aman an lapanakni. Akxni tala'ts'ilhcha an comandante chi an soldadojnin, jantucha ali talakasamalhi an Pablo.
44021033	Chi an comandante jala'cha'alhcha chi ch'apayawlhcha an Pablo, lhinawlhcha li kach'i'ulakalhcha laka ma'at'uy kadena. Xli'astan lhasakminilhcha tichini yuchacha, chi tuchini ilhtulhcha.
44021034	Pero wa tamj tamjcha xtalaknajun, pus an comandante tu layi tu'u xk'atsay, mu wa t'ililicha xtalakt'asay; pus lhinawlhcha li kalhi'ankalhcha tan tatawlachalh an soldadojnin.
44021035	Akxni cha'alhcha an Pablo an tan talakchaj talakchaj ixjunita tan xtatawlay an soldadojnin, an soldadojnin wa tach'ixli'alhcha, mu sawalhcha xtala'talh'amanta an lapanakni.
44021036	Astancha xtamintachalh, ixtalaknajun: "¡Kanilhcha!"
44021037	An Pablo akxni ixtamaknut'awkanachalhcha an tan tawilanalh soldadojnin, yucha juniy an comandante: —¿Layi akt'achiwinin lakats'uni? An comandante alhtaylh juniy: —¿Layi ch'iwiniy lhigriego?
44021038	Pus chuncha ka ntu uxint'i an lapanak, yu jamacha'a Egipto yu an tawananchacha jalhi'alh an lapanakni la'at'at'i milh, yu tajama'ninin chi jalhi'alhcha an tan wa lakaaxixnicha lakaat'un.
44021039	An Pablo alhtaylh juniy: —Kit'in ikjudío, tan ikla'awlh la'acha'an Tarso xalakaat'un Cilicia, kit'in xalapanak tan lhitapalay la'acha'an, pero lamaapaynin ak'imak'awninka li ajkaxa'alalh an lapanakni.
44021040	Pus an comandante makawnilhcha an Pablo li kajaxa'alalhi an lapanakni, pus tayalhcha an tan talakchaj talakchaj ixjunita, chi jatamakyawnilhcha li kasa'ka talajkilhulh. Akxni sa'cha lajkilhunkalh, jaxa'alalhcha lhi'ebreo, jajuniy:
44022001	"Yu lhit'ala'awnin chi xalakpaynin, k'a'asmatt'iti tacha ani aklajunaw, yu ikputa'a'tayjuy".
44022002	Akxni ta'asmatlhicha li lhi'ebrewi xjaxa'alay, palaycha sa' talajkilhun'olh. An Pablo taylhi'alhcha chiwiniy, ixnajun:
44022003	"Kit'in ikjudio. La'acha'an Tarso xalakaat'un Ciliciaja iktsukulh, pero ani la'acha'an Jerusaleni ikta'ayalh, chi yu kimatalaninilh yucha an Gamaliel, tacha an najunta la xlamap'a'sink'an an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inawi ijkatalaninilh, kit'in wa yucha an Dioscha yu iktapatsaniputun chux la kijalhunut, tacha uxitnan minchuxk'an ilht'uyat wachu yu chaway.
44022004	Wa xlip'ulhnaj sawalhcha xajkalhitama'chapuyi an yu xtakiklaka'iy ani sast'i tij, chi xajkach'apayajuy, xajkamalaklhchajuycha, t'akunin chi lapanakni.
44022005	An xa'ay sacerdote chi ixchuxk'an an xalaj'ajin yu'uncha oxi tak'atsay. Yu'uncha kintaxta'nilh jalhiki para li ajkalhi'anilh an kint'ajudiojnink'an la'acha'an Damasco, para li lay ajkach'apayawlh an yu takiklaka'iy Jesús, chi ajkalhimilhcha ani la'acha'an Jerusalén, para li kajamalaklhchawkalhcha chi kajamama'alh'ajnikalhcha.
44022006	Pero akxni laka tijka xakt'ajun, wanicha an la'acha'an Damasco, katacha atunkucha, minchalh an lakt'iyan la'atam alhp'as jatapulhkunu', wa xlimjnik'acha, wanaj kila'atanchanu'olh,
44022007	chi ikta'a'talh. Xli'astan k'asmat'a chiwinkancha, kijunkan: "Saulo, Saulo, ¿t'asu li k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uycha?"
44022008	Pus iknajun: "¿Tisu uxint'icha Jamach'alhkat?" Chi an yu ixchiwiniy kijuniy: "Kit'in ikJesús jamacha'a Nazaret, kit'ini k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uy".
44022009	An yu kixtat'a'anta tala'ts'ilhi an jatapulhkunu', pero ntu ta'alha'asmatlhi an yu kixa'alalh.
44022010	Chi kit'in ijkuniy an yu kixa'alalh: —¿Tisuncha lay ak'ilhtulhi Jamach'alhkat?, chi an jamach'alhkat Jesús kijuniy: "K'a'ost'aycha chi k'ap'inchicha la'acha'an Damasco. Anchacha k'a'un'ok'ana'a chux yu k'a'ilht'uya'a."
44022011	Chi mu an ix'alhp'asninti an jatapulhkunu kimala'ach'ixlalhcha, pus wa kintama'ch'apalhi'alhcha la'acha'an Damasco an yu xakintat'a'anta.
44022012	Ancha ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak ixjunkan Ananías, yucha sawalh xjakiklaka'inin chi ixkiklaka'iya an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés. Ixchuxk'an an judiojnin yu ixtawilanalh an la'acha'an Damasco sawalh oxi ixtalhipast'ak'a.
44022013	An Ananías kinkila'ts'ilh, akxni kila'cha'alh kijuniy: "Kint'ala'ajun Saulo, k'ajalak'awanch'o'ocha". Pus wanaj wa akxni wakcha ijkalakawancho'olh, chi laycha ikla'ts'ilh an Ananías.
44022014	Chi kijumpalay: "An xDiosk'an kilakpaynink'an sakxtuni para li k'ak'ats'at'i yu ilhtuputun, chi para li k'ala'ts'i yu Stalan'a Lapanak chi wanajcha yucha k'a'alha'asmatt'i la xkilhni.
44022015	Mu uxint'i k'anawna'a yu la'ts'i ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa', chi k'anawna'a t'uch'ini asmatt'acha chi t'uch'ini la'ts'int'acha.
44022016	Chi chaway t'uch'a ali k'ap'akxa, k'a'os'taycha, k'a'a'p'axt'icha, chi k'at'ap'ayninincha an Dios, k'ach'a'amaj'acha amintala'alhin."
44022017	"Akxni k'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, k'alhcha tapaynini an laka tajtan, walh wa tacha wa kla'puminatnalh,
44022018	ikla'ts'in an Dios kijuniy: "K'aso'ocha, lasch'a k'at'axt'u an la'acha'an Jerusalén, mu ntu katitakiklaka'ilhi t'ach'a an k'ilhich'iwini."
44022019	Kit'in ijkuniy: "Dios, yu'uncha tak'atsayi li kit'in xak'an ja'ini an yu takiklaka'iyan, ta lakachux laka tajtan chi xajkalhi'ancha laka pulach'in chi xajkamuk'anicha.
44022020	Chi akxni tama'nilh an yu ixt'atapatsayan Esteban, yu xlichiwiniy minchiwinti, kit'in wachu ani xakt'ajun chi iknawlhi li kama'nikalhcha, sta xajkalhistaknita an xla'ch'itk'an an yu tama'nilh."
44022021	Pero an Dios kijuniy: "K'ak'ilht'aycha mintij, mu kit'in la'ma'at la'acha'anaxni akmak'anan."
44022022	An lapanakni wanaj wa ancha talhitayanilh ta'alha'asmatlhi, chi ixli'astan tsukulhcha talakt'asay, ixtalaknajun: "¡K'amala'mixit'icha aniy lapanak aniy lakamunulhpa' "!
44022023	Chi mu ali ali ixtalakt'asay chi ixtala't'alhtama'st'aycha ixla'la'chi'tk'an chi po'xmi,
44022024	pus an comandante lhinawlhcha li katamaknukalhcha an tan tawilanalh an soldadojnin an Pablo, chi lhinawlhcha li kala'ana'makalhcha, para li kanawlhcha tuchini ixlakatacha li an lapanakni sawalhcha xtalhilakt'asay.
44022025	Pero akxni xch'iyawkantacha para li ka'ayna'kanacha, an Pablo lhisakmilhi an kapitán yu ancha ixt'ajun, juniy: —¿Ch'unch'a lhi'unk'anat uxitnan li layi k'ala'ana'mat xamati yu xalapanak Roma, chi masi ntuka' k'atsakani li tu'u ilhtuta tala'alhin?
44022026	Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an kapitán, alh mak'atsaanini an comandante, juniy: —¿T'isunch'a k'a'ilht'uya'a uxint'i? Aniy lapanak xalapanak Roma.
44022027	Pus wachuncha an comandante la'alhi an Pablo chi juniy: —Sawalhi li xalapanak Romajk'at'i? An Pablo alhtaylh juniy: —Chun.
