44022028	An comandante najun: —K'it'in wanaj la'lhuw tumini iklhits'an'alh para li lay akwalh xalapanak Roma. An Pablo alhtaylh juniy: —Pus kit'in xalapanak Roma sawalh mu kit'in chuncha iktsukulh.
44022029	Wachuncha an yu kaxtala'ana'malh an Pablo talaj'oslicha, chi an comandante wachu', mu k'atsalhcha li wachu xalapanak Roma, chi xtalhanancha, mu yuchaa xma'ch'iyajuta.
44022030	Akxni tunkunchalhcha, an comandante, mu xk'atsaputuncha oxi tuchini yu xtalhi'alhtasuycha an judiojnin an Pablo, lakmakp'uxlicha an cadena chi lhinawlhcha li katata'ayxto'lhicha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi ixchuxk'an an xalaj'ajin lapanakni yu tama'ilhtuy junta. Wachuncha an comandante lhi'alhcha an Pablo chi la xlakapuchak'ani yawlh.
44023001	An Pablo sa'cha jala'ts'ini an yu xta'ilhtuy junta, chi jajuniy: —T'ala'awnin, kit'in sta chaway la x'ukxlakapu Dios ijk'atsayi li oxi ikt'ajun.
44023002	Pus wachuncha an Ananías yu xa'ay sacerdote ixjunita, jajunilhi an yu waniy xtat'ayanalh li katakiksalhi an Pablo.
44023003	Chi an Pablo alhtaylh juniy: —¡Uxint'i wa t'a'ukxp'ut'uyunun Diosi kakiksayan! Mu uxint'i li anch'unu wilht'i, para li lakalhamap'a'sini ak'ilats'awalanin ani yu klats'awalay, ¿chi tasu li k'ilhina'uncha li akinkiksakalhi?, jant'u ch'uni ilht'uy tacha an najunta lhamaap'a'sin.
44023004	An lapanakni yu wachu ancha xtat'ajun tajuniy an Pablo: —¿Tasu li t'ap'u'uych'a ch'unch'a xa'alay an xa'ay tukan isacerdote Diosi?
44023005	An Pablo jajuniy: —T'ala'awnin, kit'in tu xajk'atsay li yucha aniya yu tukancha xa'ay sacerdote, mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios, najunta: "Jant'u wa aya k'a'uni xapumatam yu ch'alhkatnan la mila'acha'an".
44023006	Chi an Pablo mu jalhakapu'alhi an lapanakni li an ali'in yu'uncha an saduceojnin chi an akilhmaktamin yu'uncha an yu xjajunkan fariseojnin, pus p'ascha jaxa'alalh jajuniy: —T'ala'awnin, kit'in ikfariseo, chi yu ta ijkalhila'ts'in wachu yu'un; chi tuchi kilhilhiminkanta aniy wa xliyu li ijkiklaka'iya li katala'awcho'oya an yu tanitacha.
44023007	Akxni chunchacha nawlh an Pablo, an fariseojnin chi an saduceojnin tsukulhcha talakikxtukuy, chi tatakilhmakt'uyulhcha an tan xta'ayxto'nun,
44023008	mu an saduceojnin tanajun li an yu talaknitacha jantucha a'tam katitala'awcho'olh, chi tanajun li ntu tu'u angelhnin chi li ntu tu'u takuwin, pero an fariseojnin yu'uncha tanajun li chun.
44023009	Pus wa t'ili t'ilicha xtalakchiwiniy, walh ali'in an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, yu xtat'a'an an fariseojnin, talaktayalh chi tanajun: —Aniy lapanak tu tu'u ilhtuta tala'alhin, ka sna pumatam angelh u takuwini xa'alalh.
44023010	Chi mu palaycha tala'talh'amalh an lapanakni, pus an comandante xtalhanancha li wa lay wanajcha lakt'ikt'i kata'ilhtu'olh an Pablo, pus lhinawlh li katamaxtulhi an soldadojnin chi li katalhi'ampalh a'tami an tan tatawlachalh.
44023011	Akxni taputs'isilhcha, an Dios talakasunilhi an Pablo, chi juniy: "Pablo, jo'ati k'anaw, mu t'ach'a lhich'iwiniya kinchiwinti ani la'acha'an Jerusalén, wanajcha chuni k'a'ilht'uya'a la'acha'an Roma".
44023012	Akxni tunkunchalhcha, tichi yu'uncha judiojnin wa tamcha tak'atsaalh li katama'niyacha an Pablo, tanajun li ntu katitawaylh chi li ntu tu'u katita'otlhi sta li ntu tama'niy, tanawlhi li chuncha katalaya sawalh.
44023013	Palay de t'up'uxam (40) lapanakni yu chuncha talhitamakawlh.
44023014	Chi tala'alhcha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xalaktatanincha judiojnin, chi tat'alajuniy: —Kitnan iktamakajucha laka lhi'ay junita li ntu tu'u akti'u sta li ntu ikma'niyaw an Pablo.
44023015	Chaway uxitnan chi an ali'in an yu tama'ilhtuy ay junta, k'ask'initcha an comandante li lhiy katalhiminincha an Pablo, k'a'unit li wa oxicha palay k'atsaputunkan tuchini yu ilhtutacha, chi kitnan akla'asijawcha akma'niyaw akxni ntuka' chin.
44023016	Pero an sts'alh yu xt'alajamatsan an Pablo, k'atsaalh, pus alhi mak'atsaanini an Pablo an tan xtawilananchalh soldadojnin.
44023017	Wachuncha an Pablo t'asanilh pumatam kapitán, chi juniy: —K'alhip'inichika ani ts'alh an comandante, mu tuchichun kajuna'.
44023018	Pus an capitán lhi'anilhcha an ts'alh an comandante chi juniy: —An tach'in Pablo kixa'alalh chi kijuni li ma aklhiminin ani ts'alh, ma tuchichun jumputunan.
44023019	An comandante ma'ch'apachalhi an ts'alh chi lakatamcha lhi'alh, juniy: —¿Tisu k'i'ump'ut'uncha?
44023020	An ts'alh juniy: —An judiojnin tatamakawlhcha li lhiy ma katajunan li k'alhip'i an Pablo an laka junta, ma wa palaycha oxi k'atsaputunkan tuchini ilhtutacha katajunan.
44023021	Pero nt'u k'ajak'iklak'a'it'i, mu palay de t'up'uxam ixlapanaknik'ani tatats'e'ta, tapakxan'iya an Pablo, chi laka lhi'ay junita tanajunta li ma ntu katitawaylh chi ma ntu tu'u katita'otlhi sta li ma ntu tama'ni an Pablo, chaway tala'asijtacha, wayuchacha tapakxan'i t'ani k'aja'una'acha.
44023022	Wachuncha an comandante mala'achacho'olhcha an ts'alh, chi juniy li ntu xamati kajunilh li kiimak'atsaanilh.
44023023	An comandante jat'asanilh xt'uyunk'an xkapitanin, chi jajunilh li katamala'asijnilh la'at'uy ciento soldadojnin yu wa tach'aja'an, chi t'utump'uxam (60) yu laka kawayo chi la'at'uy ciento yu talaklhi'an xpatipnik'an, para li kata'alh la'acha'an Cesarea las nueve, akxni puts'istacha.
44023024	Chi lhinawpalh li kamala'asijninikalh kawayojo an Pablo, para li kaputawk'alhcha, chi lhinawlhcha an comandante li oxi kalhicha'ankalh an Pablo la x'ukxlakapu an gobernador Félix.
44023025	An comandante, jat'amala'achalhcha a'xtam carta tan ixnajunta:
44023026	Kit'in Claudio Lisias, ikmala'achaniyan ani cartaja gobernador Félix, chi ikla'axa'alayan.
44023027	Aniy lapanak yucha an judiojnini tach'apayawlh, chi xtama'niputuncha, pero akxni ijk'atsalh li yucha xalapanak Roma, ijkat'a'alhi an kisoldadojnin chi ijkima'alhtaxtulh.
44023028	Chi mu ijk'atsaputulhi tuchini xtalhi'alhtasuycha, pus iklhi'alhi an xta'ayxto'nun an judiojnin,
44023029	walh ijk'atsalhi li yu xtalhi'alhtasuy, yucha an xlamap'a'sink'an yu'uncha; pero ntu tu'u yu kalhima'nikalhcha, chi masi wa kamalaklhchawkalhcha laka pulach'in.
44023030	Chi chaway mu ijk'atsalhi li an judiojnin wa tama'niputun, pus xliyu iklhimala'achaniyan; chi wachucha ijkajunilhi an yu ta'alhtasuy li la mi'ukxlakapucha katalats'awalalh tuchini talhimuk'aycha.
44023031	An soldadojnin tacha yu jalhijunkalhcha chunchacha ta'ilhtulh, talhi'alhcha an Pablo puts'ista la'acha'an Antípatris.
44023032	Tunkunchalh, an soldadojnin an yu wa xtach'aja'anta, tacha'ancho'olhcha xtatawlay, chi an yu laka kawayo xta'anta, yu'unchacha tat'a'alh an Pablo.
44023033	Akxni tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Cesarea, taxta'nilhcha an gobernador an carta chi an Pablo.
44023034	Chi akxni punaw'olhcha an gobernador an carta, lhasakminilhcha tanchuncha xla'acha'an an Pablo, chi akxni k'atsalhcha li jamacha'a Cilicia,
44023035	juniy: —Akxni katachinacha an yu ta'alhtasuyan, akxnicha ak'asmatniyan. Chi wachuncha lhinawlhcha li kalhi'ankalhcha an la xpalacio Herodes chi li oxi kalhistakkalh.
44024001	La'akisicha wilhchan la'pusli, an Ananías yu xa'aycha tukan sacerdote ixjunita, jat'acha'alhcha la'acha'an Cesarea ali'in an yu laktatanincha chi pumatamcha abogado ixjunkan Tértulo. Tala'cha'alhcha an gobernador para li kata'alhtasulhcha an Pablo.
44024002	Akxni lhicha'ankalhcha an Pablo, an Tértulo tsukulhcha ja'alhtasunun, juniy an Félix: —Lhimala'puchajuncha jamach'alhkat, mu milakata li oxi sa' wilakalh, chi lhuw tanlhuni oxi la'ts'ilhi'ankanta ani la'acha'an la mijatapast'ak'at.
44024003	Kitnan wa tanchuncha ikla'ts'inawi t'ach'a an t'ap'ats'at'a'un chi sawalhcha iklaxta'niyaw lhimala'puchajun.
44024004	Chi para ntucha ali akmama'tijlan, iktapayniniyanka li akila'asmatniwka tam pants'ik'is.
44024005	Aniy lapanak ikla'cha'antaw wa sawalhcha jalakt'ilhi'ulanan, wa sawalhcha jalama'ayniya an judiojnin ta xli'ay an lakaamunulhpa', chi yucha yu xa'ay an jajunkan li nazarenojnin.
44024006	Chi an laka tajtan ix'ilhtuputuni yu ntu makawkan ka'ilhtukalh, xliyu kitnan iklhich'apayaju, chi kitnancha xak'ilhtuputunaw tacha an najunta lakilhamap'a'sink'an.
44024007	Pero an Comandante Lisias kintama'xa'axtun,
44024008	chi jamala'achachalhcha yu katamin mak'atsaaninin tani klayawcha, para li aniya akmiw. K'alhisakmit'icha uxint'iy ani lapanak, k'ak'ats'aya'acha li chun sawalhi chux tacha an iklhi'alhtasuyaw.
44024009	An judiojnin yu ancha xtat'ajun wa tamcha ixtanajun.
44024010	Pus an gobernador tamakyawnilhi an Pablo li kachiwinilhcha, an Pablo najun: —Kinta'achanini akchiwinina aknawna kimputa'a'tayjun, mu ijk'atsayi li uxint'i ma'anch'ach'a wilhnin milhijues ani la'acha'an.
44024011	Uxint'i layi k'alhasakmin li sawalhi yu iknajun li wa la'akawt'uyka wilhchani ikchilh la'acha'an Jerusalén para li aktapayninilh an Dios,
44024012	chi ntu a'tami aki'a'taymakalhcha akt'alakikxtukulh xamati', u li ajkalaktilhlhicha an lapanakni an lakatajtan chi an lakalakcha'a tan tapula'ta'ayxto'palay, u wa tanchuncha an la'acha'an ajkalaktilhlhi.
44024013	Aniy lapanakni jantu layi katitamasulh tu'u para li katasulhcha li sawalhi yu kintalhi'alhtasuy.
44024014	Pero yu iknajun la mi'ukxlakapu: kit'in ikt'atapatsay an Dios yu xtakiklaka'iy an kilakpaynin tacha yu najuntacha ka'ilhtukalh yu Sast'i Tij, yuchaa an yu tajuniy ani lapanakni ma tumpaj jatapast'ak'ati yu ik'ilhtuy, mu kit'in ijkiklaka'i'ojoyi tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta laka laklibro yu puwilh lhamap'a'sin chi an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
44024015	Chi tacha yu'uncha tanajun, kit'in wanajcha chuni iknajun, ikpakxan'iya li an Dios kajamala'awnicho'oya an yu talaknitacha, yu oxi lapanakni chi yu wa ay tajunita.
44024016	Xliyu kit'in lhilhiji iklhit'alay li stalan'a kawalh kijatapast'ak'at la x'ukxlakapu an Dios chi an lapanakni.
44024017	La'alhuwcha k'ata ijki'aklatsukulh tan tumpaj la'acha'anaxni, chi chaway ijkalhiminitacha an yu ikpusaklhi tumin an jakilhpatinin chi akma'axtaniyacha lha'ulani an Dios.
44024018	Yucha xakla't'ajun akxni tichi yu'uncha judiojnin jamacha'an xalakaat'un Asia kintala'cha'alh an laka tajtan, chi kit'in xakstalan'antacha, pero jantu tu'u lhilhuw xt'awkan ancha chi ntu tu'u xajkalaktilht'ajun an lapanakni.
44024019	Yu'uncha yu ani kaxtatsukulh chi xakinta'alhtasulhcha li sna tu'u yu lay akintalhi'alhtasulh,
44024020	chi li jantu, yu'uncha anicha tat'ajuni katanawlh li sna tu'u tala'alhini kila'cha'aninikalh akxni xakilhi'ankanta laka ay junta yu ta'ilhtulh an judiojnin.
44024021	Yu ijk'atsay iknawlh chi p'asi iknawlh, ta'asmat'ojoy, sna yucha lay katajunilh, iknawlh: "Chaway uxitnancha kilajunt'awnaw li oxi u jantu, wa xliyu li ijkiklaka'iya li katala'awcho'oya an yu talaknitacha."
44024022	Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an Félix, mu yucha oxi ixk'atsay ixlakata an sast'i tij, wachuncha makawlh ani lakchiwinti, jajuniy: —Akxni kaminacha an comandante Lisias, akxniy ajk'atsaya oxi tuchini ixlakatacha yu ani la't'ant'at.
44024023	Chi an Félix lhijunilhcha an capitán li an Pablo kalhistakkalh, pero li kamakawnilhi li layi ka'ilhtulh tu'u yu ilhtuputun, chi li an yu oxi xjat'alalhi'an an Pablo li layi katala'cha'alh.
44024024	La'puslicha wilhchan, a'tamcha cha'ampalhi an Félix, ixt'a'anta ixt'iwi ixjunkan Drusila, yucha judía. Pus an Félix lhinawlhcha li kakit'asanikalhi an Pablo, chi alha'asmatlhicha yu xlichiwiniy, an Pablo xlichiwiniy li kakiklaka'ikalhi an Jesucristo.
44024025	Pero akxni asmatlhicha an Félix li an Pablo xlichiwiniy li ts'ajwi katsukukalh chi li ka'akstu ilhtukawi li ka'ilhtuwi yu oxi, chi li Diosi kanawna akxni ka'ukla'oya tichini yu oxicha ixt'ajun chi tichini yu jantucha, an Félix talhanalh, pus junkan an Pablo: —K'ap'inchicha. Akt'asanipalanka akxni kapulhijumpala'.
44024026	Chi an Félix ixpakxan'i li an Pablo ka'ixta'nilh tumin, xliyu wanajcha a'lhuwi ixt'asani chi xt'alakchiwinicha.
44024027	La'at'uy k'ata chuncha la'pusli; xli'astan an Félix taxtucho'olhcha xligobernador, yucha an Porcio Festojcha tawlhnicho'olh, chi mu an Félix oxi ixjat'alamakawputun an judiojnin, pus malaklhchawlhka an Pablo.
44025001	An Festo cha'alhcha para li kajama'tayananacha xligobernador, chi la'at'utucha wilhchan la'pusli an la'acha'an Cesarea taxtulhcha, alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén.
44025002	Ancha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xalaj'ajin judiojnin tachiwimaj'alhcha an Pablo la xmakni an Festo.
44025003	Wanaj wa lhilakatijtam tajunilhi li kalhinawlhi li an Pablo kalhi'ankalhi la'acha'an Jerusalén. Yu'uncha, yu xtapastakta, li an Pablo ka xma'nikalhi an laka tij.
44025004	Pero an Festo jajuniy li an Pablo kataylhi'ana katalaklhchawya la'acha'an Cesarea, chi jajuniy li wanaj yucha past'ak'a ka'ana wa tukan.
44025005	Jajuniy: —Xliyu amijamach'alhkatnik'an akintat'a'alhi la'acha'an Cesarea, walh lani li ani lapanak ilhtuta tu'u tala'alhin, anchacha lay k'a'alht'asuya'it.
44025006	An Festo ka tacha la'atsajin u la'akaw wilhchani ixt'ajun la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi wachuncha ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Cesarea. Tunkunchalh tawlhnilhcha xlich'alhkat chi lhinawlhcha li kalhi'anikalhcha an Pablo.
44025007	Akxni tanuchalhcha an Pablo, an judiojnin yu xtamintachalh Jerusalén tacha'alhcha chi tanlhuncha yu laj'alhp'asi talhi'alhtasulh, masi ntu inta lay putasulh li sawalh.
44025008	Chi an Pablo para li kaputa'a'tayjulhcha ixnajun: —Kit'in tu tu'u k'ilhtuta tu'u tala'alhin, u tu'u ak'ilhtunilh tala'alhin an xlamap'a'sink'an judiojnin, u an tajtan, u an ay xajamachalhkat Roma.
44025009	Pero mu an Festo oxi ixjat'atamakawputun an judiojnin, pus lhisakmilhi an Pablo, juniy: —¿K'uxap'ini Jerusalén para li ancha aklats'awalachalh milakata?
44025010	An Pablo alhtaylh, juniy: —La xlakapu xajamach'alhkat Romaja ikt'ajun, aniya lay akint'alats'awalakana'. Tacha uxint'i oxi k'ats'ay, jantu tu'u yu ntucha oxi ijka'ilhtunita an judiojnin.
44025011	Li tu'u k'ilhtuta tala'alhin yu lay akilhima'nikalh, aklhiniyacha, pero li ntu tu'u yu sawalh tacha an kintalhi'alhtasuy, jantu xamati t'acha'an lay akima'axta'lhi la xmaknik'an ani lapanakni. Yucha an ay jamach'alhkatcha iknajun li akijunilh li oxi u jantu tani iklaycha.
44025012	Wa chuncha an Festo jalhisakmilhcha an xt'ajamach'alhkatni tani yu oxicha kawalh, pus najun: —Mu li yucha an ay jamach'alhkatch'a na'un li kajunin li oxi u jantu t'ani laycha, yuch'ach'a k'ala'p'ina'a.
44025013	La'alhucha wilhchani la'pusli, an rey Agripa chi an Berenice ta'alh la'acha'an Cesarea, ta'alh la'axa'alanin an Festo.
44025014	Chi mu la'alhuw wilhchani ancha xtat'awnachalh, an Festo junilhi an rey ixlakata an Pablo. Juniy: —Aniy t'ajun pumatam lapanak yu an Félix malaklhchawlh.
44025015	Akxni xakt'awnachalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xalaktatanincha judiojnin kintala'cha'alh, tan tachiwimaj'an ani lapanak, kintajuni li ma kama'nikalhcha.
44025016	Kit'in ijkajuni li an xajamach'alhkat Roma jantu chuni ilhtuy li kama'nilhcha xamati tach'in li ntu p'ulhnajcha jat'alats'awalayi an yu tachiwimaj'an, para li kachiwinilhcha wachu', li sna sawalh u jantu yu lhi'alhtasukan.
44025017	Xliyu akxni takilachilhcha yu'uncha, jantucha ikpakxanilh, wanaj wa tunkunchalh iktawilhcha la kintants'i an tan ikch'alhkatnan, chi iklhinawlhcha li kalhiminkalhcha an lapanak.
44025018	Pero an yu tacha'alhcha li xta'alhtasuycha, jantu tu'u talhimuk'alh tu'u yu kit'in xakpast'ak'a li sna yuchacha tala'alhini ilhtuta.
44025019	Yu xtalhimuk'ay wa ixlakatacha tanlhun yu takiklaka'i, chi tichiyuchacha Jesús yu nitacha, yu an Pablo najun ma la'ajunta.
44025020	Chi mu kit'in jantu ijk'atsay tani aklhit'alalhcha yu yucha ixlakata, iklhisakmilhi an Pablo li sna k'uxa'ani Jerusalén para li anchacha kat'alats'awalakanchalh aniy tanlhun.
44025021	Pero yucha najun li ma yucha an ay jamach'alhkatcha kat'alats'awalalh, pus kit'in iklhinawlh li katanulhka laka pulach'in sta li akxni laycha akmala'acha'niya an ay jamach'alhkat.
44025022	Wachuncha an rey Agripa juniy an Festo: —Kit'in wachu ik'alha'asmatputuni anchunu lapanak. An Festo ja'alhtayanalh, najun: —Lhiycha k'a'alha'asmat'a'a.
44025023	Tunkunchalh, an Agripa chi an Berenice sawalhcha oxi tala'mala'ch'ininta tacha'alh, chi tatanuchalhcha an tan kalakchiwinkana', tat'acha'alhcha an xalaj'ajin soldadojnin chi an xalaj'ajincha lapanakni an la'acha'an. An Festo lhinawlhcha li kalhiminkalhcha an Pablo,
44025024	chi najun: —Rey Agripa chi chux lapanakni yu ani kintat'a'ayxto'nunan: Anich'a la'ts'inat'iti ani lapanak. Chux an judiojnin wa lhuwcha tanlhuni talhi'alhtasuy, ta'alhtasuyi an la'acha'an Jerusalén chi ani Cesarea, chi ntu sa' talajkilhuni kintask'ini li ma kama'nikalhcha.
44025025	Pero kit'in iknajun jantu tu'u ilhtuta tala'alhin, para li kama'nikalhcha. Chi ix'akstu najun li yucha an ay jamach'alhkatcha ma kajunilh li oxi u jantu tani laycha, pus kit'in ikpastaklhicha li akmala'achaniyacha la'acha'an Roma an ay jamach'alhkat.
44025026	Pero mu ntu tu'u yu oxicha ajk'atsaalh ixlakata yucha, para li akts'o'nilhcha an ay jamach'alhkat, pus chaway uxitnancha iklalhiminitaw, pero uxint'i yu palay iklhisakmiyani rey Agripa, tani yu oxicha kawalh, para li xli'astan laycha tu'u akts'o'lhi.
44025027	Mu wanaj tucha k'is pujatapast'ak'ati li laycha akmala'achalh xamati tach'in li ntu tu'u iknajun tuchini lhi'alhtasukancha.
44026001	Wachuncha an rey Agripa juniy an Pablo: —Layi k'ach'iwin t'uch'ini nawp'ut'uncha yu tacha mimputa'a'tayjuncha. Pus an Pablo tamakch'ixli chi chunchunicha tsukulh chiwiniy:
44026002	Oxi ijk'atsan li chaway layi akchiwina la mi'ukxlakapu'u rey Agripa, para li aknawlh li ntu sawalhi chux tacha an kintalhi'alhtasuy an judiojnin.
44026003	Chi palaycha oxi iklhiwilay mu uxint'i oxi misp'a'o'oy tacha an talhismanita an judiojnin chi tacha aniy tanlhun yu iklalhikikxtukuyaw. Xliyu iklhisk'iniyan lamapaynin li xlak'anti ak'i'asmatnin.
44026004	Ixchuxk'an an judiojnin tak'atsayi tani kijatsukunticha, akxni xakt'ajun lakint'un chi la'acha'an Jerusalén, sta akxni wa ts'alhka xajkunita, tak'atsay.
44026005	Wachu tak'atsayi li kit'in wa ijkun'alhitacha fariseo, tan lakask'inkan li ts'awj sawalhi kamuktaxtukalh yu kiklaka'ikan, chi layi katanawlh li tanawputun.
44026006	Chi chaway xliyuchacha kintalhilhiminta ani li kanawkalhcha li oxi u jantu yu k'ilhtuy wa xliyu li kit'in ikpakxan'iya tacha an jajunilh an Dios an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw.
44026007	An kilhmakkawt'uy kilapanaknik'an ta'alin xalakaat'un Israel, tapakxan'iya li tala'ts'imputuni li chuncha kuna tacha an nawlh an Dios, xliyu talhitapayniniya an Dios chi tat'atapatsayi tunku chi puts'ista. Rey Agripa, pus ixlakata yu tacha ani pakxan'ikan li ka'ilhtuya an Dios, an judiojnin yuchacha yu kintalhi'alhtasuy chaway.
44026008	¿Tasu li uxitnan jant'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti li an Dios layi jamala'awnicho'oy an yu talaknitacha?
44026009	Kit'in xlip'ulhnaj xaknajun li oxicha li akstak tanchanilh yu ilhtuputun an Jesús jamacha'a Nazaret,
44026010	chi chunchacha k'ilhtulh an Jerusalén. Yu'uncha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnincha kintamakawnilh. Wanaj xluwk'ani ijkamalaklhchawlh laka pulach'in an yu xtakikla'i an Jesús; chi akxni xjama'nikancha, kit'in wa tamcha xakma'najun.
44026011	Kit'in wanaj a'lhuwi ijkamama'alh'ajnilh para li katanawlhcha li ntucha ali katitakiklaka'ilh, wa asi xajkamanawnicha. Wa tanchuncha an laka lakcha'a an tan ixtapula'ta'ayxt'o'a chuncha xajka'ilhtuy, chi sawalhcha xakintama'talh'aman, xaktapujuycha xajkach'a'o'ay masi lakatamincha la'acha'anaxni.
44026012	Yuchacha xaktila'ampalay la'acha'an Damasco, mu kintamakawnilhcha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi yu'uncha kintasakxtulh.
44026013	Pero an laka tijcha, rey, ikla'ts'ilh la'atam alhp'as jatapulhkunu', atunkucha ixjunita, ani jatapulhkunu yu ikla'ts'ilh palay alhp'as, an wilhchan jantu, wanaj kila'atanchanu'olh chi an yu kixtat'a'anta.
44026014	Kinchuxk'ani kla'ta'a'taw, klaktama'ocha'aw lakaat'un, chi kit'in k'asmatlhi kijunkan lhi'ebreo: "Saulo, Saulo, ¿T'asu li k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uycha? Wa mi'akst'uch'a lhit'ama'ch'ap'uk'an li laych'a k'int'alasap'ut'un".
44026015	Pus wachuncha iknajun: "¿Tisi uxint'icha Jamach'alhkat?" An Jamach'alhkat ki'alhtaylh, kijuniy: "Kit'in Jesús, kit'ini k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uy".
44026016	Chaway k'a'ost'aycha, k'at'aycha, mu iktalakasunin para li uxint'i ak'int'at'ap'ats'at'icha chi k'anawna'acha t'ach'a ani la'ts'i chi yu aklakmasunipalanka'.
44026017	Kit'in ak'ilhtuya li ntu tani kata'ilhtun an judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin, mu ancha akmala'achayan.
44026018	Ancha akmala'achayan an tan tawilanalh, para li k'ajamalak'awanit'i chi ntucha ali katalakalhtanalhi lakaaputs'isni, tan putunkucha katalakalhtanalh. Para li ntucha yucha an satanasi kajalhilatsukulh, yucha an Dioscha katach'a'o'alh, chi akintakiklaka'ilhcha. Walh lani kajamala'mixinikana ixtala'alhink'an, chi chuncha katala'a'iya yu kajaxta'nikana an la'stalan'an ixlapanakni Dios".
44026019	"Pus kit'ini rey Agripa, jantu wa ijkapmaj'alhi tacha an ikla'ts'ilh, yu lakt'iyan minchalh.
44026020	Yu p'ulhnajcha ijkamak'atsaanilh aniy chiwinti yu'uncha an jamacha'an Damasco chi ampalh yu'uncha an jamacha'ancha Jerusalen chi chux an la'acha'anaxni yu lak'alin an la xalakaat'un Judea chi wachu an yu ntu judiojnin, ijkajunicha li katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios chi li katach'a'o'alhcha chi li kata'ilhtulhcha tanlhun yu kataputasulhcha li sawalhcha li takiklaka'icha.
44026021	Yuchacha ixlakata li an judiojnin kintach'apayawlhcha an laka tajtan chi kixtama'niputuncha.
44026022	Pero an Dios yucha yu ki'a'tayjuy li sta chaway watachacha chuncha iknajun, ta lhichuxi ijkalhixa'alay Dios, laj'ajin chi lakt'ikt'in. Jantu tu'u yu ntucha chun ajkajunilh an lapanakni an tacha ixnajun Moisés chi an yu tacha ixtanajun yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, li katapasaya'.
44026023	Tan ixtanajun li an Cristo chuncha xt'acha'an li kaniya', pero xli'astan li yucha p'ulh kala'awcho'oya', chi li kajalhixa'alayacha chi jamasuniyacha an jatapulhkunu yu puta'alhtaxtukan an judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin".
44026024	Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Pablo yu tacha ixputa'alhtaxtuncha, an Festo p'ascha chiwinilh, najun: —¡Wa lok'ojlaycha Pablo! Wa xliyu sawalhch'a jat'alaninin wa lhilok'ojlach'o'oycha.
44026025	Pero an Pablo alhtaylh, juniy: —Kit'in tu wa iklokojo, Festo, kit'in yu iknajun sawalh chi pujalakpastaknat.
44026026	An rey Agripa oxi k'atsay yu tacha ani iknajun, xliyu ntu ijkiktalhanani la x'ukxlakapu', chi kit'in oxi ijk'atsay li yucha wachu oxi k'atsay tacha ani iknawt'ajun, mu yucha ntu wa intacha tapasata tan wa la'asa'nik'acha.
44026027	Rey Agripa, ¿K'iklak'a'iya an yu tanawlh an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios? Kit'in ijk'atsayi li k'iklak'a'i.
44026028	An rey Agripa alhtaylh chi juniy: —Wanaj wa puwalas ¿k'i'ilht'up'ut'uncha li ajkiklaka'ilhi Cristo?
44026029	An Pablo juniy: —Wa puwalas u ma'an, an Dios chunchacha kanawlh li uxint'i chi ixchuxk'an an yu kinta'alha'asmatt'ajun chaway, wachucha chuni katawalh tacha kit'in, pero yu'uncha jantu tu'u katitalhi'alh cadena.
44026030	Wachuncha tayalhi an rey chi an gobernador chi an Berenice chi ixchuxk'an an yu ancha xtaalakwilanalh,
44026031	chi tatala'xtinulhcha, ta'alhcha lakchiwinin. Ixtalajuniy: —Aniy lapanak tu tu'u ilhtuta yu laycha kalhima'nikalh; jantu t'acha'ani masi wa kamalaklhchawkalhcha.
44026032	Pus an Agripa juniy an Festo: —Layi kaxmakawkalh ani lapanak li ntu wa la'ayajcha najuni li yucha an ay jamach'alhkatcha kajunilh li oxi u jantu tani laycha.
44027001	Akxni nawkalhcha li akintamak'ankanancha xalakaat'un Italia, an Pablo chi an ali'in tach'inin jama'axta'nikalhcha pumatam capitán ixjunkan Julio, yu ixt'ajun la xbatayón an ay jamach'alhkat.
44027002	Chi ik'awcha, ikpu'awcha la'atam barco yu taxtuchalh la'acha'an Adramitio, tukancha ixti'an xalakaat'un Asia. Wachu ani ixt'ajun an Aristarco an tan xakt'awnaw, yucha jamacha'a Tesalónica, xalakaat'un Macedonia.
44027003	La'atamcha wilhchan juncho'olh, ikcha'awcha la xkilhtu an lakxkan, la'acha'ancha Sidón, ancha an Julio sawalhcha oxi ixa'alay an Pablo chi makawnilhcha li kajala'alh la'pixiyalhna an yu oxi xjat'alalhi'an chi li yu'unchacha katalhistaklhi.
44027004	Iktaxtupalaw la'acha'an Sidón iktaylhi'ampalawi kintijk'an laka barco, xakpamatanchananawcha an lhtayan tantanun lakaat'un an lakxkan, yu junkan Chipre, mu an un wa xakintalakatast'uk'an.
44027005	Wakcha ik'ukx'awi an lakxkan, wanicha an xkilhtu xalakaat'un Cilicia chi xalakaat'un Panfiliaja ikpu'aw, chi ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Mira, xalakaat'un Licia.
44027006	Ancha an ixkapitank'an an soldadojnin la'cha'alh la'atam barco yu xanawin la'acha'an Alejandría, ixti'an xalakaat'un Italia, pus anchacha kintamujun, para li aktaylhi'awcha kintijk'an.
44027007	La'alhuw wilhchani wa laksnicha ik'aw chi sawalhcha lhima'anxkayi ikcha'aw xlakapu an la'acha'an Gnido. Chi mu an un wa xakintalakatast'uk'an, pus tucha kintamakawnini aktaylhi'aw kintijk'an, pus an xlakapucha la'acha'an tan junkan Salmóni ik'aw, la x'a'lhch'a an lhtayan tantanun t'un an lakxkan yu junkan Creta, para li akpamatanchanawcha.
44027008	Chi masi sawalhcha lhima'anxkayi iktaylhi'aw kintijk'an an laka barco, wa chux ixkilhtu an lakxkan, ikcha'awcha tanchun junkan Buenos Puertos, wani la'acha'an Lasea.
44027009	Wa stakcha ikma'ats'an'awi panch'e'ex chi lhima'anxkaycha li ali xaktaylhi'awi kintijk'an an laka barco an lakxkan, mu iso'omintacha ixpaku lhik'asnin. Pus an Pablo jajuniy:
44027010	Kit'in kla'ts'in li ani jalhtanti lhima'anxkayi kajuna'a lapanakni, kama'ats'an'ayawi ani barco chi an xtak'uk'at chi sta layi kama'ats'an'aw an kijatsukuntik'an.
44027011	Pero an xkapitank'an an soldadojnin palay kiklaka'ilhi an yu jamanawin an barco chi an yu malhtanay, an Pablo tu asmatnilh.
44027012	Chi mu anchunu la xkilhtu lakxkan jantu oxi ancha aktamakawlh akxni lhik'asnin, pus lanan ixchuxk'ani tapastaklhi li palay oxi jantu an katatamakawlh, talhit'alalhi tacha'amputulh la'acha'an Fenice xalakaat'un Creta para li anchacha aktamakaju ixpaku lhik'asnin. An Fenice tan xlita'aknuyachalh wilhchani xlilaka'anta.
44027013	Akxni tsukulhcha mincho'oyachalhi an un yu wa laksni, lhitalaktsin, tapastaklhicha li laycha katataylhi'ancho'olh an ixtijk'an, pus tataxtulhcha, wa laxkilhtucha an Cretaja tapu'alh, ay t'un yu lhtayan tantanun an lakxkan, tapu'alhcha an barco.
44027014	Pero ntu tukancha ta'a'ma'alh, xli'astan kintapaxto'ni la'atam p'as un, yu junkan Eroclidón, chi p'ascha putalakanuchalh an barco,
44027015	pus tsukulhcha tisalhi'an. Chi mu ntucha layi xakmalaka'aniyaw an barco an tan xliminachalh an un, pus wa iklhitamakawniwcha li katisalhi'alhcha an un an barco.
44027016	Akxni xakla'pust'awnawcha lax'a'lhch'a yu junkan Clauda, la'atam kilht'ikt'i t'un yu lhtayan tantanun an lakxkan, lanancha ikpamatanchanaw, akxnicha asi ikch'apacha'aw an bote yu puta'alhtaxtukan.
44027017	Chi akxni tamujuchalhcha an bote an laka barco, xli'astan tala'ach'ilhcha laka lasojo an barco, para li kalhitayanilh. Wachuncha, mu xtatalhanani li p'asi katawj talakanuchalh an barco an tan opej opej ixlakwilh kukuj tan lhimapa'a'ukan Sirte, pus talakp'uxnilhi an la'lhmaniya la'ch'it an barco chi talhitamakawlhcha li yucha an uncha kajalhi'alh watanchuncha.
44027018	Tunkunchalh, an p'as un, p'aska ixlay, pus tsukulhcha talakmujuyi an lakxkan an yu xlaktajun an laka barco.
44027019	Xlila'at'utucha wilhchan walh, talakt'alhtamaj'olhcha an xalaktanlhun an barco an lakxkan.
44027020	Wachuncha la'alhuw wilhchani jantucha xtalakasuy an wilhchan chi an st'akunin, chi tacha an stakcha kixtaputalakanuyani an p'as un chi an xkan wanajcha xaknawnawi li ntucha aktita'alhtaxtu.
44027021	Chi mu wanajcha la'alhuw wilhchani jantucha xaklakwaynaw, an Pablo tayalhi lakimpujank'an chi najun: —¡Lapanakni, palay oxi xakila'asmatniw jantu kaxtaxtucha'awi Creta, chuncha ntu chuni kaxputapasaw tacha ani putapasayaw.
44027022	Chaway jant'u k'ala't'a'oxila'alhit'it, mu ntu xamati katinilh, wa yucha an barcojo kats'an'aya'.
44027023	Mu ts'isicha kintalakasunilh pumatam angelh, yucha an Dios yu ikt'alhtananta chi ikt'atapatsayi ixmala'achatachalh,
44027024	chi kijuniy: "Pablo, jant'u k'at'alhan, mu k'ach'ip'ina'a la x'ukxlakapu an ay jamach'alhkat Roma, chi milakata kajama'alhtaxtuni'oya an Dios ixchuxk'an an yu ani jat'at'anta laka barco."
44027025	Pus xliyu iklalhijunawi lapanakni, jo'at'i k'ana'unt'it, mu kit'in ijkiklaka'iya an Dios chi ijk'atsayi li chuncha katapasaya tacha an kijunilh an ángelh.
44027026	Pero inta tacha an lhtayan lhtayan laktantanun t'un an lakxkani katawj kitalakanuyaw.
44027027	La'atam jatats'isni akxni cha'alhcha la'at'uy samana xakt'awnaw laka barco an alamalh tan junkan Adriático, akxni wa tanchuncha xakintalhi'anan an p'as un, ka tacha ixjaytatnant'ajuncha an yu tatapatsay laka barco talhakapu'alhcha li xakcha'ant'awnawcha lakaat'un.
44027028	Chi talhkalhi tani xlitalhmancha an lakxkan, tak'atsalhi li 36 metrojo xlitalhman ixjunita, palaycha ik'aw, a'tam talhkapalh, akxni wa 27 metrojcha xlitalhman ixjunita.
44027029	Chi mu xtatalhanancha li wa lay katawj kitalakanulhi an barco an lakaachiwxin, pus tamujulhcha la'at'at'i yu lay kasa' putawilh an barco, lhilax'istaja tapumujulh, chi xtatapayninicha an Dios li katunkunlhicha.
44027030	Pero an yu xtatapatsay laka barco ixta'ostakutputun, pus tsukulhcha tama'alhtajuyi an bote yu puta'alhtaxtukan, ma wa katamujuyacha lhilaxkinkapu ali an yu sa' putawlay barcojo ixtalay.
44027031	Pero an Pablo jajuniy an kapitán chi an soldadojnin: —Li ani yu tatapatsay laka barco jantu kasa' titatajulh, uxitnan jant'u lay k'at'it'a'alht'axt'ut.
44027032	Pus wachuncha an soldadojnin tach'uk'ulhi an laso an yu xpulakch'i'ulakanta an bote yu puta'alhtaxtukan, chi tamaka'alhcha an lakxkan.
44027033	Wa tunkunminta, an Pablo ixchuxk'ancha jajunilh li tu'ucha kata'ulh, jajuniy: —La'at'uycha samanaja jant'uch'a t'u'u uyat'it, wa xliyu la'ts'imp'ut'unat'iti tuchini katapasayacha.
44027034	Chaway klask'iniyaw lamapaynin lananch'a k'a'ut'iti tu'u', mu chunchaa lhitask'ini, para k'ats'uk'ut'it, chi ntu xamati katima'ats'an'alh masi wa ma'atamcha ix'ay.
44027035	Akxni chunchacha nawlh an Pablo, xa'a'ilhcha a'xtam pan chi xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, tan ixchuxk'an xtayanalh. Chi an Pablo puch'e'elhcha chi tsukulhcha uy.
44027036	Xli'astan ixchuxk'an wachucha tatapujulhi tsukulh talak'uy.
44027037	An laka barco 276 lapanakni xak'antaw.
44027038	Akxni talaj'o'atsalhcha, tatamaj'olhcha an trigo an lakxkan para li ntucha ts'ink'i kawalh an barco.
44027039	An yu xtatapatsay laka barco jantu xtajala'mispanani tanchuncha an lakaat'un an yu xtala'ts'in, pero ixtala'ts'ini li oxi pukulhuk ixjunita an xtamp'in anchunu lakaat'un, pus ixtalhipuxkawnicha tani anchacha katalhimalakanu'ulachalh an barco.
44027040	Talakch'uk'ulhcha an laso an yu ixpulakch'ikanta an yu sa' xpu'ulakay barco, talakmakawjulhcha an lakxkan, chi an laso an yu ixpulakch'ikanta an yu pumalhtanakan an barco wachucha talakch'uk'ulh. Xli'astan tamuk'anicho'olhcha an xala'ch'it an barco, yu putalakanuy an un, para li kajalhtanalh, chi kacha'alhcha lakaat'un.
44027041	Walh lakatam tan opej lakanuwilhchalh kukuj, ancha tawj takinkalakanuchalh an barco, chi anchacha kinkala'awtawilh, jantucha lay ixlaklay chi an la x'istaj tsukulhcha talakt'ilhi, mu p'asi an tacha milh milh xlay an xkan.
44027042	An soldadojnin ixtama'niputuni an tach'inin, para li ntu katajaxk'iwitnijpatakutlhi chi kata'oslicha.
44027043	Pero an ixkapitank'an an soldadojnin, mu ixma'alhtaxtuputuni an Pablo, jantu jamakawnilh, apalij jajuniy li katatajulhcha p'ulhnaja an lakxkan li yu layi tajaxk'iwitnin, para li katacha'alhcha lakaat'un.
44027044	Chi an ali'in ma laka lht'a'alak'iwcha katapu'alh u laka tu'ucha xt'ata'aklhtanchajun an barcojo katapu'alh. Chunchacha yu kinchuxk'an ikcha'aw lakaat'un, ikta'alhtaxtu'ojo.
44028001	Akxni ikta'alhtaxtucha, ijk'atsaw li an tan xakt'awnaw lakaat'un yu wanaj la'atanchanu'ojota xkan ma junkan Malta.
44028002	Chi an yu ancha jamacha'an sawalhcha oxi kintala'ts'in; tamakilhnulhcha jikmi chi kinchuxchak'ani kintala'a'in, mu xliyu xmin an xkan chi lhik'asnini ixjunita.
44028003	Chi an Pablo laksaklhicha ix'a'atan'alat k'iw yu ixlakxixtacha chi map'ulhcha an laka jikmi, walh ancha taxtulh la'atam tsapulh, mu ix'ichicha, chi olencha maktawk'achalhi an Pablo.
44028004	Akxni an yu ancha jamacha'an tala'ts'ilhcha an tsapulh li olencha ma'ch'ita an Pablo, ixtalajuniy: "Aniy lapanak o'sliyani li jama'nini', masi li pa'osnuncha ani lakxkan, pero an Dios tu katimakawnilhi ali katsukulh."
44028005	Pero an Pablo tamajk'alhalhi an laka jikmi chi tap'ulhi an tsapulh, jantu tani lalh an Pablo.
44028006	An lapanakni yu'uncha ixtapakxan'icha li kamajk'unacha, u li kata'a'tayacha chi kaniyacha; pero mu panijnicha tapakxalh chi tala'ts'ilhcha li ntu tani lalh, pus tamcha tapastakpalh, ixtanajun ma dios.
44028007	Wani ancha an tan xakt'awnaw, ix'alin jalhi'ay lakaat'un, ix'anun tichiyucha lapanak yu xlitapalay ancha, ixjunkan Publio, yucha sawalhcha oxi kintala'a'in la ixcha'a la'at'utu wilhchan.
44028008	Walh an ixpay an Publio ixmalh la xputamat sawalhcha ixch'apata alhp'as iskakat chi wa ixak'alhnatantin; pus an Pablo alh la'ts'ini pulakni tan ixmachalh chi t'atapaynilhcha, xli'astan lakpach'apalhcha walh ta'oxilhcha.
44028009	Akxni chunchacha ilhtulh, an yu wachu ixtala'ta'an'ay yu de ancha, wachucha ixtala'cha'an chi ixjak'uch'uycha;
44028010	chi sawalhcha xkintalhakapu'ankanan chi xkintalhiwilakanan; chi akxni ikpu'ancho'ocha barco tanlhuncha kintamalhi'anin yu akma'lhtask'iniyaw.
44028011	La'at'utucha malhkuyu walh, xakt'awnaw anchunu lakaat'un yu wanaj la'acho'oni'ojoy xkan, xli'astan ikpu'awcha la'atam barco yu minchalh la'acha'an Alejandría, yu ancha ixtamakajunta ta ixlima'an ixpaku ixjunita lhik'asnin, an barco ix'ayts'o'ulakanta Cástor chi Pólux, yu tacha diosnincha xjala'ts'inkan an Alejandría yuchacha ixpumispakan.
44028012	Akxni ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Siracusa, la'at'utu wilhchani ancha iktamakajuw.
44028013	Chi akxni iktaxtunipalaw, wa japiktucha ikpu'aw chi ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Regio; tunkunchalh sua'a'acha ixminachalhi un yu lhitalaktsin, chi la'atam wilhchan jumpalh ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Puteoli.
44028014	Ancha ijkala'cha'aw ali'in t'ala'awnin chi sawalhcha kintask'inin lamapaynini li ajkat'atamakajuw la'atujun wilhchan, xli'astan ik'awcha la'acha'an Roma.
44028015	An la'acha'an Roma ancha tak'atsaalhi an t'ala'awnin li ik'antacha'aw, pus kintakitastukni sta la'acha'an Foro de Apio chi tan junkan las Tres Tabernas; chi akxni jala'ts'ilhcha an Pablo xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios chi oximaj'aycha k'atsalh.
44028016	Akxni ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Roma, an Pablo makawnikalhcha li layi katawilh wa tanchuncha oxi lhiwilay laka cha'a', pero ixlistakta pumatam soldado.
44028017	La'at'utucha wilhchan la'pusli, an Pablo lhinawlh li kajat'asanikalhi an xalaj'ajin judiojnin an Roma, akxni tata'ayxto'lhicha jajuniy: —T'ala'awnin, kit'in jantu tani ijka'ilhtuy an judiojnin chi ntu tani iklak'ilhtuy tacha an xtalhismanitacha an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw. Walh an la'acha'an Jerusalén ikma'axta'kalhi la xmakak'an an jamacha'an Roma,
44028018	chi yu'uncha kixtamakawputuni akxni kintalhisakmi'olhcha, mu ntu tu'u kintala'cha'aninilh tu'ucha ixlakata para li akima'nikalh.
44028019	Pero an judiojnin tanawlhi li ntu akimakawkalh, pus kit'in iknawlhi li yucha an ay jamach'alhkati yu akint'alats'awalalh, masi ntu tu'u yu ajkalhit'alaxtukulh an kint'amacha'an.
44028020	Pus chaway yuchacha ixlakata li iklalhit'asanitaw, para li aklala'ts'iw chi li aklaxa'alaw; mu tacha ani ikma'ch'ikanta laka kadena ixlakata tacha an tapakxan'iy an jamacha'an Israel li katapasaya'.
44028021	Wachuncha yu'uncha tajuniy: —Kitnan tu tu'u ijkama'tayanantaw tu'u karta yu kaminchalh la'acha'an Judea yu milakata, u li kaminchalh xamati kint'ala'ajunk'an yu ancha jamacha'a chi tu'ucha kalhi'alhtasun tu'u yu ntu oxi.
44028022	Kitnan ik'asmatputunaw t'uch'ini p'ast'ak'acha, mu ijk'atsayawi li wa tanchuncha jantu oxi lhipastakkan t'ach'a ani ma'ilht'uy tumpaj jatapast'ak'at.
44028023	Pus tajunilhcha tuchi wilhchancha katala'cha'ana an Pablo an tan ixwilh. Wanajcha lhilhuwi tala'cha'alh, chi an Pablo wats'isin sta ta'oxay ixjalhixa'alaycha an ixlich'alhkat Dios, xlipuxkawnicha tani kaxjalhimakiklaka'inilhcha ixlakata an Jesús, laxlamap'a'sin an Moisés chi tacha an tats'o'muk'ata an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
44028024	Ali'in takiklaka'ilhi tacha an ixnajun an Pablo, pero an ali'in jantu.
44028025	Chi mu ntu wa tami ixtak'atsay, akxni xtitalak'ancho'oycha, an Pablo jajunilh: —An Stalan'a Takuwin ts'ajwi jajunilh an yu t'a xjala'lhila'ts'inat akxni an Isaías yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios manawnikalh:
44028026	"K'ap'inchi ani la'acha'an chi k'aja'una'a: Masi sawalhch'a k'a'asmatt'it, jant'u k'at'ilhimach'a'xat'it; ch'i masi sawalhch'a k'ala'ts'int'it, jant'u k'at'imisp'at'it.
44028027	Mu an xjatapast'ak'ak ani la'acha'an sawalhcha t'ak'alha. An lapanakni taalaj'akatupats'ita chi taala'la'puts'inin, para li ntu lay katajalakawanalh chi ntu lay kataja'asmatnalh chi ntu lay katalhimacha'xalh; chi chuncha ntu lay akintitach'a'o'alh, chi ntu lay aktijak'uch'ulh."
44028028	Chaway k'ak'ats'at'itcha uxitnan, chaway ati'anta an ixjama'alhtaxtunti Dios yu'uncha an yu ntu judiojnincha kajamak'anikana', chi yu'uncha kata'asmat'a'.
44028029	Akxni chunchacha nawlh an Pablo, an judiojnin talak'ancho'olhcha, stakcha xtalalhikikxtukuy.
44028030	Chi an Pablo la'at'uy k'ata ancha ixwilh an laka cha'a tan wa ixmapalhlhi'an, chi oxi ixjala'a'i ancha watichicha yu ixtala'cha'an.
44028031	Ancha ixta'achanincha xlichiwiniy an xlich'alhkat Dios, chi xmasuycha ixlakata an Jesucristo, jantu xamati ixmama'tijlay.
45001001	Aniy jalhiki kit'ini ikts'o'lhi, kit'in ikPablo, kit'in ixma'tapatsan Jesucristo, yucha kint'asanilh chi kimala'achalhcha para li ajkamak'atsaaninilh an laj'oxi ixchiwinti Dios.
45001002	An Dios ma'anchacha chunchacha ixnajunta li ka'alina an laj'oxi chiwinti. Yu'uncha an yu xtalhichiwiniy xchiwinti chuncha japunawlh, chi ancha ts'o'muk'akanta an la ixchiwinti Dios.
45001003	Aniy laj'oxi chiwinti yucha an isTs'alh Diosi lhichiwiniy, yu kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo. Akxni lhitsukulh ixlakatunaj, yu ta ixjalhila'ts'in an Daviti japula'awlh.
45001004	Chi akxni la'awcho'olhcha, chunchacha lhimasulh li yucha isTs'alh Dios, ixlakata an Stalan'a Takuwin.
45001005	Ixlakata an Jesucristojo li an Dios kimapaynilh chi kimala'achalh, para li ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni an lapanakni katakiklaka'ilh chi kata'asmatnilhi an Dios, para li katamapaynilh an xta'a'ut.
45001006	Uxitnan yu jamacha'an Roma wachu tat'asaniyani para li ixlapanaknicha an Cristojo k'a'unt'it.
45001007	Ani jalhiki ikts'o'a para ta lhichux wilakalh an la'acha'an Roma, mu an Dios jamapayni chi jat'asaniya para li katawalhi ixjas'at'an. An oxi ixjatawlhnat chi an ixjamapayninti kimPayk'an Dios chi yu wachu ixnawin an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo lhilhiji k'alhits'uk'ut'it.
45001008	Yucha an Jesucristojo ikpuxta'niy lhimala'puchajun an Dios milakatak'an chux uxitnan, mu wa tanchuncha si lhichiwinkani amijakiklaka'intik'an.
45001009	An Dios k'atsayi li lhilhiji iklapast'ak'aw akxni iktapayni. Kit'in chux la kijalhunuti iktapatsaniy an Dios, ijkamak'atsaaninini an laj'oxi chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy an isTs'alh.
45001010	Iksk'iniy an Dios li lay ak'anchalh para li aklala'ts'iw, chi kalaya li an Dios akimakawniya'.
45001011	Mu iklala'ts'imputunaw para li lay akla'a'tayju li k'ala'a'it'it yu tataxta'niputun an xTakuwin Dios, para li lajk'ut'ilini k'a'unt'it la mijakiklaka'intik'an,
45001012	chuncha iknajun, para li kalapula'oximaj'ayawi an yu kiklaka'itawcha.
45001013	Kint'ala'awnin, kit'in iklakask'in li k'ak'ats'at'iti li a'lhuwcha ikla'amputunacha'aw la'ts'inin, pero sta chaway wa tanlhuncha kila'mama'tijlay. Yu sawalhcha iklakask'in kit'in, ikla'a'tayjuputunawi li oxicha k'ajak'iklak'a'inint'it tacha ijka'a'tayjutacha tanlayj la'acha'anaxni.
45001014	An yu griegojnin chi an yu ntu griegojnin, chi an yu tajalakpastaknancha chi an yu ntu tu'u tak'atsay, ijk'atsan li tachanu ijkalhi'ani,
45001015	xliyu wachu sawalhcha iklalhijumputunaw an laj'oxi chiwinti yu wilat la'acha'an Roma.
45001016	Jantu ikt'amaxanani an laj'oxi chiwinti, mu yucha ix'alhp'asninti an Dios, yu taputa'alhtaxtuy ixchuxk'an yu takiklaka'i. P'ulhnaj yu judiojnin pero wachu yu ntu judiojnin.
45001017	An laj'oxi chiwinti yucha kintajunan li an Dios kintala'a'iyani li kiklaka'iyaw sawalh, wachuncha yu lay kala'a'in li kiklaka'ikan sawalh. Chuncha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios, tan najunta: "Yu oxi t'a'aklat'ajun an Dios yucha an ixjakiklaka'inticha kaputsukuya'."
45001018	Mu an Dios masuyi sta an lakt'iyan ixtalh'amti, jamama'alh'ajniya an yu wa ay tajunita, an yu ntu oxi tat'ajun, an yu wa tatanchay an yu sawalh.
45001019	Mu chux yu alin yucha an Diosi tapumispay, mu wanaj yucha an Diosi jamasuni;
45001020	chi mu an yu ntu tasuy ixlaktanlhun Dios layi mispakan li oxi sa' lhatapastaknankan an yu lak'ilhtuta. Chi sta akxni ilhtukanchalh an lakaamunulhpa an Dios oxi tasuy li yucha Dios, chi an ix'alhp'asninti jantu inta kimaktay. Xliyu an yu wa tani talaycha, jantu lay katitanawlh li wa ntu tak'atsay.
45001021	Mu masi tamispaycha an Dios, jantu tala'ts'ini tacha Dios chi ntu taxta'niya lhimala'puchajun. Apalij wa tanlhuncha talakpast'ak'a yu wa lhitontojcha chi mu sawalhcha lakt'ak'alha an ixjalhunutk'an pus tu tu'u tak'atsay.
45001022	Masi li tanajuni li tajalakpastaknan, wa talaktontojlalhcha.
45001023	Mu an ixta'ayaxtu Dios yu ntu a'tam katinilh, talhimapaxalhi wa ixla'ma'stele'chak'an lapanakni yu lay taniy, chi masi wa ixma'stele'chak'an tanlhun ts'o'on chi tanlhuncha yu ixputach'ant'at'ik'an jatapakxat chi ts'apulin.
45001024	Xliyu an Dios jamakawlhcha para li kata'ilhtulhcha yu ta'ilhtuputun, chi atamj atamjcha talat'a'ilhtupaxalh la ixlakatunajk'an yu wa lhimaxancha.
45001025	An yu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios talhimapaxalhi wa maslakatinticha. Chi apalijcha yucha talhiwilay chi ay tala'ts'in an yu wa lak'ilhtutacha an Dios, jantucha yu apalij an Diosi yu talhiwilay. An Dios yuchaa la'la'oxilh an tanlhun, pus yucha an Diosi yu lhilhij lhitask'ini kaxta'nikalh lhimala'puchajun. Chunchaa kawalh.
45001026	Xliyu an Dios jamakawlhcha an lapanakni li katalalhcha wa tani talaputuncha, ta'ilhtulhcha yu wa lhimaxancha, asta an t'akunin jantucha yu wa ixt'apapak'ani ixtaxa'alay, yu tacha Dios makajun, tsukulhcha wa aya tat'alayi wa siya ixt'at'akuninchak'an.
45001027	Chi an lapanakni wachucha tamakawlhi yu makajun an Dios lay ka'ilhtukalh, jantucha wa ixt'iwik'ani ixtaxa'alay, tsukulhcha tak'atsani li wa aya katalalhcha wa siya lapanakni. Wa lhimaxancha talay, chi wa ix'akstuchak'ani tama'alh'ajnan la ixlakatunajk'an ixlakata tacha an wa aya talay.
45001028	Mu ntucha talhiwilayi an Dios li yucha Dios, pus yucha jamakawlhcha li kata'ilhtulhcha an wa laklhits'isitcha ixjatapast'ak'atk'an masi yucha jantu oxi li chuncha talay.
45001029	An la xjatsukuntik'an wa tanlhuncha yu ntucha k'is laj'oxi ta'ilhtuy, wa aya talaycha, wa tala'alhincha ta'ilhtuy, wa talaksk'unla'ts'incha tanlhun chi la xkayt chi lalhitalh'amajla'ts'it tanlhun chi jama'ninti chi la xtukut chi ja'o'xcho'onti chi talh'amti chi maslakatinti.
45001030	Wa sawalhcha tajalhichiwininin, sawalhcha taxkajiya an Dios, jantucha k'is taja'asmatnan, wa tanlhuncha ta'ilhtuy yu ntu lhitapalay, wa lhilhijcha tapast'ak'a tani tamcha katalhi'ilhtupalh ixtala'alhink'an, chi palaycha jantucha tu'u talhiwilay ixlakpaynink'an.
45001031	Jantucha tajalakpastaknamputun, chi ntu ta'ilhtuyi yu tanajun li kata'ilhtuya', jantucha xamati tamapayni, jantucha xamati tamala'mixini tu'u'.
45001032	Oxi tak'atsay li yu wa tani kalayacha, yu tacha anicha talay, an Dios najun li katalakniya', walh chi ali ta'ilhtuyi yu'uncha, chi sawalhcha oxi tala'ts'in yu wachu chun ilhtuy.
45002001	Pus xliyu uxint'i li xamati wa aya lhich'iwiniy, jant'u k'at'imala'mixinik'a, wa tichicha uxint'i k'a'unt'i. Akxni xamat'i lhich'iwiniy wa mi'akst'uch'a p'uxk'a'uy yu lhima'anxkay, mu uxint'i wanajch'a ch'uni lay tacha yu'uncha talay.
45002002	Wa yucha an Diosi yu lay kajajuna li talhit'ajuni xtala'alhink'an an yu wa tanlhuncha yu ntu laj'oxi ta'ilhtuy. Mu k'atsayawi li an Dios yucha ts'ajwi kalaks lats'awalay an tanlhun, yucha ts'ajwi xt'a'a lhima'alh'ajna.
45002003	Uxint'i wa aya jalhich'iwiniya an ali'in, walh ch'i wanajch'a ch'uni lay, jant'u k'ap'ast'akt'i li sna k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'acha akxni an Dios kajamama'alh'ajniya'.
45002004	Uxint'i wa la'amaj'ani an Dios li mapayniyan chi li pakxaniyan para li k'ach'a'o'a, jant'u lhak'ap'up'ini li xliyu mapayniyan li yucha lakask'in li k'ak'iklak'a'it'i.
45002005	Uxint'i sawalhcha a'atu'axixik'at'i, jant'u ch'a'o'ap'ut'uni an Dios, wa mi'akstucha lalhawat'a'un lhima'alh'ajna, mu kachina wilhchan akxni an Dios katalakasuyacha para li kaxt'a'acha lhima'alh'ajna,
45002006	chi akxni an Dios, kajamapalhniyacha atamj atamj tuchinischa ilhtulh akxni ixt'ajun.
45002007	Kajaxta'niya jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy an yu ixtataylhi'anta ixta'ilhtuy tanlhun yu laj'oxi, yu ixtapuxkajuy an ixta'ayaxtu Dios yu xtapuxkajuy li oxi kajala'ts'inkalh chi tapuxkawlhi an jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy.
45002008	Pero an yu wa ixli'ayajk'atsanchak'an tala'amaj'alhi an ixchiwinti Dios, chi tataylhi'alhi yu ntu oxi, katala'a'iya an ay lhima'alh'ajna.
45002009	Katalhitsukuya lhima'alh'ajna chi yu ntu oxi k'atsat ixchuxk'an an yu wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi ta'ilhtuy, p'ulhnaj yu'uncha an judiojnini katama'alh'ajnana pero wachu an yu ntu judiojnin.
45002010	Pero an Dios kajaxta'niya ta'ayaxtu chi li kajalhiwilakalh chi li oxi katatawilh, ixchuxk'an an yu ta'ilhtuy yu laj'oxi tanlhun, yu'uncha an judiojnini p'ulhnaj chuncha kaja'ilhtuya', pero wachu an yu ntu judiojnin,
45002011	mu an Dios yucha ntu wa sakxtuyi yu oxi lhiwilay.
45002012	Ixchuxk'an an yu ta'ilhtuy ixtala'alhink'an, li ntu tamispayi an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés, wachuncha katats'an'acho'oya', chi an yu ta'ilhtuyi ixtala'alhink'an chi tamispaycha an lhamap'a'sin, ixlakata ani lhamap'a'sini kajapumama'alh'ajnikana'.
45002013	Chi ntu kanaju li oxicha tat'ajun la x'ukxlakapu Dios an yu wa ta'asmat'acha an lhamap'a'sin, yu oxicha ts'awj tat'ajun yu'uncha an yu tamuktaxtuy.
45002014	Mu an yu ntu judiojnin jantu tamispayi an lhamap'a'sin, walh chi wa la xjatapast'ak'atchak'an, ta'ilhtuy, pus chunchacha putasuy li para yu'uncha wachu an lhamap'a'sin.
45002015	Mu tamasuyi la xlakatijlak'an li talhit'ajuni an lhamap'a'sin la xjalhunutk'an, yucha an ixjatapast'ak'atchak'ani lhimasuy, chi yucha an ixjatapast'ak'atchak'ani kaja'alhtasuya u kajalhi'a'tayjuya
45002016	akxni kachinacha wilhchan li an Dios kanawnacha tani ixt'ajuncha atamj atamj, yucha an Cristojo chuncha kapu'ilhtuya', kak'atsakana masi yu ntu k'atsakan, tacha najunta an laka laj'oxi chiwinti an yu iklhichiwiniy.
45002017	Uxint'i judiojk'at'i unk'an, ch'i k'iklak'a'iya an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés, ch'i ayi p'uk'ats'an an Dios.
45002018	K'ats'ayi tani lhi'achanicha an Dios, chi an lhamap'a'sin masuniyani tani k'alhisakxt'ucha yu palay oxi.
45002019	K'ats'ayi li layi k'ajamalht'anat'i an la'la'lhtulu'un chi li layi k'ajamap'ulhk'unin an yu lakaaputs'isni tat'ajun.
45002020	K'ats'ayi li layi k'ajamap'a'sit'i an yu ntu tu'u tak'atsay chi li layi k'ajamap'a'sit'i an yu ntuka' oxi tajalakpastaknan, mu an laka lhamap'a'sini la'ch'ip'in an jatapast'ak'at chi an yu sawalh.
45002021	Pus oxich'a li jamasuniya an ali'in, ¿t'asu li nt'u masunik'ancha mi'akstu? Li lhich'iwiniya li ntu kaja'alhawanankalh, ¿t'asu li ja'alhawanancha?
45002022	Li na'uni li ntu katalaxa'alalhi yu ntu talat'at'ajun, ¿ch'i li xa'alaycha xamati uxint'i? Li jant'u k'is la'ts'imp'ut'uni an yu wa jala'la'oxikantacha an yu jajunkan li tacha diosnincha, ¿p'us ch'i li laj'alha'uycha an tanlhun yu laj'oxi an la xlaktajtank'ani?
45002023	P'ut'a'ayaycha an lhamap'a'sin, pero nt'u k'iklak'a'iya an Dios, mu nt'u ilht'uyi yu najun.
45002024	Xliyu najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: An yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin wa aya tajuniya an Dios, uxitnani minkwentajk'an".
45002025	Sawalhi li yu ilhtuyi tacha an najun ixlamap'a'sin Moisés, a'tayjuycha lanani li akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta an ix'a'axt'a'a; pero yu ntu ilhtuy, wa tachanu jantu akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'a.
45002026	Pus yu ilhtuyi tacha najunta an lhamap'a'sin, masi ntu akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'a, kala'ts'inkana tachanu chuncha, masi jantu.
45002027	Yu ilhtuyi an lhamap'a'sin masi ntu tu'u akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'a la ixlakatunaj, layi kajuna li ntucha oxi tacha lay an yu mispaycha lhamap'a'sin chi masi akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'a, mu li yucha ntu muktaxtuyi an lhamap'a'sin.
45002028	Mu para li ajkunikalh li ikjudio jantu wa xliyu li kila'ts'inkancha li ikjudio, u li akijunikalh li ki'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ki'a'axt'a'a jantu wa xliyu li katasulhcha la kilakatunaj.
45002029	Yu judio sawalh sta la xpulakni chuncha najun chi li iknajuni li ki'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ki'a'axt'a'a yucha li ch'uk'up'uxnikantacha yu ntu oxi la kijalhunut. Jantu yu akinti'ilhtulh chuncha li wa intacha stak ts'o'muk'akanta yu ka'ilhtukalh, yu chuncha ka'ilhtuyan sawalh yucha an Takuwin. Yu chuncha sawalh, yucha maklachalhcha, chi ntu yu an lapanakni katitajunin, yucha an Dios.
45003001	¿Tisu xli'oxinticha li kajunkalh judio u li ka'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalh x'a'axt'a'a xamati'i?
45003002	Wanaj lhuw sawalhi tuchini xli'oxicha. Yu p'ulhnaj, wa xliyu yu'uncha an judiojnini an Dios jaxta'nilh an ixchiwinti.
45003003	Ali'in judiojnin jantucha takiklaka'iy. Chaway ¿tasu tapasaycha? ¿An Dios jantucha kati'ilhtulhi yu najun li ka'ilhtuya'?
45003004	¡Jantu! An Dios yucha kataylhi'ana yu najun li ka'ilhtuya', mu yucha yu najun ilhtuy sawalh, masi chux an lapanakni wa katamaslakatinilh. Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: Ch'unch'a k'ap'ulhiwilak'ana'a li sawalhi yu na'un t'ani yu k'ach'iwinina'acha, chi k'alhajat'achi akxni katajunan li oxi u jantu t'ani laycha.
45003005	Chi li chunchachaa putasuy li sawalhi an yu najun an Dios, akxni tu'u yu ntu oxi ilhtuyaw, ¿tasucha kanawnawi? ¿kanawnawi li an Dios tu oxi li kintamama'alh'ajniyan? (Ikchiwiniy tacha chiwiniy yu wa lapanak).
45003006	Jantu, jantu layi chuncha katinaju, mu li an Dios jantu oxi yu ilhtuy, ¿tasucha lay kalhinawna li oxi u jantu yu ilhtuy an lapanak yu wilh aniy lakaamunulhpa'a?
45003007	Pero li yucha an kimaslakatinti ilhtuy li palay kaputa'alhp'asnilhi an yu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios, ¿Tasu li kijunkancha li ikma'lhta'alhini'i?
45003008	Li chuncha, apalij ak'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi para li katapasalhi yu oxi. Chunchacha tanajun ali'in li ma chuncha yu ikmasuy, para li kalhiwilakalhi li ma ntu sawalhi yu iknajun; pero an yu chuncha tanajun katala'a'iya lhima'alh'ajna.
45003009	¿Pus t'asuch'a p'ast'ak'at'iti? ¿sawalhcha oxi t'awnaw kitnan yu judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin jantu? ¡Jantu sawalh! Mu lhimasutawcha li chux kitnan yu judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin, an tala'alhin kintalaklhajayan.
45003010	Tacha ts'o'muk'akanta la ixchiwinti Dios: "¡Jantu xamati t'ajun masi wa pumatamcha yu ts'awj katsukulh sawalh!
45003011	Jantu xamati lhimach'a'xay yu oxi, jantu xamati yu kapuxkawlh Dios.
45003012	Ixchuxk'ani tapu'alh tan tu oxi tij, ixchuxk'ani ta'ilhtulh ixtala'alhink'an. Jantu xamati yu ka'ilhtulh yu laj'oxi tanlhun, masi wa pumatamcha.
45003013	Wa tacha wa a'lho'o'cha ajkanta puta'aknuni an ix'ochuk'an. Tapumaslakatinini isima'atk'an. Talaktsin la ix'e'xt'a'ak'an tachanu la'stu ixvenenojk'an tsapulini talhit'ajun
45003014	chi an la xkilhnik'an wa la'stucha lhi'ay junita talhit'ajun chi talh'amti.
45003015	Sawalhcha layi talakats'alaj'an ta an jama'ninin;
45003016	chi wa la'stucha jalakt'ilhinti chi lhikilhpati alin la xtijk'an.
45003017	Jantu tamispayi an xatij yu oxi jatawlhnat.
45003018	Jantu a'tam tatalhamniya an Dios."
45003019	Pero k'atsayawi li chux an tacha najunta an la xlamap'a'sin Dios, yu'uncha jajuniy an yu ixli'ilhtutk'an li kata'ilhtulh tacha an najunta. Para li ixchuxk'ani kasa' talajkilhulh chi chux tacha an wilakalh an lakaamunulhpa yucha an Diosi kajajuna tanchuncha kata'ana atamj atamj;
45003020	mu ntu xamati lay katinawlh li muktaxtutacha tacha an najunta laka lhamap'a'sin, para li an Dios kanawlhcha li ts'awjcha sawalhi t'ajun, mu an lhamap'a'sin yucha wa kintapumak'atsaanikanancha li kitnan la'ma'lhta'alhinin.
45003021	Pero chaway an Dios masuycha li oxi kintala'ts'inan, pero ntu wa xliyu li muktaxtuyaw xlamap'a'sin. Chuncha ixtanajun an lapanakni yu tats'o'lhi an lhamap'a'sin chi an yu ma'anchacha ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
45003022	Li kiklaka'ikani an Jesucristo, an Dios chunchacha oxi jala'ts'in ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'i. Si kintala'a'ikanan, watichicha.
45003023	Ta lhichuxi ilhtukalh tala'alhin, pus tu xamati yu wa nicha katsukulh tan an alhp'as wilh Dios.
45003024	Pero an Dios la xjamapayninti oxi jala'ts'in an lapanakni, chi ntu tu'u jach'inin. Yucha an Jesucristojo chuncha pu'ilhtuy, mu an Cristo yucha kintama'alhtaxtuncha.
45003025	An Dios ilhtulhi li yucha an Cristojo yu akintapumala'mixinikan kintala'alhink'an, akxni an maj'alh xak'alhni. Chi para li akimala'mixinikalh chux kintala'alhin yucha li ajkiklaka'ilh an Cristo. Chunchacha pumasuy an Dios li oxi kintala'ts'inan; kintamala'mixiniyani an kintala'alhink'an yu ix'ilhtutaw ixlip'ulhnaj,
45003026	mu yucha ntu wa lasi talh'aman. An Dios masuputuni li yucha ts'ajwi t'ajun, wachu chuni ja'ilhtuy an yu takiklaka'iy an Jesús.
45003027	Jantu layi tu'ucha katipu'ayajk'atsaw la x'ukxlakapu Dios, ¿tasu'u? Wa xliyu ntu muktaxtuyawi an lhamap'a'sin, ajnik'acha wa kiklaka'iyaw.
45003028	Xliyu lhinawnaw li an Dios yucha kanawna li oxicha t'ajun yu jakiklaka'inin, jantu yu wa xliyu muktaxtuycha an lhamap'a'sin.
45003029	¿Chu sna an Dios wa ixDiosk'an an judiojnin? ¿Jantu wachu ixDiosk'an an yu ntu judiojnin? Li mu chun.
45003030	Wa pumatami t'ajun Dios. Yucha kanawna li oxi tat'ajun la xjakiklaka'intik'an an yu judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin.
45003031	Chi chuncha, ixlakata an jakiklaka'inti ¿jantucha lhitapalayi an lhamap'a'sin? ¡Chun, lhitapalay! Apalij iknawnaw li lhitapalayi an lhamap'a'sin.
45004001	¿Pus tisu lhajaxtulhcha kanawnaw an Abrahami, yu kimpayk'an ixjunita?
45004002	Mu li an Abraham kaxla'ts'inkalhi li ts'ajwi ixt'ajun wa xliyu li tacha an ixlak'ilhtuycha tanlhun, kax'alilhi tuchini kaxputa'ayalhcha masi ntucha x'ukxlakapu Dios.
45004003	Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: "An Abraham kiklaka'ilhi an Dios, chi an Dios nawlhi li an Abraham ts'ajwi t'ajun."
45004004	Pus chaway, li xamati tapatsay, yucha mapalhnikan mu yucha lhajaxtulhcha, jantu tu'u yu wa xta'nikancha.
45004005	An Dios yucha oxi la'ts'in an ma'lhta'alhini yu kiklaka'iy, xliyu li xamati kiklaka'iy, an Dios najuncha li ts'awjcha t'ajun anchunu lapanak, masi ntu tu'u ka'ilhtulh yu lhinawkan.
45004006	Wanaj yucha an Daviti nawpalh li sawalhcha oxi li yu an Dios oxicha la'ts'in, pero jantu wa xliyu li tu'ucha yu oxicha lak'ilhtuy.
45004007	An David nawlh: "¡Sawalhcha oxi para yu'uncha yu an Dios jamala'mixiniya wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi ta'ilhtuta, chi ntucha jalhakapu'aniniya an ixtala'alhink'an!
45004008	Sawalhcha oxi para yucha anchunu lapanak li yu an Jamach'alhkat jantucha lhakapu'aniniya ixtala'alhin."
45004009	¿Aniy oxinti wa yu'uncha an yu jalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'ak'ani lay tala'a'i u wachu layi tala'a'i an yu ntu chun tajunita? Najucha li an Dios lhakapu'aninilhi an xjakiklaka'inti an Abraham, chi nawlhcha li ts'awjcha t'ajun.
45004010	Pero, ¿Tasu wanancha lhakapu'aninilhi? ¿Xli'astancha akxni akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalhcha ix'a'axt'a'a u xlip'ulhnaj? Xlip'ulhnaj.
45004011	Chi xli'astan an Abraham akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalhcha an ix'a'axt'a'a, tan kaputasulhcha li an Dios mispalhcha li ts'awjcha ixt'ajun, mu ixjakiklaka'inin. Pus chunchacha an Abrahan yuchacha walh ixpayk'an an yu tajakiklaka'inin, masi yu ntu tu'u jalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'ak'an; chi wanajcha chuni yu'uncha an Dios jala'ts'incha li ts'awjcha tat'ajun.
45004012	Chi an Abraham wachu ixpayk'ani masi an yu jalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'ak'an li ta'ilhtuyi tajakiklaka'inin tacha ix'ilhtuy an kimpayk'an Abraham akxni ntuka' ix'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkan ix'a'axt'a'a.
45004013	An Abraham junikalhi li yucha chi an yu tapu'a'p'unminchalhcha li yu'uncha katala'a'iya aniy lakaamunulhpa'; pero tacha ani junikalh li kaxta'nikana jantu xliyu li muktaxtulh an lhamap'a'sin, tuchi chuncha lhijunikalh wa xliyu xjakiklaka'inin.
45004014	Chi mu li yu'uncha kaxtala'a'ilh an lakaamunulhpa an yu wa laka lhamap'a'sin taput'ajun, pus an jakiklaka'inti jantucha tu'u kaxlitapalalh chi tacha an nawlh an Dios li ka'ilhtuya, jantucha tu'u kaxlitapalalh.
45004015	Yu ntu muktaxtuyi an lhamap'a'sin kala'a'iya ma'alh'ajnat ixlakata xtala'alhin, pero tan tu tu'u ali'in lhamap'a'sin, wachu ntu tu'u alin tala'alhin.
45004016	Xliyu li tacha an najun an Dios li ka'ilhtuya, yu katala'a'iya yu'uncha an yu takiklaka'i, pus an Dios kajamapayniya mu li tajakiklaka'inin. Ixchuxk'an an yu tapu'a'p'unminchalh an Abrahami katajama'tayanana', chi ntu wa yu'uncha an yu talhit'ajun an lhamap'a'sini katitala'a'ilh, wachu katala'a'iya an yu talhit'ajun jakiklaka'inti yu tacha ixlhit'ajun an Abraham. Chi kitnan yucha an Abrahami kimpayk'an.
45004017	Tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Kit'ini k'ilhtutan li k'a'unt'i ixpayk'an kilhmaklhuw lapanakni". An Abraham kiklaka'ilhi an Dios, chi ani Dios yucha jaxta'niya jatsukunti an janinin chi lak'ilhtuyi an tanlhun masi yu ntuka' lak'alin.
45004018	Akxni masi watali jantucha layi chuncha kawalh, an Abraham kiklaka'ilh chi pakxan'ilh, pus chunchacha yu walh "xapay wanaj kilhmaklhuw lapanakni", chunchacha walh tacha yu ixjunitacha an Dios akxni junilh: "Chuncha xlilhuw katajuna yu katapu'a'p'un'anan."
45004019	An ixjakiklaka'inti an Abraham jantu t'iya' lalh, masi yucha ixla'tsat'ajuncha tamciento k'ata chi ixlakapu'ancha li yucha chi an ixt'iwi yu ixjunkan Sara tachanu ixtalaklakanicho'otacha chi lakpapanincha ixtajunita para li lay katajamas'at'analh.
45004020	An Abraham kiklaka'ilhi tacha an junilh an Dios, jantu a'tami nawlh li sna kajuna u jantu, apalij wa palay p'as kiklaka'ilh, ayi ilhtulh an Dios.
45004021	Lhiwilalh sawalhi li an Dios layi ilhtuy sawalh yu najun.
45004022	Pus an Dios lhakapu'aninilhi xjakiklaka'inti an Abraham chi yuchacha ixlakata li la'ts'ilhcha li ts'awjcha t'ajun.
45004023	Chi ntu wa ixlakatacha an Abrahami lhits'o'muk'akalh li lhakapu'ankalh,
45004024	wachu kilakatak'an. Mu an Dios wachu kintalhakapu'aniniyani kijakiklaka'intik'an, li kiklaka'iyawi an yu mala'awnicho'olh an Jesús, yu kiJamach'alhkatk'an,
45004025	yu ma'axta'kalh laka lhinin ixlakata kintala'alhink'an, chi yucha la'awcho'olhi para li an Dios oxicha akintala'ts'in.
45005001	Pus mu an la kijakiklaka'intik'an an Dios kintapula'ts'inancha li chuncha ts'awjcha t'awnaw, pus oxicha t'a'aklat'awnaw an Dios. Yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo chuncha kintapu'ilhtukanan.
45005002	Chi ixlakata an Jesucristojo li lay la'cha'anaw an Dios, mu jakiklaka'ininaw, para li lay kalhitsuku an ixjamapayninti. Chi lajk'ut'ilini la kijakiklaka'intik'an chi sawalhcha laj'achanawi li pakxan'iyawi li kama'cha'anawi tan xlimj wilhchalh Dios.
45005003	Chi ntu wayu', wachu laj'achanawi masi akxni lhima'alh'ajna; mu k'atsayawi li an lhima'alh'ajna kintalak'ut'iliyan para li kalhitayaniw,
45005004	chi li lhitayaniyaw, chunchacha kintapula'ts'inkanan li jakiklaka'ininaw sawalh, chi li sawalhi li jakiklaka'ininaw, alhp'ascha pakxan'iyaw an yu kala'a'iyaw.
45005005	Chi an yu pakxan'iyaw jantu akintita'o'xcho'on, mu an Dios wanajcha la'tsama'ojota an la kijalhunutk'an an ixjamapayninti, yucha an Stalan'a ixTakuwin yu kintaxta'nitani chuncha pu'ilhtulh.
45005006	Akxni kitnan tu lay kaxta'alhtaxtu, mu kitnan ixt'alaxkay an Diosi ixjuntaw an Cristo kintalhinini akxni tukan ixpaku'.
45005007	Chi sawalh lhima'anxkayi li xamati lapanak kalhinilh yu oxi lapanak. Pero kasna layi xamati lapanak kalhima'ats'an'aputulh ixjatsukunti ixlakata yu sawalh oxi lapanak.
45005008	Pero an Cristo yucha nilhi kilakatak'an masi kitnan wa stakcha ixlit'awnawi kintala'alhink'an. Chunchacha an Dios kintamasunin ixjamapayninti.
45005009	Oxicha kintala'ts'inan mu an Cristo kintalhimaj'an xjak'alhni, xliyu chaway palaycha k'atsayaw li sawalhi li kata'alhtaxtuyaw an la xtalh'amti Dios.
45005010	Chi mu li akxni ixt'alaxkayka Diosi ixjuntaw walh kintat'ala'oxamixnini akxni kintalhinin an isTs'alh, pus chaway palaycha li o'sliyani li kata'alhtaxtuyawi ixlakata an ixjatsukunti an Cristo, mu chaway an Dios t'ala'oxamixniwcha.
45005011	Chi ntu wayu', chaway wachu sawalhcha laj'achanawi tacha an ilhtulhcha an Dios. Oxicha t'alalhi'antaw an Dios, yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo put'ala'oxamixniw.
45005012	Wa pumatam lapanaki yu putanuchilh an tala'alhin aniy lakaamunulhpa', chi an tala'alhin putanuchilhcha an lhinin, chi an lhinin lhichuxcha jala'cha'an'ojoy, mu ta lhichuxi ilhtukalh tala'alhin.
45005013	Akxni ntuka' tu'u ix'alin lhamap'a'sin, ix'alincha tala'alhin an lakaamunulhpa'; pero mu ntu tu'u ix'alin lhamap'a'sin, pus tulayi ixjalhimuk'akan li ixta'ilhtuyi tala'alhin an lapanakni.
45005014	Pero sta akxni ixt'awnachalh an Adán, chi sta akxni ixt'ajuncha an Moisés ixchuxk'ani talaknilh. An Adán nilhi mu ntu asmatnilhi an ixlamap'a'sin an Dios. Chi wachu talaknilhi an ali'in masi yu ntu ixt'achun tala'alhin ixta'ilhtuta tacha an ilhtulh Adán. An Adán wa ixpumasukancha an yu xli'astanka kamina'.
45005015	Pero an ixtala'alhin an Adán jantu wa ixt'atami an yu kintaxta'niyan an Dios. Wanaj lhilhuwi nikalh masi wa pumatami yu ilhtulh tala'alhin; pero an xjamapayninti Dios yu kintapuxta'niyan pumatam lapanak, yu junkan Jesucristo, yucha ntu mapalhkan, wa xta'kancha, chi yucha palay ay, chi yucha oxi para lhuw lapanak.
45005016	An ixtala'alhin wa pumatam lapanak, jantu lay katinawkalh li wa xt'atami an yu xt'a'a Dios, mu wa la'atam tala'alhini yu puchilh an lhinin, pero an xjamapayninti an Dios yucha makmilh wa xliyu lhuw tala'alhini alin, chi yuchacha oxicha kintapula'ts'in.
45005017	Pus mu li an lhinin ch'alhkatnalhcha wa xliyu masi wa pumatam lapanaki ilhtulh tala'alhin, pus palaycha an Dios kajaxta'niya an lapanakni lhich'alhkat an laka sast'icha jatsukunti. Wa pumatam lapanaki yu kapuxta'kana xjamapayninti, yucha an Jesucristo, yucha yu oxicha kintapula'ts'inan.
45005018	Tacha ilhtulhi an ixtala'alhin Adán li lhichuxi kalakni'okalh, wanajcha chuni an Jesucristo yu ts'awj muktaxtulh, kinta'ilhtu'oyani li oxi akintala'ts'inkan para li kalhitsukuwi jatsukunti.
45005019	Mu wa pumatam lapanaki yu ntu ja'asmatnalh, walh chi wanaj lhuw lapanakni yu tawalh ma'lhta'alhinin; pus wanajcha chun, wa pumatam lapanaki yu ja'asmatnalh, walh wanaj lhuw lapanakni yu oxicha jala'ts'inkalh.
45005020	An lhamap'a'sin makminkalh para li an tala'alhin palay oxi katasulh; pero akxni palaycha alilhi an tala'alhin, an Dios palaycha jamapayninilh.
45005021	Chi tacha an tala'alhin ch'alhkatnalhcha chi lhimilhcha an lhinin, wanajcha chuni an ixjamapayninti Dios ch'alhkatnalh chi kinta'ilhtuncha li ts'awjcha katsukuw chi kintaxta'niyancha jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh; yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo kintapuxta'nikan.
45006001	¿Chi tasu kanawnawcha? ¿Ali ka'ilhtuyawi kintala'alhink'an para li an Dios akintamapaynin?
45006002	¡Jantu! Kitnan tachanu nitawcha para li ntucha ali ka'ilhtuwi tala'alhin; ¿chi tasucha li ali ka'ilhtuyawi tala'alhini?
45006003	¿Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti uxitnan li akxni laj'a'paxwicha t'atala'xt'o'awcha an Cristo Jesús chi wachucha t'aniyawi tacha akxni an nilh?
45006004	Pus li laj'a'paxawcha kintat'amaknukanancha an Cristo chi niyawcha para li kala'awcho'o chi sast'icha jatsukunti kalhitsukucho'ow, tacha an Cristo mala'awnicho'okalh la x'alhp'asninti an kimPayk'an.
45006005	Li t'atala'xt'o'awcha an Cristo la xlinin tacha yucha nilh, pus wanajcha chuni kat'atala'xt'o'aw tacha an la'awcho'olh.
45006006	K'atsayawi li yu tacha p'ulhnajcha ixt'awnaw, anchacha t'axtukmuk'akalh an Cristo, para li an kijatsukuntik'an yu wa sawalhcha ix'ilhtuy tala'alhin, kanilhcha, chi chuncha jantucha yu an tala'alhini akintalhilatsukun;
45006007	mu yu nitacha, ma'alhtaxtukalhcha an laka tala'alhin.
45006008	Li kitnan t'anitawcha an Cristo, kiklaka'iyawcha wachu li kat'a'aklatsukuyaw.
45006009	K'atsayawi li an Cristo, la'awcho'olh chi ntucha a'tam katinilh. An lhinin tucha layi ta kati'ilhtulh.
45006010	Mu an Cristo akxni an nilh, akxnicha wanajcha ixpujun'alhin laklhaja'olh chux an tala'alhin, chi chaway li yucha la'awcho'otacha, yucha para yucha an Dioscha li t'ajun.
45006011	Wanajcha chuni uxitnan, k'alhi'ilht'utcha li laknit'atcha, jantucha layi k'at'i'ilht'ut tala'alhin, pero la'awt'at'iti para Dios, t'at'ala'xt'o'at'iti an Cristo Jesús.
45006012	Pus jant'uch'a k'amak'awnit'iti li ali katalaklhajani an tala'alhin an la milakatunajk'an, yu lay niy, chi li ali katamatanunini katama'ilhtun an wa tanlhuncha lakask'in an lakatunaj.
45006013	Jant'uch'a k'ama'axt'a'nit'iti amilakatunajk'an an tala'alhin, para li lay kapu'ilhtukalh yu ntu oxi. Apalij k'at'ama'axt'a'nit'it an Dios, tacha yu laknit'atcha, pero chaway la'awch'o'ot'atcha, chi k'ama'axt'a'nitcha amilakatunajk'an an Dios para li yuchacha kapu'ilhtulh yu oxi tanlhun.
45006014	Chuncha an tala'alhin tucha layi katich'alhkatnalh la mijatsukuntik'an, mu uxitnan jantu yu an lhamap'a'sini p'ut'awnat'it yucha an ixjamapayninti Dios.
45006015	¿Chi chaway tasucha?, ¿Ali ka'ilhtuyawi kintala'alhink'an mu li ntu yu an lhamap'a'sini yu kiklaka'iyaw li yucha an ixjamapayninti Dios? ¡Jantu!
45006016	Uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat li t'ama'axt'a'niyat pumatam patrón para li wa kataputapatsancha chi li yuchacha k'a'asmatnit'it, yucha ani patroni ixma'tapatsanin k'a'una'it chi yucha k'a'asmatniya'it. Pus wanajcha chuni aniy, li yuch'a asmatniyat an tala'alhin, yucha katalhi'ananiy laka lhinin, pero li asmatniyat'iti an Dios, yucha oxicha katala'ts'inan.
45006017	Pero lhimala'puchajuncha an Dios, mu masi uxitnan xlip'ulhnaj yucha an tala'alhini ixta'a'ch'apatan, chaway xlichuxcha mijalhunutk'ani asmat'at'it t'ach'a an masunik'ant'at'it lhamap'a'sin.
45006018	Uxitnan ma'alht'axt'uk'antcha tacha an ixta'a'ch'apatan an tala'alhin, chaway yucha an laj'oxicha tanlhuni ch'a'o'at'at.
45006019	Tacha ani klajuniw, wanaj klalhixa'alaw yu oxi misp'ayat'it, wa xliyu uxitnan lhima'anxkayi para li k'alhimach'a'xat. Xlip'ulhnaj uxitnan ma'axt'a'nit'iti amilakatunajk'an an tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi chi x'ilht'uyatcha mintala'alhink'an, pero chaway k'ama'axt'a'nitcha amilakatunajk'an an Dios, oxich'a yu k'ap'u'ilht'ut chi wa yucha an Dioscha k'at'a'aklats'uk'ut.
45006020	Uxitnan akxni yuchaka an tala'alhin ixta'a'ch'apatan jantu yu ixt'at'ap'ats'ayat an yu oxi tanlhun.
45006021	¿Chi tisuncha yu oxi la'ch'ip'init an t'ach'a ixlayat'iti? Chaway uxitnan wa lhimaxananatcha anchunu tanlhun, mu yucha wa laka lhinincha kalhi'an.
45006022	Pero chaway, li ma'alht'axt'uk'antcha tacha an ixta'a'ch'apatan an tala'alhin, chi ixma'tapatsanincha an Diosi ilht'uk'ant'it, chaway oxicha t'a'aklat'awnat an Dios, yucha k'ap'uch'ip'ina'itcha an laka jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
45006023	Mu yu xatalhaja an tala'alhin yucha lhinin; pero yu xt'a'a an Dios yucha jatsukunti, yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy, yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo kintapuxta'nikanan.
45007001	Kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan misp'ayat'iti an lhamap'a'sin, ch'i k'ats'ayati'ti li an lhamap'a'sin alhp'asi li an lapanak t'ajunka'.
45007002	Tacha pumatam t'aku yu t'at'awkan, li t'ajunka ixt'apapa kat'atawla an ixt'apapa tacha najunta laka lhamap'a'sin, pero li an ixt'apapa an t'aku nicha, an t'aku putaxtunicha an laka lhamap'a'sin, yu ixput'at'ajun an ixt'apapa'.
45007003	An t'aku li t'atsukupalay pumatam lapanak chi li t'ajunka yu ixt'apapa, wa aya laycha, pero li an ixt'apapa nitacha, chuncha putaxtunicha an laka lhamap'a'sin, chi laycha kat'atsukucho'olh pumatam lapanak chi chuncha jantucha wa aya lay.
45007004	Wanajcha chuni uxitnani kint'ala'awnin, akxni ch'a'o'atcha an Cristo t'anit'itcha, pus akxni jantucha yu an lhamap'a'sini xtach'alhkatnaniyan. Tachanu k'at'at'ala'xt'o'ch'o'otcha pumatam, kanaju, an yu nilh chi xli'astan la'awcho'olh. Chunchacha lay ka'ilhtuyaw yu oxi lhiwilay an Dios.
45007005	Mu akxni wa la'ma'lhta'alhinincha ixt'awnaw, an la kilakatunajk'an kintamakujunini yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun an lhamap'a'sin, chi wa para laka lhinincha junlhi an tanlhuncha yu ixlak'ilhtuyaw.
45007006	Pero chaway makajuwcha an lhamap'a'sin yu kixta'a'ch'apatan, tachanu lakniwcha. Chaway kintamakajuncha, chaway yucha an ixTakuwincha Diosi put'atapatsayaw. Jantucha yu ma'anchacha lhamap'a'sini put'atapatsayaw.
45007007	¿Chi chaway kanawnaw li sna tala'alhini an lhamap'a'sin? ¡Jantu, jantu tala'alhin! Pero kit'in yucha an lhamap'a'sini ikpumispalh tuchini yu tala'alhincha. Jantu a'tam xajk'atsalhi tuchini jumputuncha yu sk'unla'ts'inkan tu'u' li an lhamap'a'sin tu tu'u kaxnawlh: "Jant'u k'ask'unla'ts'i tu'u'".
45007008	Chi an tala'alhin apalij wa pu'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi an lhamap'a'sin, wa stakcha kima'ilhtulhi li aklaksk'unla'ts'ilhi chux an tanlhun yu ntu oxi; mu akxni ntu tu'u lhamap'a'sin, jantu alhp'asi an tala'alhin.
45007009	Ix'alin panch'e'ex akxni jantu laka lhamap'a'sin xakt'ajun, pero akxni chilhcha an lhamap'a'sin an tala'alhin la'aw'icho'olh chi kit'in iknilhcha.
45007010	Chunchacha apaliji an lhamap'a'sin yu xakixta'nilh jatsukunti, apalij wa ikpunilhcha.
45007011	Mu an tala'alhin apalij wa pu'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi an lhamap'a'sin, chi ki'o'xcho'olh, an tala'alhin yucha an lhamap'a'sini kimpuma'nilh.
45007012	Pus an lhamap'a'sin yucha stalan'a chi an chiwinti yu lhinawkan wachu stalan'a chi ts'awj chi oxi.
45007013	¿Chi chuncha xliyu li an yu oxi apalijcha wa ikpunilh? ¡Jantu, jantu xliyu'! Wa xliyu an tala'alhin, para li kalhimasulhi li tala'alhin sawalh, kima'nilh, yucha an yu laj'oxi tanlhuni kimpuma'nilh. Pus chunchacha an chiwinti yu nawkan li kamuktaxtukalh pumasukalhi li an tala'alhin tu k'is oxi.
45007014	K'atsayawi li an lhamap'a'sin laka takuwini minchalh, pero kit'in wa iklapanaklata. Kist'amaka'ankanta an laka tala'alhin.
45007015	An yu k'ilhtuy jantu iklhimacha'xay, mu ntu yu k'ilhtuy an yu k'ilhtuputun, apalij yucha an yu ntu k'ilhtuputuni k'ilhtuy.
45007016	Pus li apalij yucha ik'ilhtuy an yu ntu k'ilhtuputun, chunchacha ikpuk'atsay li an lhamap'asin oxi.
45007017	Pus tucha kit'ini ik'ilhtuy an yu ntu k'ilhtuputun, yucha an tala'alhin an t'ajun lakilakatunaj.
45007018	Mu kit'in ijk'atsayi li an la kilakatunaj tu tu'u alin yu oxi, mu masi k'ilhtuputuni yu oxi, jantu lay ik'ilhtuy.
45007019	An yu k'ilhtuputun yu oxi, jantu yu k'ilhtuy, apalij yucha k'ilhtuy an yu ntu oxi, walh chi ntu yu k'ilhtuputun.
45007020	Pus mu li k'ilhtuyi an yu ntu ik'ilhtuputun, jantucha kit'ini k'ilhtuy an yu k'ilhtuy masi tachanu kit'ini k'ilhtuy tasuy, yucha an tala'alhin an alin an la kilakatunaja chuncha ilhtuy.
45007021	Iklhakapu'ani li masi k'ilhtuputuni an yu oxi tanlhun, wa yucha an yu ntu oxi tanlhuni iklhit'ajun.
45007022	La kimpulakni ik'achaniya an ixlamap'asin an Dios,
45007023	pero ikla'ts'in tuchichun yu ki'ilhtuy li ntu lay oxi ajkalakpastaknalh, yucha an ixlamap'a'sin an tala'alhin, yu alin an la kilakatunaj chi oxicha kima'alhilata.
45007024	¡Paynicha kit'in! ¿Tisiyuchacha akima'alhtaxtuya aniy laka lakatunaj yu xt'a'a lhinini?
45007025	Wa yucha an Dios, yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo akimpuma'alhtaxtuya', lhimala'puchajuncha an Dios. La kijatapast'ak'at k'ilhtuputuni an tacha najun ixlamap'a'sin an Dios, pero an la kilakatunaj ki'a'ch'apata an ixlamap'a'sin an tala'alhin.
45008001	Pus chaway tucha tu'u katijalhimama'alh'ajnikalh an yu tat'atala'xt'o'acha an Cristo Jesús, an yu ntu wa la xjatapast'ak'atchak'an tat'ajun an yu ta'ilhtuy an yu lhinajun an Takuwin.
45008002	Mu an ixlamap'a'sin an Takuwin yu xt'a'a jatsukunti, ixlakata an Jesucristo, kima'alhtaxtulh li xakt'ajun an la'ixlamap'a'sin an tala'alhin chi an lhinin.
45008003	Mu an Dios ilhtulhi yu an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés jantu lay ilhtulh. An ixlamap'a'sin Moisés ma'ats'an'alhi ix'alhp'asninti ixlakata li ntu lajk'ut'ilini an lapanakni li lay katamuktaxtulh. An Dios makmilhi an isTs'alh, wa tacha kitnan yu lay ilhtuyaw tala'alhini ixmakminta chi xlimakminta tachanu lha'ulan, ixlakata an tala'alhin. An isTs'alh Dios la ixlakatunaja ma'nilh an tala'alhin.
45008004	Chunchacha ilhtulh para li kitnan layi kamuktaxtu tacha an najunta ka'ilhtuw an lhamap'a'sin, mu ntucha wa kijalakpastaknatk'ani ilhtuyaw li t'awnaw, tacha an lakask'incha an Takuwini ilhtuyaw li t'awnaw.
45008005	An yu wa la xjatapast'ak'atchak'an taput'ajun, wa yuchacha tapast'ak'a katach'a'o'alh, pero an yu tat'ajun tacha an lakask'in ixTakuwin Dios, yu'uncha yucha tapast'ak'a.
45008006	Chi li wa yuchacha pastakkan akch'a'o'alh an yu wa kijatapast'ak'atchak'an ilhtuputun, yucha kalhi'an laka lhinin, pero li yucha pastakkan an tanlhun yu de laka Takuwin, yucha kalhi'aniy laka jatsukunti chi kaxta'nini oxi jatawlhnat.
45008007	An yu wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'an ta'ilhtuputun, yu'uncha taxkajiya an Dios, mu ntu ta'ilhtuniputuni an ixlamap'a'sin chi ntu lay ta'ilhtuy.
45008008	Xliyu li an yu wa tacha lakask'incha xjatapast'ak'atk'an taput'ajun, jantu lay oxi katijalhiwilalhi an Dios.
45008009	Pero uxitnan jantucha yu p'ut'awnat an yu wa mijatapast'ak'atchak'an lakask'in, yucha an tacha lhi'achanicha Takuwin, mu an ixTakuwin Dios la mijatsukuntichak'ani t'ajun. Yu ntu lhit'ajuni an ixTakuwin Cristo, jantu ixlapanak an Cristo.
45008010	Pero li an Cristo lhit'awnat'iti la mijatsukuntik'an, an ixTakuwin Dios t'ajun, mu an Dios tala'ts'inancha li ts'awjcha t'awnat masi akxni amilakatunajk'an kanilh ixlakata an tala'alhin.
45008011	Chi li lhit'awnat'iti la mijatsukuntik'an an ixTakuwin an yu mala'awnicho'olh an Jesús, wachu kataxta'niyani sast'i jatsukunti an la milakatunajk'an yu lay niy, mu an ixTakuwin lhit'awnatcha.
45008012	Pus chunchacha kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan yu wach'u k'iklak'a'iyat an Dios alini kilhi'ilhtutk'an, pero yu jantucha yu wa kijatapast'ak'atchak'an lakask'in.
45008013	Mu li uxitnan wa tacha an yu lakask'incha mijatapast'ak'atk'ani ilht'uyat, k'alakniya'it, pero li an la xTakuwin Diosi ma'niyat an wa tanlhuncha mijatapast'ak'atk'an, k'ats'uk'uya'it.
45008014	Ixchuxk'an an yu ixTakuwin Dios jamalhtanata, yu'uncha ixjas'at'an an Dios.
45008015	Mu uxitnan jantu ta'a'ch'apatan la'atam takuwin yu wa kata'ilhtupalan li wa k'alakt'alhanant'itcha, an Takuwin yu ta'a'ch'apatan yucha ta'ilhtuyan li ixjas'at'an Diosi k'a'unt'it. Yucha ani Takuwini yu lay pula'cha'anaw tan wilhchalh an Dios, chi nawnaw: "KimPay, kimPay".
45008016	Chi ani Takuwin t'atala'xt'o'a an kintakuwink'an para li kanawna li kitnan ixjas'at'an an Dios.
45008017	Chi mu ixjas'at'ancha an Diosi kitnan, wachu kala'a'iyawi yu an Dios kintajunan li akintaxta'niyan, kalhawat'alhitsukuyawi an Cristo, li t'ama'alh'ajnanaw para li wachu kat'atawlhcha'awi tan ka'ana tawlhna la xlich'alhkat.
45008018	Tacha an lak'alin lhima'alh'ajna yu chaway ani panch'e'ex, kit'in iknajun wanaj tu k'is tu'u katitasulh tacha an kala'ts'inaw xli'astan ixta'ayaxtu an Dios.
45008019	Chux tacha an alin aniy lakamunulhpa yu ilhtuta an Dios, sawalhcha so'ojo tala'ts'imputun tani wanancha kajamasuya an Dios tichini yu'unchacha yu tukancha ixjas'at'an.
45008020	Mu an yu ja'ilhtulh an Dios, jantu layi tacha'alh tan kaxtacha'alh. Chi li chunchacha tatapasalh jantu wa ixjatalapututchak'an, yucha an Diosi chuncha ilhtulh. Pero chuxi tapakxan'i
45008021	li an Dios kajama'alhtaxtuya'. Mu aniy wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi jalaklhilat'ajun. An Dios kajama'alhtaxtuya para li katacha'alhi an tan ay ixputa'alhtaxtuk'an an ixjas'at'an.
45008022	K'atsayawi li sta chaway chux tacha an lak'ilhtuta an Dios ma'alh'ajnan, chi najuni li tachalayjcha k'atsan, tacha pumatam t'aku akxni lhitsukuy ixjas'at'a.
45008023	Chi ntu wa yucha an tacha lak'ilhtutacha an Diosi tala'ma'alh'ajnan, wachu kitnan, yu lhit'awnaw an Takuwin, yu puk'atsayaw tuchini kala'a'iyawcha. Sawalhcha la'ma'alh'ajnanawi li chaway wa pakxan'iyawka akxni akintala'a'iyancha tacha ixjas'at'an an Dios, chi chunchacha yu kaputa'alhtaxtuya an kilakatunajk'an.
45008024	Tacha ani pakxan'iyaw chunchacha puta'alhtaxtuyaw, pero li tu'u ikpakxan'iy li yu tasuycha, yucha ntu lay aktijunilh li wa ikpakxan'ika', mu li yu tasuycha ¿tasucha wa aklhipakxan'iyaka li yu ikla'ts'incha?
45008025	Pero li yu wa pakxan'iyawka, yu ntuka' la'ts'inaw, xlak'anti kapakxan'iyaw.
45008026	Wanajcha chun an Takuwin kintalhi'a'tayjuyani akxni ntucha lajk'ut'ilin juntaw la kijakiklaka'intik'an. Mu ntu lay ts'awj tapayniyaw tacha yu ts'awjcha katapayniw, pero an Takuwin yucha tapayniniya an Dios kilakatak'an, jantu lay nawkan laka chiwinti tacha an tapaynini.
45008027	Chi mu an Dios yucha oxi laklhakapu'an an jalhunut, pus k'atsayi tuchini nawputuncha an Takuwin, mu an Takuwin tapayniniya an Dios ixlakatak'an an yu takiklaka'i, chi tacha yu lakask'in an Diosi tapaynini.
45008028	Chi k'atsayawi li an yu oxi talhiwilay an Dios, chux an laktanlhun laktapasay wa oxi japulhi'a'tayjuy. Yu'uncha yu an Dios jat'asanita.
45008029	An yu ixjamispaycha an Dios akxni masi ntuka' xtatsukuy yucha nawlh li wachucha tacha an isTs'alhi katawalh, para li xluwk'ancha lhit'ala'awnin katawalh, chi yucha an isTs'alh Dioscha yu xa'ay kawalh.
45008030	Chi yu yucha an Dioscha ixjasakxtuta akxni ntuka' xtatsukuy, wachu jat'asanilh, chi an yu jat'asanilh oxicha jala'ts'ilh, chi ani yu oxicha jala'ts'ilh ja'ilhtulhi li katalhitapalalhi an tan ch'alhkatnan.
45008031	¿Tasucha kanawpalawi? Li Diosi kintalhistaktan, ¿tisiyuchacha akintat'alaxtukuyani?
45008032	Li an Dios ma'axta'lhi laka lhinin an isTs'alh kilakatak'an kinchuxk'an, ¿tasucha li ntu wa ayxtam ali an isTs'alhi akintaxta'niyan chux an laktanlhuni?
45008033	¿Tisiyuchacha lay kaja'alhtasuya an yu Dios jasakxtuta, li yu oxicha jala'ts'in yucha an Diosi?
45008034	¿Tisiyuchacha lay akintalhimuk'ayan kintala'alhink'ani? Jantu xamati', an Cristo yucha kintalhinincha, pero masi chuncha, yucha la'awcho'olh chi chaway piktuwilhchalhcha tan oxi ixpa'xti an Dios chi lhisk'iniya kilakatak'an.
45008035	¿Tisiyuchacha lay akintama'osuyan la xjamapayninti Cristojo? ¿Yucha an lhima'alh'ajna u yucha an la'lhima'anxkay tanlhun u li kintach'a'o'akanan u chawan u li mati kila'ch'itk'an u tu'u yu lhima'anxkay u makxkayalhinin?
45008036	Tacha najunta tan ts'o'muk'akanta: Lhilhiji wa k'is ikt'awnaw laka lhinin milakata, Wa tacha wa borregojnincha akxni jalhi'ankan tan jama'nikani kinta'ilhtukanan.
45008037	Pero masi chuncha tapasay palay alhp'asi iklhajayacha'aw, yucha an yu kintamapayniyani kintalhi'a'tayjuyan.
45008038	Oxi ijk'atsay li ntu tu'u lay akintitama'osun la xjamapayninti Dios, jantu layi akintitama'osun an lhinin chi an jatsukunti chi an angelhnin chi an yu ntu laj'oxi lhich'alhkat chi an ix'alhp'asninti lakmakxkay'un chi yu wa tapasat'ajunka chi yu wa katapasayaka',
45008039	chi tan palay talhman chi tan palay talaktsin, chi watuchicha atumpaj yu tacha an lak'ilhtuta an Dios, tu tu'u yu lay akintitama'osunin an ixjamapayninti Dios, yu an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo kintapumasunin.
45009001	Tacha kit'in ixlapanak an Cristo, sawalhi an yu iknawt'ajun, jantu wa ikmaslakatinin. Atumpaj mu yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini malhtanata an kijatapast'ak'at, pus ijk'atsayi li aniy yucha sawalh.
45009002	Ay ta'oxila'alhiti iklhit'ajun chi an la kijalhunut wa paktsincha kixkani,
45009003	sta wa laycha li kit'in akts'an'alhcha, jantucha akt'ajalhtanalhi an Cristo, li sna chuncha yu lay akjalhi'a'tayjulh an kijat'ala'awnin, yu kint'ajudiojnin.
45009004	Yu'uncha jamacha'an Israel, yu'uncha yu an Dios jasakxtuta para li tacha ixjas'at'ancha katawalh. An Dios jamasunilhi an ix'alhp'asninti chi jat'atamakawlhi li yu'uncha ixlapanakni chi jaxta'nilhi lhamap'a'sin chi ja'ilhtulhi li yu'uncha ayi katala'ts'ilh an Dios, chi li katapakxan'ilhi tacha an jajunilh an Dios.
45009005	Yu'uncha ixlakpaynink'an oxi ixtat'a'aklat'ajun Dios ma'anchacha. Chi yu'uncha japula'awlh an Cristo, chi an Cristo yucha Dios, wa tanchun kawalhcha. Yucha lhilhiji kaxta'niw lhimala'puchajun. Chuncha kawalh.
45009006	Chaway jantu takiklaka'iy pero jantu iknawputun li an ixchiwinti Dios jantu lhitapalay. Yu tapasay, li ntu ixchuxk'ani an jamacha'an Israel ixjas'at'an an Dios.
