45009007	Chi ntu wa xliyu li yucha an Abrahamcha tapu'a'p'unminchalh, chaway kanaju li sicha ixjas'at'an. An Dios junilh an Abraham: "Yu k'aja'una'a li uxint'i tapu'a'p'unmincha'an yu'uncha an yu katapu'a'p'unminanta an Isaac."
45009008	Nawputun, jantu ixchuxk'an an ixjas'at'an an Abrahami ixjas'at'an Dios, yu ixjas'at'an Dios yu'uncha an yu takiklaka'iy li ka'alina tani kalhita'alhtaxtukanacha, yu tacha an Dios junilh an Abraham.
45009009	Mu an Dios chunchuniya nawlh: "Ani minta k'ata, uxint'i Abraham chi uxint'i Sara, aklaxta'niyaw pumatam mints'alhk'an."
45009010	Chi ntu wa chunchacha tapasalh. An ixt'uyunk'an ists'alan an Rebeca wa pumatami ixpayk'an, yu ta ixlila'ts'inaw yu junkan Isaac.
45009011	Akxni ntuka' ixtatsukuy, akxni ntuka' tu'u ixta'ilhtuy yu oxi u yu ntu oxi, an Dios sakxtulh pumatam. Chunchacha pumasulh an Dios li yucha sakxtuy yu yuchacha sakxtuputun, jantu xamati sakxtuy wa xliyu oxicha tanlhun lak'ilhtuta,
45009012	an Rebeca junkan: "An xa'ay wa ma'tsuku apaliji kajuna', yucha an xalakat'ikt'i yu xa'ay kajuna'."
45009013	Chi chuncha ts'o'muk'ak'anta an tan najunta: " An Jacob ikmapayni, pero an Esaú jantu ikla'ts'imputun."
45009014	¿Chaway tasu kanawnawcha? ¿Kanawnawi li an Dios jantu oxi tacha an lay? Jantu layi chunchacha katinaju.
45009015	Mu an Dios juniy an Moisés: "Akmapayniya li yu ikmapayniputun."
45009016	Pus li kintasakxtukanan, jantu wa kitnancha lakask'iw u wa sawalhcha lhipuxkawniw, yucha an Diosi yu kintamapayniyan.
45009017	Chi an tan ts'o'muk'akanta, an Dios juniya an Faraón: "Kit'ini ik'ilhtun rey para li akpumasuni an ki'alhp'asninti chi para li kamispakalhi ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaat'un an kinta'a'ut."
45009018	Pus an Dios yucha mapayniya yu yucha mapayniputun, chi yucha wachu yu t'ak'alh ilhtuniy ixjalhunut yu chuncha ilhtuniputun.
45009019	Chi chaway ak'i'una'a: Li chuncha, ¿tasu li an Dios najuncha li yucha an lapanaki ixkwentaja, mu yu Dioscha chuncha najun jantu lay xamati katitanchanilhi?
45009020	¡Uxint'i lapanak! ¿Tisu milhijunticha para li k'at'alaxt'uk'ucha Diosi? ¿Chu sna an de t'un xaluj kajuna an yu la'oxilh: Tasu li t'ach'a k'ila'oxit'icha?
45009021	An yu la'la'oxiy tanlhun laka slaman'a t'un yucha yu lay kalak'ilhtuya an tanlhun tani yu ilhtuputuncha; layi ka'ilhtulh la'atam xaluj an laka slaman'a t'un yu sawalh lhitapalay chi layi ka'ilhtupalh la'atam yu wa kapumukalhcha jamakxtalh.
45009022	An Dios masi ixmasuputuni tani yu junitacha an ixjamama'alh'ajninti chi kaxmasulhi an ix'alhp'asninti, sawalh xlak'anti jalhitayanilh an yu ixtat'acha'an li kaxtama'alh'ajnalh chi kaxtats'an'alhcha.
45009023	Chi wachu masulhi an ixk'usinti la kijatsukuntik'an, mu kintamapaynin chi kitnancha kintamala'asijnin yu ma'anchacha para li kat'a'awi an tan xlimj wilhchalh.
45009024	An Dios kintat'asanincha, ali'in kitnan yu judiojnin chi an ali'in yu masi ntu judiojnin.
45009025	Tacha an najunta an la xlibro an Oseas: Ajkajuna li kilapanakni an yu ntu kilapanakni ixtajunita. Chi akmapayniya an yu ntu xakmapayni.
45009026	Chi an tan jajunkalh: Uxitnan yu ntu kilapanakni, ancha kajajunkana ixjas'at'an Dios yu la'ajunta.
45009027	Chi an Isaías jalhichiwinilh an jamacha'an Israel, najun: Masi an ixjas'at'an an Israel wanajcha ixluwk'ani katawalh tacha an alin kukuj alamalh, wa lakats'uniya katatamakawna yu katata'alhtaxtuya'.
45009028	Mu an Jamach'alhkat yucha kamuktaxtuya an ixchiwinti aniy lakamunulhpa', chi wa lasi ka'ilhtuya chi chuxi ka'ilhtu'oya'.
45009029	Tacha yu p'ulhnajcha najunta an Isaías: Li an Jamach'alhkat yu lhuw jalhit'ajun ixsoldadojnin jantu xakintamakawnini kijas'at'ank'an, ka tacha an la'acha'an Sodoma chi an la'acha'an Gomorraja ixputapasaw.
45009030	¿Chaway tasu kanawnawcha? An yu ntu judiojnin chi ntu ixtapuxkajuy Dios para li ts'awjcha katat'ajalhtanalh, yu'unchacha yu ts'awjcha tat'ajalhtanan mu takiklaka'iy.
45009031	Pero an israelitajnin masi ixtalhit'ajuni lhamap'a'sin tan ixtala'ts'in para li lay ts'awj kaxtat'ajalhtanalh an Dios, jantu lay tamuktaxtulhi anchunu lhamap'a'sin.
45009032	¿Tasu'u? Mu ntu la xjakiklaka'intik'ani tapuxkawlh, wachunchacha tapula'cha'amputulh tacha an talak'ilhtuycha tanlhun, wa li laycha kapula'cha'ankana chuncha. Jantu takiklaka'ilh xliyu tachanu japu'ayst'uk'ukalh an chiwx yu ja'ayst'uk'unun,
45009033	an yu lhichiwininta tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Kit'in ak'ulaya an la'acha'an Sion, chiwx yu kaja'ayst'uk'ununa chi chiwx yu kaputa'a'takana'. Yu kakiklaka'iya jantu katitamaxanilh."
45010001	Kint'ala'awnin, yu sawalhcha lakask'in an kijalhunut chi an kintapaynit akxni iktapaynini an Dios ixlakatak'an an israelitajnin, li katata'alhtaxtulh.
45010002	Kit'in klajunaw, yu'uncha sawalhcha tat'atapatsaputuni an Dios; pero wa x'aman tacha an taputapatsaputun jantu tacha an najunta an yu oxi jatapast'ak'at.
45010003	Mu ntu tak'atsayi li yucha an Diosi yu ja'ilhtuy an lapanakni li ts'awj katatsukulh, wa tacha yu yu'unchacha tajatapastaknani tapuch'a'o'aputun an Dios, jantu ta'ilhtuyi tacha an najun an Dios yu ka'ilhtukalh para li oxicha kat'a'klatsuku.
45010004	Yu pu'ukla'olhcha an ixlamap'a'sin an Moisés yucha an Cristo, chi chux yu takiklaka'iy ts'ajwi katatsukuya'.
45010005	Chi tani yu ts'awjcha kat'ajalhtanankalh an Dios, an la xlamap'a'sin Moisés ts'o'lhi: "Yu kamuktaxtuya aniy lhamap'a'sin, yuchacha kaputsukuya'."
45010006	Pero yu yucha an jakiklaka'inti ts'awj put'a'aklat'ajun an Dios, ancha chunchuniya najun: "Jant'u k'ap'ast'akt'i k'anaw, ¿tisiyuchacha ka'ana lakt'iyani?" (mu chuncha tachanu nawt'a'un li kata'alhtajulhi lakaat'un an Cristo),
45010007	u k'anaw, "¿Tisiyuchacha ka'ana tan ta'aknunun an janinini?" (mu tachanu li nawt'a'un li ka'ostayalh an Cristo tan an tamanalh janinin)
45010008	¿Tisapujcha yu nawputun an tan najunta?: "An chiwinti wa niya lhit'a'un, la minkilhni chi la mijalhunut." Aniy chiwinti yu pujakiklaka'ininkan yucha yu iklhichiwininaw.
45010009	Li la minkilhnich'a p'una'un li an Jesús yucha Jamach'alhkat chi li k'iklak'a'iya la mijalhunut li an Dios mala'awnicho'olhi an Jesús laka lhinin, k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'a.
45010010	Mu la kijalhunutk'ani pukiklaka'ikan para li oxi k'at'a'aklats'uk'u an Dios, chi la kinkilhnik'ani nawkan tichini yuchacha an Jesucristo para li k'at'a'alht'axt'u.
45010011	An tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: "Jantu xamati yu yucha kiklaka'iy chi wa kalhits'an'alhcha."
45010012	Jantu xamati yu ntucha kala'a'ikalh, yu judiojnin chi yu ntu judiojnin, mu an Jamach'alhkat, ta lhichuxi kiJamach'alhkatk'an chi lhuwi jaxta'niy t'u'u ixchuxk'an an yu ta'a'atant'asay.
45010013	Mu chunchuniya najunta: "Ixchuxk'an yu kata'a'atant'asaya an ixta'a'ut an Jamach'alhkat, katata'alhtaxtuya'."
45010014	Pero, ¿tasucha lay katalhi'a'atant'asaya li ntu takiklaka'ita? ¿Chi tasucha lay katalhikiklaka'iya li ntu a'tam ta'asmatta tan kalhichiwinkalh yucha? ¿Chi tasucha lay katalhi'asmat'a li ntu xamati yu kajalhixa'alalh an ixchiwinti?
45010015	¿Chi tasucha lay kata'ana lhichiwinin an ixchiwinti li ntu xamati jamala'achayi? Tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "¡Sawalhcha oxi akxni li tachincha an yu talhichiwiniy an chiwinti yu oxi jatawlhnat chi talhichiwiniycha an laj'oxi chiwinti!"
45010016	Pero ntu ixchuxk'ani takiklaka'ilh an laj'oxi chiwinti yu puta'alhtaxtukan. Tacha najun an Isaías: "Jamach'alhkat, ¿Tisiyuchacha kiklaka'ita an kinchiwintik'ani?"
45010017	Pus chunchacha, li jakiklaka'ininkan wa xliyu li asmatkan an ixchiwinti Dios chi li asmatkan akxni lhichiwinkan an Cristo.
45010018	Chi chaway iknajun, ¿Sna ntu ta'asmatlhi aniy chiwinti? ¡Chun, ta'asmatlhi! An tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: An ixchiwintik'an yu'uncha ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaat'uni asmatkalh, chi an ixchiwintik'an cha'alhi wa tanchun kawalhcha an lakaamunulhpa'.
45010019	Chi a'tam iknawpalay: ¿Sna an yu jamacha'an Israel jantu tak'atsay? Pero an Dios p'ulhnajcha manawnilhi an Moisés, najun: Akla'ilhtuyawi li k'ajask'unla'ts'init'iti yu talhit'ajun an lapanakni yu ntu kilapanakni; akla'ilhtuyawi li k'ajat'alh'amajla'ts'int'iti an lapanakni yu ntu ixtaja'asmatnamputun.
45010020	Chi an Isaías tapujulhi nawlh: Yu'uncha an yu ntu kixtapuxkajuyi kintala'cha'alh; Yu'uncha an yu ntu kixtalhasakminini kintamispalh.
45010021	Chi akxni yucha an israelitajnincha ixjalhichiwiniy an Isaías, najun: Tam wilhchani ikstak jat'asanilh an lapanakni yu ntu k'is taja'asmatnan chi ntu k'is tajakiklaka'inin."
45011001	Chaway iknajun, ¿Sna an Dios jantucha jala'ts'imputuni an ixlapanakni? ¡Jantu, jantu chun! Kit'in wachu xjas'at'a Israel, yu ta jalhila'ts'in an Abraham, chi yu ta ixjalhila'ts'in an Benjamín.
45011002	Yu ma'anchacha, an Dios yu'uncha an xjas'at'an Israelhi ja'ilhtulh ixjas'at'an, chi chaway tu jala'amaj'anta. ¿Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti tani lhichiwinkantacha an Elías an tan ts'o'muk'akanta, li tani tapayninilhcha an Dios tan ja'alhtasulh an Israelitajnin? An Elías najun:
45011003	"Jamach'alhkat, jala'ma'ninik'a an yu ixtalhichiwiniy minchiwinti chi amintan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan talakt'ilhini'ojon chi wa ki'akstucha iktamakajunta chi wachu kintama'niputun."
45011004	Pero an Dios alhtaylh: "Ijkama'ata la'atujun milh lapanakni yu para kit'in, yu ntu tatatso'ottanita an dios Baal."
45011005	Pus chaway wanajcha chuni tatamakajunta lakats'uni yu de yu'uncha, yucha an Diosi jasakxtuta la xjamapayninti.
45011006	Chi li la xjamapayninti an Dios jasakxtuta, jantu wa xliyu li tu'u laj'oxi tanlhun ixta'ilhtuta, mu li chuncha kaxwalh, an ixjamapayninti Dios jantucha kaxjunkalhi li jamapayninti.
45011007	¿Chaway tasucha? An xjas'at'an Israel jantu tala'cha'alhi yu ixtapuxkajuy. Pero yu an Dios jasakxtulh yu'uncha tala'cha'alh. An ali'in ja'ilhtukalhi li t'ak'alh katalalh,
45011008	tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: An Dios ja'ilhtulhi li an la xjatapast'ak'atk'an tu katajak'atsaanalh; chi jaxta'nilhi la'chulh yu ntu tapalakawanan chi a'ax'olh yu ntu tapa'asmatnan chi sta chaway chuncha talay.
45011009	Chi an David wachu najun: An tan talak'ilhtuy wayt is'apak'ani katatapalaxtunilh, para li kataputa'a'talh chi kajaxta'nikalhi lhima'alh'ajna.
45011010	Katala'la'ach'ixlalh para li ntu katajalakawanalh, katala'pula'alh'awilin'alhilhcha.
45011011	Chi chaway iknajun, ¿Li an judiojnin jalaj'ayst'uk'ukalhcha, ixpujun'alhinchak'ani tata'a'talh? ¡Jantu! Li an judiojnin jantu taja'asmatnalh, an ali'in chunchacha yu taputa'alhtaxtulh, para li an judiojnin katask'unla'ts'ilhcha an oxi jatsukunti yu talhit'ajun an yu ntu judiojnin.
45011012	Pus mu li an tala'alhin an yu ta'ilhtulh an judiojnin wa oxicha para an lakaamunulhpa xajchalh chi li tacha an tu oxi tat'axajchalh an judiojnin wa oxicha para an yu ntu judiojnini walh, ¡pus palaycha oxi kajuna para an judiojnin akxni katach'a'o'acho'oyacha an Dios!
45011013	Chi uxitnan yu ntu judiojnin aklajunaw tuchichun, mu li an Dios kimala'achaycha ak'alh jajunini an xchiwinti yu ntu judiojnin, yu para kit'in an kintapatsat sawalhcha lhitapalay.
45011014	Iklakask'in li an yu kijak'alhni talhit'ajun yu kint'ajudiojnin, kata'ilhtulhi an t'ach'a layat, para li katata'alhtaxtulh.
45011015	Mu li jala'amaj'ankalhi an judiojnin, chi oxi para an lakaamunulhpa walh, para li an lakaamunulhpa oxi kat'ajalhtanalh an Dios, an judiojnin yu'uncha wachu kajaxta'nikana jatsukunti akxni katach'a'o'acho'oyacha an Dios.
45011016	Pus mu li an yu p'ulhnajcha ilhtukan pan yucha ixnawincha Dios, an ali jax'ot'anti harina wachucha chuxi xnawin. Chi li a'atam k'iw ixnawincha an Diosi an ixjataxiyak, chux an ix'a'atan'alat wachucha chuxi ixnawin.
45011017	An judiojnin, yu'uncha xak'iw olivo, chi a'atancha'xmaj'ankalhi an ali ix'a'atan'alat ani olivo, chi yucha an wa xasimaroncha olivojo t'alamaklhtanchawcho'okalh, yucha uxint'i yu ntu judiojk'at'i. Chunchacha wa la'atamcha jatsukunti t'alhits'uk'u an olivo chi wanajcha yu mijataxiyak walh an ixjataxiyak.
45011018	Pero chaway jant'u k'anawi li uxint'icha tukan ch'i jant'uch'a t'u'u k'ajalhiwilat'i an yu tukan ix'a'atan'alat an olivo. Li ch'unch'a lay, k'ap'ast'akt'i li ntu uxint'i pula'awtan an ixjataxiyak an olivo, uxint'i yu wa p'ula'a'unt'a an ixjataxiyak an olivo.
45011019	Chi sna layi k'anawp'alh, "chun, pero laj'a'apacha'xmaj'ankalhi an ali ix'a'atan'alat an olivo chi kit'incha ikt'amaklhtanchawkalh".
45011020	Chun sawalh, pero tuchi jalhilaj'a'apacha'xmaj'ankalh wa xliyu jantu ixtajakiklaka'inin, chi uxint'i wa xliyu jak'iklak'a'inin xliyu t'alamaklht'anch'awk'acha. Pero jant'u k'anawi li uxint'icha tukan, apalij wa k'ak'iklak'a'it'i an Dios.
45011021	Mu li an Dios jantu jamak'akxanilhi an yu ixlaj'a'atan'alat tukan an olivo, uxint'i wachu ntu katimak'akxanin.
45011022	Chaway k'ala'ts'icha an Dios li yucha ntu k'is ay junita, pero wachu lakask'ini li ts'awj sawalhi katsukukalh. Jamama'alh'ajniya an yu ntucha takiklaka'iy chi uxint'i oxi la'ts'inan. Pero wachunchacha k'ats'uk'u'alhit'i tacha yucha lhi'achani, mu li jantu, uxint'i wachu k'ach'a'xmaj'anch'o'ok'ana'a.
45011023	Chi atumpaj li an judiojnin katajakiklaka'inincho'olhcha, kajamaklhtanchawcho'okana tan jacha'xp'uxkalh, mu an Dios layi kajamaklhtanchawcho'oya'.
45011024	Chi mu li uxint'i o'sliyancha wa xasimaronk'at'i olivo chi ch'a'x'ik'acha para li k'at'alamaklht'anch'awk'acha an yu oxiya olivo, ¡pus palaycha an judiojnin kajat'alamaklhtanchawcho'okana an tan jacha'xp'uxkalh xlijunti, mu yu'uncha ixlaj'a'atan'alat sawalhi an yu oxi olivo.
45011025	Kint'ala'awnin, iklakask'in li k'ak'ats'at'iti an ixlaktanlhun Dios yu ntu tasuy, para li nt'u k'alat li sawalhch'a k'ats'ayat, an ali'in xjas'at'an Israel t'ak'alh talay, pero wa kacha'ana panch'e'ex akxni katatanu'oyantacha ixchuxk'an an yu ntu xjas'at'an Israel.
45011026	Akxni chunchacha katapasaya, chux an xjas'at'an Israel katata'alhtaxtuya', mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: An yu kajama'alhtaxtununa Sioni kaminanta, chi kama'osuniya an Jacob an yu ntu oxi tanlhun.
45011027	Yucha anicha yu ajkat'atamakawna yu'uncha, akxni ajkama'osuniya ixtala'alhink'an".
45011028	Chi chaway an laka laj'oxi chiwinti, an judiojnin jala'ts'inkan tacha ixt'alaxkayk'an an Dios, para li uxitnan lay k'at'ajalht'anant'it an Dios, pero an Dios jamapaynika an judiojnin, ixlakata li yu'uncha an ixlakpaynink'ani yu jasakxtukalh.
45011029	Mu yu xt'a'acha an Dios jantucha kamaxtunicho'on chi li kat'asanin jantucha kamala'achacho'on.
45011030	Ma'anchacha ixjuntachalh, jant'u k'iklak'a'it'iti an Dios, pero chaway li an judiojnin jantu takiklaka'i, an Dios tamapayniyani uxitnan.
45011031	Pus wanajcha chuni yu'uncha chaway jantucha taja'asmatnan, pero wa xliyu li an Dios wachu katamapaynini uxitnan, chi chaway, para li wachu kajamapaynilhi an Dios an judiojnin.
45011032	Mu ta lhichuxi an Dios kintama'anun laka pulach'in tan ntu ja'asmatnanaw, para li kinchuxk'ani akintamapaynin.
45011033	¡Laj'ay tukani an laj'oxi ixtanlhun Dios chi an ixjatapast'ak'at chi an yu lajk'atsay! ¡Jantu xamati lay najun tuchini past'ak'acha, chi ntu xamati lay la'lhimacha'xani an ixtij!
45011034	¿Tisiyuchacha k'atsaani ixjatapast'ak'at an Jamach'alhkati? ¿Tisi yuchacha lay kamap'a'siya'a?
45011035	¿Tisiyuchacha lapanaki p'ulhnaj kaxta'nilh tu'u Dios para li yucha kamapusp'itnicho'olhcha?
45011036	Mu chux an tanlhun yucha an Diosi xt'a'a, chi yucha pulak'alin chi yucha ix'anun. ¡An Dios yucha ixpujun'alhini ay! Chunchacha kawalh.
45012001	Pus xliyu'u kint'ala'awnin, iklatapaynisk'iniyawi la xjamapayninti an Dios li k'ama'axt'a't'iti amilakatunajk'an tacha lha'ulan yu la'ajunta chi stalan'a chi yu lhi'acha kala'a'ilh an Dios. Anch'ach'a k'ap'umasuya'it li ay sawalhi lhiwilayat an Dios.
45012002	Jantucha wachu wa ch'uni k'ats'uk'ut yu tacha chaway t'awkan aniy lakaamunulhpa', k'amap'axatcha amijatapast'ak'atk'an para li katapaxalhcha amijatsukuntik'an chi laych'a k'ak'ats'at tani yu oxicha lhiwilay an Dios, kanaju, yu oxi, yu lhi'achanit chi yu ts'awj.
45012003	Tacha an kilhimap'a'sita an Dios la xjamapayninti, minchuxk'ani iklajunaw li ntu xamati kanawlh li palay lhitapalay, tacha yu xli'aycha mijakiklaka'intik'an taxta'nin an Dios chunchacha yu k'alhit'ap'alat.
45012004	Mu tacha an la kilakatunajk'an wanaj tipalhuwi t'o' la'nuyaw, chi ntu wa tipatamcha tu'u talhitapalay tacha an t'o' la'nuyaw, tipaspiti talhitapalay,
45012005	pus wanajcha chuni kitnan, masi wanaj kilhuk'an, wa la'atam lakatunaja pulhit'awnaw an Cristo, tacha la'atam lakatunaj wa stakcha la'nuy chuncha kitnan, wanaj lach'apa'otacha'aw.
45012006	An Dios tacha yu yuchacha kintaxta'niputun atamjtamin, chunchacha kintaxta'nin tipaspit tapatsat, li yu xta'nikalhi tapatsat para li kalhichiwinilh an ixchiwinti Dios, tani xli'aycha xjakiklaka'inti chunchacha kalhichiwinilh,
45012007	li yu kajatapatsaniya an ali'in, oxicha kajatapatsanilh, li yu kamasuya, kamasulhcha,
45012008	li yu kajat'alama'oximaj'ayaya an ali'in, kajat'alama'oximaj'ayalhcha, li yu kaja'a'tayjuya yu tama'lhtask'iniy tu'u, laka lhi'oxicha lapanaki ka'ilhtulh, li yu tu'u la'ts'ilhi'an, oxicha kala'ts'ilhi'alh, li yu jamapayninin lhi'achacha chuncha ka'ilhtulh.
45012009	Yu xlisawalhch'a k'alamap'aynip'axat atamjtamin, k'axk'a'it'iti an yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun chi k'a'ilht'ut'iti an yu laj'oxi tanlhun.
45012010	Tacha lhit'ala'awnini k'alamap'aynip'axat, oxi k'alala'ts'int'it ch'i k'alalhiwilap'axat.
45012011	K'at'at'axt'unit'it, jant'u k'amalhe'nint'it, k'at'at'ap'ats'at'iti an Jamach'alhkat laka takuwin yu jo'at.
45012012	Lhi'acha k'ats'uk'ut ixlakata an yu p'akxan'iyat uxitnan; k'alhit'ayanit'iti an tanlhun lhima'alh'ajna, jantu a'tam k'ak'apmaj'ant'iti an tapaynit.
45012013	K'aja'a't'ay'ut'iti an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu wachu takiklaka'iy Dios li tu'u tama'lhtask'ini; oxi k'ajala'a'it yu tala'pixiyalhnanan.
45012014	K'ask'init'iti an Dios li oxi katatawilh an yu wa talhitama'chapuyan; k'ajalhisk'int'iti li oxi katatawilh chi ntu kajaxta'nikalhi tanlhun la'lhima'alh'ajna yu ntu oxi.
45012015	K'ajat'alaj'ach'ant'iti an yu talaj'achan chi k'ajat'alaj'alhunt'iti an yu talaj'alhun.
45012016	Wa tami k'ak'ats'at'it. Jant'u k'alaj'ayajk'ats'at'it, k'ajat'ak'ilhp'at'inijk'ats'at'iti an yu wa tajakilhpatinijk'atsay. Jant'u k'alat'iti li sawalhcha jalakp'ast'aknanat.
45012017	Uxitnan jant'u k'ajalhit'ama'ch'ap'ut'iti masi yu wa talhitama'chapuyan. K'a'ilht'ut'iti tanlhun yu laj'oxi la x'ukxlakapuk'an ixchuxk'an an lapanakni.
45012018	Li wa laycha, k'alhip'uxk'awnit'iti tani oxicha k'ajat'alalhip'in'o'ot chux an lapanakni.
45012019	Kint'ala'awnin, jant'u k'alhich'it'iti tu'u wa mi'akstuchak'an xamati', yucha an Diosi k'amak'awnit li kaxta'nilh lhima'alh'ajna; mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: "Kit'ini aklhach'inina', kit'ini akmapalhniya xamati'." Chuncha najun an Jamach'alhkat.
45012020	Pus li masi yu wa xkayan, li chawani, k'at'away, chi li kikxixa, k'at'a'ott'i, mu li ch'unch'a k'a'ilht'uya'a, k'a'ilht'uya'a li kalhimaxanalhi tacha an ixlakatijla pakxanta.
45012021	Jant'u k'alhit'amak'awi li kalaklhajan an yu ntu oxi tanlhun, apalij k'alaklhaja an yu ntu oxi tanlhun an laka laj'oxi tanlhun.
45013001	Chux lapanak kajak'iklak'a'ilhi an jamach'alhkatni, mu ntu xamati jamach'alhkat yu ntu yu an Dios kamakawnilh, chi an yu ta'alin, yucha an Diosi ja'ulata.
45013002	Pus yu ntu asmatni an jamach'alhkat, jantucha asmatnit'ajuni an yu Dios ulata. Chi an yu wa tat'alaxtukuy, kajamama'alh'ajnikana',
45013003	mu an yu tach'alhkatnan jantu tawilanalh para li katame'e'swalh an yu oxi tanlhun ta'ilhtuy, yu'uncha an yu wa tani talaycha yu kajala'me'e'swakana'. ¿Ts'uk'up'ut'uni jant'u k'at'alhamnin an jamach'alhkat? Pus wa oxich'a k'ats'uk'u, walh an jamach'alhkat oxi kala'ts'inan,
45013004	mu oxi para uxint'i li tatapats'anit'ajun an Dios. Pero li wa t'ani laycha, chuncha k'at'alhanana'a; mu ntu wa la'a'ijcha li lhi'anta an espada an jamach'alhkat, yucha, yucha an Diosi tapatsanit'ajun, para li yu ilhtuy yu ntu oxi kamama'alh'ajnilh.
45013005	Pus lhitask'iniya li k'aja'asmatnit'iti an jamach'alhkatni, chi jantu wanajcha wa xliyu li jantucha k'amama'alh'ajnik'ant'it, wachu xliyu li chuncha yu junita laka jatapast'ak'at.
45013006	Chi wachu yucha ixlakata li uxitnan map'alhlhip'inat'it an tanlhun, mu an jamach'alhkatni yucha an Diosi tat'atapatsay chi yucha yu lhilhij ixli'ilhtutk'an.
45013007	Ixchuxk'an k'ajaxt'a'nitcha yu jalhip'iniyat. Yu k'axt'a'niya'it'iti laka tu'u la'a'tayjun, k'axt'a'nitcha la'a'tayjun, yu k'amap'alhniya'it'iti ixlakata yu lhimapalhlhi'at tu'u, chunchacha k'amap'alhnit. Li yu k'alhiwilaya'it, k'alhiwilatcha, yu ay lapanak k'ala'ts'ina'it, ch'unch'ach'a k'ala'ts'int'it.
45013008	Jant'u xamat'i k'alhip'init tu'u', wa x'aman an jamapayninti, mu yucha ntu a'tam lay mapalh'okan, pero yu mapayniya ixt'alapanak muktaxtuycha tacha an najun lhamap'a'sin.
45013009	An lhamap'a'sin najun: "Jant'u wa aya k'alat'i, jant'u k'ajama'nin, jant'u k'aja'alhawan, jant'u k'ask'unla'ts'i tu'u'." Tacha ani laknajun an lhamap'a'sin chi an alicha lhamap'a'sin, anchacha naw'ojota an tan najun: "K'amap'aynit'i mint'alapanak t'ach'a akst'umap'aynik'an".
45013010	Yu lhit'ajuni jamapayninti tu lhitama'chapuyi ixt'alapanak. Pus an laka jamapayninticha ts'awj muktaxtukan an lhamap'a'sin.
45013011	Chuxcha k'a'ilht'ut tacha aniy, k'alhak'ap'up'itcha an panch'e'ex yu chaway t'awnaw, ixpakucha li kalajkuj'wicha la kilhtatatk'an. Akxni wa jakiklaka'iniwka ma'atka ixt'awnachalh kinta'alhtaxtutk'an, pero chaway palaycha waniya t'ajun.
45013012	Sawalhcha anta an jatats'isni chi mintacha an jatunkunu', pus xliyu ntucha ali ka'ilhtuw an yu xnawin an jatats'isni, kala'la'ch'iwcha yu xnawin an jatunkunu yu kapulasayaw.
45013013	Wa oxicha katsuku, tacha akxni tan tunku. Jantu wa sawalhcha kala't'a'ap'ajtsuku laka lajk'atan. Jantu kapu'ilhtuwi wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi an kilakatunajk'an, chi ntu wa aya kapulaw. Chi ntu kala'ajiw chi ntu kalaxkajiw.
45013014	Yu lhitask'iniy li yucha an kiJamach'alhkatchak'an Jesucristojo katamalhtanan, jant'u k'ap'uxk'a'ut'iti yu wa mijatapast'ak'atchak'an oxi lhiwilay.
45014001	Oxi k'ala'a'it an yu ntu k'ut'ilh la xjakiklaka'inti, ch'i nt'u k'at'alak'ikxt'uk'ut.
45014002	Mu ta'alini yu tanajun li layi kata'ulh wa tuchicha ta'uputun, pero an ali'in yu ntu lajk'ut'ilin la xjakiklaka'intik'an wa yu wa jatawk'atcha talak'uy.
45014003	Pus yu chuxi lak'u'ojoy, jantu kala'amaj'alhi an yu wa sakxtuy yu lak'uy, chi an yu wa sakxtuy yu lak'uy, jantu kalhichiwinilh wachu an yu lak'u'ojoy tanlhun, mu an Dios chunchacha la'a'iy anchunu lapanak.
45014004	¿Tisu milhijunticha uxint'i para li k'alhich'iwincha yu ixma'tsuku apumatami? Li oxi u jantu t'axajachalh, yucha yucha an ixpatroncha ixkwentaj. Pero oxi kat'axajanta mu an Jamach'alhkat ka'ilhtuya li oxi kat'axajchalh.
45014005	Atumpaj, ali'in tanajun li alini wilhchan yu palay lhitapalay chi an ali wilhchan li jantu, chi an ali'in tanajun li watamcha an wilhchan. Pero atamj atamjcha tani yu lhiwilaycha chunchacha kalhiwilalh.
45014006	Yu lhiwilayi la'atam wilhchan li palay lhitapalay, ixlakatacha an Jamach'alhkati chuncha ilhtuy. Chi yu wa tuchicha si uy, ixlakatacha an Jamach'alhkati uy, chi xta'nicha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, chi xamati yu wa sakxtuyi yu uy, ixlakatacha an Jamach'alhkati li chuncha ilhtuy, chi wachu xta'niy lhimala'puchajuni an Dios.
45014007	Mu ntu xamati yu wa para ix'akstucha katsukulh chi yu wa para ix'akstucha kanilh.
45014008	Li t'awnaw, para yucha an Jamach'alhkati li t'awnaw; chi li niyaw, para yucha an Jamach'alhkati li niyaw. Pus katsuku u kaniw, an kijatsukuntik'an yucha an Jamach'alhkati ixnawin.
45014009	An Cristo xliyu lhinilh chi la'awcho'olh, para li kajach'alhkatnanilhi an yu tanitacha chi an tala'ajunta.
45014010	¿Chi chaway, t'asu li lhich'iwinicha mint'ala'ajuni? ¿U tasu li la'amaj'ancha mint'ala'ajun uxint'i? Kinchuxk'ani kacha'anaw la x'ukxlakapu Dios para li yuchacha akintajunan li oxi u jantu ixt'awnaw.
45014011	Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: "Kit'in ikt'ajun, najuni an Dios, Ta lhichuxi akintatso'ottanikana la ki'ukxlakapu', Chi chux sima'at kanawna li kit'ini Dios.
45014012	Pus kitnan atamj atamjcha ka'akstujunaw an Dios tani yu ixt'awnawcha.
45014013	Pus xliyu ntucha kalalhichiwiniwi wa siya kitnancha, apalij k'ap'ast'akt'itcha li ntucha tu'u k'a'ilht'ut yu lay kapu'ayst'uk'uk'alh mint'ala'ajunk'an u yu lay kaputat'ilhilh la xjakiklaka'inti.
45014014	Kit'in li ijkiklaka'icha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ijk'atsayi li tacha an alin yu ukan, jantu tu'u yu ntucha lay ka'ukalh. Chi li xamati najun li alini yu ntu ka'ukalh, pus para yucha jantu lay kati'ulh.
45014015	Chi wa xliyu t'uch'ini yu uycha, chi amint'ala'ajun kalhita'oxila'alhilhcha, jant'uch'a jamap'ayninini chuncha. Jant'u k'a'ilht'u li wa xliyu t'uch'ini yu uycha kats'an'alhi xamati yu lhinitacha an Cristo.
45014016	Pus jant'u k'amak'a'unt'iti an yu oxi para uxitnan li wa tani kalhichiwinkalhcha.
45014017	Mu an xlich'alhkat Dios jantu wayt chi ntu lhi'ot'at, ancha, tan ts'awj katsukukalh, chi tan wa oxicha katsukukalh chi tan lhi'achacha kaputsukukalh an Stalan'a Takuwin.
45014018	Yu chunchacha t'atapatsay an Cristo ma'an'achaycha an Dios chi an lapanakni talaknajuncha li ts'awjcha t'ajun.
45014019	Pus wa yuchacha kapuxkaju yu pu'oxiya tawlancha chi kala'a'tayjupaxawcha para li k'ut'ilhi kawalh kijakiklaka'intik'an.
45014020	Jant'u k'alakt'ilhi an tapatsat yu xnawin Dios wa ixlakatacha an wayt. Chux an yu ukan la'stalan'a, chi sawalh; pero ntu oxi li xamati lapanak wa xliyu tuchini yu uycha, kajapumats'antijlalhi an ali'in.
45014021	Palay oxi nt'u k'a'ut'i lhiway ch'i nt'u k'a'ott'i xaxkan uvaj chi tu'u k'a'ilht'up'alh yu wa lay kaputa'a'talh xamati mint'ala'ajun.
45014022	Amijakiklaka'inti yu lhit'a'un lax'ukxlakapucha an Diosi k'alhits'uk'u. Oxi para yucha li yu past'ak'a li ntu tani junita tuchini ilhtulhcha.
45014023	Pero li yu past'ak'a li sna ntu oxi li ulhcha tu'u, ix'akstucha ta'aj'ajuy, mu ntu laxjakiklaka'inti uy; chi yu ntu lakajakiklaka'inti minachalh, yucha tala'alhin.
45015001	Yu lajk'ut'ilini juntaw la kijakiklak'a'intik'an, kajalhi'a'tayjuwi an yu ntu lajk'ut'ilin la xjakiklaka'intik'an, jantu kapuxkajuwi yu wa kitnancha akintama'an'achan.
45015002	Kinchuxk'an kajama'an'achawi an kint'alapanaknik'an, ka'ilhtuwi yu laj'oxi tanlhun para yu'uncha, walh lajk'ut'ilini katajuna la xjakiklaka'intik'an.
45015003	Mu masi an Cristo, jantu wa x'akstucha ma'an'achakalh, yucha la xjatsukunti uktaxtulh tacha an najunta an tan tso'muk'akanta: "Tacha an stak xkayaj ixtajunan kit'ini kila'cha'an'olh."
45015004	Mu an tanlhun yu ma'anchacha la'ts'o'kalh, yucha lhits'o'kalh li kapulaklaniw para li laktachapunini kapujunwi chi chuncha layi kapakxan'iyaw yu najun an Dios li kajuna'.
45015005	Yucha an Dios yu xt'a'a ta'oximaj'ayat chi yu ka'ilhtun li k'ap'akxan'it'i tu'u, yuchacha kata'ilhtun li wa tamcha k'ak'ats'at, tacha an Cristo Jesús,
45015006	para li akxni wa tamcha k'ats'ayat, wa ayxtamcha laka la'atam chiwinti k'anawna'it li an Dios yucha ay chi yucha ixPay an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
45015007	Pus oxi k'alala'a'ip'axat tacha an Cristo Jesús tala'a'in, k'alala'a'ip'axat'it para li an Dios katasulhi li ay.
45015008	Kit'in klajunaw li an Cristo jakitapatsanichilhi an judiojnin, ki'ilhtuchilhi tacha an ixjajunitacha an Dios an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw, chi chunchacha japumasunilh li yu najuni an Dios li ka'ilhtuya, ilhtuy sawalh.
45015009	Wachu yucha ixlakata li kilachilh, li an yu ntu judiojnin katanawlhi li an Dios yucha ay, ixlakata an ixjamapayninti, tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Xliyu kit'in ajkajuna an yu ntu judiojnin li uxint'i ayk'at'i, chi akmilhpaniya aminta'a'ut."
45015010	Chi an lakatam tan ts'o'muk'apalhkanta nawpalay: "¡Uxitnan yu ntu judiojnin, k'ajat'alaj'ach'ant'itcha an ixlapanakni Dios!"
45015011	Chi an alakatam nawpalay: "Minchuxk'an yu ntu judiojnin, k'ana'unt'iti li an Jamach'alhkat ay, chi chux lapanakni, minchuxk'an, k'amilhp'anit'iti milhpat."
45015012	An Isaias wachu ts'o'lhi: "Kala'awna an ixjataxiyak an Isaí, yu ka'ostayaya para li kajach'alhkatnanilh an yu ntu judiojnin, chi yucha katapupakxan'i'oya chux an lapanakni."
45015013	An Dios yu ilhtuy li kapakxan'ikalhi yu najun, yuchacha kataxta'nin achat chi oxi jatawlhnat, uxitnan yu k'iklak'a'iyat, chi an la x'alhp'asninti an Stalan'aTakuwin yuchacha katapu'ilhtun an Dios li k'ap'akxan'it'iti an tacha najun.
45015014	Kint'ala'awnin, ijk'atsayi li uxitnan lhuwi lhit'awnat an oxi lanti chi chux an jatapast'ak'at lhit'awnat, pus layi lamap'a'sip'axayat,
45015015	pero aniy laka jalhiki iktapujulh sawalhi iklats'o'niw ixlakata yu laklhichiwiniy tanlhun, para li nt'u k'ak'apt'it. Chuncha k'ilhtuy, ixlakata li an Dios chuncha kilhijunilh la xjamapayninti,
45015016	para li akt'atapatsalhi an Jesucristo para li oxi katat'axajchalh an yu ntu judiojnin. Tacha ani kilhisacerdote iktapatsay k'it'in, iklhichiwiniy an laj'oxi ixchiwinti an Dios, para li ajkalhicha'alhi an yu ntu judiojnin la x'ukxlakapu an Dios, tacha lha'ulan yu ka'achanilh an Dios, yu stalan'acha laka Stalan'a Takuwin.
45015017	Li ikt'atapatsay an Dios, alini tuchini ixlakatacha li ikputa'ayay an Jesucristo.
45015018	Mu ntu iktapujuyi aknawlh tu'u yu ntucha yu an Cristo chuncha kimpu'ilhtuy, para li kataja'asmatnalhi an yu ntu judiojnin. Chi laka lakchiwinti chi laka laktanlhuncha yu tasuyi chuncha k'ilhtuy,
45015019	chi laka laj'alhp'ascha tanlhun yu laktasuy chi tanlhuncha yu la'lhi'a'nin chi la x'alhp'asninticha an ixTakuwin Dios. Pus sta la'acha'an Jerusalén chi tacha an lak'alincha la'acha'anaxni tuntala'acho'o sta Ilírico chuxcha ikma'pitsi'ojota an xchiwinti Cristo.
45015020	Chunchacha kit'in ikt'ataxtunilh iklhichiwiniy an laj'oxi chiwinti, tan tuka' k'is ixlichiwinkan an Jesucristojo iklhichiwinilh, chuncha ntu wa ik'aklhtayanicha xamati yu anchacha a'taynita,
45015021	mu chunchuniya najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios: "An yu ntu a'tam xjalhix'alakanta ixlakata yucha, yu'uncha katala'ts'ina'. Chi an yu ntu a'tam ixta'asmatta kalhichiwinkalh, katalhimacha'xaya'."
45015022	Xliyu li masi a'lhuwcha iklala'k'uxa'anacha'aw, jantu lalh.
45015023	Chaway li k'ilhtu'olhcha an kintapatsat tan ani lhilakwilhkanchilh chi mu la'alhucha k'ata yu sawalhcha iklala'k'uxa'amputunacha'aw,
45015024	akxni ak'ana xalakaat'un España aklala'antacha'aw. Chi akxni aklala'ts'inawcha masi ntu ma'an, akilat'ataylhi'anawi kijalhtanti.
45015025	Chaway la'acha'an Jerusaleni ikti'an, iktijalhi'ani la'a'tayjun an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu ancha tawilanalh.
45015026	Mu an jamacha'an Macedonia chi an jamacha'an Acaya ixta'achanink'ani tama'ayxto'lhi la'a'tayjun, para li katamala'achanilhcha an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu wa takilhpati an la'acha'an Jerusalén.
45015027	Wa ixta'achaninchak'ani chuncha tapastaklhi, masi chuncha yu junita li kata'ilhtulh, mu tacha an judiojnin an yu tajakiklaka'inincha tat'alaxta'nilhi an laj'oxi tanlhun yu wa takuwin an yu ntu judiojnin, pus an yu ntu judiojnin wachu katat'ala'a'tayjulhi la xlaktanlhunk'an an judiojnin yu an tajakiklaka'inincha.
45015028	Pus akxni chunchacha ak'ilhtuya aniy, chi akxni ajkama'axta'niyacha an yu ma'ayxto'kalh la'a'tayjun, ak'anacha España chi aklala'ts'intijlayawcha.
45015029	Kit'in oxi ijk'atsay li akxni aklala'antacha'aw laktachapunini kalakjun'oyaw an la xjapaxkatla'ts'inti an Cristo.
45015030	Pero iklatapaynisk'iniyawi kint'ala'awnin la xtalakask'i an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo chi la xjamapayninti an Takuwin li akilat'atapayniniwi an Dios kilakata.
45015031	K'alhisk'init'iti an Dios li akima'alhtaxtulhi la xmakak'an an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin, an yu tawilanalh xalakaat'un Judea chi li an la'a'tayjun yu iktijalhi'ani an kijat'ala'awnink'an an la'acha'an Jerusalén oxi kajama'lhtayanankanchalh;
45015032	li Dios chuncha lakask'in, lhi'acha aklala'cha'aw, lhi'acha aklala'ts'iw chi aklat'ajastaknawcha.
45015033	Yucha an yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat Diosi katalhistakni minchuxk'an. Chunchacha kawalh.
45016001	Iklalhisk'iniyaw an kint'alajamatsank'an Febe, yu lhka'ulakanta li kaja'a'tayjulh an yu tajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Cencrea
45016002	li oxi k'ala'a'it, la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat, tacha lhitask'ini li chuncha kala'ilhtukalh yu wa tamcha kiklaka'ikan Dios, chi k'alhi'a't'ay'ut'iti wa tuchicha ma'lhtask'ini, mu yucha wanajcha xluwk'ani ja'a'tayjuta, kit'in wachu ki'a'tayjuta.
45016003	Akilala'axa'alanicha'awi an yu kintat'atapatsay an Priscila chi an Aquila, yu wachu tat'atapatsay an Cristo Jesús.
45016004	Yu'uncha wa k'ischa ixtitama'ats'an'atacha ixjatsukuntik'an wa xliyu kintama'alhtaxtulh, chaway jantu wa kit'incha ijkaxta'niy lhimala'puchajun, wachu taxta'niya lhimala'puchajun ixchuxk'an an kijat'ala'awnink'an an yu ntu judiojnin ta kilhmakchux tata'ayxt'o'a.
45016005	Wanajcha chun k'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu tata'ayxt'o'a an la ixcha'a Priscila chi Aquila. Akilala'axa'alanicha'awi an ki'amigo Epeneto, yucha yu p'ulhnajcha kiklaka'ilh Cristo an xalakaat'un Akaya.
45016006	K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Maria, yucha sawalhcha tapatsata milakatak'an.
45016007	K'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Andrónico chi an Junias, yu ta ijkalhila'ts'in chi xajkat'amalaklhchawkanta, yu'uncha p'ulhnaja takiklaka'ilh an Cristo kit'in xli'astan, chi yu'uncha sawalhcha oxi jalhiwilakan li jamala'achakanta li katalhichiwinilh an xchiwinti Jesús.
45016008	K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Amplias, yucha ki'amigo la xtalakask'i an Dios.
45016009	K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Urbano, yu wachu t'atapatsay an Cristo tacha kitnan chi an Estakis.
45016010	K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Apeles, yu wanajcha lhuw malaksuta li kiklaka'iya an Cristo, chi an yu tawilanalh la ixcha'a an Aristóbulo wachu k'ajala'axa'alachi'it.
45016011	K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Herodión yu ta iklhila'ts'in chi an yu tawilanalh la ixcha'a an Narciso, yu'uncha wachu takiklaka'iya an Jamach'alhkat.
45016012	K'ajala'axa'alachi'i't'iti an Trifena chi an Trifosa, yu'uncha wachu tat'atapatsayi an Jamach'alhkat, chi an kint'alajamatsank'an Pérsida, wachu k'ala'axa'alachi'it, yucha wachu sawalhcha t'atapatsata an Jamach'alhkat.
45016013	K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Rufo, yu sakxtuta an Dios, chi wachu k'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an ixnati yu wa tacha kinaticha wachu ikla'ts'in.
45016014	K'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Asíncrito chi an Flegonte chi an Hermas chi an Patrobas chi an Hermes chi an yu ancha tat'awilananchalh kijat'ala'awnink'an.
45016015	K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Filólogo chi an Julia chi an Nereo chi an ixt'alajamatsan, chi an Olimpas chi ixchuxk'an an kijat'ala'awnink'an an yu ancha tat'awilananchalh.
45016016	K'alala'axa'alap'axachi'itcha minchuxk'an laka stalan'a jala'xtikilhtastuknut. Ta kilhmakchux an yu takiklaka'iy Cristo tamak'aniyacha'ani jala'axa'alanti.
45016017	Kint'ala'awnin, iklatapaynisk'iniyaw li k'ajalhak'ap'up'it'iti an yu wa sawalhcha tajalakilhmakt'uyunun chi tajama'ayst'uk'unun, an yu ntucha chun tamasuniyan tacha yu uxitnan map'a'sik'ant'at. Jant'u k'ajach'a'o'at'it,
45016018	mu yu'uncha jantu yu an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Cristojo tat'atapatsay, yu'uncha wa x'akstuchak'ani tacha an tanajun, yu'uncha wa tapu'o'xcho'oycha laka lakxlak'anti ixchiwintik'an chi laka lajk'usi ixchiwintik'an an yu wa las takiklaka'iy li tu'u'.
45016019	Ta lhichuxi k'atsakan li uxitnan jak'iklak'a'ininat'it, chi sawalhcha oxi iklhiwilay li ch'unch'a layat, pero iklakask'in li laka jatapast'ak'ati k'a'ilht'ut an yu laj'oxi tanlhun chi an yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun jant'u k'a'ilht'ut,
45016020	chuncha an Dios yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat watukan ka'ilhtuya li k'a'akp'ut'ayamat'iti an satanás. Uxitnancha kataxta'nin an ixjamapayninti an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesús.
45016021	An kint'atapatsan Timoteo, yu wachu chun tapatsay tacha kit'in chi an yu ta ijkalhila'ts'in, an Lucio chi an Jasón chi an Sosípater tamak'aniyacha'an jala'axa'alanti.
45016022	Kit'in yu ijkunkan Tercio, yu iklats'o'niyaw aniy laka jalhiki, wachu iklala'axa'alayaw la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat.
45016023	Wachu tala'axa'alayan an Gayo. An la ixcha'a an Gayojo ikwilh, chi aniya tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakikla'inin. Chi an Erasto wachu tala'axa'alayan, yucha ma'ay xatumin an la'acha'an, chi an kint'ala'ajunk'an yu junkan Cuarto wachu tala'axa'alayan.
45016024	An xjamapayninti kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo minchuxk'ancha kataxta'nin.
45016025	Oxi kalhichiwiniw an Dios, yu lay ta'ilhtuyan uxitnan li oxi k'at'a'aklats'uk'ut, tacha an najun an laj'oxi chiwinti yu iklhichiwiniy, chi tacha an masukan yu lhichiwiniy Jesucristo. Aniy chiwinti yucha yu sawalh, yu an Dios wa la'asa' lhichiwininta chi ma'ani ixtats'e'ta sta akxni an lakaamunulhpa jantuka' ix'alin,
45016026	pero chaway an tan tats'o'muk'alh an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, anchacha pumalakasukalh, tacha najuntacha an Dios yu ntu a'tam katinilh. Ani xlamap'a'sin an Dios yu wa la'asa' ixt'ajun, chaway lhichiwinkancha ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni para li katakiklaka'ilh chi kata'ilhtulhi yu lhinajun.
45016027	An yu wa yucha Dios sawalh chi jalakpastaknan, yucha an Jesucristojo ay pujun chi ixpujun'alhincha. Chunchacha kawalh.
46001001	Kit'in ikPablo yu kint'asanilh an Dios chi kimala'achalhcha an Jesucristo para li ajkamak'atsaaninilh an xchiwinti, iklala'axa'alayaw ali an kint'ala'ajunk'an Sóstenes.
46001002	Uxitnan ixlapanakni Dios, yu t'a'ayxt'o'at an la'acha'an Corinto, tamastalan'atani an Jesucristo. Chi Diosi tat'asanin li wachu la'stalan'ani k'a'unt'it ali an yu wachu ta'a'atant'asay wa tanchun kawalhcha an xta'a'ut an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo. Yucha ixJamach'alhkatk'an chi kiJamach'alhkatk'an.
46001003	An kimPayk'an Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo kataxta'nincha ixjamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnat.
46001004	Lhilhiji ikxta'niy lhimala'puchajun an kiDios milakatak'an, mu yucha tapuxta'nini an Jesucristo ixjamapayninti.
46001005	Yucha an Cristojo tapuxta'nin an Dios chux an yu laj'oxi tanlhun, laj'oxi chiwinti chi laj'oxi jatapast'ak'at.
46001006	Mu an chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy an Cristo oxicha tasuy la mijatsukuntik'an.
46001007	Pus chaway tu tu'u tats'an'atayaniyan yu xt'a'a Dios para li lay k'ap'ut'ap'ats'anit'it li chaway wa p'akxan'iyatka tuchi wilhchancha katalakasuya an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
46001008	An Dios kata'a'tayjuyani li k'at'a'aklats'uk'ut'iti sta akxni ka'ukla'oya', para li ntu xamati tu'u katalhimuk'an akxni kachincho'oya an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
46001009	An Dios, yucha ilhtuy sawalhi yu najun li ka'ilhtuya', chi yucha yu tat'asanin para li k'at'at'ala'xt'o't'iti an isTs'alh Jesucristo, yucha kiJamach'alhkatk'an.
46001010	T'ala'awnin, la xtalakask'i an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo iklatapaynisk'iniyaw li lhilhiji wa tam k'ak'ats'at'it ch'i nt'u k'at'ala'ap'its'it'it, wa la'atam jatapast'ak'ati k'alhits'uk'ut'it.
46001011	Tuchi chuncha iklalhijunaw, mu an yu ta jalhila'ts'in an Cloé kintajuni li wa la'ayat'it.
46001012	Iknawputun li ali'in yu uxitnan tanajun: "Kit'in yucha an Pablojo ikch'a'o'ay. Chi an ali'in tanajun: "Kit'in yucha an Apolojo ikch'a'o'ay." Chi ali'in tanajun: "Kit'in yucha an Cefasi ikch'a'o'ay." Chi ali'in tanajun: "Kit'in yucha an Cristo."
46001013	¿Chu sna wanaj pumalhuwi Cristo? ¿An Pablo makxtukmuk'akalhi laka cruz milakatak'an? ¿U sna a'p'axat'iti la xtalakask'i an Pablo?
46001014	Ikxta'niy lhimala'puchajuni an Dios li ntu xamati apumatami ikma'paxalh yu uxitnan, wa yucha an Crispo chi an Gayo.
46001015	Chuncha ntu layi xamati lay katinawlh li la kintalakask'i a'paxli.
46001016	Wachu ijkama'paxalhi an yu ta jalhila'ts'in Estéfanas, pero ntu ikpast'ak'a li xamati ikma'paxapalata apumatam.
46001017	Mu an Cristo tu kilhijuni li ajkama'paxanalh, yucha kilhijuni li aklhichiwinilh an laj'oxi chiwinti. Jantu iklhichiwiniy laka lajk'usi chiwinti yu minachalh la xjatapast'akat an lapanak, para li an xcruz an Cristo jantu kama'ats'an'alhi ix'alhp'asninti.
46001018	An chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy li nilh an Cristo laka cruz wa tachanu wa lhitontojcha talhiwilay an yu tats'an'at'ajun, pero an yu ta'alhtaxtut'awnaw, aniy chiwinti yucha ix'alhp'asninti an Dios.
46001019	Tacha najunta an la ixchiwinti Dios: Ajkalakt'ilhiniya an ixjatapast'ak'atk'an an yu sawalhcha tajalakpastaknan. Chi ajka'ilhtuya li ntu katalhimacha'xalhi tu'u an yu sawalhcha lay talhimacha'xay tu'u talay.
46001020	¿Tanischa t'ajun an jalakpastaknaj lapanaki? ¿Tanischa t'ajun an xamaestro lhamap'a'sini? ¿Tanischa t'ajun an yu lani lhilakikxtukut tanlhun yu alin aniy lakamunulhpa'a? ¡An Dios ilhtulhi li wa lhitontojcha kawalh an xajatapast'ak'at aniy lakamunulhpa'.
46001021	An Dios sawalh jalakpastaknan xliyu an lapanakni yu tat'ajun an lakamunulhpa jantu layi tapumispay wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'an. An Dios chuncha oxi lhiwilalh li an yu tajakiklaka'inin kajama'alhtaxtulhi an la xchiwinti, masi wa lhilokojcha lhiwilakan.
46001022	Mu an judiojnin task'in li kajamasunikalh tu'u yu kamasulh ix'alhp'asninti an Dios chi an griegojnin tapuxkajuy lhuw jatapast'ak'at.
46001023	Pero kitnan lhichiwinaw an Cristo yu makxtukmuk'akalh laka cruz, yu an judiojnin tu tala'ts'imputun wa ixlakata tacha an nilh chi an yu ntu judiojnin tanajun li wa lhilocojcha.
46001024	Pero an yu Dioscha jat'asanita, judiojnin u griegojnin, yu'uncha tak'atsayi li an Cristo ix'alhp'asninti an Dios chi ixjatapast'ak'at an Dios.
46001025	Mu masi wa lhitontojcha tasuy yu najun an Dios, palay oxi jatapast'ak'at, an ixjatapast'ak'at lapanak jantu, chi masi ka ntu k'is k'ut'ilhi katasulh tu'u yu ix'anu an Dios, palay k'ut'ilh, an wa ixtachaputcha lapanak, jantu.
46001026	T'ala'awnin, k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti li an Dios tat'asanini masi ntu milhuk'ani yu k'alhits'uk'ut jatapast'ak'at yu wa xanawincha aniy lakamunulhpa', chi ntu milhuk'ani yu k'alhits'uk'ut lhich'alhkat chi ntu milhuk'ani yu k'alhit'ap'alat.
46001027	Mu wa xliyu li an Dios para li kajamamaxanilhi an yu sawalhcha tajalakpastaknan tanajun, jasakxtulhi an yu wa laktontojnincha jalhimalakxtukan. Chi para li an Dios kajamamaxanilhi an yu sawalhcha lajk'ut'ilin tanajun, jasakxtulhi an yu ntu lajk'ut'ilin aniy lakamunulhpa'.
46001028	An Dios yucha jasakxtulh an lapanakni an yu wa jala'amaj'ankancha chi ntu tu'u talhitapalay jajunkan aniy lakamunulhpa'. An yu ntu tu'u talhitapalay, japu'ilhtukani li ntu tu'u katalhitapalalh an yu talhitapalay tanajun.
46001029	Chuncha ntu xamati lay katilhita'ayalh tu'u la x'ukxlakapu an Dios.
46001030	Pero an Dios yuchacha tat'amala'xto'tan uxitnan an Jesucristj. Chi wachucha ilhtulhi li an Cristo kijatapast'ak'atchak'ani kawalh chi yu ts'awjcha kaputsukuw chi yu kapustalan'aw chi yu kaputa'alhtaxtuw.
46001031	Tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Li xamati lhita'ayaputun tu'u, yucha an Jamach'alhkatcha Diosi kalhita'ayalh".
46002001	T'ala'awnin, akxni iklakila'kilaw, iklalhixa'alawi an ixchiwinti Dios chi ntu yu sawalhcha lajk'usi chiwinti ikpuchiwinilh yu wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'an an lapanakni.
46002002	Chi akxni ancha xaklat'a'aklat'awnaw, jantu tu'u atumpaja ijk'atsaaputulh, wa de Jesucristo chi akxni tacha an nilh an laka cruz.
46002003	Akxni iklala'cha'aw jantucha k'is k'ut'ilhi xajkunita chi wa xk'ip'ip'icha xaklay la kintalhanti.
46002004	Chi akxni iklalhixa'alaw an ixchiwinti Dios jantu iklapuxa'alaw yu sawalhcha laj'ay chiwinti para li aklama'ankiklaka'iniw. Iklama'ankiklaka'iniw mu yucha Takuwini yu masulh la x'alhp'asninti li an yu iklajuniw sawalh.
46002005	Chi chuncha ik'ilhtulh para li amijakiklaka'intik'an jantu ani kapuminchalh an wa la xjatapast'ak'atchak'an lapanakni, yucha an ix'alhp'asninti Diosi kapuminchalh.
46002006	Pero an yu tak'at'atacha la xjakiklaka'intik'an chun sawalh laka lakchiwinti yu pujatapast'ak'ati ikpulakchiwininaw. Pero ntu wa xajatapast'ak'atcha aniy lakamunulhpa', chi ntu xjatapast'ak'atk'an an yu ani tach'alhkatnan, yu'uncha tama'ats'an'at'ajuncha an ixlich'alhkatk'an.
46002007	Yu ikmasuyaw yucha an yu ntu lay la'ts'inkan ixjatapast'ak'at Dios. Ani jatapast'ak'at wa la'asa'a tan t'ajun sta akxni a'taynichalh an lakamunulhpa'. Chi ani xjatapast'ak'at Dios najun li sawalh kalhitapalaw.
46002008	Ani ntu xamati tacha an tach'alhkatnan aniy lakamunulhpa lhimacha'xata, mu li kaxtalhimacha'xalh tu kaxtamakxtukmuk'alhi laka cruz an ay Jamach'alhkat.
46002009	Pero tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "An yu tamapayni an Dios jamala'asijninita tanlhun yu ntu xamati la'ts'inta chi ntu xamati asmatta chi masi wa xamaticha kapastaklhi".
46002010	Yucha aniy tanlhuni yu kintamasunitan an Dios laka Takuwin, mu an Takuwin yucha oxi laklhakapu'an'ojoy chux, sta masi yu sawalhcha ma'at t'awnachalh xjatapast'ak'at an Dios.
46002011	Yu wa lapanak jantu xamati k'atsaaniy ixjatapast'ak'at apumatam, wa yucha k'atsay an kintakuwink'an tani yu jatapastaknanawcha atamjtamin. Pus wanajcha chuni an ixTakuwin Dios, wa yucha k'atsay tuchini past'ak'acha an Dios.
46002012	Chi kitnan ntu wa takuwincha yu wa anicha alin lakamunulhpa la'a'itaw. Yu la'a'itaw yucha an Takuwin yu kintaxta'niyan an Dios, para li kala'lhimacha'xawi an laktanlhun yu an Dios la xjamapayninti kintaxta'nitan.
46002013	Ani laktanlhun, laka chiwinti yu an ixTakuwin Dios kintamasunitani pulakchiwininaw, jantu wa laka chiwinticha yu wa la kijatapast'ak'atchak'an lanitaw. Chunchacha lhilakchiwinaw laka chiwinti yu minachalh la ixTakuwin an Dios.
46002014	An lapanak yu ntu lhit'ajuni an ixTakuwin Dios, jantu la'a'iya yu xt'a'a an ixTakuwin Dios. Mu wa lhitontojcha yu wa lhiwilay. Chi wachu ntu lay la'lhimacha'xayi mu yucha la xTakuwin Diosi la'lhimacha'xakan.
46002015	Pero yu lhit'ajuni an xTakuwin Dios, layi k'atsay chux an tanlhun tanyucha yu oxi u jantu, pus layi kanawna'. Pero an yu lhit'ajun an xTakuwin Dios yucha ntu lay tu'u katilhimuk'akalh.
46002016	Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: ¿Tisiyuchacha k'atsaani xjatapast'ak'at Jamach'alhkat Diosi? ¿Tisiyuchacha lay kamap'asiya'a? Pero kitnan lhit'awnawi an ixjatapast'ak'at an Cristo.
46003001	T'ala'awnin, kit'in tu layi iklaxa'alaw uxitnan tacha lapanakni yu oxicha tamispay an xTakuwin Dios, iklaxa'alaw wa tacha yu ntuka' oxi tamispay, tacha wa jas'at'ancha iklalhixa'alaw an Cristo.
46003002	Wanaj tu k'is lhima'anxkayi yu klamasuniw. Tacha jas'at'an yu tats'ik'ika', mu nt'uk'a' lay k'axlakts'ak'at'iti yu p'as tu'u. ¡Chi masi chaway jant'uk'a' lay lakts'ak'ayat'it,
46003003	mu t'awnatka tacha yu ntuka' jalakp'ast'aknanat'it. Li la xk'ayatka ch'i la xt'uk'uyatka, wa t'ani layatcha, wa tacha wa lapanaknika yu wa ntuka' tamispay Diosi layat'it.
46003004	Akxni xamati najun: “Kit'in yucha an Pablojo ikch'a'o'ay”. Chi pumatam nawpalay: “Kit'in yucha an Apolojo ikch'a'o'ay”. Ch'unch'ach'a lhimasuyat li wanajka wa lhilakatijtam lapanakni.
46003005	An Apolo chi kit'in Pablo ¿tisapu kitnancha? Kitnan wachucha wa ikt'atapatsayaw an Dios, kitnancha yu uxitnan p'ujak'iklak'a'inint'it. Atamjtamin kitnan k'ilhtuwcha an tapatsat yu an Dios kintalhijunin.
46003006	Kit'in ikjach'ananalh chi an Apolo la'tanti'awalh, pero an Dios yucha yu ilhtulh li kata'ayalh an yu ch'ankalh.
46003007	Pus tacha an yu jach'ananan chi an yu laj'away, jantu yu'uni yu talhitapalay, yucha an Dios, mu yucha yu la'ayay an yu ch'ankan.
46003008	An yu tajach'ananan chi an yu talaj'away an jach'ananti wa xtamk'an, pero tani yu tatapatsalhcha atamj atamj yucha an Dioscha chuncha kajamapalhniya'.
46003009	Kitnan ikt'atapatsayaw an Dios, chi uxitnan tachanu jach'ananti chi tacha a'atam cha'a yu yawt'awkan, yu x'anu an Dios.
46003010	La xjamapayninti an Dios kilhijunilhi li aktapatsalhi la mijatsukuntik'an tacha pumatam yu oxi yajuy cha'a', kit'incha kla'oxinilh an xjach'aja', chi an la x'ukxni an xjach'aja pumatamcha taylhi'anta la'oxiy. Pero atamj atamjcha kalhakapu'alh tani yu taylhi'ancha la'oxi an cha'a'.
46003011	Mu ntu xamati a'tam kati'ilhtunipalh ixjach'aja la'atam cha'a yu alininicha, chi ani ixjach'aja yucha an Jesucristo.
46003012	Ani la x'ukni an xjach'aja cha'a, lay kataylhi'alh kala'oxilh xamati: laka la'stu de oro u de plata chi yu lajk'usi chiwx u de lht'a'alak'iw u de kawak u de tu'ucha jach'itin.
46003013	Pero tani yu katapatsayacha atamj atamj akxnicha ts'awj katasuya akxni kanawkanacha li oxi u jantu yu ilhtulh, kachina panch'e'ex akxni katasuya', mu laka jikmicha kapulhila'ts'intanukana'. Chi atamj atamjcha tanyuchacha ixtapatsat, yucha an jikmicha kalhila'ts'intanuya'.
46003014	Li yu xamati la'oxita cha'a chi li lhitayanilh, kajama'lhtayananacha ixtalhaja.
46003015	Pero li la'xawlhi yu ixla'oxita, wa ts'an'aycha an ixtapatsat, pero yucha kata'alhtaxtuy', tacha xamati yu ta'alhtaxtuy laka jikmi.
46003016	¿Ch'u sna nt'u k'ats'ayat'iti li uxitnan ixtajtan an Dios, chi an ixTakuwin an Dios taputanumanan?
46003017	Li xamati lakt'ilhiy an ixtajtan an Dios, an Dios wachu kalakt'ilhiya', mu an ixtajtan an Dios yucha stalan'a chi an tajtan uxitnan.
46003018	Jantu xamati ka'o'xcho'okalh ix'akstu, li xamati k'atsan li sawalhcha lajk'atsayi an tanlhun xajatapast'ak'at yu alin aniy lakaamunulhpa, task'iniy kalalh li ntu tu'u k'atsay, chuncha katasuya li jalakpastaknan.
46003019	Mu an xajalakpastaknat aniy lakamunulhpa, an Dios k'atsayi li wa sicha lhitonto. Tasuyi an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: An Dios japula'ma'alhilayi wa la x'akstu xlakatijlachak'an an yu sawalhcha tajalakpastaknan talay.
46003020	Chi nawpalay: "An Jamach'alhkat Dios k'atsayi li an xjatapast'ak'atk'an an yu sawalhcha tajalakpastaknan jantu tu'u lhitapalay".
46003021	Pus tu xamati kalhita'ayalh ixlakata an yu wa lapanaknicha talak'ilhtuy; mu chux an laktanlhun mi'anuk'an.
46003022	Kit'in Pablo, an Apolo, an Cefas, an lakamunulhpa, an jatsukunti, an lhinin, an yu wa tapasat'ajunka, an yu wa katapasayaka, chuxi mi'anuk'an,
46003023	chi uxitnan ixnawin an Cristo chi an Cristo ixnawin an Dios.
46004001	Kitnan akilala'ts'iw wa ix'a'tayjununcha an Cristo chi wa ixmasununcha an yu ntu xlajk'atsakan ixlaktanlhun an Dios.
46004002	Chaway oxicha, yu lhijunkan tu'u ka'ilhtulh chi jama'lhtayanancha an tapatsat, kalhimasulhcha li ka'ilhtuya sawalh.
46004003	Yu kit'in la kimakni, jantu tukancha iklhakapu'ani li akilajuniw li oxi u jantu yu k'ilhtuy, u li xamati yu wa lapanak jamach'alhkat akijunilh, sta masi wa ki'akstucha jantu ijkunkani li oxi u jantu yu k'ilhtuy.
46004004	Pero masi ijk'atsayi li ntu tu'u yu ntucha oxi ak'ilhtulh, wachu jantu xliyu li aknawlh li ntu tu'u wanaja kintala'alhin. Mu yu kanawna li oxi u jantu yu ik'ilhtuy yucha an Jamach'alhkat.
46004005	Pus uxitnan jant'u tu'u k'ana'unt li oxi u jantu yu ilhtuy xamati mu ntuka' chini xpanch'e'ex, k'ap'akxant'iti li kachajcha timilhi an Jamach'alhkat, chi li tan putunkucha kamasuya yu chaway lakaputs'isni tapasay, chi kamasuyacha tuchini yu x'ilhtuputuncha an jalhunut. Chi akxni atamj atamjcha kala'a'iya yu an Dios kaxt'a'a'.
46004006	T'ala'awnin, aniy tanlhun iklalhixa'alayaw oxi para uxitnan, klamasuniyawi t'ani k'alatcha, chi wanaj kitnan an Apolo chi kit'in Pablojo iklalaniniyaw t'anisch'a k'alat. Para li k'alanit'iti jant'u wa k'alhimo'slatcha tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta la ixchiwinti Dios, chuncha ntu xamati lapanaki k'at'ip'u'ayajk'ats'at chi apumatam k'axk'a'itcha.
46004007	¿Tisapiyuchacha yu sawalhcha oxi kala'ts'in chi an ali'in tucha tukan oxi kajala'ts'ilh? ¿Chi tisunch'a yu lhit'a'un yu ntucha yu an Dios kaxta'nini? Chi li yucha an Diosi xta'nitan ¿t'asu li sawalhch'a layi li lhit'a'uni? wa t'ach'a wa mi'akst'uch'a la'ch'ip'int'a lay.
46004008	Uxitnan lhit'aw'oyatch'a yu lak'ask'inat'it, ch'alhk'atnanatcha mi'akstuk'an, jantucha kilama'lhtask'iniyaw. O'palaj rejnincha sawalhi k'ax'unt'it para li xaklat'ach'alhkatnawcha.
46004009	Mu kit'in iklhiwilay yu kitnan yu kintamala'achayan an Dios, an Dios palay wa xalakt'ikt'ini kinta'ilhtun, tachanu t'acha'ankantacha li akintama'nikanan. Ikt'acha'antawcha tacha wa ixlila'astatcha an lakamunulhpa ijkuntaw chi akintala'astancha an angelhnin chi an lapanakni.
46004010	Kitnan ixlakata an Cristo wa laktontojnincha, walh uxitnan ixlakata an Cristo sawalhch'a jalakp'ast'aknanat'iti lhiwilak'anat'it. Kitnan tu laj'oximaj'ay, uxitnan sawalhcha laj'oximaj'ay. Uxitnan sawalhch'a lhiwilak'anat'it, kitnan wa kintala'amaj'ankanancha.
46004011	Sta yu chaway tukan ikma'alh'ajnanawi laka chawan chi laka kikxixat chi mati kila'ch'itk'an chi an lapanakni wa kintalhitama'chapuyan chi ntu tu'u kincha'ak'an.
46004012	La kimakak'ani iktapatsayaw chi sawalhcha ikla'lho'onaw. Wa tanlhuncha yu ntu laj'oxi kintapulhitama'chapukanan, pero kitnan tanlhun yu laj'oxi ijkamapusp'itnicho'oyaw chi xakintach'a'o'akanan para li akintalhitama'chapukan, pero iklhitayaniyaw.
46004013	Xkayaj kintajunkanan, pero kitnan laka laj'oxi chiwinti ijka'alhtayananaw. Chi sta chaway, wa tacha wa xajamakxtalhcha aniy lakamunulhpa kinta'ilhtukanan, wa tacha wa xatat'ilhincha tu'u aniy lakamunulhpa kintala'ts'inkanan.
46004014	Tacha ani iklats'o'niyaw jantu wa klamamaxaniyawcha, wa iklamap'a'siyaw, tacha kijas'at'an, mu klamapayniyaw.
46004015	Mu masi uxitnan tacha ixlapanaknicha Cristo, layi k'ajalhits'uk'ut'it la'akaw milh lapanakni yu katamatalaninin, pero yu milakpaynink'an jantu xluwk'an. Yu mimpayk'an uxitnan, kit'in, mu kit'ini iklalhixa'alaw an laj'oxi chiwinti, yu laych'a p'uch'a'o'at'it an Cristo Jesús.
46004016	Pus chaway iklatapaynisk'iniyaw li tacha ikt'ajun wach'uch'a ch'uni k'ats'uk'ut.
46004017	Xliyu iklalhimala'achaniw an Timoteo, yu ikmapayni tacha kints'alh, mu kiklaka'iy sawalhi an Dios. Yucha katajunan tani ikt'ajuncha la xtij an Cristo Jesús, tacha ijkamasuni an kijat'ala'awnink'an, wa tanchuncha, chi ta lakachux tan ijkapu'ini tan tata'ayxt'o'a.
46004018	Ali'in de uxitnan yu wa ta'ayajk'atsay talhi'ilhtuy li ntucha aktilala'ancha'aw la'ts'inin chi oxicha talhiwilay.
46004019	Pero li an Dios chuncha lakask'in, ikpakxan'iy li watukan ak'antachalh. Chi akxnicha akla'ts'inanta tuchini yu sawalhcha lay ta'ilhtuy anchunu yu sawalhcha tata'ayay, li ntu junita wa sawalhcha lay talakchiwiniy.
46004020	Mu an xlich'alhkat Dios jantu wa laka chiwinticha lay putasuy, wachu putasuyi la xtachaput.
46004021	¿Uxitnan t'asuch'a yu nawnat'iti? ¿lak'ask'inat'iti li aklala'ancha'aw mama'alh'ajninin u li aklala'ancha'aw laka jamapayninti?
46005001	K'atsakan li ma xapumatam yu uxitnan ma tacha ixt'iwicha lhit'ajun xtunati. Tacha ani tapasay alhp'as tukani jantucha k'is oxi, masi an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin tu chuni talay.
46005002	¡Uxitnan masi chuncha tapasay, sawalhch'a laj'ajini k'ats'anat'it! ¿Chu ntu apalij k'ala't'a'oxila'alhit'iti para li k'ama'osunik'ant'iti anchunu lapanak yu ilhtulh yu ntucha k'is oxi?
46005003	Yu kit'in masi jantu iklat'a'aklat'awnacha'aw, pero tachanu ancha iklat'a'aklat'awnacha'aw, chi kit'in iknajun li kama'alh'ajnalhi ani lapanak yu ntucha oxi tacha an lay.
46005004	Akxni k'at'a'ayxt'o'a'it kit'in tachanu ancha aklat'ata'ayxto'tacha'aw chi an ix'alhp'asninti an kiJamach'alhk'atk'an Jesús wachu ani katat'ata'ayxt'o'an. Wachuncha, la xtalakask'i an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo,
46005005	anchunu lapanak kama'axta'nikana an Satanás, para li an ixlakatunaj kalakt'ilhikalh chi an ixtakuwin kata'alhtaxtulhi akxni kaminacha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
46005006	Uxitnan jantu sawalhi yu nawnat'it para li lay laj'ajin k'ak'ats'ant'it. K'ats'ayatcha li masi wa lakats'uni lhamaskajan, wanaj maskaja'ojoyi li tu'ucha lhix'ot'akan.
46005007	Pus chaway k'amaj'ant'itcha anchunu yu at'ilhcha lhamaskajan, yu wa talakt'ilhiyancha, para li la'sast'incha k'a'unt'it. Uxitnan tacha an pan yu ntu tu'u lhiyalh lhamaskajan, yu ukan akxni ixpaku Paxku. Mu an Cristo yu kiborregojk'an laka Paxku, ma'nikalhcha kilakatak'an.
46005008	Pus chaway kamak'ataniwcha an kimpaxkuk'an laka pan yu ntu tu'u lhiyalh lhamaskajan, yu nawputun li sawalh, jantu yu kapumak'ataniw an yu at'ilhcha lhamaskajan chi an wa tanlhuncha yu ntu laj'oxi.
46005009	Iklats'o'nitawcha jalhiki tan klajunaw li nt'u k'ajat'at'ala'xt'o't'iti an yu wa aya talay.
46005010	Chi li chuncha klajunaw, jantu klajumputunaw li wanaj jant'uch'a k'ajala'ts'inp'ut'unt'iti an yu wa aya talay aniy lakaamunulhpa', u an yu wa sawalhcha lhuw tanlhun talaklhitsukuputun, u an ja'alhawnan, u an yu wanajcha tacha ixdiosk'an tala'ts'in li tu'u'. Mu li chuncha, yucha li wanaj k'at'axt'ut'it aniy lakamunulhpa'.
46005011	Yu klajumputunaw li nt'u k'at'at'ala'xt'o't'iti xamati yu najun li wachu ixlapanak Jesucristo, walh chi li wa aya lay u li wa sawalhcha lhuw tanlhun laklhitsukuputun u tacha ixdioscha wanaja kala'la'ts'ilh an laktanlhun u wa aya kachiwinilh u kat'a'ap'alh u kaja'alhawanalh. Yu chuncha lay lapanak, jant'u k'at'alakwa'int'it.
46005012	Jantu kit'ini aktijajunilh li oxi u jantu tani talaycha an yu ntu takiklaka'iy Dios. Uxitnan milhi'ilhtutk'ani li k'aja'unit'iti li oxi u jantu tani talaycha an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.
46005013	An yu ntu takiklaka'iy Dios yucha an Diosi kajajuna li oxi u jantu yu ta'ilhtuy. Pus uxitnan k'at'amakxt'utcha an t'an t'awnat an yu wa aya lay lapanak.
46006001	Akxni li xamati yu uxitnan yu k'iklak'a'iyatcha Dios wa t'ala'aji apumatam, ¿tasu li ancha sk'inini an juez yu ntu mispay Dios li kat'alats'awalalhi? Palay oxi kajapuxkawlh an yu takiklaka'iy Dios li katat'alats'awalalh.
46006002	¿Ch'u wa nt'u k'ats'ayat li yu'uncha an yu tajakiklaka'inincha yu katanawna li oxi u jantu tani lapanakni aniy lakaamunulhpa'? Ch'i li uxitnani yu k'anawna'it li oxi u jantu tani laycha aniy lakaamunulhpa, ¿t'asuch'a li nt'u layi lats'awalayat ani yu wa lakt'ikt'ika lhilats'awalat tanlhuni?
46006003	¿Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti li sta masi an angelhnin kitnani kanawnaw li oxi u jantu tani talaycha? ¡Pus mu li chuncha yu junita, pus palaycha kitnan kalats'awalayaw yu ixlakata tacha an ani laktapasay aniy laka jatsukunti!
46006004	Pus chaway, li uxitnan lalhi'ayat'iti wa tanlhuncha ixlakata yu chaway ani t'awkan, ¿Tasu li apalijcha wa yu'uncha mijuesnink'an ja'ilht'uyat an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inini?
46006005	Tacha ani iknajun para li k'alhimaxanant'it: ¿chu sna ntu xamati yu uxitnan yu lay kajat'alats'awalalh tu'u ixjat'ala'awnin?
46006006	¡Chi ntu wa lhilakatijtamcha wa lhit'ala'awnini la'ayp'axayat'it, sta la xlakapuchak'an an juesnin an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inini lalhip'inat'it!
46006007	Tacha ani wa siya uxitnanch'a la'ayp'axayat, aycha tukani lhits'an'ayat. ¿Tasu li ntu apalij wa lhit'ayaniyatcha an wa tanlhuncha yu ntu laj'oxi? ¿Tasu li ntu apalij wa lhit'ayaniyatcha li alhawnik'anat'it tu'u'u?
46006008	¡Apalij uxitnani yu wa t'ani layatcha, chi masi wa mijat'ala'awninchak'an ja'alhawniyat'iti li tu'u'!
46006009	¿Ch'u nt'u k'ats'ayat'iti li an yu wa tani talaycha jantu katitacha'alhi an tan ch'alhkatnan Dios? Jant'u k'at'a'o'xch'o'ot'it. Mu an yu wa aya talay chi an yu tacha ixdioschak'an tala'ts'in wa tanlhuncha chi an yu talat'atamay yu ntu talat'at'ajun chi an yu talat'atamay wa siya lapanaknicha chi an yu talat'atamay wa siya t'akunincha
46006010	chi an yu wa taja'alhawanan chi an yu wa sawalhcha lhuw lhitsukuputun tu'u chi an t'a'ap'anin chi an yu wa aya talakchiwiniy chi an yu wa taja'o'x'alhawnan, jantu katitacha'alhi an tan ch'alhkatnan Dios.
46006011	Tacha aniy, chuncha xtajunita ali'in yu uxitnan xlip'ulhnaj. Pero chaway xak'amaj'anik'ant'at'itcha mintala'alhink'an ch'i la'st'alan'ak'ant'at'itcha chi oxicha la mijatsukuntik'an la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo chi la xTakuwin an kiDiosk'an.
46006012	Nawkan: -Kit'in layi ak'ilhtulh watuchicha k'ilhtuputun. Chun sawalh, pero ntu chuxi oxi xajachalh. Chun, kit'in watuchicha k'ilhtuputun ak'ilhtulhcha, pero ntu aktimakawnilhi li tu'u akilaklhajalh.
46006013	Chi nawpalhkan: "An yu ukan para li katajuchalhcha la kimpalaknik'an, chi an kimpalaknik'an para li kaputajuchalhcha an yu ukan." Chi chun sawalh, pero an Dios kalaklakt'ilhiya an palakni chi an yu ukan. Pero an lakatunaj yucha ntu wa aya kapulakalhcha, yucha kama'axta'nikalh an Dios chi an Dios yucha an lakatunaja kaputsukuya'.
46006014	Chi tacha an Dios mala'awnicho'olhi an Jesucristo, kitnan wachu chuni akintamala'awnicho'oyan la x'alhp'asninti.
46006015	¿Ch'u nt'u k'ats'ayat'iti uxitnan li amilakatunajk'an ixlakatunaj an Cristo? ¿Chi ani ixlakatunaj Cristo laycha ak'ilhtulh ixlakatunaj t'aku yu wa aya lay? ¡Jantu!
46006016	¿Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti li akxni xamati lapanak t'atamay xamati t'aku yu wa aya lay wa pumatamcha tajun? An tan ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios najunta: "An xt'uyunk'an tachanu wa pumatamcha lapanaki katajuna'."
46006017	Pus wanajcha chun, akxni xamati t'atala'xt'o'acha an Dios laka takuwin, wa pumatamcha tajun.
46006018	Uxitnan jant'u wa aya k'alat'it. Wa tuchicha yu tumpaj tala'alhin ilhtuy an lapanak jantu mama'lhtajuniya an ixlakatunaj, pero yu wa ayacha lay, ilhtuycha tala'alhin chi wa ix'akstucha xkaji an ixlakatunaj.
46006019	¿Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti li amilakatunajk'an ixtajtan an Stalan'a Takuwin, yu yucha an Dios taxta'nitan chi li an Stalan'a Takuwin uxitnani taput'awnan? Jantu mi'anuk'ani amilakatunajk'an.
46006020	Mu an Dios yucha tatamawtan. Pus xliyu amilakatunajk'an k'ama'axt'a'nit'iti an Dios.
46007001	Chi chaway aklajunawcha an yu kilalhisakmiyaw la minkartajk'an. Palay oxi ntu kaxlat'atsukukalh,
46007002	pero wa ixlakata li wa lay wa aya katalalh an lapanakni, atamj atamjcha kalhitsukulh ixt'iwi wa pumatam, chi an t'akunin atamj atamjcha katalhitsukulh ixt'apapak'an wa pumatam wachu'.
46007003	Chi tacha an lapanak chi an t'aku yu talat'at'ajuncha wa katalamuktaxtunilhcha yu lhi'ilhtut tanlhun akxni lat'at'awkancha.
46007004	An t'aku jantucha wa ix'akstu ix'anu an ixlakatunaj, ix'anucha an ixt'apapa', chi an lapanak wachucha ntucha wa ix'akstu ixnawin an ixlakatunaj, ix'anucha an ixt'iwi'.
46007005	Pus jant'uch'a k'ala'unit'iti li jantu akxni lama'lht'ask'iniyat'it, pero li wa t'amak'awt'at'iti li ka'alina panch'e'exi akxni jant'u k'at'it'ala'xt'o't'it, para li wa k'at'ap'aynitcha, pus masicha nt'u k'at'ala'xt'o't'it. Pero xli'astan k'at'ala'xt'o'ch'o'otcha, para li an satanás jantu katama'ilhtuni yu ntu oxi, ixlakata li uxitnan t'u lay ts'uk'uyat wa mi'akstuk'an.
46007006	Tacha ani klajunaw wa la'atamcha lamap'a'sit, jantu wa p'ascha iklalhijunawi li k'alakt'ats'uk'uk'ant'it.
46007007	Yu kit'in xaknajun li chux an lapanakni tacha kit'in jantu ikt'at'awkan wa chuchuni kaxtawalh; pero an Dios tamj tamjcha kintalhimakmintan, ali'in tamj chi ali'in tamj.
46007008	An yu ntu jat'at'awkan chi an yu talaknitacha ixt'apapak'an kit'in ijkajuni li palay oxi jantucha kajalakt'atsukukalh, tacha kit'in.
46007009	Pero li ntu layi tatsukuy wa x'akstuk'an, kajat'atsukukalhcha, mu palay oxi li kajat'atsukukalh walh jantu li wa kastakcha tala'ma'alh'ajnajtsukulh.
46007010	Chi an yu jalakt'at'awkancha kit'in ijkajuni tacha najun an kiJamach'alhkatk'an, an t'aku jantu kamakawlhi an ixt'apapa'.
46007011	Pero li an t'aku makajuni an ixt'apapa, jantucha kat'atsukukalh, pero li t'atsukuputunkan wa kat'atawlhcho'olhi an ixt'apapa'. Wanajcha chuni an lapanak jantu kamakawlhi an ixt'iwi'.
46007012	Chi an ali'in, kit'ini ijkajuni jantu yu an kiJamach'alhkatk'ani najun, li xamati kint'ala'ajunk'an lhit'ajun xt'iwi yu ntu jakiklaka'inin, pero li an t'aku najuni li t'atawlhputuni an ixt'apapa, ani kint'ala'ajunk'an jantu kamakawlhi an ixt'iwi'.
46007013	Chi li xamati t'aku yu kint'alajamatsank'an t'at'ajun xamati lapanak yu ntu jakiklaka'inin, pero li ani lapanak najuni li wa t'atawlhputuncha, ani kint'alajamatsank'an jantu kat'alamakawlh.
46007014	Mu an lapanak an yu ntu jakiklaka'inin chunchacha pustalan'an li t'at'ajun pumatam t'aku yu jakiklaka'inin, chi an t'aku yu ntu jakiklaka'inin chunchacha pustalan'an li t'at'ajun xamati lapanak yu jakiklaka'inin. Li ntu chun kaxwalh, amijas'at'anink'an la xjatsukuntik'an laklhkilikini kaxtawalh, pero chaway la'stalan'an.
46007015	Pero li an yu ntu jakiklaka'inin najuni li makawputuni an yu jakikkaka'inin, kamakawlhcha, mu an yu jakiklaka'inin t'aku u lapanak jantu junkani li ka'asi t'atawilhi yu ntu wa tawlhputuncha, an Dios yucha kintat'asanitan li oxi katawlaw.
46007016	Mu uxint'i xat'iwi', jant'u k'ats'ayi li sna layi k'ama'alht'axt'uya'a mint'apapa'? u ¿uxint'i xat'apapa', jant'u k'ats'ayi li sna layi k'ama'alht'axt'uya'a mint'iwi'?
46007017	Pus atamj atamjcha chuncha katsukulh tani yu lhimakmilhcha Dios, chi tani yu ixjuniitacha akxni an Dios t'asanilh, chunchacha katsukulh. Chuncha yu iklhinajun li kata'ilhtulh ta lakachux tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakikla'inin.
46007018	Li xamati t'asanikalh akxni ix'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkantacha ix'a'axt'a'a, chunchacha katsukulh, chi li xamati t'asanikalh akxni ntu chun ixjunita, jantu ka'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalh.
46007019	An yu akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta jantu tu'u lhitapalhni chi an yu ntu tu'u akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta wanajcha chun. Yu lhitapalay yucha li ilhtukan an xlamap'a'sin Dios.
46007020	Atamj atamj chunchacha katsukulh tani yu ixt'ajuncha akxni t'asanilh Dios.
46007021	Li akxni t'asanik'a wa putapatsatch'a ix'unit'a, jant'u k'alhak'ap'up'i, pero li alini tani yu laych'a k'alhimak'awk'a, k'at'axt'ucha.
46007022	Mu yu wa putapatsatcha ixjunita akxni an Dios t'asanilh, yucha ma'alhtaxtunilhcha an Dios, chi wanajcha chun, yu ntu wa putapatsatcha ixjunita akxni an Dios t'asanilh, chaway wa xputapatsatcha an Cristo.
46007023	An Dios la'lhuw tukani talhitamajun uxitnan; jant'u k'alhit'amak'a'unt'iti li an ali'in lapanakni wa xputapatsanchak'ani kata'ilhtun.
46007024	Pus chunchacha t'ala'awnin atamj atamjcha chuncha katsukulh la x'ukxlakapu Dios tani yu ixt'ajuncha akxni t'asanilh.
46007025	Chi an yu jatsi'inka yu ntuka' jalakt'at'awkan, jantu tu'u kijuni an Dios tani yu ajkajunilhcha, pero ajkajuna tani yu ikpast'ak'acha. Layi akilakiklaka'iw mu an Dios kixta'nita ixjamapayninti.
46007026	Kit'in iknajun palay oxi ntu kajat'atsukukalh wa ixlakata li lhima'anxkayi ani panch'e'ex yu t'awnaw.
46007027	Li lhit'a'uni mint'iwi', jant'u k'amak'aw, ch'i li nt'u lhit'a'un, jant'u k'ap'uxk'aw.
46007028	Li t'ats'uk'uk'an, jantu tu'u tala'alhini ilht'uy, chi li xamati jatsi t'atsukukancha, wachu ntu tala'alhini ilhtuy. Pero an yu jat'atsukukan katala'ts'ina tanlhun lhima'alh'ajna an la xjatsukuntik'an, chi kit'in yucha yu xaklakask'in li ntu kaxtala'ts'ilh.
46007029	Kint'ala'awnin, yu iknawputun yucha aniy: Wa lakats'unicha panch'e'exi lhit'awnaw. Pus an yu jalakt'at'awkan tachanu ntu jalakt'at'awkani katatsukulh.
46007030	Chi an yu talaj'alhun tachanu ntu talaj'alhun, chi an yu talaj'achan tachanu ntu talaj'achan, chi an yu tajatamawnan tachanu ntu tu'u talhit'ajun.
46007031	Chi an yu tama'an'achay an tanlhuncha lak'alin aniy lakamunulhpa, tachanu ntu tu'u katama'an'achalh, mu tacha an tasuy aniy lakamunulhpa wa la'pusa.
46007032	Kit'in wa laycha li xaklama'alhtaxtucha para li nt'uch'a t'u'u k'alaklhak'ap'up'it'it. Yu ntu t'at'awkan yucha an ixlaktanlhun Diosi lhakapu'an chi yucha ma'an'achaputun.
46007033	Pero yu t'at'awkan yucha an lak'alin lakamunulhpa laklhakapu'an chi li kama'an'achalh ixt'iwi'.
46007034	Wanajcha chuni junita an t'aku yu t'at'awkan chi yu ntu t'at'awkan. An yu ntu t'at'awkan t'aku, yucha an ixlaktanlhun Diosi lhakapu'an, para li stalan'a kawalh la ixlakatunaj chi la ixtakuwin. Pero an yu t'at'awkan t'aku, yucha an yu lak'alin aniy lakamunulhpa lhakapu'an chi li kama'an'achalh ixt'apapa'.
46007035	Tacha ani klajunaw jantu klajunaw li nt'uch'a k'at'ats'uk'uk'ant'it chi oxi para uxitnan, para li wa oxich'a k'ats'uk'ut, jantu tu'u katamama'tijlan li t'at'ap'ats'ayat an Dios.
46007036	Li xamati lhiwilay li oxicha li kat'atsukulhcha yu t'atamakajuntacha li kat'atsukuyacha, li laycha kat'atsukukalh, li past'ak'acha li chunchacha yu oxicha xajachalh, pus ka'ilhtulhcha, kat'atsukukalhcha, yucha ntu tala'alhin.
46007037	Chi li apumatam yucha jantu k'atsani li kat'atsukukalh chi wa lhi'ilhtuycha la xjalhunut li ntu a'tam katit'atsukukalh, oxi li chuncha lay, chi watuchicha yu ilhtuputun, ilhtuycha.
46007038	Pus li yu t'atsukuyi yu t'atamakajuntacha, oxi li chuncha ilhtuy, pero li yu ntu t'atsukukan, palay oxi li chuncha lay.
46007039	An t'aku yu t'at'awkan t'ala'xt'o'a an ixt'apapa li t'ajunka'; pero li niycha an ixt'apapa an t'aku, an t'aku laycha kat'atsukucho'olh watichicha yu oxi lhiwilay, pero yu jakiklaka'inin lapanak.
46007040	Chi yu kit'in iknajun, an t'aku palay lhi'acha katsukulh li ntucha kat'atsukucho'okalh. Chuncha iknajun kit'in chi kit'in iklhiwilay li wachu yucha an xTakuwin Diosi iklhit'ajun.
46008001	Atumpaj, ixlakata an lhiway yu jalha'ulananikan an yu tacha dioscha jala'ts'inkan, oxi k'atsayaw kinchuxk'an tani yu junitacha an xajatapast'ak'at. Pero an jatapast'ak'at layi wa pu'ayajk'atsakancha, pero yu lhit'ajuni an jamapayninti yucha oxi ja'a'tayjuy an lapanakni.
46008002	Li xamati lhiwilay li tu'ucha k'atsay, jantuka' tu'u k'atsay tacha yu kak'atsaalhcha.
46008003	Pero li xamati lapanak mapayniya an Dios, an Dios mispaycha tichini yuchacha.
46008004	Yu ixlakata li ak'ulh tu'u yu xjalha'ulananikantacha an yu tacha diosnincha jala'ts'inkan, oxi k'atsayaw li aniy lakamunulhpa jantu tu'u talhitapalay, mu wa pumatami yu Dios sawalh.
46008005	Chi mu masi kata'alilhi yu kajajunkalh li diosnin an lakt'iyan u aniy lakaat'un (tacha ta'alini xluwk'an diosnin chi xluwk'an jamach'alhkatni),
46008006	pero para kitnan wa pumatami Dios, yu Kimpayk'an, yu pulak'alin'ojoy chux an tanlhun, chi kitnan xnawin an Dios. Chi wachu wa pumatami alin Jamach'alhkat, yucha an Jesucristo, yucha pulak'ilhtu'okalh chux an tanlhun chi kitnan wachu yucha put'awnaw.
46008007	Pero ntu ta lhichuxi k'atsakan. Ali'in yu sawalhcha xtalhismanita ixtakiklaka'iy an wa tanlhuncha yu tacha xdiosninchak'an xtala'ts'in, akxni ta'uy lhiway talhi'ilhtuy li sna xla'ulanankantacha. Chi mu ntu lajk'ut'ilini la xtak'atsank'an, pus ja'ilhtuycha li laklhkilikincha katak'atsalh la xjatsukuntik'an.
46008008	Jantu wa xliyu tuchini yu laycha ka'uw palaycha oxi akintala'a'iyan Dios chi li jantu ka'uw jantucha oxi akintitala'a'in.
46008009	Pero k'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, jantu junita kataputa'aj'ajulhi an yu ntuka' oxi talhimacha'xay ixlakata li uxitnan layi uyat watuchicha.
46008010	Mu li uxint'i k'ats'ayi tani yu lakjunitacha an tanlhun ch'i t'awlaych'a wa'in tan wa para yu'uncha an tacha xdiosninchak'an tala'ts'in an lapanakni, chi xamati mint'ala'ajun yu ntu tukancha oxi jakiklaka'inin, kala'ts'in, layi wachucha katapujulhi ka'ulh anchunu yu xla'ulanankantacha.
46008011	Pus chuncha, wa ixlakata an yu lajk'ats'aycha p'u'ilht'uycha xlijunti li kats'an'alh amint'ala'ajun yu ntu tukancha oxi jakiklaka'inin, yu wachu an Cristo lhinita.
46008012	Akxni li tu'u yu ntu oxi jap'umak'atsaniniyat xtak'atsank'an amijat'ala'awnink'an an yu ntuka' tak'atsay tanyuchacha yu oxi chi yu jantu, yucha an Cristojo ilht'uniyat tala'alhin.
46008013	Pus li wa ixlakata li yu ak'uya, wa puta'a'tayi an kint'ala'ajun, apalij tu a'tam ak'ulhi lhiway, para li ntu kapu'ayst'uk'ukalh.
46009001	¿Chu ntu Jesusi kimala'achata? ¿Jantu layi ak'ilhtulh yu lay ta'ilhtuy an ali'in? ¿Jantu kla'ts'inta an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesús? ¿Jantu uxitnanch'a p'ut'asuyat li ikt'atapatsayi an Jamach'alhkat?
46009002	Ka layi ali'in katanawlh li kit'in jantu Jesucristojo kimala'achay, pero uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li chun, mu chaway li ch'a'o'at'atcha an Jamach'alhkat anchacha putasuy li kit'in yucha kimala'achay sawalh.
46009003	Chunchunicha ijka'alhtayst'uk'a an yu sawalhcha kintalhichiwiniy:
46009004	¿Chu ntu ikt'acha'anawi li akwajiw chi li ak'ottwi tu'u'?
46009005	¿Jantu ikt'acha'anawi li aklhi'aw kint'iwik'an yu wachu jakiklaka'inin, tacha ta'ilhtuy an ali'in yu Jesús jamala'achay chi an ixjat'ala'awnin an Jamach'alhkat chi an Cefas?
46009006	¿U sna wa yucha an Bernabé chi kit'ini yu aklhitsukupalaw la'atam tapatsat tan akmaxtuwcha yu aklhiwajiw?
46009007	¿Tisiyuchacha yu jun soldado chi wa ix'akstucha kalaktamawlh yu la'ma'lhtask'iniya? ¿Chi tisiyuchacha yu ch'an jalhi'ay uva chi jantucha ka'unilhi xajatawk'ati? ¿Chi tisiyuchacha yu kajalhistaklhi borregojnin chi ntucha kaja'otnilhi yu jach'itxtuni ists'ik'itk'ani?
46009008	Ch'i nt'u k'ana'unt li wa xchiwinticha lapanaki ani, mu an la xlamap'a'sin Moisés wachu chuni najunta:
46009009	Chunchuniya ts'o'muk'akanta an laka libro yu puwilh lhamap'a'sin: "Jant'u k'ak'ink'alhut'i an toroj akxni maputayanit'awkan an trigo para li kataxtunilhcha an xatalhts'i, mu tapatsat'ajun, chi t'acha'ani lay ka'ulh". Tacha ani najun an Dios jantu nawputun li yucha an torojnini jajuni,
46009010	kitnani kintajunan. Mu an lhamap'a'sin kilakatak'ani ts'o'kalh, chi tacha an yu puja an t'un chi an yu maxtunicha an xatalhts'i an jach'ananti an yu ma'alakalh, katapakxan'iya li katala'a'iya yu ix'anuchak'an.
46009011	Pus li kitnan ikch'anwicha la mijatsukuntik'an yu la xTakuwin Dios minachalh, jantu sawalhcha tu'u li aklask'iniw lakats'uni yu lhit'awnat'it mintanlhunk'an.
46009012	Li ali'in tat'acha'ani li chuncha kata'ilhtun, pus kitnan palaycha. Pero ntu tu'u chuncha ik'ilhtutaw masi ikt'acha'anaw, kitnan chuxi iklhitayaniyaw para li ntu tu'u katanchastuklhi an laj'oxi xchiwinti Cristo.
46009013	Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li an yu tatapatsay laka ay tajtan anchacha tamaxtuy yu ta'uy, kanaju an yu tala'ts'ilhi'anta an tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan, tan an jama'axta'kan an yu jama'nikan jatapakxat, ta'uycha an xalhiway.
46009014	Wanajcha chun, an Jamach'alhkat ilhtuta li an yu tajamak'atsaaninin an laj'oxi chiwinti, wachucha ani katamaxtulh yu kata'ulh.
46009015	Pero kit'in tu a'tami chunchacha ak'ilhtulh masi ikt'acha'an, chi wachu ntu xliyu chuncha iklalhits'o'niyaw para li wa tu'ucha akilaxta'niw. Palay oxi li aknilh walh jantu li aklask'iniw. ¡Jantu xamati akinti'ilhtulh li ntucha aklhita'ayalh ani achat yu iklhit'ajun!
46009016	Kit'in li iklhichiwiniy an laj'oxi chiwinti, jantu ikputa'ayaycha li sawalhcha tu'u wa ikti'ilhtut'ajun, mu yucha wa xliyu kilhi'ilhtut. ¡Chi paynicha kit'in li ntu ajkamak'atsaaninilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti!
46009017	Chi li kinta'achanini ak'ilhtulh ani tapatsat, chuncha akla'a'iya kintalhaja. Pero ntu wa kit'incha iksakxtuta ani tapatsat, ani tapatsat yucha wa kilhijunkan.
46009018	¿ Chi tanyuchacha yu kintalhajacha? Yu kintalhaja yucha li jantu ajkach'inilh tacha an ijkalhixa'alaycha an laj'oxi chiwinti an lapanakni, para li ntu wa aklhimo'slayask'inlhicha yu ikt'acha'an li iklhichiwiniycha an laj'oxi chiwinti.
46009019	Pus masi kit'in tu xamati wanaja ixma'tsuku, wanaj ta lhichuxi ikwalh ixma'tsukuk'an, para li lay lhuw ajkalhajaxtulh para li xnawincha an Cristo katawalh.
46009020	Tan an tawilanalh an judiojnin tacha yu'uncha iklalh, para li lay ajkalhajaxtulh katakiklaka'ilh an Cristo. Chi an tan tawilanalh an yu yucha an lhamap'a'sin tapuwilanalh, wachu chuni iklalh, masi kit'in tu yu an lhamap'a'sini ikput'ajun. Wa chunchacha iklalh para li ajkalhajaxtulh.
46009021	Chi an tan tawilanalh an yu ntu tu'u talhit'ajun an lhamap'a'sin, wanajcha chuni xakt'ajun tacha yu'uncha, masi kit'in jantu wanajcha wa ikt'ajun li ntucha ak'ilhtulhi an ixlamap'a'sin Dios, kit'in ak'ilhtulhi an xlamap'a'sin an Cristo. Chuncha iklalh para li lay ajkalhajaxtulh an yu ntu tat'ajun laka lhamap'a'sin.
46009022	Tan tat'ajun an yu ntu lajk'ut'ilin la xjakiklaka'intik'an wanajcha chuni iklalh tacha yu'uncha, para li ajkalhajaxtulh wachu'. Kanaju wanaj kla'olhi tacha an tamj tamjcha tat'ajun an lapanakni, para li lay ajkalhajaxtulh ali'in.
46009023	Chunchacha ik'ilhtuy ixlakata an laj'oxi chiwinti, para li wachu akma'la'ts'ilhi'alh.
46009024	¿Ch'u nt'u k'ats'ayat'iti li an yu talalhajay tan lakats'alhkan, ixchuxk'ani talakats'alay, pero wa pumatami yu lhajayachalh? P'us k'alak'ats'alat'it, para li k'alhajachi'it ch'i k'alhajaxt'ut'iti yu k'axt'a'nik'ana'it.
46009025	An yu tamala'asijni li inta katama'lalhajaya li kalakats'alhkana, jantu tu'u ta'ilhtuy yu wa lay kataputs'an'alh. Chi li chunchacha talay, para li lay katalhajaxtulh ixkoronajk'an, pero ani corona wa talakt'ilhicho'oy; pero kitnan lhima'alh'ajnanaw li kalhajaxtuyaw kinkoronajk'an yu ntu talakt'ilhiy.
46009026	Yu kit'in, jantu wa la'a'ijcha ijkats'alay li ntu inta akticha'alh, chi ntu klaktamakyajuyi wa la'a'ijcha yu tachanu wa uncha akmuk'anilh,
46009027	kit'in ikmama'alh'ajniya an kilakatunaj para li ka'ilhtulhi yu ijkuni, para li ntu junita li kit'in ijkamak'ats'aanilhcha an ali'in an laj'oxi chiwinti chi kit'in apalijcha jantu akla'puschalh.
46010001	Kint'ala'awnin, jantu kla'a'iy li k'ak'apt'iti li an yu ma'anchacha ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw ixchuxk'ani ixjamatanchanita anchunu jataputs'i chi ixchuxk'ani tapatakutlhi an lakxkan.
46010002	Chunchacha ixchuxk'an tat'atala'xto'olh an Moisés, akxni ta'a'paxli an laka jataputs'i chi an lakxkan.
46010003	Chi wanajcha chun ixchuxk'ani ta'ulh an wayt yu jaxta'nilh an Dios,
46010004	chi ixchuxk'ani ta'otlhi xkan yu Dios jaxta'nilh. Mu xta'ot'a an xkan yu xtaxtuy lakatam laka chiwx yu Dios xja'ulanita, ani chiwx yucha an Cristo, yu xjat'a'anta.
46010005	Pero palay xluwk'ani yu ntu tama'an'achalh an Dios, pus xliyu an ixlakatunajk'an, an lakaxixnicha lakaat'uni laktamalh.
46010006	Tacha ani laktapasalh wa kintapumasunikanancha, para li ntu ka'ilhtuwi yu ntu oxi, tacha yu'uncha ta'ilhtuputulh.
46010007	Pus chaway uxitnan jant'u k'ala'ts'int'iti li tachanu midioschak'ani an wa laktanlhuncha, tacha ali'in talalh, tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "An lapanakni talaktawilhcha talakwajin chi talaj'ot'a chi xli'astan talaj'amanalhcha".
46010008	Jantu wa aya kalaw tacha talalh ali'in yu'uncha, akxni 23 mil lapanakni talaknilh wa tam wilhchan.
46010009	Chi wachu ntu wa kalhila'ts'intanuwi an Cristo, tacha ali'in yu'uncha talalh, mu li chuncha talalh jats'ak'alh ts'apulin chi talaknilh.
46010010	Chi ntu kap'ulu p'ulu lhichiwiniwi an Dios, tacha ali'in yu'uncha p'ulu p'ulu talhichiwinilh, chi an xa'angelh lhinin jama'ni'olh.
46010011	Chux tacha ani tatapasanilh an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inaw wa kapuk'atsawcha tani laycha tapasay, chi anchacha ts'o'muk'akalh an la ixchiwinti Dios, tan kintapumak'atsaanikanan yu chaway ani t'awnaw, yu ani min'ot'ajuncha panch'e'ex.
46010012	Pus li yu najuni li k'ut'ilhi t'ajalhtananta Dios, kajalajk'atsanalhi para li ntu kata'a'talh.
46010013	Uxitnan jant'u t'u'u p'ulhila'ts'int'anuk'ant'at tu'u yu lhima'anxkay yu ntu wa lapanakcha kapulhila'ts'intanukalh. Chi uxitnan layi k'ak'iklak'a'it an Dios li ntu katitamakajuni li k'ala'ts'int'iti yu palay makxkay, t'an t'uch'a lay k'alhit'ayanit. An Dios katamasuniyani t'ani k'alhila't'axt'utcha para li lay k'alhit'ayanit.
46010014	Pus xliyu'u kint'ala'awnin, yu iklamapayniyaw k'amak'a'unt'iti an wa tanlhuncha yu tacha xdiosninchak'an tala'ts'in an lapanakni.
46010015	Uxitnan iklaxa'alayaw tacha yu tajalakpastaknan lapanakni, uxitnanch'a k'ana'unt li oxi u jantu tacha an klajunaw.
46010016	Akxni pu'ot'aw an vaso yu pupast'ak'aw an xjamapayninti Cristo, xta'niyawcha lhimala'puchajun an Dios, chi ¿jantu lhawa'ot'awcha an xak'alhni Cristo? Chi li uyawcha an pan yu la'ch'e'eyaw, ¿jantu lhawa'uyawcha an ixlakatunaj?
46010017	Masi kilhuwk'an, kinchuxk'ani wa la'atam pan uyaw. Pus xliyu wa la'atami kilakatunajk'an.
46010018	K'ajalhak'ap'up'it'iti an israelitajnin: an yu ta'uy an jatapakxat yu jalha'ulanankantacha, wa tamcha tama'ilhtuy yu ilhtukan an laka tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan.
46010019	Pero tacha ani iknajun jantu iknajun li lhitapalayi an yu tacha dioscha tala'ts'in an lapanakni, chi ntu iknajun li lhitapalayi an lhiway an yu ma'axta'nikan.
46010020	Yu iknajun, li akxni taja'ulanan an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin, yu'uncha an lakmakxkay'uni taja'ulanani, jantu Dios, chi kit'in tu iklakask'in li uxitnan k'ajat'at'ala'xt'o't'iti an lakmakxkay'un.
46010021	Jant'u lay k'at'ip'u'ott'it an ixvaso Dios ch'i a't'am k'ap'u'otp'alat'iti an ixvasojk'an lakmakxkay'un, ch'i nt'u lay k'at'ima't'awlat'iti la xmesaj an Dios chi a'tam k'alakt'awlhp'alat'iti la xmesajk'an an lakmakxkay'un.
46010022	¿U kama'talh'amnawi an Dios? ¿Palay lajk'ut'ilini kitnan chi yucha jantu?
46010023	Tanajun ali'in: watuchicha k'ilhtuputun layi ak'ilhtulh tu xamati akintila'a'aymalh. ¡Chun sawalh! Pero ntu chuxi oxi kat'ilhtunin la mijatsukunti.
46010024	Jantu kapuxkajuwi yu oxi wa para ki'akstuchak'an, kapuxkaju yu oxi para an ali'in.
46010025	Chux yu st'akan an tan st'akan lhiway, k'a'ut'it, ch'i nt'u k'alhasakminint'iti tu'u', wa ixlakata amijatapast'ak'atk'an.
46010026	Mu chux an lakamunulhpa chi chux yu ancha alin, ix'anu an Jamach'alhkat.
46010027	Li xamati yu ntu jakiklaka'inin ta'aylhi'anan li k'at'ap'it lakwaynin chi li uxitnan t'ak'uxap'inat, wat'uch'ich'a yu ulanik'anat chuxi k'alak'ut'it ch'i nt'u t'u'u k'alhasakminint'it, wa ixlakata an jatapast'ak'at.
