47013004	Chun sawalh yucha makxtukmuk'akalh tacha yu ntu k'ut'ilh, pero yucha lhit'ajuni an ix'alhp'asninti Dios. Pus kitnan wanajcha chun jantu lajk'ut'ilini ikpujuntaw yucha, pero an la x'alhp'asninti an Dios akput'a'aklatsukuyawi an Cristo para li aklatapatsaniw.
47013005	K'alhak'ap'up'ink'ant'itcha mi'akstuk'ani li sna jak'iklak'a'ininat'it; k'alhila'ts'int'anuk'ant'itcha mi'akstuk'an. ¿Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti li an Jesucristo taput'awnan? Li nt'u oxi t'awnat, pus chuncha ntu taput'awnan.
47013006	Pero kit'in ikpakxan'iya li uxitnan k'anawna'it'iti li kitnan iklhajatacha'awcha.
47013007	Chi iktapayniniyawi an Dios li jant'u t'u'u k'a'ilht'ut yu ntu oxi, chi jantu wa xliyu aktasuwcha li iklhajatacha'awcha, wa xliyu li k'a'ilht'uti uxitnan yu oxi, masi kitnan wa tachanu yu ntucha talhajatachalh aktasuw.
47013008	Mu jantu lay tu'u akti'ilhtuw yu wa akput'alaxtukucha an yu sawalh, apalij wa ik'ilhtuyaw yu t'ala'an an yu sawalh.
47013009	Pus kitnan iklaj'achanawi li kitnan jantu lajk'ut'ilin chi li uxitnan lajk'ut'ilin; walh chi masi chuncha iklalhitapayniyawi para li jant'uch'a t'u'u k'a'ilht'ut yu ntu oxi.
47013010	Xliyu iklalhits'o'niyawi masi jantu an iklat'a'aklat'awnacha'aw, para li akxni aklala'cha'aw jantu alhp'asi akla'ilhtuniw an lakilhich'alhkat yu an Jamach'alhkat Jesús kixta'nita para li oxi k'ats'uk'ut chi para li jantu wa k'ap'uma'nik'ant'itcha.
47013011	Yu xli'astancha iklajunawi kint'ala'awnin, k'alaj'ach'ant'it, k'amak'a'unt'itcha yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun, k'ala't'a'oximaj'ayat'it, wa tami k'ak'ats'at'it chi wa oxich'a k'at'awlat'it; walh an Dios yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat chi jamapayninti katat'a'aklatsukuyan.
47013012	K'alala'axa'alap'axachi'itcha atamjtamin laka la'atam stalan'a jala'xtikilhtastuknut.
47013013	Ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'icha sawalh Dios tamak'aniyacha'an jala'axa'alanti. Minchuxk'an k'ala'a'itcha an ixjamapayninti an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo chi an ixjamapayninti an Dios chi katat'a'aklatsukuncha an Stalan'a Takuwin.
48001001	Kit'in ikPablo yu ntu wa lapanakcha kilhka'ulalh chi ntu wa lapanakcha kimala'achay, yu chuncha lakask'ilh yucha an Jesucristo chi an Dios, yu kimPayk'an, yu mala'awnicho'olh an Jesús,
48001002	ali ixchuxk'an an kint'ala'awnink'an yu ani kintat'awilanalh iklamala'achaniyawi jala'axa'alanti uxitnan yu la't'a'ayxt'o'achi'it an xalakaat'un Galacia yu k'iklak'a'iyat an Dios.
48001003	Yucha an kimPayk'an Dios chi an kiJamach'alhkatchak'an Jesucristojo kataxta'nin jamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnat.
48001004	An Jesús mapalalhi kintala'alhink'an, x'akstu tama'axta'lhi. Chuncha ilhtulh tacha yu oxicha lhiwilay an kimPayk'an Dios para li akintama'alhtaxtuni ani tan tu oxi lakamunulhpa t'awnaw.
48001005	Yucha an Dioscha ay kala'ts'inkalh. Chunchacha kawalh.
48001006	Jantu lay ijkiklaka'iya li wat'uk'anch'a mak'awnat'iti an Dios, yu tat'asanin la xjamapayninti an Cristo. Mak'a'unt'itcha an Dios chi chaway tumpajcha chiwinti yu k'ap'ut'a'alht'axt'uya'it'iti k'iklak'a'iyat'it, yu sawalh tam yu ntu tacha an yu klalhixa'alaw.
48001007	Yu sawalh, jantu tu'u alimpalay atumpaj chiwinti yu puta'alhtaxtukan, wa ta'alin ali'in yu wa tat'awnan ma'o'xcho'onin. Yu'uncha wa tamapaxaputun an laj'oxi chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy Jesucristo.
48001008	Pero li xamati yu kitnan, u pumatam ángel yu kaminchalh lakt'iyan, tu'u yu tam chiwinti katalhixa'alan, tan katajunin li chuncha yu puta'alhtaxtukan, yu ntu chun tacha an yu iklajuntawcha, ¡kachajcha la'a'ilhi ma'alh'ajnat!
48001009	Chunchacha iknawlh chi chaway a'tam iknawpalay: Li xamati talhixa'alayan yu tumpaj chiwinti yu ntu yu tacha an yu la'a'it'atcha, ¡kachajcha la'a'ilhi ma'alh'ajnat!
48001010	¿Lhiwilayat li wa oxicha ijkat'atamakawputun an lapanakni u yucha an Dios? ¿U sna wa iklhipuxkawnicha tani oxicha ajkalhima'an'achalh an lapanakni? Mu li wa yu'unchaka an lapanakni yu ijkama'an'achay, jantu xakwalhi xt'atapatsan an Cristo.
48001011	Kint'ala'awnin, klakask'in li k'alhimach'a'xat'it li an laj'oxi chiwinti klamasuniw jantu wa xchiwinticha lapanak.
48001012	Aniy chiwinti jantu yu an lapanakni kintaxta'nilh chi ntu wachu yu'uncha kintamasunilh, yucha an Jesucristojo kixta'nilh.
48001013	Uxitnan asmat'at'iti tani xaklaycha akxni xakma'ach'a'o'ananta tacha an talay judiojnin. Xajkalhitama'chapuyi an yu takiklaka'iy Dios chi xajkala'ma'niputuncha.
48001014	Xa'aycha xajkunt'ajun an laka religión judía, chi palay xakintalhiwilay. Ixluwk'ani an yu wa kilakt'atamka xaklhila'ta'ayataw yu kint'ajudiojnin jantu chuni xjala'ts'inkan. Palay xakt'ataxtuniya xak'ilhtuy tacha an xakintalhimasmanitancha li aklaw an kilakpaynink'an, an ali'in jantu xtat'ataxtuni.
48001015	Pero akxni an Dios, kisakxtulhi sta la ixpalakni an kinati chi kint'asanilhi la ixjamapayninti,
48001016	oxi lhiwilalh an Dios li akimasunilh an isTs'alh, para li ajkalhixa'alhalh an xchiwinti an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin chi ntucha xamati ikla'alh para li aklhisakmilh.
48001017	Chi ntu iktama'ast'a'alhi la'acha'an Jerusalen ak'alh jala'ts'ini an yu p'ulhnajcha ixjamala'achata an Jesús xtajunita, apalij ik'alh Arabia chi ikmimpalh Damasco.
48001018	Xli'astan, la'puslicha la'at'utu k'ata, iktama'ast'a'alhi Jerusalen para li akla'ts'ilh an Pedro chi la'akawkisi wilhchani ikt'atamakawchalh.
48001019	Pero ntucha xamati ali an yu ixjamala'achata an Jesúsi kla'ts'ilh, wa yucha an Jakobojcha an xt'ala'ajun an Jamach'alhkat.
48001020	Tacha ani iklats'o'niyaw, an Dios k'atsayi li ntu wa ikmaslakatinincha, yucha k'atsayi li sawalh.
48001021	Xli'astan ik'alhcha an xalaklakaat'un Siria chi Cilicia.
48001022	Pero an xalakat'un Judea jantuka' xakintamispayi tani iktasuycha tacha an xtala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios yu xnawinin an Cristo.
48001023	Wa x'amani xta'asmat'a xlaknawkan: an yu wa p'ulhnaj wa xakintamama'alh'ajniyan chaway lhichiwiniycha an jakiklaka'inti yu la'atam panch'e'ex xjuntachalh wa xmala'mixiputun.
48001024	Chi oxicha xtalhichiwiniy an Dios kilakata.
48002001	Xli'astan la'akawt'at'icha k'ata la'pusli iktama'ast'a'ampalhcha Jerusalen ali an Bernabé chi xak'aylhi'anta an Tito.
48002002	Ik'alh mu an Dios xakimasunita li ak'alh. Tan wa ki'akstuk'an ijkat'ata'ayxto'lhicha an yu xalaj'ajin xjala'ts'inkan, chi ts'awjcha ijkalhixa'alalh an ixchiwinti Dios yu ijkalhixa'alay an yu ntu judiojnin, para li chux tacha ani ikt'ataxtuni k'ilhtuy jantu wa paxkatcha kawalh.
48002003	Pero masi chuncha an Tito yu xakint'a'anta yucha griego jantu xamati asi lhijunilh li ka'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalhi ix'a'axt'a'a.
48002004	Ali'in yu ntu kint'ala'awnink'an ixtatanumananchalhi wa la'asa' an tan xaktanumaw, para li katak'atsaalhi tacha kintama'alhtaxtuni'ojoncha an Cristo Jesus, para li akinta'ilhtuputumpalani li a'tam akinta'a'ch'apapalan an lhamap'a'sin.
48002005	Pero masi wa tamcha pants'ik'is jantu k'is ijkalhakapu'aniniwi yu'uncha, mu kitnan yu klakask'inaw li an yu laj'oxi chiwinti, yu sawalh, k'alhits'uk'u'alhit.
48002006	Xlakatak'an an lapanakni an yu xjalhiwilakan li xtalhitapalay (masi kit'in ntu iklhakapu'ani tuchini xtajunitacha, mu an Dios jantu wa jasakxtununcha), jantu tu'u kintamasunilh yu sast'icha tu'u'.
48002007	Apalij talhiwilalhi li kit'ini kixlijunkanta li ajkalhixa'alalhi an laj'oxi chiwinti an yu ntu judiojnin, tacha lhijunikalh an Pedro li kajalhixa'alalh an yu judiojnin.
48002008	An Dios yu mala'achalh an Pedro li kajalhixa'alalh an laj'oxi chiwinti an yu judiojnin, wanajcha yu kimala'achalh kit'in para li ajkalhixa'alalhi an yu ntu judiojnin.
48002009	An Santiago chi an Cefas chi an Juan, yu tacha xatiatsasnincha xjala'ts'inkan an tan xtata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin. Talhiwilalhi li yucha an Diosi xakimala'achata, chi para li katasulhi li kintala'a'ini li tacha xt'ama'tapatsanchak'an ajkunwi kintaxta'nincha xmakak'an, kit'in chi an Bernabé, para li kitnan ak'awcha jat'atapatsanin an yu ntu judiojnin chi yu'uncha yucha an yu judiojnincha.
48002010	Wa yucha kintask'inin li ma ajkalhakapu'awi an jakilhpatinin, yu ixlakata ani kit'in wanajcha chuni oxi ijkalhakapu'an.
48002011	Pero akxni an Pedro kilachilh la'acha'an Antioquia, la x'ukxlakapu ikla'a'aymalh, mu an yu ix'ilhtut'ajun tu k'is oxi.
48002012	Wa xlip'ulhnaj ixjat'alakwajini an yu ntu judiojnin, pero akxni tachilhcha ali'in yu xjamala'achatachalh an Santiago, tsukulhcha jat'alamakajun, jantucha xjat'alakwajin. Wa xliyu xjatalhamniya an yu ixtanajun li kaja'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalhi ix'a'axt'a'ak'an an lapanakni yu wachu takiklaka'iputun an Dios.
48002013	Chi an ali'in judiojnin wa tamcha tat'ak'atsaalh an Pedro la xta'ukxput'uyunti, sta an Bernabe wachu tamatanunilh.
48002014	Xliyu akxni kla'ts'ilhi li ntu chuni tacha an xtalay, tacha najunta an laj'oxi chiwinti, yu sawalh, ijkunilhi an Pedro la x'ukxlakapuk'an ixchuxk'an: Uxint'i judiojk'at'i, walh chi wa tacha yu ntucha judiojk'at'i t'a'un. ¿Tasu li an yu ntu judiojnin p'asch'a ja'uni li tacha judiojnincha katatsukulhi?
48002015	Kitnan judiojnin sta wa titsuku chi ntu la'ma'lhta'alhinin tacha an yu ntu takiklaka'iy Dios.
48002016	Walh chi k'atsayawi li ntu xamati la'ts'inkan li oxicha t'ajun wa xliyu li kamuktaxtulhcha an lhamap'a'sin, yu oxi putsukukan li kiklaka'ikan an Jesucristo. Xlakata ani jakiklaka'inti li kitnan wachu kiklaka'itaw an Jesucristo, para li an Dios akintala'ts'ini li oxicha t'awnaw. Xlakata an jakiklaka'inti, jantu wa xliyu li muktaxtuyawcha an lhamap'a'sin. Mu ntu xamati katila'ts'inkalh li oxicha t'ajun wa xliyu li muktaxtuycha an lhamap'a'sin.
48002017	Chi li puxkawyawi li oxi kaputsuku an Jesucristo, nawputun li kitnan wachu la'ma'lhta'alhinin, ¿chi chaway ani jumputun li an Cristo yuchacha kinta'ilhtuyan la'ma'lhta'alhinin? Jantu.
48002018	Mu li kit'in aklakt'ilhilh tu'u chi li a'tam akla'oxipalh kit'incha kinkwentaj.
48002019	Tachanu wanajcha kint'axtukmuk'akanta laka cruz an Cristo. Kit'in jantucha para an lhamap'a'sini ikt'ajun, kit'in iknitacha para yucha. Yucha an lhamap'a'sini kima'nilh, pero li iknilhcha para an lhamap'a'sin, chaway laycha iktsukuy para Dios.
48002020	Chaway tucha kit'ini ikt'ajun, yucha an Cristojcha kimput'ajun. Chi li ikput'ajuncha aniy lakatunaj, yucha an isTs'alh Diosi ijkiklaka'iy yu kimapaynilh chi ma'axta'lhi ixjatsukunti para li akima'alhtaxtulh.
48002021	Pus kit'in tu aktila'amaj'alhi an oxi ixjamapayninti Dios. Mu li yucha an lhamap'a'sincha yu lay oxi kaxputsukuw la x'ukxlakapu Dios, chuncha li nilh an Jesucristo tucha tu'u kaxlitapalalh.
48003001	¡Uxitnan, Gálatas, jant'u k'is ja'asmatnanat'it! ¿Tisiyuchacha tachanu tachawtancha para li nt'u k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti an chiwinti yu sawalhi? Tan iklalhixa'alayaw iklamasunitawcha la mila'chulhk'an an Jesucristo yu makxtukmuk'akalh.
48003002	Wa yucha aniya klakask'in li akilajuniw: An xTakuwin Dios ¿la'a'it wa xliyu li ilht'ut'iti tacha an lhinajun an xlamap'a'sin Moises, u wa xliyu li k'iklak'a'it'iti tacha an asmatt'it?
48003003	¿Tasucha li nt'uch'a k'is ja'asmatnanat'iti? ¿Nawnatcha li wa mi'akstuchak'ani k'ala'ts'aya'it yu an laka Takuwin p'u'a't'aynit?
48003004	¿Jantu tu'u talhitapalhniyan chux t'ach'a an ma'alh'ajnant'atcha? ¡O'palaj tu'ucha kaxtalhitapalhnin!
48003005	An Dios taxta'niyan an xTakuwin chi ilhtuyi tanlhun yu la'lhi'anin yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanak lay ilhtuy t'an t'awnat'it. ¿Tasu li chunchacha ilhtuyi? Jantu xliyu li uxitnan ilht'uyat'iti yu lhinajun an lhamap'a'sin, wa xliyu li k'iklak'a'iyat'itcha an yu asmatt'at.
48003006	An Abraham kiklaka'ilhi an Dios, pus an la ixjakiklaka'inti, an Dios la'a'ilhi tacha yu oxi lapanak.
48003007	Xliyu uxitnan task'iniya li k'ak'ats'aat'it li yu yu'uncha an Abraham sawalh tapu'a'p'unmintachalh yu'uncha an yu tajakiklaka'inin.
48003008	An tan ts'o'muk'akanta, an Dios mu ixk'atsaycha li an yu ntu judiojnin wachu kajamaxtuniya xtala'alhink'an yu katajakiklaka'inina, pus an Abraham mak'atsaanikalhi yu ma'anchacha aniy oxi chiwinti: "Ta kilhmakchux an lapanakni milakata uxint'i oxi katatsukuya'."
48003009	Pus, yu takiklaka'iy an Dios ali an Abraham oxi kajaxta'nikana jatsukunti, mu yucha kiklaka'ilh.
48003010	Yu yucha an xlamap'a'sin Moises taputa'alhtaxtuputun yu'uncha alini xtala'alhink'an. Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: "Ixchuxk'an yu ntu lhilhij ta'ilhtuy chux tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta an laka libro yu puwilh lhamap'a'sin, talhit'ajuni xtala'alhink'an."
48003011	Pus ts'awjcha tasuy li an Dios jantu xamati yu oxicha la'ts'in wa xliyu li ilhtuycha tacha an najunta laka lhamap'a'sin; mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: "Yu oxicha lapanak kala'ts'inkana la xjakiklaka'inti kapu'aklatsukuya'."
48003012	Chi an xlamap'a'sin an Moises jantu yu an jakiklaka'inti pumuktaxtukan, ancha wa najun: "Yu kalakmuktaxtu'oya ani lhamap'a'sin yucha kapu'aklatsukuya'."
48003013	An Cristo kintama'alhtaxtuncha akxni makxtukmuk'akalh laka k'iw tacha an xakintamama'alh'ajniputunan an lhamap'a'sin. Mu an lhamap'a'sin najun: "Wa tichicha yu kach'imuk'akana laka k'iw kama'alh'ajnalh".
48003014	Chuncha tapasalh para li an tacha sawalhcha oxi junikalh an Abraham li kaxta'nikana, yucha an Cristojo puxta'nikalh, jaxta'nikalhi masi yu ntu judiojnin. Chi li wachu kiklaka'iyawi an Dios akintaxta'niyani an Takuwin yu kintajunan li akintaxta'niyan.
48003015	Kint'ala'awnin, tacha chiwiniy yu wa lapanaki iklaxa'alayaw: Li tu'u tamakawkan, masi wa lapanaki yu ilhtuy, li ts'o'muk'alhcha xta'a'ut, jantucha xamati lay katilakt'ilhicho'olh u tu'u ka'a'lh'ulapalh.
48003016	Pus, chaway, an Dios junilhi an Abraham chi an yu kapula'awna li kajaxta'niya yu oxi. An tan ts'o'muk'akanta jantu najunta: "yu katapula'awnan, mu ntu xluwk'an, ancha wa najunta: "an yu kapula'awnan"; mu wa pumatam lapanak, yucha an Cristo.
48003017	Yu iknajun yucha aniy: An Dios t'atamakawlhi an Abraham, chi nawlhi li sawalh. Xliyu an xlamap'a'sin Moises yu 430 k'ata xli'astan chilh, jantu layi katimala'mixilhcha an yu tamakawkantacha ixchiwinti Dios yu najun li ka'ilhtuya'.
48003018	An Dios junilh an Abraham li kajaxta'niya yu laj'oxi tanlhun an xjas'at'an, chi ntu ixlakata li tamuktaxtuy an lhamap'a'sin; yu najun an Dios li yucha an Abrahami kaxta'niya wa chuncha, jantu ixlakata tu'u'.
48003019	Pus, ¿tisuncha lhitapalay an xlamap'a'sin an Moisesi? Yucha xli'astancha a'lh'ulakalh, para li kamasulh an tala'alhin. Wa ancha lhitapalalh sta akxni chilhcha an yu pula'awlh an Abraham yu jama'lhtayanalhcha an yu ixnajunta an Dios li kaxta'niya'. An lhamap'a'sin yucha an angelhnini tanawlh chi an Moises wa manawnikalhcha.
48003020	Pero ntu task'iniy xamati kamanawnikalhi akxni wa pumatam, chi an Dios wanaj yucha t'achiwinilh an Abraham.
48003021	¿Ani chu sna nawputun li an xlamap'a'sin an Moises wa t'alaxtukuycha an yu najun Dios li ka'ilhtuya'? Jantu. Mu li ka'ixta'kalh lhamap'a'sin yu ka'ixta'lhi jatsukunti, pus chuncha laycha oxi kaxput'a'aklatsukukalh an Dios li kaxmuktaxtukalhcha yu lhinajun an lhamap'a'sin.
48003022	Tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta, li ta lhichuxi ixtach'inin an tala'alhin, yuchacha ixlakata li najun an Dios li kajaxta'niya yu oxi an yu takiklaka'iy an Jesucristo.
48003023	Akxni ntuka' xkiklaka'iyaw an Jesucristo, ixtach'inin an xlamap'a'sin Moisesi ixjuntaw. Xpakxan'iyaw li kaxmasukalh an yu kiklaka'iyaw.
48003024	Yucha an lhamap'a'sini xakintala'ts'ilhi'antan, tachanu jas'at'an. Xakintamap'a'siyani li wa ixpakxan'iyawka an Cristo. Xli'astan kiklaka'iwcha an Cristo chunchacha yu oxicha put'a'aklatsukuw an Dios.
48003025	Chi chaway wa x'amancha li kakiklaka'iw an Jesucristo, jantucha ali la ixmakni an xlamap'a'sin Moisesi t'awnaw.
48003026	Mu li k'iklak'a'iyatcha an Cristo Jesús uxitnan xjas'at'ancha an Dios.
48003027	Chux uxitnan akxni a'p'axt'it t'at'ala'xt'o't'itcha an Cristo, yucha an Cristojch'a la'ch'it'it tacha la'atam la'ch'it.
48003028	Chaway tachanu ntucha xamati judio u griego, u yu wa putapatsakancha lapanak, u yu ntu xamati putapatsay, u lapanak, u t'aku'; mu chaway li t'at'ala'xt'o't'atcha an Cristo Jesús, chux uxitnan wa pumatamcha.
48003029	Chi li uxitnan ixnawinin an Cristo, pus uxitnan yucha an Abrahami p'u'a'p'unt'ant'achi'it ch'i k'ala'a'iya'it'iti yu an Dios najun li kaxt'a'a.
48004001	Yu iknawputun yucha aniy: Li xamati kama'axta'nikana chux ixtanlhun ixpay li jas'at'aka, wa xt'atamka an yu wa putapatsakancha lapanak, masi yucha jamanawin chux an tanlhun.
48004002	Ani jas'at'a wa ta'alinka lapanakni yu talhist'ak'a chi yu tala'ts'ilhi'aniy tuchini ilhtuycha, sta akxni li chincha panch'e'ex li an ixpay junicha li laycha ka'ilhtulh ix'akstu an tanlhun.
48004003	Chi chuncha tapasayaw kitnan. Kanajuw li akxni ntuka' ixjakiklaka'ininaw, tani yu xakinta'ulaniyachincha jatapast'ak'at an yu tach'alhkatnan laka un chunchacha ix'ilhtuyaw.
48004004	Pero akxni chilhcha an panch'e'ex, an Dios makmilhcha an isTs'alh, yu putsukulh pumatam t'aku chi x'asmat'a an xlamap'a'sin Moisés.
48004005	Chuncha kitsukuchilh para li akintama'alhtaxtuni kitnan yu xakinta'a'ch'apatan an lhamap'a'sin, para li an Dios akintala'a'ini tacha ixjas'at'ancha.
48004006	Chi para li kamasulhi li uxitnan ixjas'at'ancha, an Dios makmilhi la mijalhunutk'an an ixTakuwin an isTs'alh; chi an ixTakuwin p'asi chiwiniy, najun: "¡KimPay! ¡KimPay!"
48004007	Pus uxint'i ixjas'at'achak'at'i Dios, jantucha wa putapatsank'at'i. Chi mu chaway ixjas'at'achak'at'i Dios, yucha kaxta'niyancha an xintanlhun, yucha an Cristojo kapuxta'niyan.
48004008	Xlip'ulhnaj, akxni uxitnan jant'u ixmisp'ayat'it an Dios, yu'uncha an yu ntu diosnin sawalhi xtaputapatsayan.
48004009	Pero chaway li misp'ayatcha an Dios, u palay oxi kanajuw, li chaway tamispayancha an Dios, ¿tasu li a'tam k'a'ilht'up'ala'it'iti yu lhinajun an yu ntu k'ut'ilh chi wa jakilhpatinij lhich'alhk'atcha? ¿Tasu li a'tamcha yucha k'ak'iklak'a'ip'ala'it tacha lay yu wa putapatsakancha lapanaki?
48004010	Uxitnan k'aat'aniyatka tanlhun wilhchan chi tanlhun malhkuyu chi tanlhun panch'e'ex chi tanlhun k'ata.
48004011	Iknajun ta iknajun, o'palaj an kintapatsat wa paxkatcha kawalh chi ntu tu'u katalhitapalhnin.
48004012	Kint'ala'awnin, iklajunaw wanajcha chuni k'alat tacha kit'in, mu kit'in tacha uxitnani iklay. Jantu wa xliyu li tu'ucha yu ntu oxi kila'ilhtuniyaw.
48004013	Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'it, akxni xlip'ulhnajcha iklalhixa'alaw an yu puta'alhtaxtukan chiwinti, wa xliyu xakimama'alh'ajni tuchichun ta'an'at an la kilakatunaj.
48004014	Chi an ta'an'at an yu iklhitsukulh kilhila'ts'intanulh, pero jantu xliyu uxitnan kilala'amaj'awcha u ntucha akilala'ts'imputu. Apalij, kilala'a'iw tacha pumatam ix'angelh an Dios; tachanu wanajcha kit'ini Jesucristo kilala'a'iw.
48004015	¿Tanisch'a mak'ap'it an achat t'ach'a an ixlit'awnat'iti? Milakatak'an layi iknajun, li wa kaxlalhcha uxitnan sta masi k'axlakt'ap'axt'ut amila'chulhk'an xakilaxta'niw.
48004016	Chi chaway, ¿chu sna mint'alaxkaychak'ani ijkunlhi wa xliyu li iklajuniw an yu sawalh?
48004017	Anchunu lapanakni sawalhcha talhakapu'anani uxitnan, pero li chuncha talay jantu wa xliyu li wa tamapayniyancha. Yu yu'uncha talakask'in li akilamakaju, para li xli'astan uxitnan yu'unch'ach'a k'ajalhak'ap'up'it.
48004018	Pus oxicha, oxi li lhilhij k'alhak'ap'up'it yu oxi, masi akxni ntu an iklat'awilhcha'aw.
48004019	Kijas'at'an, a'tam iklalhima'alh'ajnant'awpalaw, tacha akxni xamati xanati ma'alh'ajnan akxni jamas'at'anan; chi ali akma'alh'ajnana sta li oxich'a k'a'unt'it tacha an Cristo.
48004020	Wa laycha li aklala'cha'awcha wanaj wa chaway, para li lay tam aklaxa'alaw; mu chaway tu ijk'atsay tani aklalhipastakwicha.
48004021	Uxitnan yu an xlamap'a'sin Moises ilht'up'ut'unat, ¿jant'u asmatt'at'iti yu najun anchunu lhamap'a'sin?
48004022	Ancha najun li an Abraham xt'uyunk'an ists'alani jalhitsukulh: pumatam ists'alh yu wa xputapatsaycha t'aku lhitsukunilh, chi an pumatam yucha an yu ixt'iwi tukani t'alhitsukulh, ani t'aku yucha jantu xamati wa xputapatsaycha.
48004023	An ists'alh an t'aku an yu wa ixputapatsakancha wa chunchacha pula'awlh tacha lhichux pula'awkan, pero an ists'alh an t'aku an yu ntu wa ixputapatsakancha yucha la'awlh para li katapasalhi tacha an ixnajunta an Dios li ka'ilhtuya'.
48004024	Aniy tacha la'atam pulhamacha'xan. An Dios a't'uyi jat'atamakawlh an ixlapanakni, yucha jumputun an ixt'uyunk'an t'akunin. La'atam aniy chiwinti yu an Dios jat'atamakawlh an ixlapanakni para li kata'ilhtulh an xlamap'a'sin Moisés, jat'atamakawlh lakatam a'stitawk'a tan junkan Sinaí. Yucha, yucha an Agarcha lhimalakxtukan. Yu yucha an Agar tapula'ajun yu'uncha para li wa kajaputapatsakanacha.
48004025	Mu an Agar lhitalakxtuy an a'stitawk'a Sinaí yu wilh Arabia, xliyu an ixlapanakni an Jerusalén tachanu xjas'at'an an Agar yu tamuktaxtuputun an xlamap'a'sin Moisés.
48004026	Pero an Jerusalén yu talhman juntachalh yucha ntu xamati wa putapatsaycha, chi kitnan yucha ixjas'at'an.
48004027	Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: Uxint'i yu nt'u lay jalhits'uk'uy mijas'at'an k'a'ach'a; k'at'asa la mi'achat, uxint'i nt'u k'ats'ayi tani xkaycha akxni jamas'at'anankan. Mu palay lhuwi kajalhitsukuya ixjas'at'an an t'aku yu wa la'amaj'ankalhcha, walh jantu an yu lhit'ajun ixt'apapa'.
48004028	Kint'ala'awnin, kitnan tacha an Isaac; kitnan tsukuw mu ixnajunta an Dios li katsukuyaw.
48004029	Tsukulhcha an ists'alh an Agar yu wa tacha wa xamaticha lapanak tsukuy, chi xli'astan ixlitama'chapuycha an yu la xtalakask'i xTakuwin Dios la'awlh, chuncha wachu tapasay chaway.
48004030	Pero ¿tasucha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta? ancha najunta: "K'at'amakxt'u ma'spa an yu wa putapatsakancha t'aku ali an ists'alh, mu an ists'alh an yu wa putapatsakancha t'aku jantu lay katit'alhitsukulhi an xtanlhun xpay an ists'alh an t'aku an yu ntu wa putapatsakancha."
48004031	Pus chuncha kint'ala'awnin, kitnan tu ixjas'at'an an yu wa putapatsakancha t'aku', kitnan ixjas'at'an an yu ntu wa putapatsakancha t'aku'.
48005001	An Cristo kintama'alhtaxtun para li ntu xamati wa akintaputapatsancha. Lajk'ut'ilincha chuncha k'alak'aklats'uk'ut, jantucha wa a'tam k'ap'ut'ap'ats'ap'alhk'ant'it.
48005002	Akila'asmatniw. Kit'in ikPablo, iklajunaw li uxitnan ilht'uyat'iti tacha an talay an yu jalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkan ix'a'axt'a'ak'an, an Cristo jantu tu'u katitalhitapalhnin.
48005003	A'tam ijkumputumpalayi wa tichicha lapanak yu akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkan, yucha o'sliyani li kamuktaxtulhi an xlamap'a'sin Moises.
48005004	Uxitnan yu lhiwilayat'it li oxicha t'at'alaxt'o'at an Dios wa xliyu li ilht'uyatcha an xlamap'a'sin Moises, mak'awt'atcha an Cristo, mak'awt'atcha an ixjamapayninti an Dios.
48005005	Mu kitnan, an laka Takuwin chi an laka jakiklaka'inti, yucha pupakxan'iyaw li oxi kat'atala'xt'o'aw an Dios.
48005006	Chi li t'atala'xto'tawi an Cristo Jesus, jantu tu'u lhitapalay li ak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalh u jantu. Yu lhitapalay li kajakiklaka'iniw, chi li ani jakiklaka'inti akinta'ilhtuni li laka jamapayninti katsuku.
48005007	Uxitnan oxich'a ixp'int'at. ¿tisiyuchacha ta'ilhtun li nt'uch'a k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti an yu sawalhi?
48005008	T'ach'a ani layat jantu yu an yu tat'asaniyani chuncha ta'ilhtuyan.
48005009	Jant'u k'ak'apt'iti li "masi wa lakats'uni lhamaskajan wanaj maskaja'ojoyi an jax'ot'anti harina."
48005010	Kit'in ijkiklaka'iya an Jamach'alhkat li uxitnan jant'u k'at'imap'axat'iti mijatapast'ak'atk'an; pero an Dios kamama'alh'ajniya an lapanak yu wa tamama'tijlayancha, wa tichicha lapanak.
48005011	Yu kit'ini kint'ala'awnin, li xaklhinawlhka li kach'uk'up'uxkalhi a'axt'a'a, an judiojnin jantu xakintach'a'o'alh para li akintalhitama'chapulh; mu chuncha, an tacha lhichiwiniy an ixcruz an Jesus jantu xkay kaxta'asmatlhi.
48005012	Pero anchunu lapanakni yu tama'achapuyan ixlakata an ixch'uk'up'uxka a'axt'a'a, apalijcha katach'uk'upux'olhi yu'uncha wa xawa'a'tamcha.
48005013	Mu uxitnani kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan t'asanik'ant'it li jantu wa xamaticha kataputapatsan. Wa x'aman jantu xliyu li ntucha wa xamati taputapatsayan chaway wa t'ani k'alatcha; apalij wa k'alat'at'ap'ats'ap'axatcha wa ixlakata li lamap'aynip'axayat.
48005014	Mu chux an lhamap'a'sin wa yucha aniya yu pu'uktaxtuy: "K'amap'ayniya'a mint'alapanak t'ach'a akst'umap'aynik'an."
48005015	Pero li wa mi'astuchak'ani lats'ak'ap'axayat ch'i la'up'axayat, k'ajalajk'ats'anant'it jantu junita wa mi'akstuchak'an wachu k'alalakt'ilhit'it.
48005016	Yucha aniya yu iklajunaw: Tacha lakask'in an Takuwini k'ats'uk'ut'it, walh lani chuncha jant'u k'at'its'uk'ut'iti yu wa tacha an milakatunajchak'an lakask'in.
48005017	Mu yu wa yucha an lakatunajcha chuncha lakask'in yucha jantu t'alala'ts'imputuni an ixTakuwin Dios, chi an ixTakuwin Dios jantu t'alala'ts'imputun wachu an yu wa lakatunajcha chuncha lakask'in. Jantu talala'ts'imputumpaxay, pus xliyu nt'u lay lhi'ilht'uyat yu ilht'up'ut'unat uxitnan.
48005018	Pero li yucha an Takuwini yu tamalhtanatan, pus chuncha ntucha yu an lhamap'a'sini ta'a'ch'apatan.
48005019	Jantu lhima'anxkayi k'ala'ts'i an tanlhun yu talak'ilht'uy an lapanakni yu wa yucha an ixlakatunajchak'an chuncha ta'asmatni: wa aya talay, talat'atamayi masi yu ntu talat'at'ajun, ta'ilhtuyi masi yu ntu laj'oxi,
48005020	tacha ixdioschak'ani tala'ts'in an wa tanlhuncha chi tajachawanan. Talatalh'amnipaxay, talasapaxay, talalhixkaypaxay tu'u, talama'talh'aman, talaxkaypaxay, tatala'apitsiy chi lakatamincha tata'ayxt'o'a.
48005021	Sawalhcha tajaxkayanan, tajama'ninin, tala't'a'ap'ay chi wa sawalhcha talakwajin chi tanlhuncha ali yu tacha aniya talak'ilhtuy. Iklajunaw, yu tacha iklajuntawcha xlip'ulhnaj, yu chuncha talay tacha an iklajuniw jantu katitacha'alhi an la xlich'alhkat Dios.
48005022	Pero an ixTakuwin Dios yucha ilhtuy li kajamapayniniw, li ka'achaw, li oxi katawlaw, li xlak'anti ka'ilhtuw an tanlhun, li oxi kajala'ts'iw an ali'in, li oxi lapanaki kajunwi, li kamuktaxtuwi an tanlhun,
48005023	li kajakilhpatinijk'ats'aw chi li ntu ka'ilhtuwi yu ntu oxi. Yu tacha aniy tanlhun jantu tu'u lhamap'a'sini yu lay kanawlh li ntucha oxi yu ilhtut'awkan.
48005024	Chi yu ixnawinin an Cristo, yu'uncha taxtukmuk'atacha an ixlakatunajk'an ali an wa tachalayjcha laktanlhun jatapast'ak'at.
48005025	Li yucha an Takuwincha put'awnaw, pus wanajcha chun yuchacha kamakawniw li yuchacha akintama'ilhtuy yu ilhtuyaw.
48005026	Jantu kalaj'ayajk'atsaw, para li ntu kalama'talh'ampaxaw, chi ntu kalaxkaypaxaw.
48006001	Kint'ala'awnin, li xamati a'taymakan li tu'u ilhtuy tala'alhin, uxitnan mu la'a'it'at'iti an xTakuwin Dios, k'a'a't'ay'ut'it, para li ka'ostayalh. Pero laka jakilhpatinij jalhunuti k'a'ilht'ut'it, chi atamjtamin k'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, jantu junita uxitnan wach'u k'alhila'ts'int'anuk'ant'it.
48006002	K'ala'a't'ay'up'axat'iti atamjtamin la mintak'uk'atk'an, walh lani chuncha k'amukt'axt'uya'it'iti an xlamap'a'sin Cristo.
48006003	Mu li xamati k'atsan li tu'u lhitapalay, masi ntu tu'u lhitapalay, wa ix'akstucha o'xcho'okan.
48006004	Atamj atamjcha kala'ts'ilh tani yu t'ajuncha; walh lani li achan, wa ix'akstucha kama'an'achakalh jantu xamati kat'aalamaaklhkaakalh.
48006005	Mu atamj atami kak'uk'aya tuchini yu ilhtulhcha.
48006006	Yu malanikani an ixchiwinti Dios kat'alaxta'nilhcha chux yu laj'oxi tanlhun an yu malanit'ajun.
48006007	Jant'u wa k'a'akst'u'o'xch'o'ok'ant'itcha: jantu xamati lay kati'o'xcho'olh an Dios. Tuchini yu ch'ancha an lapanak wachucha yucha kama'alaya'.
48006008	Li xamati lapanak past'ak'a ilhtuputun yu ntu oxi, tachanu ch'anch'a xlinin. Pero li ch'an yu yucha an Takuwin achaniy, an Takuwin kaxta'niya jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
48006009	Pus tu kala'lho'owi ka'ilhtuw yu laj'oxi, mu li ntu t'iya' katilaw, wanajcha wa ixpanch'e'exi akxni kajap'uxnunaw.
48006010	Xliyu a'tamincha akxni lay, tu'u kaja'ilhtuniw yu oxi wa tichicha. Chi yu palay kaja'ilhtuniw yu oxi yu'uncha an yu wachu takiklaka'iy Dios.
48006011	K'ala'ts'int'iti tacha wanajcha laj'ay jats'o'nut iklats'o'niyaw la kimaka'.
48006012	An yu tajunan li k'alaj'ak'axwililich'uk'up'uxk'ant'it wa xliyu wa oxicha tat'alalhi'amputun an lapanakni, jantu tala'a'iya li kajalhimama'alh'ajnikalhi ixlakata an xcruz Cristo.
48006013	Mu an yu jalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkan jantu ta'ilhtuyi an lhamap'a'sin. Pero yu'uncha talakask'in li k'alak'ak'axwililich'uk'up'uxk'ant'it, para li yu'uncha laycha katalhita'ayalh li tamatanunincha li ch'unch'ach'a k'a'ilht'ut milakatunajk'an.
48006014	Pero yu kit'in jantu tu'u iklhita'ayaputun wa yucha an tacha nilh an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo an laka cruz. Mu an la ixcruz an Cristo, an lakamunulhpa para kit'in nitacha, chi kit'in iknitacha para an lakaamunulhpa'.
48006015	Mu li t'atala'xto'tawcha an Cristo Jesus, jantucha tu'u lhitapalay li yu akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta u jantu; yu lhitapalay li tumpajcha lapanakni kajunwi.
48006016	Katala'a'ilhcha oxi jatawlhnat chi jamapayninti ixchuxk'an yu tacha anicha lhamap'a'sin taput'ajun, chi ixchuxk'an an yu ixlapanakni Dios sawalh.
48006017	Chaway ati'anta jantu ikla'a'iy li xamati tu'u lhima'anxkay aki'ilhtunilh; mu an tacha iklakamakaxtacha masuycha li kit'in ikt'atapatsayi an Jamach'alhkat Jesus.
48006018	Kint'ala'awnin, an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo minchuxchak'ani katamapaynin. Chunchacha kawalh.
49001001	Kit'in, ikPablo, la ixtalakask'i an Diosi li an Jesucristo kimala'achay ak'alh lhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti. Ijkats'o'niy ani kartaj an yu ixlapanakni an Dios chi yu takiklaka'iy an Jesucristo, yu tawilananchalh an la'acha'an Éfeso.
49001002	Katamapaynin chi kataxta'nini an oxi jatawlhnat an Dios yu kimPayk'an chi ixPay an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
49001003	Ayi kala'ts'iw an Dios yu ixPay an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo, mu yucha kintamakminicha'ani awint'i lakt'iyan chux yu ma'lhtask'iniy kintakuwink'an, yucha an Cristojo kintalhiminin.
49001004	An Dios kintapusakxtuni an Cristo sta akxni ntuka' ix'ilhtukan an lakamunulhpa', para li la'stalan'ani katsukuw la ix'ukxlakapu chi ntu tu'u kintala'alhink'an kajunlhi.
49001005	La ixjamapayninti kintasakxtuni sta ma'anchacha, para li kajunwi tacha isas'at'ancha yucha, yucha an Jesucristojo kintapusakxtun, tacha yu yuchacha lakask'ilh.
49001006	Xliyu chaway lhilhijcha oxi lhichiwininaw an Dios, mu yucha kintamapayniyan, yucha kintala'a'itancha ixlakata an isTs'alh, yu mapayniy.
49001007	An Dios kintama'alhtaxtutancha ixlakata li maj'alh xak'alhni an isTs'alh, kintamala'mixinini kintala'alhink'an ixlakata li sawalh ayi xjamapayninti.
49001008	An Dios sawalhcha stak kintamasunitani ixjamapayninti, kintaxta'niyani chux jatapast'ak'at chi li lay kalhimacha'xaw yu kintajunan.
49001009	Kintamasunincha yu sa'cha xpastakta ix'akstu ka'ilhtuya', yu ntu wa xamaticha lay xk'atsay, chi ixpastaktacha li yucha an Cristojo yu chuncha kapu'ilhtuya'.
49001010	Chux yu ilhtuputun, ts'ajwi ka'uktaxtuya akxni kachinacha ixpaku'. An Dios la ixmaknicha an Jesucristojo kajama'axta'oya chux an tanlhun, kajamala'xt'o'acha yu lak'alin an lakt'iyan chi yu lak'alin an lakaat'un.
49001011	Yucha an Cristojo kintapusakxtun an Dios para li kala'a'iwi yu tajama'tayanan an xjas'at'an Dios. Yucha chunchacha ixpastakta. Yucha ilhtuy an tanlhun li katapasalh tacha yu yuchacha lakask'in.
49001012	Chuncha ilhtulh para li kitnan yu p'ulhnajcha kiklaka'iw an Cristo, kilakatak'an oxi kalhichiwinkalh an Dios, mu yucha ay.
49001013	Chi uxitnan wachu', akxni asmatt'itcha an chiwinti yu sawalh, yu lhichiwiniy ta'alhtaxtut, ch'i k'iklak'a'it'itcha an Cristo, uxitnan t'at'ala'xt'o't'itcha an Cristo ch'i seyojlak'ant'itcha li ixnawinincha an Diosi uxitnan. Yucha an Stalan'a ixTakuwini tapuseyojlan tacha ixnajunta li kataxta'niyan.
49001014	Yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini yu putasuy li sawalhi li kajama'lhtayananaw an yu tajama'lhtayanan xjas'at'an Dios akxni kajala'tsayacha kajama'alhtaxtuya an yu ixlapanakni, para li oxi kalhichiwinkalh ixlakata li yucha ay.
49001015	Xliyu kit'in, akxni ijk'atsaalhi t'ach'a an k'iklak'a'iyat an Jamach'alhkat Jesus, ch'i t'ach'a an jamap'ayniyat ixchuxk'an an yu tach'a'o'ay Dios,
49001016	jantu a'tami li ntucha akxta'lhi lhimala'puchajun milakatak'an. Akxni iktapayniy, iklapast'ak'aw.
49001017	Iksk'iniya an yu ay Dios, ixPay an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo, li kataxta'nini jatapast'ak'at yu xt'a'a an xTakuwin, para li k'alhimach'a'xat'iti yu tamasuniyan chi palay oxi k'amisp'at.
49001018	Iksk'iniya an Dios li katamapulhkunini lamijatapast'ak'atk'an, para li k'ak'ats'at'iti tuchini talhit'asanitancha, tuchini p'akxan'iyatcha, chi ay sawalh chi oxi tukani an yu jaxta'niy an Dios an ixlapanakni.
49001019	Chi ay tukan sawalh chi ntu min'ojoyi an ix'alhp'asninti, yucha yu kintamalhtanatan la kijatsukuntik'an yu kiklaka'iyawcha. Ani alhp'asninti wanajcha yu yu sawalhcha tachapun chi alhp'asni masulh an Dios
49001020	akxni mala'awnicho'olh an Cristo, chi ilhtulhcha li kapiktutawlhchalhcha tan oxi ixpa'xti an lakt'iyan.
49001021	Yuchacha ilhtulh li yuchacha tukani yu xa'aycha chux jamach'alhkat kajunlhi chi li yuchacha yu kalhinawlh chi li wa yucha yu ay tukan an ixta'a'ut kajunlhi yu chaway ani t'awkan chi yu ka'alinaka'.
49001022	An Dios chux an tanlhun la ixjach'aja an Cristojo mama'olh, chi jajunikalh an yu takiklaka'icha Dios li an Cristo yucha yu ay tukan Jamach'alhkat, watuchicha ixlakata yucha yu ay.
49001023	Mu an yu tajakiklaka'inin yu'uncha ixlakatunaj an Cristo, chi yucha an Cristojo yu tapula'a'i'ojoy an tanlhun, mu yucha an Cristojo yu lhit'aw'ojoy chux an tanlhun.
49002001	Xlip'ulhnaj uxitnan ixlaknit'at'it ixlakata an tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi ix'ilht'uyat'it chi ixlakata mintala'alhink'an.
49002002	Uxitnan wa yuch'ach'a xlak'ilht'uyat yu ntu laj'oxi yu xtamasuniyan an lapanakni aniy lakamunulhpa'. Ixk'iklak'a'iyat'iti an xapay makxkay'un yu ch'alhkatnan an laka un yu jach'alhkatnani an yu ntu takiklaka'iy Dios.
49002003	Tacha yu'uncha wanajcha chuni kitnan kinchuxk'an ixt'awnaw, x'ilhtuyawcha yu ntu oxi tacha yu ixk'atsanawcha, chi ix'ilhtuyawcha yu ixlakask'in an kilakatunajk'an chi yu ixpast'ak'aw. Tacha an ixlayaw, sawalhcha ixt'acha'anawi li kaxla'a'iwi an alhp'as xjamama'alh'ajninti an Dios, tacha an ali'in.
49002004	Pero an Dios sawalhcha jamapayninin chi kintamapaynini la ixjamapayninti yu ay,
49002005	akxni ixlaknitawka ixlakata an kintala'alhink'an kintaxta'nini jatsukunti akxni la'awcho'olh an Cristo. Wa xjamapayninticha an Diosi li la'a'it'at an ta'alhtaxtut.
49002006	Chi an Dios wa ayxtamcha kintat'amala'awnicho'on an Cristo Jesús, chi wa lakatamcha kintat'a'ulacha'an an lakt'iyan.
49002007	Chunchacha ilhtulh para li ma'an katasuya an ixjamapayninti chi li oxi kintala'ts'inan ixlakata an Cristo Jesús.
49002008	Mu ixlakata xjamapayninti an Diosi li t'a'alht'axt'ut'it, ixlakata li jak'iklak'a'ininat. Jantu wa xliyu li wa mi'akstuchak'ani k'ama'alht'axt'uk'ant'it, yucha an Diosi tama'alhtaxtuyan.
49002009	Chi ntu wa xliyu li sna wa oxicha tanlhun k'alak'ilht'ut, para li ntu xamati lay kalhita'ayalh.
49002010	Mu yucha an Diosi yu kinta'ilhtutan, yucha an Cristojo kintapu'ilhtun, para li yu laj'oxi tanlhuni ka'ilhtuw, tacha yu an Dios chunchacha o'sliyan ixla'apula'ts'ilhkata li chuncha katsukuw.
49002011	K'ap'ast'akt'it, uxitnan yu ntu israelitajnin jantu ixlapanakni Diosi x'unt'at'it, mu ch'unch'a ts'uk'ut'it. Uxitnan jantu xwililich'uk'up'uxnik'ant'at'iti mi'a'axt'a'ak'an xliyucha jantu oxi xtalhila'ts'inan an judiojnin yu chuncha tajunita.
49002012	Ma'anchacha ixjuntachalh jant'u ixt'at'ala'xt'o't'at'iti an Cristo, jant'u xjat'at'ala'xt'o't'at'iti an xalapanakni Israel chi uxitnan tu tu'u xlima'p'ut'e'ek'anat tacha an xtamakawkanta li ka'ilhtuya an Dios. Ani lakamunulhpa, jant'u t'u'u xlit'awnat an Dios ch'i nt'u t'u'u ixp'akxan'iyat.
49002013	Pero chaway, li t'at'ala'xt'o't'atcha an Cristo Jesús, ixlakata tacha an maj'alh ixjak'alhni, uxitnan li ma'at xt'awnachi'it chaway wa nich'a t'awnat'it.
49002014	An Cristo yucha kintaxta'niyan oxi jatawlhnat. Yucha kintat'amala'xto'niy judiojnin chi yu ntu judiojnin. Lakt'ilhilhi an axi yu kixtamala'apitsitan. Li nilh, chuncha puma'osulh li wa xlaxkayaw.
49002015	Ilhtulhi li ntucha tu'u ka'alilh an lhamap'a'sin yu tanlhun ixlaklhinajun li kax'ilhtukalh, chi ilhtulhi li an kilhmakt'uy lapanakni wa kilhmaktamcha katapujunlhi an Cristo, chunchacha kintapuxta'nin an oxi jatawlhnat.
49002016	Yucha lakt'ilhilh la ixlakatunaj tacha an ixlaxkayaw an kilhmakt'uy lapanakni, chi li nilh an laka cruz chunchacha oxi lala'ts'incho'o, oxicha t'alalhi'ancho'o an Dios, wa la'atamcha lakatunaja junwi.
49002017	An Cristo milh para li akintalhiminin ta kinchuxk'an laj'oxi chiwinti yu oxi putawlhkan, para uxitnan yu ma'at ixt'awnat la ix'ukxlakapu Dios chi kitnan yu waniy xakt'awnaw.
49002018	Yucha an Cristojo kinchuxk'an lay wa niy pula'cha'anaw an kimPayk'an, wa la'atam Takuwini yu pula'cha'anaw.
49002019	Xliyu chaway uxitnan jantucha wa xamati'in lapanakni, xlip'ulhnaj jant'u xjat'at'ala'xt'o't'at'iti an ixlapanakni Dios, chaway tacha an jaxta'nikan an ixlapanakni Dios wachucha mi'anuk'an, wachucha ixjas'at'an Diosi chaway.
49002020	Uxitnan tachanu yu yawkanta a'atam cha'a', yu pumach'atakanta ani cha'a yu'uncha an yu jamala'achalh an Jesucristo chi an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi an Jesucristo yucha yu tukancha xachiwx an ixma'ats'astu ani cha'a'.
49002021	Xlakata yucha kitnan tachanu a'atam cha'a yu oxi la'xto'ojoy, chi yucha ilhtuy li kata'ayalh chi li stalan'a kawalh an xtajtan an Jamach'alhkat.
49002022	Uxitnan wachu yucha an Cristojo p'u'unt'it la'atam xtajtan an Dios, an ixTakuwin taput'awnan.
49003001	Kit'in ikPablo ikmalaklhchawkanta ixlakata an Cristo Jesus, wa xliyu li iklalhixa'alayaw an ixchiwinti Dios uxitnan yu ntu judiojnin.
49003002	Ka o'sliyanch'a li asmatt'atcha an tapatsat yu k'ilhtuy. An Dios la ixjamapayninti kixta'nilhi ani tapatsat para li akla'a'tayju.
49003003	Yucha kimasunilh tani yu sa'cha xpastakta ka'ilhtuya yu ntu xamati xk'atsay, tacha p'ulhnaj klats'o'niw lakats'uni.
49003004	Li p'unawt'at'iti yu ikts'o'lhi, oxi k'ak'ats'aya'it tacha ikpumispalh an chiwinti yu wa sa' xma'akanta yu xlichiwiniy an Cristo.
49003005	Yu ta wananchacha ixjuntachalh tacha an sa' ixpastakta an Dios jantu jamasunikalhi an lapanakni, pero chaway an Dios jamasunitacha laka Takuwin an ixlapanakni yu jamala'achalh li kata'alh lhichiwinin an xchiwinti.
49003006	Yucha aniya an yu sa' ixpastakta ka'ilhtuya an Dios: An yu ntu judiojnin wanajcha chuni kajaxta'niya yu oxi tacha kajaxta'niya yu oxi an yu judiojnin. An judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin taala'xto'nuncha tacha lakatunaj. Wa tamcha tala'a'iy tacha an nawlh an Dios li ka'ilhtuya ixlakata an Cristo Jesús, mu takiklaka'ilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti.
49003007	Xlakata an ixjamapayninti an Diosi li ki'ilhtulh xma'tsuku' chi iklhichiwiniycha an laj'oxi xchiwinti. La ix'alhp'asninti an Diosi ikpula'a'ilh ani tapatsat.
49003008	Tacha an tat'ajun an ixlapanakni Dios masi kit'ini yu ntu palay iklhitapalay, an Dios kimapaynilh chi ki'ilhtulhi li ajkamasunilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti an yu ntu judiojnin, ixlakata an laj´oxi xtanlhun an Cristo yu ntu lay la'mispa'okan.
49003009	An tapatsat yu kilhijunilh an Dios yucha li oxi ajkamasunilh chux an lapanakni yu ka'ilhtuya'. Mu yucha yu lak'ilhtu'ojota chux an yu lak'alin, ma'anchacha sa' ixpastakta yu ka'ilhtuya'.
49003010	Chuncha tapasalh para li chux an jamach'alhkatni chi an yu tach'alhkatnan an lakt'iyan katala'ts'ilhi li wa tami tak'atsay an ixlapanakni Dios, chuncha katapumispaya an tipaspit chi an lhuw tukan ixjatapast'ak'at an Dios.
49003011	Chunchacha putapasay an yu o'sliyancha chuncha ixpastakta an Dios, yucha an Cristo Jesusi pu'ilhtulh, an kiJamach'alhkatk'an.
49003012	Li kiklaka'iyaw an Cristo, chunchacha lay wa niy kala'cha'anaw la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios jantu katilaktalhanaw.
49003013	Xliyu iklalhitapaynisk'iniyaw li nt'u k'at'iya' lhilat'iti ixlakata an laktanlhun lhima'alh'ajna yu klaklhitayaniy kit'in milakatak'an. Apalij oxi para uxitnani tacha an ikla'ma'alh'ajnan.
49003014	Xliyu iklhitatso'ottay para li aktapayninilhi an kimPayk'an,
49003015	yu pula'a'iyaw kinta'a'utk'an chux yu ixlapanak juntaw, an lakt'iyan chi aniy lakaat'un.
49003016	Iksk'iniya an Dios li an la ixTakuwin chi an la ix'alhp'asninti yu minachalh an laka laj'oxi ixtanlhun, katalak'ut'ilini uxitnan la ixpulakni mijatsukuntik'an,
49003017	para li ixlakata an mijakiklaka'intik'an an Cristo la mijalhunutk'ani katsukulh, chi la mijatsukuntik'an k'ap'ut'ach'an'aknut'iti an xjamapayninti Cristo.
49003018	Chi chuncha laych'a k'ajat'alhimach'a'xat ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'iy Dios tani xlipu'aycha chi tani xlilhmancha chi tani xlitalhmancha chi tani xliputalhmancha an xjamapayninti Cristo.
49003019	Pus iklhitapaynisk'iniy li k'amisp'at'iti an jamapayninti, yu pu'ini'ojota watuchicha jatapast'ak'at, para li k'alhits'uk'u'o'ot'iti yu lhit'ajun an Dios.
49003020	An ix'alhp'asninti Dios yu kintamalaklayan yucha layi palay lhuw tanlhun lak'ilhtuy yu ntu lay a'tam sk'inaw u yu ntu past'ak'aw kask'inwi.
49003021	An Dios ayi kala'ts'inkalh kilakatak'an yu kiklaka'iyaw, chi ixlakata an Cristo Jesús, wa ta wanancha chi ixpujun'alhincha. Chunchacha kawalh.
49004001	Xliyu kit'in yu ikmalaklhchawkanta ixlakata an Jamach'alhkat, iklatapaynisk'iniyaw li oxi k'ats'uk'ut'it tacha katatsukulhcha yu yucha an Dioscha jat'asanita, tacha uxitnan.
49004002	K'ajak'ilhp'at'inijk'ats'at'it chi oxi k'ajala'ts'int'it an ali'in, xlak'anti laka jamapayninti k'alalhit'ayanip'axat,
49004003	k'at'at'axt'unit'iti k'at'ala'xt'o't'it an laka Stalan'a Takuwin ch'i oxi k'alalhip'it, mu chuncha yu p'ut'ala'xt'o'at'it minchuxk'an.
49004004	Wa la'atam lakatunaja juntaw chi wa la'atam Takuwini lhit'awnaw, tacha an Dios wa la'atam tuchichuni talhit'asanitan li k'ap'akxan'it.
49004005	Wa pumatam Jamach'alhkati alin, wa la'atam jakiklaka'inti, wa la'atam a'paxat.
49004006	Wa pumatam Diosi alin chi yucha kimPayk'an kinchuxk'an. Yucha yu wanaj kinchuxk'an jantu xamati taymata, kinchuxk'ani kintapu'ilhtuyan tu'u chi kinchuxk'ani kintaput'awnan.
49004007	Pero atamjtamin kitnan la xjamapayninti an Cristo kintaxta'nitani yu lay ka'ilhtuw.
49004008	Xliyu lhinajunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta an ixchiwinti Dios: Akxni tach'ixlicha an talhman jalhi'alhi an yu ixjama'alhilakanta, chi tipaspitcha tapatsati jaxta'nilh an lapanakni.
49004009	¿Tisu nawputuncha li tach'ixlicha? Nawputun li p'ulhnaj ta'alhtajulhi an lakaat'un.
49004010	Chi an yu ta'alhtajulh wanajcha yu an yu talhman tukan tach'ixli an lakt'iyan para li chuxi kala'apula'tsamachalh.
49004011	Chi wanajcha yu yu ja'ilhtulh ali'in yu jamala'achalh an Jesús chi ali'in yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios ma'anchacha, ali'in li katalhichiwinilh an laj'oxi chiwinti, ali'in ja'ilhtulh li katalhistaklhi an yu takiklaka'icha an Dios chi ali'in yu tajamatalaninin.
49004012	Chunchacha yu jamala'asijnilhcha an ixlapanakni Dios, para li katat'atapatsalhcha chi tachapuncha katawalh mu yu'uncha ixlakatunaj Cristo.
49004013	Ani tapatsat kataylhi'ana sta li kinchuxchak'an wa laka la'atamcha jakiklaka'inti kaputala'xt'o'aw chi wa tamcha kamispayaw an isTs'alh Dios. Kataylhi'awi kala'ta'ayaw sta li kat'acha'anawcha kak'at'ayaw tacha an Cristo, chi wachucha chuni oxi katsukuw tacha yucha.
49004014	Chuncha ntucha wa tacha jas'at'ani katilaw yu wa lascha tam tapastakpalay chi jala'xa'alhi'ancha an xa'un watuchicha yu tumpaj jatapast'ak'at sta li ja'o'xcho'okancha, mu tat'ajuni lapanakni yu sawalhcha lay taja'o'xcho'onun yu ntu oxi tij tat'ajun.
49004015	Apalij kalhichiwiniw an yu sawalh, laka jamapayninti. Chuncha kak'at'ayaw chi tacha an Cristojo kajunaw wa laka tuchicha jatapast'ak'at, an Cristo yucha xa'a'tsulh
49004016	chi chux an lakatunaj yucha malhtanay. Yucha pula'xto'ojoy chux an xalaktanlhun an lakatunaj, chi sa'cha tala'xto'nun. La'atamj la'atamj xalaktanlhun an lakatunaj ilhtuycha yu xli'ilhtut, chi chuncha, chux an lakatunaj ta'ayaycha, chi yucha an jamapayninti tachapun pujun.
49004017	Ani yu aklajunaw yucha an Jamach'alhkati jamak'atsaaninin: jant'uch'a ali ch'uni k'alat tacha an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin, mu yu'uncha wa yucha an yu ntu oxi ixjatapast'ak'atk'ani tapu'ilhtuy li tu'u'.
49004018	Yu'uncha jantu tu'u tak'aktsay chi ntu talhimacha'xay; jantu ta'asmatputuni yu jajunkan. Xliyu ma'ati tamakajunta an jatsukunti yu minta, yu kaxt'a'a an Dios.
49004019	Jantucha tu'u yu oxi tapast'ak'a wa lhilakatijtamcha yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhuni talak'ilhtuy. Palay palay tatama'axt'a'a ta'ilhtuy chux tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi.
49004020	Pero uxitnan an yu laklanit sawalh tam, yu tamasunin an Cristo.
49004021	Ijk'atsayi li uxitnan la'a'itcha an ixchiwinti ch'i laklanitcha an yu sawalh, yu masuy an Jesús.
49004022	Masunik'ant'it li k'amak'a'unt'itcha xalakatijla an jatsukunti yu xlit'awnat xlip'ulhnaj. An yu p'ulhnaj jatsukunti xlit'awnat wa palay palay ix'ilhtuyi yu ntu oxi, ixlakata an tanlhun yu k'ap'ast'akt'i lhi'ilhtuputu yu wa ja'o'xcho'onuncha.
49004023	K'at'ap'axatcha la mintakuwink'an chi la mijatapast'ak'atk'an.
49004024	Sast'icha lapanakni k'a'unt'it, la mijatsukunti'an katasulhcha tani xlanticha Dios, ts'ajwi k'ats'uk'ut chi la'stalan'ancha k'a'unt'it.
49004025	K'amak'a'unt'itcha an maslakatinti, wa yu sawalhcha k'ala'ump'axat lhilhij, mu kitnan wa la'atam lakatunaja juntaw.
49004026	Li t'alh'amnat jant'u k'a'ilht'ut'iti mintala'alhink'an, jantu tam wilhchani kata'a'ma'alh mintalh'amtik'an.
49004027	Jant'u k'amak'awnit'iti an xapay makxkay'un li katala'cha'an.
49004028	Yu wa ixja'alhawanan, jantucha ali kaja'alhawanalh, wa katapatsalhcha, ka'ilhtulhcha yu oxi tu'u tapatsat la ixmaka', para li tu'ucha kalhitsukulh yu lay kat'alaxta'nilh yu ma'lhtask'iniy la'a'tayjun.
49004029	Jant'u wa aya k'ach'iwinint'it wa yu oxi chiwinti k'ana'unt'it yu lhitask'iniy chi yu oxi kaja'ilhtulh yu ta'asmat'a.
49004030	Jant'u k'ama'ant'a'oxila'alhinit'i an Stalan'a ixTakuwin Dios, an yu p'useyojlak'ant'it para li k'ap'umisp'ak'ant'itcha akxni k'ama'alht'axt'uk'ana'it.
49004031	K'amak'a'untcha chux t'ilh k'atsat, talh'amti, asisi'ut, lh'ap'aj lh'ap'aj chiwinti chi xkayaj chiwinti chi chux tanlhun yu wa lhi'aycha junita.
49004032	Laj'oxi lapanakni k'a'unt'it, k'alamap'aynip'axat, k'alamala'mixinip'axat, tacha an Dios tapumala'mixinini mintala'alhink'an an Cristo.
49005001	Uxitnan tacha tamapaynini an Dios li ixjas'at'an wach'u ch'uni k'alat'it.
49005002	Chux an ali'in k'ajamap'aynit'it, tacha an Cristo kintamapaynin chi tama'axta'lhi kilakatak'an, tacha lha'ulan, yu lhaklhij akamin yu oxi lhiwilalh an Dios.
49005003	Uxitnan ixlapanakni an Dios yu la'stalan'an. P'us jant'u wa aya k'alat'it ch'i nt'u k'ask'unla'ts'int'iti li tu'u', ch'i masi wa k'alhilakch'iwinint'itcha.
49005004	Jant'u k'ana'unt'iti tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi chiwinti chi yu wa lhitontojcha chi yu wa xkayajcha chiwinti, yucha ntu oxi. Yu k'a'ilht'ut li oxi k'alhich'iwinint'it an Dios.
49005005	Mu yu t'atamay li yu ntu yu t'awilh chi yu wa tani laycha chi yu wa laksk'unla'ts'incha an tanlhun, yucha tacha ixdioscha lala'ts'in an tanlhun, o'sliyani li ntu katitanuchalhi an tan ch'alhkatnan Dios.
49005006	Jantu xamati kata'o'xcho'on laka chiwinti yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay, mu chuncha yu pumin ixtalh'amti an Dios tan tat'ajun an yu ntu taja'asmatnan.
49005007	Pus uxitnan jant'u t'u'u k'ajat'a'ilht'ut yu ntu oxi.
49005008	Xlip'ulhnaj uxitnan lakaaputs'isni xt'awnat'it, pero chaway li t'at'ala'xt'o't'itcha an Jamach'alhkat, laka jatapulhkunuch'a t'awnat'it. Tacha ixjas'at'ancha an jatapulhkunu k'ats'uk'ut'it.
49005009	Mu an jatapulhkunu chux yu laj'oxi tanlhuni ma'alay, chi yu ts'awj tanlhun chi yu sawalh.
49005010	Yu oxi lhiwilay an Jamach'alhkati oxi k'alhak'ap'up'it.
49005011	Jant'u k'ajat'a'ilht'ut'iti an tanlhuncha talak'ilhtuy yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay an yu lakaaputs'isni tat'ajun, apalij k'ajamasunit'iti li ntu oxi an yu talak'ilhtuy.
49005012	Mu masi wa aknawlhcha tani talaycha yu'uncha tan tu xamati jala'ts'in, lhimaxan.
49005013	Pero akxni chux an tanlhun tan putunkuwi lakmalakasukan, oxi laktasuy, mu yucha an jatapulhkunu yu oxi lakmalakasu'ojoy chux.
49005014	Xliyu lhinajunta: Uxint'i yu lht'at'ay, k'ak'ujt'icha, ch'i k'a'ost'aycha la ixpujank'an an janinin, walh kamapulhkuniyani an Cristo.
49005015	P'us oxi k'alhak'ap'up'it t'ani yu t'awnatcha, tacha yu tajalakpastaknan, jantu tacha yu ntu k'is tajalakpastaknan.
49005016	Oxi tu'u yu k'ap'u'ilht'ut an panch'e'ex, mu an lak'alin wilhchan jantu laj'oxi.
49005017	Jantu wa lhitontojo k'ats'uk'ut k'alhimach'a'xat'iti tani yu oxicha lhiwilay an Jamach'alhkat.
49005018	Jant'u k'ala't'a'ap'at'it, mu yucha wa kata'ilhtuyancha li wa t'ani k'alat'itcha, apalij yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini katapu'a'tsaman.
49005019	K'alalhixa'alap'axat salmos, chi milhpat yu wa laka Takuwin, ch'i k'amilhp'anit ch'i oxi k'alhich'iwinint'it chux la mijalhunutk'an an Jamach'alhkat.
49005020	Xlakata chux an tanlhun lhilhiji k'axt'a'nit lhimala'puchajun an kimPayk'an Dios la ixta'a'ut an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
49005021	K'ala'asmatnip'axat'iti yu la'unat wa xliyu li k'iklak'a'iyat'it an Cristo.
49005022	Uxitnan yu lakt'at'awk'anat t'akunin k'aja'asmatnit'iti yu tajunan mint'apapak'an tacha an Jamach'alhkat.
49005023	Mu an xat'apapa yucha ix'a'tsulh an xat'iwi', tacha an Cristo yucha ix'a'tsulhk'an an ixlapanakni Dios, chi yu'uncha ixlakatunaj an Cristo chi yucha wachu ixJama'alhtaxtunuk'an.
49005024	Pus tacha an ta'asmatniya an Cristo an ixlapanak Dios wanajcha chuni an t'akunin yu jalakt'at'awkan kata'asmatnilhi chux watuchicha an ixt'apapak'an.
49005025	Lapanakni, k'ajamap'aynit'iti mint'iwinink'an tacha jamapaynilh an Cristo an yu takiklaka'iy Dios chi lhitama'axta'lhi ixlakatak'an yu'uncha,
49005026	para li la'stalan'ani katajunlhi. La'stalan'ani ja'ilhtulh an laka laj'oxi chiwinti chi an laka xkan,
49005027	para li an Cristo ka'akstu xta'nikalhi an yu takiklaka'iy an Dios la'sut'ut'uncha yu ntu laklhkilikin chi ntu la'we'elin u tu'u atumpaj katalhitsukupalh yu ntu oxi. Yu'uncha la'stalan'an chi oxicha tukani kalaks oxi tat'ajun.
49005028	Wanajcha chuni an lapanakni an yu jalakt'at'awkan chuncha katamapaynilh ixt'iwik'an tacha akstu tamapayni ixlakatunajk'an. Yu mapayniya ixt'iwi, akstu mapaynikan.
49005029	Mu ntu xamati yu akstu xkajiy ixlakatunaj, apalij maway chi lhist'ak'a, tacha an Cristo ja'ilhtuy an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.
49005030	Mu kitnan ixlaktanlhun an ixlakatunaj an Cristo.
49005031	Xliyu an lapanak kamakawna ixpay chi ixnati chi kat'atala'xt'o'acha ixt'iwi, chi an ixt'uyunk'an wa pumatamcha katajuna'.
49005032	Anicha tasuy li ayi an sa' ma'ata ixjatapast'ak'at an Dios, kit'in yu iklhichiwint'ajun yucha an Cristo chi an yu takiklaka'iy an Dios.
49005033	Atumpaj, atamjtamin uxitnan k'amap'aynit'iti mint'iwik'an t'ach'a akst'u map'aynik'anat, chi an t'aku wachu ka'asmatnilhi yu juniy ixt'apapa'.
49006001	Uxitnan yu xajas'at'an k'aja'asmatnit'iti amilakpaynink'an tacha oxi lhiwilay an Jamach'alhkat, mu chuncha yu oxi.
49006002	An yu p'ulhnaj lhamap'a'sin yu kintapujunkanan li tu'u akintaxta'nikanan najun: "K'ak'iklak'a'it'i mimpay chi minati
49006003	para li lhi'ach'a k'ats'uk'u chi ma'ani k'ats'uk'u aniy lakaat'un."
49006004	Chi uxitnani xalakpaynin, jant'u k'ajama't'alh'amant'iti amijas'at'anink'an, wa k'ajap'umap'a'sitcha an xlamap'a'sin an Jamach'alhkat.
49006005	Uxitnan yu wa p'ut'ap'ats'ak'anatcha k'aja'asmatnit'iti amimpatronink'an yu wa de anicha lakaat'un. Ixlisawalhi li k'aja'asmatnit'it ch'i k'ajalhiwilat'it tachanu li yucha an Cristojch'a asmatnit'awnat.
49006006	K'ajat'ap'ats'anit'it, jantu wa akxnich'a k'ajat'ap'ats'anit akxni tala'ts'inan, para li wa oxicha katalhiwilan, k'at'ap'ats'at'iti tacha ixma'tapatsanin an Cristo, xlisawalhi k'a'ilht'ut yu chuncha oxi lhiwilay an Dios.
49006007	Xlisawalhi oxi k'at'ap'ats'anit xamati', tachanu li yucha an Jamach'alhkat tu'u ilht'unit'awnat chi ntu wa yucha an lapanaknicha.
49006008	Mu wa tuchicha tu'u yu oxi ilht'uyat chuncha kataxta'niyan an Jamach'alhkat, watichicha, lapanak yu wa putapatsakancha u yu ntu xamati putapatsay.
49006009	Chi uxitnani patronin wanajcha chuni oxi k'ajala'ts'int'it an mima'tapatsanink'an jant'u k'ajala'lhit'ama'ch'ap'ut'it. K'ap'ast'akt'iti li uxitnan chi yu'uncha yucha an Jamach'alhkat yu wilhchalh lakt'iyani ta'asmatni chi yucha ntu xamati wa la'amaj'ancha.
49006010	Chi chawayi kint'ala'awnin, yucha an Jamach'alhkatcha laktachapunin k'ap'u'unt'it chi an la ix'alhp'asninti an ixtachaput.
49006011	Chuxcha k'ala'ch'i'o'ot an pulasan yu xt'a'a an Dios, para li layi k'alak'at'ast'ukt'it an tanlhuncha ixpa'o'xcho'on an xapay makxkay un.
49006012	Mu ntu jat'alasayaw yu wa lapanaknicha, an yu jat'alasayaw ixtachaputk'an an lakmakxkay'un, yu tat'ajun an lakt'iyan, yu'uncha talhinajun li ka'ilhtukalh an laktanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi, chi tach'alhkatnan chi yu'uncha talhinajun an tanlhun aniy lakamunulhpa yu kintala'atanchanu'otan yu wa lakaputs'isni t'ajun.
49006013	Xliyu k'ala'xa'a'i'o'ot'iti an pulasan yu an Dios taxta'nitan, para li lay k'alhit'ayanit akxni katala'chin yu ntu oxi wilhchan, chi li akxni t'ala'oyatcha an lasat, jantu katama'tan.
49006014	Jant'u k'at'a'a't'at, yucha an yu sawalh chiwinti k'ap'uch'axp'ach'ik'ant'it, yucha an yu oxi aytanuti k'ap'ut'a'a't'ay'ut'it,
49006015	chi yu k'ach'ant'anut'it yucha li ka'ilht'ut'it k'alhich'iwinint'it an laj'oxi chiwinti yu oxi putawlhkan.
49006016	Atumpaj an tacha najuwcha, k'axa'a'it'iti an mijakiklaka'intik'an yu k'ap'ut'a'a't'ay'ut'it, yucha yu lay k'ap'umamixiya'it chux an ixpatipni an ay junita.
49006017	K'axa'a'it'iti an a'tanut yu de tsasnat yu puta'alhtaxtukan chi an Stalan'a Takuwin yu tacha espada, yucha an ixchiwinti Dios.
49006018	An laka Takuwin lhilhiji k'at'ap'ayninit ch'i k'ask'init an Dios yu ma'lht'ask'iniyat. Lhilhiji k'as'alaj ts'uk'ut'it ch'i nt'u k'ak'apt'iti k'ajalhit'ap'aynit an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.
49006019	Akilalhitapayniw wachu kit'in para li akxni akchiwinilh, an Dios akixta'nilhi chiwinti, chi tachapuni akxnawlh an yu ntu xamati k'atsay an laj'oxi chiwinti,
49006020	mu ixlakata yucha li kimakminkanta masi iklaklhchajuy. K'at'ap'aynit'iti para li tachapuni aklhichiwinilh tacha yu ak'ilhtulh.
49006021	An yu sawalh oxi la'ts'inaw kint'ala'ajunk'an Tíquico, chi yu oxi sawalh t'atapatsay an Jamach'alhkat, chuxi katajun'oyan para li wach'u k'ak'ats'at'iti uxitnan tani ikwilhcha chi tuchini ik'ilhtuycha.
49006022	Yucha iklalhimala'achaniyaw para li k'ak'ats'at'iti tani ikt'awnawcha chi laj'oximaj'ayi k'a'unt'it.
49006023	Yucha an kimPayk'ancha Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristojo kajaxta'nilh oxi jatawlhnat chi jamapayninti chi jakiklaka'inti an kijat'ala'awnink'an.
49006024	Diosi kaja'a'tayjulh ixchuxk'an an yu tamapayni'alhi kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo. Chunchacha kawalh.
50001001	Kit'in Pablo chi an Timoteo yu ikt'atapatsayaw an Cristo Jesús, iklamak'aniyacha'awi jala'axa'alanti uxitnan ixlapanakni Dios yu t'at'ala'xt'o't'at an Cristo Jesús yu wilhchi'it la'acha'an Filipos chi an yu talhist'ak'an chi an yu taja'a'tayjunun.
50001002	An kimPayk'an Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo kataxta'nini jamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnat.
50001003	Akxni iklapast'ak'aw iklhixta'niya lhimala'puchajun an kiDios;
50001004	chux akxni iktapayni o'sliyani lhi'acha iklalhitapayniyaw minchuxk'an,
50001005	mu uxitnan kila'a'tayjuyawi kilat'amasuyaw an ixchiwinti Dios, sta akxni p'ulhnajcha k'iklak'a'it'it hasta chaway.
50001006	Xliyucha oxi iklhik'atsay, li an Dios yu lhi'a'taynilh aniy oxi tapatsat an la mijatsukuntik'an kataylhi'ana para li oxicha tukani kajunlhi sta akxni kamina an Jesús.
50001007	Oxi li chuncha aklalhipastakkwi minchuxk'an, mu la kijalhunuti iklalhit'awnaw, Dios tamapaynin chi kimapayniy wachu', masi akxni kintamalaklhchajuy u akxni li ak'alh la x'ukxlakapuk'an an jamach'alhkatni para li aklhi'a'tayjulhi an oxi chiwinti chi akmasulh li yucha sawalh.
50001008	An Dios yucha oxi k'atsay li klamapayniyawi minchuxk'an an laka oxi xjamapayninti Jesucristo.
50001009	Yucha aniya yu iklhitapaynisk'in: li an mijamapaynintik'an ali ali ka'alilh chi an Dios kataxta'nini jatapast'ak'at ch'i k'alhimach'a'xat'it,
50001010	para li yucha an yu oxi laktanlhuni k'asakxt'ut'it, chi la'stalan'ani k'a'unt'it ch'i nt'u k'alhimuk'ak'ant'it tu'u tala'alhin akxni kamina an Cristo.
50001011	Wa yu sicha oxi laktanlhuni k'alak'ilht'ut yu wa yucha an Jesucristo lay chuncha pulak'ilhtukan, para li an Dios ayi kala'ts'inkalh chi kamilhpanikalh.
50001012	T'ala'awnin, klakask'in li k'ak'ats'at'it li an tanlhun yu ikputapasata, apalij wa a'tayjutacha li ali kata'a'pitsilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti.
50001013	An tan iklhilaktalaklhchajuy ixlakata an Cristo sawalhcha talhakapu'ani ixchuxk'an an yu tajalhistaknan, chi ixchuxk'an an ali'in.
50001014	Chi li kintala'ts'in li klaklhchajuy, ixchuxk'an an kint'ala'awnink'an laj'oximaj'ayi tajunlhi mu talhila'siya an Jamach'alhkat Dios, palaycha talhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios, jantucha tatalhanan.
50001015	Ali'in chun sawalh talhichiwiniya an Cristo wa xliyu wa talhaxkayanancha chi wa talaxtukuputuncha; pero ali'in xlisawalhi li yucha talhichiwiniy.
50001016	Yu'uncha talhichiwiniya an Cristo laka jamapayninti, mu tak'atsayi li yucha an Diosi kimakminta para li aklhi'a'tayjulh an laj'oxi chiwinti.
50001017	Pero ali'in talhichiwiniy wa xliyu wa ix'akstuchak'an tu'u tapupuxkajuy, yu'uncha ntu xasawalh, wa palaycha kintamama'alh'ajniputun li chaway iklaklhchajuy.
50001018	Pero ¿tisu lhitapalaycha? masi chunchacha talay, talh ichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, ali'in xta'achanink'an sawalh chi ali'in wa talhaxkayanancha, pero o'sliyancha talhichiwiniy an Cristo; chi iklhi'achan. Chi alika ak'achana'.
50001019	Mu ijk'atsay li ixlakata amintapaynitk'an chi ixlakata li ki'a'tayjuy an xTakuwin Jesucristo akmakawkana'.
50001020	Lhitala'si ikpakxan'i li ntu tu'u aktilhitamaxanilh, apalij tacha o'sliyajcha mukumintachalh, chaway an Cristo kamasukana li yucha ay, la kilakatunaja kamasukana, la kijatsukunti u la kilhinin.
50001021	Mu kit'in li ikt'ajun ixlakata an Cristo, chi li aknilh iklhajachalhcha.
50001022	Pero li ali aktsukulhi aniy laka lakatunaj para li ali aklak'ilhtulhi tanlhun yu laj'oxi la xtapatsat an Dios, pus tucha ijk'atsay tanyuchacha aksakxtulh.
50001023	Lhima'anxkayi aksakxtulh ani la'at'uy: ikpast'ak'a ikniputuncha para li ak'alhcha t'atawlhna an Cristo, mu chuncha palaycha oxi para kit'in;
50001024	pero atumpaj, milakatak'an palay lhitapalayi li ali aktsukulh.
50001025	Chi ijkiklaka'iya tacha ani iknajun, ijk'atsayi li aktamakawna', aklat'a'aklatsukuyawka chux uxitnan, oxi para uxitnan chi para li k'alaj'ach'ant'iti la mijakiklaka'intik'an.
50001026	Akxni aklala'chimpalaw, kilakata sawalhch'a k'ap'ulaj'ach'ana'it'iti an Jesucristo.
50001027	Wa oxich'a k'ats'uk'ut tacha najunta an laka laj'oxi xchiwinti Jesucristo, walh lani li akla'ancha'aw la'ts'inin u inta ma'at aktsukuchalh, pero ak'asmatlhi milakatak'an li lajk'ut'ilini t'awnat'it, li wa la'atam jatapast'ak'ati lhit'awnat, li minchuxk'ani t'ach'a an k'iklak'a'it'atcha an laj'oxi chiwinti wa t'ami alhp'as jamak'atsanininaat.
50001028	Chi li ntu k'is tame'e'swayani an yu wa taxkayan. Yu ixlakatak'an yu'uncha oxicha tasuy li katats'an'aya', pero uxitnan mimputa'alhtaxtuk'an, yucha an Diosi chuncha ilhtuy.
50001029	Mu uxitnan ixlakata an Cristo jant'u tamapaynitan li wa k'ak'iklak'a'it'itcha lhilakat'ijtam, ilht'uk'ant'it wachu li k'alhima'alh'ajnant'iti ixlakata yucha.
50001030	Uxitnan chi kit'in wa tami la'ma'alh'ajnant'awnaw. Kilala'ts'iwcha tacha xlip'ulhnaj ikma'alh'ajnalh, chi chaway asmat'at'iti li ali ikma'alh'ajnant'ajun.
50002001	Pus, li k'ats'ayat'iti li tu'u tapuma'oximaj'ayayan an Cristo, li tama'oximaj'ayayani an xjamapayninti, li tat'atala'xt'o'ani an Takuwin, li minachalhi jamapayninti la mimpulaknik'an, li lhit'awnat'iti jalhunut yu jamapayninin,
50002002	akilama'an'achawcha, wa tamcha kak'atsaaw, wa la'atamcha jamapayninti kalhitsukuw, katala'xto'wicha chi wa tamcha kajatapastaknaw.
50002003	Jant'u tu'u k'a'ilht'ut yu wa k'ap'ulaxt'uk'utcha u wa k'ap'u'ayajk'ats'atcha. An tanlhun k'a'ilht'ut laka jakilhpatinijk'atsat, chi atamjtamin uxitnan an ali'in k'ajala'ts'int'it tachanu palay talhitapalay.
50002004	Jantu xamati kapuxkawlh tu'u yu wa para ix'akstucha, wachu kalhakapu'alhi ixlakatak'an an ali'in.
50002005	Amijatapast'ak'atk'an tacha an xjatapast'ak'at Cristo Jesusi k'alhits'uk'ut.
50002006	Mu yucha masi an xjatsukunti, xjatsukunti Dios, yucha jantu nawlhi li kala'ts'inkalh tacha Dios, masi yucha wa xt'atami an Dios.
50002007	Yucha makawlhi tacha Dios chi junlhicha tacha yu wa ma'tapatsancha, akxni an la'awlhcha tacha yu wa lapanak.
50002008	Chi ntu wachun kawalh, akxni wa tacha lapanakcha ixjunita, jakilhpatinijk'ats'aalh, ja'asmatnalh, sta nilh chi laka crusi nilh.
50002009	Xliyu an Dios wachu palay lhitapalayi ilhtulh, chi xta'nilhi ta'a'ut yu palay lhitapalay, yu ntu tu'u alimpalay yu xt'achun.
50002010	Para li akxni kata'asmatlhi an xta'a'ut Jesús katatatso'ottalhi an yu tawilananchalh lakt'iyan chi an yu tawilanalh lakaat'un chi an yu tawilanalh xtan'api lakaat'un.
50002011	Chi para li chux sima'at kanawlhi li an Jesucristo yucha Jamach'alhkat, para li an Dios yu kimPayk'an ayi kala'ts'inkalh.
50002012	Pus chawayi t'ala'awnin, mu lhilhiji jak'iklak'a'ininat uxitnan, jantu wa akxni iklat'a'aklat'awnacha'awcha, tacha chaway p'alaych'a jak'iklak'a'ininat'it, masi ntu an iklat'a'aklat'awnacha'aw, p'us k'alhak'ap'up'inchi'it palayi an minta'alhtaxtutk'an laka jakiklaka'inti chi laka jaxk'ip'ip'inti.
50002013	Mu an Dios yucha yu ta'ilhtuyan li k'a'ilht'up'ut'unt'it ch'i li k'a'ilht'ut'iti an tanlhun tacha yuchacha lhi'achaniy.
50002014	Ch'uxch'a k'a'ilht'ut'it, pero ntu laka asisi'ut chi ntu laka la xtukut,
50002015	para li ntu xamati katalhimuk'an tu'u chi katala'cha'aninin tu'u yu ntu oxi. Xjas'at'an Dios yu ntu laklhkilikini k'a'unt'it tan ani tat'ajun an lapanakni yu ntu taja'asmatnan chi wa tani talaycha. Ani lakamunulhpa tan tat'ajun an lapanakni, uxitnan wa tacha st'akucha slimj t'asuyat'it.
50002016	Oxich'a k'alhits'uk'ut an chiwinti yu xt'a'a jatsukunti, walh chuncha akxni kamina an Cristo layi aklhita'ayaya li ntu wa la'a'ijcha stak iklhima'alh'ajnalh chi ntu wa la'a'ijcha stak iktapatsalh.
50002017	Chi masi akima'nikalh para li kalhila'tsakalhcha amilha'ulank'an yu ma'axt'a'niyat an Dios ixlakata mijakiklaka'intik'an, kit'in ik'achan chi ali uxitnani iklat'alaj'achanaw.
50002018	K'alaj'ach'ant'itcha wachu uxitnan, chi akilat'alaj'achawcha wachu'.
50002019	Li an Jamach'alhkat Jesús chuncha lakask'in, ikpast'ak'a wa tukan aklamala'achaniyawi an Timoteo para li kata'ancha'an la'ts'inin, para li ak'achalhi akxni ajk'atsaalhcha t'ani wilhchi'itcha.
50002020	Mu ntu xamati iklhit'awpalay yu tacha kit'in kapastaklhi chi yu kalhakapu'alh sawalh yu oxi para uxitnan;
50002021	ixchuxk'ani tapuxkajuy yu wa para yu'unchacha, chi ntu talhakapu'ani yu lhinajun an Cristo Jesús.
50002022	Pero uxitnan k'ats'ayatcha tacha oxi ixlanti an Timoteo chi tacha kint'atapatsata li iklhichiwininaw an laj'oxi chiwinti, tacha xamati ts'alh yu a'tayjuy xpay.
50002023	Pus ikpast'ak'a watukan aklamala'achaniyawi an Timoteo li ajk'atsayacha tani akint'alakanacha para li kata'ancha'an la'ts'inin.
50002024	Chi ijkiklaka'iya an Jamach'alhkat Jesús li kit'in wachu watukan akla'antacha'aw la'ts'inin.
50002025	Wanajcha chun iklhiwilay li lhitask'iniya li aklamala'achaniwi an kint'ala'ajunk'an Epafrodito. Yucha kint'atapatsan tacha kint'asoldado, yu uxitnan kilamala'achanicha'aw para li kalhakapu'alhi tuchini ikma'lhtask'iniycha.
50002026	Mu sawalhcha tala'ts'imputunani minchuxk'an, chi sawalhcha tapast'ak'an wa xliyu k'ats'achi'it'iti li wa xta'an'ay.
50002027	Chun sawalh wa xta'an'ay, wa k'ischa xtinitacha, pero an Dios mapaynilh, chi ntu wa yuchacha mapaynilh, kit'in wachu kimapaynilh, para li ntu ali akta'oxila'alhilhi tacha an ikta'oxila'alhiycha.
50002028	Xliyu wa tukancha klalhimala'achaniyaw para li akxni k'ala'ts'imp'ala'itcha k'alaj'ach'ana'itcha chi kit'in tucha sawalh akta'oxila'alhilh.
50002029	Lhi'acha k'ala'a'ichi'it, mu yucha wachu ixlapanak an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, chi ali'incha yu tacha yucha wachu oxi k'ajala'ts'int'it.
50002030	Mu yucha wa k'ischa xtilhinitacha wa xliyu t'atapatsay an Cristo. Xtilhima'ats'an'atacha an xjatsukunti li xakilhist'ak'a, mu uxitnan t'u lay t'at'it.
50003001	Kint'ala'awnin, yu tumpaj xlakata, k'alaj'ach'ant'iti ixlakata an Jamach'alhkat. Kit'in tu ja's k'uyi masi wa yuchacha a'tami iklats'o'nipalaw yu klats'o'nitawcha, mu uxitnan talhitapalhniyan.
50003002	K'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti ixlakatak'an anchunu lapanakni yu tacha x'oyun, k'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti ixlakatak'an an yu ntu oxi tatapatsay, k'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti ixlakatak'an an yu tach'uk'up'uxa lakats'uni lakatunaj.
50003003	Mu kitnani yu ixlapanakni sawalh an Dios, yu ay la'ts'inaw an Dios laka Takuwin, chi laj'achanawi li kitnan ixlapanakni an Cristo Jesús, chi ntu yu lhiwilayaw yu wa kitnancha lay ilhtuyaw.
50003004	Masi kit'in wachu alini yu lay aklhiwilalh yu wa kit'incha lay ik'ilhtuy. Li xamati past'ak'a li lhit'ajuni yu lay kalhiwilalh yu wa x'akstucha lay ilhtuy, kit'in palaycha.
50003005	Akxni la'atsajincha wilhchan xakt'ajun akxnicha ki'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalh ki'a'axt'a'a, mu kit'in ik'israelitaj, kit'in ta iklhila'ts'in an Benjamín, kit'in sta akxni wa iktitsukulh kilhichiwin lhi'ebreo, yu kimpaynin hebreojnin. Kit'in farisewi xajkunita, tacha an talhimacha'xay an fariseojnin an xlamap'a'sink'an an judiojnin chuncha xaklhimacha'xay.
50003006	Sawalhcha p'asi xajkalhitama'chapuy an yu takiklaka'iy Dios, jantu xamati tu'u lay xakijuni mu xajkiklaka'iya an lhamap'a'sin yu xakilhijunkan.
50003007	Anchunu panch'e'ex kit'in xaklhi'ilhtuy li sawalhcha oxi yu xak'ilhtut'ajun, pero lhimala'puchajuncha an Cristo, chaway ijk'atsaycha li ntu k'is tu'u lhitapalay.
50003008	Chi ijk'atsayi li chuxi jantu tu'u lhitapalay tacha an xak'ilhtuy li ikt'ala'ts'incha tacha an yu sawalhcha lhitapalay li ikmispalhcha an Cristo Jesús, kiJamach'alhkat, yucha ntu xamati xt'achun. Yucha an Cristojo ikpuma'ats'an'a'olh chux an tacha xaklay p'ulhnaj, yucha tacha wa jamakxtalhcha chaway ikla'ts'in an tacha p'ulhnaj xaklay para li an Cristo aklhajaxtulhcha
50003009	chi akt'atala'xto'lhicha. An Dios oxicha kila'ts'in jantu wa xliyu li sawalhcha oxi tanlhun k'ilhtuy, yucha oxicha kila'ts'in wa xliyu li ijkikla'a'iycha an Cristo.
50003010	Kit'in ikmispaputuni an Cristo, chi an alhp'asninti yu pumala'awnicho'okalh, chi wachu akt'ama'alh'ajnalh, chi wachu chuni ijkumputun tacha ixt'ajun akxni nilh,
50003011	li sna tacha kalhila'alh wachu akla'awcho'olh.
50003012	Jantu iknajun li ikcha'alhcha tan task'iniy li akcha'alh u li oxicha tukani ikt'ajun, kit'in iktaylhi'anta ikpast'ak'a li akcha'ana', mu ixlakata yucha li an Cristo Jesús kintaymalhcha.
50003013	T'ala'awnin, jantu iknawt'ajun li ikcha'alhcha; yu ik'ilhtuy kit'in li ijk'ap'acha yu la'puslicha, wa yuchacha ikt'ataxtuni iktaymaputun yu ts'an'ayka',
50003014	para li akcha'alhi tan kacha'ankana chi akixta'nikalhi yu an Dios kintalhit'asaniyan awint'i lakt'iyan, wa xliyu li t'atala'xt'o'awi an Cristo.
50003015	Kinchuxk'an yu oxi sawalh jakiklaka'ininaw chuncha kapastakkwi. Li tu'u yu t'am p'ast'ak'at'it, an Dios katajunan.
50003016	Pero ixlakata ani yu chunchacha t'acha'antaw wa tamcha kapastakkwi chi wa tamcha katsukuw.
50003017	T'ala'awnin, akilala'ts'ixtucha ch'i wach'u k'ajala'ts'ixt'ut'iti an yu wachu chun tat'ajun tacha kitnan klamasuniyaw.
50003018	A'lhuwcha klajunaw chi a'tam klajumpalaw laka alhut li lhuwi yu tat'ajun yu taxkaji tan lhichiwininta an xcruz an Cristo.
50003019	Ani yu chuncha talay akxni ka'ukla'oyacha kajalakt'ilhikana'. Yu'uncha yu ixdiosk'an wa yucha an tacha tak'atsancha talaputun chi talhita'ayaycha yu katalhimaxanalh. Wa yucha an yu wa anicha lak'alin lakamunulhpa tapast'ak'a.
50003020	Pero kitnan xalapanakni an lakt'iyan, chi pakxan'iyaw li kaminchalhcha an lakt'iyan an Jama'alhtaxtunu', an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo.
50003021	Yucha akintamapaxaniyani an kilakatunajk'an yu ntu oxi para li tacha an ixlakatunajcha yu oxi tukani kajunwi, chuncha akintapu'ilhtuyan an la x'alhp'asninti yu lay lakpu'ilhtu'opalay chux an tanlhun.
50004001	Pus xliyu'u t'ala'awnin, uxitnan yu iklamapayniyaw, uxitnan yu sawalhcha iklala'ts'imputunaw, uxitnan yu ki'achat chi uxitnan yu tachanu kincorona, chunchacha oxi k'at'aylhip'it k'at'ajalht'anant'it an Jamach'alhkat.
50004002	Ijkatapaynisk'iniya an Evodia chi an Síntique li wa tami katak'atsaalh ixlakata an Jamach'alhkat.
50004003	Chi uxint'i kint'atapatsan yu mukt'axt'uy sawalh, iksk'iniyan lamapaynin li k'aja'a't'ay'ut'i ani kint'alajamatsanink'an yu wachu t'ak'alh xakintat'a'aklat'ajun tan xaktsukuy xaklhichiwiniy an laj'oxi chiwinti, chi an Clemente chi an ali'incha yu kintat'atapatsalh, yu'uncha ixta'a'utk'an jats'o'muk'anikantacha an laxalibro jatsukunti.
50004004	Lhilhiji k'ap'ulaj'ach'ant'it an Jamach'alhkat. A'tam iknawpalay: ¡K'alaj'ach'ant'it!
50004005	Minchuxk'ani k'amisp'ak'ant'it li oxi lapanakni. An Jamach'alhkat wa nicha t'ajun.
50004006	Jant'u tu'u k'alhak'ap'up'it, yucha an Diosi k'at'ap'aynisk'init t'uch'ini ma'lht'ask'iniyatcha, ch'i k'axt'a'nit'iti lhimala'puchajun.
50004007	Ch'i k'ala'ts'ina'it'iti li an Dios kataxta'niyani an oxi ixjatawlhnat, la'atam oxi jatawlhnat yu ay tukan yu ntu lay lhimacha'xayaw. Aniy oxi ixjatawlhnat an Dios katalhistakniyani amijalhunutk'an chi amijatapast'ak'atk'an, mu t'ala'xt'o'at'iti an Cristo Jesús.
50004008	Yu xliti'astani t'ala'awnin, k'ap'ast'akt'iti chux yu sawalh, chux yu kakiklaka'ikalh, chux yu ts'awj sawalh, chux yu stalan'a, chux yu lhi'achanit, chux yu oxi tu'u lhichiwinkan. K'ap'ast'akt'iti chux yu oxi chi yu oxi lhipastakkan.
50004009	Yu klamasuniw, yu la'a'it'it, yu asmatt'it ch'i yu la'ts'int'it ik'ilhtuy, yuch'ach'a k'a'ilht'ut; chi an Dios yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat katat'a'aklatsukuyan.
50004010	Sawalhcha ikpu'achani an Jamach'alhkat li uxitnan kilapastakpalawcha. Oxi tasuy li xakilalhakapu'anaw wa ntu ix'alin an panch'e'ex para li xakilalhimasuniw.
50004011	Chi tacha ani iknajun jantu wa xliyu li tu'ucha akma'lhtask'inilh, kit'in iklhismanitacha ik'achan wa tanischa aktsukulh.
50004012	Iklaniya tani tsukukancha lhijakilhpatini chi tani tsukukancha akxni lhuw lhit'awkan, wa tani kaminchalhcha panch'e'ex laycha iklakatast'uk'a, iklhismanita oxi ak'o'atsalh u akchawanalh, iklhismanita lhuw aklhitsukulh tu'u chi li ntu tu'u wanaj aklhitsukulh.
50004013	Layi ik'ilhtu'ojoy chux, yucha an Cristojo kilak'ut'ili.
50004014	Pero oxich'a t'ach'a an lat'it li wachu kilat'ama'alh'ajnawi.
50004015	Ch'i wach'u k'ats'ayat'iti uxitnani jamacha'an Filipos, li xlip'ulhnaj akxni ik'a'taynilhcha iklhichiwiniy an laj'oxi chiwinti, akxni iktaxtulhcha la mint'unk'an Macedonia, wa uxitnani yu kila'a'tayju la milha'ulank'an.
50004016	Chi akxni xakt'awnachalh Tesalónica, uxitnan tu wa a'tami kilamak'aniw milha'ulank'an, para li aklhi'ichalhcha yu xakma'lhtask'iniy.
50004017	Tacha ani iknajun tu wa xliyu li wa alicha akpuxkawlh li akixta'nikalh lha'ulan, kit'in yu iklakask'in li ali k'alalhawat'iti la x'ukxlakapu an Dios yu minawink'an.
50004018	Kit'in chuxcha ikla'a'i'olh, chi wa kixajnicho'oyachalhcha. T'ach'a an malhit'anit an Epafrodito li akilhiminilh, oxicha, kinta'a'ts'anicha, lhuwcha iklhit'ajun. An kilamakminiw tacha la'atam lha'ulan yu lhaklhi, tachanu la'atam lha'ulan yu an Dios oxi lhiwilay.
50004019	Pus chaway an kiDios kataxta'niyani uxitnan chux yu tats'an'atayaniyan, tacha yu yuchacha laj'ay tukan lhit'ajun ixlaktanlhun, yucha an Cristo Jesusi pulhit'ajun.
50004020	¡An kiDiosk'an ay chi xpujun'alhincha li kimPayk'an! Chunchacha kawalh.
50004021	Akilala'axa'alanicha'awi la xtalakask'i an Jesucristo ixchuxk'an an ixlapanakni Dios. An kijat'ala'awnink'an yu ani kintat'a'aklat'ajun tala'axa'alayan.
50004022	Ixchuxk'an an ixlapanakni Dios tala'axa'alayan, chi wachu tala'axa'alayani yu wanaj wa lhilakatijtam tat'atapatsay an ay xajamach'alhkat Roma.
50004023	An kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo yuchacha katamapaynin. Chunchacha kajunlhi.
51001001	Kit'in ikPablo yu kimala'achatachalh an Jesucristo la ixtalakask'i an Dios, ali an kint'ala'ajunk'an Timoteo,
51001002	iklala'axa'alayawi uxitnan ixlapanakni Dios yu kint'ala'awnink'an unt'at wa ixlakata li wach'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an Cristo, yu wilhchi'it'it la'acha'an Colosas. An kimPayk'an Dios katamapaynin chi oxi jatawlhnati kataxta'nin t'an wilat.
51001003	Lhilhiji iklalhitapayniyaw uxitnan, ikxta'niyawi lhimala'puchajun an Dios, an ixPay an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
51001004	Mu ijk'asmattawi li uxitnan sawalhch'a k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an Cristo Jesús ch'i li jamap'ayniyat'iti ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'iy an Dios.
51001005	Ch'unch'a layat'it mu p'akxan'iyat'iti yu k'ala'a'iya'it yu an Dios tama'anitan an lakt'iyan. Chuncha lanit'it akxni asmatt'it an laj'oxi chiwinti yu sawalh,
51001006	yu tala'cha'an. Aniy chiwinti ta xlijalhi'ay an lakamunulhpa lhichiwint'awkan chi wa tanchuncha lhichiwinkan oxi xajt'awnachalh. Wanajcha chuni tapasat'ajun an t'an t'awnat'it uxitnan. An chiwinti ta'ayat'ajuni an t'an wilat sta akxni p'ulhnajch'a asmatt'it an laj'oxi ixchiwinti Dios ch'i lhimach'a'xat'iti an yu sawalh ixlakata an oxi xjamapayninti Dios.
51001007	An Epafras tamasunini an laj'oxi chiwinti. Yucha oxi ikt'alalhi'antaw chi wachu chuni tapatsay tacha kitnan. Atumpaj yucha oxi xma'tsuku sawalh an Cristo yu oxi para uxitnan.
51001008	Yucha kintajunin t'ach'a p'ujamap'aynininat an Stalan'a Takuwin.
51001009	Yuchacha ixlakata li akxni ijk'atsawcha, jantu sa' iklajkilhunawi iklalhitapayniyaw. Iksk'iniyawi an Dios li sawalhcha kataxta'nini jatapast'ak'at yu minachalh laka takuwin para li k'alhimach'a'xat'iti tanyuchacha yu oxi lhiwilay.
51001010	Walh lani milakatijlak'an tacha yu an tach'a'o'aycha an Jamach'alhkati k'alhits'uk'uya'it chi wa t'uch'ich'a k'a'ilht'uya'it k'ap'uma'an'ach'aya'it. Chi chuncha laych'a k'a'ilht'uya'it chux yu laj'oxi tanlhun chi palay oxi k'amisp'aya'it an Dios.
51001011	Atumpaj, an ay ix'alhp'asninti Dios palay lajk'ut'ilini kata'ilhtuyan para li watuchicha k'alhit'ayanit'it.
51001012	Sawalhcha laka ta'achanini k'axt'a'niya'it lhimala'puchajun an kimPayk'an mu yucha ta'ilhtun li layi k'ama'la'a'it yu kajaxta'niya an ixlapanakni, yu laka jatapulhkunu tat'ajun.
51001013	An Dios kintamaxtuni an lakaaputs'isni chi kintama'anuncha an tan ch'alhkatnan an isTs'alh, yu mapayniy.
51001014	An isTs'alh Dios mapalalhi para li akintamakawkan. Pus yucha kintapumala'mixinikan kintala'alhink'an.
51001015	Jantu xamati lay la'ts'in an Dios, pero an Jesús, yucha Dios, yu tasuy. An Jesús yucha ixt'ajuncha akxni an lakamunulhpa ilhtukalh.
51001016	An la ix'alhp'asninti ilhtulh chux an tanlhun yu alin an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un, chux yu tasuy chi yu ntu tasuy, watuchicha yu tala'ajunta takuwinin, chi yu talhit'ajun ix'alhp'asnintik'an u yu tach'alhkatnan. Yucha pu'ilhtu'okalh chux an tanlhun chi para yucha li ilhtukalh.
51001017	Yucha p'ulhnajcha ixt'ajun akxni ntuka' k'is tu'u ix'alin, chi yucha oxi sa' pujun'ojota chux an tanlhun.
51001018	An Cristo yucha ix'a'tsulhk'an an yu takiklaka'iy sawalh an Dios, chi an yu takiklaka'iy sawalh an Dios yucha ixlakatunaj an Cristo, yucha yu pu'a'taynilh chux chi yucha yu p'ulhnaj la'awcho'olh, para li yucha yu p'ulhnaj tukan kajunlhi wa laka tuchicha kawalh.
51001019	An Dios chuncha oxi lhiwilalh li chux yu tacha yucha xli'ay, an Cristo chunchacha kawalh.
51001020	Chi an Dios yucha an Cristojcha yu put'ala'oxamixnilh chux an lakamunulhpa', yu lak'alin an lakaat'un chi yu lak'alin an lakt'iyan. An la ixjak'alhni an Cristo yu maj'alh an laka cruz ilhtulhcha li wa oxicha ka sa' tawlakalh.
51001021	Uxitnan xlip'ulhnaj, wa tanlhuncha yu ntu laj'oxi x'ilht'uyat, ma'ati xt'awnachi'it tan t'ajun Dios chi xt'alaxkaynini x'unt'at.
51001022	Pero chaway an Cristo li nilh ta'ilhtuncha li ix'amigojnincha an Diosi k'a'unt'it. An Cristo nilh para li la'stalan'ani katamalakasun la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios, kanajuw jantu k'is la'smala'aniy laka tala'alhin chi ntu tu'u k'alhits'uk'ut yu wa lhi'aycha junita yu lay kanawkalh li ntu oxi.
51001023	Chuncha kajuna li oxich'a k'alakt'ach'an'aknut chi oxicha sawalhi k'ats'uk'ut la mijakiklaka'intik'an. Jant'uch'a k'amak'a'unt'iti an yu tajunan an laj'oxi chiwinti li k'axt'a'nik'ana'it, yu ta xlijalhi'ay an lakamunulhpa lhichiwinkan, chi kit'in ikPablo tacha ikma'tsuku ikma'a'tayjununi ikma'jamak'atsaaninin.
51001024	Tacha an ikma'alh'ajnan milakatak'an ik'achan. Kit'in yu la kimakni ikla'a'iya an ma'alh'ajnat para li akla'tsalhi an xma'alh'ajnat an Cristo, ixlakata an ixlapanakni an Cristo, yu ixlakatunaj tajunita.
51001025	An Dios tacha yu yuchacha oxi lhiwilay, ki'ilhtulhi li ajkatapatsanilhi an yu takiklaka'iy Dios. An kintapatsat yucha li ajkamasunilhi an ixchiwinti Dios yu a'tsay.
51001026	Aniy chiwinti yucha an yu ma'anchacha sa' xmats'e'ta an Dios, yu ntu xamati xk'atsay, pero chaway an Dios jamasunilhcha an ixlapanakni.
51001027	Jamasunilhi an yu takiklaka'iy tacha an sawalhcha oxi xpast'ak'a ix'ilhtuputun para ta kilhmakchux an lapanakni. Chi ani yu sa'cha ixpastakta an Dios yu ntu xk'atsaakan yucha an Cristo yu taput'awnan uxitnan. Xliyu p'akxan'iyat'it an xta'ayat an Dios.
51001028	Kitnan ijkalhixa'alayawi an Cristo an lapanakni. Ijkamap'a'siyaw chi ijkamasuniyawi chux laka jatapast'ak'at yu an Dios kintaxta'niyan, para li akxni ajkamalakasuw la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios ts'awjcha tat'ajun sawalh tacha Cristo.
51001029	Xliyu iktapatsay chi alhp'asi ikt'ataxtuniy. An ix'alhp'asninti an Cristo yu iklhit'ajun kixta'niya tachaput para li aktapatsalh.
51002001	Klakask'ini li k'ak'ats'at'iti li tacha an alhp'as ikt'ataxtuni wa xliyu li kla'a'tayjuyawi uxitnan chi an yu tawilananchalh la'acha'an Laodicea chi wachu ixchuxk'an masi yu ntu kintamispay.
51002002	Ikt'ataxtuniya mu klakask'ini li laj'oximaj'ayi katajunlhi la ixjalhunutk'an, katatala'xto'lhi laka jamapayninti chi oxicha sawalhi katalhitsukulh jalakpastaknat, para li katalhimacha'xalhi an jatapast'ak'at yu sa' xmats'e'ta an Dios, yu lhichiwiniy an Cristo.
51002003	An Cristo yucha putats'e'ojota chux an laj'oxi jatapast'ak'at chi an jatalaninti.
51002004	Ani klajunaw para li ntu xamati kata'o'xcho'on laka lakchiwinti yu lay katapumatanunin.
51002005	Mu masi ntu ani iklat'a'aklat'awnacha'aw la kilakatunaj, la kintakuwin chun, chi ik'achani li kla'ts'ini li oxi t'awnat la milakatijlak'an chi li oxi sa' k'iklak'a'it'at an Cristo.
51002006	Xliyu chaway li la'a'itcha an Jesucristo tacha miJamach'alhkatk'an, tacha yu yuchacha lakask'ini k'ats'uk'ut.
51002007	Talhmancha k'ap'ulakt'ach'an'aknut an Cristo chi yuchacha k'ap'ut'ach'at'at tacha tu'u yu p'as. Tachapuni k'a'ilht'ut an mijakiklaka'intik'an, yucha an yu sawalhi k'ap'uts'uk'ut, yu masunik'ant'it, chi lhilhiji k'axt'a'nit lhimala'puchajun.
51002008	K'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti li ntu xamati kata'o'xcho'on laka lakjatapast'ak'at yu ntu oxi chi yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay. Yu chuncha lakjatapast'ak'at wa anicha lakamunulhpa ostayata, wa anicha xalhamap'a'sin, chi yucha wa yu chunchacha ajnik'a tapast'ak'a an lapanakni. Jantu yu an Cristojo chuncha lhinajun.
51002009	Chux tacha xli'ay an Dios la ixlakatunajcha an Cristojo t'ajun.
51002010	Uxitnan an Cristo p'u'a'ts'ayatcha, jantucha tu'u ali ma'lht'ask'iniyat. An Cristo yucha ix'a'tsulhk'an an yu wa takuwinin yu talhit'ajun lhich'alhkat chi alhp'asninti.
51002011	An Cristo taxwililich'uk'up'uxnincha mintala'alhinkan jantu wa xamaticha lapanak. An lakatunaj lhit'ajun ix'alhp'asninti yu pu'ilhtuy tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi, pero an Cristo tama'alhtaxtuncha.
51002012	Akxni a'p'axt'itcha, uxitnan t'aamaaknuk'ant'itcha an Cristo, chi akxni an a'p'axt'itcha wachucha t'ala'awch'o'ot'iti an Cristo, mu k'iklak'a'it'iti an ix'alhp'asninti an Dios, yu mala'awnicho'olh an Cristo.
51002013	Uxitnan tumpaj panch'e'ex xjuntachalh xlaknit'at'iti la mintakuwink'an ixlakata amintala'alhink'an. Pero an Dios taxta'nini jatsukunti ali an Cristo chi la ixta'achanin kintamala'mixini'ojoni chux an kintala'alhink'an.
51002014	Xlit'awnaw la'atam jalhi'aninti, mu ntu ixmuktaxtuyawi an xlamap'a'sin an Dios, pero an Dios kintamala'mixinini an jalhi'aninti chi an laka cruzi xtukmuk'alh an tacha xjalhi'anininaw.
51002015	An Cristo jalhaja'olhi an yu xtach'alhkatnan chi an lakmakxkay takuwin yu xtalhit'ajun ix'alhp'asnintik'an, xlitalakasuni jalakmamaxanilh chi tacha tach'inincha ja'ilhtulh akxni lhajachalhcha.
51002016	Xliyu iklalhijunaw: Jant'u k'alhit'amak'a'unt'iti li xamati katajunin t'uch'ini k'a'ut'itcha u yu k'a'ott'it, u ixlakata tani wanancha ixwilhchan k'atan, u akxni sast'i malhkuyu u akxni wilhchan yu wa pujastaknankan.
