51002017	Chux yu tacha aniy xlinawkan wa ixma'stele'cha an Cristo, pero yu sawalh yucha an Cristo.
51002018	Jantu xamati kata'o'xcho'on para li k'ama'ats'an'at an yu k'ala'a'iya'it mu ta'alin lapanakni yu talay li ma tajakilhpatinijk'atsay. Yu'uncha sawalhcha laj'ajini tala'ts'in an angelhnin, chi tanajun li ma tala'puminatnan chi sawalhcha laj'ajini tapuk'atsan ixlakata an wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'an.
51002019	Jantu yu an Cristojo yu ta'asmatni, yu yucha xa'a'tsulh chi yu yucha t'alach'apa'otachalh an xalakatunaj. An Cristo yucha yu ilhtuy li chux an xalaktanlhun an lakatunaj katatala'xto'lhi chi katala'a'tayjupaxalh, lak'ut'iliya an lakatunaj chi oxi sa' mala'xt'o'a, para li tacha yu lakask'in an Diosi kata'ayalh.
51002020	Uxitnan t'alaknit'iti an Cristo chi chunchacha p'uma'alht'axt'uk'ant'it, para li nt'uch'a k'a'ilht'ut'iti an wa xlamap'a'sincha an lakamunulhpa'. Xliyu iklalhisakmiyaw ¿Tasu'u li alik'a k'iklak'a'iyat'iti akxni unk'anat?:
51002021	"Ani jant'u k'a'ut'it u anchunu atumpaj jant'u k'ak'ilhk'ats'at'it, anchunu jant'u k'amakp'init'it."
51002022	Chux ani lhamap'a'sin wa ixlakatacha tanlhun yu akxni pu'ilhtukancha tu'u la'mixcho'oycha, chi wa lapanaknicha yu chuncha talhinajun chi tamasuy.
51002023	Wa li oxicha jalakpastaknati tasuy, mu ja'ilhtuycha an lapanakni li katakiklaka'ilhi li lhit'ajuni jakilhpatinijk'atsat chi li katamama'alh'ajnilhi ixlakatunajk'an, pero ntu jalhi'a'tayjuyi li ntucha kata'ilhtulhi tanlhun yu ntu oxi.
51003001	An Cristo yuch'ach'a t'ala'awch'o'ot, pus uxitnan yuch'ach'a k'ap'uxk'a'ut an tanlhun yu alin an lakt'iyan tan wilhchalh an Cristo tan oxi la xpa'xti an Dios.
51003002	An tanlhun yu lak'alinachalh talhman yuch'ach'a k'alhak'ap'up'it'it, jantu yu lak'alin lakaat'un.
51003003	Mu uxitnan laknit'itcha, pero an mijatsukuntik'an p'ut'aylhip'int'at'iti an Dios, yucha an Cristojo puma'akanta amijatsukuntik'an.
51003004	Xliyu li akxni an Cristo an yu mijatsukuntik'an, kamincho'oyacha, wa lakatamch'a k'a xlimj t'at'alak'asuya'it la ixta'ayaxtu.
51003005	K'amak'a'untcha chux tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi yu alin la mijatsukuntik'an aniy lakaat'un. Tucha xamati kaxa'alalh li yu ntu t'at'ajun, tucha xamati ka'ilhtulh yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun yu sawalhcha ilhtuputun, tucha xamati wa aya kajalakpastaknalh, chi ntucha xamati wa kalaksk'unla'ts'ilhcha tanlhun, mu li chuncha, chunchacha apalij yu wa tanlhuncha apalij tacha diosnincha jala'ts'inkan.
51003006	Xlakata tacha ani laktanlhun yucha yu kajapumama'alh'ajniya an Dios an yu ntu taja'asmatnan.
51003007	Chi uxitnan xlip'ulhnaj ch'unch'a xlayat.
51003008	Pero chaway k'amak'aw'o'otcha uxitnan chux aniy tanlhun: an talh'amti, an asisi'ut, an lhi'ay junita, an xkayaj chiwinti chi an tanlhuncha chiwinti yu ntu laj'oxi.
51003009	Jant'u k'alamaslak'at'ij'wap'axat'it, mu li uxitnan maj'ant'itcha jatsukunti yu p'ulhnaj xlit'awnat chi yu x'ilht'uyat xlip'ulhnaj.
51003010	Chaway uxitnan sast'ich'a mala'ch'inint'it, yu sast'icha lapanak, yu oxicha tapaxa'anta tacha tasuy Dios yu ta'ilhtun para li oxich'a k'amisp'at'it.
51003011	Ancha jantucha tu'u lhitaplay xamati lapanak masi yu griego u yu judio chi yu akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'a u yu jantu, chi yu jalakpastaknan u yu ntu jalakpastaknan chi yu wa putapatsakancha lapanak u yu jantu., ancha wa yucha an Cristojcha yu lhitapalay chi yucha taput'aw'oyan.
51003012	Pus yu tacha yu yucha an Dioscha tasakxtutani k'alat: la'stalan'an, k'amasut'iti li map'aynik'anat'it, la mimpulaknik'an ka'alilhi jamapayninti, oxi lapanakni k'a'unt'it, k'ajak'ilhp'at'inijk'ats'at, jant'u ay ka'unt'it chi k'alhit'ayanit'iti yu lhima'anxkay.
51003013	K'alalhit'ayanip'axat chi k'alamala'mixinit'iti li tu'u yu ntu oxi tu'u la'ilht'uniyat. Tacha an Cristo tamala'mixinin, wach'u ch'uni k'alat'it.
51003014	Yu palay lhitapalay yucha li k'ap'umala'ch'inint'iti an jamapayninti, mu yucha yu oxi tukan putala'xto'kan.
51003015	An oxi ixjatawlhnat an Cristo yuchacha kach'alhkatnalh an la mijalhunutk'an, mu an Cristo tat'asanin para li wa la'atam lakatunaja k'a'unt'it, para li wa oxich'a k'asa' t'awlat.
51003016	An xchiwinti an Cristo yuchacha yu sawalhcha kastak lhits'uk'ut. Yuch'ach'a k'alap'umasunip'axat chi k'ap'ulamap'a'sip'axat chux tacha an taxta'niyan an jatapast'ak'at an Dios. La mijalhunutk'an k'axt'a'nit'iti lhimala'puchajun an Dios, k'alakmilhp'anit Salmos chi laka milhpat yu minachalh la xTakuwin Dios.
51003017	Chi chux yu nawnat'it ch'i yu ilht'uyat'it, chux la ixtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat Jesusi k'a'ilht'ut'it, yuch'a k'ap'uxt'a'nit lhimala'puchajun an Dios yu kimPayk'an.
51003018	T'akunin, k'aja'asmatnit'iti yu tajunan mint'apapak'an, mu yucha milhi'ilhtutk'ani tacha uxitnan k'iklak'a'iyatcha an Jamach'alhkat.
51003019	Chi uxitnani lapanakni k'amap'aynit'iti mint'iwik'an, jant'u k'ajala'lhit'ama'ch'ap'ut.
51003020	Xajas'at'an, chux yu tajunan milakpaynink'an k'aja'asmatnit, mu chuncha yu oxi lhiwilay an Jamach'alhkat.
51003021	Xalakpaynin, jant'u k'ajala'ma't'alh'amant'iti amijas'at'anink'an, para li ntu katala'ta'oxila'alhilh.
51003022	Ma'tapatsanin, k'aja'asmatnit'iti chux yu tajunan mimpatronk'an yu wa anicha lakaat'un tat'ajun, jantu wa akxni tala'ts'inancha k'aja'asmatnit, para li wa oxicha katalhiwilan, xlisawalh la mijalhunutk'ani ch'unch'a k'a'ilht'ut, wa xliyu li k'iklak'a'iyat'it an Jamach'alhkat.
51003023	Chux yu ilht'uyat, chux la mijalhunutk'an sawalhi k'a'ilht'ut, tacha yu para an Jamach'alhkat, jantu wa para yu'uncha an lapanaknicha.
51003024	Mu k'ats'ayatcha li an Jamach'alhkat katalhi'o'xla'ts'inani kataxta'niyan yu jaxta'niy ixlapanakni. Uxitnan yucha an Jamach'alhkat Cristojo xma'tapatsanin.
51003025	Yu ka'ilhtuya yu ntu oxi wa x'akstucha kamapala ixlakata yu ntu oxi ilhtulh, chi aniy ntu katilasakxtukalh.
51004001	Uxitnani patronin, oxi chi wa tami k'ajaxt'a'nit amima'tapatsanink'an. K'ap'ast'akt'iti li uxitnan wach'u lhit'awnat'iti mimPatronk'an awint'i lakt'iyan.
51004002	Lhilhiji k'at'ap'aynit'it ch'i k'as'alaj ts'uk'ut'it ch'i k'axt'anit'iti lhimala'puchajun an Dios.
51004003	Wachu akilalhitapayniwi kitnan, para li an Jamach'alhkat akinta'a'tayjuni para li aklhichiwiniw an xchiwinti, para li ajkamak'atsaaniniwi an yu ntu k'atsakan yu najun an Cristo, yu iklhilaklhchajuy.
51004004	K'at'ap'aynit'it, para li ts'ajwi akmasulh tacha yu lhitask'iniy ak'ilhtulh.
51004005	Jantu wa paxkatcha k'a'ilht'ut'iti an panch'e'ex, laka jatapast'ak'ati k'ajat'a'aklats'uk'ut an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin.
51004006	Lhi'acha lhilhij k'alakch'iwinint'it chi yu lhi'achaniti k'alakna'unt'it, para li k'ak'ats'at'iti tani k'aja'alht'aya'itcha atamjtamin an lapanakni.
51004007	An kint'ala'ajunk'an Tíquico, yu oxi tapatsani an Jamach'alhkat chi kint'ama'tapatsan li ikt'atapatsayaw an Jamach'alhkat, yucha oxi katajunan tani iklaycha.
51004008	Yuchacha ixlakata li iklalhimala'achaniyaw para li k'ak'ats'at'iti tani ikt'awnawcha, chi chuncha k'ap'ut'a'oximaj'ayat'itcha.
51004009	T'a'antachalh wachu an Onésimo, yu ikmapayniyaw chi yu muktaxtuy sawalh kint'ala'ajunk'an, yucha pumatam de uxitnan. Yu'uncha katajunan chux watuchicha tapasayachilh aniy.
51004010	An Aristarco, yu kint'alaklhchajuy tamak'aniyacha'ani jala'axa'alanti, chi an Marcos, ixprimo an Bernabé. Uxitnan lhimap'a'sik'ant'atcha ixlakata an Marcos, li katala'cha'anan oxi k'ala'a'it'it.
51004011	Wachu tala'axa'alayan an Jesús yu tajuniy ma Justo. Wa yu'uncha yu judiojnini yu kinta'a'tayjuy ixlakata an xlich'alhkat Dios. Chi sawalhcha ijkaputa'oximaj'ayay.
51004012	Tamak'aniyan jala'axa'alanti an Epafras pumatam xma'tsuku an Cristo Jesús, yucha pumatam de uxitnan chi yucha lhilhiji talhitapayniyan akxni tapayni, para li oxicha tukan sawalhi k'at'a'aklats'uk'ut an Dios, chi para li chuxi k'a'ilht'ut yu oxi lhiwilay an Dios.
51004013	Kit'in ijk'atsayi li an Epafras sawalhcha talhakapu'anani uxitnan chi an yu tawilananchalh la'acha'an Laodicea chi an la'acha'an Hierápolis.
51004014	An Lucas an yu sawalh oxi lhiwilakan jak'uch'unu tala'axa'alayan chi an Demas.
51004015	K'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu tawilananchalh Laodicea. Wach'u k'ala'axa'alat'iti an Ninfa chi an yu tata'ayxt'o'a an la ixcha'a'.
51004016	Akxni p'unaw'oyatcha ani karta, k'amala'ach'atcha an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Laodicea, para li wachucha kajapunawnikalhi ancha. Ch'i wach'u k'ap'una'unt'iti an karta yu ijkamala'achanilh an yu Laodicea tawilananchalh.
51004017	Ch'unch'uniya k'a'unit an Arquipo: K'alhak'ap'up'i li oxi k'amukt'axt'ut'i an tapatsat yu xta'nin an Jamach'alhkat.
51004018	Kit'in ikPablo la kimaka iklats'o'niyawi ani jala'axa'alanti. K'ap'ast'akt'iti li kit'in iklaklhchajuy. An Dios katamapaynin.
52001001	Kit'in ikPablo chi an Silvano chi an Timoteo iklala'axa'alayaw an yu k'iklak'a'iyat'it Dios an la'acha'an Tesalónica yu t'at'ala'xt'o'at an kimPayk'an Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesús. Lhuw xjamapayninti chi oxi ixjatawlhnati kataxta'nin an Dios t'an t'awnat'it.
52001002	Lhilhiji ikxta'niyaw lhimala'puchajun an Dios milakatak'an minchuxk'an, iklapast'ak'awi la kintapaynitk'an.
52001003	Lhilhiji iklapast'ak'aw la x'ukxlakapu an kimPayk'an Dios ixlakata an tapatsat an yu ilht'ut'at wa xliyu li jak'iklak'a'ininat, chi ixlakata an tapatsat yu tama'ilhtuyan an mijamapaynintik'an chi ixlakata li lhilhiji t'aylhip'inat p'akxan'iyat'iti an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
52001004	T'ala'awnin, an Dios tamapayniyan, ijk'atsayawi li yucha tasakxtutan,
52001005	mu akxni iklalhixa'alawcha an laj'oxi chiwinti, jantu wa laka chiwinticha iklajuniw, wachu laka alhp'asninti, kanajuw, an laka stalan'a Takuwin chi laka jakiklaka'inti sawalh. Uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat li akxni ancha xaklat'a'aklat'awnacha'aw yu oxi para uxitnani ikpuxkajuw.
52001006	Uxitnan ch'unch'a lat'it tacha iklayaw chi tacha masuy an Jamach'alhkat, ch'i lhi'ach'a la'a'it an chiwinti yu an Stalan'a Takuwin taxta'nin masi lhuw lhima'alh'ajna xlit'awnat.
52001007	Chunchacha yu oxich'a jamasunit para li katala'ts'ixtun ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'iy Dios yu talakwilananchalh an xalakaat'un Macedonia chi Acaya.
52001008	Uxitnani yu p'u'a't'aynik'ant'it, an xchiwinti an Jamach'alhkat ta'a'pitsilhcha, jantu wa Macedoniajcha chi Acayajcha k'atsaakalh wanaj ta lakachux, chi k'atsaakani t'ach'a an k'iklak'a'iyat an Dios, pus tucha task'iniya li kitnan tu'u aknajuw.
52001009	Wa tanchuncha kawalh an lapanakni talaknajuni tani sawalhcha oxi kilala'a'iw, akxni iklala'cha'aw, ch'i li jamak'a'unt'itcha an yu xjala'ts'inat tacha midiosnink'an an yu wa lapanaknicha tala'la'oxiy, ch'i t'at'ap'ats'atcha an yu Dios sawalh, yu la'ajunta.
52001010	Uxitnan a't'aynitch'a p'akxan'iyat tani wanancha kachina an isTs'alh Dios yu kaminanta lakt'iyan, yucha an Jesús, yu an Dios mala'awnicho'olh yu akintama'alhtaxtuniyan an laka lhima'alh'ajna yu ka'alina'.
52002001	Kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li akxni iklakila'kilaw jantu wa paxkatcha walh.
52002002	Masi t'ach'a k'ats'ayatcha li xlip'ulhnaj wa xkayajcha kintajunkan chi kintala'lhitama'chapukancha an la'acha'an Filipos. An Dios kinta'a'tayjun para li la'jo'atni akjunwi aklamak'atsaaniw an laj'oxi xchiwinti, masi wanaj xluwk'ani yu wa xtalhitalh'aman.
52002003	Mu kitnan jantu wa xakta'elh'o'xcho'otawcha tacha an xaklhichiwinaw chi ntu xakchiwininaw wa xliyu li wa tu'ucha yu ntucha oxi xak'ilhtuputunaw, chi ntu wa xajka'o'xcho'onunawcha.
52002004	Yucha an Diosi kintasakxtun chi kintalhijunincha li ajkamak'atsaaniniw an laj'oxi chiwinti, chi chunchacha yu ikchiwiniw. Jantu wa yucha an lapanaknicha ijkama'an'achaputunaw, yucha an Dios, yu oxi lhakapu'an an kijalhunutk'an.
52002005	Tacha uxitnan k'ats'ayat'it, jantu a'tami sawalhcha oxi aklalhichiwiniw laka lajk'usi chiwinti chi li tu'ucha ak'ilhtuw para li wa aklamaxtuniwcha tumin. Dios oxi k'atsay.
52002006	Jantu ikpuxkawyaw li wa sawalhcha oxi kala'ts'inkalh xamati u uxitnan u ali'in.
52002007	Kitnan yu Cristo kintamala'achayan masi layi aklama'achapuw uxitnan, kitnan laka jamapayninti klala'ts'inaw. Tacha xamati xanati yu mats'ik'iy yu lakat'ikt'ika xjas'at'a chi an ali'in xjas'at'an jalhistakpalay.
52002008	Chuncha kitnan, wa xliyu klamapayniyaw, klaj'achanawi klat'alamasuniyaw an laj'oxi chiwinti chi ntu wa yucha an laj'oxicha chiwinti, wachu an kijatsukuntik'an, tachanu iklaxta'niyaw. ¡Sawalhcha iklamapayniyaw!
52002009	T'ala'awnin, uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti tacha p'as iktapatsaw para li lay aktsuku. Ts'isi chi tunku xaktapatsayaw para li ntu xamati yu uxitnan aksk'iniw tu'u', chi kitnan xaklalhixa'alayawcha an laj'oxi ixchiwinti Dios.
52002010	Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'it, chi an Dios wachu li lakilakatijlak'an stalan'a klat'a'aklatsukutaw uxitnan, yu k'iklak'a'iyat an Dios, chi ts'awj chi tacha ntu xamati tu'u lay akintajunin.
52002011	Ch'i wach'u k'ats'ayat'iti tani iklaxa'alawcha chi tani iklama'oximaj'ayawcha atamjtamin uxitnan, tacha pumatam xapay yu jamap'a'siy an xjas'at'an.
52002012	Chi xaklajunawi li oxi k'ats'uk'ut tacha yu lhi'achani an Dios yu tat'asaniyancha la xlich'alhkat chi tan xlimj wilhchalh.
52002013	Xliyu kitnan jantu sa' ijkilhunaw, lhilhiji ikxta'niyaw lhimala'puchajun an Dios. Mu akxni asmatt'itcha an ixchiwinti Dios yu iklalhixa'alaw, k'iklak'a'it'iti tacha ixchiwinti Dios mu yucha sawalhi an ixchiwinti, jant'u k'iklak'a'it'it tacha wa xchiwinticha lapanak. Chi uxitnan yu k'iklak'a'iyatcha an xchiwinti an Dios la mijatsukuntichak'ani tapatsay.
52002014	T'ala'awnin, akxni uxitnan talhitama'chapun an yu wa mint'amacha'achak'an, wanajcha chuni p'ut'ap'asat tacha an taputapasalh an yu takiklaka'iy Dios yu tat'atala'xt'o'a an Cristo Jesús an xalakaat'un Judea, yu'uncha wachu jalhitama'chapukalh, wa yu'uncha an ixt'amacha'anchak'an yu judiojnin.
52002015	An ani judiojnin tala'ma'nilhi an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios ma'anchacha chi wachu tama'nilhi an Jamach'alhkat Jesús. Chi kintatamakxtun, jantu tama'an'achayi an Dios chi watichicha lapanak, jantu xamati tu'u ta'asmatniy.
52002016	Mu akxni ijkaxa'alaputunawi an yu ntu judiojnin, para li wachu katata'alhtaxtulh, jantu kintamakawniyan. Chunchacha ali ali talalhawat'ajun xtala'alhink'an masi talhit'ajuncha. Pero para li kajamak'akxakanacha, an ay ma'alh'ajnat yu xt'a'a an Dios kajala'cha'anacha.
52002017	T'ala'awnin, akxni iklat'alamakaju la'atam panch'e'ex, masi ntu xaklala'ts'inaw, lhilhiji xaklalhit'awnaw la kijalhunutk'an chi sawalhcha xajk'uxa'anacha'aw lala'ts'inin.
52002018	Ik'ilhtuwi xajk'uxa'anacha'aw; kit'in Pablo a'lhuwi ik'ilhtulh xajk'uxa'anachalh, pero an satanás jantu kintamakawnin.
52002019	Pus, ¿tisapiyu yu ikpakxan'iyawcha yu ki'achatchak'an chi yu aklhi'achanawcha la ix'ukxlakapu an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesús akxni kamincho'oyacha? Uxitnan, jantu tu'u atumpaj kawalh.
52002020	Chun, uxitnani yu ikputa'ayayaw chi iklhi'achanaw.
52003001	Pus, mu ntucha layi ali iklhitayaniyaw li klala'ts'imputunaw, ikpastakwi li aktamakajuwi wa ki'astuk'an an Atenas,
52003002	chi an kint'ala'ajunk'an Timoteo iklamala'achanicha'awcha. Yucha t'atapatsay an Dios chi kintat'atapatsayan li ikma'pitsiyaw an laj'oxi xchiwinti Cristo. Ikmak'ancha'aw para li katat'alamak'ut'ilin chi katat'alama'oximaj'ayani la mijakiklaka'intik'an,
52003003	para li ntu katamamakawnini amijakiklaka'intik'an aniy tanlhun lhima'alh'ajna. Mu uxitnan k'ats'ayat'itcha li kala'ma'alh'ajnanaw.
52003004	Atumpaj, akxni xakt'awnachalh t'an wilhchi'it uxitnan, iklajuniwi li kapula'pusawi tanlhun lhima'alh'ajna, chi chunchacha tapasalh, t'ach'a k'ats'ayatcha.
52003005	Xliyu kit'in, mu ntucha lay ali iklhitayanilh, ikmak'anchalhi an Timoteo para li ka'anchalh k'atsaana t'ani t'awnatcha la mijakiklaka'intik'an. Jantu junita katalhila'ts'intanuncha an jalhila'ts'intanunu chi katama'ilhtuncha yu ntu oxi chi an kintapatsatk'an wa paxkatcha kawalh.
52003006	Pero chaway an Timoteo tasp'itcho'ochalhcha Tesalónica, chi oxi chiwinti kintalhiminin ixlakata an mijakiklaka'intik'an chi an jamapayninti yu uxitnan lhit'awnat. Kintajunan li ma lhilhiji kilapast'ak'aw laka jamapayninti, chi ma sawalhcha kilala'ts'imputunaw tacha kitnank'an iklala'ts'imputunaw.
52003007	Xliyu'u t'ala'awnin, xtan'ajni chux tacha an tucha k'is oxi k'ak'atsa chi laka lhima'alh'ajna, uxitnan kilaxta'niwi ta'oximaj'ayat akxni ijk'atsaw li jak'iklak'a'ininat'it.
52003008	Li ijk'atsayawcha li uxitnan oxi t'a'aklat'awnat an Jamach'alhkat, kintama'oximaj'ayayan.
52003009	¿Tasucha lay aklhixta'niyaw yu sawalhcha lhuw lhimala'puchajun an Dios milakatak'an chi ixlakata an lhuw achat yu kilaxta'niyaw la x'ukxlakapu yucha?
52003010	Tunku chi ts'isi iklhitapaynisk'iniyaw li akintamakawnini aklala'ts'impalaw para li lay aklaxta'niw yu ts'an'aniy a mijakiklaka'intik'an.
52003011	Yucha an kimPayk'an Dios chi an kiJamach'alhkatchak'an Jesucristojo akinta'a'tayjun para li lay ak'ancha'aw lala'ts'inin.
52003012	Chi an Jamach'alhkat katala'ayanin chi katalalhawanini an jamapayninti yu k'alap'umap'aynip'axat'it chi yu chux lapanak k'ap'umap'aynit'it, tacha kitnan wachu iklamapayniyaw uxitnan.
52003013	Yucha katalak'ut'ilinin mijalhunutk'an, jantu tu'u katalhimuk'an li t'u'u lhits'an'ayat la x'ukxlakapu an kimPayk'an Dios, akxni kamincho'oya yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo ali chux an ixlapanakni. Chunchacha kawalh.
52004001	T'ala'awnin, chaway, iklatapaynisk'iniyaw chi klalhijunaw la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat Jesús li ali k'at'aylhip'it'iti k'ats'uk'ut tacha iklamasuniw, para li k'ama'an'ach'at'iti an Dios, t'ach'a ilht'ut'awnatcha.
52004002	Uxitnan k'ats'ayatcha tani iklajuniwch'a k'alat ixlakata an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
52004003	Mu an Dios yu lakask'in li la'stalan'ani k'ats'uk'ut, li nt'u k'at'at'amat'iti li yu nt'u t'at'awnat'it.
52004004	Atamj tamin de uxitnan ka k'atsaalhi tani kalhilhitsukulhcha stalan'a xt'iwi' chi tacha oxi kala'ts'inkalh.
52004005	Jant'u wa t'ani k'alat'itcha li sawalhch'a k'a'ilht'up'ut'ut tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi la milakatunjk'an, tacha talay an yu ntu tamispay Dios.
52004006	Jantu xamati wa tani ka'ilhtulhcha chi wa ka'o'xcho'olhcha xamati yu wachu jakiklaka'inin, mu an Jamach'alhkat yucha chuxi kalhach'inin'oya yu yucha ixlakata, tacha iklajuntawcha.
52004007	Mu an Dios jantu kintat'asanin para li wa laklhits'isitnicha kajunwi, yucha kintat'asanin para li la'stalan'ani kajunwi.
52004008	Pus yu wa la'amaj'ani ani yu lhinawkan, jantu wa lapanaki la'amaj'an, yu la'amaj'an, Dios, yu taxta'niyan an Stalan'a Takuwin.
52004009	Xlakata li k'alamap'aynip'axat li lhit'ala'awnin, jant'u ma'lht'ask'iniyat'iti li aklats'o'niw, mu wanaj yucha an Diosi tamasunitan li k'alamap'aynip'axat.
52004010	Ch'i ch'unch'ach'a ilht'uyat jamap'ayniyat ixchuxk'an an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu tawilanalh ta xlijalhi'ay an xalakaat'un Macedonia. Pero iklatapaynisk'iniyawi kint'ala'awnin li ali ali k'alamap'aynip'axat.
52004011	K'alhip'uxk'awnit'iti tani ntucha xamati wa katat'ala'ajin, wa yu milhilhakapu'atchak'ani k'alaklhak'ap'up'it chi wa k'at'ap'ats'atcha la mimakak'an tacha klajuntawcha k'a'ilht'ut.
52004012	Para li katalhiwilani an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin ch'i nt'u xamat'i k'ama'ach'ap'ut li ma'lht'ask'iniyat tu'u'.
52004013	T'ala'awnin, klakask'inaw li k'ak'ats'at'iti tani talaycha an yu talakniycha, para li uxitnan jant'u k'ala't'a'oxila'alhit'it tacha an ali'in yu an jantu tu'u tapakxan'iy.
52004014	Tacha kiklaka'iyawi li an Jesús nilh chi la'awcho'olh, wanajcha chuni an Dios kajat'alhimincho'oya an Jesús an lapanakni an yu tat'atala'xto'lhi chi talaknilhcha.
52004015	Yu chaway ani ijkamak'atsaanininaw xchiwinti an Jamach'alhkat: li yu la'la'awtawka katamakawnaw, sta akxni kamincho'oyacha an Jamach'alhkat, jantu katijatap'ulhniwi an yu talaknitacha.
52004016	Mu ka'alha'asmatkana an Jamach'alhkat Dios la xchiwinti yu puch'alhkatnan, kachiwina pumatam xa'ay angel chi la ixtrompeta an Dios p'asi kas'olhkana li ta'alhtajut'ajuncha an lakt'iyan an Jamach'lhkat. Chi an yu talaknitacha yu takiklaka'ilh an Cristo, p'ulhnajcha katala'awcho'oya'.
52004017	Xli'astan kitnan, yu la'la'awtawka yu tamakawtawka, akintat'alhi'ankanancha laka jataputs'i an yu katala'awcho'oyacha. Para li kala'cha'anawcha an Jamach'alhkat an laka un chi xpujun'alhincha kat'a'aklatsukuyaw an Jamach'alhkat.
52004018	Pus k'alama'oximaj'ayap'axatcha atamjtamin laka ani lakchiwinti.
52005001	T'ala'awnin yu ixlakata an fechas chi ixlakata an tanlhuncha ixpaku tu'u laktapasay jant'u ma'lht'ask'iniyat'iti li aklats'o'niw.
52005002	Mu uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat li jantu xamati k'atsay an wilhchan yu kapumincho'oya an Jamach'alhkat, katapasaya tacha akxni chin an ja'alhawana akxni puts'ista.
52005003	Akxni an lapanakni katanawna: Chaway chuxcha oxi jun'olh, chaway oxicha sa' wilaw, akxnicha ka las jala'china xlinink'an, tacha an la'chin lhima'alh'ajna an yu ja'aynanta t'aku', chi ntu katitata'alhtaxtulh.
52005004	Pero uxitnani t'ala'awnin, jantu lakaaputs'isni t'awnat'it, xliyu anchunu wilhchan jantu katitala'chini tacha pumatam ja'alhawna'.
52005005	Mu chux uxitnan xjas'at'an jatapulhkunu chi xjas'at'an jatunkunu'; kitnan tu xjas'at'an jatats'isni chi ntu xjas'at'an tan s'oya' wilh.
52005006	Pus kitnan jantu kalaklhtatawi tacha an ali'in, kitnan kakujwi chi kinta'oxixtuk'ani katsuku.
52005007	Mu an ali'in tacha an yu talaklhtatanan akxni puts'ista chi tacha an yu tala't'a'ap'ay akxni puts'ista.
52005008	Pero kitnan, yu ixlapanakni an jatunkunu, kinta'oxixtuk'ani katsukuw. Kitnan kala'ch'iwi an jakiklaka'inti chi an jamapayninti tacha la'atam ts'asnat yu pamatanchanankan tan lasakan. Chi li pakxan'iyaw an ta'alhtaxtut tachanu la'patanumaw la'atam la'patanut yu ts'asnat yu pulasakan.
52005009	Mu an Dios yucha ntu kintalhimalakxtutan li kala'a'iw an lhima'alh'ajna, kitnan kintamakmin li kaputa'alhtaxtuwi an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
52005010	Yucha nilhi kilakatak'an, para li masi li la'awtawka u nitawcha kat'atawlhcha'awi tan wilhchalh.
52005011	Pus xliyu k'alama'oximaj'ayap'axat'it chi k'alamach'ap'up'axat'iti atamjtamin tacha yu ilht'ut'awnatcha chaway.
52005012	T'ala'awnin, klatapaynisk'iniyaw li k'ajalhiwilat'iti an yu tatapatsay an t'an wilat, yu tajunan t'ani k'ats'uk'utcha li k'iklak'a'it'atcha an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo chi yu tamap'a'siyan.
52005013	Sawalhcha talhitapalayi k'ajala'ts'int'it chi k'ajamap'aynit'it ixlakata an tapatsat an ta'ilhtuy. Wa oxicha k'alala'ts'imp'axat.
52005014	Wachu klalhijunawi t'ala'awnin, li k'ajalaj'aymat'iti an yu ntu tatapatsaputun, li k'ajama'oximaj'ayat'iti an yu wa t'iya'cha talay, li k'aja'a't'ay'ut'iti an yu ntucha lajk'ut'ilin chi li k'ajalhit'ayanit'iti ixchuxk'an.
52005015	K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti li ntu xamati'ini wa katalamapusp'itnicho'olhcha lhi'ay junita, yu si laj'oxi tanlhuni k'ala'ilht'unit uxitnan, chi ntu wa siya uxitnancha, ta lhichuxi oxi k'aja'ilht'unit tu'u'.
52005016	Lhilhiji k'alaj'ach'ant'it.
52005017	Lhilhiji k'at'ap'aynit'it.
52005018	Chux wa tuchicha ixlakata k'axt'a't'iti lhimala'puchajun, mu an Dios chuncha lakask'in li k'a'ilht'ut'it, li uxitnan k'iklak'a'it'atcha an Cristo Jesús.
52005019	Jant'u k'ala'amaj'ant'iti an yu ilhtuy an Takuwin.
52005020	Jant'u wa k'ala'amaj'ant'iti an lapanak yu najun ixchiwinti Dios.
52005021	Chuxi k'alhila'ts'int'anut'it ch'i k'ach'ap'aya'utcha yu oxi.
52005022	Chux watuchicha yu ntu oxi jant'u k'a'ilht'ut.
52005023	Wanaj yucha an Dios yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnati katalastalan'a'ojon. Chux mijatsukuntik'an, mintakuwink'an, chi milakatunajk'an stalan'a kama'alh para akxni kachinacha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
52005024	An yu kintat'asaniyan jantu wa maslakatinincha, yucha kamuktaxtu'oya sawalhi yu najun.
52005025	T'ala'awnin, wachu akilalhitapayniwi kitnan.
52005026	K'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti ixchuxk'an an kint'ala'awnink'an laka stalan'a jala'xtikilhtastuknut.
52005027	Iklalhijunaw la x'ukxlakapu an Jamach'alhkat li k'ajap'unawnit'iti ani kartaj ixchuxk'an an kijat'ala'awnink'an.
52005028	An xjamapayninti an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo katat'atamakajuncha. Chunchacha kajunlhi.
53001001	Kit'in ikPablo chi an Silvano chi an Timoteo iklala'axa'alayaw uxitnan yu k'iklak'a'iyat Dios yu wilhchi'it la'acha'an Tesalónica, yu t'at'ala'xt'o't'at an kimPayk'an Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo.
53001002	An kimPayk'an Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo kataxta'nini jamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnat.
53001003	T'ala'awnin, lhilhiji akxta'niw lhimala'puchajun an Dios milakatak'an, tacha t'acha'an li ak'ilhtuw, mu amijakiklaka'intik'an uxitnan ta'ayat'ajun chi palay palaych'a lap'umap'aynip'axayat.
53001004	Masi kitnan, lhi'achacha iklalhichiwininaw an tan tala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios. Xlakata li lajk'ut'ilin ch'i li masuyat'iti li jak'iklak'a'ininat, masi xtan'ajni t'awnat chux tanlhun lalhitama'chapu chi ma'alh'ajnanat.
53001005	Ani tasuycha li ts'ajwi ch'alhkatnan an Dios chi masuycha li yucha ta'ilhtuyancha li t'ach'ip'inatcha li lay k'at'anuchi'it tan ch'alhkatnan yu lhima'alh'ajnant'awnat'it.
53001006	An Dios mu yucha ts'ajwi lats'awalay an tanlhun, yucha kajamama'alh'ajniya yu tamama'alh'ajniyan uxitnan.
53001007	Chi uxitnan, yu ma'alh'ajnanat'it, kataxta'niyani jastaknat chi kitnan. Chuncha katapasaya akxni an Jamach'alhkat Jesús chi an laktachapunin x'angelhnin katatalakasuyacha sta anu lakt'iyan, la xpujan jikmi yu lam lam anta.
53001008	Para li kajamama'alh'ajniyacha an yu ntu tamispay Dios chi ntu takiklaka'iy an laj'oxi xchiwinti an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesús.
53001009	Yu'uncha katama'alh'ajnana yu xpujun'alhincha jalakt'ilhinti, jantu katitala'ts'ilhi tan katayaya an Jamach'alhkat chi ntu katitala'ts'inilhi an xta'ayat xlich'alhkat.
53001010	Chuncha katapasaya anchunu wilhchan akxni an Jamach'alhkat kamincho'oyacha, para li an yu la'stalan'an ixlapanakni ayi katala'ts'ilh chi para li katalhi'a'nilhi ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'ilh. Mu uxitnan k'iklak'a'it'iti akxni klajuniw yu ijk'atsayaw.
53001011	An Dios tat'asanitan para li ixlapanakni k'a'unt'it, chi kitnan iktapaynisk'iniyaw para li kata'a'tayjuni k'ats'uk'ut tacha yucha lakask'in. Wachu iklhitapaynisk'iniyaw li kata'a'tayjuni para li layi k'a'ilht'u'o'ot chux yu laj'oxi yu tama'ilhtuyan mijalakpastaknatk'an chi amijakiklaka'intik'an.
53001012	Para li chuncha an ixta'a'ut an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo ayi kala'ts'inkana milakatak'an. Chi uxitnan wachu laj'ajini k'ala'ts'ink'ana'it ixlakata an oxi xjamapayninti an kiDiosk'an chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo.
53002001	Pero ixlakata akxni kamincho'oya an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo chi li kat'ata'ayxt'o'awcha, iklatapaynisk'iniyawi t'ala'awnin
53002002	li ntu wa tacha tu'u wa las k'amap'axat mijatapast'ak'atk'an. Chi ntu xamati katala'me'e'swan yu katajunin li masunilhcha tu'u takuwin, u li tu'ucha masunikalh laka chiwinti u laka cartaj tan tacha kitnancha akts'o'wi, tan kanawlh li an wilhchan yu kapuchina an Jamach'alhkat chilhcha.
53002003	Jantu xamati tu'u katapu'o'xcho'on. Mu anchunu wilhchan jantuka' katichilhi li ntuka' tapasayi akxni kat'alaxtukukana an Dios, akxni katalakasuya an ayajk'atsan lapanak yu kaxta'nikana xma'alh'ajnat li kats'an'aya'.
53002004	Ani ayajk'atsan lapanak tanchay chi t'alaxtukuyi chux yu lhi'an xta'a'ut an Dios u tu'ucha yu ay la'ts'inkan, sta a'ch'apayi an xtajtan an Dios chi yuchacha najun li Dios.
53002005	¿Jant'u p'ast'ak'at'iti akxni xaklat'a'aklat'awnaw li kit'in xaklajunawi li chuncha katapasaya'?
53002006	Chi chaway uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti tuchini yu tanchanicha para li ntuka' katalakasulhi li ntuka' ixpaku '.
53002007	Chun sawalh an yu ntu lay la'tsi'nkan, an lhi'ay junita, tapats'at'ajuncha; pero wa x'amancha ts'an'ay li kama'osukalhi an xtan'ajni yu chaway tanchaniy.
53002008	Wachuncha, katalakasuyacha anchunu ayajk'atsan, pero an Jamach'alhkat Jesús kama'niya', wa kasuna la xkilhni, chi kapulakt'ilhi'oya tacha an kaxlimj china'.
53002009	Yucha an Satanasi ka'a'tayjuya ani ayajk'atsan para li lay kachilh. Alhp'asi kachina', chi kalakmasuya tanlhun chi kalak'ilhtuya yu ntu wa lapanakcha lay lak'ilhtuy, yu wa xpa'o'xcho'oncha kajuna'.
53002010	Chi chux watuchicha yu ntu oxi kala'xa'a'i'oya para li lay kajalaj'o'xcho'olh an yu katats'an'aya', wa xliyu li ntu tala'a'ilh chi ntu tamapaynilhi an yu sawalh, para li kaxtata'alhtaxtulh.
53002011	Xliyu an Dios kajamak'aniya alhp'as ja'o'xcho'onti, para li katakiklaka'ilhi an maslakatinti.
53002012	Para li kajaxta'nikalhi lhima'alh'ajna ixchuxk'an an yu ntu takiklaka'ilh an yu sawalh, apalij ta'achanilhi an yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun.
53002013	T'ala'awnin, an Jamach'alhkat tamapayniyan chi an Dios yucha p'ulhnaj tasakxtun uxitnan, para li katama'alhtaxtun. Xliyu kitnan lhilhiji ikxta'niyaw lhimala'puchajun an Dios milakatak'an. Uxitnan t'a'alht'axt'ut'atcha mu tamastalan'atancha an Takuwin chi ixlakata li k'iklak'a'iyatcha an yu sawalh.
53002014	Yucha aniya talhit'asanin an Dios an laka laj'oxi chiwinti yu kitnan ijkamak'atsaanininaw: para li k'at'at'ala'xt'o't'iti an Jesucristo akxni ay tukan kala'ts'inkana'.
53002015	T'ala'awnin, pus oxi k'ak'ut'iklh ts'uk'ut'it, ch'i nt'u k'ak'apt'iti tacha an klamasuniw wa laka chiwinti chi laka cartaj.
53002016	An kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo chi an kimPayk'an Dios yu'uncha kintamapaynin, chi la xjamapaynintik'an kintaxta'nini oxamixat yu xpujun'alhincha chi kintaxta'nini yu oxi pakxan'iyaw,
53002017	yu'uncha katama'oximaj'ayan chi katalak'ut'ilinin mijalhunutk'an, para li chuxi oxi k'a'ilht'ut wa tuchicha laka chiwinti u laka tapatsat.
53003001	Yu xli'astancha, t'ala'awnin, akilalhitapayniwi kitnan, para li an xchiwinti an Jamach'alhkat wa lasi kacha'alh wa tanchuncha kawalh chi oxi kala'a'ikalh, tacha uxitnan la'a'it.
53003002	Wach'u k'alhit'ap'aynit'iti para li akintama'alhtaxtukani la xmakak'an an lapanakni yu wa ay tajunita chi an yu wa tani tajatapastaknancha, mu ntu lhichuxi jakiklaka'ininkan.
53003003	Pero an Jamach'alhkat yu najun yucha muktaxtuy, yucha lajk'ut'ilini kata'ilhtuyan chi ntu katimakawlhi li ta kata'ilhtun an yu wa ay junita.
53003004	Yucha an Jamach'alhkati ikpukiklaka'iyaw li uxitnan ilht'uyat chi ali k'a'ilht'uya'it'iti tacha an iklalhijunaw k'a'ilht'ut.
53003005	An Jamach'alhkat kata'a'tayjuni k'ajamap'ayninint'it tacha Dios jamapayninin, ch'i k'alhit'ayanit'iti, tacha lhitayanilh an Cristo.
53003006	T'ala'awnin, la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo iklajunaw li k'amak'a'unt'iti wa tichicha kint'ala'ajunk'an yu ntu tapatsaputun tacha kitnan klamasunitaw.
53003007	Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti tani klamasunitawcha k'ats'uk'ut. Kitnan xaktapatsayawi akxni xaklat'a'aklat'awnacha'aw.
53003008	Chi ntu xamati k'uniw tu'u li ntucha akmapalhniw. Tunku chi puts'ista kitnan p'asi iktapatsaw chi ntu ijkastaknaw para li ntu xamati yu uxitnan akma'achapuw.
53003009	Chi li chuncha ik'ilhtuw, jantu wa xliyu li ntucha xakt'acha'anawi li xakila'a'tayjuw, chuncha k'ilhtuw para li akilala'ts'ixtuw.
53003010	Mu akxni an t'an wilhchi'it xakt'awnacha'aw chunchuniya klajuniw: yu ntu tapatsaputun wachu ntu kawaylh.
53003011	Ijk'atsayaw li an t'an wilhchi'it ma ali'in yu uxitnan ma wa tani talaycha, ma ntu tatapatsay ma wa tanlhuncha tama'ch'axpatanuy yu ntu xkwentajk'an.
53003012	Anchunu lapanakni yu chuncha talay ijkajunaw la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo li laksnicha katatapatsalh para li ka'alilhi yu kata'ulh.
53003013	T'ala'awnin, uxitnan jant'u k'ala'lho'ont'iti k'a'ilht'ut yu laj'oxi tanlhun.
53003014	Li xamati ntu asmat'a tacha an klajunaw lhamap'a'sin aniy laka cartaj k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti tichini yuchacha, ch'i nt'u k'at'at'ala'xt'o't'it, para li kamaxanalh.
53003015	Pero nt'u k'ala'ts'int'it tacha mint'alaxkayk'an wa k'amak'ats'aanit'iti li ntu oxi tani laycha tacha mint'ala'ajunk'an.
53003016	An xaJamach'alhkat oxi jatawlhnat yuchacha kataxta'nin oxi jatawlhnat lhilhij chi wa tuchicha panch'e'ex t'awnat'it. An Jamach'alhkat minchuxk'ani katat'a'aklatsukun.
53003017	Kit'in ikPablo, la kimaka chi la kijats'o'nuti iklats'o'niyaw ani jala'axa'alanti, aniy chunchacha putasuy yu kijats'o'nut chux an la kincarta; chuncha ijkats'o'nun kit'in.
53003018	An xjamapayninti an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo minchuxk'ani k'alhits'uk'ut. Chunchacha kawalh.
54001001	Kit'in ikPablo, yu kimala'achalh an Cristo Jesús, yucha an Diosi chuncha kilhijuni yu kiJamach'alhkatk'an chi an Cristo Jesús, yu pakxan'iyaw.
54001002	Ikla'axa'alay an Timoteo, yu kints'alh sawalh an laka jakiklaka'inti. An kimPayk'an Dios chi an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Cristo Jesús kataxta'nini jamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnat.
54001003	Akxni ik'alh xalakaat'un Macedonia iktapaynisk'inini li k'at'amak'awchi an la'acha'an Éfeso. Chi iklhijunin li k'aja'un tichi yu'uncha lapanakni li ntu katamasulhi yu ntu xasawalh lhamap'a'sin.
54001004	Chi li ntu katalhakapu'alhi yu wa cuentojcha chi wa tanlhuncha lakchiwinti yu ntu min'ojoy, ixlakatak'an an yu ta xtalhila'ts'in. Mu ixlakata aniy tanlhun yucha wa pulaxtukukancha, jantu ja'a'tayjununi li kataylhi'ankalhi an xtapatsat Dios yu laka jakiklaka'inti pu'ilhtukan. Chuncha iklhimap'a'siyan chaway.
54001005	Ch'unch'a k'a'ilht'u para li an jamapayninti tan stalan'a jalhunuti kaminchalh, tan laka oxi jatapast'ak'at chi tan laka sawalh jakiklaka'inti.
54001006	Ali'in lh'awitcha tach'axpataxtulhi ani chi tats'an'atacha, wa tan wa lalhikikxtukukancha yu ntu lhitapalay tanlhuni tat'ajun.
54001007	Ma xamaestrojnincha xlamap'a'sin Diosi tajumputun, masi yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xayi yu tanajun chi masi yu lhitala'sicha tamasuy.
54001008	Pero k'atsayawi li an lhamap'a'sin oxi, li oxi putapatsakan.
54001009	Kapastakwi li an lhamap'a'sin jantu xta'kalh ixlakata an yu oxi t'ajun. Yucha lhtukalh ixlakatak'an an yu wa tani talaycha chi ntu taja'asmatnan, ixlakatak'an an yu wa ay tajunita chi ta'ilhtuy xtala'alhink'an, ixlakatak'an an yu ntu tu'u talhiwilay Dios chi ntu tu'u talhiwilay an jakiklaka'inti. Xlakatak'an an yu tama'ni xpayk'an u xnatik'an, chi para ixchuxk'an an jama'ninin.
54001010	Chi wachu ixlakatak'an an yu tat'atamay yu ntu tat'at'ajun, chi an yu wa t'akunin tak'atsan masi lapanakni, chi an yu ta'alhawst'ay lapanakni, chi an maslakatinin chi an yu tanajun tu'u li katamuktaxtuya walh chi ntu ta'ilhtuy. Xlakata yucha lhi'ilhtukalh an lhamap'a'sin para wa tichicha yu ntu la'ts'imputun an oxi chiwinti.
54001011	Aniy chiwinti yucha an oxi Diosi kilhijuni li akmasulh.
54001012	Ikxta'niy lhimala'puchajuni an yu kila'oximaj'ayay, an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Cristo Jesús. Mu yucha kila'ts'ilhi li ikmuktaxtuy sawalhi yu iknajun pus kixta'nilhi tapatsat.
54001013	Masi li kit'in wa aya xaklhichiwiniya xlip'ulhnaj, chi xakch'a'o'ayi li xaklhitama'chapuy chi xkayaj xajkuniy. Pero an Dios kimapaynilh kimak'akxanilh, mu kit'in tuka' xajkakiklaka'inin chi ntu xajk'atsay tuchi xak'ilhtuy.
54001014	Pero an xjamapayninti an kiJamach'alhkatk'an lhuw tukani kimakminilh la kijatsukunti chi kixta'nilhi an jakiklaka'inti chi an jamapayninti yu lhit'ajun an Cristo Jesús.
54001015	Aniy yucha chun sawalh, chi lhichuxi kakiklaka'ikalh: li an Cristo Jesús kilachilhi an lakamunulhpa para li kajama'alhtaxtulhi an ma'lhta'alhinin, chi de yu'uncha kit'in p'ulhnaj tukan.
54001016	Pero yuchacha ixlakata li kimak'akxanilhi an Dios, para li an Jesucristo kamasu'olh chuxi lakijatsukunti li kintalhitayaniyan. Ikpumasukalhcha tacha kajala'a'ikana yu katakiklaka'iya para li kajaxta'nilh jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh.
54001017	Pus xliyu an Rey yu katsuku'alhiya, yu ntu a'tam katinilh, yu ntu tasuy, yu wa yucha Dios, yucha yu kalhiwilaw chi ay kala'ts'iw, wa ta wanancha kuna'. Chunchacha kawalh.
54001018	Kints'alh, Timoteo, ikmakawniyani ani lhamap'a'sin mu iklhakapu'ani tacha an lhichiwinkalh xlip'ulhnaj amijatsukunti. Iklakask'in li anch'ach'a k'ap'u'ichi jatapast'ak'at k'alhilasat'i aniy oxi lasat.
54001019	K'ama'at'i an jakiklaka'inti chi an oxi jatapast'ak'at. Ali'in wa xliyu ntu p'ulhnaj talhakapu'alhi an xjatapast'ak'atk'an tamakawlhi an xjakiklaka'intik'an.
54001020	Chuncha taputapasalh an Himeneo chi an Alejandro, yu'uncha ijkama'axta'nilhcha an satanás para li katalanilhi jantu wa aya katajunilh an Dios.
54002001	Yu p'ulhnaj tukan iksk'in li ixchuxk'an an lapanakni kajalhitapaynikalh, kalhisk'inikalhi an Dios yu tama'lhtask'iniy an lapanakni para li an Dios kajamapaynilh. Wachu k'axt'a'nit'iti lhimala'puchajun an Dios ixlakata chux tacha an t'awkan.
54002002	Kajalhitapaynikalhi an yu tach'alhkatnan chi ixchuxk'an yu tapakxanta lhich'alhkat, para li wa ka sa'cha tawlaw chi wa oxicha katawlaw chux laka jamapayninti chi laka oxi lanti.
54002003	Ani yucha oxi chi oxi lhiwilay an Dios yu kintama'alhtaxtuyan
54002004	mu yucha lakask'in li chux lapanak kata'alhtaxtulh chi katamispalhi an yu sawalh.
54002005	Mu wa pumatami Dios chi wa pumatam lapanaki yu lay kapula'cha'ankana an Dios, wa yucha an Cristo Jesús.
54002006	Yucha ma'axta'lhi an xjatsukunti para li kinchuxk'an kata'alhtaxtu'ojo. Aniy chiwinti an Dios ixpaku tukani jamak'ats'aaninilh.
54002007	Xlakata aniy kit'ini kisakxtukalh chi kimala'achakan para li ajkamak'ats'aaninilh. Sawalhi ani yu iknajun, jantu wa ikmaslakatinin: An Dios yucha ki'ilhtulh xmaestrojk'an an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin, para li ajkamasunilhi an yu jakiklaka'inti sawalh.
54002008	Pus iklakask'in li an lapanakni wa tanchuncha kawalh, katatapaynilh, katach'ixli la'stalan'a xmakak'an, jantu ka'alilhi talh'amti chi laxkay.
54002009	Wanajcha chun an t'akunin wa yu oxicha tasuy xla'ch'itk'ani katala'ch'ilh, wa tacha yu oxicha tasuyi kajala'ala'oxikalh chi katajakilhpatinijk'ats'aalh, jantu tani wa katitalhimo'slacho'olhcha la x'aktujukak'an, jantu katalhi'alhi oro chi perla chi yu xtapalh la'la'lhuw la'ch'it.
54002010	Yu katalaklakatayalh xlijunti apalij yucha an laj'oxi tanlhun lhi'ilhtut, tacha talay t'akunin yu tamasuy li tat'atapasay an Dios.
54002011	An t'aku wa sa' kakilhulhi li laklani tu'u', chux laka ja'asmatnat.
54002012	Jantu ikmakajun li an t'aku yuchacha kamasunilh an lapanak chi kach'alhkatnanilh, an t'aku wa sa' kakilhulh.
54002013	Mu an Dios yu p'ulhnaj ilhtulh yucha an Adán chi xli'astan yucha an Evajcha.
54002014	Chi an Adán jantu yu yu o'xcho'okalh, yucha an t'aku', chi akxni o'xcho'okalhcha, ilhtulhcha tala'alhin.
54002015	Pero an t'aku kata'alhtaxtuya li kajalhitsukuya xjas'at'an chi li kajakiklaka'inin'alhiya chi kajamapayninina chi stalan'a katsukuya'.
54003001	Aniy chiwinti yucha sawalh: li xamati jalhistakputun an yu takiklaka'iy Dios, oxi tapatsati lakask'in.
54003002	Pero task'iniy li an yu kajalhistaklhi an yu takiklaka'iy Dios tu tu'u kala'cha'aninikalh yu ntu oxi, wa pumatami kalhitsukulh xt'iwi', jantu wa kat'apala'pusli an tanlhun, kajalajk'atsanalh, yu kalhiwilakalh, kajaxta'nilhi tan katatamakawlh yu tala'cha'an la ixcha'a chi yu lay kajamasunilh an xt'alapanakni;
54003003	jantu kat'a'ap'alh chi ntu kalasalh, chi ntu ka'achanilhi tani kalhi'alhawlhajalhcha tumin, task'iniy oxi lapanaki kawalh yu oxi katalhiwilalh an xt'alapanakni.
54003004	Yu oxi kala'ts'ilhi'alh la ixcha'a', yu katakiklaka'ilh an xjas'at'an chux laka oxi lanti.
54003005	Pus mu yu ntu lay la'ts'ilhi'an la ixcha'a ¿tasucha lay kajalhist'ak'a an yu takiklaka'iy Diosi?
54003006	Yu wa kiklaka'ilhka a Dios jantu katilalh, jantu junita sawalhcha kalhi'ayajk'atsaalh chi wanajcha chuni kat'acha'alh laka lhima'alh'ajna tacha t'acha'alh laka lhima'alh'ajna an xapay makxkay un.
54003007	Wachu task'iniy li oxi katalhichiwinilh an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin, para li ntu katamaxanilh chi ntu kama'alhilalhi an xapay makxkay un.
54003008	An diaconojnin wanajcha chun yu lapanakni yu kajalhiwilakalh, yu katamuktaxtulh xchiwintik'an, yu ntu katat'a'ap'alh yu ntu kata'achanilh tani katalhi'alhawlhajalhcha tumin.
54003009	Katalhitsukulhi an yu sawalh, yu chaway an Dios kintamasunitancha chi stalan'a katalhitsukulh xjatapast'ak'atk'an.
54003010	P'ulhnajcha kajalhila'ts'intanukalh xli'astan li ntu tu'u jala'cha'aninikan yu ntu oxi, katatapatsalhcha xlidiaconojk'an.
54003011	An t'akunin wanajcha chun, yu kajalhiwilakalh, jantu wa katamaslakatinilh, la'lhitala'sini katawalh chi katamuktaxtulh sawalhi chux tanlhun.
54003012	An diaconojnin wa pumatami katalhitsukulh xt'iwik'an chi oxi katala'ts'ilhi'alh xjas'at'anink'an chi ixcha'ak'an.
54003013	Mu yu oxi tatapatsay xlidiaconojk'an x'akstuchak'ani talhajaxtuy yu oxicha kajapula'ts'inkalh chi sawalhcha la'lhitala'sini tak'atsan an laka jakiklaka'inti yu xt'a'a an Cristo Jesús.
54003014	Masi li ikpakxan'iya li watukan ak'antacha'an la'ts'inin, ikts'o'niyani ani;
54003015	para li sna akta'a'ma'alh, k'ak'ats'at'i tani yu k'alhit'aylhip'ina'acha an la ixcha'a an Dios, an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy. Yu'uncha ixnawinin an Dios yu la'ajunta, yu'uncha xatiatsas chi alhp'asi talhist'ak'a an yu sawalh.
54003016	Jantu lhitala'a'o'xcho'o li ay sawalhi an yu ntu tasuy jamapayninti: An Cristo kitalakasuchilhi laka jakanit, an xTakuwin nawlhi li yucha sawalh, chi tala'ts'ilhi an angelhnin. Yucha jalhixa'alakalhi ta lakachux an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni. Kiklaka'ikani aniy lakamunulhpa'. La'a'ikalhi an talhman li yucha ay.
54004001	Pero an Takuwin ts'ajwi najun li akxni xalakti'astancha panch'e'ex ali'in katamakawnacha an jakiklaka'inti, wa lakmaslakatinij takuwincha katach'a'o'aya chi tanlhuncha jatapast'ak'at yu wa lakmakxkay'uncha xnawink'an.
54004002	Katakiklaka'iya lapanakni yu wa taja'o'xcho'onun, yu wa stakcha lakchamalata an xjatapast'ak'atk'an.
54004003	Aniy lapanakni katanawna li ntucha kalat'atsukukalh chi katanawna li ntucha ka'ukalhi tanlhun yu lhi'ut yu an Dios ilhtulh li kata'ulh an yu tajakiklaka'inin chi tamispay an yu sawalh akxni li taxt'a'acha lhimala'puchajun.
54004004	Mu chux tanlhun yu ilhtuta an Dios oxi, chi ntu tu'u yu wa kala'amaj'ankalhcha, li akxni jama'lhtayananaw xt'a'aw lhimala'puchajun.
54004005	Mu an xchiwinti an Dios chi an tapaynit yuchacha pustalan'an an tanlhun yu ukan.
54004006	Aniy tanlhun ch'unch'a k'ajamasunin an kijat'ala'awnink'an, walh lani oxi xt'atapatsan an Jesucristojo k'a'una'a. An yu pujakiklaka'ininkan chiwinti k'ut'ilhi k'ap'u'una'a chi an oxi jamap'a'sinti yu ch'a'o'at'a.
54004007	Jant'u k'a'asmatt'i wa tanlhuncha cuento talaknajun an lapanakni chi yu wa lhitontojcha. Yu k'alaklanin li p'asi k'ach'a'o'a an Dios.
54004008	Mu masi lhitapalaycha lanani li lay ilhtukan tachapun kilakatunajk'an, li p'as ch'a'o'akan an Dios, yucha para chux tanlhuni lhitapalay, mu yucha kintajunani li kalhitsukuyawi jatsukunti yu chaway chi yu mimpalhtachalh.
54004009	Ani yucha chun sawalh, chi lhichuxi kakiklaka'ikalh.
54004010	Xliyu iktapatsayaw chi ikt'ataxtuniyaw, mu yu ikpakxan'iyaw yucha an Dios yu la'ajunta, yucha chux lapanaki ma'alhtaxtuy, pero wa yu'uncha an yu takiklaka'i.
54004011	Aniy tanlhun yuch'a k'alhinaw ch'i k'amasut'i.
54004012	Jantu xamati kala'amaj'an wa xliyu li wa ts'alhkak'at'i, uxint'i katala'ts'ixtuni an yu tajakiklaka'inin, laka chiwinti chi laka lanti chi laka jamapayninti chi laka takuwin chi laka jakiklaka'inti chi laka stalan'anti.
54004013	Li kit'in tuka' ikcha'an, k'ajap'unawnini an lapanakni an ixchiwinti Dios, k'ajama'oximaj'ayat'i an kijat'ala'awnink'an ch'i k'ajamasunin.
54004014	Jant'u k'ak'apmaj'a an tapatsat yu Dios xta'nin, yu unk'a li ch'unch'a k'ala'a'iya'a akxni talakpach'apan an yu laktatanincha yu takiklaka'iy an Dios.
54004015	Yucha aniy tanlhuni k'alak'ilht'u, anch'a k'a sa' ts'uk'u'alhit'i, para li lhichuxi k'ala'ts'ink'a t'ach'a t'it'aylhip'in.
54004016	K'ajalajk'ats'ani la milanti ch'i an yu masuy, ch'unch'a k'at'aylhip'i ani laktanlhun. Mu li ch'unch'a k'a'ilht'uya'a k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'a chi wachu an yu kata'asmatniyan.
54005001	Jant'u p'asi k'ala'a'aymat'i yu tatacha, yucha tacha mimpayi k'axa'alat'i li t'u'u ump'ut'un yu ts'awj ka'ilhtulh; an yu palayka lakts'alanin tacha mijat'ala'awnini k'ajala'ts'i.
54005002	An yu laknananincha, tacha minatini k'ajala'ts'i. An yu lakjatsi'ininka tacha mint'alajamatsanani k'ajala'ts'i, chux laka laj'oxi jatapast'ak'at.
54005003	Li yu sawalhi li maticha ixt'apapak'an an t'akunin k'aja'a't'ay'ut'i.
54005004	Pero li xamati t'aku yu maticha xt'apapa li jalhit'ajuni xjas'at'an u xjapapanatni yu'unchacha p'ulhnaj katalanilh tani katalhila'ts'ilhi'alhcha an yu ta talhila'ts'in chi wachu katalhistaklhi xpaynink'an, mu chuncha yu oxi lhi'acha tasuy la x'ukxlakapu Dios.
54005005	Pero li yu sawalhi maticha xt'apapa an t'aku chi wa x'akstucha tamakajunta, wa Dioscha lhila'si. Chi ntu a'tami li ntucha katapaynilh, tunku chi ts'isi tapayni.
54005006	Pero li yu wa yucha an wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi jatapast'ak'at tama'axta'ni, masi t'ajun, nitalh.
54005007	Tacha ani laktanlhun wach'u k'ajalhi'uni li kata'ilhtulh, para li ntu tu'u kajajunikalh li ntu ts'awj ta'ilhtuy.
54005008	Mu li xamati jantu tu'u jaxta'niy yu tama'lhtask'iniy yu ta jalhila'ts'in chi masi yu la ixcha'a jat'awilh, ani lapanak samaj'ani an jakiklaka'inti, chi ntucha k'is oxi tacha an lay, pu'inita masi yu ntu jakiklaka'inin.
54005009	T'an k'ajats'o'ulaya'a an t'akunin yu maticha xt'apapak'an wa yu'uncha an yu palaycha de t'utump'uxam (60) k'ata talhit'ajun, chi yu wa pumatam xt'apapak'an talhits'ukulh.
54005010	Yu oxi lhichiwinkan li oxi tanlhuni yu lak'ilhtulh, li oxi jala'ayalh xjas'at'an, li yu oxi jala'a'iy yu tacha'an la ixcha'a', li yu jala'ch'anch'a'ata an yu takiklaka'iy Dios; li yu jalhi'a'tayjuta an yu tala'ma'alh'ajnan, li yu ilhtuta chux yu oxi tanlhun.
54005011	Pero an t'akunin yu maticha xt'apapak'an yu palayka lakjatsi'inin jant'u k'ajats'o'muk'a, mu akxni wa xliyu li tu'ucha tapast'ak'a, jantucha ta'asmatniya an Cristo, jat'atsukuputuncho'okancha.
54005012	Chunchacha pujun xkwentajk'an li ntucha ta'ilhtuyi yu tanajun li kata'ilhtuya'.
54005013	Atumpaj lakatamj lakatamjcha laka lakcha'a talajkilay, chi ntucha tatapatsay; chi li ntucha tatapatsay wachu wa talakmaslakatinincha, wa tanchuncha tama'ch'axpatanuy chi wa tanlhuncha tanajun yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay.
54005014	Xliyu iklhilakask'in li an yu nitacha xt'apapak'an li yu jats'i'ininka kajat'atsukukalh, katalhitsukulhi xjas'at'ank'an, katala'ts'ilhi'alhi ixcha'ak'an chi ntu katamakawnilhi tu'u wa aya kajalhichiwinilh an yu wa kintaxkayan.
54005015	Mu ali'in t'akunin tat'a'alhcha an satanás.
54005016	Li xamati lapanak u t'aku yu jakiklaka'inin jat'awilh t'akunin yu tanitacha xt'apapak'an, kaja'a'tayjulh. Walh laniy an yu tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin layi kata'a'tayjulh an yu wa ix'akstuchak'an sawalh.
54005017	An yu laktatanincha yu oxi tala'ts'ilhi'an an yu tajakiklaka'inin wanaj katapu'a't'uyunulhi oxi kajala'ts'inkalh. Yu chuncha xlipu'a't'uy chuncha oxi kajamapalhnikalh, yu'uncha an yu talhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios chi tamasuy.
54005018	Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: "Jant'u k'ama'an'at'anut'i ixbusalh an xapay toroj an yu tapatsay chi an yu tapatsay t'acha'ani li kamapalhnikalh.
54005019	Jant'u k'alhak'ap'up'i li xamati yu tatacha tu'u talhimuk'ay, li ntu talhit'ajun pumat'uy u pumat'utu yu katanawlh li tala'ts'in.
54005020	An yu ali tataylhi'ani ta'ilhtuy xtala'alhink'an, k'ajalaj'aymat'i la ix'ukxlakapuk'an ixchuxk'an an ali'in, para li an ali'in katatalhanalh.
54005021	Chuncha iklhijunan la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios chi an Jesucristo chi an yu jasakxtukanta angelhnin, li k'at'aylhip'i ani lhamap'a'sin jant'u k'ala'amaj'a xamati chi ntu wa ka'alilhi yu oxi k'alhiwilat'i.
54005022	Jant'u xamat'i k'alakp'ach'ap'a li nt'u oxich'a p'ulhnaj p'ast'ak'a, para li nt'u k'ajat'alhit'awk'a xtala'alhink'an ali'in. Stalan'a k'a'aklats'uk'u.
54005023	Jant'uch'a k'a'ott'i wa xkancha, k'a'ott'icha lakats'uniya jamaskajanti xaxkan uvaj ixlakata amimpajan ch'i li wa p'akts'inch'a t'a'an'ay.
54005024	An xtala'alhink'an an ali'in oxicha tasuy chaway masi ntuka' tu'u ts'awalan, pero ali'in xli'astani jak'atsanikan.
54005025	Wanajcha chun, an yu laj'oxi tanlhun ilhtukan, tasuy, chi an yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun jantu layi ntucha a'tam katik'atsakalh.
54006001	Ixchuxk'an an lapanakni yu wa japutapatsakancha katapastaklhi li t'acha'ani an xpatronk'an li katalhiwilalh, para li ntu wa aya kalhichiwinkalh an xta'a'ut Dios chi an yu masuyaw.
54006002	Chi an yu wa japutapatsakancha lapanakni li talhit'ajuni xpatronk'an yu takiklaka'iy Dios, jantu katala'ts'ilh li ntucha tukan tu'u katalhiwilalh wa xliyu li takiklaka'iy Diosi an patronin. Apalij yu'uncha palay oxi katat'atapatsalh, mu an yu tala'a'it'ajun an oxi xtapatsatk'an yu'uncha takiklaka'iy Dios chi t'ala'awnin. Tacha aniy yuch'a yu k'amasut'i ch'i k'aja'un.
54006003	Li xamati tu'u yu tumpaj masuy, chi ntu lhimamayi an laj'oxi xchiwinti kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo chi an lhamap'a'sin yu masuy jamapayninti,
54006004	yucha wa ayajk'atsaycha chi ntu tu'u k'atsay. Yucha li lalhixtukuycha an tu'u tachanu lhit'ajun tu'u ta'an'at; chi anchacha minachalh li kalaxkaykalh li kalama'talh'amankalh li kaxkayaj lajunikalh li ntu tu'u kalakiklaka'ikalh
54006005	chi li ntu a'tam kasa' tawlakalhi kalasakalh, aniy ancha tan tat'ajun lapanakni yu ntu oxi tajalakpastaknan chi ntu tamispay an yu sawalh. Yu'uncha tala'ts'in an jamapayninti tacha tu'u yu pulhaja; yu chuncha talay, k'ajamak'aw.
54006006	Pero ay talhaja an jamapayninti yu t'aminta achat.
54006007	Mu ntu tu'u lhimiw aniy lakamunulhpa, pus tulay tu'u katilhi'aw.
54006008	Pus li lhit'awnawi yu uyaw chi yu la'ch'iyaw, kalhi'achawcha.
54006009	Mu an yu tajamatuminimputun taputala'ch'icha li sawalhcha talhitsukuputun, chi lhuwcha tanlhun ali task'unla'ts'in, chi li chuncha, jalakt'ilhinin. Yucha wa jasaaknuycha an lapanakni li katatat'ilhilh chi li katats'an'alh.
54006010	Mu ixjataxiyak chux an tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi li sawalhcha achanikan an tumin, chi ta'alini wa xliyu task'unla'ts'ini an tumin, tamakajuncha an xjakiklaka'intik'an chi lhuw yu laj'alhp'as lhima'alh'ajna jalhimini.
54006011	Pero uxint'i ixlapanak Dios, k'alaj'ost'i aniy tanlhun. Yu oxi jatsukunti k'alhip'i, yu oxi lanti, yu jakiklaka'inti, yu jamapayninti, yu xlitayanika ma'alh'ajnat, yu jakilhpatinijk'atsat.
54006012	K'alhilasat'i an oxi lasat ixlakata an jakiklaka'inti; jant'u k'ama'ats'an'at'i an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy, mu yucha lhit'asanin an Dios chi xliyu oxi lhimalak'asut'i amijakiklaka'inti la ix'ukxlakapuk'an xluwk'an lapanakni.
54006013	Chaway, la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios, yu xta'niy jatsukunti watuchicha yu alin, chi la ix'ukxlakapu an Jesucristo yu xta'lhi laj'oxi chiwinti la ix'ukxlakapu an Poncio Pilato,
54006014	iklhijunan, li k'a'ilht'u an lhamap'a'sin, oxi k'alhist'akt'i mijatsukunti, tacha ntu xamati kamamaxanin sta akxni kachinacha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
54006015	Akxni kachinacha xpanch'e'ex an Dios ka'ilhtuyacha ani, mu yucha yu tukancha chi yucha ay tukan, yucha ixRejk'an rejnin chi xJamach'alhkatk'an jamach'alhkatni.
54006016	Yucha wa yucha yu ntu lay niy, yu wilh laka la'atam jatapulhkunu tan tu lay xamati kicha'an. Jantu xamati lapanaki la'ts'inta chi ntu lay katila'ts'inkalh. ¡Yucha xpujun'alhincha x'anun an ta'ayat chi an alhp'asninti! Chunchacha kawalh.
54006017	K'aja'un an yu talhit'ajun xtumink'an yu aniy lakaamunulhpa li ntu katapu'ayajk'atsaalh chi ntu yu katalhila'silh an xlaktanlhunk'an yu la'la'lhuw, mu an laktanlhun yu laj'oxi alin aniy, jantu lhitala'si. Yucha an Diosi katalhila'silh, mu yucha lhuw kintaxta'niyan chux an tanlhun, para li kalhi'achawcha.
54006018	K'aja'un li yu oxi kata'ilhtulh, ricojnini katajunlhi wa xliyu li lhuwcha tanlhuni kata'ilhtulh yu laj'oxi chi li tu'u kataxta'lhi, yu talhit'ajun katat'alaxta'nilhi an ali'in.
54006019	Chunchacha yu katalhitsukuya lhuw tanlhun yu laj'oxi yu lhitala'si kataputsukuya yu wa mintachalhka', chi katala'cha'ana an yu sawalh jatsukunti.
54006020	Timoteo, ¡oxi k'alhist'akt'i ani yu malhist'aknik'an! Jant'u k'a'asmatt'i yu ntu oxi lakchiwinti, yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay chi an tanlhuncha yu lhichiwiniy yu ntu sawalh oxi jatapast'ak'at.
54006021	Mu ali'in yu yuchacha jatapast'ak'at tach'a'o'ay, tach'axpataxtulhcha an la xjakiklaka'intik'an. An xjamapayninti Dios kala'cha'an. Chunchacha kawalh.
55001001	Kit'in ikPablo, yu kimala'achay an Cristo Jesús la xtalakask'i an Dios, ani jatsukunti iklhit'ajun yucha yu kaxta'nin an Cristo Jesús.
55001002	Ikla'axa'alayani kints'alh Timoteo. An kimPayk'an Dios chi an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Cristo Jesús kataxta'nini xjamapaynintik'an chi oxi jatawlhnat.
55001003	Ikpast'ak'ani tunku chi ts'isi akxni iktapayniy chi o'sliyani iklhixta'niy lhimala'puchajun milakata an Dios, yu laka stalan'a jatapast'ak'at ikt'atapatsay, tacha ta'ilhtulh an yu ta xajkalhila'ts'in.
55001004	Chi akxni ikpast'ak'a ami'alhut sawalhcha ikla'ts'imputunan para li sawalhcha ak'achalh.
55001005	Ikpast'ak'a li jak'iklak'a'inin sawalh, tacha aminana Loida chi aminati Eunice yu p'ulhnaj tajakiklaka'inilh. Chi ijk'atsayi li uxint'i wach'u ch'uni jak'iklak'a'inin.
55001006	Xliyu iklhimap'a'siyan li ali amak'ilhnut'i an xajikmi tapatsat yu xta'nin an Dios akxni ikmuk'anin an kimaka la mi'uktan.
55001007	Mu an Dios tu kintaxta'nin takuwin yu wa talhanan, yucha kintaxta'nin takuwin yu alhp'as, yu jamapayninin chi li lay ka'ilhtuw an tanlhun yu laj'oxi.
55001008	Pus t'u k'alhimaxani li lhich'iwini ixlakata an kiJamach'alhkatk'an, ch'i wach'u nt'u ak'int'amaxan, mu kit'in yucha kima'alhilata. Apalij uxint'i wachu an la ix'alhp'asninti Dios k'alhit'ayanini an la'lhima'alh'ajna tanlhun ixlakata an laj'oxi chiwinti.
55001009	Mu an Dios kintama'alhtaxtuncha chi kintalhi'ancha laka stalan'a jatsukunti, chi ntu wa xliyu li tanlhuncha tu'u lak'ilhtu, wa xliyu li kintamapaynin chi yuchacha chuncha nawlh. Ani jamapayninti yucha an Cristo Jesusi chuncha kintapuxta'nin akxni ntuka' x'a'tayni an panch'e'ex.
55001010	Chi chaway an jamapayninti tasuycha li kilachilhcha an kiJama'alhtaxtunuk'an Cristo Jesús, yu laklhajalh an lhinin chi yucha an laj'oxicha chiwinti pumalakasulh tan putunku an jatsukunti yu ntu lay niy.
55001011	An Dios kihijunilhi li ajkamak'atsaaninilhi aniy chiwinti chi kimala'achaycha ak'alh lhichiwiniy chi li maestrojcha akjunlhi.
55001012	Chi ani yuchacha ixlakata li tanlhuncha la'lhima'alh'ajna iklhitsukuy. Pero ntu ikmaxanan, mu ijk'atsayi tichini ijkiklaka'itacha chi ijk'atsay li lhitala'si li yucha layi ma'ay yu kimalhistaknita sta akxni kachinacha wilhchan.
55001013	Laka an jakiklaka'inti chi laka an jamapayninti yu pula'a'iw an Cristo Jesús, yuch'a k'ap'u'ilht'u an laj'oxi jatapast'ak'at yu kit'in ikmasunin.
55001014	La ix'alhp'asninti an yu kintaput'awnan Stalan'a Takuwini k'ap'ulhist'akt'i an laj'oxi jatapast'ak'at yu malhist'aknik'ant'a.
55001015	K'ats'aycha li ixchuxk'an an yu tawilanalh la xalakaat'un Asia kintamakaw'olh, sta an Figelo chi an Hermógenes.
55001016	An xfamiliaj an Onesíforo kajalhi'a'tayjulhi an Jamach'alhkat, mu yucha wanaj a'lhuwi kima'oximaj'ayalh chi ntu kint'amaxanalhi akxni xakimalaklhchawkanta chi xakimakch'ikanta laka kadenaj.
55001017	Yucha apalij, akxni cha'alhcha Roma stak kimpuxkawlhitsukulh sta kila'cha'alh.
55001018	An Jamach'alhkat kamakawnilhi kala'cha'alh xjamapayninti akxni kachinacha anchunu wilhchan. Uxint'i oxi k'ats'ay tacha stak kinta'a'tayjun an Onesíforo an la'acha'an Éfeso.
55002001	Pus uxint'i kints'alh k'ap'ut'a'oximaj'ayat'i an jamapayninti yu lhit'ajun an Cristo Jesús.
55002002	Chi kit'in k'i'alha'asmatt'a kinchinwinti yu wa tacha tanawlh an ali'in lapanakni. Yuch'a k'ajalhi'un an lapanakni yu tamuktaxtuy sawalh li katat'alamasuniya wachu an ali'in.
55002003	Akilat'ama'alh'ajnaw tacha oxi issoldado an Jesucristo.
55002004	Jantu xamati soldado lhima'ats'an'ay xpanch'e'ex wa sawalhcha kapastaklhi tanlhun yu tapasay laka xajatsukunti yu ntu pusoldado. Yucha wa yuchacha past'ak'a tani kalhima'an'achayacha ixkapitán.
55002005	Chi wanajcha chun yu inta ma'lalhajay tu'u amanti jantu tu'u katilhajaxtulh li ntu ts'ajwi ilhtuy tani kalalhcha.
55002006	Yu tapatsay lakakuxtu t'acha'ani li yucha yu p'ulhnaj kala'a'ilh yu x'anuncha kuna yu alilh.
55002007	K'asa' p'ast'akt'i an yu iknajun, chi an Jamach'alhkat ka'a'tayjuyani li p'alay oxi k'alhimach'a'xat'i chux aniy.
55002008	K'ap'ast'akt'i an Jesucristo, yu taa lhila'ts'in an David yu la'awcho'olh tacha najun an laj'oxi chiwinti yu iklhichiwiniy.
55002009	Chi ixlakata aniy, iklhima'alh'ajnan, asta kilhimalaklhchawkan tacha ma'lhta'alhini'. Pero an ixchiwinti Dios jantu laklhchajuy.
55002010	Xliyu kit'in chuxi ilhitayani'ojoy ixlakata li ijkamapayniya an yu Dios jasakxtuta, para li wachu katalhitsukulhi an ay ta'alhtaxtut yu xpujun'alhincha yu pula'cha'ankan an Jesús.
55002011	Aniy chiwinti yucha sawalh: Li kat'aniyaw, wachu kat'ala'awnaw.
55002012	Li ma'alh'ajnanaw, wachu kat'ach'alhkatnanawi yucha. Li nawnawi li ntu mispayaw, yucha wachu kanawna li ntu kintamispayan.
55002013	Li ntu katimuktaxtuwi yu kintalhijunan, yucha ntu chuni lay, yucha muktaxtuyi yu najun, mu yucha ntu layi ntucha katimuktaxtunikalh x'akstu yu najun li ka'ilhtuya'.
55002014	K'ajamap'ast'ak'anit'i aniy. K'aja'uni la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios li ntu katalalhikikxtukulhi tanlhun yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay, mu yucha wa taputs'an'aycha an yu ta'asmat'a.
55002015	K'at'at'axt'unini para li oxi k'ach'ip'i la ix'ukxlakapu Dios, tacha ma'tapatsan yu ntu tu'u lhimaxanan, yu oxi putapatsay an chiwinti yu sawalh.
55002016	Jant'u k'anawi xkayaj chiwinti chi yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay, mu yu chuncha talakchiwiniy wa palay palaycha tapu'an tan tu oxi.
55002017	Chi an xchiwintik'an ta'a'pitsi tacha jakanit yu ali ali p'uch'i'an. Chuncha tatapasay an Himeneo chi an Fileto,
55002018	yu'uncha tach'axpataxtulhcha an tan sawalh, yu'uncha tanajun li ma tapasalhcha li kala'awcho'okana', chunchacha tapulakt'ilhini an xjakiklaka'intik'an an ali'in.
55002019	Pero an Dios yucha oxi ilhtuta tan oxi putasuy, tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "An Jamach'alhkat jamispayi yu xnawin", chi "Ixchuxk'an yu ta'a'atant'asay an xta'a'ut an Jamach'alhkat katamakawlhcha yu ntu oxi tanlhun."
55002020	Lakatam laka cha'a jantu wa vasojcha yu de oro chi de plataja alin, wachu alini yu wa de k'iw chi de t'un, an ali yu palay sawalh lhitapalay tu'u pu'ilhtukan chi an ali yu wa tanlhuncha ajnik'a lakats'uniya pu'ilhtukan.
55002021	Li xamati yu stalan'a katsuku'alhiya, kacha'ana kajuna vaso yu lhitapalay, yu stalan'a, yu kalhitapalhniya an Jamach'alhkat. Chi la'asijtacha watuchicha yu oxi tu'u kapu'ilhtukana'.
55002022	K'amak'aw wachu an tacha sawalhcha tak'atsan an yu wa tala'ta'ayat'ajunka', yucha an yu oxi tanlhuni k'ach'a'o'a, an jakiklaka'inti, an jamapayninti chi an oxi jatawlhnat ali an yu laka stalan'a xjalhunutk'an ta'a'atant'asay an Jamach'lhkat.
55002023	Jant'u k'ama'lhak'ap'up'i yu wa tanlhuncha la lhikikxtukut yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay, yuch'a k'ats'aycha li wa ilhtuycha li kala'aykalh.
55002024	Mu yu ixma'tsuku an Jamach'alhkat jantu wa kala'aytsukulhcha. Yucha chux lapanaki oxi kajat'alalhi'alh. Yucha kalanilhi kamasulh chi ntu wa lascha katalh'amalh.
55002025	Chi kajamap'a'silhi an yu ntu k'is taja'asmatnan, laka jakilhpatinijk'atsat, para li sna an Dios kaja'ilhtulhi li katamakawlhcha yu ntu oxi jatsukunti, para li katamispalh an yu sawalh.
55002026	Chi kata'oslicha an tan jama'alhilata an xapay makxkay un, an tan jamalaklhchajuta, mu yucha chunchacha yu oxi lhiwilay.
55003001	Wach'u k'ak'ats'at'i aniy: Li an xalakti'astancha wilhchan kamina yu la'lhima'anxkay panch'e'ex.
55003002	An lapanakni wa ka'akstujamapaynikanacha, an ali'in xt'alapanaknik'an jantu katitat'alamapaynilh, wa yucha an tumincha sawalh katamapayniya'. Katalaj'ayajk'atsaya chi wa tanlhuncha kata'achaniya kata'ilhtuya masi yu ntu lhitapalay.
55003003	Jantucha xamati oxi katitala'ts'ilh chi katitamapaynilh, wa katamaslakatininacha. Jantucha layi katitalaklhajalh tacha an wa tanlhuncha katapast'ak'a kata'ilhtuputuna'. Jantucha k'is oxi sawalhi tacha an katitalalh chi ntucha k'is katitala'ts'imputulhi chux an tanlhun yu laj'oxi.
55003004	Wa kataja'o'xcho'onunacha chi katatapujuya kata'ilhtuya an tanlhun. Wa yucha an tanlhuncha yu ntu tu'u laklhitapalayi sawalhcha kata'ilhtuputuna'. Chi wa yucha an yu oxicha talhik'atsan tapast'ak'a kata'ilhtuya', jantucha katitapuxkawlhi an Dios.
55003005	Katalaya li ma tajamapayninin, pero tacha an katalaya la ixlakatijlak'an chunchacha katapumasuya li ntu talhit'ajuni an ix'alhp'asninti an jamapayninti. Anchunu lapanakni nt'u t'u'u k'ajat'a'ilht'u.
55003006	Mu yu'unchaa an yu talaktanuy laka lakcha'a chi talaj'o'xcho'oycha an t'akunin yu wa stakcha talhit'ajun xtala'alhink'an, yu wa stakcha talhit'ajun tipaspit jatapast'ak'at yu ntu oxi.
55003007	Yu'uncha lhilhiji talaklanit'ajun an tanlhun, pero ntu a'tami lay tacha'an tamispay an yu sawalh.
55003008	Chi tacha an Janes chi an Jambres jantu ta'asmatnilhi an Moisés, wanajcha chuni talay yu'uncha, jantu ta'asmatputuni an yu sawalh. Aniy lapanakni tatalakt'ilhinitacha xjatapast'ak'atk'an, tamakawlhcha an jakiklaka'inti.
55003009	Pero ntu ma'ati katitat'a'alh, mu chux an lapanakni katalhakapu'ana li wa ntu tajalakpastaknan, tacha taputapasalh anchunu xt'uyunk'an yu ntu ta'asmatniputulh an Moisés.
55003010	Pero uxint'i oxi t'aylhip'int'a tacha an ikmasuy. Tacha ikt'ajun, tuchini chunchacha iklhilay, an kijakiklaka'inti, li iklhitayani an tanlhun, an kijamapayninti chi an kintachaput li iklhitayaniy.
55003011	Ch'i k'int'ala'ts'int'a li kinch'a'o'akan kilhituma'chapuputunkan chi an kima'alh'ajnat. Tacha an iklhitsukulh ma'alh'ajnat chi iklhitayanilh an la'acha'an Antioquía, chi Iconio chi Listra. ¡Ikma'alh'ajnalhi li xakinch'a'o'akan! Pero an Jamach'alhkat kila'ma'alhtaxtu'olh.
55003012	Chi ixchuxk'an an yu wachu oxi tat'a'aklatsukuputun an Cristo Jesús kajalhitama'chapukana'.
55003013	Pero an yu wa ay tajunita lapanakni chi an yu wa taja'o'xcho'onun wa palay palay kata'ana tan tu oxi, kataja'o'xcho'onuna chi kaja'o'xcho'okana'.
55003014	Pero uxint'i wa k'at'aylhip'i an yu laklanit'acha, ch'i yu k'iklak'a'it'acha. Uxint'i k'ats'aycha tichini yu'unchacha tamasunin.
55003015	Chi wa mintajas'at'ati k'ats'at'a an ixchiwinti Dios, yucha yu lay kaxta'niyan jatapast'ak'at para li k'at'a'alht'axt'u, ixlakata li k'iklak'a'iy an Cristo Jesús.
55003016	Chux an tan ts'o'muk'akanta an ixchiwinti Dios yucha an Diosi chuncha chiwininta. Yucha pumasukan an tanlhun chi pujamap'a'sininkan chi pula'oxinikan xjatapast'ak'at yu wa lhits'an'ay. Pujamatalanininkan para li oxi jatsukunti kalhitsukukalh,
55003017	para li an ixlapanak Dios oxi tukani kajalakpastaknalh chi oxi tukani kalanilh lay kalak'ilhtulh chux yu laj'oxi tanlhun.
55004001	La ix'ukxlakapu an Dios chi an Cristo Jesús yu kamina la xlich'alhkat chi yu kajajuna li oxi u jantu xtat'ajun an yu tat'ajunka chi an yu talaknitacha, iklhijunani aniy:
55004002	li k'alhich'iwini an ixchiwinti Dios, k'ajamak'ats'aanini akxni ixpaku chi masi akxni ntu ixpaku '. K'ajamat'anunin, k'ajamap'a'sin, xlak'anti k'ajama'oximaj'ayan ch'i k'amasut'i.
55004003	Mu kachina panch'e'ex akxni ntucha katita'asmatputulh an yu laj'oxi lhamap'a'sin. Chi mu wa xliyu wa ixjatapast'ak'atchak'ani ta'ilhtuputun, wa lhuwcha maestrojnini katalakask'ina para li wa yu oxicha talhiwilay kajajunikalh.
55004004	Katamakawnacha an yu sawalh chi wa la'stucha kuentojo kata'asmat'a'.
55004005	Pero uxint'i oxi k'asa' ts'uk'u la mijatapast'ak'at, k'alaklhit'ayanini an la'lhima'alh'ajna tanlhun. Wa yuch'ach'a k'ajamak'ats'aanin an laj'oxi chiwinti, oxi k'amukt'axt'ut'i amintapatsat.
55004006	Kit'in akima'axta'kanacha tacha la'atam lha'ulan li akima'nikanacha, chi chint'ajuncha an panch'e'ex li ak'anacha.
55004007	Iklasalhcha an oxi lasat, ikmuktaxtulhcha an kintapatsat, chi ntu a'tami iktaticho'olh, ikmuktaxtulh sawalh.
55004008	Chaway kimpakxan'icha an yu ikt'acha'an akla'a'ilh, an corona, yu an Jamach'alhkat yu ts'awj muktaxtuy xlijuez akixta'niya akxni kachinacha wilhchan. Chi ntu wa kit'incha akintixta'nilh, wachu kajaxta'niya ixchuxk'an yu an laka jamapayninti tapakxan'iy akxni kaxlimj mina'.
55004009	K'alhip'uxk'awnini li lay watukan ak'int'at'i la'ts'ini',
55004010	mu an Demas kimakawlhcha, yucha, wa yucha aniy lakamunulhpacha oxi lhiwilay, chi alhcha Tesalónica. An Crescente alh Galacia, chi an Tito alh Dalmacia.
55004011	Wayucha an Lucascha kint'atamakajunta. K'ap'uxk'awchi an Marcos chi k'at'at'at'i, mu akilhitapalhniya an laka tapatsat.
55004012	An Tíquico ikmala'achalh Éfeso.
55004013	Akxni k'at'ana'a, k'alhit'ana'a an ikpupula'axt'a'kan yu ikmakawchalh an Troas la ixcha'a an Carpo. Chi k'alhit'an'ot'achi an libro, yu palay ikma'lhtask'iniy yucha an yu libro de jaxta'an.
55004014	An Alejandro an yu la'slaman tsasnat, tu k'is oxi tacha an kint'alay. Yucha an Jamach'alhkatcha kamamapalhniya tacha an lay.
55004015	Uxint'i wach'u k'ajalajk'ats'aananin, mu ani lapanak tu k'is la'ts'imputuni an kinchiwintik'an.
55004016	Akxni p'ulhnajcha ikchiwinilh para li ntu ta aki'ilhtukalh jantu xamati kilhi'a'tayjulh. Ixchuxk'ani kintamakawlh, jantu kajalhakapu'aninikalh.
55004017	Pero an Jamach'alhkat ancha xakint'ayalh, chi kixta'nilhi tachaput, pus layi iknawlh an chiwinti yu puta'alhtaxtukan chi chuncha lay ta'asmatlhi an yu ntu takiklaka'iy Dios. Chuncha ikma'alhtaxtukalh la ixkilhni an león.
55004018	Chi an Jamach'alhkat akima'osuni'oya chux yu ntu oxi, akima'alhtaxtuya para li akilhi'alh tan ch'alhkatnanachalh lakt'iyan. Yucha ay xpujun'alhincha. Chunchacha kawalh.
55004019	K'ala'axa'alachi an Prisca chi an Aquila, chi an yu ta jalhila'ts'in an Onesíforo.
55004020	An Erasto tamakawchalh la'acha'an Corinto, chi an Trófimo wa ta'an'ay, ikmakawlh la'acha'an Mileto.
55004021	K'alhip'uxk'awnini li lay k'at'at'i akxni ntuka' chin ixpaku lhik'asnin. An Eubulo la'axa'alayan chi an Pudente chi an Lino chi an Claudia chi ixchuxk'an an kijat'ala'awnink'an.
55004022	An Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo kat'a'aklatsukulhi amintakuwin. An jamapayninti katat'a'aklatsukun. Chunchacha kawalh.
56001001	Kit'in ikPablo, ixma'tsuku an Dios chi yucha an Jesucristojo kimala'achay. Kimala'achay an Jesucristo para li an yu jasakxtutacha an Dios katacha'alhi katamispalh an yu sawalh chi katamuktaxtulh.
56001002	Yu'uncha tapakxan'iy an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy. Akxni ntuka' tu'u ix'ilhtukan chunchacha ixnajunta an Dios li kaxt'a'a', chi yucha ntu maslakatinin.
56001003	Chaway, akxni ts'awjcha ixpaku tukan, yucha ilhtuycha an yu najun li ka'ilhtuya', yuchacha pumuktaxtut'ajun li iklhichiwiniycha yu najun, yucha an kiJama'alhtaxtunuk'an Diosi chuncha kilhijuniy.
56001004	Uxint'i Tito, wach'u k'iklak'a'i sawalhi an yu kiklaka'itaw, tachanu kints'alhk'at'i. An kimPayk'an Dios chi an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo kataxta'nini jamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnat.
56001005	Ikmakajun an tan junkan Creta, para li k'alats'awalat'i yu xtamakajuntaka kalats'awalakalh, chi para li lakatamin la'acha'an k'ajamak'aw yu katala'ts'ilhi'alh an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios tacha iklhijunin k'a'ilht'u.
56001006	An yu kajalhistaklhi'alh an yu takiklaka'iy Dios, xamati lapanak yu ntu tu'u kalhitawk'alh tala'alhin. Wa pumatam xt'iwi kalhitsukulh chi an xjas'at'an katakiklaka'ilh Dios, chi ntu kajajunkalh li wa tani talaycha chi li ntu k'is taja'asmatnan.
56001007	Mu an yu jalhistaklhi'an yu takiklaka'iy Dios, yucha ntu ka'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi, yucha t'atapatsay Dios. Jantu ka'ayajk'atsaalh, jantu katalh'amalh, jantu kat'a'ap'alh, jantu kalasalh, chi ntu kask'unla'ts'ilhi li kapulhajalhi tu'u yu ntu oxi.
56001008	Yucha, kajaxta'nilhi tan katatamakawlh yu tala'cha'an la ixcha'a', yu oxi tanlhuni ka'achanilh. Stalan'a kajalakpastaknalh, oxi lapanaki kawalh, stalan'a lapanaki kajunlhi chi oxi lanti kalhitsukulh.
56001009	Kamuktaxtulhi an chiwinti yu lhitala'si tacha yu kalaks masunikalh, para li wachu layi kajamap'a'silh ali'in an laka laj'oxi chiwinti chi kajamakiklaka'inilhi an yu wa ta'alhapu'iyajuy an chiwinti.
56001010	Mu wanaj lhuwi tat'ajun an yu ntu k'is taja'asmatnan, an yu wa tani talakchiwiniycha, yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay, chi wa taja'o'xcho'onuncha, an judionin yu'uncha yu palay wachu chuncha talay.
56001011	Aniy lapanakni oxi kawalh kajalajkikchutkalh, mu wa talakmalokojlaycha ixchuxk'an yu tawilanalh lakatamin laka cha'a', wa tanlhuncha tamasuy yu ntu katamasulh para li katapu'o'xcho'olhajalhcha.
56001012	Masi pumatam yu yu'uncha, yu ixnajun yu wa katapasayaka, nawlh: "An jamacha'an Creta, sawalh tamaslakatinin, yu'uncha lakmakxkay jatapakxat, wa sawalhcha tawajin chi ntu tatapatsay."
56001013	Tacha aniy nawlh an lapanak, sawalh. Pus chaway alhp'asi k'ajalaj'aymat'i para li la'stalan'ani katawalh la ixjakiklaka'intik'an,
56001014	para li ntu wa yuchacha katalhakapu'alh yu wa tala'la'oxitacha xcuentojk'an an judiojnin chi yu talhinajun an yu wa tamakawpalaycha an yu sawalh.
56001015	An yu la'stalan'an, chux an tanlhun para yu'uncha, la'stalan'a; pero para an yu la'smala'an chi ntu tala'a'iya an jakiklaka'inti, jantu tu'u alin yu stalan'a, mu yu'uncha la'smala'a talhit'ajun an xjatapast'ak'atk'an.
56001016	Tanajun li tamispayi Dios, pero la ixlakatijlak'an chunchacha tapunajun li ntu tamispay, jantu k'is jalhila'ts'imputu chi ntu k'is taja'asmatnan, jantu lay tu'u ta'ilhtuy yu laj'oxi.
56002001	Pero uxint'i k'alhich'iwin yu yucha lhichiwiniy an oxi lhamap'a'sin.
56002002	An yu laktatanincha stalan'a katajalakpastaknalh, sawalhi yu katanawlh, katajalajk'atsaanalh, stalan'a la ixjakiklaka'intik'an kawalh chi la xjamapaynintik'an chi li talhitayani an lhima'alh'ajnat.
56002003	An yu laknananincha wanajcha chun tacha yu kajapulhiwilakalh xlakatijlak'ani katalhitsukulh, jantu katalakmaslakatinilh chi ntu katala't'a'ap'alh. Katamasulhi yu oxi
56002004	chi katamasunilhi an yu lakjatsi'ininka li katamapaynilhi xt'apapak'an chi xjas'at'ank'an,
56002005	katajalajk'atsaanalh chi la'stalan'ani katawalh, katalhistaklhi ixcha'ak'an, oxi lapanakni katawalh chi kata'asmatnilhi xt'apapak'an, para li an ixchiwinti Dios tu wa aya kalhichiwinkalh.
56002006	Wanajcha chun, k'ajamat'anunit'i an yu lakts'alaninka li katajalajk'atsaanalh.
56002007	Uxint'i k'ajat'ap'ulhnin k'ajamasunin chux an tanlhun yu laj'oxi. Akxni jamasuni u jamap'a'si laka stalan'a lakatijla k'a'ilht'u chi xlisawalh.
56002008	Chi yu stalan'a chiwinti k'anaw yu ntu xamati kanawlh li ntu oxi. Chuncha watichicha yu tam kanawputuna tacha an nawnaw, kamaxanana'. Mu ntu layi tu'u wa aya akintitalhichiwinin.
56002009	An ma'tsukunin k'aja'uni li kata'asmatnilhi xpatronk'an. Watuchicha chuxi katalhima'an'achalh, jantu kataja'alhtaystuknulh.
56002010	Jantu kataja'alhawanalh, katamasulhi li yu'uncha la'lhitala'sin lapanakni yu ntu taja'alhawanan, para li chux an laka laktanlhun katapumasulhi li ayi an tacha masuy an Dios yu kintama'alhtaxtuyan.
56002011	Mu an Dios yucha masutacha xjamapayninti akxni ja'alhtasunilh an ta'alhtaxtut ixchuxk'an an lapanakni.
56002012	An xjamapayninti Dios kintamasuniyan li kamakajucha an yu ntu oxi chi an yu wa tanlhuncha past'ak'aw ka'ilhtuw aniy lakaamunulhpa', chi yu oxicha jatsukunti kalhi'aw yu chaway ani panch'e'ex t'awnaw, yu ts'awj chi yu jamapayninin.
56002013	Chuncha katsuku li ntuka' chini an yu lhi'acha pakxan'iyaw: akxni kaxlimjcha chincho'oya an ay kiDiosk'an chi an Jesucristo yu kintama'alhtaxtuyan.
56002014	Yucha tama'axta'lhi laka lhinin kilakatak'an para li akintama'alhtaxtuni chux tan alin yu ntu oxi, chi stalajcha akintach'a'a'ojon. Chi kitnan xjas'at'ancha kajunwi, yu wa yu laj'oxicha tanlhun ka'ilhtuw.
56002015	Yucha aniya yu k'amasut'i, k'ajamat'anunin chi alhp'asi k'ajamap'a'sin. Jantu xamati kanawlh li nt'u t'u'u lhit'ap'alay.
56003001	K'ajamap'ast'ak'anit'i ixchuxk'an li kata'asmatnilhi an jamach'alhkatni, kata'ilhtulhi chux yu laj'oxi tanlhun.
56003002	Jantu xamati wa aya katalhichiwinilh, jantu laj'ayajk'atsanin lapanakni katawalh, laj'oxi lapanakni katawalh, ixchuxk'an an lapanakni katamasunilhi jakilhpatinijk'atsat chux la ixjalhunutk'an.
56003003	Mu kitnan la'atam panch'e'ex xjuntachalh wachu ntu k'is ixjalakpastaknanaw chi ntu xja'asmatnanaw; ists'an'ataw chi yuchacha xakintalaklhilat'awnan chux an tanlhun yu ntu oxi jatapast'ak'at chi tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi k'atsat. Tan tu oxi ixt'awnaw chi tan laxkaykan, xakintaxkaykanan chi xlaxkaypaxayaw.
56003004	Pero an Dios yu kintama'alhtaxtuyan masulhi ixta'alh'oxinti chi ixjamapayninti kilakatak'an chux yu t'awnaw.
56003005	Chi masi li kitnan jantu wa xliyu li tu'ucha yu laj'oxi tanlhun ilhtuw, wa la xjamapayninticha kintama'alhtaxtun, kintach'a'an chi kintamapaxan. Chi sast'icha jatsukunti kintapuxta'nicho'on an Stalan'a Takuwin.
56003006	Pus yucha an Jesucristo yu kintama'alhtaxtuyani kintapuxta'nin lhuw an Stalan'a Takuwin,
56003007	para li xli'astan akxni li oxicha kintapu'ilhtutan an xjamapayninti, laycha kapakxan'iyaw li kala'a'iyaw yu an Dios nawlh sawalh li akintaxta'niyan, yucha ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
56003008	Aniy chiwinti yucha sawalh, chi klakask'in li sawalhch'a k'anawi yucha chi lhitala'si k'anaw, para li an yu takiklaka'iy Dios yucha kata'ilhtulh an yu oxi tanlhun. Aniy tanlhun yucha laj'oxi chi talhitapalhniya an lapanakni.
56003009	Pero an wa tanlhuncha la lhikikxtukut chiwinti yu wa lhitontojcha yuch'a k'amak'aw. Chi an ixlakapu'anka li t'anch'unch'a a'p'unt'anch'i, ch'i nt'u k'ala'ay, chi ixlakata an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés wach'u nt'u k'alalhik'ikxt'uk'u; mu yucha ntu tu'u lhitapalay chi ntu tu'u yu oxi kamakawnin.
56003010	An lapanak yu wa ilhtuy li kala'aykalh u katala'apitsikalh, li a't'uych'a un li ntu oxi tacha lay, k'at'amakxt'ucha.
56003011	Yuch'a k'ats'aycha li anchunu lapanak tucha oxi t'ajun, chi ilhtuycha tala'alhin chi kamama'alh'ajnikana xli'akstu wa xliyu tacha an lay.
56003012	Akxni akmala'achaniyan an Artemas u an Tíquico, watukan k'aso'ot'achi ak'ila't'ana'a la'acha'an Nicópolis, mu ancha aktamakawna akxni ixpaku cha lhik'asnin.
56003013	An Zenas yu la'Fmispay lhamap'a'sin chi an Apolos k'ajalhi'a't'ay'uchi laka laktanlhun chux yu lay. K'ajaxt'a'nini yu katama'lhtask'iniya para li ntu tu'u katats'an'atayanilh para li katataylhi'alh ixtijk'an.
56003014	Chi an kilapanaknik'an katalanilh, wachu kata'ilhtulh an yu oxi, chi kataja'a'tayjunulhi akxni tu'u task'iniy, para li an xjatsukuntik'an kalhitapalalh.
56003015	Ixchuxk'an an yu ani tat'ájun tan ani ikt'awnachilh tamak'aniyan jala'axa'alanti. K'ajala'axa'alachi an yu kintat'alamapayniyan laka jakiklaka'inti. Katat'a'aklatsukuni an jamapayninti minchuxk'an. Chunchacha kawalh.
57001001	Filemón, oxi kint'atapatsank'an, kit'in ikPablo, iklaklhchajuy ixlakata an xchiwinti Jesucristo, chaway ikts'o'niyan ani kartaj ali an kint'ala'ajunk'an Timoteo yu wachu kiklaka'iy an ixchiwinti Dios. Ani karta para uxint'i Filemón,
57001002	chi para ixchuxk'an an yu tata'ayxt'o'a la mincha'a yu takiklaka'iy an ixchiwinti Dios, chi para an kint'alajamatsank'an Apia chi an Arquipo yu wachu p'as kintat'alhakapu'anan li lhilasayaw an ixchiwinti Dios.
57001003	Yucha an kimPayk'ancha Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristojcha kataxta'nin xjamapaynintik'an chi oxi jatawlhnat.
57001004	Akxni iktapayni, lhilhiji ikpast'ak'an chi ikxta'niya lhimala'puchajun an Dios milakata,
57001005	mu ik'asmat'a tanajun li k'iklak'a'iya an Jesucristo ch'i li jat'alamap'ayniya an yu wachu takiklaka'iy.
57001006	Chi mu uxint'i jalhixa'alayi an lapanakni tichini kiklaka'itawcha, iklhisk'iniya an Dios li k'alhimach'a'xa'o chux an laj'oxi tanlhun yu kintaxta'niyan an Jesucristo.
57001007	Sawalhcha oxi iklhiwilay chi kima'oximaj'ayayi an mijamapayninti kint'ala'ajun Filemón, mu uxint'iy taputa'oximaj'ayan an kijat'ala'awnink'an.
57001008	Xliyu chaway masi kit'in yucha an Jesucristo kimala'achatachalh chi ikt'acha'ani aklhijunin t'uch'ini k'a'ilht'ucha,
57001009	pero wa laka lamapaynini ijkunan yu k'a'ilht'u, mu kit'in ikPablo chaway iktatacha, chi atumpaj chaway iklhilaklhchajuyi ixlakata an xchiwinti Jesucristo.
57001010	Iksk'iniyan lamapaynin ixlakata an Onésimo, mu chaway tachanu kints'alhcha walh aniy laka pulach'in, mu kiklaka'ilhcha an ixchiwinti Dios,
57001011	masi minchalhcha wilhchan jantu tu'u xlitapalhniyan xna'un, pero chaway uxint'i chi kit'in kintalhitapalhniyancha.
57001012	Chaway ikmala'achanicho'oyancha chi tachanu kit'ini k'ala'a'it'i.
57001013	Kit'in xaknajun li wa laycha li xakint'atamakawlhcha aniy, para li xaki'a'tayjulhcha yucha tacha uxint'i xak'i'a't'ay'ut'i, li chaway kit'in iklaklhchajuyka aniy laka pulach'in ixlakata an ixchiwinti Dios.
57001014	Pero ntu chuni iklhi'achani kit'in li uxint'i nt'u t'u'u k'ats'ay. Para li ntu wa asi akmatanunincha li k'amak'awnin akint'atamakawlh, kit'in oxi iklhiwilay li yu minta'achanin.
57001015	Kit'in iknajun an Onésimo ka xliyu lhilaj'osni tam panch'e'ex para li chaway ixpujun'alhincha k'ala'a'it'i,
57001016	chi k'ala'a'it'i tacha xamati yu sawalh map'ayni, tacha mint'ala'ajun yu map'ayni sawalh, jantucha tacha wa mimputapatsancha. Kit'in ikmapayni sawalh, pero uxint'i p'alaych'a k'amap'aynit'i, mu lapanak chi wachucha kiklaka'ilhi an ixchiwinti Dios.
57001017	Chaway ijkunan, mu kint'atapatsank'at'i tachanu kit'ini k'ala'a'it'i an Onésimo.
57001018	Li tu'u tala'alhini ilhtunitan u li lhi'aniyan, kit'incha ak'ilhich'it'i.
57001019	Chi para li ntu ajkunini li wach'u k'ilhip'iniya mijatsukunti, mu kit'ini ikmasunin la xtij an Jesucristo, chaway kit'in ikPablo la kimaka ikts'o't'ajun ani jalhiki tan ikpujunan li kit'ini akmapalhniyan.
57001020	Kint'ala'ajun Filemón, la xtalakask'i an Dios iksk'iniyan lamapaynin ak'ila'oximaj'ayat'i, mu uxint'i misp'aycha an Dios wachu'.
57001021	Ikts'o'niyan mu ijk'atsayi li k'a'asmat'a'a an tacha ijkunan, chi ijk'atsayi li tacha an ijkunan k'a'ilht'u uxint'i, k'alhimo'slaya'ilht'uya'a.
57001022	Atumpaj wachu ijkunan li ak'imala'sijnininka lakatam tan lay akcha'alh, mu ikpakxan'iya li amintapaynitk'an ka'asmat'anta an Dios, para li lay aklala'cha'aw.
57001023	Wachu tala'axa'alayan an Epafras yu wachu kint'amalaklhchawkanta ixlakata an xchiwinti Jesucristo,
57001024	chi an Marcos chi an Aristarco chi an Demas chi an Lucas, wachu tala'axa'alayan, yu'uncha wachu kintat'atapatsay la xchiwinti an Dios.
57001025	An xjamapayninti Jamach'alhkat Jesús la mintakuwinchak'ani katsukulh.
58001001	Yu ma'anchacha xjuntachalh an Dios wanaj a'lhuwi jaxa'alalh an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw chi tamj tamjcha ixjaxa'alay yucha an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Diosi ixjapuxa'alay.
58001002	Yu chaway anicha xati'astan panch'e'ex, yucha an isTs'alhcha kintapuxa'alayan, yu pu'ilhtulh an lakaamunulhpa chi yu ma'axta'ni'olh chux an tanlhun.
58001003	Yucha ixmakalip'at an ixta'ayat an Dios, yucha ixtasut an Dios chi yucha sa' lakch'apayaw'ojota chux an tanlhun an laka alhp'asni xchiwinti. Akxni kintaxakamaj'anincha kintala'alhink'an, tawilhcha an lakt'iyan tan ch'alhkatnan an Dios tan oxi ixpa'xti tawlhnilh,
58001004	chi palay xa'ayi walh, an angelhnin jantu, mu yucha la'a'ilh la'atam ta'a'ut yu palay oxi, an angelhnin jantu.
58001005	Mu an Dios jantu a'tam junilh xamati angelh: "Uxint'i kinTs'alhk'at'i; kit'ini ikxta'nin jatsukunti." Chi ntu xamati angelhi kapastakpalh kanawlh: "Kit'in ixPayi ajkuna', chi yucha kints'alhi kajuna'."
58001006	Chi lakatam najun akxni lhimilhcha an la'atamij isTs'alh aniy lakaamunulhpa: "Ixchuxk'an an ix'angelhnin an Dios ayi katala'ts'ilh."
58001007	La ixchiwinti Dios najun: Yucha ja'ilhtuyi an ix'angelhnin tacha un chi an yu tat'atapatsay tacha lam lam an jikmi ja'ilhtuy.
58001008	An Dios juniy an isTs'alh: "Uxint'i Diosk'at'i amilhich'alhkat xpujun'alhincha. Amink'iw yu p'uch'alhk'atnan wa tami k'ap'uxt'a'a'a.
58001009	Uxint'i yucha an yu laj'oxi tanlhuni ach'ani, jant'u la'ts'imp'ut'uni an yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun, xliyu lhisakxtun an Dios, minDios chi palay xta'nini achat an mint'alhtanan jantu."
58001010	Chi nawpalay: "Uxint'i Jamach'alhkat, xlip'ulhnaj ilht'ucha tan katawilh an lakaat'un. Chi an lakt'iyan la mimaka ilht'u.
58001011	Yu'uncha katats'an'acho'oya', pero uxint'i k'ats'uk'u'alhiya'a. Chi chux yu'uncha katalaj'at'ilina tacha la'atam la'ch'it.
58001012	Uxint'i k'ajats'ipsa'a tacha ts'ipskan alhtam la'ch'it chi k'ajamap'axaya'a tacha mapaxakan la'ch'it. Pero uxint'i watachacha uxint'i k'a'una'a, amink'ata jantu a'tam katimin'olh."
58001013	An Dios tu a'tam junilh xamati angelh tacha junilh an isTs'alh: "Tan oxicha kimpa'xti k'at'a'ulh sta li an yu wa taxkayan ajka'ilhtuyacha li k'ajap'ut'ach'at'acha."
58001014	Mu ixchuxk'an an angelhnin yu'uncha takuwinin yu tat'atapatsay an Dios, yu'uncha jamala'achakanta para li kata'a'tayjulh an yu katata'alhtaxtuya'.
58002001	Pus xliyu li lhitask'iniya li oxicha palayi kalhakapu'aw an chiwinti yu asmattawcha, para li ntu kach'axpataxtuwi an laka tij.
