58002002	An Dios japuxta'lhi ixlamap'a'sin an angelhnin yu tawananchacha xjuntachalh, chi alhp'asi ixjunita, chi yu ta'ilhtulhi xtala'alhink'an chi yu wa ta'asmatmaj'alhi an lhamap'a'sin jaxta'nikalhi lhima'alh'ajna tacha yu xtat'acha'ancha.
58002003	¿Tasucha kalhita'alhtaxtuyaw kitnan li ntu katilhistakwi an la'atam ay ta'alhtaxtuti? Yucha an Jamach'alhkati yu p'ulhnaj jamak'atsaaninilh ani ta'alhtaxtut, xli'astan kintamak'atsaanincha an yu ta'asmatlhi aniy chiwinti.
58002004	Atumpaj an Dios yucha pumasuycha laka laktanlhun yu la'lhi'a'nin chi tanlhuncha yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanak lay ilhtuy chi mala'pitsicha an stalan'a xTakuwin tacha yu yuchacha oxi lhiwilay.
58002005	An Dios jantu la xmaknik'an an angelhnini jamakawnita an lakaamunulhpa yu lhichiwint'awnaw yu wa ka'alinaka'.
58002006	Pero tichiyucha najun tanchun: ¿Tisu xlijunticha an lapanak para li ap'ast'akt'icha, u tisu xlijunticha an wa ists'alhcha lapanak para li ala'p'ixiyalhnacha?
58002007	An lapanak yucha palay wa lakat'ikt'i ilht'u, an angelhnin jantu, walh ch'i xt'a'nini ixcorona yu kaputa'ayalh chi kalhiwilakalh.
58002008	Chux an tanlhun ilht'u li la xjach'aja an lapanaki katamakawlh. Pus mu li ilhtulhi an Dios li chux an tanlhun la xjach'aja an lapanaki katamakaw'olh, pus tu tu'u yu ntucha yu kala'ts'ilhi'alh walh chi chaway la'ts'inaw li ntuka' chuxi yu yuchacha kala'ts'ilhi'an'olh.
58002009	Pero la'ts'inawi li an Jesús yu an Dios ilhtulh tam panch'e'ex li palay wa xalakat'ikt'i kawalh chi an angelhnin palay xalaj'ajin, li yucha xta'nikalhi ixcorona para li ayi kala'ts'inkalh chi kalhila'sikalh ixlakata li yucha nilh. An Dios la xjamapayninti lakask'ilhi li kama'k'atsalhi an lhinin kilakatak'an kinchuxk'an.
58002010	Chux an tanlhun ixlakata an Diosi li lak'alin chi yucha lak'ilhtuta, yucha lakask'in li ixchuxk'an an xjas'at'an katacha'alhi tan ch'alhkatnan. Xliyu an Dios laka lhima'alh'ajna ilhtulhi li ntu tu'u kats'an'anilh an Jesucristo, yu ixjama'alhtaxtunuk'an an xjas'at'an.
58002011	Mu ixchuxk'an wa pumatami xPayk'an: tacha an yu jamastalan'anan chi an yu jamastalan'anikan. Xliyu an isTs'alh Dios jantu maxanani li kintajunan li ixjat'ala'awnin juntaw.
58002012	Chuncha nawlh an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Ajkalhixa'alaya milakata an kijat'ala'awnin, chi akmilhpaniyani milhpat xtan'ajni tan ikta'ayxt'o'aw."
58002013	Chi nawpalay: "Yucha ajkiklaka'iya'." Chi nawpalay: "Aniya ijkat'ayalh an kijas'at'an yu an Dios kijaxta'nilh."
58002014	Ixjas'at'an pumatam lapanak wachu chuni ixjakanitk'an chi ixjak'alhnik'an, wanajcha chuni an Jesús lhitsukulhi ixjakanit chi ixjak'alhni, para li an xlinin kapulaklhajalhi an yu lay ixjama'ninin, an xapay makxkay un.
58002015	Chunchacha japuma'alhtaxtunilh ixchuxk'an an yu wa xliyu li xtatalhamni an lhinin wa xja'a'ch'apa'alhitacha xtat'ajun.
58002016	Mu yucha kilachilh jantu para li kaja'a'tayjulh an angelhnin, yu'uncha an yu tapu'a'p'unminchalh an Abrami ja'a'tayjulh.
58002017	Chi chuncha xlitask'iniy li wanaj tacha an ixjat'ala'awnini kijunchilh para li lay yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote kijunchilh, yu jalakmapayni chi t'atapatsay an Dios. Chi nilh para li lay kajamala'mixinilh xtala'alhink'an an lapanakni.
58002018	Chi mu wanaj yucha ma'alh'ajnalh akxni lhila'ts'intanukalh, pus yucha layi kajalhi'a'tayjuya an yu jalhila'ts'intanukan.
58003001	Pus chawayi kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan yu wach'u t'asanik'anat an lakt'iyan, k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti an Cristo Jesús, an mala'achalh Dios chi yu ay tukan sacerdote, mu ixlakata yucha li tacha ani jakiklaka'ininaw.
58003002	Yucha muktaxtuni sawalhi an Dios, yu lhka'ulalh li ka'ilhtulh ani tapatsat, tacha an Moisés yu wachu muktaxtu'olhi xtapatsat an la ixcha'a an Dios.
58003003	Pero an Jesús palay lhitapalayi la'ts'inkan, an Moisés jantu, tacha an yu yajuy a'atam cha'a yucha yu palay lhitapalay, jantu yu an cha'a'.
58003004	Wa tanyuchacha cha'a si alini tichini la'oxilhcha, pero chux an tanlhun yu lak'alin'ojoy yucha an Diosi lak'ilhtulh.
58003005	Pus chunchacha, an Moisés tacha ma'tapatsan muktaxtulh sawalhi chux an la ixcha'a Dios, chi nawlhi an yu Dios ka xnawlh xli'astan.
58003006	Chi an Cristo, isTs'alh Dios yucha lhist'ak'a sawalhi an ixcha'a Dios, chi an cha'a yucha kitnan, li sa' lhitsuku'alhiyawi an kijakiklaka'intik'an chi tacha an laj'achanaw li pakxan'iyaw.
58003007	Xliyu tacha an lhinajun an Stalan'a Takuwin an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: Li asmat'at'iti uxitnan chaway yu iknajun,
58003008	jant'u k'at'ak'alh ilht'ut'iti mijalhunutk'an tacha an yu ntu kintakiklaka'ilh chi kintalhila'ts'intanulhi an tan wa lakaaxixnicha.
58003009	Ancha kintalhila'ts'intanulhi an yu t'a xjalhila'ts'inat masi xtala'ts'intacha t'up'uxam k'ata tacha an klak'ilhtuy tanlhun,
58003010	xliyu kintalhima'talh'amalh anchunu lapanakni yu ma'anchacha xtat'ajun, chi iknawlh: ‘Wa lhilhijcha tats'an'ata la xjalhunutk'an, jantu tamispata an kin tij.’
58003011	Xliyu iklhitalh'amajnawlh, iknawlh: Jantu katitatanuchalhi tan ijkastaknan.
58003012	K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti t'ala'awnin, li ntu xamati yu uxitnan kalhitsukulh jalhunut yu ntu oxi, yu ntu jakiklaka'inin, yu kamala'xtinulh la x'ukxlakapu an yu la'ajuntu Dios.
58003013	Apalij k'alamach'ap'ut'iti atamjtamin yu uxitnan tamin wilhchan, li nawkanka: "Chaway", para li ntu xamati yu uxitnan ka t'ak'alh lalh ixlakata an xja'o'xcho'onti an tala'alhin.
58003014	Mu kitnan kinta'ilhtukantan li kat'atala'xto'wi an Cristo, para li oxi katsuku'alhiw sta xpu'uktaxtun an laka jakiklaka'inti yu xlit'awnaw xlip'ulhnaj.
58003015	Xliyu lhinajunta: Li chaway asmat'at'iti uxitnan yu an Dios najun, jant'u k'at'ak'alh ilht'ut'iti amijalhunutk'an tacha an yu wa tala'amaj'alh an Dios.
58003016	¿Chi tisiyu'unchacha an yu xta'asmattacha an ixchiwinti Dios chi wa tala'amaj'alhi? Ixchuxk'an yu an jamaxtuchalh xalakaat'un Egipto an Moisés.
58003017	¿Chi tisi yu'unchacha yu jatalh'amnilh an Dios t'up'uxam k'ata? Yu'uncha an yu ta'ilhtulh xtala'alhink'an, yu'uncha tala'ta'a'atalh chi talaknilhi an tan wa jaxixnintacha lakaat'un.
58003018	¿Chi tisi yu'unchacha yu jajurarlanikalh chi jantu katitatanuchalhi tan jastaknani? Yu'uncha an yu ntu ta'asmatnilh an xchiwinti.
58003019	Pus la'ts'inawcha li ntu layi tatanuchalh wa xliyu li ntu tajakiklaka'inilh.
58004001	Pus xliyu li ixpaku ka an tan kintajunan li layi katanucha'aw tan jastaknan an Dios, kajalajk'atsanaw, jantu junita xamati de uxitnan jantu katanuchalh.
58004002	Mu kitnan wachu kintamak'atsaanikantani an laj'oxi chiwinti tacha yu'uncha; pero yu'uncha jantu tu'u talhitapalhnilh masi ta'asmatlhi, mu ntu takiklaka'ilhi an chiwinti .
58004003	Pero kitnan yu kiklaka'iyaw, katanutacha'awi tan jastaknan an Dios, an tan najunta: "Xliyu iklhitalh'amajjurarlalh iknawlh li ntu katitatanuchalhi tan ikjastaknan." Masi an xlaktapatsat xlak'ilhtu'ojotacha sta akxni ilhtuchalh an lakaamunulhpa'.
58004004	Mu an tanchun lhichiwininta chunchuni yu xlila'atujuncha wilhchan: "Chi an Dios jastaknalhcha akxni lak'ilhtu'olhcha an xtapatsat xlila'atujuncha wilhchan."
58004005	Chi nawpalata an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Jantu katitatanuchalhi tan ijkastaknanta."
58004006	Walh chi ts'an'ayka li ali'in katatanuchalhi an tan jastaknankan, mu an yu p'ulhnaj jamak'atsaanikalh an laj'oxi chiwinti jantu tatanuchalh wa xliyu jantu takiklaka'ilh.
58004007	Xliyu an Dios a'tam makawpalay la'atam wilhchan, la'atam sast'i "chaway". Yucha an Daviti ma'ancha puchiwinilh, tan an nawkalh: "Li asmat'at'iti uxitnan chaway yu najun an Dios, jant'u k'at'ak'alh ilht'ut'iti mijalhunutk'an."
58004008	Mu li an Josué kaxjaxta'nilhcha jastaknat an israelitajnin, an Dios jantucha tu'u atumpaj wilhchani kaxlichiwinilh.
58004009	Pus chaway alinka la'atam jastaknat para an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.
58004010	Mu yu tanuyachalhi an la xjastaknat Dios, wachucha jastaknani la xtapatsat, tacha an Dios jastaknantacha la xtapatsat.
58004011	Pus kat'ataxtuniwi para li katanucha'aw anchunu tan jastaknankan, para li ntu xamati ali kataylhi'alh tacha an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inilh.
58004012	Mu an ixchiwinti Dios yucha la'ajunta chi alhp'as, chi palay jach'uk'unun, walh jantu masi watuchicha espada yu ta'ukxput'uy makikxtukanta, chi yucha layi ta'aknuy sta ch'uk'uy an tak'atsan chi an takuwin, ta'aknuyi sta xpulaknicha tukan an lapanak, layi k'atsay tani jatapastaknankancha chi tuchini ilhtuputuncha an jalhunut.
58004013	Jantu tu'u an yu alin ani yu ntucha lay kala'ts'ilh, chuxi la'ts'in'ojoy la xla'chulh anchunu yu kajun'oyaw tani xt'awnawcha.
58004014	Pus li lhit'awnawi yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote, an Jesús, an isTs'alh Dios, yu pala'puschalh an lakt'iyan, kakiklaka'i'alhiwcha yu kiklaka'itaw.
58004015	Mu ani lhit'awnaw xa'ay tukan sacerdote layi akintamak'akxaniyan li tu'u' ilhtuyaw yu ntu lay lhitayaniw. Yucha wachu lhila'ts'intanukalhi chux laka laktanlhun tacha kitnan, pero yucha ntu tu'u ilhtulh xtala'alhin.
58004016	Pus kakiklaka'iwcha, kastalhcha awi an tan wilh xputawlan yu puch'alhkatnan an kiDiosk'an, yu jamapayninin, para li akintamak'akxanin chi an la xjamapayninti akintalhi'a'tayjuni akxni ma'lhtask'iniyaw.
58005001	Mu chux yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote an tan tat'ajun lapanakni, sakxtukan, chi lhka'ulakancha para li yuchacha kat'achiwinilh Dios ixlakatak'an an lapanakni, chi para li kama'axta'lhicha lha'ulan chi kajama'nilhcha jatapakxat ixlakata tala'alhin.
58005002	Chi mu an sacerdote wachu k'atsayi li lhima'anxkayi li ak'ilhtulh yu lhinajun an Dios, pus layi jalakmapayni an yu ntu tu'u tak'atsay chi an yu wa tats'an'ata,
58005003	chi ixlakata li wachu lhima'anxkayi lhiwilay li ka'ilhtulh yu lhinajun Dios, pus kajama'niya jatapakxat chi kaja'ulanana', yu ixlakata xtala'alhin yucha chi yu ixlakata xtala'alhink'an an lapanakni.
58005004	Jantu xamati lay katilhitsukulh ani tapatsat wanajcha wa xjatalaputut, yucha an Diosi kaxta'niya yu chuncha katapatsaya', tacha ixjunita an Aarón.
58005005	Wanajcha chun, an Cristo jantu wa x'akstucha lhka'ulakalh xa'ay tukan sacerdote, yucha an Diosi xta'nilh ta'ayat akxni junilh: "Uxint'i kinTs'alhk'at'i, kit'ini ikxta'nin jatsukunti."
58005006	Chi tanchun ts'o'muk'apalhkanta an la ixchiwinti Dios jumpalay: "Uxint'i xpujun'alhincha sacerdote tacha an Melquisedec."
58005007	An Cristo akxni ixt'ajunka aniy lakamunulhpa, tapayninilh chi sk'inilhi laka p'as chiwinti chi alhut an yu lay kaxma'alhtaxtulh laka lhinin, chi mu wa xliyu jakiklaka'inin, pus an Dios asmatnilh.
58005008	Pus an Cristo masi yucha isTs'alh Dios, mu ma'alh'ajnalh, pus laklanilhi tanyuchacha yu ja'asmatnat,
58005009	chi chaway li ts'awjcha tukani tsukulh, yuchacha walh li kataputa'alhtaxtu'olh yu xpujun'alhincha ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'i.
58005010	Chi an Dios ilhtulhcha li xa'ay tukan sacerdoteje kajunlhi tacha an Melquisedec.
58005011	Yu ixlakata aniy wanaj lhuwi yu aknaju, pero lhima'anxkayi li aklhichiwinilh, mu uxitnan sawalhcha xlak'anti lhimach'a'xayat'it.
58005012	Tacha ani ma'anchacha la'pusta panch'e'ex, uxitnan jamatalanininch'a k'ax'unt'it, walh chi apalij wa ma'lht'ask'inip'alat li a'tam wa k'a'ump'alhk'ant'iti an tanlhun yu ntu la'lhima'anxkay, yu masuy Dios, t'ach'anu t'ach'ip'int'at'iti li yu p'as tu'u ukan jant'uk'a' lay uyat'it wa ts'ik'ikk'a ot'at'it.
58005013	Chi yu wa ts'ik'iyka jantuka' k'atsayi an oxi chiwinti, mu jas'at'aka'.
58005014	Pero yu p'ascha lakts'ak'akan ukan para yu'uncha an yu laj'ajincha, yu wa xliyu tajatapastaknancha pus la's'alalancha, tak'atsaycha tanyuchacha yu oxi chi yu ntu oxi.
58006001	Pus kataylhi'awcha sta li kat'acha'awcha li laj'ajincha kajunwi. Jantu wa x'amancha kalhakapu'aw an yu p'ulhnajcha laklaniw yu masuy Cristo: akxni an makajucha yu ntu laj'oxi chi an tanlhun yu kalhi'an laka lhinin, chi li kiklaka'iwcha an Dios,
58006002	chi li laklaniwcha li a'paxkan, chi li jalak'uktach'apakan an yu tajakiklaka'inin, chi li katala'awcho'oya an yu talaknitacha chi yu xpujun'alhincha kanawkana li oxi u jantu tani xt'awnawcha.
58006003	Chuncha aktaylhi'anaw akmasuyaw li Dios kintamakawniyan.
58006004	Ali'in jantucha takiklaka'in. Tala'a'ilhcha an jatapulhkunu chi takilhk'atsalhcha yu an Dios jaxta'niy tuchini yu katalhitapalacha, chi tama'la'a'ilhcha an Stalan'a Takuwin.
58006005	Chi wanajcha chun takilhk'atsalhcha an oxi ixchiwinti Dios, chi an ix'alhp'asninti an yu wa ka'alinaka lakaamunulhpa.
58006006	Pero li yu'uncha a'tam tata'a'tapalay, jantucha layi wanaj a'tam xlisast'i katijamach'a'o'apalakalh Dios, mu chuncha tachanu a'tam tamakxtukmuk'apalayi an isTs'alh Dios, chi tamamaxanicha tan lhilhuw.
58006007	Akxni an lakaat'un ot'acha an xkan yu wa paktsincha ancha tamayachalh, chi oxicha jama'axta'niy yu tach'an an lapanakni, an Dios najun oxi kawalh an t'un.,
58006008	Pero an lakaat'un tan wa lakalhtukuncha, jantu tu'u lhitapalay, an Dios kajuna li ntu oxi, chi kala'xawakana'.
58006009	Pero masi chuncha ikchiwinawi t'ala'awnin, ijk'atsayawi li uxitnan yu oxi tu'u k'ala'a'iya'it, kanaju, yu yucha an ta'alhtaxtut.
58006010	Mu an Dios yucha ts'ajwi lak'ilhtuy an tanlhun, jantu katikaplhi yu uxitnan lak'ilht'ut'at chi an mijamapaynintik'an yu masunit'at li ja'a't'ay'uyat an yu tajakiklaka'inin, t'ach'a t'aylhip'int'at masi chaway.
58006011	Pero iklakask'inaw li atamjtamin uxitnan k'at'aylhip'it'iti k'amasut sta wa xpu'ukla'ojoncha t'ach'a an t'at'axt'uniyat'it, para li k'alhits'uk'utcha sawalhi yu p'akxan'iyat.
58006012	Jant'u wa k'ala'malhe'nint'it, k'ajala'ts'ixt'ut'iti an yu la xjakiklaka'intik'an chi li talhitayani, tala'a'iya yu jaxta'niy Dios yu jajunkan li kajaxta'nikana'.
58006013	Akxni an Dios junilhi tuchini kaxta'niyacha an Abram, an Dios wa x'akstucha punawkalh, mu ntu xamati alin yu palay ay, yu kapunawnkalh,
58006014	najun: "Kit'in sawalh, aknawna' li oxi k'a'unt'i chi lhuwi ajkaxta'niyan yu katapu'a'p'un'anan."
58006015	Chi lhitayanilhi pakxan'ilh, chi la'a'ilhi an Abram yu an Dios ixjunita li kaxta'niya'.
58006016	An lapanakni akxni tanajun li kata'ilthuya' tu'u', yu palay ay xamati tapunajun, chi akxni tanajuncha li chuncha sawalhi li tu'u, jantucha ali lay tu'u lalhikikxtukukan.
58006017	Pus an Dios oxicha sawalhi jamasuniputulh an yu jajuniy li kajaxta'niya yu laj'oxi, jajuniy li kajaxta'niya sawalh chi li ntu tu'u yu tamcha katinawpalh, xliyu lhinawlh li ka'ilhtuya' para li kak'atsakalhi li sawalhi yu najun.
58006018	Akxni jajunilh li kajaxta'niya sawalhi yu ja'alhtasuni chi jaxta'nilh an ixchiwinti, jajunilh la'at'uy chiwinti yu ntu lay katitapaxalh, chi an Dios tu lay katipumaslakatinilh. Yucha pula'a'iyaw yu sawalh oxi kintama'oxamixiyan yu an puxkawyaw ixja'a'tayjunti Dios chi yu kiklaka'iyaw tacha an kintajunan li kapakxan'iw.
58006019	Tacha aniy pakxan'iyaw lhitala'si chi k'ut'ilhi kinta'ilhtuniyan kintak'atsank'an, tacha an barco lhitala'si sa' putawlay an tsasnat yu puch'i'ulakan. Tacha ani pakxan'iyaw la'pustachalhi sta la x'a'lhch'a an st'ak'ak'a la'ch'it an uk'alh an laka tajtan awint'i lakt'iyan,
58006020	tan an Jesús tanuchalh, para li akintatap'ulhnin chi junlhicha yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote yu xpujun'alhincha tacha an melquisedec.
58007001	An Melquisedec xarey la'acha'an Salem chi isacerdote an Dios yu wilhchalh lakt'iyani ixjunita. Akxni an Abram chincho'olhcha li jakit'alasalh an rejnin chi jalhajalh, an Melquisedec kilakatastuklhi chi lhitapaynisk'inkalhcha an Abraham li Diosi ka'a'tayjulh.
58007002	Tacha an la'akawincha ixkilhajaxtuta an tanlhun an tan kilasalh an Abram xta'nilhcha la'atamini an Melquisedec. An ta'a'ut Melquisedec yu p'ulhnaj nawputun: xajamach'alhkat yu oxi laklats'awalay tanlhun, chi wachu xajamach'alhkat la'acha'an Salemiji ixjunita. Chi Salem nawputun: xajamach'alhkat oxi jatawlhnat.
58007003	An Melquisedec jantu tu'u lhit'ajun xpay chi xnati chi ntu xamati'ini yu ta kajalhila'ts'ilh, jantu k'atsakani tawanancha tsukulh chi tawanancha nilh, wa xt'atami tacha an isTs'alh Dios, xpujun'alhincha sacerdoteje junita.
58007004	K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti li ay lapanak sawalhi ixjunita an Melquisedec mu masi an Abram yu kimpayk'an xlila'ts'inaw xta'nilhi décima parte an yu xkilaklhajaxtuta tanlhun tan kilasalh.
58007005	An la xlamap'a'sin Moisés najunta li an sacerdotejnin yu tapu'a'p'unmintachalh an Leví, talhit'ajuni lhamap'a'sin li katach'ilhi décima parte yu talhajay an lapanakni, masi an lapanakni chi an sacerdotejnin wachu yucha an Abrami tapu'a'p'unmintachalh.
58007006	Pero an Melquisedec masi ntu yu xpu'a'p'unmintachalh an Leví, ma'lhtaylhi an décima parte yu ilhajata an Abram chi an Melquisedec sk'inilhi an Dios li oxi katawilh an Abram yu ixjunita an Dios li tuchini kaxta'niyacha.
58007007	Chi yu palay ay yucha an yu sk'in an Dios li oxi katawilh yu palay xalakat'ikt'i, jantu lay xamati katinawlh li ntu chun.
58007008	Ani chun sawalh an diezmo wa lapanaknicha yu talakniya tajama'lhtayanan, pero an lakatam ancha jama'lhtayanan pumatam yu lhichiwinkan li t'ajunka'.
58007009	Chi layi kanaju li an Leví, yu jama'lhtayanan an diezmo chaway, yucha an Abramcha pujamapalanalh wachu',
58007010	mu an Melquisedec akxni alhcha lakatastuknu an Abram, an Abram ixjalhit'ajuncha la ixlakatunaj an yu katapu'a'p'un'ana'.
58007011	Li an lapanakni laycha yu'uncha ts'awj kaxtaputsukulh an sacerdotejnin yu ta xjalhila'ts'in an Leví, (mu yu'unchacha yu japuxta'nikalh lhamap'a'sin an lapanakni), oxicha kaxtaputsukulh, pero mu ntu layi oxi taputsukulh pus task'inipalh li katsukupalh pumatam sacerdote yu tacha an Melquisedec jantucha yu tacha an Arón.
58007012	Mu akxni mapaxakani tani tapatsaycha pumatam sacerdote wachu tapaxayi an lhamap'a'sin,
58007013	chi ani Jesús yu tacha ani lhichiwinkan yucha tumpaj lapanakni japu'a'p'unminchalh, yu yu'uncha jantu xamati tapatsalh tan ixma'axta'kan lha'ulan.
58007014	Mu oxi k'atsakan li an kiJamach'alhkatk'an yucha an Judaja japu'a'p'unminchalh, walh an Moisés tu tu'u jalhichiwinilh akxni lhichiwinilh ixlakata an pusacerdote.
58007015	Chi aniy palaycha oxi tukan putasuy, li an sast'i sacerdote yu talakasulh tacha an Melquisedec.
58007016	Yucha jantu wa lapanaknicha ta'ilhtulh sacerdote, yucha pujunlhi sacerdote an la x'alhp'asninti xjatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katinilh.
58007017	Yucha alini tan lhichiwininta an Dios, tan najun: "Uxint'i mimpujun'alhincha milhisacerdote tacha an Melquisedec."
58007018	Pus an yu p'ulhnajcha lhamap'a'sin mala'mixikalhcha, mu ntu alhp'asi ixjunita chi ntu tu'u xlitapalay,
58007019	pus an xlamap'a'sin Moisés jantu tu'u yu oxicha ka'ilhtulh, chi yu xli'o'lhtapaxancha yucha palay lhitala'si, yucha stalh pula'anawi an Dios.
58007020	Chi aniy yucha jurarlanikalh. An ali'in sacerdotejnin akxni jalhka'ulakalh jantu jajurarlanikalh,
58007021	pero yu ixlakata aniy yucha jurarlanikalhi akxni nawlh an yu junilh: An Jamach'alhkat jurarlalh, chi ntu astan katinawlh: Uxint'i xpujun'alhincha sacerdote tacha an Melquisedec.
58007022	Ani nawputun li yucha an Jesuscha yu lhitala'sicha japut'atamakajun an ixlapanakni an Dios.
58007023	An ali'in sacerdotejnin wanajcha xluwk'ani tawalh wa xliyu li akxni ixtanicha jantucha lay ali xtataylhi'an.
58007024	pero an Jesús mu yucha jantu a'tam katinilh, pus an xpusacerdote jantu a'tam katitapaxalh.
58007025	Xliyu yucha layi jama'alhtaxtuy yu xpujun'alhincha yu yucha tapula'cha'an an Dios, mu yucha xpujun'alhincha li t'ajun para li kajalhitapayninilhi an Dios ixlakatak'an.
58007026	Pus an Jesús yucha xa'ay tukan sacerdote yu xma'lhtask'iniyaw. Yucha Stalan'a, jantu tu'u ilhtuy yu ntu oxi, yucha jantu lhkiliki, yucha jantu jat'atala'xt'o'a an yu ta'ilhtuy xtala'alhink'an yucha palay awint'i lakt'iyani ulakantachalh.
58007027	Yucha jantu tacha an ali'in xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, yu tama'lhtask'iniy tamin wilhchan katama'nilh jatapakxat, yu p'ulhnajcha tama'niy jatapakxat ixlakata xtala'alhink'an chi xli'astan ixlakatachak'an an lapanakni, yucha wa a'tami ilhtulh yu xpujun'alhincha, wanaj xjatsukunti yucha ma'axta'lhi.
58007028	An xlamap'a'sin Moisés wa lapanaknicha yu lay ta'ilhtuy xtala'alhink'ani jalhka'ulay, pero an yu nawlh an Dios li sawalh, yu xli'astancha lhamap'a'sin ilhtukalh, yucha lhka'ulay an isTs'alh, yu ntu tu'u xtala'alhin chi yu xpujun'alhincha.
58008001	Yucha aniya an yu tukancha lhilakchiwint'awnaw: an xa'ay tukan kisacerdotejk'an sa'cha wilhchalhi an lakt'iyan tan lhi'oxi la xpa'xti an tan wilh xputawlan an Dios yu puch'alhkatnan.
58008002	Yucha la'ts'ilhi'an an tan xasawalh ixtajtan Dios, yu yucha an Dios la'oxilh yu ntu wa lapanakcha la'oxilh.
58008003	Mu ixchuxk'an an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin jalhka'ulakani li katama'ninilhi jatapakxat an Dios chi li kataja'ulananilh, pus an Jesucristo wachu task'iniya li tu'u kama'axta'lhi.
58008004	Li aniy lakaat'uni kax'aklatsukulh yucha jantu kaxjunlhi sacerdote, mu aniy ta'alincha sacerdotejnin yu tama'axt'a'a lha'ulan tacha lhinajun an xlamap'a'sin Moisés.
58008005	Ani sacerdotejnin yu'uncha wa yucha an ixma'stele'k'an yu lak'alinachalh sawalh anu lakt'iyani taputapatsay, tacha an junikalh an Moisés akxni mala'oxinikalh an Tabernáculo tan xchin an ix'alhp'asninti Dios, akxni junkan: "Oxi k'alhak'ap'up'i, chux an tanlhun ch'unch'a k'a'ilht'u, t'ach'a an masunik'a an a'stitawk'a."
58008006	Pero an xa'ay tukan kisacerdotejk'an, yu la'a'ita ixpusacerdote yu palay oxi, yucha yu palay oxi lakchiwinti kintaput'atamakawnan, mu yu palay laj'oxi tanlhun yu akintaxta'nikanani pupastakchalh.
58008007	Li an yu p'ulhnaj lakchiwinti yu kintaput'atamakawkan jantu inta kaxlits'an'alh, pus tucha tu'u kaxlitask'inilh li kax'alimpalh yu xlipu'a'tuycha xakintaput'atamakawkan.
58008008	Pero an Dios la'cha'alhi tan tu oxi xtat'ajun an lapanakni chi nawlh: "An Jamach'alhkat Dios najun: kamina wilhchan akxni tumpaj ajkat'atamakawcho'oya an xla'acha'an an Israel chi an ixla'acha'an Judá.
58008009	Ani lakchiwinti yu ajkaput'atamakawcho'oya jantu yu tacha an ik'ilhtulh ali an yu t'a ixjalhila'ts'inat'it, akxni ijkala'ma'ch'apachalh para li ajkamaxtuchalh Egipto; chi mu yu'uncha jantu tamuktaxtulhi tacha an ijkajunilh, kit'in ijkamakawlh, najuni an Jamach'alhkat.
58008010	An lakchiwinti yu ajkaput'atamakawna an la'acha'an Israel xli'astan yucha aniy, najuni an Jamach'alhkat: An la ixjatapast'ak'atk'ani ak'ilhtuya li katalhitsukulh an kilhamap'a'sin chi la ixjalhunutk'ani ajkats'o'muk'aniya'. Kit'ini ixDiosk'an ajkuna chi yu'uncha kilapanakni katajuna'.
58008011	Chi ntucha xamati katit'alamasunilh ixt'alapanak chi kamasunilh xamati ixt'ala'ajun, kajunilh: k'amisp'at'icha an Jamach'alhkat. Mu ixchuxk'ani akintamispaya', sta yu wa lakt'ikt'in chi yu laj'ajin.
58008012	Ajkamala'mixiniya tanlhun yu ntu oxi ta'ilhtuta, chi ntucha a'tam aktijapastaknilhi ixtala'alhink'an."
58008013	Li lhichiwiniya an Dios yu sast'icha chiwinti putamakawcho'okan, an yu p'ulhnaj at'ilhcha ilhtulh, chi yu at'ilhcha chi yu ntucha xa'a'ikan wa k'ischa ts'an'aniy li kala'mixacha.
58009001	Chaway oxicha, an chiwinti yu Dios p'ulhnajcha jat'atamakawlh ixlapanakni, yucha lhinawlh yu ixma'lhtask'iniy para li katakiklaka'lhi an Dios. Wachu lhinawlh li kata'ilhtulh la'atam cha'a yu wa de anicha lakaat'un tan ixputapayninikan.
58009002	An cha'a yu xputapaynikan chunchuniya ixjunita: tan yu p'ulhnajcha pulaktam tan ixjunkan xnawin Dios, ancha ixlaktanun yu pumach'atakan maklhku, chi mesa chi an pan yu yucha an Dios ixma'axta'nikan.
58009003	Ix'a'lhch'acha an ixli'a'xt'uycha st'ak'ak'a la'ch'it an laka cha'a, ixjunkan yu wa lhilakatijtamcha xnawin Dios.
58009004	Ancha ixtanun la'atam altar de oro tan ixawakan pum chi ancha ixtanun an caja yu xmasuy li jat'atala'xto'lhi an ixlapanakni Dios. An caja wanaj si orojo xpulakmuk'a'okanta chi x'aymuk'akanta, chi ancha xtajun la'atam xaluj de oro xputajun maná, chi an xk'iw an Aarón yu alhala'awlh chi an la'lht'a'alhcha chiwx tan ists'o'ulakanta an la'akaw lhamap'a'sin yu japut'atamakawlh an ixlapanakni an Dios.
58009005	An caja ixta'ukxyanalhcha xt'uyunk'an tacha lapanakni xtala'pa'achujlata, yu'uncha xtamasuy an ix'alhp'asninti Dios, an tan mala'mixikan tala'alhin. Pero yu chaway yu yucha ixlakata aniy tanlhun jantu lay yucha oxi katilhichiwinkalh.
58009006	Chi li chunchacha ixlak'ilhtukanta aniy tanlhun, an tan p'ulhnajcha pulaktam ani cha'a wa paktsincha xtatanuy an sacerdotejnin xtat'achiwiniycha an Dios.
58009007	Pero an tan xlipulakt'uycha an laka cha'a wa yucha an yu xa'ay tukan sacerdoteje lay ixtanuy, wa a'tami tam k'ata, chi akxni ixtanuy ixli'an jak'alhni, ixma'axt'a'acha ixlakata yucha chi ixlakatak'an an lapanakni yu wa o'palajcha xta'ilhtuta xtala'alhink'an.
58009008	Chunchacha an stalan'a Takuwin ixpumasuy li laklhchajuyi an tan xwilh Dios wa xliyu li an yu p'ulhnaj pulaktam laka cha'a ix'alinka'.
58009009	Chux tacha ani wa kintapumasunikanancha yu ani panch'e'ex, li an lha'ulan chi an tacha jama'nikan jatapakxat yu anchacha jama'axta'nikan an Dios jantu tu'u lhitapalay para li oxicha katajalakpastaknalh an yu chuncha ta'ilhtuy.
58009010	Mu ancha ajnik'acha wa waytcha chi wa yu laycha otkan tu'u tama'axt'a'a, chi tanlhuncha ta'ilhtuy yu laycha katapustalan'alh, chi tanlhuncha lhamap'a'sin ixlakata an jakanit, yucha lhitapalay wa sta akxni an Dios kamapaxacho'oyacha an tanlhun.
58009011	Pero an Cristo kilachilhcha, chi an tanlhuncha yu laj'oxi ka'alina chaway yucha an Cristojcha yu tukancha xa'ay sacerdote. An laka stalan'a cha'a tan tapatsay xlisacerdote palay oxi junita. Yu jantu wa lapanaknicha tala'oxita, yucha ntu xanawin aniy lakamunulhpa'.
58009012	An Cristo wa a'tami tanulh an tan wilh Dios, jantu wa xliyu li kama'axta'pala xjak'alhnik'an chivo chi jas'at'a torojnin, yucha, ma'axta'lhi xjak'alhni, xpujun'alhincha tanulh, chi xpujun'alhincha li kintama'alhtaxtun.
58009013	Mu li an xak'alhnik'an an toroj chi an xapaynin cabra chi an xalhk'ak'acha becerra yu lax lax jala'muk'akan an yu ntu la'stalan'an tat'ajun, li tapustalan'ancha la ixlakatunajk'an,
58009014	¿Tasucha jantu palaycha katapustalan'ana an xak'alhni Cristojo? An laka Takuwin yu ntu a'tam niy, yucha putama'axta'nilh ix'akstu an Cristo an Dios, yucha lha'ulan yu ntu k'is lhkiliki, chi an xak'alhni kintastalan'aniyani an kijatapast'ak'atk'an tacha an tanlhuncha yu xlak'ilhtutaw yu wa kintalhi'anan laka lhinin, para li lay kat'atapatsaw an Dios yu la'ajunta.
58009015	An Cristo yucha yu sast'icha kintat'aputamakawcho'on an Dios, mu akxni an nilh jama'alhtaxtulhi an lapanakni la xtala'alhink'an yu xta'ilhtuta akxni ix'alinka an yu p'ulhnajcha ixjaput'atamakajunta, chi ilhtuyi li yu yucha an Dios jat'asanita katala'a'ilhi yu kajaxta'niya yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy yu yucha an Dios jajunita li kajaxta'niya'.
58009016	Akxni xamati lapanak niy makajun la'atam jalhiki, pero para li katapasalh, task'iniya li kamasukalhi li an yu la'oxilh an jalhiki nitacha.
58009017	Pus Anchunu jalhiki jantu tu'u lhitapalay li an yu la'oxita t'ajunka', lhitapalay akxni nitacha.
58009018	Wanajcha chun an yu p'ulhnajcha japut'atamakawlh chiwinti an ixlapanakni an Dios wachu lhimaj'ankalhi jak'alhni para li kalhitapalalh.
58009019	An Moisés jamak'atsani'olhi chux tacha an najunta an lhamap'a'sin chux an lapanakni; xli'astan xa'a'ilhcha slapulh xla'ach'awt jatapakxat chi xax'oy hisopo, chi lhilaj'awalhcha an xjak'alhnik'an an becerrojnin chi an chivojnin, xliyajutacha xkan, chi lax laxcha la'maka'alhi an jalhiki yu xpuwilh an lhamap'a'sin chi ixchuxk'an an lapanakni wachucha jala'maka'alh.
58009020	Wachuncha jajuniy: "Ani jak'alhni yucha yu taput'atamakawnan an Dios yu talhijunan li k'amukt'axt'ut."
58009021	An Moisés wachu lax lax la'maka'alhi an jak'alhni an cha'a tan xputapayninikan an Dios chi chux an laktanlhun yu ancha xputapatsakan.
58009022	An lhamap'a'sin ixnajun li lanan wanaj chuxi kamastalan'akalh laka jak'alhni; chi li ntu tu'u maj'ankan jak'alhni jantu tu'u mala'mixikan tala'alhin.
58009023	Pus chuncha ixtask'iniy li anchunu laktanlhun yu tacha xla'ma'stele' an yu lak'alinachalh lakt'iyan chuncha yu lay kamastalan'akalh; pero aniy tanlhun yu lak'alinachalh an lakt'iyan yu palay oxi lha'ulani ma'lhtask'ini, jantu yu wa tacha aniy.
58009024	Mu an Cristo jantu tanulh laka stalan'a cha'a yu wa lapanaknicha tala'oxita, tan wa la'ts'ixtukantacha tani junitacha an yu stalan'a cha'a sawalh, yucha wanaj an lakt'iyani tanuchalh para li la x'ukxlakapucha Diosi chaway katayachalh kilakatak'an.
58009025	Chi ntu para li wa a'lhuj a'lhujcha kama'axta'kalh, tacha lay an xa'ay sacerdote tamin k'ata, yucha tanuycha an laka cha'a yu xnawin Dios chi lhi'ancha jak'alhni yu ntu xjak'alhni.
58009026	Pero an Cristo wa a'tami tanulh an tan wilh Dios, li a'lhuw xtanulh a'lhuwi xnilh sta akxni ilhtukanchalh an lakaamunulhpa'. Pero chaway, yu pula'ojoycha an panch'e'ex, an Cristo wa a'tami talakasulh chi xpujun'alhincha, chi ix'akstu tama'axta'lhi ma'nikalh para li kama'osulh an tala'alhin.
58009027	Chi tacha an ilhtukanta li an lapanakni wa a'tami katanilh, chi xli'astan kajajunkanacha li oxi xtat'ajun u jantu,
58009028	wanajcha chuni an Cristo wa a'tami ma'axta'kalh para li kajalhi'anilhi xtala'alhink'an xluwk'an an lapanakni, chi katalakasupala yu xlipu'a't'uycha. Pero ntucha yu an tala'alhini katila'milh, yucha wa kaminacha jama'alhtaxtunu an yu tapakxan'iy.
58010001	Mu an xlamap'a'sin Moisés yucha wa xma'stele'cha an tanlhun yu laj'oxi yu wa ka'alinaka', jantu yu an yu sawalhcha. Xliyu an xlamap'a'sin Moisés jantu a'tami lay yu oxicha sawalh katija'ilhtulh an lapanakni, yu tamin k'ata tala'an an Dios, para li a'tamcha katama'axta'nipalh lha'ulan wa yu laycha tama'axta'ni.
58010002	Mu li an lhamap'a'sin laycha sawalhi kaxjama'osunilh xtala'alhink'an, jantucha kaxtapastaklhi li talhit'ajuni xtala'alhink'an, chi ntucha ali kaxtama'nilhi jatapakxat yu kaxtalha'ulanalh.
58010003	Pero tacha ani jama'nikan jatapakxat yu lha'ulanankan wa tamincha k'ata pastakkan an tala'alhin.
58010004	Mu an xjak'alhnik'an an toroj chi an xjak'alhnik'an an yu xajo'atnin cabra jantu lay mala'mixi an tala'alhin.
58010005	Pus xliyu akxni tanuchilhcha an lakamunulhpa an Cristo juniy an ixPay: "Uxint'i nt'u yu oxi lhiwilay yu jama'nikan jatapakxat chi lha'ulan; apalij k'ixt'a'nin kilakatunaj.
58010006	Yu jala'xawakan jatapakxat chi lha'ulan yu pumala'mixikan tala'alhin jant'u oxi lhiwilat'i.
58010007	Wachuncha iknajun: Anicha ikyalh, tacha kalaks kilhits'o'muk'akanta an laka jalhiki, para li ak'ilhtulhcha tacha yu uxint'i oxi lhiwilayi Dios."
58010008	P'ulhnaj najun, ixma'nika jatapakxat chi lha'ulan chi yu ixla'xawa'oka jatapakxat chi lha'ulan yu pumala'mixikan tala'alhin jant'u la'a'it'i, ch'i nt'u oxi lhiwilat'i (aniy tanlhun chuncha ma'axta'kan mu chuncha lhinajun an lhamap'a'sin).
58010009	Chi xli'astan najun: Dios, anicha ikyalh para li ak'ilhtulhcha yu uxint'i oxi lhiwilay, ma'osulhi an tacha p'ulhnajcha ixjala'ma'nikan jatapakxat yu ixla'ulanankan chi yu sast'icha ilhtucho'olh.
58010010	Xlakata tacha an yu yuchacha oxi lhiwilalh an Dios chunchacha yu kintapustalan'akan, mu an Jesucristo ma'axta'lhi an ixlakatunaj para li kalha'ulanankalhcha, wa a'tam chi xpujun'alhincha.
58010011	Chux sacerdote lhilhiji tamin wilhchan tapatsay chi wa yuchacha a'lhuw a'lhuw ma'axt'a'a an tacha jama'nikan jatapakxat, yucha ntu a'tam lay mala'mixiy an tala'alhin.
58010012	Pero an Jesucristo wa a'tami lhinilh an tala'alhin yu xpujun'alhincha, chi xli'astan tawilhcha tan oxi la ixpa'xti an Dios.
58010013	Chaway anchacha pakxan'ita sta li an Dios la xjach'ajacha kajamama'olh an yu wa taxkaji para li kajaputach'atalhcha.
58010014	Mu yucha wa laka la'atam lha'ulani ja'ilhtulh li xpujun'alhincha oxi katatsukulh an yu la'stalan'ancha.
58010015	Chi an Stalan'a Takuwin kintajunan, akxni nawlh:
58010016	Yucha aniya yu ajkat'atamakawna yu'uncha, xli'astancha akxni kala'pusacha anchunu wilhchan, najuni an Jamach'alhkat: An la xjalhunutk'ani akmakawna an kilhamap'a'sin chi an la xjatapast'ak'atk'ani akts'o'muk'aya'.
58010017	Chi nawpalay: Chi ntucha ali aktijapastaknilhi xtala'alhink'an chi tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi ta'ilhtuta.
58010018	Pus tan mala'mixikancha tala'alhin, jantucha ali task'iniya kaja'ulanankalh ixlakata an tala'alhin.
58010019	T'ala'awnin, chaway jantucha lhima'anxkayi tanuyacha'aw an tan wilh Dios ixlakata an xjak'alhni Jesucristo.
58010020	An sast'i tij yu pulhitsukuyaw jatsukunti yucha kintamati'anin an tan ix'uk'alh la'ch'it, akxni xta'lhi an ixlakatunaj xliyucha lay tanuyaw.
58010021	Lhit'awnaw pumatam yu ay sacerdote yu kintatap'ulhniyan an yu kiklaka'iyaw Dios.
58010022	Pus kala'awcha an Dios la kijalhunutk'an yu xlisawalh jantu katalhanaw, la kijalhunutk'an kamakajucha yu ntu oxi jatapast'ak'at, chi kach'a'awcha kilakatunajk'an laka stalan'a xkan.
58010023	Lhitala'sicha kalhitsuku an yu pakxan'iyaw, an yu kiklaka'itaw, jantucha wa tamj tamj kapastakkwi mu an yu najun li akintaxta'niyani an yu pakxan'iyaw ka'ilhtuya sawalh.
58010024	Kala'a'tayjupaxawcha para li kalamatanuniw ali kalhitsuku an jamapayninti chi li ka'ilhtuwi tanlhun yu laj'oxi.
58010025	Jantu kamakajuwi li ta'ayxt'o'aw, tacha talay ali'in, kitnan kalama'oximaj'ayapaxaw chi palaycha li la'ts'inawcha li an wilhchan wanicha minta.
58010026	Li a'tam ilhtupalawi kintala'alhink'an yu wa lhile'eyajcha chi li mispayawcha an yu sawalh jatapast'ak'at, jantucha xamati ali akintitalhinin para li akintamala'mixinikan kintala'alhink'an,
58010027	wa la'atamcha yu ay tukan lhima'alh'ajna pakxan'iyaw chi tan lam lam anta jikmi yu wanaj kajat'olo'oya an yu ntu taja'asmatnan.
58010028	Yu ntu muktaxtuyi an xlamap'a'sin Moisés, li tanajuni xt'uyunk'an u xt'utunk'an li chuncha sawalhi lay watukan niy, jantu k'is mak'akxanikan.
58010029	Pus ¿jant'u lhiwilayat'iti li palay ay lhima'alh'ajna katala'a'iya an yu wa taputayaycha an isTs'alh Dios, chi ntu tu'u talhiwilay an xjak'alhni yu ixtapustalan'antacha chi wa talhila'ts'incha an Takuwin yu jamapayninin?
58010030	Pero mispayawi an Jamacha'alhkat yu nawlh: "Kit'ini aklhach'inina', kit'ini akmapala'." Chi nawpalay: "An Jamach'alhkat yucha kajajuna an yu takiklaka'iy li oxi u jantu yu ta'ilhtulh."
58010031	¡Ay tukan lhima'anxkayi li la xmaka an Dios yu la'ajunta aktamachalh!
58010032	Pero k'ap'ast'akt'i anchunu panch'e'ex yu la'pustacha, akxni map'ulhk'unik'ant'itcha, xli'astan lhit'ayanit la'atam alhp'as chi lhima'alh'ajna lasat;
58010033	chun sawalh wachu mamaxanik'ant'it ch'i ma'alh'ajnant'it wa st'akch'a lhi'a'nik'ant'it chi a tumpaj ja'ilht'ut'iti mincompañerojk'an an yu wachu tacha uxitnan ixtama'alh'ajnant'ajun.
58010034	Mu an yu xtalaklhchawnan uxitnan oxi jala'ts'int'it, ch'i an t'ach'a lakmaxt'unik'ant'it milaktanlhunk'an masi ma'alh'ajnant'it laj'ach'ant'it, mu k'ats'ayat'iti li uxitnan lhit'awnat'iti yu k'ajama'lht'ayanana'it yu palay oxi chi yu ntu min'ojoy an lakt'iyan.
58010035	Pus, jant'u k'ama'ats'an'at'iti an mijakiklaka'intik'an, yu k'ap'ujama'lht'ayanana'it yu k'alhajaxt'uya'it.
58010036	Mu lhitask'iniya li k'alhit'ayanit'it, para li akxni mukt'axt'utitcha an yu lhinajun Dios, k'ajama'lht'ayanana'itcha an yu unk'anat li k'axt'anik'ana'it.
58010037	Mu ts'an'ayka lakats'uni, chi an yu kamina kaminacha, chi ntu katita'a'ma'alh.
58010038	Pero an yu ntu ilhtuy xtala'alhin yucha an ixjakiklaka'inticha kaputsukuya'; chi li katala'asp'itcho'oya jantu oxi aktilhiwilalh.
58010039	Pero kitnan jantu yucha an yu wa tatala'asp'itcho'oy chi tats'an'aycha, kitnan jakiklaka'ininawcha para li kalhitsukuw kijatsukuntik'an.
58011001	An jakiklaka'inti, yuch'a li na'un sawalhi li kajuna yu p'akxan'iy, yuch'a li na'un li lhit'a'uncha sawalhi masi yu nt'uka' la'ts'in.
58011002	Yu ma'anchacha xtat'ajun oxi jala'ts'inkalh mu xtajakiklaka'inin.
58011003	Yucha an jakiklaka'inti pulhimacha'xayaw li an lakamunulhpa yucha an ixchiwinti Diosi pu'ilhtukalh, an yu tasuy tan an yu ntu tasuyi minchalh.
58011004	An Abelh yucha an jakiklaka'inti palay oxi puma'axta'nilh lha'ulan an Dios, pero an Caín jantu, pus xliyu lhichiwinkan li yucha oxi lapanaki ixjunita, yucha an Dioscha lhichiwiniy ixlakata an xla'ulan; chi masi nitacha chiwinika'.
58011005	An xjakiklaka'inti an Enoc kalaks pulhi'ankalhi para li ntu kala'ts'ilhi lhinin, chi ntucha inta la'cha'ancho'okalh, mu yucha an Diosi lhi'alh; chi akxni ntuka' xli'ankan, k'atsakalhi li an Dios oxi xliwilay an Enoc.
58011006	Pero li ntu jakiklaka'ininkan an Dios jantu lay oxi akintitalhiwilan, mu lhitask'iniya li yu stalhcha la'ani an Dios kakiklaka'ilhi li yucha t'ajun chi an yu tapuxkajuy jaxta'niya yu laj'oxi tu'u'.
58011007	Akxni an Dios mak'atsaanilh an Noé tanlhun yu ntuka' xtasuy, kiklaka'ilh xliyu mala'asijnilh an ay caja tan tata'alhtaxtulh an yu ta jalhila'ts'in, chi laka anchunu jakiklaka'inti xta'niy lhima'alh'ajna an lakamunulhpa', chi yucha xta'nikalhi yu an Dios jaxta'niy ixlapanakni para li oxi kajala'ts'inkalh.
58011008	An Abram, akxni t'asanikalh, kiklaka'ilhi li kataxtulhi para li ka'alh tan kajama'lhtayanana yu Dios kaxta'niya'; chi taxtunilhcha masi ntu xk'atsay tanchuncha xti'an.
58011009	Xlakata an xjakiklaka'inti li tawilh an Abram tacha yu ntu an jamacha an lakaat'un tan junkan li kaxta'nikana', alicha an Isaac chi an Jacobi ixjat'atawlay laka cha'a yu wa las yawkan, yu'uncha wachu katajama'lhtayanana an yu junkan li kaxta'nikana an Abram.
58011010	Mu an Abram yucha ixpakxan'i an la'acha'an yu oxi ch'an'aknuy, tan yu wanaj yucha an Dios najun tani kawalhcha chi yu yucha la'oxita.
58011011	Wanajcha chun laka jakiklaka'inti an Sara, masi ntu lay xjamas'at'anan, la'a'ilhi tachaput para li kaja'aynalh, chi lhitsukulhi xjas'at'a masi ntucha ixpaku ', mu yucha kiklaka'ilhi li ka'ilhtuya sawalhi an yu junilh li kaxta'niya'.
58011012	Wanajcha chun an Abraham yu wanajcha xnit'ajun, lhuwi tapu'a'p'unminchalh tacha an st'aku yu ta'alin an lakt'iyan, tacha an kukuj yu ntu lay put'e'ekan yu alin an la xkilhtu alamalh.
58011013	La xjakiklaka'intik'ani talakni'olh ixchuxk'an ani lapanakni, jantuka' tala'a'ilhi an yu jajunkan li kajaxta'nikana', wa ma'atka tala'ts'ilh, takiklaka'ilh chi tala'axa'alalh, chi tanawlhi li yu'uncha jantu aniy lakamunulhpa xla'acha'ank'an chi li wa katala'pusa'.
58011014	Yu chuncha tanajun, ts'awjcha tanajun li tapuxkajuy la'atam la'acha'an,
58011015	li wa yuchacha kaxtapastaklhitsukulh an tan tataxtuchalh, layi kaxta'ancho'olh.
58011016	Pero yu'uncha xtak'uxa'an tan palay oxi, tan talhman juntachalh; pus an Dios yucha ntu maxanani li xDiosk'an tajuni, mu yucha jamala'asijninita la'atam la'acha'an.
58011017	An Abram jakiklaka'inilh xliyu akxni lhila'ts'intanukalh, ma'axta'lhi tacha lha'ulan an Isaac. An yu ixla'a'ita tuchini yu kaxta'nikanacha ixma'axt'a'acha an ists'alh masi wa pumatam,
58011018	masi li ixjunkanta: "Yucha an Isaaki yu k'ap'u'a'p'ump'ina'a,
58011019	mu an Abram ixk'atsayi li an Dios yucha layi sakcho'oy xamati tan tamanalh janinin, aniy chaway nawputun, an Abram jama'lhtayanancho'olhi an Isaac.
58011020	An Isaac kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu lhitapayninilh li kaja'a'tayjulhi an Jacob chi an Esaú, ixlakata an tanlhun yu wa ka'alinaka'.
58011021	An Jacob kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu akxni ntucha ma'an kaniya, tapayninilhi para li kaja'a'tayjulhi an ixjas'at'an José, chi aycha la'ts'ilh an Dios, la ixpaliki xjama'anch'apaxnanta para li lay kasa' tayalh.
58011022	An José kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu akxni kaniyacha, lhichiwinilhi li katataxtuya an Israelitajnin Egipto chi jajunilhi tani kata'ilhtuyacha an ixjalukut.
58011023	An xpaynin Moisés ixtakiklaka'iya an Dios xliyu akxni tsukulh tamats'e'lhi la'at'utu malhkuyu', mu tala'ts'ilh li k'usi jas'at'a ixjunita chi ntu tatalhamnilhi an xlamap'a'sin an rey.
58011024	An Moisés kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu akxni ta'ayalhcha, jantu la'a'ilhi li ists'alh an istsi faraón kajunikalh.
58011025	Apalij la'a'ilh li kajat'alhitama'chapukalh an ixlapanakni Dios, jantu la'a'ilhi li kama'an'achalhi an tanlhuncha yu wa la'pusa tala'alhin.
58011026	Palay oxi lhiwilalh li ntu oxi la'ts'inkan an Cristo, jantu la'a'ilhi an tanlhuncha yu laj'oxi ixlhit'ajun an Egipto, mu yucha xlakapu'anta yu an Dios kaxt'a'a'.
58011027	An Moisés jakiklaka'inilh xliyu lhitaxtulh an Egipto, jantu talhamnilhi an rey masi xtalh'aman, mu yucha lhitala'si ixk'atsan tachanu ixla'ts'ini an yu ntu tasuy Dios.
58011028	Xlakata an xjakiklaka'inti li an Moisés ilhtulhi an Paxku chi li kala'la'muk'akalhi jak'alhni an laka lakmalhticha para li an yu jama'ni'ojoy an yu xlima'sast'i jas'at'an yu'uncha jantu kajama'nilh.
58011029	An israelitajnin takiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyuw tala'pusli an laka slapulh alamalh tachanu tan wa jaxixninta lakaat'un, chi an jamacha'an Egipto wachucha chuni ta'ilhtuputulh walh yu'uncha wanaj talaj'aksk'anj'u'olh.
58011030	An israelitajnin takiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyuw an axi yu ixla'acho'oni'ojoy an la'acha'an Jericó tatist'a'olhi akxni xli'a'tujuncha tatala'asp'itni'olh an israelitajnin.
58011031	An Rahab yu wa aya ixlay t'aku kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu li jantu nilh tacha tanilh an yu ntu xtajakiklaka'inin, mu yucha oxi jala'a'ilh an yu takilaka'alh.
58011032	¿Chi tisu alicha ali aknawlhi? Xapanch'e'exi task'iniy para li aklhichiwinilh an Gedeón, chi an Barac, chi an Sansón chi an Jefté, chi an David, chi tacha an Samuel chi an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios yu wa katapasayaka'.
58011033	Ixchuxk'an yu'uncha takiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu la'alhuw lhich'alhkat talhajalh, chi tanawlhi tanyucha yu oxi chi yu jantu, tala'a'ilhi yu jajunkan li kajaxta'nikana', tala'ma'e'sto'lhi la'a'lhuw lión.
58011034	Talakmamixilhi laj'ay lhitalhamnit jikmi, jantu jama'nikalhi laka espada yu lajkikxtuy, ta'ilhi xtachaputk'an masi ntucha lajk'ut'ilin xtajunita, lajk'ut'ilini tawalh laka lasat, tala'ma'ats'alalhi yu kilhmaktam soldadojnin.
58011035	Ta'alilhi t'akunin yu tala'awcho'olhi xjaninik'an chi tala'a'icho'olh, pero ali'in stakcha jamama'alh'ajnikalh, jantu tala'a'ilhi li kajama'alhtaxtukalh, para li katalhitsukulhi yu palay oxi jatsukunti akxni kala'awcho'okana'.
58011036	Ali'in stakcha jamamaxanikalh chi jala'na'makalh chi sta xjalakch'i'ulakanta laka kadena chi xjamalaklhchawkanta.
58011037	Jalakt'alhmakalh laka chiwx, japuch'uk'ukalh, jalhila'ts'intanukalh, japuma'nikalhi yu lajkikxtuy espada. Wa tanlayjcha xtalak'aklat'ajun wa ixjaxt'a'anchak'an jatapakxati ixjapula'axt'a'kan, wa xtalajkilhpaticha, tucha k'is oxi xtak'atsan, stakcha xjalhitama'chapukan.
58011038	An lakamunulhpa jantu xt'acha'ani li kaxjalhitsukulh ani lapanakni, wa tanchuncha ixtalak'aklat'ajuni an tan wa xixtacha lakaat'un chi lakaak'iwin, chi tan la'tan'apilho'o'o a'stitawk'a chi tan la'jalho'o'o lakaat'un.
58011039	Pero ntu xamati yu'uncha la'a'ilh yu najun an Dios li kaxt'a'a', masi oxi jalhichiwinkalh an la xjakiklaka'intik'an,
58011040	mu an Dios ixpaxkama'ata yu palay oxi para kitnan, para li wa ayxtamcha ali yu'uncha akinta'ilhtukan li ntucha tu'u kintats'an'aniyan.
58012001	Pus xliyu li kitnan kintala'acho'oni'oyani lhuw yu tala'ts'ilh an x'alhp'asninti Dios, kamakaw'ojocha chux yu wa kintamama'tijlayancha, chi an tala'alhin yu wa las kintamats'antijlayan, chi lhitala'sicha kajats'alaw an jats'alat yu lhit'awnaw laki'ukxlakapuk'an.
58012002	Yucha an Jesuscha kasa' la'ts'iw, mu yucha puminachalh an kijakiklaka'intik'an chi yucha yu oxicha tukan kinta'ilhtuniyan an kijakiklaka'intik'an. An Jesús lhitayanilhi an laka cruz, jantu lhakapu'alhi anchunu lhimaxan lhinin, mu yucha ixk'atsayi li xli'astan ka'achana', chi tawilhcha tan oxi la xpa'xti an tan wilh xputawlan yu puch'alhkatnan an Dios.
58012003	K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti anchunu yu ma'alh'ajnalh, yu wa tat'atasp'itlhi an yu wa xtala'alhinchak'an ta'ilhtuy, para li tacha an laj'oximaj'ay unt'at jant'u wa k'alho'ont'it chi k'ala't'a'a't'atcha.
58012004	Mu uxitnan t'uk'a' st'a anch'a lhit'ayaniyat li wanajch'a k'alhimaj'ant'it mijak'alhnik'ani li t'alasayat an tala'alhin.
58012005	Walh ch'i k'apt'atcha t'ach'a an unk'anat tacha uxitnan xajas'at'an, tan nawkan: Kijas'at'a, jant'u k'ala'amaj'a an ixjamalakpast'ak'anti an Jamach'alhkat Dios, ch'i nt'u k'at'a'oxila'alhit'i akxni la'a'aymayan.
58012006	Mu an Jamach'alhkat yu mapayniy, malakpast'ak'aniy, chi ixchuxk'an yu jala'a'iy tacha ixjas'at'an, jatina'a.
58012007	Li lhit'ayaniyat'iti an ixjamalakpast'ak'anti Dios, tacha ixjas'at'ancha kata'ilhtuyan, ¿chu sna xamati lapanaki katsukulh yu ntucha kamalakpast'ak'anilh ixjas'at'a?
58012008	Pero li an Dios uxitnan jantu tamalakpast'ak'aniyani tacha jamalakpast'ak'aniy ixchuxk'an an yu ixjas'at'an sawalh, pus uxitnan jantu sawalh ixjas'at'an.
58012009	Atumpaj jalhitsukuwi yu wa anicha lakaat'un kilakpaynink'an yu xakintamalakpast'ak'aniyan, chi ixjakiklaka'iyawcha. ¿Tasu li ntu palaycha kakiklaka'iyaw an kimPayk'an yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan para li katsukuwi?
58012010	Anchunu kilakpaynink'an jantu ma'ani kintamalakpast'ak'anin chi yu'uncha wa tacha yu oxicha xtalhiwilay ajnik'a kintamalakpast'ak'anin, pero an Dios oxi para kitnani li kintamalakpast'ak'aniyan, para li wachucha la'stalan'ani kajunwi tacha yucha.
58012011	Chun sawalh akxni wa kintamalakpast'ak'anit'awkananka, jantu achaniyau, kintaxkaniyan u lhita'oxila'alhiyaw, pero xli'astan oxicha xajachalh. Akxni laj'achanawcha chi oxicha tsukuyaw.
58012012	Lajk'ut'ilinch'a k'a'unch'o'ot'it, mu wa la't'iya'anch'a lak'unt'at'it.
58012013	Oxi k'alhak'ap'up'it t'anch'unch'a p'alht'ananat para li nt'u k'ap'uts'an'at'iti t'ach'a an wa t'iya'ch'a layat; walh ch'unch'a k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'it.
58012014	Oxi k'ajat'alalhip'it chux an lapanakni chi la'stalan'ani k'ats'uk'ut, mu yu ntu stalan'a katitsukulh jantu katila'ts'ilhi an Jamach'alhkat Dios.
58012015	K'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, jantu junita xamati jantu kajama'lhtayanalh yu an Dios xta'niputun; jantu junita kala'awlh la'atam xajataxiyak talh'amti chi katamama'tijlancha chi xluchak'ani kajamatsamalh;
58012016	jantu xamati wa aya kalalh chi yu ntucha ka'asmatniputulh an Dios, tacha lalh an Esaú, mu yucha wa la'atam wayt lhist'amaj'alhi li yucha xa'ay.
58012017	Ch'i k'ats'ayatcha li masi xli'astan lakask'ilhi li an ixpay kask'inicho'olhi an Dios yu ixt'acha'an kaxlitsukulh, jantucha lhakapu'ankalh, chi masi astan nawlh jantucha tani lhila'alh, masi lhi'alhulh.
58012018	Uxitnan jantu ani ch'ip'int'at an tan wilh a'stitawk'a yu lay xlakach'apakan, chi ixma'taji laka jikmi, tan s'oya' junita, tan ts'ite's wilh chi tan lhima'anxkay.
58012019	Jant'u asmatt'iti tacha an is'oli kikst'ililh s'olh, chi tacha an p'as ixchiwinkan, tan ma'anchacha ta'asmatlhi an judiojnin. Tatapaynisk'inlhi li ntucha ali kajaxa'alakalh,
58012020	mu ntu xtalhitayaniya tacha ani yu ixjalhijunkan tan jajunkalh: Li xamati kakitach'ataya ani a'stitawk'a kalakat'alhmakalh sta kama'nilalh u kama'nikalh laka patipni chi masi wa la'atamcha jatapakxat kakitayalh ani a'stitawk'a, wanajcha chun.
58012021	Chi sawalhcha lhitalhamnit tuchichuni an yu xtasuy, sta an Moisés nawlh: Ijkaxk'ip'ip'itnincha la kintalhanti.
58012022	Uxitnan ch'it'ant'at an tan junkan a'stitawk'a Sión, la xla'acha'an an Dios yu la'ajunta, an la'acha'an Jerusalen yu lakt'iyan alinachalh, tan la'alhuw millón angelhnin tat'awilanalh,
58012023	tan ta'ayxto'nun an ixjas'at'an Dios yu jats'o'ulakanta an lakt'iyan, tan wilh an Dios yu kinchuxk'an kiJuezk'an, tan tat'ajun an ixtakuwink'an yu oxi xtat'ajun yu ja'ilhtukalh li ntucha tu'u xtala'alhink'an katalhitsukulh,
58012024	tan wilh an Jesús, yu sast'icha kintaput'atamakawcho'on an Dios, chi tan alin an jak'alhni yu lax lax jala'muk'anankalh yu palay oxi kintaxa'alayan, walh jantu an ixjak'alhni Abel.
58012025	K'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti li nt'u wa k'ala'amaj'ant'iti an yu chiwiniy, mu li ntu tata'alhtaxtulhi an yu wa tala'amaj'alh an yu jalaj'aymalh aniy lakaat'un, palaycha kitnan, li wa la'amaj'anawi an yu kintalaj'aymalakaminan sta anu lakt'iyan.
58012026	Anchunu panch'e'ex akxni chiwinilh an Dios malaklalhi an lakaat'un, pero chaway najun: "A'tam akmalaklapala', chi ntucha wa yu an lakaat'un wachu an lakt'iyan."
58012027	Chi li najun a'tam akmalaklapala, nawputun li kama'osukana an yu wa lak'ilhtukanta, an yu lay malaklakan, para li wa yuchacha katamakawlh an yu ntu lay malaklakan.
58012028	Pus kitnan, mu la'a'it'awnawcha lhich'alhkat yu ntu lay lak'anukan, kaxta'wicha lhimala'puchajun, chi yuchacha kaput'atapatsaw an Dios kama'an'achawcha laka jakiklaka'inti chi laka jalhiwilanti;
58012029	mu an kiDiosk'an jikmi yu jala'xawanan.
58013001	Xpujun'alhincha chuncha kajunlhi li lamap'aynip'axayat li lhit'ala'awnin.
58013002	Jant'u k'ak'apt'iti li oxi k'ajala'a'it'it yu tala'cha'anan la mincha'ak'an, mu chuncha ali'in masi ntu xtak'atsay, angelhnini ixtala'a'iy la ixcha'ak'an.
58013003	K'ajap'ast'akt'iti an yu talaklhchawnan, tachanu jat'alaklhch'awyat'it; chi an yu wa jala'lhitama'chapukan, tachanu an la ixlakatunajk'ani t'awnat'it.
58013004	Minchuxk'an yu lakt'at'awk'anat oxi k'ats'uk'ut mint'uyunk'an, stalan'a k'ats'uk'ut li lat'at'awnat'it, mu an yu wa aya talay chi an yu tat'atamapalay xamati yu ntu yu tat'at'ajun, an Dios kajaxta'niya lhima'alh'ajna.
58013005	Jantu wa tumincha sawalhch'a k'axo'ulat'it, k'at'alaj'ach'ant'itcha yu lhit'awnatcha chaway; mu an Dios najun: Jantu a'tam aktikapmaj'an chi ntu at'am aktimakajun.
58013006	Pus lhitala'si lay nawnaw: "An Jamach'alhkat Dios yucha ki'a'tayjuy; jantu aktitalhamnilhi tani laycha aki'ilhtulh an wa lapanakcha."
58013007	K'ajap'ast'akt'iti an xalaj'ajin, yu talhixa'alan an ixchiwinti Dios; k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti tani t'axajachalhcha ixjatsukuntik'an, ch'i k'ala'ts'ixt'unitcha an xjakiklaka'inti.
58013008	An Jesucristo wanajcha yu yu kutanchacha xjuntachalh, chi yu chaway, chi wa xpujun'alhincha kajuna'.
58013009	Jant'u k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti wa tanlhuncha tipaspit lhamap'a'sin yu ntu lhitala'si. Palay oxi li an kijalhunutk'an k'ut'ilhi kawalh la xjamapayninti an Dios, walh jantu li wa xalhamap'a'sincha wayt; mu yu yucha lhamap'a'sin jantu a'tam tu'u lhitapalay.
58013010	Kitnan lhit'awnaw la'atam tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan tan tu tat'acha'an lay kata'ulh yu ma'axta'kan lha'ulan an yu tatapatsay an laka cha'a tan ixt'ajun ix'alhp'asninti Dios,
58013011	mu an ixlakatunajk'an an jatapakxat, an yu jatamaknuni ixjak'alhnik'an an laka cha'a yu sawalh stalan'a an sacerdote ixlakata an tala'alhin, ma'spa an laka campamentojo ankan la'xawaka.
58013012	Pus xliyu wachu an Jesús, para li kajamastalan'anilhi la xjak'alhni an yu takiklaka'i, xlima'spa an la'acha'an nilh.
58013013	Pus kataxtuwcha tan tawilanalh an lapanakni kala'awcha xlima'spa an campamento, chi kama'alh'ajnawcha wachu tacha yucha ntu tu'u talhiwilalh,
58013014	mu aniy jantu tu'u la'acha'ani yu ka'alin'alhiya', kitnan puxkawyaw la'acha'an yu ka'alin'alhiya' yu wa ka'alinaka'.
58013015	Pus lhilhiji yucha an Jesucristo kapuma'axta'niw milhpat an Dios tacha kilha'ulank'an, la kinkilhnik'an kapumapa'a'uwi an ixta'a'ut.
58013016	Jant'u k'ak'apt'iti uxitnan li k'a'ilht'ut'iti yu laj'oxi tanlhun chi li k'ala'a't'ay'up'axat'it; mu an Dios yu chuncha lha'ulani achani.
58013017	K'aja'asmatnit'iti yu tajunan amimpastornink'an ch'i k'ajak'iklak'a'it'it; mu yu'uncha talhistakta amintakuwink'an chi mu yu'uncha kajalhisakmikana t'ani xt'awnatcha, p'us k'ajak'iklak'a'it'it, para li lhi'acha katatapatsalh chi ntu junita katanawlh li lhima'anxkaycha talhiwilay, mu li chuncha, jantu tu'u yu oxi talhiminiyan.
58013018	Akilalhitapayniw, mu iklhiwilayawi li oxi ijkalakpastaknanaw, chi oxi iktaylhi'amputunaw chux an tanlhun.
58013019	Chi palaycha iklalhitapaynisk'iniyaw kit'in li k'at'ap'aynit'it, para li akimakawnikalhi watukan aklala'ampalhcha'aw.
58013020	An Dios yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat, yu mala'awnicho'olh an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo, an ay lapanak yu jalhist'ak'a ixborregojnin, an laka jak'alhni yu xpujun'alhincha putamakawkalh.
58013021	Yuchacha katapu'ilhtun li layi k'amukt'axt'ut chux tanlhun yu laj'oxi, para li yu yuchacha chuncha oxi lhiwilayi k'a'ilht'ut, chi an Dios yucha an Jesucristojcha akintapu'ilhtun kitnan tani yu lhi'achanicha. ¡Yucha an Jesucristojo yu ay chi xpujun'alhincha! Chunchacha kawalh.
58013022	T'ala'awnin, iklatapaynisk'iniyaw li k'alhit'ayanit'iti ani kinchiwinti, mu wa lakats'uniya ani klats'o'nitaw.
58013023	K'ak'ats'at'it an kint'alajunk'an Timoteo makawcho'okalhcha li xmalaklhchawkanta, li wa tukan kamina akt'a'antachalhi li aklala'antacha'aw.
58013024	K'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti ixchuxk'an an mimpastornink'an, chi ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'iy Dios. An xalakaat'un Italia tala'axa'alayan.
58013025	An Dios minchuxchak'ani kataxta'nin an xjamapayninti. Chunchacha kawalh.
59001001	Kit'in Santiago, ixma'tapatsan an Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo, ijkala'axa'alay an kilhmakkawt'uy ixlapanak Dios yu ta'a'pitsinin ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa'.
59001002	Kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan sawalhch'a k'alaj'ach'ant'iti akxni tanlhuncha tu'u yu lhima'anxkay p'ula'p'ust'awnat'it.
59001003	Mu k'ats'ayatcha li akxni lhila'ts'int'anuk'anat'it ixlakata an mijakiklaka'intik'an, p'alay laklaniyat'iti lhit'ayaniyat an ma'alh'ajnat.
59001004	Pero li lhit'ayaniyat k'alhip'uxk'awnit'iti para li oxicha k'ats'uk'ut, k'a k'at'atcha sawalh, jantucha tu'u katats'an'anin.
59001005	Li xamati yu uxitnan ts'an'ani jatapast'ak'at, kask'inilh an Dios, chi an Dios kaxta'niya', mu an Dios ixchuxk'ani lhuw jaxta'niy yu task'iniy chi ntu xamati yu wa la'amaj'an.
59001006	Pero yu sk'in, kakiklaka'ilh sawalhi li kaxta'nikana'. Jantu kanawlh li sna kalaya u jantu. Mu yu ntu lhiwilay yucha wa tacha an milh milhcha lay alamalh, watanlayjcha lhilhi'an an un.
59001007	Yu chuncha lay, jantu kapastaklhi li tu'u kala'a'iya la xmakni an Dios,
59001008	mu chaway tami past'ak'a chi lhiy tamcha pastakpalay, chux yu ilhtuy jantu lhitala'si, wa tamj tamj jatapastaknan.
59001009	Yu wa kilhpati kint'ala'ajunk'an kalhi'achalhi li an Dios juniya li yucha lhitapalay;
59001010	chi an yu jamatumin wachu ka'achalhi akxni ntucha lhitapalay la'ts'inkan mu yucha wa tacha an xaxanti an jach'itini katapasaya'.
59001011	Akxni xajachilhcha an wilhchan chi sawalhcha p'asi jask'unun, an jach'itin xixacha chi patajunicha an xaxanti chi ntucha k'usi jun. Chuncha katapasaya an yu jamatumin, wa kat'anicho'oyacha tuchini wa tilak'ilhtuycha.
59001012	Wa lhi'o'slaya oxicha para yucha an lapanak yu lhitayani akxni lhila'ts'intanukan. Mu akxni li kalhajayantacha, kala'a'iyacha an xakorona jatsukunti, yu an Dios najun li kajaxta'niya an yu tamapayni.
59001013	Li akxni xamati lhila'ts'intanukan li ka'ilhtulh tu'u yu ntu oxi, jantu kapastaklhi li Diosi chuncha ilhtuy. Mu an Dios jantu k'is past'ak'a li ka'ilhtuputulh yu ntu oxi tu'u', chi an Dios jantu xamati lhila'ts'intanuy para li kama'ilhtuputulh yu ntu oxi.
59001014	An lapanak yucha an lajk'atsancha tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi, yucha yu lhila'ts'intanuy, chi li lhakapu'ancha, pus ma'ilhtuycha yu ntu oxi.
59001015	Yucha anicha yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhuni yu pup'a'a an tala'alhin, chi akxni an lapanak ilhtutacha sawalhi an tala'alhin, la'chincha an lhinin.
59001016	Kint'ala'awnin yu iklamapayniyaw, jant'u k'at'a'o'xch'o'ot'it:
59001017	Chux yu oxi tu'u kintaxta'nikanan chi yu ntu k'is inta tu'u ts'an'ani, talhmani minachalh, yucha an xaPay jatapulhkunu makminachalh, yu ntu tapaxay chi ntu laklay tacha an ma'stele'.
59001018	Yucha mu chuncha lakask'ilh, kintaxta'nini jatsukunti an laka chiwinti yu sawalh, para li kitnancha p'ulhnaj kajunwi tacha an jamala'awnininta.
59001019	Kint'ala'awnin yu klamapayniyaw, k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti ani yu klajunaw: minchuxk'ani wa las k'a'asmatt'it yu unk'anat'it, pero ntu wa lasi k'ach'iwinint'it chi ntu wa lasi k'at'alh'amant'it.
59001020	Mu an lapanak yu wa talh'aman jantu lay ilhtuy yu oxi lhiwilay an Dios.
59001021	Pus uxitnan k'amak'aw'o'ot'itcha chux yu ntu oxi chi tacha an wa stakcha alin yu wa lhi'ay junita, chi laka jakilhpatinijk'atsatcha k'ala'a'it an chiwinti yu xt'a'nik'anat. Mu aniy chiwinti layi katama'alhtaxtuyan.
59001022	Jantu wa lhilakatijtamcha k'a'asmatt'iti aniy chiwinti, yucha k'amukt'axt'utcha, mu li jantu, wa mi'akstuchak'ani o'xcho'ok'anat'it.
59001023	Yu wa asmat'acha ajnik'a an chiwinti, chi ntu muktaxtuy, tachanu xamati lapanak yu la'pula'ts'inkancha laka spejo,
59001024	la'pula'ts'inkancha ix'akstu, pero akxni tala'asp'itcho'oycha kappalaycha tani tasuycha.
59001025	Pero yu ntucha k'ap'a yu asmat'a, chi oxicha lhakapu'an an yu ts'awj lhamap'a'sin, yu jama'alhtaxtunun, chi yuchacha pu'aklatsuku'alhiy chi ilhtuycha tacha najun, yucha lhi'acha kak'atsana tuchini yu ilhtuycha.
59001026	Li xamati k'atsan li sawalhcha kiklaka'iya tuchini kiklaka'itacha, pero li ntu lay lhist'ak'a an isima'at, wa ix'akstucha o'xcho'okan chi ntu tu'u lhitapalay tuchini yu kiklaka'itacha.
59001027	Yu stalan'a jakiklaka'inti chi yu ntu lhkiliki la x'ukxlakapu an Dios, yu xaPay, yucha aniy: Kaja'a'tay'ut'i la xma'alh'ajnatk'an an yu maticha ixpayk'an chi an yu maticha xt'apapak'an an t'akunin, ch'i nt'u k'alhk'iliki an laka laktanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi aniy lakaamunulhpa'.
59002001	Kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan yu k'iklak'a'iyat an ay kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo, jantu wa kata'alilhi yu oxi k'ajalhiwilat.
59002002	Mu li t'an t'a'ayxt'o'at'it katanuchalh xamati lapanak yu maktanun ix'anillo de oro chi sawalhcha oxi ixla'ch'it, chi wachu katanuchalh pumatam yu wa kilhpatiy, yu wa at'ilhcha ixla'ch'it,
59002003	chi wa yucha an yu sawalhcha oxi mala'ch'ininta yu oxi k'ala'ts'int'it ch'i k'a'unit: "Anich'a k'at'a'ulh tan oxi"; chi an yu wa kilhpatiy k'a'unit: "Uxint'i anch'unuch'a k'asa' t'ayachi u anicha lakaat'uni k'at'a'ulh".
59002004	Wa siya uxitnancha, wa lasakxt'uyatcha yu oxi lhiwilayat chi yu jantu, tachanu juesninch'a unat laka yu ntu oxi jatapast'ak'at.
59002005	Kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan iklamapayniyaw, k'a'asmatt'iti aniy: An Dios yuchaa jasakxtuta an yu wa takilhpati aniy lakaamunulhpa', para li sawalhcha katajakiklaka'inilh chi para li katajama'lhtayanalhi an lhich'alhkat, yu yucha an Dios jajunita li kajaxta'niya an yu tamapayni;
59002006	uxitnan apalij wa nt'u t'u'u jalhiwilayat'it. ¿Chu ntu yu an jamatuminini yu sawalhcha talhitama'chapuyan chi taxa'alhi'anancha la x'ukxlakapuk'an an jamach'alhkatni?
59002007	¿Jantu yu'uncha yu xkayaj talhichiwiniy an oxi xta'a'ut an yu p'ut'asanik'ant'it?
59002008	Uxitnan oxich'a li ch'unch'a layat li mukt'axt'uyat sawalhi an yu ay tukan lhamap'a'sin, tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "K'amap'aynit'i mint'alapanak t'ach'a akst'u map'aynik'an".
59002009	Pero li wa ta'alini yu oxi jalhiwilayat chi ali'in jantu, tala'alhinch'a ilht'uyat, chi an xlamap'a'sin Dios kanawna li minkwentajk'an.
59002010	Mu watichicha yu muktaxtu'ojoycha chux an lhamap'a'sin, pero li inta la'atam lhamap'a'sin jantu ka'ilhtulh, chuxcha jantucha muktaxtu'ojoy.
59002011	Mu an Dios nawlh: "Jant'u k'at'at'amat'i yu ntu mint'iwi'", chi nawpalay: "Jant'u k'ajama'nin". Pus chaway, li xamati jantu t'atamayi yu jantu xt'iwi, pero li jama'ninin, jantucha muktaxtuyi an lhamap'a'sin.
59002012	Uxitnan k'ach'iwinint'it ch'i k'alat'it tacha yu yucha an lhamap'a'sin yu akintama'alhtaxtuyan akintapujunkanan li oxi u jantu xlayaw.
59002013	Mu yu ntu k'is tamapaynilhi ali'in, wanajcha chuni kaja'ilhtukana akxni kajajunkana li yu'uncha ixkwentajk'an. Chi an yu tajamapayninin yu'uncha oxi katat'axajanta, tan kanawkana li oxi u jantu yu ilhtuta atamj.
59002014	Kint'ala'awnin, ¿tisu lhitapalhnicha xamati li kanawlh li jakiklaka'inini, li ntu tu'u ilhtuy yu kaputasulhcha? ¿laycha kaputa'alhtaxtuya wa laka jakiklaka'inti?
59002015	Kanajuw li xamati kint'ala'ajunk'an u kint'alajamatsank'an tats'an'atayani ixla'ch'itk'an chi tats'an'atayani yu lhilhij kata'ulh,
59002016	chi xamati yu uxitnan kajajunilh: Oxich'a k'ap'it, k'amala'ch'inint'itcha ch'i k'alaj'o'ats'atcha; pero li ntu jaxta'niya yu tama'lhtask'iniy la ixlakatunajk'an, ¿tisu talhitapalhnicha?
59002017	Wanajcha chuni tapasay an laka jakiklaka'inti, li ntu tu'u k'ilhtuy yu kaputasulhcha, jantu tu'u lhitapalay.
59002018	Pero xamati layi kanawlh: "Uxint'i jak'iklak'a'inin chi kit'in tanlhuncha iklak'ilhtuy. Kit'in iknajun li jant'u lay ak'int'imasunini li jak'iklak'a'inin li nt'u ilht'uyi yu lhinawkan. Chi kit'in chunchacha akpumasuniyan kijakiklaka'inti tacha an iklak'ilhtuycha tanlhun."
59002019	Uxint'i k'iklak'a'iya li wa pumatami Dios, oxich'a li ch'unch'a lay, pero an lakmakxkay'un wachu takiklaka'iy chi tajaxk'ip'ip'itnin.
59002020	Jantu wa tontojo k'a'unt'i, ch'i k'ak'ats'at'i li na'uni li jakiklaka'inin pero li nt'u ilht'uyi yu laj'oxi tanlhun, jantu tu'u lhitapalay.
59002021	An Dios la'a'ilhi an Abraham tacha oxi lapanak, yu tacha kimpayk'an xlila'ts'inaw, wa xliyu an Abraham lha'ulanalhi an ists'alh yu junkan Isaac, lha'ulananilhi an Dios.
59002022	Ch'away la'ts'incha an la xjatsukunti an Abraham li xjakiklaka'inin, pero wachu ixlak'ilhtuyi tanlhun tan ixputasuy, chi xliyu tacha an xlak'ilhtuycha, pus an ixjakiklaka'inti oxicha sawalhi walh.
59002023	Chunchacha sawalhi tapasalh an tan ts'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: "An Abraham kiklaka'ilhi an Dios, pus an Dios oxi lhiwilalh tacha an lalh an Abraham." "Chi an Abraham ix'amigojcha an Diosi junikalh."
59002024	Pus chaway uxitnan la'ts'inatcha li an Dios oxi lapanaki juniy li yu ilhtuyi tanlhun yu laj'oxi, jantu wa xliyu li jakiklaka'inincha.
59002025	Wanajcha chuni putapasalh an t'aku yu ixjunkan Rahab, yu wa aya ixlay. An Dios tacha yu oxicha aklat'ajun t'aku la'a'ilh wa xliyu li ilhtulhi yu oxi. Mu ani t'aku jaxta'nilhi tan katatawilh an yu xta'anta jalaklakawanin. Chi ja'a'tayjulhi li lakatamcha laka tiji katapu'ancho'olh.
59002026	Mu tacha an lakatunaj li ntu lhit'ajuni takuwin, nita, wanajcha chuni an jakiklaka'inti li ntu ilhtukaniy tanlhun yu laj'oxi, jantu tu'u lhitapalay.
59003001	Kint'ala'awnin, jantu wanajcha milhuk'ani k'a'unt'it yu k'ajamat'alaninint'it, mu k'ats'ayatcha li yu ijkamatalanininaw palay akintamama'alh'ajnikanani li ntu oxi ikmasuyaw.
59003002	Kinchuxk'ani lhuw ilhtuyaw tu'u yu ntu oxi, li xamati jantu k'is wa aya najun u ta'elh'o'xcho'oy akxni chiwiniy, yucha lapanakcha yu ts'awj sawalh t'ajun, chi yu chuncha, wachu layi lhistak'ojoy chux an ixlakatunaj para li ntu tu'u yu ntucha oxi ka'ilhtulh.
59003003	Akxni jamakilhtanuyaw ixfrenojk'an an kawayojnin para li lay kajamalhtanaw, chux an ixlakatunajk'an ilhtuyawi tani ilhtuputunawcha.
59003004	Ch'i k'alhak'ap'up'it wachu an barco; masi yucha wanaj laj'ay chi tacha an jatisamaj'an an un masi yu k'ut'ilh, pero an yu tamalhtanay talhi'ani watanchuncha talhik'uxa'an, walh chi wa lakat'ikt'i an yu tapumalhtanay.
59003005	Wanajcha chuni an sima'at yucha wa lakat'ikt'i, pero layi lak'ilhtuy laj'ay tanlhun. ¡La'atam lakat'ikt'i jikmi layi la'xaway ay lakaak'iwin!
59003006	Chi an sima'at yucha tacha jikmi, ancha minachalh ta tipachux yu alin tala'alhin an lakamunulhpa'. An sima'at la kilakatunajk'ani kintat'amala'xto'nikantan, pus kintalhkiliki'oyani chux la kilakatunajk'an. Chi an sima'at yucha an la'nini putakilhnuy chi makilhnu'ojoycha ta xlilhman an jatsukunti.
59003007	An lapanak layi ja'ilhtuy tani ja'ilhtuputuncha chux an xajatapakxat lakamunulhpa', yu tala'pa'achujlata chi an ts'apulin chi an yu tatajumanalh alamalh. Layi jamamansojlay an lapanak,
59003008	pero ntu xamati lay mamansojlay an sima'at. Yucha la'atam tu'u yu ntu oxi, yu ntu lhitamakajun li kamamansojlakalh chi wa stakcha lhit'ajuni yu lhinikan.
59003009	Lakisima'atk'an oxi lhichiwininaw an Dios, yu kimPayk'an, chi wanajcha yu xkayaj japujunaw an lapanakni yu yucha an Dios ja'ilhtulh tacha yucha junita.
59003010	Wa la'atam kinkilhnik'ani tan putaxtuy laj'oxi chiwinti chi xkayaj chiwinti. Kint'ala'awnin, jantu chun.
59003011	¿Chu sna layi tan taxtuy xkan kataxtulh yu sa'si chi kataxtupalh yu sun?
59003012	Tacha a'atam xak'iw higo jantu layi katitawk'anilh aceituna chi alhtam xasiwik uva jantu layi katitawk'anilh higo. Pus wanajcha chuni kint'ala'awnin, tan taxtuy xkan yu s'o'o jantu layi katitaxtulh yu sa'si.
59003013	Li xamati yu uxitnan jalakpastaknan chi lhimacha'xayi an tanlhun, laka oxicha ixlakatijla kamasulh, laka jakilhpatinij k'atsat.
59003014	Pero li uxitnan mak'awniyat'iti an xkayajk'atsat amijalhunutk'an, chi li an tanlhun wa pulaxkaycha ilht'uyat'it chuncha ntu layi k'at'ina'unt'it li tu'ucha yu sawalhcha oxi ilht'ut'awnat'it chi nt'uch'a ilht'uyat'iti an yu sawalh.
59003015	Mu ani jatapast'ak'at jantu yu, yu makmin Dios, an yu ilht'uyat wa xajatapast'ak'atcha aniy lakamunulhpa', ixjatapast'ak'at an lapanak chi an xapay makxkay un.
59003016	Tan alini laxkayt chi la'ayt, wachu talaktilhkanta chi alin'ojoyi chux yu ntu oxi tanlhun.
59003017	Pero yu talhit'ajun an jatapast'ak'at yu yucha an Dios makmin yu'uncha wa tanchun kawalhcha talhit'ajuni an jatsukunti yu stalan'a, chi ntu tala'aji chi oxi lapanakni chi oxi tachiwiniy chi sawalh tajamapayninin chi oxi tanlhuni ta'ilhtuy chi xlisawalhi yu ta'ilhtuy, jantu wa talaycha.
59003018	Chi an yu wa oxicha talakask'in katawlakalh wa laka lhi'oxi lapanaki tach'an an oxi jatawlhnat, para li katama'alalh an oxi lanti.
59004001	¿Tanischa minachalh an lasat chi an la'ayt yu wa siya uxitnancha? Ancha minachalh tacha an lhilhij k'ats'anat ilht'up'ut'unat yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun, yu lhilhij t'alaxt'uk'uyat la mimpulaknik'an.
59004002	Uxitnan ach'aniyat'iti tu'u, ch'i nt'u lhits'uk'uyat'it; jama'nininat'it, lhaxk'ayananat'iti tu'u', chi mu nt'u lay lhits'uk'uyat'iti yu lhaxk'ayananat'it, pus la'ayatcha ch'i lasayatcha. Jant'u lay lhits'uk'uyat'iti yu ach'aniyat mu nt'u sk'iniyat'iti an Dios;
59004003	ch'i li sk'iniyat'it, jantu taxta'niyan mu nt'u oxi sk'iniyat, mu uxitnan yucha an wa tanlhunch'a lakp'ast'ak'at'iti lakp'u'ilht'up'ut'unat'it.
59004004	¡Uxitnan mak'awnat'iti an Dios! Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti li oxi t'alalhi'ankan an lakaamunulhpa ixt'alaxkaycha an Diosi junkan? Watichicha yu oxi t'alalhi'amputun an lakamunulhpa, ixt'alaxkaycha an Diosi jun.
59004005	Sawalh lhitapalayi an tan ts'o'kanta ixchiwinti Dios tan najun: An Takuwin an yu kintaxta'nitan Dios mapayni, chi yucha lakask'in li ntu kamakajuw.
59004006	Pero an Dios ali kintamapayniyan, mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: An Dios jatanchaniya an yu wa talaj'ayajk'atsay, pero an yu tajakilhpatinijk'atsay jamapayni.
59004007	Pus yucha an Diosch'a k'a'asmatnit'it, k'alhit'ayanit, jant'u k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti an xapay makxkay un, walh lani chuncha katalaj'osan.
59004008	K'ast'alhch'a la'p'it'iti an Dios, chi yucha kastalhcha tala'anan. ¡K'alakmakxak'atcha la'ma'lhta'alhinin! ¡Uxitnan yu map'aynip'ut'unat an Dios chi a'tam map'aynip'ut'ump'alat wachu an lakamunulhpa, k'ast'alan'atcha mijalhunutk'an!
59004009	¡K'alakt'axap'aatcha chi k'ala't'a'oxila'alhitcha chi k'alaj'alhunt'itcha! ¡T'ach'a an lakts'i'inat mi'alhutchak'ani kawalh chi ami'achatk'an minta'oxila'alhitchak'an!
59004010	La x'ukxlakapu an Dios k'amasut'iti li ntu tu'u milhijuntik'an chi yucha kata'ilhtuyani li k'alhit'ap'alat.
59004011	T'ala'awnin, jant'u wa aya k'alalhich'iwinp'axat. Yu wa aya lhichiwiniy ixt'ala'ajun u junicha tani laycha, wa aya lhichiwiniycha an xlamap'a'sin Dios chi ntucha tu'u lhiwilay. Ch'i li nt'uch'a t'u'u lhiwilay an lhamap'a'sin apalijcha ixjuezi un an lhamap'a'sin ch'i nt'uch'a ilht'uy apaliji yu najun.
59004012	Wa pumatami yu xta'lhi an lhamap'a'sin, yucha Juez, yucha layi jama'alhtaxtunun chi wachu layi jama'ninin. Pero uxint'i ¿tisu milhijunticha para li k'anawcha tani laycha mint'alapanaki?
59004013	Chaway k'a'asmatt'iti yu ch'unch'uni nawnat : "Chaway u lhiy ka'anaw tanchun la'acha'an chi anchacha katawlhtacha'aw tam k'ata, ka'ilhtutacha'awcha kintapatsatk'an chi kalhajayaw tumin".
59004014	¡Masi nt'u k'ats'ayat'iti tani katatapasaniyancha la mijatsukuntik'an lhi! Uxitnan wa tacha an jataputs'i, talakasuycha tam pants'ik'is, chi pants'ik'ischa jun, la'mixcho'oycha.
59004015	Yu lay k'ana'unt'it: "li chuncha najun Dios katsukuyaw chi ka'ilhtuyawi aniy u tu'u atumpaj".
59004016	Pero uxitnan ali t'aylhip'inat'iti laj'ayajk'ats'ajch'iwininat; chi chux tacha ani ayajk'ats'at jantu oxi.
59004017	Yu layi ilhtuy yu oxi chi ntu ilhtuy, ilhtuycha tala'alhin.
59005001	¡Uxitnani jamatuminin k'a'asmatt'iti aniy! ¡k'alaj'alhunt'it ch'i k'alakt'asat'it, ixlakata an tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi k'ap'uma'alh'ajnana'it!
59005002	An mintumink'an lakp'uch'ita; an mila'ch'itk'an lak'utacha an xatsapulh.
59005003	An mi'orojk'an chi a mimplatajk'an laj'alhuntacha, chi anchunu ix'alhut k'ap'ulhila'ts'int'anuk'ana'it chi tacha jikmi katama'niyan. Wa st'akch'a lalhawat'at'iti laj'oxi mintanlhunk'an chaway yu k'ap'ulhila'ts'int'anuk'ana'it yu xalak'astancha wilhchan.
59005004	Jant'u jaxt'a'nit'iti xtalhajak'an an lapanakni yu tatapatsalh an la mintapatsatk'an. Ta'alhtasuyan chi an Dios yu lay ilhtu'ojoy wa tuchicha, asmat'acha tacha an tachiwiniy an yu tatapatsalh.
59005005	Ani lakaat'un uxitnan sawalhcha oxi jatsukunti lhit'awnat. Ch'i ma'an'ach'ayatcha milakatunajk'an, wa tacha wa jatapakxatch'a laj'ont'at'it. ¡Chi chint'ajuncha wilhchan akxni k'ala'ma'nik'ana'it!
59005006	Uxitnani lhimuk'ayat ch'i ma'niyat an yu ntu ta lay, chi masi chuncha, yucha jantu k'is ta'alhtayst'uk'an.
59005007	Pero uxitnani t'ala'awnin, xlak'anti k'ap'akxan'it sta akxni kamina an Jamach'alhkat Jesús. K'ala'ts'int'iti tacha lay an yu tapatsay la xkuxtu, yucha xlak'anti pakxan'iy akxni katamatachilhcha an xkan, para li laycha kamach'ixtamilh akxni ma'alaycha yu ch'an.
59005008	Uxitnan wachu xlak'anti k'ap'akxan'it ch'i k'ajak'iklak'a'inint'it sawalh, mu wa k'ischa ts'an'ay kaminacha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
59005009	T'ala'awnin, jant'u wa k'alalhich'iwimp'axat, para li nt'u k'amuk'anikant'iti mintala'alhink'an, mu an Juez la xlakapucha an malhticha yalh.
59005010	Kint'ala'awnin, k'ajala'ts'ixt'ut'iti an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios la xtalakask'i, yu'uncha xlak'anti talhitayanilh yu lhima'alh'ajna.
59005011	Kitnan nawnaw li oxi para yu'uncha an yu tama'alh'ajnan. Asmatt'atcha li an Job xlak'anti lhitayanilh ixma'alh'ajnat ch'i la'ts'inatcha tacha ilhtulh an Dios xli'astan, mu an Jamach'alhkat Dios sawalh oxi lapanak chi sawalh jamapayninin.
59005012	Pero klajunawi kint'ala'awnin, jant'u k'ap'ujurarnant'iti an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un chi watuchicha tu'u atumpaj. Akxni nawnat li chun, wa k'ana'unt'it chun, chi akxni nawnat li jantu, wa k'ana'unt'it, li jantu, para li an Dios jantu katamama'alh'ajnin.
59005013	Li xamati yu uxitnan wa ta'oxila'alhiy, katapayninilhi an Dios. Li xamati uxitnan achan, kamilhpanilhi an Dios.
59005014	Li xamati wa ta'an'ay, kajat'asanilhi an yu laktatanincha an yu takiklaka'iy Dios para li katalhitapaynilh chi la xtalakask'i an Dios kata'ukmuk'alhcha lakats'uni aceite.
59005015	Chi an tapaynit yu laka jakiklaka'inti sawalh ilhtukan kama'alhtaxtuya an ta'an'an, chi an Jamach'alhkat Dios kama'ostayanicho'oya an yu wa ixta'an'ay, chi li tu'u ixlak'ilhtuta ixtala'alhin kamala'mixini'okana'.
59005016	Xliyu k'ala'ump'axat'iti t'uch'ini ilht'ut'atcha mintala'alhink'an chi k'alat'at'ap'aynip'axatcha para li an Dios katak'uch'un. An ixtapaynit an yu oxi t'ajun la xtij Dios, sawalh alhp'as, chi asmatniya an Dios.
59005017	An Elías yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios wa tacha kitnancha wachu lapanaki ixjunita, walh chi akxni alhp'as tapaynisk'inlhi li ntu kamilh xkan, la'at'utu k'ata apaytati jantu lalh xkan.
59005018	Xli'astan akxni a'tam tapaynipalh mincho'olhcha xkan chi an lakaat'un tanlhuncha ma'alacho'olh.
59005019	Kint'ala'awnin, li xamati yu uxitnan jantucha yu an yu sawalhi ch'a'o'apalay chi li xamati apumatam kakilhyawcho'olhi an tan sawalh,
59005020	k'ak'ats'at'iti li wa tichicha yu kilhyawcho'oyi tan oxi tij an yu wa ixma'lhta'alhinincha, ma'alhtaxtuyi laka lhinin chi lhuw tala'alhini tanchaniy.
60001001	Kit'in Pedro yucha an Jesucristojo kimala'achay. Iklats'o'niyaw uxitnan yu wa t'ilhch'a a'p'its'iyat yu ntucha la milakaat'unk'an wilat yu xalakaat'uncha Ponto wilat chi Galacia chi Capadocia chi Asia chi Bitinia,
60001002	uxitnan yucha an Dios kimPayk'ani tasakxtun xlip'ulhnaj chi tamastalan'anini an laka Stalan'a Takuwin para li k'ak'iklak'a'it'it, chi tamastalan'anini an la xjak'alhni Jesucristo. Lhuw jamapayninti k'ala'a'it chi oxi jatawlhnat.
60001003	Ayi kala'ts'iw an Dios chi xPay an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo, mu yucha laka ay ixjamapayninti kintamala'awnicho'on, yucha an Jesucristojo chuncha kintapu'ilhtun akxni an la'awcho'olh. Chunchacha kintapu'ilhtun li kapakxan'iwi
60001004	li kala'a'iyaw an laj'oxi tanlhun yu xt'a'a an Dios, yu japaxkama'anita an ixjas'at'an an lakt'iyan. Aniy laj'oxi tanlhun jantu laktalakt'ilhi chi ntu laklhkilikin chi ntu la'xlo'a.
60001005	Chi mu uxitnan k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an Dios, pus an la x'alhp'asninti talhist'ak'an para li k'alhits'uk'ut'iti an ta'alhtaxtut yu mala'asijnita, chi kamasuya akxni xati'astancha panch'e'ex.
60001006	Xliyu chaway uxitnan sawalhch'a laj'ach'anat'it, masi li task'iniya li k'ala'ma'alh'ajnant'it tam panch'e'ex tipaspit lhima'alh'ajna.
60001007	Mu uxitnan an mijakiklaka'intik'an tacha an oro, kamala'pusukana laka jikmi para li kala'ts'inkalhi li jak'iklak'a'ininat sawalh. An jakiklaka'inti yu lhitayani akxni lhila'ts'intanukan yucha palay lhitapalay, an oro jantu, mu yucha wa min'ojoy. An mijakiklaka'intik'an uxitnan akxni chunchacha kalhila'ts'intanukana, kanawkanacha li lhajachalhcha, chi kala'ayakana chi kalhitapala'. Chuncha katapasaya akxni katalakasuyacha an Jesucristo.
60001008	Uxitnan map'ayniyat'iti an Jesucristo masi nt'u la'ts'int'at'it; ch'i li k'iklak'a'iyat'iti masi nt'u la'ts'inat'it, laj'ach'anat'iti an laka aya achat, yu nt'u lay nawnat laka chiwinti,
60001009	amijakiklaka'intik'an oxicha xajt'awnachalh, mu la'ch'ip'itcha yu puta'alhtaxtuy an mijatsukuntik'an.
60001010	An yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios xlak'anti talhatalaninilh para li oxi katak'atsaalh ixlakata an ta'alhtaxtut, chi tanawlhi yu an Dios kataxta'niyan uxitnan la xjamapayninti.
60001011	An xTakuwin an Cristo p'ulhnajcha xjamak'atsaaniya an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios tuchi lhima'alh'ajnacha kalhitsukuya an Cristo chi tacha an ay kala'ts'inkana xli'astan; chi yu'uncha xtalhipuxkawnicha xtak'atsaaputun tichini yuchacha anchunu lapanak, chi tani wanancha chuncha katapasaya tacha an xjamasuni an Takuwin.
60001012	Pero an Dios jamak'atsaanilhi li an yu yu'uncha xtalhichiwiniy jantu wa para yu'unchacha, para kitnan. Atumpaj an lapanakni yu talhixa'alan uxitnan anchunu laj'oxi chiwinti an laka Stalan'a Takuwini tapumasunin yu makminkanchalh lakt'iyan. Aniy tanlhun an angelhnin wachu tala'ts'inputun.
60001013	Pus xliyu oxi k'ap'ast'akt'it t'uch'ini k'a'ilht'uya'itcha, chi oxi k'ats'uk'ut'it. K'ap'akxan'it'iti yu Dios kataxta'niyan la xjamapayninti akxni katalakasuyacha an Jesucristo.
60001014	Tacha yu taja'asmatnancha jas'at'ani k'a'unt'it uxitnan, jant'uch'a ch'uni k'ats'uk'ut t'ach'a xt'awnat akxni nt'uk'a' xmisp'ayat Dios.
60001015	Chaway, la mijatsukuntik'an la'stalan'ancha k'ats'uk'ut, mu an Dios yu tat'asanin, yucha stalan'a;
60001016	chi an tan ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios najun: "La'stalan'ani k'a'unt'it, mu kit'in ikstalan'a."
60001017	Li t'ach'iwinat'iti an Dios tacha mimpayk'an uxitnan, yu ta lhichux kintajunan tani t'a'unawcha la kijatsukuntik'an, k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti sta wa tani xlima'ancha k'atsuk'uya'it aniy lakamunulhpa'.
60001018	Mu an Dios yucha tama'alhtaxtunitancha amijatsukuntik'an yu ntu tu'u xlitapalay yu ixtaxta'nitan an yu t'a xjalhila'ts'inat'it. Chi uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat li yu p'ut'a'alht'axt'ut jantu wa tuchicha yu wa min'ojoy, tacha an oro u an plataj,
60001019	yucha an k'usi xak'alhni an Cristojo pumapalakalh, yucha ma'axta'kalh chi ma'nikalh tacha la'atam borrego yu ntu k'is inta ta juninita chi yu ntu lhkiliki.
60001020	An Cristo chunchacha xlipaxkakanta sta akxni jantuka' x'ilhtukan an lakamunulhpa', pero sta chaway yu xati'astancha ani panch'e'exi malakasukalh, oxi para uxitnan.
60001021	Yucha an Cristojo p'uk'iklak'a'iyat an Dios. An Dios mala'awnicho'olhi an Cristo chi ilhtulhi li ayi kala'ts'inkalh, pus uxitnan k'iklak'a'iyat ch'i p'akxan'iyat'iti yu ka'ilhtuya an Dios.
60001022	Chaway uxitnan, li k'iklak'a'iyatcha an chiwinti yu sawalh, la'stalan'ancha, para li k'ajamap'aynitcha xasawalhi amijat'ala'awnink'an. Pus k'alamap'aynip'axatcha chux la mijalhunutk'an chi chux la mintachaputk'an.
60001023	Mu uxitnan t'ump'ajch'a la'awch'o'ot'at, chaway jantucha wa yu p'ula'awt'at milakpaynink'an yu wa talakniy, yucha an xchiwinticha Diosi p'ula'awt'at, yu la'ajunta chi yu ntu a'tam niy.
60001024	Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios najun: Ta kilhmakchux lapanak tacha an t'awkan wa tacha an jach'itin, chi an tanlhuncha an yu talhita'ayay wa tacha an xaxanticha an jach'itin. An jach'itin xixa chi an xaxanti patajuni.
60001025	Pero an xchiwinti an Jamach'alhkat Dios yucha ntu a'tam katila'mixli. Chi aniy chiwinti yucha yu puta'alhtaxtukan yu uxitnan unk'ant'at'itcha.
60002001	Pus k'amaj'ant'itcha chux tanlhun yu ntu oxi, chux la'o'xcho'o, maslakatinti, jaxkayanti, chi chux lalhi'o'xchiwinti.
60002002	Tacha yu wa tatsukuyka jas'at'an ch'unch'a p'as k'ap'uxk'a'ut an leche yu wa takuwin yu ntu lhkiliki, para li yuch'ach'a k'ap'ut'a'ayat ch'i k'at'a'alht'axt'ut,
60002003	mu li sawalhch'a li k'ats'atcha li an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo oxi lapanak.
60002004	K'ast'alhch'a la'p'it'iti an Jamach'alhkat, tacha la'atam chiwx yu la'ajunta. An lapanakni wa tala'amaj'alh, pero an Dios yucha la'ts'in tacha la'atam chiwx yu sakxtukanta chi sawalh lhitapalay.
60002005	Uxitnan wachu tacha chiwx yu tala'ajunta, uxitnani katapu'ilhtuyan ixcha'a an Dios tan katawla an xTakuwin, uxitnan sacerdotejnincha yu la'stalan'ani kata'ilhtuyan, para li k'ama'axt'a't'itcha amijatsukuntik'an tacha lha'ulan yu la'a'iy an Dios ixlakata yu ki'ilhtuchilh an Jesucristo.
60002006	Xliyu wachu najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta an ixchiwinti Dios: An la'acha'an Sión kit'in k'ulay pumatam yu yuchacha tukan xachiwx an ay cha'a', chiwx yu jasakxtunti chi sawalh lhitapalay; yu yucha kiklaka'iy, jantu katitamaxanilh.
60002007	Uxitnan yu k'iklak'a'iyat'it anchunu chiwx sawalhcha lhitapalay; pero an yu ntu takiklaka'iy, tapasaycha tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta an ixchiwinti Dios: An chiwx an yu wa tala'amaj'alh an ixyawnan cha'a, yuchacha apaliji yu lhitapalay tukan.
60002008	Chi wachu tapasapalayi an tan najunta: Yucha la'atam chiwx yu ja'ayst'uk'unun chi wachu la'atam chiwx yu jama'tanan. Mu yu'uncha ja'ayst'uk'ukalhi li ntu takiklaka'ilh an chiwinti; chuncha nawlh an Dios li kataputapasalh.
60002009	Pero uxitnan kilhmaktam lapanakni yu sakxt'uk'ant'at'it, kilhmaktam sacerdotejnin yu t'at'ap'ats'ayat an rey. Uxitnan kilhmaktam lapanakni yu la'stalan'an chi ixlapanakni an Dios, para li k'ajamak'ats'aaninint'iti an tanlhun yu la'lhi'a'nin ilhtuy an Dios. Mu yucha tat'asanin para li k'at'axt'ut'iti an tan lakaaputs'isni ch'i k'at'anuchi'itcha an tan sawalhcha lhi'a'nin xjatapulhkunu'.
60002010	Uxitnan xlip'ulhnaj jantu ixlapanakni Diosi x'unt'at'it, pero chaway ixlapanaknicha, xlip'ulhnaj jantu xamati xtamapayniyan, pero chaway an Dios tamapayniyancha.
60002011	Uxitnan klamapayniyaw, kitnan jantu aniy lakaat'uni kila'acha'ank'an wa kala'pusaw, klatapaynisk'iniyaw li nt'u k'a'ilht'ut'iti an tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi mu yucha wa t'alasay an mijatsukuntik'an.
60002012	Oxi jatsukunti k'alhip'it an tan tat'ajun an lapanakni yu ntu takiklaka'iy Dios, walh lani chuncha masi yu'uncha wa aya talhichiwinan, katala'ts'ina li uxitnan oxi t'awnat'it chi katanawna li an Dios yucha ayi akxni kachina wilhchan akintala'chinan.
60002013	Xlakata li chuncha lhinajun an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo k'ajak'iklak'a'it'iti chux jamach'alhkatni yu an wa lapanakni talhka'ulata; tacha an rey, wa xliyu yucha yu palay xa'ay,
60002014	wachu an gobernadorjnin yu an rey jamala'achata para li kajamama'alh'ajnilhi an yu tala'ma'lhta'alhinin chi oxi kajalhichiwinilh an yu oxi ta'ilhtuy tanlhun.
60002015	Mu an Dios yucha lakask'in li uxitnan, yu oxi k'a'ilht'ut, para li k'asa' jamak'ilhunit'iti an yu ntu tu'u tak'atsay yu wa aya talakchiwiniy.
60002016	Tacha yu ntu xamati tach'i'ulatani lay k'a'ilht'ut yu ilht'up'ut'unat, pero ntu xliyu wachu li k'a'ilht'ut'it yu ntu oxi. Tacha yu tat'atapatsay an Diosi k'ats'uk'ut'it.
60002017	Ixchuxk'ani k'ajalhiwilat an lapanakni. K'ajamap'aynit'iti an ixlapanakni Dios, k'at'alhamnit'iti an Dios, k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti an rey.
60002018	Ma'tapatsanin, k'aja'asmatnit'iti an mimpatronk'an, chi ntu wa yu oxicha lapanak u yu talhimacha'xaniyan patroni kaja'asmatnit, wach'u k'aja'asmatnit'iti an yu wa ay tajunita.
60002019	Mu oxi li xamati lhitayani ma'alh'ajnat yu ntu xt'acha'an li kaxlima'alh'ajnalh, pero lhitayaniy wa xliyu li yucha an Diosi yu kiklaka'iy.
