60002020	Li uxitnan ilht'uyat tu'u yu ntu oxi chi xliyuchacha li mama'alh'ajnik'anat, ¿tasu lhila'ancha masi xlak'anti k'alhit'ayanit'iti? Pero li ma'alh'ajnanat wa xliyu ilht'ut tu'u yu oxi, chi li xlak'anti lhit'ayaniyat an ma'alh'ajnat, yucha oxi lhiwilay an Dios.
60002021	Mu para yuchacha ixlakata li an Dios tat'asanin, mu an Cristo talhima'alh'ajnan, tamasunincha t'ani k'alatcha, para li k'acha'o'atcha tan tach'atay.
60002022	Yucha jantu k'is tu'u ilhtulh xtala'alhin, chi ntu a'tam o'xcho'olh xamati';
60002023	akxni xkayaj xtajuni, yucha ntu xkayaj xja'alhtaji; akxni xtamama'alh'ajni, yucha ntu tu'u xjapume'e'sway, yucha yucha an Diosi ixmakawni'ojoy, mu yucha oxi lats'awalay an tanlhun.
60002024	An Cristo yucha lhi'alhcha an kintala'alhink'an la ixlakatunaj an laka cruz, para li kitnan jantucha akintala'chini an tala'alhin chi yu oxicha jatsukunti katsukuw. Yucha mak'atsanikalh para li uxitnan k'at'ak'uch'ut.
60002025	Uxitnan wa tacha wa borregojnincha yu wa xtats'an'atacha x'unt'at'it, pero chaway la'ch'ip'inch'o'otcha an Cristo, yu talhist'ak'an tacha yu jalhist'ak'a xborregojnin chi yucha talhistakniyan mintakuwink'an.
60003001	Wanajcha chuni uxitnani t'akunin yu lhit'awnat mint'apapak'an, k'aja'asmatnit'iti yu tajunan, para li xamati'in t'akunin yu wachu talhit'ajun xt'apapak'an yu ntu takiklaka'iy an Dios, wachu katakiklaka'ilh, masi ntu tu'u laka chiwinti k'aja'unit'it, wa xliyu li katala'ts'ilhcha t'ani t'awnatcha,
60003002	wa xliyu li kala'ts'ilhcha li oxi sawalhi t'awnat'it ch'i li jalakp'ast'aknanat.
60003003	Jantu yu wa milhima'spachak'ani yu sawalhcha oxi k'alakmalht'ak'at'it, tacha an ja'aktujunti yu wa lhimo'slakantacha u k'alaklak'at'awlat tu'u yu de oro u la'lach'it yu sawalhcha laj'oxi.
60003004	La xpulakni an mijalhunutk'ani tan k'usi k'amalht'ak'achi'it, yu ntu talakt'ilhi jamalht'ak'anti. Oxi lapanakni k'a'unt'it chi watichicha oxi k'ala'ts'int'it, yucha yu sawalh oxi lhiwilay an Dios.
60003005	Mu yu ma'anchacha ixjuntachalh chuncha wachu yu xjamalht'ak'antik'an xtalhit'ajun an t'akunin yu la'stalan'an xtat'ajun; yu'uncha xtakiklaka'iya an Dios chi xta'asmatniya xt'apapak'an.
60003006	An Sara, wachu chuni ixt'ajun, ix'asmatniya yu ixjuniy an Abraham chi "kijamach'alhkat", junilh. Uxitnan wach'u ch'uni k'a'una'it li k'a'ilht'uya'i'titi an yu oxi, ch'i li nt'u t'u'u k'at'it'alhamnit'it.
60003007	Wanajcha chuni uxitnani lapanakni yu lakt'at'awk'anat, k'ajalhimach'a'xanit'iti amint'iwik'an, k'ajalhiwilat'it, mu yu'uncha palay tu lajk'ut'ilin, chi yu'uncha katat'ala'a'iyani an jatsukunti yu kataxta'niyan an Dios. Ch'unch'a k'a'ilht'ut para li ntu tu'u kamama'tijlalh akxni t'ap'ayniyat.
60003008	Yu kanajuw, chux uxitnan wa tami k'ak'ats'aat'it, k'alamak'akxanip'axat, k'alamap'aynip'axat tacha lhit'ala'awnin, chi k'ajak'ilhp'at'inijk'ats'at.
60003009	Li xamati ta'ilhtuniyan yu ntu oxi tu'u, uxitnan nt'uch'a ch'uni k'a'ilht'ut. Chi li xamati tamamaxaniyan, uxitnan t'uch'a k'amamaxanit. Uxitnan yu oxi tu'u k'amap'usp'itt'it, mu an Dios tat'asanin li k'ala'a'it yu oxi tu'u'.
60003010	Mu: Yu mapayniputuni an jatsukunti chi lhi'acha la'ts'imputun la'alhuw wilhchan, kalhistaklhi li an isima'at jantu wa aya kachiwinilh chi li an ixkilhni jantu wa kamaslakatinilh.
60003011	Kamakawlhcha an yu ntu oxi chi ka'ilhtulhcha an yu oxi, kapuxkawlhcha an oxi jatawlhnat chi kach'a'o'alhcha.
60003012	Mu an Jamach'alhkat Dios jalhist'ak'a an yu oxi lapanakni chi ja'asmatniya an ixtapaynitk'an, pero an yu wa tanlhuncha ta'ilhtuy yu ntu laj'oxi yu'uncha jantu jala'ts'imputun.
60003013	¿Tisiyuchacha ta kata'ilhtuyan li uxitnan lhilhiji ilht'uyat yu oxi?
60003014	Pero masi k'alhima'alh'ajnant'iti la mijatsukuntik'an wa xliyu li ilht'uyat'iti yu oxi, k'alaj'ach'ana'it. Jant'u xamat'i k'at'alhamnit, ch'i nt'u k'alakt'alhanant'it,
60003015	apalij k'alhiwilati an Jamach'alhkat Dios la mijalhunutk'an. Lhilhiji k'ala'asijt'it para li wa tichicha yu talhisakmiyan t'uch'ini lhik'iklak'a'iyatcha yu p'akxan'iyat, k'a'alht'a'it'it, pero laka jakilhpatinijk'atsati k'a'ilht'ut.
60003016	Oxi k'ats'uk'ut'it para li an mijatapast'ak'atk'an stalan'a k'alhits'uk'ut, para li an yu wa aya talhichiwiniy ixlakata li oxi milantik'an, uxitnan li k'iklak'a'iyat an Cristo, katalhimaxanalhi tacha an wa aya tachiwiniy.
60003017	Palay oxi lhima'alh'ajnankan li yu oxi tu'u ilhtukan, yu chuncha lhinajun an Dios, walh jantu li aklhima'alh'ajnalh wa ixlakata li yu ntu oxi.
60003018	Mu an Cristo yucha lhinilhi ixlakata an kintala'alhink'an, wa a'tami lhinilh. Yucha oxi lapanaki ixjunita, pero kintalhima'alh'ajnani kitnan yu wa ay juntaw, para li akintalhi'an tan wilhchalh Dios. Yucha nilhi la ixlakatunaj, pero yucha la'awcho'olhi la ixtakuwin,
60003019	chi japukila'kilalhi la ixtakuwin an yu talaklhchawnan takuwinin.
60003020	Aniy takuwinin jantu taja'asmatnalhi yu ma'anchacha xjuntachalh, akxni ixt'ajun an Noé, akxni an Dios xlak'anti pakxan'ilh li ixla'oxit'awkanka an arca, tan wa lakats'uni lapanakni jama'alhtaxtukalh laka xkan, wa xpumatsajink'ani jama'alhtaxtukalh.
60003021	Anchunu xkan yucha nawputun tacha an yu pu'a'paxkancha xkan chaway, yu puta'alhtaxtuyawcha chaway. Li a'paxkancha jantu nawputun li wa ch'a'akancha an kilakatunajk'an, yu juniy li sk'inikancha an Dios la'atam oxi jatapast'ak'at; chi kintapuma'alhtaxtuyancha an Jesucristo mu yucha la'awcho'olh.
60003022	Yucha li alhcha an lakt'iyan chaway piktuwilhchalhcha an Dios tan lhi'oxi ixpa'xti', chi an ángelhnin chi an yu talhit'ajun lhich'alhkat chi an yu talhit'ajun tachaput, ta'asmatniy.
60004001	Pus xliyu tacha ma'alh'ajnalhi la ixlakatunaj an Cristo, uxitnan wach'u k'alak'ap'ap'it'iti k'ama'alh'ajnant'it. Mu yu ma'alh'ajnan la ixlakatunaj laklhajalhcha an tala'alhin,
60004002	para li tacha yu lakask'incha an Diosi katsuku'alhilh chi ntucha wa xjatapast'ak'ati kati'ilhtulh.
60004003	Lhuwch'a ilht'ut yu awint'i panch'e'ex xjuntachalh yu ta'achani an yu ntu takiklaka'iy Dios. Akxni wa t'anisch'a xlayat, t'ani yu xp'ast'ak'atcha sich'a x'ilhtu'yat, xla't'a'ap'ayatcha chi ists'uk'uyatcha tan wa ayacha lakan, wa xlimo'slaya laj'ot'atcha chi tacha midioschak'ani ixja'ilht'uyat an wa tanlhuncha yu wa laklhits'isitcha.
60004004	Yu'uncha ntucha oxi tala'ts'in li uxitnan t'uch'a ch'uni jat'alayat tacha an wa tani talaycha yu ntu oxi jatsukunti, chi xliyuchacha li wa ayacha talhichiwinan.
60004005	Yu'uncha, yuchacha katajuna tani xtalaycha, an yu la'asijtacha li kajat'alats'awalaya tani xtat'ajuncha an yu tala'ajunta chi an yu talaknitacha.
60004006	Mu an yu talaknitacha jalhixa'alakalhi an laj'oxi chiwinti, chuncha masi an la ixlakatunajk'an kajalhimuk'akalhi tala'alhin, la ixtakuwink'an layi katatsukuya tacha t'ajun Dios.
60004007	Chux an tanlhun wanicha minta xpanch'e'ex li ka'ukla'oyacha. Xliyu, uxitnan oxich'a k'ajalakp'ast'aknant'it chi xlisawalhch'a li k'at'ap'aynit'it.
60004008	Yu lhitapalay sawalh, li sawalhch'a k'alamap'aynip'axat, mu an jamapayninti wanaj lhuw tala'alhini mala'mixiy.
60004009	K'alaxt'a'nip'axat'iti t'an k'at'amak'a'unt'it li akxni xamati ntu inta tamakajun, ch'i nt'u xamat'i k'alhich'iwinint'it.
60004010	Atamj atamj chunchacha kajatapatsanilh an ali'in tuchi tapatsatcha xta'nikalh, oxi k'ap'ut'ap'ats'at'it an tipaspit laj'oxi tapatsat yu xt'a'a an Dios.
60004011	Li xamati yu oxi chiwiniy, kalhichiwinilh an ixchiwinti Dios. Li xamati ja'ilhtuni tu'u tapatsat an ali'in, chunchacha xli'alhp'as ka'ilhtulh tacha alhp'as xta'niy an Dios, para li watuchicha yu ilhtukan yucha an Diosi ay kapula'ts'inkalh ixlakata an Jesucristo, yu x'anu an ta'ayat chi an lhich'alhkat yu xpujun'alhincha. Chunchacha kawalh.
60004012	T'ala'awnin, jant'u k'alhit'a'oxila'alhit'iti an la'lhima'anxkay tanlhun yu p'ut'ap'asayat'it, masi li chaway tachanu laka jikmi lhila'ts'int'anut'awk'anat'it.
60004013	Apalij k'alaj'ach'ant'iti li wach'u t'ama'alh'ajnant'awnat'iti an Cristo, para li wachu sawalhch'a k'alaj'ach'ant'iti akxni k'ala'ts'ina'itcha alhp'as kamina'.
60004014	Li lhimamaxanik'anat'iti ixlakata an Cristo, laj'ach'anat'iti uxitnan; mu an ay ixTakuwin an Dios uxitnani tapujastaknanan. Yu'uncha wa aya talhichiwiniy, pero uxitnan ayi la'ts'inat'it.
60004015	Li xamati yu uxitnan ma'alh'ajnan, jantu wa xliyu li wa jama'ninicha, u wa ja'alhawnacha kawalh, u wa xliyu li wa tanlhuncha kalak'ilhtulh tanlhun yu ntu oxi, u wa xliyu li wa tanlhuncha kama'patanulh tan tu la ixmakni.
60004016	Li xamati ma'alh'ajnan wa xliyu li xt'alhtanacha an Cristo junkan, jantu kamaxanalh, apalij kanawlhi li an Dios yucha ay, xliyuchacha li lhimapa'a'ukancha li xt'alhtana'.
60004017	Chilhcha panch'e'ex li an yu takiklaka'iy Dios kajaxta'nikanacha lhima'alh'ajna, yu'uncha kajapu'a'taynikana'. Chi li an lhima'alh'ajna kitnancha kintapu'a'tayt'awnan, ¿tasucha wa tijunita yu katapu'ukla'oya an yu ntu takiklaka'iy an ixchiwinti Diosi?
60004018	Chi li an yu oxi lapanak lhima'anxkayi ta'alhtaxtuy ¿Tasucha kaputapasaya an yu ntu ja'asmatnan chi an yu ilhtuy xtala'alhini?
60004019	Yu talhima'alh'ajnani ixlakata tacha an oxi lhiwilay an Dios, ali kata'ilhtulhi yu laj'oxi tanlhun chi an ixtakuwink'an la xmakacha an Diosi katama'axta'nilh, mu yucha ja'ilhtulh, mu yucha muktaxtuy sawalhi yu najun.
60005001	Kit'in yu iktatacha yu ikla'ts'ilh an ixma'alh'ajnat an Cristo wachu akma'la'a'iya an ta'ayat yu katalakasuya xli'astan. Klatapaynisk'iniyaw an yu laktatanincha t'an la't'a'ayxt'o'achi'it
60005002	k'ajalhist'akt'iti an xborregojnin Dios yu jamalhist'aknik'ant'at'it. Minta'achanink'ani k'a'ilht'ut'it, tacha Dios lakask'in, jant'u wa k'a'asi ilht'ut'itcha u wa xliyu wa sawalhch'a k'alhajap'ut'ut tumin. Minta'achanink'ani k'a'ilht'ut amintapatsatk'an,
60005003	jant'u k'alat li minawink'ani an yu wa jamalhist'aknik'ant'at'it, uxitnanch'a k'ajat'ap'ulhnit'it an yu wa jamalhist'aknik'ant'at'it.
60005004	Walh lani akxni katalakasuyacha an xa'ay xlistakna borrego, uxitnan k'alhi'o'xla'ts'ink'ana'it la'atam corona yu ntu a'tam talakt'ilhi.
60005005	Uxitnan yu lakts'alanka chi yu lakjatsi'inka wanajcha chun, k'ajak'iklak'a'it'iti an yu laktatanincha. Chi minchuxk'an k'alak'iklak'a'ip'axat'it laka jakilhpatinijk'atsat, mu: An Dios jatanchaniya an yu wa talaj'ayajk'atsay, pero an yu tajakilhpatinijk'atsay ja'a'tayjuyi la xjamapayninti.
60005006	K'ajak'ilhp'at'inijk'ats'at'iti la x'alhp'asniyamaka an Dios, para li yucha kata'ilhtun li ayi k'ala'ts'ink'ant'it akxni xpanch'e'ex.
60005007	Chux yu sawalhch'a lhat'ap'ast'aknanat'it, la xmakni an Diosi k'amak'awnit'it, mu yucha talhist'ak'an.
60005008	K'ajalajk'ats'anant'it ch'i k'as'alaj ts'uk'ut'it; mu amint'alaxkayk'an makxkay un tacha wa ma'tilicha t'asajt'ajun, puxkawlhit'ajuni tichini ka'ulhcha.
60005009	K'alhit'ayanit'it, lajk'ut'ilini k'ats'uk'ut la mijakiklaka'intik'an, k'ap'ast'akt'iti li amijat'ala'awnink'an ta xlijalhi'ay an lakamunulhpa wanajcha chuni tama'alh'ajnant'ajun.
60005010	Pero xli'astan li akxni uxitnan ma'alh'ajnant'atcha lakats'uni panch'e'ex, an Dios oxicha lapanakni kata'ilhtuyan, chi lajk'ut'ilincha k'a'una'it chi la'lhitala'sincha. Yucha an Diosi yu kintamapayniyan chi yucha kintat'asanitan para li kala'a'iw an ixta'ayat yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy para li kat'atala'xto'wicha an Jesucristo.
60005011	Yucha yu ay tukan chi xnawini an alhp'asninti yu xpujun'alhincha. Chunchacha kawalh.
60005012	An Silvano yu ikla'ts'in li kint'ala'ajunk'an sawalh, ikmats'o'nilh lakats'uniya aniy chiwinti. Tan klamap'a'siyaw chi klajunaw li sawalhi li kintamapayniyani an Dios. K'alhits'uk'u'alhit'itcha an xjamapayninti.
60005013	An yu takiklaka'iy Dios an la'acha'an Babilonia, yu wachu yucha an Dios jasakxtuta tacha uxitnan, tamak'aniyan jala'axa'alanti, chi an kints'alh Marcos wachu'.
60005014	K'alala'axa'alap'axachi'it laka la'atam jala'xtikilhtastuknut, laka jamapayninti. Oxich'a k'at'awlat chux uxitnan yu t'a'aklat'awnat an Jesucristo. Chunchacha kawalh.
61001001	Kit'in, ikSimón Pedro, ikt'atapatsay an Jesucristo chi yucha kimala'achay, klats'o'niyaw ani carta uxitnan yu wach'uch'a lhit'awnat'it an yu sawalh lhitapalay jakiklaka'inti tacha an iklhit'awnaw. Mu an Jesucristo kiDiosk'an chi yu kintama'alhtaxtuyan yucha ts'awjwi lak'ilhtuy an tanlhun.
61001002	Lhuwch'a k'ala'a'it an jamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnat, li misp'ayatcha an Dios chi an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesús.
61001003	An Dios la x'alhp'asninti kintaxta'niyani chux yu ma'lhtask'iniyaw aniy laka jatsukunti para li wa yuchacha kat'atapatsaw. Chuxcha lhit'aw'oyaw, mu mispayawcha an yu kintat'asanin la x'alhp'asninti chi an yu lak'ilhtuy tanlhun laj'oxi.
61001004	Chunchacha an Dios kintaxta'nin yu laj'ay tanlhun chi yu lhitapalay yu kintajunan li akintaxta'niyan. Xliyu uxitnan layi k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'it an lakamunulhpa yu kalakt'ilhikana', ixlakata li wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'an ta'ilhtuy an lapanakni, chi layi k'at'at'ala'xt'o'a'it an Dios.
61001005	Pus xliyu k'at'at'axt'unit'itcha chaway para li palaycha oxi kawalh mijakiklaka'intik'an: an mijakiklaka'intik'an, k'ala'mak'ap'itcha oxi lanti. An oxi lanti, k'ala'mak'ap'itcha jatapast'ak'at.
61001006	An jatapast'ak'at, k'ala'mak'ap'itcha li layi k'a'akst'u xa'ayawk'ant'it tan tu oxi. Li nt'ucha ilht'uyat'iti yu ntu oxi, k'ala'mak'ap'itcha li k'alhit'ayanit. Li lhit'ayaniyatcha, k'ala'mak'ap'itcha k'at'at'ap'ats'at an Dios.
61001007	Li t'at'ap'ats'ayatcha an Dios, kala'mak'ap'itcha li oxi k'ajala'ts'int'it an mijat'ala'awnink'an yu takiklaka'iy Cristo. Ch'i li oxich'a jala'ts'ininat'it, k'ala'mak'ap'itcha an jamapayninti.
61001008	Li chux aniy tanlhun lhit'awnat'iti la mijatsukuntik'an ch'i li ali lhits'uk'uyat'it, jantu wa katiwalhcha amijatsukuntik'an chi ntu wa paxkatcha katiwalhi li misp'ayat an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
61001009	Li xamati la'ts'an'aniy aniy tanlhun, jantu lay oxi jalakawanan, wa la'lhtuluw chi kapta li an xtala'alhin mala'mixinikalhcha.
61001010	T'ala'awnin, an Dios tat'asanin chi tasakxtun. K'at'at'axt'unit'iti para li katasulhi an la mijatsukuntik'an ch'i ch'unch'a nt'u a't'am k'at'it'a'a't'at'it,
61001011	apalij oxi tukani k'ala'a'ik'ana'it'it laka achat an tan tu a'tam katimin'olh xlich'alhkat an kiJamach'alhkatk'an chi yu kintama'alhtaxtuyan Jesucristo.
61001012	Uxitnan k'ats'a'oyatcha chux aniy chi laj'oximaj'aych'a t'awnat an tan sawalh, yu masunik'ant'it. Pero masi chuncha, kit'in akla'a'tayjuyaw, lhilhiji aklamapast'ak'aniyaw.
61001013	Iklhiwilay li oxi li chuncha k'ilhtuy li klamapast'ak'aniyaw aniy li ikt'ajunka aniy lakaat'un, mu
61001014	an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo kimak'atsaanitacha li watukancha akmakawna ani jatsukunti.
61001015	Xliyu chux yu kalaya ak'ilhtuya', para li lhitala'sicha ajk'atsalh li k'ap'ast'akts'uk'u'alhiya'it'iti masi li akxni kit'in ik'antacha.
61001016	Jantu wa kwentojcha xaklajunt'awnaw akxni an klajunaw li an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo kamina chi kamasuya an ix'alhp'asninti. Kitnan ikla'ts'iwi li ayi an Jesús la kila'chulhk'an.
61001017	Yucha ilhtukalhi li kalhiwilakalh chi ayi kala'ts'inkalh akxni chiwinilh an Dios yu ixPay, yu ay, najun: Aniy yucha yu ikmapayniy kinTs'alh, sawalhcha ikt'a'achani yucha.
61001018	Kitnan ik'asmatwi akxni chiwinkalh an lakt'iyan akxni xakt'awnaw ali an Jesús an tan stalan'a a'stitawk'a.
61001019	Xliyu oxi tukani li kiklaka'iyaw an yu tanawlh an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios chi sawalhcha oxi li uxitnan oxi k'ach'a'o'at anu chiwinti. Chuncha tacha wa la'atamcha pumaklhku kajuna yu mapulhkuy tan puts'ista sta li katunkunlhicha. Tacha an st'aku yu tawlay akxni wa ts'isinka, chuncha katalhiminiyan yu sast'i jatapulhkunu la mijalhunutk'an.
61001020	Task'iniy li k'ak'ats'at'iti li ntu xamati wa x'akstucha lay katilhi'ilhtulh tani yu nawputuncha an ixchiwinti Dios yu ma'anchacha ts'o'kanta.
61001021	Tacha an najunta ixchiwinti Dios jantu tu'u yu wa yucha an lapanakcha chuncha kanawputulh. Chunchuniya yu tapasalh, an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios yucha an Diosi jajunilh tani katanawlhcha, yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini jamachiwinilh.
61002001	Yu ma'anchacha xjuntachalh ta'alilhi yu ntu sawalh yucha an ixchiwinti Dios xtamasuy an la'acha'an Israel, chuncha wachu kata'alina an t'an t'awnat'it. Jant'u k'at'ik'ats'at'iti uxitnan, yu'uncha yu ntucha sawalhi katitamasunin, wa katalakt'ilhiyancha. Sta layi katamakawna an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, yu mapalalh li k'at'a'alht'axt'ut. Pero li chuncha talay yu'uncha wa palaycha wa las tat'asa'iy li kajalakt'ilhikalhcha.
61002002	Xluwk'ani yu katach'a'o'aya tacha an wa tani talaycha. Chi xkwentajk'an yu'uncha li kata'alina yu wa aya katalhichiwininacha an xatij an yu sawalh.
61002003	Yu talakask'in ani yu ntu sawalh maestrojnin wa katamaxtuniyancha mintumink'an laka ja'o'xcho'onti. Pero an Dios ma'anchacha jamala'asijninita la'atam lhima'alh'ajna chi kajalakt'ilhiya'.
61002004	An Dios jantu jamak'akxanilhi an angelhnin an yu ta'ilhtulh xtala'alhink'an, jamala'achalhi la'nin chi jama'axta'lhi li kajama'anukalhi tan wa s'oya'cha junita, sta li kachinacha ixpaku li kalats'awalakanacha.
61002005	Wachu ntu jamak'akxanilhi an yu ma'anchacha xtat'ajun lakamunulhpa', ay a'muxtuti jamakminilh. Wa yucha an Noeje ma'alhtaxtulh, yu xjamak'atsaaninin tani yu oxicha tsukukan, chi xpumatujunk'an ali lapanakni.
61002006	An Dios wachu jamama'alh'ajnilhi an la'acha'an Sodoma chi an la'acha'an Gomorra wanaj lhk'ak'a ja'ilhtu'olh. Ani la'acha'anaxni pumasukancha tani kaja'ilhtukanacha an yu ntu tala'ts'imputun an Dios.
61002007	Pero an Dios la xpujan ani la'acha'anaxni ma'alhtaxtulhi an Lot, pumatam yu oxi lapanak yu ntucha wanaj oxi xtama'ank'atsay an tacha wa tani xtalaycha an lapanakni.
61002008	An Lot oxi lapanaki ixjunita, pero an xjalhunut jantucha k'is oxi xk'atsan. Wa xliyu tacha an xjala'ts'incha xtalay chi tacha an xja'alha'asmat'acha lhilhij an lapanakni an yu wa tani xtalaycha.
61002009	Ani anchacha putasuy li an Dios layi jama'alhtaxtuy laka tanlhun yu la'lhima'anxkay an yu tama'axta'niy sawalh xjatsukuntik'an. Pero wachu k'atsayi tani jalhimama'alh'ajnicha an yu wa tani talaycha li chaway wa tapakxan'iyka akxni kachinacha yu xpujun'alhincha xlima'alh'ajnatk'an.
61002010	An Dios palay kajamama'alh'ajniya ixchuxk'an an yu wa yuchacha talhakapu'an tani k'atsancha ixlakatunajk'an chi tala'amaj'ancha an xlich'alhkat Dios. Yu'uncha sawalhcha tajunita chi ntucha k'is tala'acha'an, jantucha tatalhanani wa aya tajuniy an yu tach'alhkatnan talhman.
61002011	An angelhnin yu'uncha palay laj'k'ut'ilin chi laj'alhp'asnin, an yu ntu sawalh li maestrojnin yu'uncha jantu. Walh chi an angelhnin yu'uncha ntu tu'u wa ayacha katalhimuk'alh la x'ukxlakapu an Dios an yu tach'alhkatnan talhman.
61002012	Ani yu tanajun li maestrojnin wa aya tajuniya li yu ntu talhimacha'xay. Wa tacha wa jatapakxatcha talay jantu tajatapastaknan, wa tacha wa tatsukuycha para li wa kajama'alhilakalhcha chi kajama'nikalhcha, chi chuncha katat'axajtachalh tacha an jatapakxat.
61002013	Yu'uncha ta'ilhtuniya yu ntu oxi an ali'in chi wanajcha chuni kajamapalhnicho'okana yu'uncha. Sawalhcha talhi'achani ta'ilhtuy wa tuchicha tapast'ak'a tan lhichux jala'ts'inkan; akxni tat'alakwaynan, yu'uncha mu tajasmala'anan pus tamamaxaniyan, mu talhismanitacha wa tani talaycha wanaj tapulakt'ilhi'ojoyi chux an tanlhun.
61002014	Jantu lay wa sa' tala'ts'ini xamati t'aku li ntu kata'alhalhalhi la xjalakawantik'an, ali ali ta'ilhtuyi xtala'alhink'an. Tama'ilhtuyi li kata'ilhtulhi xtala'alhink'an an lapanakni yu ntu oxi takiklaka'ita Dios, wa sawalhcha talhitsukuputun an tanlhun, yu'uncha katala'a'iya an lhima'alh'ajna.
61002015	Tamakawlhi an yu oxi tij chi lh'awitcha tach'axpatanulhi an tan pu'alh an Balaam, ists'alh Bosor, yu sawalhcha ix'achani li xmapalhnikan li tu'u x'ilhtuy yu ntu oxi.
61002016	An Balaam la'a'aymakalhi ixlakata an xtala'alhin. Masi an burrojnin jantu tachiwiniy, la'atam janatiburro xa'alalh tacha chiwiniy pumatam lapanak chi juniy li ntucha oxi tacha xlat'ajun. Chunchacha jantucha ali ilhtulh yu wa xlilokojcha an Balaam.
61002017	Ani yu ntu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios xtalhichiwiniy, wa tacha wa la'x'atijnincha yu ntu tu'u tapujats'alata xkan chi wa tacha wa jataputs'icha yu wa jasunmaj'an an un. An Dios jamala'asijninita tan wa s'oya'cha wilh chi xpujun'alhincha.
61002018	Talhipuxkawniya tani katalhima'an'a'nilhcha la xchiwintik'an an lapanakni, yucha ntu tu'u lhitapalay. Chi ta'o'xcho'oycha an yu xtakikla'icha sawalh an Dios para li wachucha kata'ilhtulhi yu wa ixlakatunajchak'an sawalh ilhtuputun.
61002019	Chi tajunicha li katamakawtijlayacha yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun, walh yu'uncha ntu lay tamakawtijlay. Mu tuchicha yu laklhajayan yucha yu nt'ulay k'amak'awt'ijla.
61002020	Yu'uncha tamispalhcha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo. Chuncha xtamakawtijlatacha tacha an wa stakcha alin tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi aniy lakamunulhpa'. Pero li a'tam jama'alhilapalay chi a'tam jalaklhajapalayi an tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi, palaycha wa tani katalayacha. Walh jantu akxni wa xlip'ulhnajka'.
61002021	Palay oxi ntu a'tam kaxtamispalh an yu oxi tij, mu chaway li tamispalhcha, chi tamakawpalayi an la'stalan'a lhamap'a'sin yu tala'a'ilh.
61002022	Aniy lapanakni taputapasaycha sawalhi tacha an najunta an jatapast'ak'at: "An x'oy yu p'at'an, upalayi an ixp'at'at," chi "An p'axni masi yu sp'uyjcha paxakan ampalay tajunu an laka pux'otu."
61003001	T'ala'awnin, ani yucha yu xli'a'xt'uycha kartaj iklats'o'niyaw. Ani a'xt'uy kartaj klats'o'niw, para li an la kijamap'a'sinti oxi k'ap'ujalakp'ast'aknant'it.
61003002	Iklakask'in li k'ap'ast'akt'iti yu tanawlh an la'stalan'an lapanakni yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios yu ma'anchacha. K'ap'ast'akt'iti yu kintalhijunin an kiJamach'alhkatk'an chi kiJama'alhtaxtunuk'an la xkilhnik'an an yu jamala'achachalh yu xtalhichiwiniy xchiwinti.
61003003	Lhitask'iniya li k'ak'ats'at'iti tuchini katapasayacha akxni lakxati'astancha wilhchan kajuna': kata'alina yu wa tanlhuncha yu ntu laj'oxi sawalh kata'ilhtuputuna'. Chi kata'ilhtuya', chi wa katajamamaxanininacha,
61003004	katanawna: "Yucha nawlh li kamincho'oya', pero, ¿tisuncha tapasay chawayi? Jantucha a'tam mincho'oy. An kilakpaynink'an talaknilhcha chi an lakamunulhpa wachunchacha taylhi'anta sta akxni ilhtukalh."
61003005	Aniy lapanakni jantu talhakapu'amputuni li sta yu ma'anchacha tukan xjuntachalh ix'alincha an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un. La xchiwinti an Diosi makxajnichilh an lakaat'un an lakxkan chi xtan'ajnicha an lakxkani sa' ulata.
61003006	Wachu yu ma'anchacha x'alimpalay lakaamunulhpa laka ay a'muxtuti lakt'ilhikalh.
61003007	Chi chaway wanajcha yu an ixchiwinti Diosi japuma'akanta an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un, wa jama'akantacha para li akxni kachinacha wilhchan li kalats'awalayacha an tanlhun an Dios, kajamak'anacha laka jikmi, chi an yu ntu takiklaka'iy Dios wanajcha chuni kaja'ilhtukana'.
61003008	T'ala'awnin, aniy jant'u k'ak'apmaj'ant'it: an Jamach'alhkat, tam wilhchan, yucha tacha tam milh k'ata la'ts'in, chi tam milh k'ata, tacha tam wilhchan.
61003009	Jantu wa xliyu an Jamach'alhkat sawalhcha kata'a'ma'alhi kamuktaxtulh yu najun li ka'ilhtuya', tacha past'ak'a an lapanak. Yu tapasay wa xliyu an Dios sawalhcha kintama'ach'ixniyan, mu ntu la'a'iy li xamati kats'an'alh chi lakask'in li ixchuxk'ani katamapaxalh an xjalhunutk'an chi katamakawlhcha xtala'alhink'an.
61003010	Tuchi wilhchancha kamincho'oya an Jamach'alhkat jantu xamati k'atsay, tacha akxni min xamati ja'alhawna'. An lakt'iyan kala'mixa'. Akxni chunchacha katapasaya wanaj p'asi kamakat'awnanta, lhitalhan, chi chux yu ancha alinachalh kala'xawa'okana'. Chi an lakaat'un wanaj kala'xawa'okana chi chux yu ancha lak'alin.
61003011	Mu li chux aniy tanlhun kalakt'ilhi'okana, pus sawalhcha la'stalan'ani k'ats'uk'ut chi oxicha sawalhi k'at'ajalht'anant'it an Dios.
61003012	K'ap'akxan'it'iti akxni kachinacha xwilhchan an Dios, chi li wa laycha k'alhip'uxk'awnit'iti tani lascha kalhimilh. Anchunu wilhchan an lakt'iyan kala'xawakana chi an yu ancha lak'alin wanaj kala'pupu'oya la x'alhp'asninti an jikmi.
61003013	Pero kitnan pakxan'iyaw yu sast'icha lakt'iyan chi yu sast'icha lakaat'un, tacha an Dios kintajunin tan wa sicha yu laj'oxi tanlhun ka'alina'.
61003014	T'ala'awnin, pus li p'akxan'it'at'iti akxni chunchacha katapasaya, lhitala'si k'alhits'uk'ut amijatsukuntik'an, li nt'uch'a t'u'u k'alhits'uk'ut mintala'alhink'an chi wa oxicha k'at'a'aklats'uk'ut an Dios.
61003015	K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti li tacha an sawalh tima'ach'ixa an kiJamach'alhkatk'an wa xliyu kata'alhtaxtuw. Wanajcha chun wachu', tats'o'nitani an kint'ala'ajunk'an Pablo tacha yu xta'nilhcha jatapast'ak'at an Dios.
61003016	Chux an la xkartaj an Pablo yucha aniy laktanlhuni talhixa'alayan, masi an ali la'lhima'anxkayi lhimacha'xakan. Xliyu an yu ntu tak'atsay chi an yu ntu oxi takiklaka'iy wa tani talhimacha'xaycha yu ntu chun, chi chuncha tat'alapalay an ali ixchiwinti Dios, wa akstu japulakt'ilhikancha.
61003017	Xliyu'u t'ala'awnin, mu uxitnan k'ats'ayatcha ani laktanlhun, k'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, para li ntu katapuxa'alhi'ani la xmaslakatintik'an an yu ntu oxi tat'ajun chi katamamakawnincha li oxich'a k'iklak'a'it'at Dios.
61003018	Apalij wa palay ali oxi k'amisp'at an kiJamach'alhkatk'an chi yu kintama'alhtaxtutan Jesucristo chi palay katasulhi an xjamapayninti Dios la mijatsukuntik'an. ¡Yucha ayi kala'ts'inkalh chaway chi wa ta wanancha! Chunchacha kawalh.
62001001	Yu ixjunitacha xlip'ulhnaj, yu ik'alha'asmattawcha, yu kla'ts'intawcha la kila'chulhk'an, yu sa'cha kla'ts'iw chi la kimakachak'ani ikch'apacha'aw, yucha an chiwinti yu xt'a'a jatsukunti.
62001002	Ani jatsukunti talakasulh, kitnan ikla'ts'iw chi iklhichiwininawi yu yucha ixlakata, chi klamak'atsaaniyawi uxitnan ani jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy, yu ixt'awilhchalh an ixPay chi kintatalakasunincha.
62001003	Pus, klamak'atsaaniyawi yu ikla'ts'intaw chi ik'asmattaw, para li uxitnan akilat'atala'xto'wicha, tacha kitnan ikt'atala'xto'taw an kimPayk'an Dios chi an Jesucristo, isTs'alh.
62001004	Iklats'o'niyawi aniy tanlhun, para li an ki'achatk'an a'tsayi kawalh.
62001005	Yucha aniy chiwinti yu ik'alha'asmattaw an Jesucristo, chi chaway uxitnancha iklamak'atsaaniyaw. Yucha najun: An Dios yucha jatapulhkunu', yucha ntu k'is tu'u lhit'ajun jatats'isni.
62001006	Li nawnawi li yucha t'atala'xt'o'aw, chi tan lakaaputs'isni t'awnaw, wa maslakatininawcha, chi ntu ilhtuyawi an yu sawalh,
62001007	pero li laka jatapulhkunu t'awnaw, tacha yucha laka jatapulhkunu t'ajun, wanaj tala'xto'otaw. Chi an xjak'alhni an Jesucristo, an sTs'alh Dios, kintamala'mixini'oyani chux kintala'alhink'an.
62001008	Li nawnaw li ntu tu'u lhit'awnaw kintala'alhink'an, wa ki'akstuchak'ani o'xcho'okanaw, chi an yu sawalh tu lhit'awnaw.
62001009	Li alhtasuyawi kintala'alhink'an, mu an Dios yucha layi kakiklaka'iw chi sawalhi yu najun, akintamala'mixiniyani kintala'alhink'an chi akintamala'mixiniyani chux yu ntu oxi.
62001010	Li nawnawi li ntu tu'u ilhtutaw kintala'alhink'an, an Dios tachanu wa maslakatinicha ilhtuyaw, chi an xchiwinti jantu tu'u lhit'awnaw.
62002001	Aniy tanlhun klats'o'niyaw, ixlakata li nt'u k'a'ilht'ut'iti mintala'alhink'ani kijas'at'an, chi li xamati ilhtuy xtala'alhin lhit'awnawi yu akintalhi'a'tayjuyan x'ukxlakapu an kimPayk'an, yucha an Cristo, yucha oxi lapanak.
62002002	An Jesucristo ma'nikalh para li akintamala'mixinikani kintala'alhink'an, chi ntu wa yucha an kintala'alhinchak'ani lhinilh, wachu an xtala'alhink'an an ali'in lapanakni ta xlijalhi'ay aniy lakaamunulhpa'.
62002003	Li asmatniyawi an xlamap'a'sin an Dios chunchacha yu laycha kanawnaw li mispayawcha an Dios.
62002004	Yu najun: kit'in ikmispay, pero li ntu ma'ayi an xlamap'a'sin, yucha wa maslakatinincha chi an yu sawalh jantu lhit'ajun.
62002005	Pero yu ma'ayi an ixchiwinti Dios, yucha sawalhcha li oxicha pujun la xjatsukunti an xjamapayninti Dios. Chi chunchacha ikpuk'atsaayaw li t'atala'xto'tawcha an Dios.
62002006	Yu najuni li t'atala'xto'tacha an Dios, tacha ixt'ajuncha an Jesucristojo katsukulh.
62002007	T'ala'awnin, ani klats'o'niyaw lhamap'a'sin jantu wa sast'ika', wanajcha yu yu p'ulhch'a la'a'it ma'anchacha. Ani yu ma'anchacha lhamap'a'sin yucha yu asmatt'atcha chiwinti.
62002008	Atumpaj ani klats'o'nit'awnaw yucha sast'i lhamap'a'sin chi yucha yu sawalh, tasuyi la xjatsukunti an Cristo chi la mijatsukuntik'an, mu an jatats'isni la'mixt'ajuncha, chi mapulhkuycha an yu sawalh jatapulhkunu'.
62002009	Yu najuni li lakaapulhkunu t'ajun, pero li xkajiya xt'ala'ajun, lakaaputs'isnika t'ajun.
62002010	Yu mapayniya xt'ala'ajun, tan pulhkuyi tsuku'alhiy chi la xjatsukunti jantu tu'u lay katipu'ayst'uk'ukalh.
62002011	Pero yu xkajiya xt'ala'ajun lakaaputs'isni aklat'ajun chi yucha put'ajun, chi ntu k'atsay tanchuncha ti'an, mu an jatats'isni mala'lhtululata.
62002012	Kijas'at'an, uxitnani klats'o'niyaw, mu an Dios, lhimala'puchajuncha an Jesucristo, tamala'mixinincha mintala'alhink'an.
62002013	Xalakpaynin, uxitnan klats'o'niyaw, mu uxitnan misp'ayatcha an yu ixt'ajuncha ma'anchacha. Uxitnani ts'alan, iklats'o'niyaw, mu lhajat'atcha an yu wa ay junita.
62002014	Kijas'at'an, uxitnan klats'o'nitawcha, mu misp'ayatcha an mimPayk'an. Uxitnani xalakpaynin, iklats'o'nitaw mu uxitnan misp'ayatcha an yu p'ulhnaj tukan t'ajun ma'anchacha. Chi uxitnani ts'alan, wachu iklats'o'nitaw, mu uxitnan lajk'ut'ilin ch'i la'a'it'iti an ixchiwinti Dios la mijalhunutk'an ch'i lhajat'iti an yu wa ay junita.
62002015	Jant'u k'amap'aynit'iti an lakaamunulhpa', chi an tanlhuncha an yu ancha lak'alin. Li xamati mapayniya an lakamunulhpa, jantu lhit'ajuni an xjamapayninti kimPayk'an,
62002016	mu chux yu alin an lakamunulhpa, tacha an wa tanlhuncha lakpastakkan ilhtuputunkan chi tacha an achanicha an la'chulh chi an tanlhuncha yu pu'ayaj k'atsakan, jantu yu an kimPayk'ani xt'a'a, wa yucha an lakamunulhpacha xt'a'a.
62002017	Chi an lakamunulhpa yucha wa la'pusa chi chux tacha an tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi lakask'in aniy lakaamunulhpa', pero yu ilhtuyi tacha an yu oxi lhiwilay an Dios, katsuku'alhiya'.
62002018	Kijas'at'an, chaway yucha yu xati'astancha panch'e'ex. Uxitnan asmatt'atcha li kamina an yu ntu cristo sawalh, pus chaway chun, lhuwcha yu ntu sawalh cristojnin tatalakasuta. Xliyuchacha lhik'atsayaw li ani panch'e'ex xati'astancha.
62002019	Yu'uncha tan t'awnawi tataxtulh, pero yu'uncha ntu sawalhi li yu tacha kitnan, mu li sawalhi li tacha kitnan kaxtawalh, xakintat'atamakajun. Li tataxtulh yu'uncha wa xliyu li katasulhi li ntu ixchuxk'ani yu de kitnan sawalh.
62002020	Pero uxitnan, Cristojo tataxta'nitan an Takuwin, ch'i misp'a'oyat'iti chux an laktanlhun.
62002021	Ani klats'o'niyaw jantu wa xliyu li nt'uch'a misp'ayat'iti an yu sawalh, klats'o'niyaw wa xliyu misp'ayat, ch'i k'ats'ayat'iti li ntu tu'u maslakatinti katiminchalh tan sawalh.
62002022	¿Tisiyucha yu wa maslakatinini? Yucha an yu najun li an Jesús jantu yu Cristo. Yucha an yu ntu cristo sawalhi chuncha najun, mu yucha najuni li ntu tu'u t'ajun an Dios chi an isTs'alh.
62002023	Watichicha yu najuni li ntu tu'u t'ajun an isTs'alh Dios wachu ntu tu'u lhit'ajun an ixPay; pero yu najuni li t'ajuni an isTs'alh Dios wachu lhit'ajuni an ixPay.
62002024	Xliyu uxitnan k'ama'at'iti la mijalhunutk'an an chiwinti yu asmatt'it sta akxni a'taynichalh; ch'i li ma'ayat'iti la mijalhunutk'an yu asmatt'it sta akxni a'taynichalh, uxitnan wach'u k'at'at'ala'xt'o'alhiya'it'iti an isTs'alh Dios chi an ixPay.
62002025	An yu kintajunan li akintaxta'niyan an Jesucristo, yucha an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
62002026	Iklats'o'nit'awnaw ixlakata an yu wa ta'o'xcho'oputunan.
62002027	Pero uxitnan lhit'awnat'iti an Stalan'a Takuwin yu an Jesucristo tapustalan'atan, ch'i nt'u ma'lht'ask'iniyat'iti li xamati katamasunin, mu an Takuwin an yu yucha taxta'nitan tamasuniyani ixlakata chux an laktanlhun, chi tacha an lakmasuy sawalh, jantu wa maslakatinti. Wa k'at'at'ala'xt'o'alhit'itcha an Cristo, tacha yu tamasunitancha an Takuwin.
62002028	Chawayi kijas'at'an wa k'at'at'ala'xt'o'alhitcha an Cristo, walh lani akxni katalakasuyacha lhi'acha ka'anaw la x'ukxlakapu', jantu kati'oswi la kimaxantik'an akxni kamina'.
62002029	Chaway li k'ats'ayatcha uxitnan li an Jesucristo yucha ntu tu'u xtala'alhin wach'u k'ak'ats'at'iti li ixchuxk'an an yu oxi tanlhun ta'ilhtuy la xjatsukuntik'an, xjas'at'an Dios.
62003001	K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti tacha wa kintitamapayniyancha an kimPayk'an Dios, para li lay akintajunkan xjas'at'an Dios, xliyu an lakaamunulhpa ntu kintamispayan, mu an lakaamunulhpa ntu mispayi an Dios.
62003002	T'ala'awnin, chaway kitnan xjas'at'ancha Dios. Chi masi ntuka' tasuyi tani kajunawcha xli'astan, k'atsaayawi li akxni an Jesucristo katalakasuyacha, kitnan wachucha chuni kajunaw tacha yucha, mu kala'ts'inawcha tani yu junita yucha.
62003003	Chi chux yu pakxan'iya an Cristo, x'akstucha stalan'an, tacha an Jesucristo stalan'a.
62003004	Chux yu ilhtuyi tala'alhin, ilhtuyi yu ntu oxi; mu an tala'alhin yucha yu ntu oxi.
62003005	Uxitnan k'ats'ayatcha li an Jesucristo kilachilh aniy lakaamunulhpa para li akintama'osunini kintala'alhink'an, chi yucha ntu tu'u lhit'ajun xtala'alhin.
62003006	Chux yu t'a'aklatsuku'alhi, jantucha ali taylhi'ani xtala'alhin; chux yu ilhtuyi tala'alhin, jantu la'ts'inta chi ntu mispay.
62003007	Kijas'at'an, jantu xamati kata'o'xcho'on, yu ilhtuyi yu laj'oxi tanlhun oxi t'ajun, tacha an Jesucristo oxi t'ajun.
62003008	Yu taylhi'ani ilhtuy tala'alhin yucha t'a'an an xapay makxkay un; mu an xapay makxkay un yucha yu ilhtulh tala'alhin akxni a'taynichalh. Xliyu lhikilachilh an isTs'alh Dios, para li kalakt'ilhinilhi an tanlhuncha lak'ilhtuy an xapay makxkay un.
62003009	Jantu xamati yu xjas'at'a Dios ali taylhi'an xtala'alhin, mu lhit'ajuni an xjatsukunti Dios, pus tu lay ali katitaylhi'alhi xtala'alhin mu xjas'at'acha Dios.
62003010	K'atsakani tichini yu'unchacha ixjas'at'an an Dios chi tichini yu'unchacha ixjas'at'an an xapay makxkay un, mu watichicha yu ntu ilhtuyi yu oxi u ntu mapayniya xt'ala'ajun, jantu Diosi t'a'an.
62003011	Yucha aniy chiwinti yu asmatt'at sta akxni a'taynichalh: li kalamapaynipaxaw.
62003012	Jantu kajunwi tacha an Caín, yucha xapay makxkay un xt'a'an pus ma'nilhi an xt'ala'ajun. ¿Chi tasu'u li ma'nilhcha? Wa xliyu li an tanlhuncha xlak'ilhtuy an Caín jantu laj'oxi, chi an yu xlak'ilhtuy an xt'ala'ajun yucha chun.
62003013	Kint'ala'awnin, jant'u k'alhi'a'nit'iti li an yu wa lakamunulhpa tat'ajun taxkayan.
62003014	Kitnan la'pustawcha laka lhinin, cha'antawcha laka jatsukunti, chi k'atsayaw, mu jamapayniyawi an kijat'ala'awnink'an. Yu ntu jamapayninin, nitaka'.
62003015	Chux yu xkaji xt'ala'ajun, jama'nini', chi uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li ntu xamati jama'niniy katilhitsukulh an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
62003016	Mispayawi tanyucha jamapayninti, mu an Jesucristo xta'lhi xjatsukunti kilakatak'an, pus wanajcha chun, kitnan kaxta'wi kijatsukuntik'an ixlakatak'an an kijat'ala'awnink'an.
62003017	Li xamati lhit'ajun xtumin chi la'ts'ini xt'ala'ajun li ma'lhtask'iniya la'a'tayjun chi li ntu tu'u lhi'a'tayjuy ¿tasicha lay kalhitsukuya xjamapayninti Dios la xjalhunuti?
62003018	Kijas'at'an, jantu wa laka chiwinti kawalh an kijamapaynintik'an, laka tanlhuncha yu tasuyi ka'ilhtuw.
62003019	Chunchacha kapuk'atsayaw li kitnan t'alhtanantaw an yu sawalh, chi la x'ukxlakapu an Dios lhitala'si kak'atsanaw,
62003020	pus mu li an kijalhunutk'an tu'u kinta'alhtasuyan, an Dios yucha palay ay chi yucha k'atsa'ojoy, an kijalhunutk'an jantu.
62003021	T'ala'awnin, li an kijalhunutk'an jantu tu'u kintalhi'alhtasuyan, lhitala'si k'atsanaw la x'ukxlakapu Dios;
62003022	chi yucha akintaxta'niyani chux yu kask'iniyaw, mu kiklaka'iyawi an xlamap'a'sin chi ilhtuyawi yu oxi lhiwilay.
62003023	Chi an xlamap'a'sin najun li kakiklaka'iwi an isTs'alh, yu junkan Jesucristo, chi li kalamapaynipaxaw tacha yucha kintalhijunin.
62003024	Yu ta'asmatniya an xlamap'a'sin Dios, yuchaa an Diosi taput'ajun. Chi yucha, yuchaa japut'ajun. Chi chunchunicha puk'atsayaw li yucha kintaput'awnan: ixlakata an xTakuwin an yu kintaxta'nitan.
62004001	T'ala'awnin klamapayniyaw, jantu chux takuwini k'ajak'iklak'a'it'it, k'ajalhila'ts'int'anut'iti an takuwinin li Dios sawalhi xnawinin, mu lhuwi tat'ajun aniy lakamunulhpa yu ntu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios talhichiwiniy.
62004002	Chunchuniya k'ap'uk'ats'aya'it tichini yu xTakuwincha Dios lhit'ajun: Chux yu najuni li an Jesucristo kijunchilh sawalhi lapanak, yucha lhit'ajuni an xTakuwin Dios.
62004003	Yu najuni li ntu sawalhi li chuncha kilachilh an Jesús, jantu lhit'ajuni an xTakuwin Dios, yucha lhit'ajun ixtakuwin an yu ntu cristo sawalh. Uxitnan asmatt'atcha li ani takuwin kamina', chaway anicha lakamunulhpa t'ajun.
62004004	Kijas'at'an, uxitnan xnawin Dios chi jalhajat'atcha an yu wa tamaslakatinin, mu an yu tat'a'aklat'awnan palay alhp'as walh jantu an yu t'ajun lakamunulhpa'.
62004005	Yu'uncha wa de lakamunulhpa'; xliyu yu wa de aniy lakamunulhpa talhichiwiniy, chi an yu wa de lakamunulhpacha yu'uncha ta'asmatni.
62004006	Kitnan xnawinin Dios, yu mispayi an Dios kinta'asmatniyan, pero yu ntu xnawin an Dios jantu kinta'asmatniyan. Chunchacha yu lay puk'atsayaw tichini yu lhit'ajuncha an Takuwin yu sawalh chi tichini yu lhit'ajuncha an takuwin yu wa ja'o'xcho'onun.
62004007	T'ala'awnin, kalamapaynipaxaw, mu an jamapayninti xnawin Dios. Chux yu jamapayninin yucha xjas'at'a Dios chi mispayi Dios.
62004008	Yu ntu jamapayninin jantu mispayi Dios, mu an Dios yucha jamapayninti.
62004009	An Dios masulhi xjamapayninti kilakatak'an akxni mala'achachalh aniy lakamunulhpa an isTs'alh masi wa ix'akstu para li kapulhitsukuwi jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
62004010	An jamapayninti chunchunicha nawputun: Jantu wa xliyu kitnancha mapayniw an Dios, yucha yu kintamapaynin kitnan, chi mala'achachalhi an isTs'alh para li kalha'ulanankalh chi ma'nikalhcha para li an kintala'alhink'an akintamala'mixinikan.
62004011	Kint'ala'awnin, li Dios chuncha kintamapayniyan, kitnan wanajcha chun, kalamapaynipaxaw.
62004012	Jantu xamati a'tam la'ts'inta Dios. Li lamapaynipaxayaw an Dios kintat'a'aklat'awnan chi an xjamapayninti kintaputasuyancha sawalh.
62004013	Tan putasuyi li kitnan pu'aklat'awnawi an Dios chi yucha kintaput'awnani kitnan, wa xliyu kintaxta'nitan an xTakuwin.
62004014	Chi kitnani la'ts'inaw chi nawnaw li an xaPay mala'achachalhi an isTs'alh para li kama'alhtaxtulhi an lakamunulhpa'.
62004015	Watichicha yu najuni li an Jesús yucha isTs'alh Dios, t'a'aklat'ajuni an Dios chi an Dios wachu t'a'aklat'ajuni yucha.
62004016	Chi kitnan mispayaw chi kiklaka'iyawi an xjamapayninti an Dios yu kintaxta'niyan. An Dios yucha jamapayninti chi yu t'a'aklatsuku'alhiya an jamapayninti, t'a'aklatsuku'alhiya an Dios, chi an Dios wachu t'a'aklatsuku'alhiya an lapanak.
62004017	An jamapayninti chunchacha yu wanajcha kintaputasuyan sawalh kitnan, para li akxni kajasakxtununacha an Dios lhitala'si kak'atsaw, mu kitnan aniy lakamunulhpa tacha an Jesucristojo juntaw.
62004018	Tan alini jamapayninti jantu alini talhanti, an oxi jamapayninti tamakxtuyi an talhanti. Yu talhanan pakxan'i ma'alh'ajnat, wa xliyu ntuka' oxi lhitsukuy an jamapayninti.
62004019	Kitnan mapayniyawi an Dios, mu yucha p'ulhnaj kintamapaynin.
62004020	Li xamati najun: "kit'in ikmapayniya an Dios", pero li xkajiya ixt'ala'ajun, wa maslakatinincha. Mu li ntu mapayniya ixt'ala'ajun yu lay la'ts'in, jantu layi katimapaynilh an Dios yu ntu lay la'ts'in.
62004021	An Jesucristo kintaxta'nin ani lhamap'a'sin: Yu mapayniya Dios wachu kamapaynilhi ixt'ala'ajun.
62005001	Chux yu kiklaka'iya li an Jesús yucha Cristo, yucha ixjas'at'a Dios. Chi yu mapayniya pumatam xapay wachu jamapayniniya an ixjas'at'an.
62005002	Akxni mapayniyawi Dios chi ilhtuyawi yu lhinajun, k'atsaayawi li wachu jamapayniyawi an ixjas'at'an an Dios.
62005003	Li mapaynikan Dios nawputun li kakiklaka'inikalhi an xlamap'a'sin; chi an xlamap'a'sin jantu lhima'anxkayi muktaxtukan,
62005004	mu chux yu xjas'at'a Dios laklhajayi an lakamunulhpa'. Chi an kijakiklaka'intik'an kinta'ilhtuyancha li kalhajawi an lakamunulhpa'.
62005005	Yu kiklaka'iya li an Jesús yucha isTs'alh Dios, laklhajayi an lakamunulhpa'.
62005006	Aniy yucha Jesucristo, yu pukilachilh xkan chi jak'alhni, jantu wa xkancha pukilachilh, xkan chi jak'alhni pukilachilh. An Takuwin yucha la'ts'ilh chi najuni yu ani ixlakata, chi yu najun ani Takuwin yucha sawalh.
62005007	Xt'utunk'ani awint'i lakt'iyan tala'ts'ilh. Yucha an xaPay chi an Chiwinti chi an Stalan'a Takuwin. Chi ani xt'utunk'an wa pumatam.
62005008	Chi an lakaat'un xt'utunk'an wachu tamasuy yu sawalh: Yucha an Takuwin chi an xkan chi an jak'alhni, chi ani xt'utunk'an wa tami tak'atsay.
62005009	Li la'a'iyawi an yu tanajun tu'u yu tak'atsay an lapanakni, pus an yu najun Dios, palaycha lhitapalay, mu aniy chiwinti yu najun an Dios yucha yu lhichiwiniy ixlakata an isTs'alh.
62005010	Yu kiklaka'iya an isTs'alh Dios, lhit'ajuni aniy chiwinti, yu ntu kiklaka'iya an Dios, wa maslakatinicha ilhtuy an Dios, mu ntu kiklaka'iya an Dios tacha an lhichiwiniy an isTs'alh.
62005011	Yucha aniya an yu jamak'atsaanininkan: Li an Dios kintaxta'nitani jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam in'ojoy chi ani jatsukunti yucha an isTs'alhi lhit'ajun.
62005012	Yu lhit'ajuni an isTs'alh Dios, lhit'ajuni an jatsukunti, yu ntu lhit'ajuni an isTs'alh Dios jantu lhit'ajuni an jatsukunti.
62005013	Uxitnani klats'o'niyaw yu k'iklak'a'iyat an isTs'alh Dios, para li k'ak'ats'at'iti li lhit'awnat'iti jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh.
62005014	Lhila'siyawi an Dios, mu k'atsayawi li tu'u sk'iniyaw tacha yu yucha lakask'in, kinta'asmatniyan.
62005015	Chi tacha k'atsayawi li an Dios asmat'a kintapaynitk'an, wachu k'atsayawi li lhit'awnawcha yu sk'initaw.
62005016	Li xamati la'ts'in xt'ala'ajun li ilhtut'ajuni tu'u xtala'alhin yu ntu kalhi'an laka lhinin, kalhitapaynilh. Chi an Dios kaxta'niya jatsukunti an yu lhitapaynikan, yucha li an tala'alhin jantu yu yu kalhi'an laka lhinin. Alini tala'alhin yu kalhi'an laka lhinin, yu yucha ani tala'alhin jantu iknajuni li kalhitapaynikalh.
62005017	Chux yu ntu oxi yucha tala'alhin, pero alini tala'alhin yu ntu kalhi'an laka lhinin.
62005018	K'atsayawi li yu Diosi put'ajun, jantucha ali ilhtuyi ixtala'alhin, mu an isTs'alh Dios lhistakta, pus an yu wa ay junita jantu lay ch'apayachalh.
62005019	K'atsayawi li kitnan xnawinin Dios, chi li chux an lakaamunulhpa yucha an yu wa ay junita a'ch'apata.
62005020	Chi wachu k'atsayawi li an isTs'alh Dios kilachilh chi kinta'ilhtuni li kalhimacha'xawi tichini yu Dioscha sawalh. Kitnan t'atala'xto'tawcha an yu sawalh, kanaju an isTs'alh an Dios, an Jesucristo. Yucha aniya yu Dios sawalh chi yucha yu jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh.
62005021	Kijas'at'an, k'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti ixlakatak'an an yu tacha xdiosninchak'an tala'ts'in an lapanakni.
63001001	Kit'in iktata Juan ikla'axa'alayani uxint'i t'aku', yu sakxtutan an Dios chi amijas'at'an yu klamapayniyaw sawalh. Chi ntu wa kit'ini iklamapayniyaw, wachu ixchuxk'an an yu tamispaycha an yu sawalh.
63001002	Iklamapayniyawi uxitnan, ixlakata li lhit'awnawcha an la kijalhunutk'an an yu sawalh chi akintat'a'aklatsuku'alhiyancha.
63001003	An Dios yu xaPay chi an Jesucristo yu isTs'alh kataxta'nini lhuw jamapayninti, chi katamak'akxanin chi kataxta'nini oxi jatawlhnat. xlisawalh chi laka jamapayninti. K'alhits'uk'ut'iti an yu sawalh chi an jamapayninti.
63001004	Sawalhcha ik'achalhi akxni ijkala'cha'alh ali'in amijas'at'an ixlakata li tapu'aklat'ajuni an yu sawalh, tacha an la'a'iw xlamap'a'sin an kimPayk'an.
63001005	Chaway, iklatapaynisk'iniyaw li kalalakmapaynipaxaw. Ani klats'o'niyaw jantu sast'i lhamap'a'sin, yucha an yu la'a'iwcha sta akxni a'taynichalh.
63001006	An jamapayninti yucha li kaputsukukalh an xlamap'a'sin Dios. Chi an lhamap'a'sin, li k'ats'ut'iti laka jamapayninti, tacha yu asmatt'atcha uxitnan sta akxni a'taynichalh.
63001007	Mu lhuw yu wa taja'o'xcho'onuni tat'ajun aniy lakamunulhpa', yu'uncha ntu tanajuni li an Jesucristo kijunchilhi lapanak sawalh. Yu chuncha lay, yuchacha yu an wa ja'o'xcho'onun chi yuchacha yu ntu Cristo sawalh.
63001008	Uxitnan k'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, para li nt'u k'ama'ats'an'at'iti an xajatawk'at an kintapatsatk'an, para li a'tsayi k'ala'a'it yu k'axt'a'nik'ana'it.
63001009	Watichicha yu ts'an'ay chi ntu aklatsuku'alhiya an la xlamap'a'sin an Cristo, jantu lhit'ajuni an Dios; yu aklatsuku'alhiya an la xlamap'a'sin an Cristo, yucha lhit'ajuni an Dios chi an isTs'alh.
63001010	Li xamati tala'cha'anan, chi ntu yu ani lhamap'a'sini talhi'aniyan, jant'u k'ala'a'it'iti la mincha'ak'an ch'i nt'u k'a'unit'iti li oxicha li tala'cha'ancha.
63001011	Mu yu kajuna: ¡Oxich'a li ch'it'acha! T'a'ilhtut'ajuncha yu ntu oxi lak'ilhtuy.
63001012	Wanaj lhuwi yu klats'o'niputunaw, pero ntu klats'o'niputunawi wa laka jalhiki chi laka pats'o'nu. Ikpast'ak'a ak'antacha'aw lala'ts'inin chi wanaj aklat'achiwininaw, para li chuncha a'tsayi kawalh ki'achatk'an.
63001013	An yu lakatamcha tawilananchilh, yu tacha mint'alajamatsank'an uxitnan, yu wachu yucha an Dios jasakxtuta, sawalhcha tala'axa'alayan.
64001001	Kit'in iktata Juan ikla'axa'alayani Gayo, ikmapayniyan sawalh.
64001002	Kint'ala'ajun, iklhisk'iniya an Dios li t'ach'a oxi t'a'un la mintakuwin, wanajcha chuni oxi kawalh watuchicha la mijatsukunti ch'i nt'u k'at'a'an'at'i.
64001003	Sawalhcha ik'achalhi akxni tichi yu'uncha kint'ala'awnink'an takilachilh chi kintajunilhi li xlisawalhi t'aylhip'int'a an tan sawalh.
64001004	Li ik'asmat'a li an kijas'at'an tan sawalhi tajalhtananta, yucha sawalhcha iklhi'achan, atumpaj tu'u jantu.
64001005	Kint'ala'ajun, xlisawalhi t'ach'a an lay, li tu'ucha yu oxi ja'ilht'uniy an ali'in kijat'ala'awnink'an, yu alakatam talakminachalh.
64001006	La x'ukxlakapuk'an an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inincha ancha tanajun tacha sawalhch'a jamap'ayniy. Lamapaynin, k'ajalhi'a't'ay'ut'i tuchini tama'lhtask'inicha, para li katataylhi'alhi xjalhtantik'an, tacha yu oxi lhiwilay an Dios.
64001007	Mu yu'uncha tataxtulh li tatapatsani an Jesucristo, pero ntu tu'u tala'a'i xja'a'tayjuntik'an an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin.
64001008	Xliyu kitnani kajalhakapu'aw yu'uncha, para li kaja'a'tayjuwi li talhichiwiniy an yu sawalh.
64001009	Kit'in ikts'o'lhi a'xtam jalhiki chi ijkamak'anilhi an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inincha, pero an Diótrefes jantu la'a'iya tacha an iknawnaw, mu ancha, yu yu'uncha, yucha yu sawalhcha lhinawputun.
64001010	Xliyu li akxni ak'ananta ajkuna li ntu oxi tacha an lay, mu yucha kilhunt'ajuncha maslakatinti, kintalhichiwinancha; chi ntu wa yu najuni tacha ani lay, jantu jala'a'iya an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu tacha'an, chi yu tala'a'iputun jantu jamakawni chi jatamakxtuycha an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin.
64001011	Kint'ala'ajun, uxint'i jant'u k'ala'ts'ixt'u yu ntu oxi, yu oxi k'a'ilht'u. Yu ilhtuyi yu oxi yucha ixnawin Dios, pero yu ilhtuyi yu ntu oxi, jantu mispayi Dios.
64001012	Ta lhichuxi oxi lhichiwinkan an Demetrio, yu muktaxtuy sawalh tacha an najunta ixchiwinti Dios, chi kitnan wachu oxi iklhichiwinaw, chi k'ats'ayi li tacha an iknawnaw sawalh.
64001013	Wanaj lhuwi yu xajkunin, pero ntu wa ikts'o'putun,
64001014	mu ikpast'ak'a li watukan akla'antacha'an chi wanaj akt'achiwinan.
64001015	Oxicha k'ats'uk'uchi'. An yu oxi jat'alalhip'in sawalhcha tala'axa'alayan. Lamapaynin, k'ajala'axa'alachika atamjtamin an yu oxi jat'alalhi'anaw.
65001001	Kit'in ikJudas ixma'tsuku an Jesucristo, kit'in ixt'ala'ajun an Santiago, iklala'axa'alayawi uxitnan yu tamapayniyan chi tat'asanitan an kimPayk'an Dios, uxitnan yucha an Jesucristojo talhistaktan.
65001002	Lhuw jamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnati k'ala'a'it'it.
65001003	T'ala'awnin, sawalhcha iklats'o'niputunawi ixlakata an ta'alhtaxtut yu lhit'awnaw kitnan; pero chaway ikla'ts'in li sawalhcha lhitask'iniya li aklajuniw li nt'u k'amak'a'unt'iti li k'amaxt'unik'ant an jakiklaka'inti yu xpujun'alhincha jaxta'nikalh an ixlapanakni Dios.
65001004	Mu ali'in lapanakni tatanumananchalhi an t'an t'awnat'it yu ntu takiklaka'iy an Dios, wa la'asa'. Yu'uncha ma'anchacha jalhisakxtukanta para li kajamama'alh'ajnikana', yu'uncha ntu k'is taja'asmatnan, yu'uncha wa tani tapulaycha an xjamapayninti kiDiosk'an chi tanajuni li ntu sawalhi an yu wa yuchacha kimPayk'an chi kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
65001005	Iklamapast'ak'aniputunaw yu k'ats'ayatcha uxitnan: li an Jamach'alhkat jama'alhtaxtulhi an ixlapanakni an xalakaat'un Egipto pero xli'astan jama'nilhi an yu ntu takiklaka'ilh.
65001006	K'ajap'ast'akt'it wachu an angelhnin yu xtalhit'ajun lhich'alhkat pero ntu talhistaklhi. Yu'uncha tamakawlhi tan xtat'ajun chi chaway tan wa s'oya'cha wilhi jalhit'ajun an Dios. Xpujun'alhincha jach'i'ulakanta laka kadenaj wa tapakxan'icha an wilhchan akxni kajaxta'nikana lhima'alh'ajna.
65001007	K'ap'ast'akt'it wachu an la'acha'an Sodoma chi Gomorra chi yu wa nicha la'acha'anaxni xlaklhitamakajun. An Dios jala'xawalh laka jikmi yu ntu a'tam mixa, mu wa tani talalhcha yu ntucha oxi chi wa ayacha xtalay, chunchacha yu'uncha kintapumak'atsaanikanan.
65001008	Pero masi chunchacha, ani lapanakni wachu talhkilikiya an ixlakatunajk'an. Wa tanlhuncha talakpast'ak'a, jantu tala'ts'imputuni an xlich'alhkat an Jamach'alhkat chi xkayaj tajuniya an yu tach'alhkatnan an lakt'iyan.
65001009	Walh chi masi akxni an arcángelh Miguel xt'alakikxtukut'ajun an xapay makxkay'un akxni xmaxtuniputun an ixlakatunaj Moisés yucha jantu xkayaj junilh, wa juniy: "Yucha an Jamach'alhkatcha Diosi kala'a'ayman".
65001010	Pero aniy lapanakni xkayaj talhichiwiniya yu ntu talhimacha'xay, chi wa tacha jatapakxatcha tajalakpastaknan wa ta'ilhtuycha li kataputalakt'ilhilh.
65001011	¡Payni'incha anchunu lapanakni! Wanajcha yu tiji taxa'a'ilh yu xa'a'ilh an Caín. Wa xliyu li talhitsukuputuni tumin tan tu yu tiji tapu'an, tacha an Balaam chi tacha an Coré, chunchacha tapulakniy wa xliyu ntu taja'asmatnan.
65001012	Aniy lapanakni lhima'anxkayi para uxitnan li wachu ancha tat'ajun an t'an t'a'ayxt'o'at'it, yu wa la'stu ixlapanak an Dios. Yu'uncha wa tamincha lakwaynin chi wa tamincha laj'amanin, jantu tu'u talhiwilay an Dios. Yu'uncha wa tacha wa jataputs'icha yu ntu tu'u lhi'anta xkan yu wa jasunmaj'an an un chi tacha wa k'iwcha yu kataxta'lhicha xjatawk'atk'an pero ntu taxt'a'a. Yu'uncha wanajcha a't'uyi talaknita, jap'ulhumaj'ankantacha chux xjataxiyakk'an.
65001013	Yu'uncha wa tacha akxni an p'ascha milh milh lay ix'ukxni alamalh yu sawalhcha pupuy. An xpuputk'an yu'uncha tapumalakasuycha an yu lhimaxan talay. Tacha wa st'akunincha yu ntu tak'atsay tanchuncha tita'an, yu'uncha jamala'asijninikantacha yu xpujun'alhincha tan wa s'oya'cha wilh.
65001014	An Enoc yu xlipu'a'tujuncha pu'a'p'unmintachalh an Adán, jalhichiwinilhi ani lapanakni najun: "¡K'alhak'ap'up'it'it an Jamach'alhkat! La'alhuw milhi kajat'amina an la'stalan'a ix'angelhnin.
65001015	Kalats'awalaya chi kamama'alh'ajniya watichicha yu ntu oxi tu'u tanlhun lak'ilhtuta yu taxkajiy an Dios chi watichicha yu ntu oxi lhichiwininta an Dios."
65001016	Aniy lapanakni wa tachalayjcha talaknajun chi lhilhiji talhichiwiniy an ali'in lapanakni, pero yu'uncha lhilhiji ta'ilhtuy yu wa xjatapast'ak'atchakan. Sawalhcha talaj'ayajk'atsay, chi wa oxicha taxa'alay an ali'in lapanakni para li kata'o'xcho'oxtunilhcha yu talhitsukuputun
65001017	Pero uxitnani t'ala'awnin, k'ap'ast'akt'iti an chiwinti yu tanawlh an yu xjamala'achatachalh an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
65001018	Yu'uncha xtajunan li akxni xalakti'astancha wilhchan kajuna, kata'alina yu ntu oxi katitalhichiwinilh an Dios chi wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'ani kataputsukuya'.
65001019	Yu'uncha yu wa katamala'apitsiyacha an t'an t'a'ayxt'o'at'it. Yu'uncha wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'ani ta'ilhtuy chi yu'uncha ntu talhit'ajuni an Stalan'a Takuwin.
65001020	Pero uxitnani t'ala'awnin, k'alalak'ut'ilip'axatcha an laka stalan'a mijakiklaka'intik'an. Yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini k'ap'ut'ap'aynit'it.
65001021	Jant'u k'amak'a'unt'iti an xjamapayninti Dios. K'ap'akxan'it'iti para li k'ala'a'it an xjamapayninti an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo sta li kataxta'niyancha an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
65001022	K'ajamak'iklak'a'init'iti an yu ntu lay oxi tajakiklaka'inin an yu wa tamj tamj tapast'ak'a.
65001023	An ali'in k'ajama'alht'axt'ut ch'i k'ajaxa'ak'ut'ut'iti an laka jikmi; chi an ali'in k'ajamap'aynit'it, pero k'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, mu masi an wa xla'ch'itchak'an tasmala'atalh, tacha an wa tani talaycha yu ntu oxi.
65001024	An yu wa yucha Dios, an kiJamach'alhkatk'an, layi tama'ayan para li nt'u k'at'a'a't'at'it, chi stalan'ani tamalakasuyan tan ch'alhkatnan chi laka ay achat.
65001025	An yu wa yucha Dios chi jalakpastaknan, yu kintama'alhtaxtun, ixlakata yu ilhtulh an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo, yuchacha ay kala'ts'inkalh, akxni a'taynichalh chi chaway chi xpujun'alhincha. chunchacha kawalh.
66001001	Yucha aniya yu an Dios masunilh an Jesucristo, para li yucha kajamasunilhi an yu tat'atapatsay tuchini yu katapasayacha watukan. An Jesucristo mala'achalhi an ix'angelh para li ka'alh mak'atsaanini an Juan yu t'atapatsay an Jesucristo tuchini yu katapasayacha.
66001002	Chi yucha laknawlhcha tani najuncha an ixchiwinti Dios chi tani najuncha an Jesucristo chi chux an tanlhun yu la'ts'ilh.
66001003	Sawalhcha oxi para yucha yu punajun chi yu ta'asmat'a aniy chiwinti yu najun yu katapasaya', chi yu takiklaka'iya yu ani ts'o'muk'akanta, mu chint'ajuncha an panch'e'ex.
66001004	Kit'in ikJuan, ijkala'axa'alayi an lakatujun tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin, an xalakaat'un Asia. Kataxta'nincha an jamapayninti chi an oxi jatawlhnat an yu yucha ixjunita chi kamina', chi yu tamala'achaniyan an la'atujun Takuwin yu tat'ajun la x'ukxlakapu tan wilh,
66001005	wachu katamapaynini an Jesucristo. Yucha sawalhi yu najun, yu p'ulhnaj la'awcho'olh yu ntucha nicho'oy chi yu jach'alhkatnaniya an rejnin aniy lakaat'un. An Cristo kintamapayniyan chi kintama'alhtaxtuni lakintala'alhink'an la xjak'alhni.
66001006	Chi kinta'ilhtuni rejnin chi li isacerdotejnin an Diosi kajunwi, an ixPay. An ta'ayat chi an alhp'asninti ixnawincha yucha kajun'alhilh. Chunchacha kawalh.
66001007	An Cristo an laka jataputs'i kamina', chi ta lhichuxi kala'ts'inkana'. An yu tapajalhto'olh wachu katala'ts'ina', chi ta lakachux alin la'acha'an aniy lakaamunulhpa katalhita'oxila'alhiya'. Chuncha kajuna'.
66001008	An Jamach'alhkat Dios yu lay ilhtu'ojoy watuchicha, najun: Kit'ini yu p'ulhnaj chi yu astan, kit'ini yu chaway, chi kit'ini yu xajkunita, chi kit'ini yu kamina'.
66001009	Kit'in ijJuan mint'ala'ajunk'an chi mint'alhtanak'an mu an Jesús wachu ki'ilhtuyi li aklhitayanilhi an laka lhima'alh'ajna chi an laka lhich'alhkat. An tan wanaj la'atanchanu'ojota xkan lakaat'uni xakt'ajun, tan junkan Patmos, ixlakata an ixchiwinti Dios chi an tacha najun an Jesucristo.
66001010	Akxni ixwilhchan an Jamach'alhkat Dios, an Takuwin kila'chilh chi wanaj kila'tanu'olh chi p'asi chiwinkalh ik'asmatlhi an ki'a'lhcha', tacha makat'ajun la'atam s'olh.
66001011	Najun: "Kit'ini yu p'ulhnaj chi astan. K'ats'o'muk'acha laka librojo an t'ach'a la'ts'in ch'i k'amala'ach'at'icha an lakatujun la'acha'an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin, an xalakaat'un Asia: an la'acha'an Éfeso, chi Esmirna, chi Pérgamo, chi Tiatira, chi Sardis, chi Filadelfia chi Laodisea."
66001012	Chi iklaka'ampalh para li akla'ts'ilhcha tichini an xakint'achiwinicha, ma'atujun yu de oro pula'ma'tajiy maklhku ikla'ts'ilh,
66001013	chi xtan'ajni an ma'atujun de oro yu pula'ma'taji jikmi ikla'ts'in pumatam wa tacha ists'alh lapanak, an ixla'ch'it wanaj lhman, wanaj la xch'aja ixcha'anini chi an la xtankilhakni p'a'xcha ixtankilhak'anta a'xtam cinturón de oro.
66001014	An ix'ay wa la'sut'ut'ucha tacha wa ixla'ach'awtcha borrego u tacha wa nievejcha, chi an ixla'chulh wa tacha wa ma'tajitacha jikmi.
66001015	An ixch'aja wa tacha wa broncejcha yu jasp'uyulanti slimj ixtasuy, tacha tasuy akxni maskakakan laka horno. Chi an xchiwinti p'asi ixmakat'ajun tacha makat'ajun tan xt'ajyalh xkan.
66001016	An la xmaka yu oxi ixjach'apata la'atujun st'aku chi an la xkilhni ixkilhtaxtuy ma'atam espada yu ta'ukxput'uy kikxtuy, chi an ix'ukxpu wa tacha an wilhchancha akxni an p'as tukan makalip'a.
66001017	Akxni ikla'ts'ilh, ikta'a'talh wa tacha wa iknitacha iktamachalh la xjach'aja', pero yucha kimpu'aych'apachalhi an yu oxi ixmaka chi kijuniy: Jant'u k'at'alhan, kit'ini yu p'ulhnaj chi yu astan,
66001018	chi ikt'ajun. Xaknitalh, pero chaway ixpujun'alhincha li ikt'ajun. Kit'in iklhit'ajuni an xayave lhinin chi an xayave tan alin ma'alh'ajnat, laka la'nin.
66001019	K'ats'o'muk'acha an tanlhun t'ach'a an la'ts'i, yu chaway laktapasat'ajun chi yu astan kalaktapasaya'.
66001020	Jantu xamati k'atsay, an la'atujun st'aku an k'ijama'la'ts'in tan oxi kimaka yu'uncha an pumatujun angelhnin yu tat'ajun lakatamin an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin.
66002001	K'ats'o'nini an xa'angelh an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'nin an la'acha'an Efeso: Chunchuniya najun an yu jach'apata la'atujun st'aku laka oxi ixmaka', an yu aklat'ajun xtan'ajni an ma'atujun yu de oro pula'ma'tajiy maklhku. Najun:
66002002	Kit'in ijk'atsa'ojoyi t'uchini ilht'uycha, ch'i li p'asi t'ap'ats'ay ch'i li lhit'ayaniy, chi ijk'atsayi li jant'u jala'ts'imp'ut'uni an yu wa ay tajunita. Wachu ijk'atsayi li jalhila'ts'int'anuyi an yu tanajun li Diosi jamala'achay chi ntu sawalh, chi jak'ats'anicha li wa tamaslakatinincha.
66002003	Uxint'i lhit'ayaniy ch'i ma'alh'ajnani kilakata ch'i nt'u k'imak'a'un, alhp'asi t'ap'ats'ay mu k'imap'ayniy.
66002004	Pero ajkunani yu nt'u oxi ilht'uy, li jant'uch'a lamap'ayniyat'iti chaway tacha xlip'ulhnaj.
66002005	Xliyu iklhijunan chaway k'ap'ast'akt'icha t'anch'unch'a ixt'a'un, k'ach'a'o'ach'o'ocha an Dios chi k'a'ilht'uch'o'ocha yu ix'ilht'uy xlip'ulhnaj. Li jant'u k'at'i'ilht'u, li jant'uch'a k'at'ich'a'o'a Dios akla'antacha'an chi akma'osuniyani amimpumaklhku an tan uk'alh.
66002006	Pero yu oxich'a t'ach'a an lay li xk'a'iya an tanlhun yu ta'ilhtuy an nikolaytajnin, kit'in wachu ntu oxi iklhiwilay.
66002007	Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna ka'asmatlhicha yu jajuniy an Takuwin an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin. Yu kalhajayanta akxta'niya para li ka'unilhi xajatawk'at an k'iw yu xt'a'a jatsukunti, yu yalh ixtan'ajni an la xjardin Dios.
66002008	Chi k'ats'o'nin wachu an xa'angelh an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Esmirna: Chunchuniya najun an yu p'ulhnaj chi yu xati'astan, an yu nilh chi la'awcho'olh.
66002009	Kit'in ijk'atsaniyani mi ma'alh'ajnat chi minkilhpatit (masi lhit'aw'u'oyi yu ma'lht'ask'iniy). Chi ijk'atsayi tacha wa aya talhichiwinan an yu tanajun li judiojnin, pero yu'uncha wa yucha an satanascha tat'ata'ayxt'o'a.
66002010	Jant'u k'at'alhani masi t'uch'ini k'ama'alh'ajnana'acha, mu an xapay makxkay'un kajatamaknuya lakapulach'in ali'in yu de uxitnan, para li chux uxitnan k'alhila'ts'int'anuk'ant'it, chi la'akaw wilhchani k'ama'alh'ajnana'it'it. K'alhit'ayanini ak'int'a'aklats'uk'u, sta wa akxni k'aniya'acha, walh lani akxta'niyani an jatsukunti.
66002011	¡Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhicha yu jajuniy an Takuwin an tan tala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin! Yu katalhajayanta jantu k'is tani katija'ilhtukalh an tan ixlila'at'uycha lhinin.
66002012	Wach'u k'ats'o'nini an xa'angelh an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Pérgamo: Chunchuniya najun an yu lhit'ajun espada yu ta'ukxput'uy kikxtuy:
66002013	Kit'in ijk'atsayi li t'an an wilht'i ancha wilh an satanás, tan ch'alhkatnan, pero masi chuncha jant'u k'imak'a'unt'a ch'i na'uni li k'ink'iklak'a'i, jant'u k'imak'awi masi akxni an ma'nikalh an Antipas yu oxi xakilhichiwiniy. An la'acha'an an tan wilh an satanasi ma'nikalh.
66002014	Pero alin lakats'uni tanlhuni yu ilht'uy yu ntu oxi, li anch'a jalhit'a'un ali'in yu ntu tamakawputun tacha an masuy an Balaam, mu an Balaam masunilhi an Balak li kajama'ilhtulhi tala'alhin an israelitajnin, jama'ilhtulhi li kata'ulhi tanlhun yu ixja'ulanikantacha an yu tacha ixdiosninchak'an tala'ts'in an lapanakni chi li wa aya katalalhcha.
66002015	Wach'u jalhit'a'un ali'ini yu ntu tamakawputun tacha an tamasuy an nikolaytajnin.
66002016	Xliyu k'amak'awcha mintala'alhin ch'i k'ach'a'o'ach'o'ocha an Dios, li jantu, watukan akla'antacha'an, chi an laka espada an yu ijkilhtaxtuy ajkaput'alasaya'.
66002017	¡Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna ka'asmatlhicha yu jajuniy an Takuwin an tan tala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin. Yu katalhajayanta ajkaxta'niya li kata'ulhi an maná yu patajulh lakt'iyan, yu tats'e'ta. Chi wachu ajkaxta'niya la'atam lakat'ikt'i sut'ut'u chiwx yu puwilh la'atam sast'i ta'a'ut yu ntu xamati mispay, wa yucha an yu jamalh'tayanani kamispaya'.
66002018	Wach'u k'ats'o'nini an xa'angelh an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Tiatira: Chunchuniya najun an isTs'alh Dios, an yu lhit'ajun ixla'chulh yu wa tacha wa malh'tajitacha jikmi chi lhit'ajun ixch'aja yu wa tacha wa sp'uyulakantacha.
66002019	Najun: Kit'in ijk'atsa'ojoyi yu ilht'uy tanlhun, ikmispaniyani mijamapayninti chi mijakiklaka'inti chi mintapatsat ch'i li lhit'ayani, chi ijk'atsayi li t'ach'a an ixlak'ilht'uy tanlhun ixlip'ulhnaj chaway palaych'a lak'ilht'uy.
66002020	Pero ajkunani t'an t'u oxi lay, li laych'a mak'awniy tacha an masuy an t'aku yu junkan Jezabel, yu najun li ixchiwinti Dios lhichiwiniy, para li lay kajapu'o'xcho'olh an yu kintat'atapatsay. Mu yucha wa jamatanunicha li wa aya katalalhcha chi li kata'ulhcha tanlhun yu ixja'ulanikantacha an yu tacha ixdiosninchak'an tala'ts'in an lapanakni.
66002021	Kit'in ikxta'niya panch'e'ex para li astancha kanawlh chi kamakawlhcha tacha an lay, pero yucha ntu makawputun chi ntu makajuni li wa aya.
66002022	Xliyu chaway ak'ilhtuya li katamachalhi la xputamat, chi ajkaxta'niya ay lhima'alh'ajna an yu wa aya tat'alay li ntu astancha tanajun chi li ntu tamakajuncha an tacha jama'ilhtuy an Jezabel.
66002023	Chi an ixlapanakni ajkama'niniya', chi ta lakachux an tacha tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin, katak'atsaya li kit'in oxi ikmispani ixjatapast'ak'at a lapanak chi an ixjalhunut. Chi tuchini yu ilhtutacha atamj atamj uxitnan chunchacha akxta'niya wachu'.
66002024	Pero uxitnan chi an ali'in yu tat'ajun an la'acha'an Tiatira yu nt'u yu ch'a'o'ayat an tacha masuy Jezabel ch'i nt'u misp'ayat'iti yu tajuniy yu'uncha li laj'ay ixjatapast'ak'at satanás, kit'in iklajunaw: Jantucha tu'u ali aktilajuniw yu k'a'ilht'ut.
66002025	Pero yu lhit'awnatcha wa sa'cha k'alhits'uk'ut sta akxni akmina'.
66002026	Yu kalhajayanta chi sta wa ixpu'uktaxtuncha chuncha ka'ilhtuya tacha kit'in iknajun, ak'ilhtuya li kajach'alhkatnanilhi an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni,
66002027	chi alhp'asni kajach'alhkatnaniya laka ma'atam tsasnat, kajala'p'a'x'ulaya tacha la'atam xaluj yu wa de t'un, tacha kit'in kixta'nita lhich'alhkat an kimPay.
66002028	Chi wachu akxta'niya an xast'aku jatunkunu'.
66002029	Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna ka'asmatlhicha yu jajuniy an Takuwin an tan tala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin.
66003001	Wach'u k'ats'o'nini an xa'angelh an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Sardis: Chunchuniya najun an yu lhit'ajun la'atujun ixtakuwin Dios chi la'atujun st'aku jalhit'ajun: Kit'in ijk'atsa'ojoyi t'uch'ini ilht'uycha chi ijk'atsayi li masi sawalhch'a lhimisp'ak'an li la'a'unt'a, nit'a.
66003002	K'ak'ujt'icha, k'ala'alhp'asnit'icha yu laj'oxi tanlhun la mijatsukunti para li ntu kats'an'a'olh, mu an yu lak'ilht'uy tanlhun jantu laj'oxicha la x'ukxlakapu an Dios.
66003003	P'us k'ap'ast'akt'icha t'uch'ini la'a'it'acha ch'i t'uch'ini asmatt'acha; ch'i k'a'ilht'ucha k'ach'a'o'ach'o'ocha an Dios. Li jant'u k'at'ik'ujt'i, tacha an lay ja'alhawana akla'cha'anan, akxni jant'u s'alaj wilht'i.
66003004	Pero jalhit'a'un lakats'uniya an la'acha'an Sardis yu oxi tat'ajun yu tachanu ntu talhkilikita an ixla'ch'itk'an, yu'uncha akintat'a'aklatsukuya laka la'sut'ut'u ixla'ch'itk'an, mu yu'uncha tat'acha'an.
66003005	Yu kalhajayanta, laka sut'ut'u ixla'ch'iti kamala'ch'inina chi ntu aktimala'mixilhi an ixta'a'ut an laka libro, an tan tasuy yu kaxta'nikana jatsukunti, chi aknawna ixta'a'ut la x'ukxlakapu an kimPay chi la x'ukxlakapuk'an an angelhnin.
66003006	Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhicha yu jajuniy an Takuwin an tan tala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.
66003007	Wach'u k'ats'o'nini an xa'angelh an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios an la'acha'an Filadelfia: Chunchuniya najun an yu Stalan'a chi an yu Sawalh, an yu lhit'ajun an xyave an ay jamach'alhkat David, an yu akxni malhti'ay tucha xamati lay malaklhchajuy chi akxni malaklhchajuy tucha xamati lay malhti'ay.
66003008	Yucha najun: Kit'in ijk'atsa'ojoyi t'uch'ini ilht'uycha, la milakapu ikyawlh la'atam malhticha yu lhti'ay, jantu lay xamati katimalaklhchawlh, mu masi wa lakats'uniya lhit'a'un mintachaput, pero ilht'uyi an kinchiwinti ch'i nt'u a't'am na'unt'a li ntu kilapanakk'at'i.
66003009	An yu jama'ayxt'o'a an satanás, an yu wa tamaslakatinin tanajun li judiojnin, walh chi ntu sawalh, ajka'ilhtuya li kata'an tatso'ottaninini la mijach'aja', para li katak'atsalhi li kit'in ikmapayniyan.
66003010	Mu uxint'i k'iklak'a'iya an kinchiwinti li kalhitayanikalh, pus kit'in wachu akma'ayani akxni kachina ixpanch'e'ex lalhila'ts'intanut ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa', para li kajalhila'ts'intanukalhcha an yu tawilanalh aniy lakaat'un.
66003011	Kit'in watukancha akmina', k'asa'ch'a lhits'uk'u yu lhit'a'un, para li ntu xamati kamaxtunin an minkorona.
66003012	Yu katalhajayanta ajka'ilhtuya li yuchaa xatiatsas katawalh an la xtemplo an kiDios. Chi ntucha a'tam katitataxtulhi ancha, chi yu'uncha ajkaputs'o'muk'aya an ixta'a'ut an kiDios chi an ixta'a'ut an ixla'acha'an an kiDios, yu junkan sast'i Jerusalén, yu lakt'iyan mintachalh, yu yucha an kiDios makmintachalh. Chi wachu ajkaputs'o'ulaya an sast'i kinta'a'ut.
66003013	Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhicha yu jajuniy an Takuwin an tan tala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.
66003014	Wach'u k'ats'o'nini an xa'angelh an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios an la'acha'an Laodicea: Chunchuniya najun an yu junkan Amén, an yu sawalh yu najun yu lhitala'si, yu pu'alilh chux an tanlhun, yu an Dios ilhtulh:
66003015	Kit'in ijk'atsa'ojoyi chux yu ilht'uy. Ijk'atsayi li ntu ts'uk'unk'uk'at'i chi ntu skakatak'at'i. ¡Apalijcha ts'uk'unk'u u skakata k'a'unt'i!
66003016	Pero mu wa pax'onk'at'i jantu ts'uk'unk'uk'at'i chi ntu skakatak'at'i, akp'at'akilhtaxtuyani la kinkilhni.
66003017	Mu uxint'i na'un: Kit'in ikjamatumin lhuwcha iklaklhit'ajun kintanlhun chi ntucha tu'u ikma'lhtask'ini; pero nt'u k'ats'ay li uxint'i jant'u ach'an, jant'u t'u'u lhit'a'un, wa k'ilhp'at'i, wa la'lhtuluk'at'i chi wa alhalhak'at'i.
66003018	Xliyu kit'in iklhimap'a'siyan li kit'ini akint'amawnin oro yu oxicha ts'utkanta laka jikmi, para li k'alhits'uk'ut'iti yu Dios xt'a'a; chi kit'ini ak'int'amawnin sut'ut'u mila'ch'it para li k'amala'ch'in chi chuncha ntu katasulhi an lhit'amaxan mi'alhalhanti, chi kit'ini ak'int'amawnin lhak'uch'un yu k'alakp'ut'awk'a para li k'ajalak'awan.
66003019	Kit'in ixchuxk'an yu ijkamapayni ijkamap'a'siy chi ijkalaj'aymay, pus chaway jo'at'i k'anaw k'ach'a'o'ach'o'ocha Dios.
66003020	Kit'in laka malhticha ikyalh chi ikchiwini; li xamati ki'asmatniy chi malhti'ayi an malhticha, aktanuya chi akt'alakwayna chi yucha akint'alakwayna'.
66003021	Yu kalhajayanta akmakawniya li akint'alaktawlanta tan akch'alhkatnana'. Tacha kit'in iklhajachalh, chi chaway ikt'alakwilhcha an kimPay la xputawlan tan ch'alhkatnan.
66003022	Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhicha yu an Takuwin jajuniy an tan tala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.
66004001	Xli'astan akxni chunchacha ikla'ts'in'olh ijkalakawanalh ikla'ts'in la'atam malhticha yu lhti'ay, an lakt'iyan; chi yu p'ulhcha chiwinti ik'asmatlhi wa tacha wa pus'olhkalhcha kikst'ilhilh s'olh, kijuniy: Anicha k'at'awk'ach'it'a, walh lani akmasuniyancha an tanlhun yu wa kalaktapasayaka.
66004002	Wa akxni la xmakni an Takuwincha iktsukulh chi ikla'ts'ilhcha la'atam putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan an lakt'iyan, chi ancha sa'cha ixpuwilh tichiyucha.
66004003	Chi an yu ancha sa' ixwilh wa tacha an tasuycha jaspeje ixtasuy u tacha an tasuy an rubí, chi ixtuntala'acho'o an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan ixyalhcha la'atam ixkulhmakchat wa xlimjcha ixtasuy tacha la'atam esmeralda.
66004004	Chi ixtuntala'acho'o an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan a'ap'uxamt'at'i putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan wachu ixla'acho'owilhnilh; chi ijkala'ts'in an tan lakwilhcha putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan sa'cha ixtalakwilanalh pumap'uxamt'at'i tatanin wa la'sut'ut'ucha an ixla'ch'itk'an chi talaj'a'tanumanalhcha ixkoronajk'an de oro.
66004005	Chi an tan wilhcha an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan ixtaxtuyachilhcha jamakalipni chi xt'asaycha xalapanak xkan chi ixchiwinkan; chi lhilaxlakapu an tan wilh an yu puch'alhkatnankan ma'atujun k'iw yu lajkinkama'tajita ixtamapulhkuy, yu'uncha yucha an la'atujun xTakuwin Dios.
66004006	Chi lhilaxlakapu an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan ikla'ts'in wa tacha wa la'atamcha alamalh de vidrio, wa tacha de cristalhcha; chi wani an tan wilh an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi ixtuntala'acho'o, ixtawilanalh ixt'at'ink'an yu tala'ajunta, wa stakcha talhit'ajun ixla'chulhk'an la xlakapuk'an chi la x'a'lhch'ak'an.
66004007	An p'ulhnajcha tuchichun yu la'ajunta wa tacha la'atam lión, an xlila'at'uycha wa tacha wa la'atam becerro, an xlila'at'utucha wa tacha ix'ukxpu lapanaki lhit'ajun, chi an xlila'at'at'icha wa tacha wa la'atamcha ats'o'o yu jalht'ilitninta.
66004008	Chi la'atamincha an la'at'at'i tuchichun yu tala'ajunta talaklhit'ajun la'achaxanan ixpa'achujk'an, chi ixtuntala'acho'o chi ixlipulakni an ixpa'achujk'an wa stakcha lakwilhnilh la'chulh chi ntu sa' ixtakilhuni tunku chi puts'ista. Ixtanajun: Stalan'a, stalan'a, stalan'a an Jamach'alhkat Dios, yu lay ilhtu'u'ojoy chux an tanlhun. Yucha ixjunita, chi yu yucha chaway chi yu kaminaka'.
66004009	Chi an la'at'at'i tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, a'tamin a'tamin ixtanajuni li ayi an yu sa' xwilh la xpuch'alhkatna an yu ixpujun'alhincha li t'ajun chi yu'uncha xtalhiwilay chi xtaxta'niy lhimala'puchajun.
66004010	Akxni chuncha ixta'ilhtuy, an ixpumap'uxamt'at'ik'an tatanin ixtatatso'ottanicha la x'ukxlakapu an yu sa' xwilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan, chi ixtala'ts'incha li yucha ayi an yu ixpujun'alhincha li t'ajun, chi ixtamaka'ancha an ixkoronajk'an la xlakapu an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan. Chi ixtanajun:
66004011	Jamach'alhkat, uxint'i t'ach'ip'ini li ayi k'ala'ts'ink'a ch'i li k'alhiwilak'a ch'i li k'ach'alhk'atna, mu uxint'iy yu lak'ilht'u chux an tanlhun chi la mintalakask'i li lak'alin chi li ilhtukalh.
66005001	Chi an yu sa'cha ixwilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan ikma'la'ts'in an tan lhi'oxi ixmaka ixch'apata la'atam libro, ta'ukxput'uyi ts'o'kanta chi lakatujuni oxi ixch'axpach'ikanta an libro.
66005002	Chi ikla'ts'ilh pumatam angelh yu k'ut'ilh yu p'as ixnajun: "¿Tisiyuchacha yu t'acha'an li lay kapux'otlhi an libro chi li kach'axpax'otmaj'alh an la'atujun yu puch'axpach'ikanta?"
66005003	Pero nin an lakt'iyan nin an lakaat'un nin an ixtan'api an lakaat'un, jantu xamati lay ixpux'ot'a an libro chi ntu layi masi wa katala'ts'ilhcha.
66005004	Chi kit'in sawalhcha xak'alhun, mu ntu xamati ixla'cha'ankan yu t'acha'an kapux'otlhi an libro chi li lay kapunawlh chi li lay kala'ts'ilh.
66005005	Pero xapumatam an tatanin kijuniy: "Jant'u k'a'alhu, mu an lión yu minchalh la xt'alalhila'ts'inin an Judá, yu ixjataxiyak an David, yucha lhajatachalhcha, para li lay kapux'otlhi an libro chi li lay kala'ch'axpax'otmaj'alh an la'atujun yu puch'axpach'ikanta."
66005006	Wachuncha ijkalakawanalh chi ikla'ts'in ixtan'ajnichak'an an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan, chi an ixt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, chi an laktatanin, ixyalh la'atam jas'at'a borrego, tacha wa ixma'nikantacha ixtasuy. Chi la'atujun ix'a'alo'oti ixlhit'ajun chi la'atujun ixla'chulh, yucha nawputun an la'atujun takuwin yu ixnawin an Dios yu jamala'achakanta ta ixlijalhi'ay an lakaat'un.
66005007	An borrego stalh la'alhi an yu sa' ixwilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi ma'lhtaylhcha an libro an yu sa' ixch'apata tan lhi'oxi ixmaka'.
66005008	Chi akxni jama'lhtayanalhcha an libro, an ixt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta chi an ixpumap'uxamt'at'ik'an tatanin tatatso'ottalhcha la xlakapu an borrego. Si ixtalaklhit'ajun x'arpajk'an chi si ixtalaklhi'anta copa de oro ixlaj'a'tsamanta cencia, yucha jumputun an ixtapaynitk'an an yu takiklaka'iy Dios,
66005009	chi ixtalakmilhpaycha la'atam sast'i milhpat. Ixtanajun: Uxint'i t'ach'ip'ini li k'ajama'lht'ayani an libro. Ch'i li k'ala'x'otnini an yu puch'axpach'ikanta. Mu uxint'i ma'nik'a chi an la mijak'alhni jama'alht'axt'ut'i an lapanakni para li ixnawin Diosi katawalh, ta kilhmakchux ta'alin an lapanakni, ta kilhmakchux chiwinti, ta kilhmakchux la'acha'an chi ta kilhmakchux lhich'alhkat.
66005010	Ja'ilht'u li ixrejnin an kiDiosk'ani katawalh chi isacerdotejnin chi li katach'alhkatnalhi ani ix'ukxni lakaat'un.
66005011	Chi iklaka'ampalh, wanaj lhuw angelhnini ijka'alha'asmatlhi, xtuntala'acho'ochak'an an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta chi an laktatanincha ixtayanalh. Lhuw tukani ixtayanalh, wanaj la'alhuw millón.
66005012	Chi p'asi ixtachiwiniy ixtanajun: ¡An borrego an yu ma'nikalh t'acha'ani li kala'a'ilhi an lhich'alhkat, chi an tanlhun yu laj'oxi, chi an jatapast'ak'at, chi an tachaput, chi li kalhila'sikalh, chi li ayi kala'ts'inkalh chi kamilhpanikalh!
66005013	Chi chux yu ilhtukanta yu alinachalh an lakt'iyan, chi ix'ukxni an lakaat'un, chi ixtan'api an lakaat'un, chi an alamalh, chi chux yu ancha lak'alin, ik'asmat'a ixtanajun: ¡An yu wilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan, chi an jas'at'a borrego, kajamilhpanikalh, kajalhila'sikalh, chi ayi kajala'ts'inkalh chi ixpujun'alhincha katach'alhkatnalh!
66005014	An ixt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta ixtanajun: "Chunchacha kawalh". Chi an ixpumap'uxamt'at'ik'an tatanin tatatso'ottanilhcha chi tatamuntitanilhcha, chi tala'ts'ilhcha li yucha ayi an yu ixpujun'alhincha li t'ajun.
66006001	Ikla'ts'ini akxni an jas'at'a Borrego exnilhcha ma'atami an ma'atujun yu puch'axpach'ikanta an libro, chi xapumatam an ixt'at'ink'an an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta ik'asmat'a tacha wa t'asaycha xalapanak xkan, najun: ¡K'at'at'i chi k'ala'ts'i!
66006002	Sa'cha ikla'ts'in, ikla'ts'in la'atam sut'ut'u kawayo, an yu ixpu'uk'alh ixli'anta la'atam pulhk'awilh ixpatipni, chi xta'nikalhcha la'atam corona, lhajatachalhcha taxtunilh para li alicha kalhajachalh.
66006003	Akxni exnilhcha yu xlima'at'uycha an yu puch'axpach'ikanta libro an jas'at'a Borrego, ik'alha'asmat'a an yu xlipumat'uycha tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, najun: "¡K'at'at'icha chi k'ala'ts'icha!"
66006004	A'tam ikla'ts'impalh la'atam kawayo, slapulh, chi an yu ixpu'uk'alh xta'nikalh lhich'alhkat para li layi kama'osulh an oxi jatawlhnat an lakaat'un chi li katalama'nipaxalhi an lapanakni, chi xta'nikalhcha ma'atam lhman espada.
66006005	Akxni xlima'at'utucha exnilh an jas'at'a Borrego an yu puch'axpach'ikanta libro, ik'alha'asmat'a an yu xlipumat'utuchak'an an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, najun: "¡K'at'at'icha chi k'ala'ts'icha!" Pus sa'cha iklaka'an chi ikla'ts'ilhcha la'atam ts'iti kawayo, an yu ixpu'uk'alh ixch'apata la'atam pama'ch'ixni.
66006006	Chi ixtan'ajnik'an an ixt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta ik'asmat'a nawkan: "Tam kilo trigo tamcha wilhchan xatapatsat, chi la'at'utu kilo cebada tamcha wilhchan xatapatsat; pero an aceite chi an jamaskajanti xaxkan uva jantu kamin'olh."
66006007	Akxni xlima'at'at'icha exli an yu puch'axpach'ikanta libro an jas'at'a Borrego ik'alha'asmat'a an yu xlipumat'at'ichak'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, najun: "¡K'at'at'icha chi k'ala'ts'icha!"
66006008	Sa'cha ikla'ts'in, ikla'ts'in la'atam x'awaw kawayo chi an yu ixpu'uk'alh, lhinin ixjunkan, chi an la'nin ixch'a'o'atacha, chi jamakawnikalhcha para li an cuarta parte tacha an wilakalh an lakaat'un katajama'ninilh laka espada chi laka chawan chi laka ta'an'at chi laka an ma'tilin yu ta'alin an lakaat'un.
66006009	Akxni an jas'at'a Borrego exlicha an yu xlima'akisicha yu puch'axpach'ikanta an libro, an ixtan'api an tan ja'ulanankan ijkala'ts'incha an ixtakuwink'an an yu jalhima'nikanta an ixchiwinti Dios chi ixlakata li sawalhi tacha an ixtanajun.
66006010	P'ascha ixtachiwiniy ixtanajun: "Jamach'alhkat, yu stalan'a, chi yu sawalh, ¿sta tasu wanancha wa k'at'ip'akxaniya'a para li k'aja'uncha li oxi u jantu tani talaycha an yu tawilanalh an lakaat'un ch'i k'ajalhich'it'icha an kijak'alhnik'ani?"
66006011	Wachuncha jala'xta'nikalhcha la'sut'ut'u ixla'ch'itk'an chi jajunkan li katapakxampalhka lakats'uni panch'e'ex, sta li katata'a'tsalhcha an ixt'ala'ajunk'an yu wachu chun kajalhima'nikana tacha yu'uncha jalhima'nikalh ixlakata li tat'atapatsay an Dios.
66006012	Akxni an jas'at'a Borrego exlicha an ixlima'achaxancha yu puch'axpach'ikanta an libro, ikla'ts'in p'as tukani laklalh an lakaat'un, an wilhchan wa ts'iticha walh, tacha wa la'ch'itcha yu pu'ankan tan nikanta, chi an malhkuyu wa slapulhcha walh, tacha wa jak'alhnicha.
66006013	Chi an st'akunin tapatajulhcha an lakt'iyan, an lakaat'uncha tatamachalh, tacha akxni an tapatajuy an higo yu la'st'a'awka la xak'iw, akxni p'as lak'anuy an un.
66006014	An lakt'iyan la'mixlicha, tacha akxni a'xtam jalhiki pasmilhkan, chi chux an a'stitawk'a chi chux an lakaat'un yu la'atanchanu'ojota xkan tatalaklakapaxatawilhi an tan ixtawilanalh.
66006015	Chi an xarejnin aniy lakaat'un chi an xalaj'ajin lapanakni, chi an yu jamatuminin chi an xalaj'ajin soldadojnin chi an yu wa talhinajuncha an lapanakni aniy lakaamunulhpa chi chux yu wa ma'tsukucha chi yu jantu, tala'tats'e'lhicha an tan la'tan'apilho'o'o lakaat'un chi tan lakpujawilh laj'ay chiwx an laj'a'stitawk'a.
66006016	Chi ixtajunicha an laj'a'stitawk'a chi an laj'ay chiwx: "Akila'a'lhtants'iwcha chi akilamats'e'wicha, para li ntucha akintala'ts'ini an yu wilh tan ch'alhkatnan chi ntucha akla'ts'iwi ixtalh'amti an jas'at'a Borrego.
66006017	Mu chaway chilhcha an ay wilhchan yu pujamama'alh'ajninin; ¿tisiyuchacha lay kalhitayaniya'a?"
66007001	Xli'astan ijkala'ts'ilhcha ixt'at'ink'an angelhnin sa'cha ixtayanalh an tama'ats'astut'at'i lakaat'un, ixtasast'uk'acha an la'at'at'i un yu alin aniy lakaat'un, para li ntu k'is kalalhi un an la x'ukxni lakaat'un chi an la x'ukxni alamalh chi masi wa a'atamcha k'iw kasunulh.
66007002	Chi wachu ikla'ts'impalh pumatam angelh yu tach'ixchalh an tan akxajachilh wilhchan, chi ixlit'ajuncha an iseyo an Dios yu la'ajunta. Chi p'ascha jaxa'alalh an ixt'at'ink'an angelhnin, an yu ixjaxta'nikantacha lhich'alhkat li layi katalakt'ilhilh an lakaat'un chi an alamalh.
66007003	Jajuniy: "Jant'uk'a' k'alhit'ama'ch'ap'ut'iti an lakaat'un chi an alamalh chi an lakaak'iwin, sta akxni kajamuntiseyojla'oyawcha an yu tat'atapatsay kiDiosk'an."
66007004	Chi ik'asmatlhicha tani ixpumachuxchak'ani an yu jaseyojlakalh: 144.000 yu jaseyojlakalh, ta kilhmakchux an ixjas'at'an an Israelhi jasakxtukalh.
66007005	An yu yucha an Judá tapu'a'p'unminchalh, la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu yucha an Rubén tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Gad, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uy milh lapanaknicha jaseyojlakalh.
66007006	An yu Aser, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uy milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Neftalí, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Manasés, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh.
66007007	An yu Siméon, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Leví, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Isacar, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh.
66007008	An yu Zabulón, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu José, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh chi an yu Benjamín, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh.
